Exod 32:28 Amadodana kaLevi enza njengezwi likaMose, kwawa ngalolo suku abantu kungathi abayizinkulungwane ezintathu.
Exod 32:29 Wayesethi uMose: “Njengalokhu yilowo nalowo emelene nendodana yakhe nanomfowabo, manizahlukanisele namuhla kuJehova ukuba aninike isibusiso namuhla.”
Exod 32:30 Kwathi ngangomuso uMose wathi kubantu: “Nenzile isono esikhulu; sengiyakukhuphukela kuJehova, uma mhlawumbe ngingenza ukubuyisana ngesono senu.”
Exod 32:31 UMose wabuyela kuJehova, wathi: “Hawu, laba bantu benzile isono esikhulu, bazenzele onkulunkulu ngegolide.
Exod 32:32 Nokho uma ubathethelela isono sabo; kepha uma ungabathetheleli, ake ungesule encwadini yakho oyilobileyo.”
Exod 32:33 UJehova wayesethi kuMose: “Owonile kimi ngiyakumesula encwadini yami.
Exod 32:34 Kalokhu hamba-ke, uhole abantu, uye kuleyo ndawo engakhuluma ngayo kuwe; bheka, ingelosi yami iyakuhamba phambi kwakho; kepha mhla ngibahambela ngiyakuhambela isono sabo kubo.”
Exod 32:35 UJehova wayesebashaya-ke abantu, ngokuba benza ithole lelo alenzayo u-Aroni.
Exod 33:1 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: “Hamba wenyuke lapha, wena nabantu obakhuphulile ezweni laseGibithe, uye ezweni engalifungela ku-Abrahama, naku-Isaka, nakuJakobe, ngathi: ‘Ngiyakulinika inzalo yakho.’
Exod 33:2 Ngiyakuthuma ingelosi phambi kwakho, ngiwaxoshe amaKhanani, nama-Amori, namaHeti, namaPherizi, namaHivi, namaJebusi,
Exod 33:3 uye ezweni elichichima ubisi nezinyosi. Angiyikukhuphuka ngiphakathi kwenu, lokhu ningabantu abantamo ilukhuni, funa nginiqede endleleni.”
Exod 33:4 Abantu beyizwa le ndaba embi badabuka, akwabakho muntu owafaka izivunulo zakhe.
Exod 33:5 UJehova wayesethi kuMose: “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Ningabantu abantamo ilukhuni; uma ngikhuphuka ngiphakathi kwenu nangokuphazima kweso nje, ngizakuniqeda. Ngalokho khumulani manje izivunulo zenu, ukuze ngazi ukuthi ngiyakwenzani kini.’ ”
Exod 33:6 Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bazihlubula izivunulo zabo, kusukela entabeni yaseHorebe.
Exod 33:7 UMose wayevama ukulithatha itende, walimisa ngaphandle kwekamu, libe kude nekamu, walibiza ngokuthi itende lokuhlangana. Kwathi bonke abamfunayo uJehova baphuma, baya etendeni lokuhlangana elalingaphandle kwekamu.
Exod 33:8 Kwathi uMose ephuma eya etendeni, bonke abantu basukuma bema, kwaba yilowo nalowo ngasemnyango wetende lakhe, bambuka uMose waze wangena etendeni.
Exod 33:9 Kwathi uMose engena etendeni, insika yefu yehla, yema ngasemnyango wetende; uJehova wakhuluma noMose.
Exod 33:10 Bonke abantu bayibona insika yefu imi ngasemnyango wetende; bonke abantu basukuma, bakhuleka, kwaba yilowo nalowo ngasemnyango wetende lakhe.
Exod 33:11 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose ubuso nobuso, njengalokhu umuntu ekhuluma nomhlobo wakhe. Wabuyela ekamu, kepha inceku yakhe uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni, insizwa, ayiphumanga etendeni.
Exod 33:12 UMose wathi kuJehova: “Bheka, uthi kimi: ‘Khuphula laba bantu,’ kepha awungazisanga yena oyakumthuma nami. Nokho ushilo ukuthi: ‘Ngiyakwazi ngegama, ufumene umusa emehlweni ami.’
Exod 33:13 Ngalokho uma ngifumene umusa emehlweni akho, ake ungibonise izindlela zakho ukuba ngikwazi, ukuze ngifumane umusa emehlweni akho, ubhekisise ukuthi lesi sizwe singabantu bakho.”
Exod 33:14 Wayesethi: “Ngiyakuhamba mina uqobo, ngikuphumuze, na?”
Exod 33:15 Wathi kuye: “Uma ungahambi wena uqobo, ungasikhuphuli lapha.
Exod 33:16 Ngokuba kuyakwaziwa ngani ukuthi ngifumene umusa emehlweni akho, mina nabantu bakho, na? Akungalokhu yini ukuthi uhamba nathi, ukuze sahlukaniswe, mina nabantu bakho, nabanye abantu abasebusweni bomhlaba na?”
Exod 33:17 UJehova wathi kuMose: “Ngiyakwenza nalokho okushiloyo, ngokuba ufumene umusa emehlweni ami; ngiyakwazi ngegama.”
Exod 33:18 Wayesethi: “Ake ngibone inkazimulo yakho.”
Exod 33:19 Wathi: “Ngiyakudlulisa phambi kwakho ubuhle bami, ngilimemezele igama likaJehova phambi kwakho, ngibe nomusa kuyena engithanda ukuba nomusa kuye, ngibe nesihe kuyena engithanda ukuba nesihe kuye.”
Exod 33:20 Wathi: “Awunakubona ubuso bami, ngokuba akukho muntu ongangibona, aphile.”
Exod 33:21 UJehova wathi: “Bheka, nansi indawo kimi; uyakuma edwaleni.
Exod 33:22 Kuyakuthi isadlula inkazimulo yami, ngiyakukufaka ofantwini lwedwala, ngikumboze ngesandla sami, ngize ngidlule.
Exod 33:23 Besengisusa isandla sami, ubone umhlane wami, kepha ubuso bami abuyikubonwa.”
Exod 34:1 UJehova wathi kuMose: “Zibazele izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe njengezokuqala, ngilobe ezibhebheni amazwi ayesezibhebheni zokuqala owazaphulayo.
Exod 34:2 Mawube usulungele kusasa, ukhuphukele entabeni yaseSinayi ekuseni, ume khona phambi kwami esiqongweni sentaba.
Exod 34:3 Akuyikukhuphuka muntu nawe, kungabonakali muntu entabeni yonke, futhi kungaklabi zimvu nazinkomo ngaphambi kwaleyo ntaba.”
Exod 34:4 Wayesebaza izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe njengezokuqala; uMose wavuka ekuseni kakhulu, wakhuphukela entabeni yaseSinayi, njengalokho uJehova emyalile; waphatha ngesandla sakhe izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe.
Exod 34:5 UJehova wehla ngefu, wema naye lapho, wamemezela igama likaJehova.
Exod 34:6 UJehova wadlula phambi kwakhe, wamemeza wathi: “NguJehova! NguJehova! NguNkulunkulu ogcwele isihe, onomusa, ophuza ukuthukuthela, novame ubumnene neqiniso,
Exod 34:7 ogcinela abayizinkulungwane umusa, othethelela ububi neziphambeko nezono, ongayikuyekela onecala, ehambela ububi bawoyise kubantwana nakubantwana babantwana, kwabesizukulwane sesithathu nesesine.”
Exod 34:8 UMose washesha wakhothamela emhlabathini, wakhuleka.
Exod 34:9 Wathi: “Nkosi, uma ngifumene umusa emehlweni akho, iNkosi mayihambe iphakathi kwethu, ngokuba bangabantu abantamo ilukhuni; usithethelele ububi bethu nokona kwethu, usithabathe sibe yifa lakho.”
Exod 34:10 Wayesethi: “Bheka, ngiyenza isivumelwano; phambi kwabantu bonke bakho ngiyakuzenza izimangaliso ezingazange zenziwe emhlabeni wonke nakusiphi isizwe; bonke abantu okhona phakathi kwabo bayakuwubona umsebenzi kaJehova, ngokuba kuyesabeka lokhu engikwenza kuwe.
Exod 34:11 Qaphela lokhu engikuyala ngakho namuhla: bheka, ngixosha phambi kwakho ama-Amori, namaKhanani, namaHeti, namaPherizi, namaHivi, namaJebusi.
Exod 34:12 Xwaya ukuba ungasenzi isivumelwano nabakhileyo ezweni oya kulo, funa babe lugibe kuwe.
Exod 34:13 Kepha niyakuwadiliza ama-altare abo, niziphahlaze izinsika zabo, nibagawule o-Ashera babo,
Exod 34:14 ngokuba awuyikukhonza omunye unkulunkulu, lokhu uJehova, igama lakhe linguMhawu, unguNkulunkulu onomhawu,
Exod 34:15 funa wenze isivumelwano nabakhileyo ezweni, baye baphinge nawonkulunkulu babo, bahlabele onkulunkulu babo, omunye akumeme, udle umhlatshelo wakhe,
Exod 34:16 uthathele amadodana akho amadodakazi abo, amadodakazi abo aye aphinge nawonkulunkulu babo, enze ukuba amadodana akho aye aphinge nawonkulunkulu babo.
Exod 34:17 “Awuyikuzenzela onkulunkulu ababunjiweyo.
Exod 34:18 “Umkhosi wesinkwa esingenamvubelo wowugcina. Uyakudla isinkwa esingenamvubelo izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, njengalokho ngakuyala, ngesikhathi esinqunyiweyo senyanga ka-Abibi, ngokuba ngenyanga ka-Abibi waphuma eGibithe.
Exod 34:19 “Konke okuvula isizalo kungokwami, nawo onke amaduna ezinkomo zakho, amazibulo ezinkomo nawezimvu.
Exod 34:20 Kepha izibulo lembongolo wolihlenga ngewundlu; uma ungalihlengi, ulaphule intamo. Amazibulo onke amadodana akho wowahlenga, kungabonakali muntu phambi kwami engaphethe lutho.
Exod 34:21 “Wosebenza izinsuku eziyisithupha, uphumule ngosuku lwesikhombisa; uyakuphumula ngesikhathi sokulima nangokuvuna.
Exod 34:22 “Uyakugcina umkhosi wamasonto, owolibo lukakolweni ovuniweyo, nomkhosi wokuvuna ngasekupheleni komnyaka.
Exod 34:23 Kathathu ngomnyaka abesilisa bakho bonke bayakubonakala phambi kweNkosi uJehova, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.
Exod 34:24 Ngokuba ngiyakuxosha izizwe phambi kwakho, ngandise imikhawulo yakho; akuyikubakho muntu olifisa izwe lakho, nxa ukhuphuka uya ukubonakala phambi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho kathathu ngomnyaka.
Exod 34:25 “Awuyikunikela ngegazi lomhlatshelo womkhosi wephasika kuze kuse.
Exod 34:26 “Izandulela zolibo lwezwe lakho woziyisa endlini kaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho. Awuyikupheka izinyane lembuzi obisini lukanina.”
Exod 34:27 UJehova wathi kuMose: “Zilobele lawa mazwi, ngokuba ngokwalawa mazwi ngenzile isivumelwano nawe nabakwa-Israyeli.”
Exod 34:28 Wayelapho noJehova izinsuku ezingamashumi amane nobusuku obungamashumi amane, kadlanga lutho, kaphuzanga manzi. Waloba ezibhebheni amazwi esivumelwano, imiyalelo eyishumi.
Exod 34:29 Kwathi uMose esehla entabeni yaseSinayi, izibhebhe zombili zobufakazi zisesandleni sikaMose esehla entabeni, uMose wayengazi ukuthi isikhumba sobuso bakhe sasikhazimula ngenxa yokukhuluma kwakhe naye.
Exod 34:30 Bathi u-Aroni nabo bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bembona uMose, bheka, isikhumba sobuso bakhe sasikhazimula, besaba ukusondela kuye.
Exod 34:31 UMose wayesebabiza; u-Aroni nazo zonke izinduna zenhlangano babuyela-ke kuye; uMose wayesekhuluma kubo.
Exod 34:32 Ngasemuva bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli basondela, wabayala ngakho konke uJehova akukhulume kuye entabeni yaseSinayi.
Exod 34:33 UMose eseqedile ukukhuluma nabo, wafaka iveli ebusweni bakhe.
Exod 34:34 Kepha uMose esezakungena phambi kukaJehova ukukhuluma naye, walikhumula iveli waze waphuma; waphuma, wakhuluma kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli lokho akuyalelweyo.
Exod 34:35 Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli babubona ubuso bukaMose ukuthi isikhumba sobuso bukaMose sasikhazimula; uMose wayesebuye walifaka iveli ebusweni bakhe waze wangena ukuyokhuluma naye.
Exod 35:1 UMose wabutha yonke inhlangano yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi kuyo: “Yilawa mazwi awayalile uJehova ukuba niwenze.
Exod 35:2 Izinsuku eziyisithupha kosetshenzwa umsebenzi, kepha ngosuku lwesikhombisa kuyakuba kini usuku olungcwele, lube yisabatha lokuphumula likaJehova; bonke abenza umsebenzi ngalo bayakubulawa.
Exod 35:3 Aniyikubasa mlilo ezindlini zenu ngosuku lwesabatha.”
Exod 35:4 UMose wakhuluma kuyo yonke inhlangano yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi: “Yile nto ayale ngayo uJehova, ethi:
Exod 35:5 Thabathani phakathi kwenu umnikelo ube ngokaJehova; bonke abanenhliziyo ethandayo mabawulethe, ube ngumnikelo kaJehova: igolide, nesiliva, nethusi,
Exod 35:6 nokuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo, noboya bezimbuzi,
Exod 35:7 nezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nezikhumba zamatahasi, nomuthi womtholo,
Exod 35:8 namafutha okukhanyisa, namakha amafutha okugcoba nawempepho ethaphukayo,
Exod 35:9 namatshe amashohamu, namatshe okufakwa, abe ngawengubo yamahlombe nawesihlangu sesifuba.
Exod 35:10 “Bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo mabeze, bakwenze konke uJehova akuyalileyo:
Exod 35:11 itabernakele, netende lalo, nesifulelo salo, nezinkibaniso zalo, namapulangwe alo, nemishayo yalo, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zalo;
Exod 35:12 umphongolo nezinti zawo, nesihlalo somusa, nesihenqo seveli;
Exod 35:13 itafula nezinti zalo nezitsha zonke zalo, nezinkwa zokubukwa;
Exod 35:14 nothi lwezibani lokukhanyisa, nezitsha zalo nezibani zalo, namafutha okukhanyisa;
Exod 35:15 ne-altare lempepho nezinti zalo, namafutha okugcoba, nempepho ethaphukayo, neveli lomnyango ngasemnyango wetabernakele;
Exod 35:16 i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa nehele lalo lethusi, nezinti zalo, nezitsha zonke zalo, nomcengezi nesinqe sawo,
Exod 35:17 nezilenge zegceke, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zazo, neveli lesango legceke,
Exod 35:18 nezikhonkwane zetabernakele, nezikhonkwane zegceke, nezintambo zazo,
Exod 35:19 nezambatho ezifekethisiweyo zokukhonza endaweni engcwele, nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aroni umpristi, nezambatho zamadodana akhe zokukhonza esikhundleni sobupristi.”
Exod 35:20 Yayisisuka yonke inhlangano yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli ebusweni bukaMose.
Exod 35:21 Bafika, kwaba yilowo nalowo owavuswa yinhliziyo yakhe nowaqhutshwa ngumoya wakhe, baletha umnikelo kaJehova ube ngowomsebenzi wetende lokuhlangana, nowenkonzo yonke yalo, nowezambatho ezingcwele.
Exod 35:22 Beza abesilisa nabesifazane, bonke abaqhutshwa yizinhliziyo zabo, baletha iziqhobosho namacici nezindandatho namasongo, izinto zonke zegolide, bonke ababenokunikela ngomnikelo wegolide kuJehova.
Exod 35:23 Bonke okwafunyanwa kubo okuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo, noboya bezimbuzi, nezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nezikhumba zamatahasi, bakuletha.
Exod 35:24 Bonke abanikela ngomnikelo wesiliva nowethusi baletha umnikelo kuJehova, nabo bonke okwafunyanwa kubo umuthi womtholo womsebenzi wenkonzo bawuletha.
Exod 35:25 Bonke abesifazane abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo baphotha ngezandla zabo, baletha okuphothiweyo, okuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo.
Exod 35:26 Bonke abesifazane abavuselwa yizinhliziyo zabo ukuhlakanipha baphotha uboya bezimbuzi.
Exod 35:27 Izinduna zaletha amatshe amashohamu namatshe okufakwa, awengubo yamahlombe nawesihlangu sesifuba,
Exod 35:28 namakha, namafutha okukhanyisa nawokugcoba nawempepho ethaphukayo.
Exod 35:29 Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bawuletha umnikelo wesihle kuJehova, bonke abesilisa nabesifazane, abanhliziyo yabo ibavusele ukulethela yonke imisebenzi ayale ngayo uJehova ukuba yenziwe ngesandla sikaMose.
Exod 35:30 UMose wathi kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli: “Bhekani, uJehova ubize ngegama uBesaleli indodana ka-Uri kaHure, owesizwe sakwaJuda;
Exod 35:31 umgcwalisile ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu, ngokuhlakanipha nangokuqonda nangokwazi nangamandla emisebenzini yonke
Exod 35:32 ukuba aqambe imisebenzi yobungcweti, asebenze ngegolide, nangesiliva, nangethusi,
Exod 35:33 nangokuqopha amatshe okufakwa, nangokuqopha imithi, ukuba asebenze yonke imisebenzi yobungcweti.
Exod 35:34 Ubeke enhliziyweni yakhe ukuba afundise, yena no-Oholiyabe indodana ka-Ahisamaki, owesizwe sakwaDani.
Exod 35:35 Laba ubagcwalisile ngokuhlakanipha kwenhliziyo ukuba basebenze yonke imisebenzi, eyomqophi neyengcweti neyomfekethisi, ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo, neyomaluki, neyabasebenza namuphi umsebenzi, nabaqamba imisebenzi yobungcweti.
Exod 36:1 “OBesaleli no-Oholiyabe bayakusebenza nabo bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo, uJehova abeke kubo ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda ukuba bazi ukwenza yonke imisebenzi yenkonzo yendlu engcwele njengakho konke uJehova akuyalileyo.”
Exod 36:2 UMose wababiza oBesaleli no-Oholiyabe nabo bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo, uJehova abeke ukuhlakanipha ezinhliziyweni zabo, bonke abavuswa yizinhliziyo zabo ukuza emsebenzini ukuba bawenze.
Exod 36:3 Bawamukela kuMose wonke umnikelo, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli ababewulethele umsebenzi wenkonzo yendlu engcwele ukuba wenziwe ngawo. Kepha babesaletha kuye njalo imihla ngemihla ekuseni iminikelo yesihle.
Exod 36:4 Bonke abahlakaniphileyo ababeyisebenza yonke imisebenzi yendlu engcwele beza, kwaba yilowo nalowo wavela emsebenzini wakhe owawusebenzayo,
Exod 36:5 bathi kuMose: “Abantu baletha okuningi kakhulu kunokwanele inkonzo yomsebenzi ayalile ngawo uJehova ukuba wenziwe.”
Exod 36:6 UMose wayeseyala, kwamenyezelwa ekamu, kwathiwa: “Makungabe kusasetshenzwa ngowesilisa nangowesifazane omunye umsebenzi womnikelo wendlu engcwele.” Base bevinjelwa abantu ukuletha.
Exod 36:7 Okwase kwenziwe kwakwanele wonke umsebenzi obuyakwenziwa, futhi kwasala.
Exod 36:8 Bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo phakathi kwabo abasebenza umsebenzi benza itabernakele ngezilenge eziyishumi, bazenza ngelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, nangokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, zinamakherubi, umsebenzi wengcweti.
Exod 36:9 Ubude besilenge babuyizingalo ezingamashumi amabili nesishiyagalombili, nobubanzi besilenge babuyizingalo ezine; zonke izilenge zazinesilinganiso sinye.
Exod 36:10 Wahlanganisa izilenge eziyisihlanu esinye nesinye; wazihlanganisa nezinye izilenge eziyisihlanu esinye nesinye.
Exod 36:11 Wazenza izihibe eziluhlaza eceleni lesinye isilenge emphethweni ngasekuhlanganeni; wenze njalo naseceleni lesilenge sokugcina ngasekuhlanganeni kwesibili.
Exod 36:12 Wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu kwesinye isilenge; wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu eceleni lesilenge esisekuhlanganeni kwesibili; izihibe zazibhekana.
Exod 36:13 Wazenza izinkibaniso ezingamashumi ayisihlanu zegolide, wazihlanganisa izilenge esinye nesinye ngezinkibaniso, kwaba yitabernakele linye.
Exod 36:14 Wazenza izilenge ngoboya bezimbuzi, zibe yitende phezu kwetabernakele; wazenza izilenge eziyishumi nanye.
Exod 36:15 Ubude besilenge babuyizingalo ezingamashumi amathathu, nobubanzi bezilenge babuyizingalo ezine; izilenge eziyishumi nanye zazinesilinganiso sinye.
Exod 36:16 Wahlanganisa izilenge eziyisihlanu zodwa, nezilenge eziyisithupha zodwa.
Exod 36:17 Wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu eceleni lesilenge sokugcina ekuhlanganeni, wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu eceleni lesilenge ekuhlanganeni kwesibili.
Exod 36:18 Wazenza izinkibaniso ezingamashumi ayisihlanu zethusi zokuhlanganisa itende libe linye.
Exod 36:19 Wasenza isifulelo setende ngezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nesifulelo ngezikhumba zamatahasi phezulu.
Exod 36:20 Wawenza amapulangwe amiyo etabernakele ngomuthi womtholo.
Exod 36:21 Ubude bepulangwe babuyizingalo eziyishumi, nobubanzi bepulangwe babuyingalo nenxenye.
Exod 36:22 Yilelo nalelo pulangwe lalinemisuka emibili, omunye malungana nomunye; wenze njalo kuwo onke amapulangwe etabernakele.
Exod 36:23 Wawenza amapulangwe etabernakele, amapulangwe angamashumi amabili ohlangothi lwaseningizimu olubheka ngaseningizimu.
Exod 36:24 Wazenza izinyawo ezingamashumi amane zesiliva phansi kwamapulangwe angamashumi amabili, izinyawo ezimbili phansi kwepulangwe linye, ezemisuka yalo emibili, nezinyawo ezimbili phansi kwelinye ipulangwe, ezemisuka yalo emibili.
Exod 36:25 Uhlangothi lwesibili lwetabernakele ngasohlangothini lwasenyakatho walwenzela amapulangwe angamashumi amabili,
Exod 36:26 nezinyawo zawo ezingamashumi amane zesiliva, izinyawo ezimbili phansi kwepulangwe linye nezinyawo ezimbili phansi kwelinye ipulangwe.
Exod 36:27 Uhlangothi lwetabernakele olungasemuva ngasentshonalanga walwenzela amapulangwe ayisithupha.
Exod 36:28 Amapulangwe amabili wawenzela amagumbi etabernakele angasemuva.
Exod 36:29 Ayemabili phansi, kanjalo aphelela aze afika phezulu esongweni lokuqala; wenze njalo kuwo omabili emagumbini omabili.
Exod 36:30 Kwakungamapulangwe ayisishiyagalombili nezinyawo zawo zesiliva, izinyawo eziyishumi nesithupha, izinyawo ezimbili phansi kwalelo nalelo pulangwe.
Exod 36:31 Wayenza imishayo ngomuthi womtholo, yaba ngeyisihlanu yamapulangwe olunye uhlangothi lwetabernakele,
Exod 36:32 nemishayo eyisihlanu yamapulangwe olunye uhlangothi lwetabernakele, nemishayo eyisihlanu yamapulangwe etabernakele ohlangothini olungasemuva ngasentshonalanga.
Exod 36:33 Wawenza umshayo waphakathi ukuba udabule phakathi kwamapulangwe, kusukela ekugcineni ngalapha kuze kufike ekugcineni ngalapha.
Exod 36:34 Wanameka amapulangwe ngegolide, wawenza amasongo awo ngegolide, abe yizindawo zezinti; wanameka nezinti ngegolide.
Exod 36:35 Wasenza isihenqo ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, wasenza saba namakherubi, umsebenzi wengcweti.
Exod 36:36 Wasenzela izinsika ezine zomtholo, wazinameka ngegolide; izingwegwe zazo zaziyigolide; wazikhandela izinyawo ezine zesiliva.
Exod 36:37 Walenza iveli lomnyango wetende ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, umsebenzi womfekethisi,
Exod 36:38 nezinsika zalo eziyisihlanu nezingwegwe zazo; wanameka izihloko zazo nezibopho zazo ngegolide; izinyawo zazo eziyisihlanu zaziyithusi.
Exod 37:1 UBesaleli wawenza umphongolo ngomuthi womtholo; ubude bawo babuyizingalo ezimbili nenxenye, ububanzi bawo babuyingalo nenxenye, nokuphakama kwawo kwakuyingalo nenxenye.
Exod 37:2 Wawunameka ngegolide elicwengekileyo ngaphakathi nangaphandle, wawenzela udini lwegolide nxazonke.
Exod 37:3 Wawukhandela amasongo amane egolide ezinyaweni zawo zozine, amasongo amabili kolunye uhlangothi lwawo, namasongo amabili kolunye uhlangothi lwawo.
Exod 37:4 Wazenza izinti zomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngegolide.
Exod 37:5 Wazifaka izinti emasongweni asezinhlangothini zomphongolo ukuba umphongolo uthwalwe ngazo.
Exod 37:6 Wasenza isihlalo somusa ngegolide elicwengekileyo; ubude baso babuyizingalo ezimbili nenxenye, nobubanzi baso babuyingalo nenxenye.
Exod 37:7 Wawenza amakherubi amabili ngegolide, wawenza ngomsebenzi okhandiweyo ekugcineni kwesihlalo somusa nxazombili,
Exod 37:8 elinye ikherubi ekugcineni ngalapha nelinye ikherubi ekugcineni ngalapha; wawenza amakherubi aba kunye nesihlalo somusa, ekugcineni kwaso ngalapha nangalapha.
Exod 37:9 Amakherubi awelula amaphiko awo ngaphezulu, amboza isihlalo somusa ngamaphiko awo, abhekana ngobuso; ubuso bamakherubi babheka isihlalo somusa.
Exod 37:10 Walenza itafula ngomuthi womtholo; ubude balo babuyizingalo ezimbili, nobubanzi balo babuyingalo, nokuphakama kwalo kwakuyingalo nenxenye.
Exod 37:11 Walinameka ngegolide elicwengekileyo, walenzela udini lwegolide nxazonke.
Exod 37:12 Walenzela usiko olulingene nesandla ngobubanzi nxazonke, walwenzela usiko lwalo udini lwegolide nxazonke.
Exod 37:13 Walukhandela amasongo amane egolide, wawafaka amasongo emagumbini omane asezinyaweni zalo zozine.
Exod 37:14 Amasongo ayengasodinini, izindawo zezinti zokuthwala itafula.
Exod 37:15 Wazenza izinti ngomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngegolide, ukuba itafula lithwalwe ngazo.
Exod 37:16 Wayesenza ngegolide elicwengekileyo izitsha ezazisetafuleni, izingqwembe zalo, nezinkezo zalo, nezinkamba zalo, nezindebe zalo zokuthela.
Exod 37:17 Walwenza uthi lwezibani ngegolide elicwengekileyo, walwenza uthi lwezibani ngomsebenzi okhandiweyo, isinqe salo nesiqu salo; izimbizana zalo, namasumpa alo, nezimbali zalo kwakukunye nalo.
Exod 37:18 Kwakukhona amagatsha ayisithupha aphuma ezinhlangothini zalo, amagatsha amathathu othi lwezibani kolunye uhlangothi lwalo namagatsha amathathu othi lwezibani kolunye uhlangothi lwalo.
Exod 37:19 Izimbizana ezintathu zafaniswa nezimbali zemi-alimondi kwelinye igatsha, zinesumpa nembali; izimbizana ezintathu zafaniswa nezimbali zemi-alimondi kwelinye igatsha, zinesumpa nembali; kwakunjalo kuwo onke amagatsha ayisithupha aphuma othini lwezibani.
Exod 37:20 Kwakukhona othini lwezibani izimbizana ezine ezifana nezimbali zemi-alimondi, zinamasumpa azo nezimbali zazo,
Exod 37:21 isumpa phansi kwamagatsha amabili likunye nalo, nelinye isumpa phansi kwamagatsha amabili likunye nalo, nelinye isumpa phansi kwamagatsha amabili likunye nalo, kuwo onke amagatsha ayisithupha aphuma kulo.
Exod 37:22 Amasumpa alo namagatsha alo ayekunye nalo; konke okwalo kwakungumsebenzi munye okhandiweyo wegolide elicwengekileyo.
Exod 37:23 Wazenza izibani zalo eziyisikhombisa nezizenze zalo nezitsha zalo zensizi ngegolide elicwengekileyo.
Exod 37:24 Walwenza ngetalenta legolide elicwengekileyo, nazo zonke izinto zalo.
Exod 37:25 Walenza i-altare lempepho ngomuthi womtholo; ubude balo babuyingalo, nobubanzi balo babuyingalo; laba nezinhlangothi ezine ezilingeneyo; nokuphakama kwalo kwakuyizingalo ezimbili; izimpondo zalo zazikunye nalo.
Exod 37:26 Walinameka ngegolide elicwengekileyo ngaphezulu, nezinhlangothi zalo nxazonke, nezimpondo zalo; walenzela udini lwegolide nxazonke.
Exod 37:27 Walenzela amasongo amabili egolide phansi kodini lwalo nxazombili, ezinhlangothini zalo zombili, abe yizindawo zezinti zokulithwala.
Exod 37:28 Wazenza izinti ngomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngegolide.
Exod 37:29 Wawenza amafutha angcwele okugcoba, nempepho enhle yamakha athaphukayo, ngokobungcweti bomthaki.
Exod 38:1 Walenza i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa ngomuthi womtholo; ubude balo babuyizingalo eziyisihlanu, nobubanzi balo babuyizingalo eziyisihlanu; laba nezinhlangothi ezine ezilingeneyo; nokuphakama kwalo kwakuyizingalo ezintathu.
Exod 38:2 Wazenza izimpondo zalo emagumbini alo omane, izimpondo zalo zazikunye nalo; walinameka ngethusi.
Exod 38:3 Wazenza zonke izinto ze-altare, amakhanzi, namafosholo, nezitsha, nezimfoloko, nemicengezi yomlilo; wazenza zonke izinto zalo ngethusi.
Exod 38:4 Walenzela i-altare ihele lethusi elenziwe njengenetha phansi kosiko oluzungeza i-altare ukuba lifinyelele ngaphakathi kwe-altare ukuya phezulu.
Exod 38:5 Wakhanda amasongo amane amagumbi omane ehele lethusi, abe yizindawo zezinti.
Exod 38:6 Wazenza izinti ngomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngethusi.
Exod 38:7 Wazifaka izinti emasongweni ezinhlangothini ze-altare ukuba lithwalwe ngazo; walenza ngamapulangwe laba yigobongo.
Exod 38:8 Wawenza umcengezi wethusi nesinqe sawo ngethusi lezibuko zabesifazane abahlangana ukuyokhonza ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana.
Exod 38:9 Walenza negceke; ngaseningizimu ohlangothini lwaseningizimu izilenge zegceke zaziyilineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, izingalo eziyikhulu.
Exod 38:10 Izinsika zazo zazingamashumi amabili, nezinyawo zazo zazingamashumi amabili zethusi; izingwegwe zezinsika nezibopho zazo zaziyisiliva.
Exod 38:11 Ngasohlangothini lwasenyakatho yizingalo eziyikhulu, izinsika zazo zingamashumi amabili, nezinyawo zazo zingamashumi amabili zethusi; izingwegwe zezinsika nemishayo yazo kwakuyisiliva.
Exod 38:12 Ngasohlangothini olungasentshonalanga izilenge zaziyizingalo ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, izinsika zazo zaziyishumi, nezinyawo zazo zaziyishumi; izingwegwe zezinsika nemishayo yazo kwakuyisiliva.
Exod 38:13 Nangasempumalanga ngasohlangothini olungasempumalanga yizingalo ezingamashumi ayisihlanu.
Exod 38:14 Izilenge kwelinye icele lesango zaziyizingalo eziyishumi nanhlanu; izinsika zazo zazintathu, nezinyawo zazo zazintathu.
Exod 38:15 Kwaba njalo nakwelinye icele: ngalapha nangalapha kwesango legceke zazikhona izilenge eziyizingalo eziyishumi nanhlanu; izinsika zazo zazintathu, nezinyawo zazo zazintathu.
Exod 38:16 Zonke izilenge zegceke nxazonke zazingezelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo.
Exod 38:17 Izinyawo zezinsika zaziyithusi, izingwegwe zezinsika nemishayo yazo kwakuyisiliva; izihloko zazo zazinamekwe ngesiliva; zonke izinsika zegceke zazinesibopho sesiliva.
Exod 38:18 Iveli lesango legceke lalingumsebenzi womfekethisi ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo; ubude balo babuyizingalo ezingamashumi amabili, nokuphakama ngokobubanzi bezilenge kwakuyizingalo eziyisihlanu ngokulingene nezilenge zegceke.
Exod 38:19 Izinsika zalo zazizine, nezinyawo zalo zazizine zethusi; izingwegwe zaziyisiliva, ukunamekwa kwezihloko nokwezibopho kwakuyisiliva.
Exod 38:20 Zonke izikhonkwane zetabernakele nezegceke nxasonke zaziyithusi.
Exod 38:21 Lokhu kuyimali yetabernakele, itabernakele lobufakazi, njengokubalwa kwayo ngesiyalezo sikaMose, ngokubala kwamaLevi ngesandla sika-Itamari indodana ka-Aroni umpristi.
Exod 38:22 UBesaleli indodana ka-Uri kaHure, owesizwe sakwaJuda, wakwenza konke uJehova amyale ngakho uMose.
Exod 38:23 Wayeno-Oholiyabe indodana ka-Ahisamaki, owesizwe sakwaDani, umqophi nengcweti nomfekethisi ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo.
Exod 38:24 Lonke igolide okwasetshenzwa ngalo, wonke umsebenzi wendlu engcwele, igolide lomnikelo lalingamatalenta angamashumi amabili nesishiyagalolunye namashekeli angamakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi amathathu ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele.
Exod 38:25 Isiliva lababebalwa esizweni lalingamatalenta ayikhulu namashekeli ayinkulungwane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisikhombisa nanhlanu ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele,
Exod 38:26 kwaba yilowo nalowo wanikela ngebeka eliyinxenye yeshekeli ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele kubo bonke abadlulela kwababaliweyo abaneminyaka engamashumi amabili nangaphezulu, abantu abayizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu ayisithupha nantathu namakhulu ayisihlanu namashumi ayisihlanu.
Exod 38:27 Amatalenta ayikhulu esiliva ayengawokukhanda izinyawo zendlu engcwele, nezinyawo zesihenqo, izinyawo eziyikhulu ngamatalenta ayikhulu, italenta ngonyawo.
Exod 38:28 Ngamashekeli ayinkulungwane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisikhombisa nanhlanu wenza izingwegwe zezinsika, wanameka izihloko zazo, wazenzela izibopho.
Exod 38:29 Ithusi lomnikelo laba ngamatalenta angamashumi ayisikhombisa namashekeli ayizinkulungwane ezimbili namakhulu amane.
Exod 38:30 Wenza ngalo izinyawo zomnyango wetende lokuhlangana, ne-altare lethusi, nehele lalo lethusi, nezinto zonke ze-altare,
Exod 38:31 nezinyawo zegceke nxazonke, nezinyawo zesango legceke, nazo zonke izikhonkwane zetabernakele, nazo zonke izikhonkwane zegceke nxazonke.
Exod 39:1 Ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu benza izambatho ezenziwe kahle zokukhonza endaweni engcwele; bamenzela u-Aroni izambatho ezingcwele, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 39:2 Wayenza ingubo yamahlombe ngegolide, nangokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo.
Exod 39:3 Balikhanda igolide laba ngongcwecwe, balisika izincingwana ukuba zalukwe nokuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo, umsebenzi wengcweti.
Exod 39:4 Bayenzela iziziba zamahlombe ezihlanganisiweyo; yahlanganiswa emaceleni omabili.
Exod 39:5 Ibhande elalukiwe kahle elalikuyo ukuyibhinca lalikunye nayo, lifana nokusetshenzwa kwayo, lalingelegolide, lingokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 39:6 Balungisa amatshe amashohamu ezungezwe yizisekelo zegolide, eqoshwe njengendandatho ngamagama amadodana ka-Israyeli.
Exod 39:7 Wawabeka ezizibeni zengubo yamahlombe, abe ngamatshe esikhumbuzo sabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 39:8 Wayesesenza isihlangu sesifuba, umsebenzi wengcweti, njengokusetshenzwa kwengubo yamahlombe, ngegolide, nangokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo.
Exod 39:9 Sasinezinhlangothi ezine ezilingeneyo; basenza isihlangu sesifuba siphindwe kabili; ubude baso babunjengokudazuluka kweminwe, nobubanzi baso babunjengokudazuluka kweminwe, siphindwe kabili.
Exod 39:10 Bafaka kuso izinhla ezine zamatshe; uhla lwesardiyu, netopazi, nerubi lwaba luhla lokuqala;
Exod 39:11 uhla lwesibili lwaba yisimaragidu, nesafire, nedayimani;
Exod 39:12 uhla lwesithathu lwaba yihiyakinte, ne-agathe, ne-amethiste;
Exod 39:13 uhla lwesine lwaba yikrisolithi, neshohamu, nejaspi; ayezungeziwe yizisekelo zegolide lapho zifakwe khona.
Exod 39:14 Amatshe ayeyishumi nambili njengamagama amadodana ka-Israyeli, njengamagama abo; njengokuqoshwa kwendandatho yilelo nalelo lalinegama lakhe kuzo izizwe eziyishumi nambili.
Exod 39:15 Benza esihlangwini sesifuba amaketanga njengamagoda, umsebenzi othandelweyo wegolide elicwengekileyo.
Exod 39:16 Benza izisekelo ezimbili zegolide namasongo amabili egolide; bawafaka amasongo omabili emaceleni omabili esihlangu.
Exod 39:17 Base befaka amaketanga omabili egolide athandelweyo emasongweni omabili emaceleni esihlangu sesifuba.
Exod 39:18 Ezinye izihloko ezimbili zamaketanga athandelweyo bazifaka ezisekelweni ezimbili, wazibeka ngaphambili ezizibeni zengubo yamahlombe.
Exod 39:19 Base bewenza amasongo amabili egolide, bawafaka emaceleni omabili esihlangu sesifuba, eceleni laso elibhekene nengubo yamahlombe ngaphakathi.
Exod 39:20 Bawenza amasongo amabili egolide, bawafaka ezizibeni zombili zengubo yamahlombe phansi ngaphambili, eduze nokuhlangana kwayo, phezu kwebhande elifekethisiweyo lengubo yamahlombe.
Exod 39:21 Base bebopha isihlangu sesifuba ngamasongo aso emasongweni engubo yamahlombe ngentambo eluhlaza ukuba sibe phezu kwebhande elifekethisiweyo lengubo yamahlombe, ukuze isihlangu sesifuba singakhumuki engutsheni yamahlombe, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 39:22 Walenza ijazi lengubo yamahlombe ngokwalukiweyo, ngokuluhlaza lonke.
Exod 39:23 Imbobo yejazi ngaphakathi kwalo yayinjengembobo yebhantshi lensimbi, inomphetho oyizungeza imbobo yalo ukuba lingadatshulwa.
Exod 39:24 Benza emiphethweni yejazi amapomegranati ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu okuphothiweyo.
Exod 39:25 Bazenza izikhencezo zegolide elicwengekileyo, bazifaka izikhencezo phakathi kwamapomegranati emiphethweni yejazi nxazonke phakathi kwamapomegranati,
Exod 39:26 isikhencezo nepomegranati, isikhencezo nepomegranati emiphethweni yejazi nxazonke, ukuba kukhonzwe ngalo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 39:27 Base bebalukela u-Aroni namadodana akhe amabhantshi elineni elicolekileyo lomsebenzi owalukiweyo,
Exod 39:28 nesigqoko selineni elicolekileyo, nezinye izigqoko ezinhle zelineni elicolekileyo, namabhulukwe elineni ngelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo,
Exod 39:29 nebhande lelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo nelokuluhlaza nelokububende nelokubomvu, umsebenzi womfeketshisi, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 39:30 Benza ungcwecwe womqhele ongcwele ngegolide elicwengekileyo, babhala kuye umbhalo njengokuqoshwa kwendandatho wokuthi: “Wahlukaniselwe uJehova”.
Exod 39:31 Babophela kuye intambo eluhlaza ukuba abekwe phezulu esigqokweni, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 39:32 Njalo-ke kwaqedwa wonke umsebenzi wetabernakele letende lokuhlangana; abantwana benza njengakho konke uJehova amyale ngakho uMose; benze njalo-ke.
Exod 39:33 Baliletha itabernakele kuMose, itende nempahla yalo yonke, nezinkibaniso zalo, namapulangwe alo, nemishayo yalo, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zalo,
Exod 39:34 nesifulelo sezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nesifulelo sezikhumba zamatahasi, nesihenqo seveli,
Exod 39:35 nomphongolo wobufakazi, nezinti zawo, nesihlalo somusa;
Exod 39:36 itafula nezinto zonke zalo, nezinkwa zokubukwa;
Exod 39:37 uthi olucwengekileyo lwezibani nezibani zalo, izibani zihleliwe, nezinto zonke zalo, namafutha okukhanyisa,
Exod 39:38 ne-altare legolide, namafutha okugcoba, nempepho ethaphukayo, neveli lomnyango wetende;
Exod 39:39 i-altare lethusi, nehele lalo lethusi, nezinti zalo, nezinto zonke zalo, nomcengezi nesinqe sawo;
Exod 39:40 izilenge zegceke, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zalo, neveli lesango legceke, nezintambo zalo, nezikhonkwane zalo, nempahla yonke yenkonzo yetabernakele, netende lokuhlangana;
Exod 39:41 izambatho ezenziwe kahle zokukhonza endaweni engcwele, nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aroni umpristi, nezambatho zamadodana akhe zokukhonza esikhundleni sobupristi.
Exod 39:42 Njengakho konke uJehova amyale ngakho uMose, benze njalo abantwana bakwa-Israyeli wonke umsebenzi.
Exod 39:43 UMose wabona wonke umsebenzi; bheka, babewenzile; njengalokho uJehova eyalile, bawenza kanjalo; uMose wababusisa.
Exod 40:1 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Exod 40:2 “Ngosuku lokuqala lwenyanga yokuqala wolimisa itabernakele letende lokuhlangana.
Exod 40:3 Wofaka khona umphongolo wobufakazi, uwuhenqele umphongolo ngesihenqo.
Exod 40:4 Ulingenise itafula, uhlele izinto eziphezu kwalo, ulungenise uthi lwezibani, ubeke izibani zalo.
Exod 40:5 Ubeke i-altare legolide lempepho phambi komphongolo wobufakazi, ulengise iveli lomnyango wetabernakele.
Exod 40:6 “Ubeke i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa phambi komnyango wetabernakele letende lokuhlangana.
Exod 40:7 Ubeke umcengezi phakathi kwetende lokuhlangana ne-altare, uthele amanzi kuwo.
Exod 40:8 Ulungise igceke nxazonke, ulengise iveli lesango legceke.
Exod 40:9 “Uthabathe amafutha okugcoba, uligcobe itabernakele nakho konke okukulo, ulingcwelise kanye nempahla yalo yonke, libe ngcwele.
Exod 40:10 Ugcobe i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa nezinto zalo zonke, ulingcwelise i-altare, i-altare libe ngcwelengcwele.
Exod 40:11 Ugcobe umcengezi nesinqe sawo, uwungcwelise.
Exod 40:12 “Ulethe u-Aroni namadodana akhe emnyango wetende lokuhlangana, ubageze ngamanzi.
Exod 40:13 Umembathise u-Aroni izambatho ezingcwele, umgcobe, umngcwelise ukuba angikhonze esikhundleni sobupristi.
Exod 40:14 Ulethe amadodana akhe, uwembathise amabhantshi,
Exod 40:15 uwagcobe, njengalokho wamgcoba uyise, ukuba bangikhonze esikhundleni sobupristi, ukugcotshwa kwabo kube ngubupristi obuphakade kubo ezizukulwaneni zabo.”
Exod 40:16 Wenze njalo uMose; njengakho konke uJehova amyale ngakho, wenze njalo-ke.
Exod 40:17 Kwathi enyangeni yokuqala ngomnyaka wesibili, ngolokuqala lwenyanga itabernakele lamiswa.
Exod 40:18 UMose walimisa itabernakele, wabeka izinyawo zalo, wamisa amapulangwe alo, wafaka imishayo yalo, wamisa izinsika zalo.
Exod 40:19 Weneka itende phezu kwetabernakele, wabeka isifulelo setende phezu kwalo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 40:20 Wathabatha, wabufaka ubufakazi emphongolweni, wafaka izinti emphongolweni, wabeka isihlalo somusa phezu komphongolo.
Exod 40:21 Wangenisa umphongolo etabernakele, wamisa isihenqo seveli, wahenqela umphongolo wobufakazi, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 40:22 Wafaka itafula etendeni lokuhlangana ohlangothini lwetabernakele olungasenyakatho ngaphandle kwesihenqo.
Exod 40:23 Wahlela izinkwa phezu kwalo phambi kukaJehova, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 40:24 Walubeka uthi lwezibani etendeni lokuhlangana malungana netafula ohlangothini lwetabernakele olungaseningizimu.
Exod 40:25 Wazibeka izibani phambi kukaJehova, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 40:26 Walibeka i-altare legolide etendeni lokuhlangana ngaphambi kwesihenqo.
Exod 40:27 Washisa lapho impepho yamakha athaphukayo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 40:28 Walengisa iveli lomnyango wetabernakele.
Exod 40:29 Wabeka i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa ngasemnyango wetabernakele letende lokuhlangana, wanikela kulo ngomnikelo wokushiswa nangomnikelo wempuphu, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 40:30 Wabeka umcengezi phakathi kwetende lokuhlangana ne-altare, wathela kuwo amanzi okugeza.
Exod 40:31 OMose no-Aroni namadodana akhe bahlambela kuwo izandla zabo nezinyawo zabo.
Exod 40:32 Nxa bengena etendeni lokuhlangana nanxa besondela e-altare, bageza njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Exod 40:33 Walungisa igceke lizungeza itabernakele ne-altare, walengisa iveli lesango legceke; kanjalo-ke uMose wawuqeda umsebenzi.
Exod 40:34 Ifu lase lisibekela itende lokuhlangana, nenkazimulo kaJehova yagcwalisa itabernakele.
Exod 40:35 UMose wayengenakungena etendeni lokuhlangana, ngokuba ifu lahlala phezu kwalo, nenkazimulo kaJehova yagcwalisa itabernakele.
Exod 40:36 Njalo lapho ifu lenyuswa etabernakele, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli baqhubekela phambili ezinkambeni zabo zonke.
Exod 40:37 Kepha uma ifu lingenyuswanga, babengaqhubeki kwaze kwafika usuku lokwenyuswa kwalo.
Exod 40:38 Ngokuba ifu likaJehova laliphezu kwetabernakele emini, nomlilo wawukulo ebusuku emehlweni ayo yonke indlu yakwa-Israyeli ezinkambeni zabo zonke.
Lev 1:1 UJehova esetendeni lokuhlangana wambiza uMose, wakhuluma kuye, wathi:
Lev 1:2 “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Nxa umuntu wakini eletha umnikelo kuJehova, anonikela ngomnikelo wenu wezinkomo zemihlambi nowezimvu.
Lev 1:3 “ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe ungumnikelo wokushiswa wemihlambi, uyakunikela ngeduna elingenasici, anikele ngalo ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, aze amukeleke kuJehova.
Lev 1:4 Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wokushiswa; uyakwamukelwa ngenxa yakhe, umenzele ukubuyisana.
Lev 1:5 Wolihlaba iduna phambi kukaJehova, amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, alethe igazi, afafaze ngegazi nxazonke ze-altare elingasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana.
Lev 1:6 Uyakuhlinza umnikelo wokushiswa, awuhlahlele izitho.
Lev 1:7 Amadodana ka-Aroni umpristi abeke umlilo e-altare, ahlele izinkuni phezu komlilo;
Lev 1:8 amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, ahlele izitho, nenhloko, namanoni, phezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni ophezu kwe-altare,
Lev 1:9 ahlanze izibilini zalo namanqina alo ngamanzi, umpristi akushise konke e-altare, kube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova.
Lev 1:10 “ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe ungowemihlambi, owasezimvini noma owasezimbuzini, ube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, wonikela ngeduna elingenasici.
Lev 1:11 Alihlabe ngasohlangothini lwe-altare olungasenyakatho phambi kukaJehova; amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, afafaze i-altare ngegazi lalo nxazonke.
Lev 1:12 Alihlahlele izitho nenhloko yalo namanoni alo, umpristi akuhlele phezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni ophezu kwe-altare,
Lev 1:13 ahlanze izibilini zalo namanqina alo ngamanzi, umpristi anikele ngakho konke, akushise e-altare kube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova.
Lev 1:14 “ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe kuJehova ungumnikelo wokushiswa kwezinyoni, wonikela ngomnikelo wamahobhe noma ngowamaphuphu amajuba.
Lev 1:15 Umpristi awulethe e-altare, awushumpule inhloko, awushise e-altare, igazi lawo likhanyelwe ngasohlangothini lwe-altare,
Lev 1:16 asuse ingila nezimpaphe, akulahle ngaseceleni kwe-altare ngasempumalanga endaweni yomlotha,
Lev 1:17 awuqaqe ngamaphiko awo, angawudabuli kodwa; umpristi awushise e-altare phezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni, ube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova.
Lev 2:1 “ ‘Nxa umuntu enikela ngomnikelo wempuphu kuJehova, umnikelo woba yimpuphu ecolekileyo, athele amafutha kuwo, abeke inhlaka kuwo,
Lev 2:2 awulethe kumadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, acaphune kuwo ngokhweshe wempuphu ecolekileyo yawo nowamafutha awo, kanye nayo yonke inhlaka yawo, umpristi awushise ube yisikhumbuzo sawo e-altare, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova;
Lev 2:3 okuseleyo komnikelo wempuphu kuyakuba ngokuka-Aroni nokwamadodana akhe; kungcwelengcwele eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova.
Lev 2:4 “ ‘Nxa uletha umnikelo wempuphu ephekwe eziko, woba ngamaqebelengwane angenamvubelo empuphu ecolekileyo exovwe namafutha, noma imiqathane engenamvubelo, egcotshwe ngamafutha.
Lev 2:5 Uma umnikelo wakho ungumnikelo wempuphu ephekwe ngomqengele, woba ngowempuphu ecolekileyo engenamvubelo, exovwe ngamafutha.
Lev 2:6 Uwuhlephule izingcezu, uthele amafutha kuzo; kungumnikelo wempuphu.
Lev 2:7 Uma umnikelo wakho ungumnikelo wempuphu ephekwe ngokhamba, uyakwenziwa ngempuphu ecolekileyo kanye namafutha.
Lev 2:8 Woletha kuJehova umnikelo wempuphu owenziwe ngalezo zinto, unikelwe kumpristi, yena awuyise e-altare.
Lev 2:9 Umpristi makathabathe okuyisikhumbuzo kuwo umnikelo wempuphu, akushise e-altare kube ngumnikelo womlilo, kube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova.
Lev 2:10 Okuseleyo komnikelo wempuphu kuyakuba ngokuka-Aroni nokwamadodana akhe; kungcwelengcwele eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova.
Lev 2:11 “ ‘Awuyikwenziwa ngemvubelo umnikelo wempuphu eninikela ngawo kuJehova, ngokuba aniyikushisa imvubelo nazinyosi kube ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova.
Lev 2:12 Anonikela ngakho kube ngumnikelo wolibo; kungenyukeli e-altare nokho, kube yiphunga elimnandi.
Lev 2:13 Yonke iminikelo yakho yempuphu iyoliswe ngosawoti; ungavumeli ukuba usawoti wesivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu wakho asilale emnikelweni wakho wempuphu; wonikela ngayo yonke iminikelo yakho inosawoti.
Lev 2:14 “ ‘Uma unikela ngomnikelo wempuphu wolibo kuJehova, wonikela ngezikhwebu zamabele ezosiwe ngomlilo, amabele agquliweyo ezikhwebu ezintsha, ube ngumnikelo wempuphu wolibo lwakho,
Lev 2:15 uthele amafutha kuwo, ubeke inhlaka phezu kwawo; kungumnikelo wempuphu.
Lev 2:16 Umpristi ashise okuyisikhumbuzo sawo, inxenye yamabele agquliweyo awo nenxenye yamafutha awo kanye nayo yonke inhlaka yawo; kungumnikelo womlilo kuJehova.
Lev 3:1 “ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe ungumhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, enikela ngowemihlambi, noma iduna noma insikazi, wonikela ngawo phambi kukaJehova ungenasici.
Lev 3:2 Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wakhe, awuhlabe ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, afafaze i-altare nxazonke ngegazi.
Lev 3:3 Wothabatha kuwo umhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, anikele ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova, umhlehlo osibekela izibilini nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini,
Lev 3:4 nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni.
Lev 3:5 Amadodana ka-Aroni ayakukushisa e-altare phezu komnikelo wokushiswa ophezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni, kube ngumnikelo womlilo, kube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova.
Lev 3:6 “ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe nomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula kuJehova ungowezimvu, noma iduna noma insikazi, wonikela ngawo ungenasici.
Lev 3:7 Uma enikela ngemvu, ibe ngumnikelo wakhe, wonikela ngayo phambi kukaJehova,
Lev 3:8 abeke isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wakhe, awuhlabe ngaphambi kwetende lokuhlangana, amadodana ka-Aroni afafaze i-altare nxazonke ngegazi lawo.
Lev 3:9 Wothabatha kuwo umhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, anikele ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova amanoni awo, nomsila wonke ononileyo, awunqume eduze nomhlandla, namanoni asibekela izibilini, nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini,
Lev 3:10 nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni.
Lev 3:11 Umpristi uyakukushisa e-altare; kungukudla komnikelo womlilo kuJehova.
Lev 3:12 “ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe uyimbuzi, wonikela ngayo phambi kukaJehova,
Lev 3:13 abeke isandla sakhe enhloko yayo, ayihlabe ngaphambi kwetende lokuhlangana, amadodana ka-Aroni afafaze i-altare nxazonke ngegazi layo.
Lev 3:14 Abesethabatha kuyo, anikele ngomnikelo wakhe ube ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova, amanoni asibekela izibilini nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini,
Lev 3:15 nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni.
Lev 3:16 Umpristi uyakukushisa e-altare; kungukudla komnikelo womlilo, kube yiphunga elimnandi; onke amanoni angakaJehova.
Lev 3:17 “ ‘Kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu ezindlini zenu zonke zokuba ningadli amanoni nagazi.’ ”
Lev 4:1 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 4:2 “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Uma umuntu ona kungengamabomu kuyo imiyalo uJehova ayale ngayo ukuthi akunakwenziwa akwenze noma yikuphi,
Lev 4:3 uma kungumpristi ogcotshiweyo owone kanjalo, aze ehlisele abantu icala, wonikela kuJehova ngesono sakhe one ngaso iduna elingenasici, kube ngumnikelo wesono,
Lev 4:4 ayiyise inkunzi ebusweni bukaJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, abeke isandla sakhe enhloko yenkunzi, ayihlabe inkunzi phambi kukaJehova.
Lev 4:5 Umpristi ogcotshiweyo wothabatha igazi lenkunzi, alilethe ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana,
Lev 4:6 umpristi agcobhoze umunwe wakhe egazini, afafaze ngegazi kasikhombisa phambi kukaJehova, ngaphambi kwesihenqo sendlu engcwele.
Lev 4:7 Umpristi abhece igazi ezimpondweni ze-altare lempepho ethaphukayo phambi kukaJehova elisetendeni lokuhlangana; lonke elinye igazi lenkunzi wolithulula ngasesinqeni se-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa elingasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana.
Lev 4:8 Uyakuthabatha onke amanoni enkunzi yomnikelo wesono, amanoni asibekela izibilini nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini,
Lev 4:9 nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni,
Lev 4:10 njengalokho kwasuswa kuyo inkunzi yomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi akushise e-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa.
Lev 4:11 Isikhumba senkunzi, nayo yonke inyama yayo, nenhloko yayo, namanqina ayo, nezibilini zayo, nomswani wayo,
Lev 4:12 yebo, yonke inkunzi uyakuyikhiphela ngaphandle kwekamu, ayiyise endaweni ehlambulukileyo lapho uthululwa khona umlotha.
Lev 4:13 “ ‘Uma-ke yonke inhlangano yakwa-Israyeli iduka, leyo nto isitheke emehlweni ebandla, benza noma yikuphi kuyo yonke imiyalo uJehova ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, baze babe necala,
Lev 4:14 lapho isono abone ngaso sesaziwe, ibandla liyakunikela ngeduna libe ngumnikelo wesono, lililethe phambi kwetende lokuhlangana.
Lev 4:15 Amalunga enhlangano ayakubeka izandla zawo enhloko yenkunzi phambi kukaJehova, inkunzi ihlatshwe phambi kukaJehova.
Lev 4:16 Umpristi ogcotshiweyo alethe igazi lenkunzi etendeni lokuhlangana.
Lev 4:17 Umpristi uyakugcobhoza umunwe wakhe egazini, afafaze ngalo kasikhombisa phambi kukaJehova phambi kwesihenqo.
Lev 4:18 Uyakulibheca igazi ezimpondweni ze-altare eliphambi kukaJehova, elisetendeni lokuhlangana, athulule lonke elinye igazi ngasesinqeni se-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa elingasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana.
Lev 4:19 Abesethabatha kuyo onke amanoni, awashise e-altare.
Lev 4:20 Makenze njalo ngenkunzi; njengalokho wenza ngenkunzi yomnikelo wesono, makenze njalo nangalena. Umpristi abenzele ukubuyisana, baze bathethelelwe.
Lev 4:21 Uyakuyikhiphela inkunzi ngaphandle kwekamu, ayishise, njengalokho wayishisa inkunzi yokuqala: lokhu kungumnikelo wesono webandla.
Lev 4:22 “ ‘Nxa kona induna, yenza kungengamabomu noma yikuphi kuyo yonke imiyalo uJehova uNkulunkulu wayo ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, ize ibe necala,
Lev 4:23 uma-ke yaziswa isono sayo eyone ngaso, iyakuletha umnikelo wayo ube yimbuzi, eyeduna elingenasici.
Lev 4:24 Iyakubeka isandla sayo enhloko yembuzi, iyihlabele endaweni lapho behlabela khona iminikelo yokushiswa phambi kukaJehova; kungumnikelo wesono.
Lev 4:25 Umpristi wothabatha igazi lomnikelo wesono ngomunwe wakhe, alibhece ezimpondweni ze-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa, igazi lawo alithulule ngasesinqeni se-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa.
Lev 4:26 Onke amanoni awo uyakuwashisa e-altare njengamanoni omhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi ayenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sayo, ize ithethelelwe.
Lev 4:27 “ ‘Uma kona umuntukazana, enza kungengamabomu noma yikuphi kuyo imiyalo uJehova ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, aze abe necala,
Lev 4:28 uma aziswa isono sakhe one ngaso, woletha umnikelo wakhe wembuzi, insikazi engenasici, ngesono sakhe one ngaso.
Lev 4:29 Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wesono, awuhlabe umnikelo wesono endaweni yomnikelo wokushiswa.
Lev 4:30 Umpristi wothabatha igazi lawo ngomunwe wakhe, alibhece ezimpondweni ze-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa, lonke elinye igazi lawo alithulule ngasesinqeni se-altare.
Lev 4:31 Onke amanoni awo uyakuwasusa, njengalokhu amanoni esuswa emhlatshelweni weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi awashise e-altare abe yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana, aze athethelelwe.
Lev 4:32 “ ‘Uma eletha iwundlu libe ngumnikelo wakhe wesono, woletha insikazi engenasici.
Lev 4:33 Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wesono, awuhlabe, ube ngumnikelo wesono endaweni lapho behlabela khona umnikelo wokushiswa.
Lev 4:34 Umpristi wothabatha igazi lomnikelo wesono ngomunwe wakhe, alibhece ezimpondweni ze-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa, lonke elinye igazi lawo alithulule ngasesinqeni se-altare.
Lev 4:35 Onke amanoni awo uyakuwasusa, njengalokhu amanoni emvu esuswa emhlatshelweni weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi awashise e-altare phezu kweminikelo yomlilo kaJehova, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe one ngaso, aze athethelelwe.
Lev 5:1 “ ‘Uma umuntu ona lapho ezwa izwi lesifungo, engufakazi wokuthile, noma ekubonile noma ekwazi, engakusho nokho, khona wothwala ububi bakhe;
Lev 5:2 noma umuntu ethinta into engcolileyo, noma isidumbu sesilo esingcolileyo, noma isidumbu senkomo engcolileyo, noma isidumbu sesilwanyana esikhasayo esingcolileyo, kumsithele, engcolile nokho, woba necala.
Lev 5:3 “ ‘Noma ethinta ukungcola komuntu, nakuba yikuphi ukungcola kwakhe angcole ngakho, kumsithele, lapho esekwazi woba necala.
Lev 5:4 “ ‘Noma umuntu efunga ngamawala ngomlomo wakhe ukwenza okubi nokuba ukwenza okuhle, noma yikuphi umuntu angaphahluka ngakho ngesifungo, kumsithele, lapho esekwazi woba necala kokunye kwalokho.
Lev 5:5 “ ‘Kuyakuthi lapho enecala kokunye kwalokho, avume lokho one ngakho,
Lev 5:6 uyakuletha umnikelo wecala lakhe kuJehova ngesono sakhe one ngaso, insikazi yasezimvini, imvu noma imbuzi, kube ngumnikelo wesono, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe.
Lev 5:7 “ ‘Uma amandla akhe enganeli imvu, makalethe kuJehova ngesono one ngaso amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, elinye libe ngumnikelo wesono, elinye libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa,
Lev 5:8 awalethe kumpristi oyakunikela ngelomnikelo wesono kuqala, alishumpule inhloko entanyeni, angalidabuli kodwa,
Lev 5:9 afafaze uhlangothi lwe-altare ngegazi lomnikelo wesono, igazi eliseleyo likhanyelwe ngasesinqeni se-altare; kungumnikelo wesono.
Lev 5:10 Uyakulungisa elesibili libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa njengokwesimiso, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe one ngaso, aze athethelelwe.
Lev 5:11 “ ‘Kepha uma amandla akhe enganeli amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, makalethe umnikelo wakhe ngalokho one ngakho, okweshumi kwe-efa lempuphu ecolekileyo, ube ngumnikelo wesono, angatheli mafutha phezu kwawo, angabeki nhlaka phezu kwawo, ngokuba kungumnikelo wesono,
Lev 5:12 awulethe kumpristi, umpristi acaphune kuwo ngokhweshe, kube yisikhumbuzo sawo, akushise e-altare phezu kweminikelo yomlilo kaJehova; kungumnikelo wesono.
Lev 5:13 Umpristi uyakumenzela ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe one ngaso, nakuyiphi yalezi zinto, aze athethelelwe; okuseleyo kube ngokompristi njengomnikelo wempuphu.’ ”
Lev 5:14 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 5:15 “Uma umuntu esenza isiphambeko, one kungengamabomu ezintweni ezingcwele zikaJehova, woletha kuJehova umnikelo wakhe wecala, inqama yasemhlambini engenasici njengokulinganisa kwakho namashekeli esiliva ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele, ibe ngumnikelo wecala,
Lev 5:16 akhokhele lokho one ngakho entweni engcwele, athasisele kukho okwesihlanu, akunike umpristi, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngenqama yomnikelo wecala, aze athethelelwe.
Lev 5:17 “Uma umuntu ona, enza noma yikuphi kuyo imiyalo uJehova ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, noma ebengakwazi, unecala nokho, futhi wothwala ububi bakhe.
Lev 5:18 Woletha kumpristi inqama engenasici yasemhlambini njengokulinganisa kwakho, ibe ngumnikelo wecala, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesiphosiso aphosise ngaso engazi, aze athethelelwe.
Lev 5:19 Kungumnikelo wecala; nempela unecala phambi kukaJehova.”
Lev 6:1 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 6:2 “Uma umuntu ona, enze isiphambeko kuJehova, akhohlise umakhelwane wakhe ngento ebekiweyo, noma isibambiso noma into ephangiweyo, noma ecindezela umakhelwane wakhe,
Lev 6:3 noma, lapho ethola into elahlekileyo, eyiphika, afunge amanga, noma yikuphi kukho konke lokhu umuntu akwenzayo one ngakho,
Lev 6:4 khona kuyakuthi, uma onile aze abe necala, uyakukubuyisa lokho okuphangiweyo, noma lokho akudlileyo, noma lokho okwakubekwe kuye, noma lokho okwakulahlekile akutholayo,
Lev 6:5 noma yikuphi afungile amanga ngakho; makakubuyise, athasisele okwesihlanu kukho, amnike lowo okungokwakhe ngosuku lomnikelo wakhe wecala.
Lev 6:6 Woletha umnikelo wakhe wecala kuJehova, inqama engenasici yasemhlambini ngokulinganisa kwakho, ibe ngumnikelo wecala, iyiswe kumpristi,
Lev 6:7 umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova, aze athethelelwe konke angahle abe ekwenzile anecala ngakho.”
Lev 6:8 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 6:9 “Yala u-Aroni namadodana akhe, uthi: ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yokushiswa: umnikelo wokushiswa uyakuhlala eziko le-altare ubusuku bonke kuze kuse, umlilo we-altare uhlale kulo uvutha njalo.
Lev 6:10 Umpristi uyakwembatha isambatho selineni, afake nebhulukwe lakhe lelineni emzimbeni wakhe, asuse umlotha womlilo oshise umnikelo wokushiswa e-altare, awuthele ngaseceleni kwe-altare.
Lev 6:11 Abesekhumula izambatho zakhe, embathe ezinye izambatho, akhiphele umlotha ngaphandle kwekamu endaweni ehlambulukileyo.
Lev 6:12 Umlilo ophezu kwe-altare uyakuhlala kulo uvutha njalo, ungacimi; umpristi uyakubasa izinkuni kulo ekuseni njalo, ahlele kulo umnikelo wokushiswa, ashise kulo amanoni eminikelo yokuthula.
Lev 6:13 Umlilo wohlala e-altare uvutha njalo, ungacimi.
Lev 6:14 “ ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yempuphu: amadodana ka-Aroni ayakunikela ngawo phambi kukaJehova ngaphambi kwe-altare.
Lev 6:15 Makucashunwe kuwo ngokhweshe impuphu ecolekileyo yomnikelo wempuphu namafutha awo, nayo yonke inhlaka ephezu komnikelo wempuphu, akushise e-altare kube yisikhumbuzo sawo, kube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova.
Lev 6:16 Okuseleyo kuwo kuyakudliwa ngu-Aroni namadodana akhe, kudliwe ngaphandle kwemvubelo endaweni engcwele, bakudlele egcekeni letende lokuhlangana.
Lev 6:17 Akuyikuphekwa ngemvubelo. Ngikunike kube yisabelo sabo seminikelo yami yomlilo; kungcwelengcwele njengomnikelo wesono nanjengomnikelo wecala.
Lev 6:18 Bonke abesilisa phakathi kwabantwana baka-Aroni bayakukudla kube yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu seminikelo yomlilo kaJehova; konke okukuthintayo kuyakuba ngcwele.’ ”
Lev 6:19 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 6:20 “Nanku umnikelo ka-Aroni nowamadodana akhe abayakunikela ngawo kuJehova mhla begcotshwa: okweshumi kwe-efa lempuphu ecolekileyo kube ngumnikelo wempuphu njalonjalo, inxenye yakho ekuseni nenxenye yakho kusihlwa.
Lev 6:21 Uyakwenziwa emqengeleni ngamafutha; usuxutshanisiwe wowungenisa, unikele ngomnikelo wempuphu, ube yizingcezu ezihleshuliweyo, zibe yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova.
Lev 6:22 Umpristi ogcotshiweyo esikhundleni sakhe phakathi kwamadodana akhe wonikela ngawo, kube yisimiso esiphakade; woshiswa wonke.
Lev 6:23 Yonke iminikelo yempuphu yompristi yoshiswa yonke, ingadliwa.”
Lev 6:24 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 6:25 “Yisho ku-Aroni nakumadodana akhe, uthi: ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yesono; endaweni ohlatshelwe kuyo umnikelo wokushiswa, mawuhlatshelwe khona umnikelo wesono phambi kukaJehova; ungcwelengcwele.
Lev 6:26 Umpristi onikela ngawo ngesono wowudla, udliwe endaweni engcwele egcekeni letende lokuhlangana.
Lev 6:27 Konke okuyakuthinta inyama yawo kuyakuba ngcwele; nxa ingubo ifafazwa ngegazi lawo, lapho kufafazwe khona uyakukugeza endaweni engcwele.
Lev 6:28 Kepha isitsha sebumba okuphekelwe kuso masaphulwe, kodwa uma kuphekelwa esitsheni sethusi, siyakuphucuzwa, sihashazwe ngamanzi.
Lev 6:29 Bonke abesilisa phakathi kwabapristi bayakuwudla; ungcwelengcwele.
Lev 6:30 Kepha makungadliwa mnikelo wesono okwangeniswa igazi lawo etendeni lokuhlangana ukuba kwenziwe ukubuyisana endaweni engcwele; woshiswa ngomlilo.
Lev 7:1 “ ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yecala; ingcwelengcwele.
Lev 7:2 Endaweni abahlabela kuyo umnikelo wokushiswa, bayakuwuhlabela khona umnikelo wecala, kufafazwe i-altare nxazonke ngegazi lawo.
Lev 7:3 Uyakunikela ngawo onke amanoni awo, umsila ononileyo namanoni asibekela izibilini,
Lev 7:4 nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni,
Lev 7:5 umprisiti akushise e-altare kube ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova; kungumnikelo wecala.
Lev 7:6 Bonke abesilisa phakathi kwabapristi bayakuwudla, udliwe endaweni engcwele; ungcwelengcwele.
Lev 7:7 “ ‘Umnikelo wecala unjengomnikelo wesono; umthetho wawo munye; umpristi owenza ukubuyisana ngawo woba ngowakhe.
Lev 7:8 Umpristi onikela ngomnikelo wokushiswa womuntu, isikhumba somnikelo wokushiswa anikele ngawo siyakuba ngesompristi.
Lev 7:9 Yonke iminikelo yempuphu ephekwe eziko, nayo yonke elungiselwa okhambeni nasemqengeleni, iyakuba ngeyalo mpristi anikele ngayo.
Lev 7:10 Yonke iminikelo yempuphu exovwe namafutha neyomileyo iyakuba ngeyamadodana onke ka-Aroni, enye ithole njengenye.
Lev 7:11 “ ‘Nanku umthetho womhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula okuyakunikelwa ngayo kuJehova.
Lev 7:12 “ ‘Uma enikela ngawo ube ngumnikelo wokubonga, uyakunikela kanye nomhlatshelo wokubonga ngamaqebelengwane angenamvubelo exovwe namafutha, nemiqathane engenamvubelo, egcotshwe ngamafutha, namaqebelengwane empuphu ecolekileyo axovwe namafutha.
Lev 7:13 Kanye namaqebelengwane esinkwa esivutshelweyo uyakunikela ngalo mnikelo kanye nomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula, ube ngowokubonga.
Lev 7:14 Athabathe kuwo libe linye njalo eminikelweni yakhe, libe ngumnikelo ophakanyiswayo kuJehova, libe ngelompristi ofafaza ngegazi leminikelo yokuthula.
Lev 7:15 Inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula ongowokubonga iyakudliwa ngosuku lokunikela kwakhe, angashiyi lutho lwayo kuze kuse.
Lev 7:16 “ ‘Kepha uma umhlatshelo womnikelo wakhe ungowesithembiso noma ungowesihle, uyakudliwa ngalolo suku anikela ngalo ngomhlatshelo wakhe; nangakusasa okuseleyo kuwo kuyakudliwa;
Lev 7:17 kepha okusele enyameni yomhlatshelo ngosuku lwesithathu kuyakushiswa ngomlilo.
Lev 7:18 Uma inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula idliwa ngosuku lwesithathu, ayiyikwamukeleka, ingabalelwa kuye owanikela ngayo; iyakunengeka, nomuntu oyidlayo uyakuthwala ububi bakhe.
Lev 7:19 “ ‘Inyama ethinta into engcolileyo ayinakudliwa, kepha iyakushiswa ngomlilo; nokho le nyama-ke bonke abahlambulukileyo bangayidla.
Lev 7:20 Kodwa umuntu oyidla inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula engekaJehova esenakho ukungcola kwakhe, lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo.
Lev 7:21 Nanxa umuntu ethinta into engcolileyo, ukungcola komuntu noma isilwane esingcolileyo noma into engcolileyo enengekayo, adle inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula engekaJehova, lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo.’ ”
Lev 7:22 Jehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 7:23 “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Aniyikudla manoni enkomo, nawemvu, nawembuzi.
Lev 7:24 Amanoni engcuba namanoni okudweshuliweyo angasebenza yonke eminye imisebenzi; kepha ningawadli nempela.
Lev 7:25 Ngokuba yilowo nalowo odla amanoni enkomo okunikelwa ngayo ibe ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova, lowo muntu owadlayo uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo.
Lev 7:26 Ningadli naliphi igazi, noma ngelenyoni noma ngelenkomo, nakuyiphi yezindlu zenu.
Lev 7:27 Yilowo nalowo odla igazi lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo.’ ”
Lev 7:28 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 7:29 “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Onikela ngomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula kuJehova uyakuletha umnikelo wakhe kuJehova emhlatshelweni weminikelo yakhe yokuthula;
Lev 7:30 izandla zakhe uqobo zilethe iminikelo yomlilo kaJehova, alethe amanoni kanye nesifuba ukuba isifuba sizuliswe, sibe ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova.
Lev 7:31 Umpristi makashise amanoni e-altare, kepha isifuba sibe ngesika-Aroni nesamadodana akhe.
Lev 7:32 Anonika umpristi umlenze wokunene, ube ngumnikelo wokuphakanyiswa emihlatshelweni yeminikelo yenu yokuthula.
Lev 7:33 Lowo phakathi kwamadodana ka-Aroni onikela ngegazi leminikelo yokuthula nangamanoni koba ngowakhe umlenze wokunene, ube yisabelo sakhe.
Lev 7:34 Ngokuba isifuba sokuzuliswa nomlenze wokuphakanyiswa ngikuthabathe kwabakwa-Israyeli emihlatshelweni yeminikelo yabo yokuthula, ngakunika u-Aroni umpristi namadodana akhe, kube yisimiso esiphakade kwabakwa-Israyeli.’ ”
Lev 7:35 Leso siyisabelo sika-Aroni nesabelo samadodana akhe seminikelo yomlilo kaJehova mhla ebaletha ukuba bamkhonze uJehova esikhundleni sobupristi,
Lev 7:36 ayala ngakho uJehova ukuba bakuphiwe ngabantwana bakwa-Israyeli mhla ebagcoba, kube yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zabo.
Lev 7:37 Lowo ungumthetho weminikelo yokushiswa, noweminikelo yempuphu, noweminikelo yesono, noweminikelo yecala, nowokwahlukaniselwa, nowomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula,
Lev 7:38 uJehova amyala ngawo uMose entabeni yaseSinayi mhla eyala abakwa-Israyeli ukuba banikele ngeminikelo yabo kuJehova ehlane laseSinayi.
Lev 8:1 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 8:2 “Thabatha u-Aroni namadodana akhe kanye naye, nezambatho, namafutha okugcoba, nenkunzi yomnikelo wesono, nezinqama zombili, neqoma lezinkwa ezingenamvubelo,
Lev 8:3 ubuthele inhlangano yonke ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana.”
Lev 8:4 UMose wenza njengalokho uJehova emyalile; inhlangano yabuthelwa ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana.
Lev 8:5 UMose wayesethi kuyo inhlangano: “Nansi into uJehova ayale ngayo ukuba yenziwe.”
Lev 8:6 UMose waletha u-Aroni namadodana akhe, wabageza ngamanzi.
Lev 8:7 Wamfaka ibhantshi, wambhincisa ibhande, wamembathisa ijazi; wamfaka ingubo yamahlombe, wambhincisa ibhande elifekethisiweyo lengubo yamahlombe, wayibophela kuye ngalo.
Lev 8:8 Wamfaka isihlangu sesifuba, nasesihlangwini sesifuba wabeka i-Urimi neThumimi.
Lev 8:9 Wafaka isigqoko ekhanda lakhe, nasesigqokweni ngaphambili wafaka ungcwecwe wegolide, umqhele ongcwele, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Lev 8:10 UMose wathatha amafutha okugcoba, waligcoba itabernakele nakho konke okuphakathi kwalo, wakungcwelisa.
Lev 8:11 Wafafaza ngawo i-altare kasikhombisa, waligcoba i-altare kanye nezitsha zonke zalo, nomcengezi nesinqe sawo, ukuba kungcweliswe.
Lev 8:12 Wathela amafutha okugcoba ekhanda lika-Aroni, wamgcoba ukuba angcweliswe.
Lev 8:13 UMose wayeseletha amadodana ka-Aroni, wawembathisa amabhantshi, wawabhincisa amabhande, wawafaka izigqoko, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Lev 8:14 Waletha nenkunzi yomnikelo wesono; u-Aroni namadodana akhe babeka izandla zabo enhloko yenkunzi yomnikelo wesono.
Lev 8:15 Wayeseyihlaba; uMose wathatha igazi, walibheca ezimpondweni ze-altare nxazonke ngomunwe wakhe, waliphothula i-altare, walithulula igazi ngasesinqeni se-altare, walingcwelisa ukuba alenzele ukubuyisana.
Lev 8:16 Wathatha onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, nezinso zombili namanoni azo, uMose wakushisa e-altare.
Lev 8:17 Kepha inkunzi nesikhumba sayo, nenyama yayo, nomswani wayo, wakushisa ngomlilo ngaphandle kwekamu, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Lev 8:18 Wayeseletha inqama yomnikelo wokushiswa; u-Aroni namadodana akhe babeka izandla zabo enhloko yenqama.
Lev 8:19 Wayihlaba, uMose wafafaza i-altare ngegazi nxazonke.
Lev 8:20 Wayeseyihlahlela inyama izitho; uMose washisa inhloko nezitho namanoni.
Lev 8:21 Wahlanza izibilini namanqina ngamanzi; uMose washisa yonke inqama e-altare; yayingumnikelo wokushiswa, waba yiphunga elimnandi, umnikelo womlilo kuJehova, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Lev 8:22 Waletha nenye inqama, inqama yokwahlukaniselwa; u-Aroni namadodana akhe babeka izandla zabo enhloko yenqama.
Lev 8:23 Wayihlaba; uMose wathatha igazi layo, walibheca esicutshini sendlebe yokunene ka-Aroni, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwakhe lokunene.
Lev 8:24 Wayeseletha amadodana ka-Aroni, uMose walibheca igazi esicutshini sendlebe yabo yokunene, nasesithupheni sesandla sabo sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwabo lokunene; uMose wafafaza i-altare ngegazi nxazonke.
Lev 8:25 Wawathatha amanoni, nomsila ononileyo, nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, nezinso zombili namanoni azo, nomlenze wokunene,
Lev 8:26 naseqomeni lezinkwa ezingenamvubelo elalisebusweni bukaJehova wathatha iqebelengwane laba linye elingenamvubelo, neqebelengwane laba linye lesinkwa samafutha, nomqathane munye, wakubeka phezu kwamanoni naphezu komlenze wokunene,
Lev 8:27 wakubeka konke ezandleni zika-Aroni, nasezandleni zamadodana akhe, wakuzulisa kwaba ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova.
Lev 8:28 UMose wayesekuthatha ezandleni zabo, wakushisa e-altare emnikelweni wokushiswa; kwakungokokwahlukaniselwa, kwaba yiphunga elimnandi, umnikelo womlilo kuJehova.
Lev 8:29 UMose wathatha isifuba, wasizulisa saba ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova; sasiyisabelo sikaMose sasenqameni yokwahlukaniselwa, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Lev 8:30 UMose wayesethatha amafutha okugcoba, negazi elalise-altare, wafafaza ngalo u-Aroni nezambatho zakhe, namadodana akhe kanye naye, nezambatho zamadodana akhe, wangcwelisa u-Aroni nezambatho zakhe, namadodana akhe kanye naye, nezambatho zamadodana akhe.
Lev 8:31 Wathi uMose ku-Aroni nakumadodana akhe: “Phekani inyama ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, niyidle kanye nesinkwa esiseqomeni lokwahlukaniselwa, njengalokho ngayala ngathi: ‘U-Aroni namadodana akhe bayakukudla.’
Lev 8:32 Okuseleyo kwenyama nokwesinkwa anokushisa ngomlilo.
Lev 8:33 Ningaphumi emnyango wetende lokuhlangana izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, kungakapheli izinsuku zokwahlukaniselwa kwenu, ngokuba uyakunahlukanisela izinsuku eziyisikhombisa.
Lev 8:34 UJehova uyalile ukuba kwenziwe njengalokho kwenziwe namuhla, ukuze nenzelwe ukubuyisana.
Lev 8:35 Ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana niyakuhlala imini nobusuku izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, nisigcine isiyalezo sikaJehova, ukuze ningafi, ngokuba ngiyaliwe kanjalo.”
Lev 8:36 U-Aroni namadodana akhe benza konke uJehova ayale ngakho ngesandla sikaMose.
Lev 9:1 Kwathi ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili uMose wabiza u-Aroni namadodana akhe namalunga akwa-Israyeli,
Lev 9:2 wathi ku-Aroni: “Mawuzithathele ithole lenkunzi, libe ngumnikelo wesono, nenqama ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, okungenasici, unikele ngakho phambi kukaJehova.
Lev 9:3 Khuluma kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Thathani impongo, ibe ngumnikelo wesono, nethole newundlu, omabili abe nomnyaka munye, angenasici, abe ngumnikelo wokushiswa,
Lev 9:4 nenkunzi nenqama zibe yiminikelo yokuthula, zihlatshwe phambi kukaJehova, nomnikelo wempuphu oxovwe namafutha, ngokuba namuhla uJehova uyabonakala kini.’ ”
Lev 9:5 Baletha-ke lokho uMose akuyalayo phambi kwetende lokuhlangana, nenhlangano yonke yasondela, yema phambi kukaJehova.
Lev 9:6 Wayesethi uMose: “Nansi into uJehova ayala ngayo ukuba niyenze, kuze kubonakale kini inkazimulo kaJehova.”
Lev 9:7 UMose wathi ku-Aroni: “Sondela e-altare, unikele ngomnikelo wakho wesono nangomnikelo wakho wokushiswa, uzenzele wena nabantu ukubuyisana, andukuba unikele ngomnikelo wabantu, ubenzele ukubuyisana, njengalokho uJehova eyalile.”
Lev 9:8 U-Aroni wayesesondela e-altare, walihlaba ithole lomnikelo wesono ongowakhe.
Lev 9:9 Amadodana ka-Aroni aletha igazi kuye; wagcobhoza umunwe egazini, walibheca ezimpondweni ze-altare, wathulula elinye igazi ngasesinqeni se-altare;
Lev 9:10 kepha amanoni nezinso namanoni aphezu kwesibindi emnikelweni wesono wakushisa e-altare, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose.
Lev 9:11 Inyama nesikhumba wakushisa ngomlilo ngaphandle kwekamu.
Lev 9:12 Wawuhlaba umnikelo wokushiswa; amadodana ka-Aroni aletha kuye igazi, wafafaza ngalo i-altare nxazonke.
Lev 9:13 Anikeza kuye umnikelo wokushiswa izitho ngezitho kanye nenhloko, wakushisa e-altare.
Lev 9:14 Wahlanza izibilini namanqina, wakushisa phezu komnikelo wokushiswa e-altare.
Lev 9:15 Wayeseletha umnikelo wabantu, wathatha impongo yomnikelo wesono ongowabantu, wayihlaba, wanikela ngayo ngenxa yesono njengowokuqala.
Lev 9:16 Waletha umnikelo wokushiswa, wanikela ngawo njengokwesimiso.
Lev 9:17 Wayeseletha umnikelo wempuphu, wagcwalisa isandla sakhe ngawo, wawushisa e-altare ngaphandle komnikelo wokushiswa wasekuseni.
Lev 9:18 Wahlaba inkunzi nenqama, zibe ngumhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula ongowabantu; amadodana ka-Aroni aletha kuye igazi owafafaza ngalo i-altare nxazonke,
Lev 9:19 namanoni enkunzi nawenqama, nomsila ononileyo, nalawo asibekela izibilini, nezinso, namanoni esibindi,
Lev 9:20 abeka amanoni phezu kwezifuba; wawashisa amanoni e-altare;
Lev 9:21 izifuba nomlenze wokunene wakuzulisa, kube ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova, njengalokho uMose eyalile.
Lev 9:22 U-Aroni waphakamisela izandla zakhe kubantu, wababusisa; wayesehla ekunikeleni ngomnikelo wesono nangomnikelo wokushiswa nangeminikelo yokuthula.
Lev 9:23 OMose no-Aroni bangena etendeni lokuhlangana, babuye baphuma, bababusisa abantu; yayisibonakala inkazimulo kaJehova kubantu bonke.
Lev 9:24 Kwaphuma umlilo ngaphambi kukaJehova, waqeda umnikelo wokushiswa namanoni e-altare; sebekubona abantu bonke bananela, bakhothamela phansi ngobuso.
Lev 10:1 ONadabi no-Abihu amadodana ka-Aroni bathatha bobabili imicengezi yabo yomlilo, bafaka umlilo kuyo, babeka impepho phezulu, banikela phambi kukaJehova ngomlilo ongafanele, angabayalanga ngawo.
Lev 10:2 Kwaphuma umlilo ngaphambi kukaJehova, wabaqeda, bafa phambi kukaJehova.
Lev 10:3 UMose wayesethi ku-Aroni: “Yikho uJehova akukhuluma, ethi: “ ‘Kubo abaseduze nami ngiyakungcweliswa, phambi kwabantu bonke ngiyakukhazimuliswa.’ ” U-Aroni wathula.
Lev 10:4 UMose wabiza oMishayeli no-Elisafani amadodana ka-Uziyeli, uyisekazi ka-Aroni, wathi kubo: “Sondelani, nibasuse abafowenu ngaphambi kwendlu engcwele, nibakhiphele ngaphandle kwekamu.”
Lev 10:5 Base besondela, babasusa bembethe amabhantshi abo, babakhiphela ngaphandle kwekamu, njengalokho eshilo uMose.
Lev 10:6 UMose wayesethi ku-Aroni naku-Eleyazare naku-Itamari amadodana akhe: “Ningathukululi izinwele zamakhanda enu, ningaklebhuli izambatho zenu ukuba ningafi, ingathukuthelelwa yonke inhlangano, kepha abafowenu, yonke indlu yakwa-Israyeli, mabalilele ukushisa akuphembileyo uJehova.
Lev 10:7 Ningaphumi emnyango wetende lokuhlangana, funa nife, ngokuba amafutha okugcoba kaJehova aphezu kwenu.” Benza-ke njengezwi likaMose.
Lev 10:8 UJehova wakhuluma ku-Aroni, wathi:
Lev 10:9 “Ungaphuzi wayini naluphuzo olunamandla, wena namadodana akho kanye nawe, nxa ningena etendeni lokuhlangana, ukuba ningafi; kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu.
Lev 10:10 Niyakwahlukanisa okungcwele nokungengcwele, okungcolileyo nokuhlambulukileyo,
Lev 10:11 nize nifundise abantwana bakwa-Israyeli zonke izimiso uJehova azikhulume kubo ngesandla sikaMose.”
Lev 10:12 UMose wakhuluma ku-Aroni naku-Eleyazare naku-Itamari amadodana akhe aseleyo, wathi: “Thathani umnikelo wempuphu osele eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova, niwudle ungenamvubelo ngaseceleni kwe-altare, ngokuba ungcwelengcwele,
Lev 10:13 niwudle endaweni engcwele, ngokuba kuyimfanelo yakho nemfanelo yamadodana akho eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova; ngokuba ngiyaliwe kanjalo.
Lev 10:14 Isifuba sokuzuliswa nomlenze wokuphakanyiswa niyakukudla endaweni ehlambulukileyo, wena namadodana akho namadodakazi akho kanye nawe, ngokuba kuphiwe kube yimfanelo yakho nemfanelo yamadodana akho emihlatshelweni yeminikelo yokuthula yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli.
Lev 10:15 Mabalethe umlenze wokuphakanyiswa nesifuba sokuzuliswa kanye neminikelo yomlilo yamanoni ukuba bakuzulise, kube ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova, kube ngokwakho nokwamadodana akho kanye nawe, kube yimfanelo ephakade, njengalokho uJehova eyalile.”
Lev 10:16 UMose wafunisisa impongo yomnikelo wesono; bheka, yayishisiwe; wabathukuthelela o-Eleyazare no-Itamari amadodana ka-Aroni aseleyo, wathi:
Lev 10:17 “Anidlanga ngani umnikelo wesono endaweni yendlu engcwele, njengokuba ungcwelengcwele, futhi niphiwe wona ukuba nisuse ububi benhlangano, niyenzele ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova, na?
Lev 10:18 Bhekani, igazi lawo alingeniswanga phakathi endaweni engcwele; bekufanele ngempela ukuba niwudlele endaweni engcwele, njengalokho ngayala.”
Lev 10:19 U-Aroni wathi kuMose: “Bheka-ke, namuhla banikele ngomnikelo wabo wesono nangomnikelo wabo wokushiswa phambi kukaJehova; nokho ngehlelwe yilokhu mina; uma bengidlile umnikelo wesono namuhla, bekuzakwamukeleka emehlweni kaJehova na?”
Lev 10:20 Esezwile lokho uMose, kwaba kuhle emehlweni akhe.
Lev 11:1 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose naku-Aroni, wathi kubo:
Lev 11:2 “Yishoni kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, nithi: ‘Yilokhu okuphilayo eningakudla kuzo zonke izilwane zasemhlabeni:
Lev 11:3 zonke ezahlukanisa inselo, nezidabula inselo kabili, nezetshisayo kuzo izilwane, lezo ningazidla.
Lev 11:4 “ ‘Kepha lezi aniyikuzidla kwezetshisayo nakwezahlukanisa inselo: ikamela, ngokuba liyetshisa, lingahlukanisi kodwa inselo; lingcolile kini;
Lev 11:5 nembila, ngokuba iyetshisa, ingahlukanisi kodwa inselo; ingcolile kini;
Lev 11:6 nonogwaja, ngokuba uyetshisa, engahlukanisi kodwa inselo; ungcolile kini;
Lev 11:7 nengulube, ngokuba iyahlukanisa inselo, idabula inselo kabili, ingetshisi kodwa; ingcolile kini.
Lev 11:8 Ningadli inyama yazo, ningathinti izidumbu zazo; zingcolile kini.
Lev 11:9 “ ‘Lezi ningazidla kuzo zonke ezisemanzini: zonke ezinamaphiko nezingcwecwe ezisemanzini neziselwandle nezisemifuleni, lezo ningazidla.
Lev 11:10 Kepha zonke ezingenamaphiko nazingcwecwe eziselwandle nezisemifuleni, nazo zonke eziswebezelayo emanzini, nazo zonke izinto eziphilayo emanzini ziyisinengiso kini.
Lev 11:11 Zoba yisinengiso kini; ningadli inyama yazo; izidumbu zazo ziyakunengeka kini.
Lev 11:12 Zonke ezingenamaphiko nazingcwecwe emanzini ziyisinengiso kini.
Lev 11:13 “ ‘Yilezi eniyakunengwa yizo ezinyonini; aziyikudliwa, ziyisinengiso: ukhozi, nenqe, nengqungqulu,
Lev 11:14 nonhloyile, noheshe ngezinhlobo zakhe,
Lev 11:15 nawo onke amagwababa ngezinhlobo zawo,
Lev 11:16 nentshe, nenkovana, nenkanu, noklebe ngezinhlobo zakhe,
Lev 11:17 nesikhova, nomphishamanzi, nomxwagele,
Lev 11:18 nefukezi, nevuba, nophalane,
Lev 11:19 nonogolantethe, nonozalizingwenya ngezinhlobo zakhe, noziningweni, nelulwane.
Lev 11:20 “ ‘Nezilwanyana zonke ezinamaphiko, ezihamba ngezinyawo zozine, ziyisinengiso kini.
Lev 11:21 Kepha lezi ningazidla kuzo zonke izilwanyana ezinamaphiko, ezihamba ngezinyawo zozine, ezinamanqina ngaphezu kwezinyawo zazo ukuxhuma ngazo emhlabeni;
Lev 11:22 kuzo ningadla lezi: isikhonyane ngezinhlobo zaso, namaboni ngezinhlobo zawo, namadiye ngezinhlobo zawo, nezintethe ngezinhlobo zazo.
Lev 11:23 Kepha zonke ezinye izilwanyana ezinamaphiko nezinyawo ezine ziyisinengiso kini.
Lev 11:24 “ ‘Niyakungcoliswa yilezi: bonke abathinta izidumbu zazo bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe.
Lev 11:25 Bonke abathwala utho lwezidumbu zazo bayakuhlanza izingubo zabo, babe ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe.
Lev 11:26 “ ‘Zonke izilwane ezahlukanisa inselo, zingayidabuli kabili kodwa, zingetshisi, zingcolile kini; bonke abazithintayo bayakuba ngabangcolile.
Lev 11:27 Nazo zonke ezihamba ngezidladla kuzo zonke izilwane ezihamba ngezinyawo ezine zingcolile kini; bonke abathinta izidumbu zazo bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe.
Lev 11:28 Othwala izidumbu zazo makahlanze izingubo zakhe, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe; zingcolile kini.
Lev 11:29 “ ‘Lezi zingcolile kini kuzo izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni: uchakide, nempuku, noxamu ngezinhlobo zakhe,
Lev 11:30 nesigcilikisha, nesiquzi, nentulo, nesibankwa, nonwabu.
Lev 11:31 Yilezo ezingcolile kini phakathi kwezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo; bonke abazithintayo sezifile bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe.
Lev 11:32 Konke esiwela phezu kwakho esinye sazo sezifile kuyakuba ngokungcolile, noma kuyinto yomuthi noma yingubo noma yisikhumba noma yisaka noma yintoni okusetshenzwa ngayo; makufakwe emanzini, kube ngokungcolile kuze kuhlwe; khona kuyakuhlanzeka.
Lev 11:33 Nezitsha zonke esiwela kuzo esinye sazo, noma yintoni ephakathi kwazo iyakuba ngengcolile, nize nizaphule.
Lev 11:34 Konke ukudla okudliwayo okukuzo, afika kukho futhi amanzi anjalo, kuyakuba ngokungcolile, nakho konke okuphuzwayo kuzo izitsha ezinjalo kuyakuba ngokungcolile.
Lev 11:35 Konke esiwela kukho isidumbu sazo kuyakuba ngokungcolile, noma iziko noma ikhanzi; makuphohlozwe; kungcolile, kuyakuba ngokungcolile kini.
Lev 11:36 Kepha umthombo nomgodi lapho amanzi eqoqene khona uyakube uhlambulukile, kodwa okuthinta izidumbu zazo kuyakuba ngokungcolile.
Lev 11:37 Uma izidumbu zazo ziwela phezu kwembewu etshalwayo ezakuhlwanyelwa, iyakuba ngehlambulukile.
Lev 11:38 Kepha uma amanzi ethelwa embewini, izidumbu zazo ziwele phezu kwayo, ingcolile kini.
Lev 11:39 “ ‘Uma kufa isilwane esidliwayo, othinta isidumbu saso uyakuba ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe.
Lev 11:40 Odla isidumbu saso makahlanze izingubo zakhe, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe; nothwala isidumbu saso makahlanze izingubo zakhe, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe.
Lev 11:41 “ ‘Zonke izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni ziyisinengiso; mazingadliwa.
Lev 11:42 Zonke ezihamba ngesisu, nazo zonke ezihamba ngezinyawo ezine noma ngeziningi, nazo zonke ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni, ningazidli, ngokuba ziyisinengiso.
Lev 11:43 Ningazenzi ninengeke ngezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo, ningazingcolisi ngazo, funa ningcole ngazo.
Lev 11:44 Ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu; ngalokho zingcweliseni, nibe ngcwele, ngokuba mina ngingcwele; ningazingcolisi ngezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni.
Lev 11:45 Ngokuba nginguJehova owakukhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu; ngalokho yibani ngcwele, ngokuba ngingcwele.
Lev 11:46 “ ‘Yilowo umthetho wezilwane nowezinyoni nowezilwane zonke eziswebezelayo emanzini, nowezilwanyana zonke ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni,
Lev 11:47 ukuba kwahlukaniswe okungcolileyo nokuhlambulukileyo, okuphilayo okudliwayo nokuphilayo okungadliwayo.’ ”
Lev 12:1 UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi:
Lev 12:2 “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Uma owesifazane ekhulelwa, azale umfana, uyakuba ngongcolile izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; njengasemihleni yokungcola ngefindo lakhe wohlala engcolile.
Lev 12:3 Ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili inyama yejwabu lakhe iyakusokwa.
Lev 12:4 Abesehlala esegazini lokuhlambuluka izinsuku ezingamashumi amathathu nantathu, angathinti lutho olungcwele, angangeni endlini engcwele, zize ziphelele izinsuku zokuhlambuluka kwakhe.
Lev 12:5 Kepha uma ezala intombazana, makabe ngongcolile amasonto amabili njengasekungcoleni ngefindo lakhe, ahlale esegazini lokuhlambuluka izinsuku ezingamashumi ayisithupha nesithupha.
Lev 12:6 “ ‘Nanxa seziphelile izinsuku zokuhlambuluka kwakhe ngomfana noma ngentombazana, makalethe imvu enomnyaka munye, ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, nephuphu lejuba noma ihobhe, libe ngumnikelo wesono, akulethe ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana kumpristi,
Lev 12:7 yena anikele ngakho phambi kukaJehova, amenzele ukubuyisana, aze ahlambuluke emthonjeni wegazi lakhe. Yilowo umthetho wozalayo umfana noma intombazana.
