2Kgs 23:2 Inkosi yenyukela endlini kaJehova, bonke abantu bakwaJuda nabo bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema benayo, kanye nabapristi nabaprofethi, yebo, abantu bonke, abancane nabakhulu, yafunda ezindlebeni zabo onke amazwi encwadi yesivumelwano ebifunyenwe endlini kaJehova.
2Kgs 23:3 Inkosi yema ngasensikeni, yenza isivumelwano phambi kukaJehova ukumlandela uJehova nokugcina imiyalo yakhe, nobufakazi bakhe, nezimiso zakhe ngenhliziyo yonke nangomphefumulo wonke ukuqinisa amazwi alesi sivumelwano alotshwe kule ncwadi; bonke abantu basivuma isivumelwano.
2Kgs 23:4 Inkosi yayisiyala uHilikiya umpristi omkhulu, nabapristi besigaba sesibili, nabalindimnyango ukukhipha ethempelini likaJehova zonke izinto ezazenzelwe oBali, no-Ashera, nebandla lonke lasezulwini, yazishisa ngaphandle kweJerusalema emasimini aseKidroni, yayisa umlotha wazo eBethele.
2Kgs 23:5 Yabasusa abapristi bezithombe amakhosi akwaJuda abamisele ukushisa impepho ezindaweni eziphakemeyo emizini yakwaJuda nanxazonke zeJerusalema, kanye nabashisa impepho kuBali nakulo ilanga nenyanga nezinkanyezi nalo lonke ibandla lasezulwini.
2Kgs 23:6 Yakhipha u-Ashera endlini kaJehova, yamkhiphela phandle kweJerusalema, yamyisa ngasemfudlaneni iKidroni, yamshisa ngasemfudlaneni iKidroni, yamcolisisa waba yincushuncushu, yayiphonsa incushuncushu yakhe emathuneni abantu nje.
2Kgs 23:7 Yadiliza izindlu zezifebe zethempeli ezazisendlini kaJehova, lapho abesifazane bemelukela khona u-Ashera amatende.
2Kgs 23:8 Yakhipha bonke abapristi emizini yakwaJuda, yangcolisa izindawo eziphakemeyo, lapho abapristi bebeshise khona impepho, kusukela eGeba kuze kube seBeri Sheba; yadiliza izindawo eziphakemeyo zasemasangweni asesikhaleni sesango likaJoshuwa umphathimuzi, ezazingakwesokhohlo somuntu ngasesangweni lomuzi.
2Kgs 23:9 Kodwa abapristi basezindaweni eziphakemeyo babengenyukeli e-altare likaJehova eJerusalema, kepha badla isinkwa esingenamvubelo phakathi kwabafowabo.
2Kgs 23:10 Yangcolisa iThofeti elisesigodini sabantwana bakwaHinomu ukuba kungabikho muntu odabulisa indodana yakhe noma indodakazi yakhe emlilweni kuMoloki.
2Kgs 23:11 Yasusa namahhashi amakhosi akwaJuda anikele ngawo kulo ilanga ngasendleleni yokungena endlini kaJehova ngasekamelweni likaNathani Meleki induna yasePariwarimi, yashisa izinqola zelanga ngomlilo.
2Kgs 23:12 Ama-altare ayesophahleni lwekamelo eliphezulu lika-Ahazi, elenziwe ngamakhosi akwaJuda, nama-altare enziwe nguManase emagcekeni omabili endlu kaJehova inkosi yawadiliza, yasuka yagijima, yalahla uthuli emfudlaneni iKidroni.
2Kgs 23:13 Izindawo eziphakemeyo ezaziphambi kweJerusalema, ngakwesokunene kweNtaba Yokonakala, uSolomoni inkosi yakwa-Israyeli ayezakhele u-Ashitaroti isinengiso samaSidoni, noKemoshi isinengiso sakwaMowabi, noMilkomu isinengiso sabantwana bakwa-Amoni, inkosi yazingcolisa.
2Kgs 23:14 Yaphahlaza izinsika, yanquma o-Ashera, yagcwalisa izindawo zabo ngamathambo abantu.
2Kgs 23:15 I-altare elaliseBethele, nendawo ephakemeyo eyenziwe nguJerobowamu indodana kaNebati owonisa u-Israyeli, nalelo altare kanye nendawo ephakemeyo yakudiliza, yayishisa indawo ephakemeyo, yayicolisisa yaba yincushuncushu, yashisa no-Ashera.
2Kgs 23:16 UJosiya waphenduka, wabona amathuna ayelapho entabeni; wathumela wakhipha amathambo emathuneni, wawashisa e-altare, walingcolisa njengezwi likaJehova alimemeza lowo muntu kaNkulunkulu owamemezela lezi zinto.
2Kgs 23:17 Wayesethi: “Yitshe lini leli engilibonayo na?” Abantu bomuzi bamtshela bathi: “Yithuna lalowo muntu kaNkulunkulu owavela kwaJuda, wamemezela lezi zindaba osuzenzile nge-altare laseBethele.”
2Kgs 23:18 Wathi: “Myekeni; mawanganyakaziswa muntu amathambo akhe.” Base beyeka amathambo akhe kanye namathambo alowo mprofethi owavela eSamariya.
2Kgs 23:19 Nazo zonke izindlu zezindawo eziphakemeyo ezazisemizini yaseSamariya, ezenziwa ngamakhosi akwa-Israyeli acunula ngazo, uJosiya wazisusa, wenza kuzona njengazo zonke izenzo azenzileyo eBethele.
2Kgs 23:20 Wabulala ema-altare bonke abapristi basezindaweni eziphakemeyo ababe lapho, washisa amathambo abantu phezu kwawo, wabuyela eJerusalema.
2Kgs 23:21 Inkosi yayisiyala bonke abantu ngokuthi: “Yenzelani uJehova uNkulunkulu wenu iphasika njengokulotshiwe kule ncwadi yesivumelwano.”
2Kgs 23:22 Ngokuba iphasika elinjalo lalingagcinwanga kusukela emihleni yabahluleli abahlulela u-Israyeli, nasemihleni yonke yamakhosi akwa-Israyeli, nakweyakwaJuda.
2Kgs 23:23 Kepha ngomnyaka weshumi nesishiyagalombili wenkosi uJosiya leli phasika lenzelwa uJehova eJerusalema.
2Kgs 23:24 Futhi abanamadlozi, nabathakathi, namatherafi, nezithombe, nazo zonke izinengiso ezazibonwa ezweni lakwaJuda naseJerusalema uJosiya wakuqeda ukuba afeze amazwi omthetho alotshwe encwadini uHilikiya umpristi ayifumanayo endlini kaJehova.
2Kgs 23:25 Kwakungekho nkosi phambi kwakhe eyaphendukela kuJehova ngayo yonke inhliziyo yayo nangawo onke amandla ayo njengawo wonke umthetho kaMose, nangasemva kwakhe akuvelanga enjengaye.
2Kgs 23:26 Nokho uJehova akabuyanga ekuvutheni kwentukuthelo yakhe enkulu, intukuthelo yakhe eyavuthela ngakho uJuda, ngenxa yakho konke ukucunula uManase ayemcunule ngakho.
2Kgs 23:27 UJehova wathi: “Naye uJuda ngiyakumsusa ebusweni bami, njengalokho ngisuse u-Israyeli, ngiwulahle lo muzi engawukhethayo, nendlu engasho ngayo ukuthi igama lami liyakuba khona lapho.”
2Kgs 23:28 Ezinye izindaba zikaJosiya nakho konke akwenzayo angithi kulotshiwe encwadini yezindaba zemihla ngemihla yamakhosi akwaJuda na?
2Kgs 23:29 Emihleni yakhe uFaro Nekho inkosi yaseGibithe wenyukela enkosini yase-Asiriya ngasemfuleni u-Ewufrathe; inkosi uJosiya yaya ukuhlangabezana naye; wayibulala eMegido, isanele ukumbona nje.
2Kgs 23:30 Izinceku zayo zayisusa ngenqola eMegido ifile, zayiyisa eJerusalema, zayimbela ethumeni layo. Abantu bezwe bamthatha uJehowahazi indodana kaJosiya, bamgcoba, bambeka inkosi esikhundleni sikayise.
2Kgs 23:31 UJehowahazi wayeneminyaka engamashumi amabili nantathu ekuqaleni kwakhe ukubusa, wabusa izinyanga ezintathu eJerusalema; igama likanina lalinguHamuthali, indodakazi kaJeremiya waseLibina.
2Kgs 23:32 Wenza okubi emehlweni kaJehova njengakho konke abakwenzileyo oyise.
2Kgs 23:33 UFaro Nekho wambopha eRibila ezweni laseHamati ukuba angabe esabusa eJerusalema, wathelisa izwe amatalenta ayikhulu esiliva netalenta legolide.
2Kgs 23:34 UFaro Nekho wambeka u-Eliyakimi indodana kaJosiya inkosi esikhundleni sikaJosiya uyise, waguqula igama lakhe laba nguJehoyakimi, kepha wamsusa uJehowahazi, waze waya eGibithe, wafela khona.
2Kgs 23:35 UJehoyakimi wamnika uFaro isiliva negolide, kepha wathelisa izwe ukuba anike imali njengezwi likaFaro. Wakhiphisa abantu bezwe isiliva negolide, kwaba yilowo nalowo njengentela yakhe ukunika uFaro Nekho.
2Kgs 23:36 UJehoyakimi wayeneminyaka engamashumi amabili nanhlanu ekuqaleni kwakhe ukubusa, wabusa iminyaka eyishumi nanye eJerusalema; igama likanina lalinguZebida, indodakazi kaPhedaya waseRuma.
2Kgs 23:37 Wenza okubi emehlweni kaJehova njengakho konke abakwenzileyo oyise.
2Kgs 24:1 Emihleni yakhe kwenyuka uNebukadinesari inkosi yaseBabele; uJehoyakimi wayeyinceku yakhe iminyaka emithathu; wayesebuya, wamhlubuka.
2Kgs 24:2 UJehova wathuma kuye amaviyo amaKaledi, namaviyo ama-Aramu, namaviyo abakwaMowabi, namaviyo abantwana bakwa-Amoni, wawathuma kuJuda ukumchitha njengezwi likaJehova alikhulumayo ngesandla sezinceku zakhe abaprofethi.
2Kgs 24:3 Impela kwaba khona lokho kwaJuda ngezwi likaJehova ukubasusa ebusweni bakhe ngenxa yezono zikaManase njengakho konke akwenzileyo,
2Kgs 24:4 nangenxa yegazi elingenacala alichithayo, ngokuba wagcwalisa iJerusalema ngegazi elingenacala, lokhu uJehova akavumanga ukukuthethelela.
2Kgs 24:5 Ezinye izindaba zikaJehoyakimi nakho konke akwenzayo angithi kulotshiwe encwadini yezindaba zemihla ngemihla yamakhosi akwaJuda na?
2Kgs 24:6 UJehoyakimi wayeselala koyise; uJehoyakini indodana yakhe waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
2Kgs 24:7 Inkosi yaseGibithe ayiphindanga futhi ukuphuma ezweni lakubo, ngokuba inkosi yaseBabele yayithathile konke okwakungokwenkosi yaseGibithe, kusukela emfuleni waseGibithe kuze kube semfuleni u-Ewufrathe.
2Kgs 24:8 UJehoyakini wayeneminyaka eyishumi nesishiyagalombili ekuqaleni kwakhe ukubusa, wabusa izinyanga ezintathu eJerusalema; igama likanina lalinguNehushita indodakazi ka-Elinathani waseJerusalema.
2Kgs 24:9 Wenza okubi emehlweni kaJehova njengakho konke akwenzileyo uyise.
2Kgs 24:10 Ngaleso sikhathi izinceku zikaNebukadinesari inkosi yaseBabele zenyukela eJerusalema, umuzi wavinjezelwa.
2Kgs 24:11 UNebukadinesari inkosi yaseBabele weza emzini, izinceku zakhe zisawuvimbezele.
2Kgs 24:12 UJehoyakini inkosi yakwaJuda waphuma, waya enkosini yaseBabele, yena nonina, nezinceku zakhe, nezikhulu zakhe, nezinduna zakhe; inkosi yaseBabele yamthatha ngomnyaka wesishiyagalombili wokubusa kwakhe.
2Kgs 24:13 Yakhipha khona yonke ingcebo yendlu kaJehova nengcebo yendlu yenkosi, yahlahlela zonke izinto zegolide uSolomoni inkosi yakwa-Israyeli azenzileyo ethempelini likaJehova njengokukhuluma kukaJehova.
2Kgs 24:14 Yathumba lonke iJerusalema, nazo zonke izikhulu, nawo onke amaqhawe anamandla, abathunjwa abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi, nezinyanga zonke zemisebenzi, nabakhandi; akushiywanga muntu ngaphandle kwabantu abayizimpofana bezwe.
2Kgs 24:15 Yathumba uJehoyakini, yamyisa eBabele; nonina wenkosi, nabafazi benkosi, nezinduna zayo, nabakhulu bezwe yabamukisa ngokubathumba eJerusalema, yabayisa eBabele.
2Kgs 24:16 Onke amadoda anamandla, ayizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa, nezinyanga, nabakhandi, abayinkulungwane, bonke bengamaqhawe azilungiselele ukulwa, nabo inkosi yaseBabele yabayisa eBabele ngokubathumba.
2Kgs 24:17 Inkosi yaseBabele yambeka uMathaniya, uyisekazi, inkosi esikhundleni sakhe, yaguqula igama lakhe laba nguSedekiya.
2Kgs 24:18 USedekiya wayeneminyaka engamashumi amabili nanye ekuqaleni kwakhe ukubusa, wabusa iminyaka eyishumi nanye eJerusalema; igama likanina lalinguHamithali, indodakazi kaJeremiya waseLibina.
2Kgs 24:19 Wenza okubi emehlweni kaJehova njengakho konke akwenzileyo uJehoyakimi.
2Kgs 24:20 Ngokuba kwenzeka lokho eJerusalema nakwaJuda ngenxa yentukuthelo kaJehova, waze wabalahla ebusweni bakhe; uSedekiya wayihlubuka inkosi yaseBabele.
2Kgs 25:1 Kwathi ngomnyaka wesishiyagalolunye wokubusa kwakhe, ngenyanga yeshumi ngolweshumi lwenyanga, uNebukadinesari inkosi yaseBabele wafika, yena nayo yonke impi yakhe, eJerusalema, wamisa malungana nalo; bakha inqaba ngakulo nxazonke.
2Kgs 25:2 Wawusuvinjezelwa umuzi kwaze kwaba ngumnyaka weshumi nanye wenkosi uSedekiya.
2Kgs 25:3 Ngosuku lwesishiyagalolunye lwenyanga indlala yaba namandla emzini, akubangakho kudla kubantu bezwe.
2Kgs 25:4 Kepha wawusufohlwa umuzi, onke amadoda empi abaleka ebusuku ngendlela yesango phakathi kwezingange zombili ezazingasensimini yenkosi amaKaledi ayekhona nxazonke zomuzi ahamba ngendlela yase-Araba.
2Kgs 25:5 Kodwa impi yamaKaledi yayixosha inkosi, yayifica emathafeni aseJeriko, yonke impi yayo yahlakazeka.
2Kgs 25:6 Ayeseyibamba inkosi, ayenyusela enkosini yaseBabele eRibila; ayahlulela.
2Kgs 25:7 Abulala amadodana kaSedekiya phambi kwamehlo akhe, akhipha amehlo kaSedekiya, ambopha ngamaketanga, amyisa eBabele.
2Kgs 25:8 Ngenyanga yesihlanu ngolwesikhombisa lwenyanga okwakungumnyaka weshumi nesishiyagalolunye wenkosi uNebukadinesari, inkosi yaseBabele, kwafika uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi, inceku yenkosi yaseBabele, eJerusalema.
2Kgs 25:9 Washisa indlu kaJehova nendlu yenkosi; nazo zonke izindlu zaseJerusalema, zonke izindlu ezinkulu, wazishisa ngomlilo.
2Kgs 25:10 Yonke impi yamaKaledi induna yabalindi eyayinayo yadiliza izingange zaseJerusalema nxazonke.
2Kgs 25:11 Abanye abantu ababesele emzini, nabahlubukileyo behlubukela enkosini yaseBabele, nesixuku esiseleyo uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wabathumba.
2Kgs 25:12 Kepha induna yabalindi yashiya abantu bezwe abayizimpofana ukuba baphathe izivini namasimu.
2Kgs 25:13 Izinsika zethusi ezazisendlini yenkosi, nezinqe, nolwandle lwethusi okwakusendlini kaJehova amaKaledi akuhlephula, athuthela ithusi lakho eBabele.
2Kgs 25:14 Amakhanzi, namafosholo, nezizenze, nezinkezo, nazo zonke izitsha zethusi ababekhonza ngazo akuthatha.
2Kgs 25:15 Nemicengezi yomlilo, nezitsha, okwegolide lodwa nesiliva lodwa, nalokho induna yabalindi yakuthatha.
2Kgs 25:16 Izinsika zombili, nolwandle olwalulunye nje, nezinqe uSolomoni ayekwenzele indlu kaJehova, ithusi lazo zonke lezi zinto lalingenakulinganiswa.
2Kgs 25:17 Ukuphakama kwensika eyodwa kwakuyizingalo eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili; phezu kwayo kwakukhona isihloko sethusi; ukuphakama kwesihloko esisodwa kwakuyizingalo ezintathu; kwakukhona nenetha namapomegranati phezu kwesihloko nxazonke, konke kwakungokwethusi; kwakunjalo nasensikeni yesibili enetheni.
2Kgs 25:18 Induna yabalindi yathatha uSeraya umpristi omkhulu, noZefaniya umpristi wesibili, nabalindimnyango abathathu;
2Kgs 25:19 yathatha emzini induna eyayimiswe phezu kwamadoda empi, nabantu abayisihlanu kwababesebusweni benkosi abafunyanwa emzini, nombhali wenduna yempi eyayibala abantu bezwe, nabantu bezwe abangamashumi ayisithupha abafunyanwa emzini.
2Kgs 25:20 UNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wabathatha, wabayisa enkosini yaseBabele eRibila.
2Kgs 25:21 Inkosi yaseBabele yabashaya, yababulala eRibila ezweni laseHamati. Wathunjwa kanjalo uJuda ezweni lakubo.
2Kgs 25:22 Abantu abaseleyo ezweni lakwaJuda abashiyiwe nguNebukadinesari inkosi yaseBabele, phezu kwabo wenza uGedaliya indodana ka-Ahikamu kaShafani abe ngumbusi.
2Kgs 25:23 Zonke izinduna zempi, zona nabantu bazo, sezizwile ukuthi inkosi yaseBabele imenzile uGedaliya umbusi ezweni, zaya kuGedaliya eMispa: u-Ishmayeli indodana kaNethaniya, noJohanani indodana kaKhareya, noSeraya indodana kaThanihumeti waseNethofa, noJahazaniya indodana yomMahakha, bona nabantu babo.
2Kgs 25:24 UGedaliya wafunga kubo nakubantu babo, wathi kubo: “Ningesabi izinceku zamaKaledi; hlalani ezweni, niyikhonze inkosi yaseBabele, kuyakuba kuhle kini.”
2Kgs 25:25 Kepha kwathi ngenyanga yesikhombisa wafika u-Ishmayeli indodana kaNethaniya ka-Elishama wozalo lwenkosi, abantu abayishumi benaye, wamshaya uGedaliya waze wafa, kanye nabaJuda namaKaledi ayenaye eMispa.
2Kgs 25:26 Abantu bonke, abancane nabakhulu, nezinduna zempi basuka baya eGibithe, ngokuba besaba amaKaledi.
2Kgs 25:27 Kwathi ngomnyaka wamashumi amathathu nesikhombisa wokuthunjwa kukaJehoyakini inkosi yakwaJuda ngenyanga yeshumi nambili ngolwamashumi amabili nesikhombisa lwenyanga, u-Evili Merodaki inkosi yaseBabele, ngomnyaka wokuqala wokubusa kwakhe, waphakamisa ikhanda likaJehoyakini inkosi yakwaJuda, wamkhipha etilongweni,
2Kgs 25:28 wakhuluma kahle kuye, wabeka isihlalo sakhe phezu kwezihlalo zamakhosi ayenaye eBabele.
2Kgs 25:29 Waguqula izingubo zakhe zasetilongweni; wadla njalo phambi kwakhe zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwakhe.
2Kgs 25:30 Isabelo sakhe sasiyisabelo esimiyo semihla ngemihla, asiphiwa yinkosi zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwakhe.
1Chr 1:1 O-Adamu, noSeti, no-Enoshe,
1Chr 1:2 noKhenani, noMahalalele, noJarede,
1Chr 1:3 no-Enoke, noMetushela, noLameka,
1Chr 1:4 noNowa, noShemi, noHamu, noJafete.
1Chr 1:5 Amadodana kaJafete: ngoGomere, noMagoge, noMadayi, noJavani, noThubali, noMesheke, noTirase.
1Chr 1:6 Amadodana kaGomere: ngo-Ashikenaze, noDifate, noThogarma.
1Chr 1:7 Amadodana kaJavani: ngo-Elisha, noTharishishi, noKitimi, noRodanimi.
1Chr 1:8 Amadodana kaHamu: ngoKushe, noMisirayimi, noPhuthi, noKhanani.
1Chr 1:9 Amadodana kaKushe: ngoSeba, noHavila, noSabita, noRama, noSabitheka. Amadodana kaRama: ngoSheba noDedani.
1Chr 1:10 UKushe wazala uNimrode; yena waqala ukuba ngonamandla emhlabeni.
1Chr 1:11 UMisirayimi wazala amaLudi, nama-Anami, namaLehabi, namaNafetuhi,
1Chr 1:12 namaPatrusi, namaKasuluhi, lapho kwavela khona amaFilisti, namaKafitori.
1Chr 1:13 UKhanani wazala uSidoni, izibulo lakhe, noHeti,
1Chr 1:14 namaJebusi, nama-Amori, namaGirigashi,
1Chr 1:15 namaHivi, nama-Arki, namaSini,
1Chr 1:16 nama-Arvadi, namaSemari, namaHamati.
1Chr 1:17 Amadodana kaShemi: ngo-Elamu, no-Ashuri, no-Arpakishade, noLude, no-Aramu, no-Use, noHule, noGeteri, noMesheke.
1Chr 1:18 U-Arpakishade wazala uShela; uShela wazala u-Ebere.
1Chr 1:19 U-Ebere wazala amadodana amabili: igama lomunye lalinguPhelege, ngokuba emihleni yakhe izwe ladatshulwa. Igama lomfowabo lalinguJokothane.
1Chr 1:20 UJokothane wazala o-Alimodade, noShelefe, noHasaramavete, noJera,
1Chr 1:21 noHadoramu, no-Uzali, noDikila,
1Chr 1:22 no-Ebali, no-Abimayele, noSheba,
1Chr 1:23 no-Ofiri, noHavila, noJobabi; bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaJokothane;
1Chr 1:24 oShemi, no-Arpakishade, noShela,
1Chr 1:25 no-Ebere, noPhelege, noRehu,
1Chr 1:26 noSerugi, noNahori, noThera,
1Chr 1:27 no-Abrama ongu-Abrahama.
1Chr 1:28 Amadodana ka-Abrahama: ngo-Isaka no-Ishmayeli.
1Chr 1:29 Lezi ziyizizukulwane zabo: izibulo lika-Ishmayeli uNebayoti, noKedari, no-Adibeli, noMibisamu,
1Chr 1:30 noMishima, noDuma, noMasa, noHadadi, noThema,
1Chr 1:31 noJeturu, noNafishi, noKhedema. Labo babe ngamadodana ka-Ishmayeli.
1Chr 1:32 Amadodana kaKetura, isancinza sika-Abrahama: wazala oZimrani, noJokishani, noMedani, noMidiyani, no-Ishibaki, noShuwa. Amadodana kaJokishani: ngoSheba noDedani.
1Chr 1:33 Amadodana kaMidiyani: ngo-Efa, no-Eferi, noHanoki, no-Abida, no-Elidaha. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaKetura.
1Chr 1:34 U-Abrahama wazala u-Isaka. Amadodana ka-Isaka: ngo-Esawu no-Israyeli.
1Chr 1:35 Amadodana ka-Esawu: ngo-Elifazi, noRehuweli, noJewushe, noJalamu, noKora.
1Chr 1:36 Amadodana ka-Elifazi: ngoThemani, no-Omari, noSefi, noGathamu, noKenazi, noThimna, no-Amaleki.
1Chr 1:37 Amadodana kaRehuweli: ngoNahati, noZera, noShama, noMiza.
1Chr 1:38 Amadodana kaSeyiri: ngoLothani, noShobali, noSibeyoni, no-Ana, noDishoni, no-Eseri, noDishani.
1Chr 1:39 Amadodana kaLothani: ngoHori noHomamu; udadewabo kaLothani wayenguThimna.
1Chr 1:40 Amadodana kaShobali: ngo-Aliyani, noManahati, no-Ebali, noShefi, no-Onamu. Amadodana kaSibeyoni: ngo-Aya no-Ana.
1Chr 1:41 Amadodana ka-Ana: nguDishoni. Amadodana kaDishoni: ngoHamrani, no-Eshibani, noJitrani, noKerani.
1Chr 1:42 Amadodana ka-Eseri: ngoBilihani, noZahawana, noJahakhani. Amadodana kaDishani: ngo-Use no-Arana.
1Chr 1:43 Lawa angamakhosi abusa ezweni lakwa-Edomi, kungakabusi nkosi phezu kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli: uBela indodana kaBeyori. Igama lomuzi wakhe laliyiDinihaba.
1Chr 1:44 Wafa uBela; uJobabi indodana kaZera waseBosira waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
1Chr 1:45 Wafa uJobabi; uHushamu wasezweni labakwaThemani waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
1Chr 1:46 Wafa uHushamu; uHadadi, indodana kaBedadi, owanqoba abakwaMidiyani ethafeni lakwaMowabi, waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomuzi wakhe laliyi-Aviti.
1Chr 1:47 Wafa uHadadi; uSamla waseMasireka waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
1Chr 1:48 Wafa uSamla; uShawule waseRehoboti ngaseMfuleni waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
1Chr 1:49 Wafa uShawule; uBali Hanani indodana ka-Akibori waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
1Chr 1:50 Wafa uBali Hanani; uHadadi waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomuzi wakhe laliyiPhahi; igama lomkakhe lalinguMehetabeli indodakazi kaMatiredi, indodakazi kaMezahabi.
1Chr 1:51 Wafa uHadadi; abanumzane bakwa-Edomi kwakuyilaba: umnumzane uThimna, nomnumzane u-Aliya, nomnumzane uJeteti,
1Chr 1:52 nomnumzane u-Oholibama, nomnumzane u-Ela, nomnumzane uPhinoni,
1Chr 1:53 nomnumzane uKenazi, nomnumzane uThemani, nomnumzane uMibisari,
1Chr 1:54 nomnumzane uMagidiyeli, nomnumzane u-Iramu. Yilabo abangabanumzane bakwa-Edomi.
1Chr 2:1 Nanka amadodana ka-Israyeli: oRubeni, noSimeyoni, noLevi, noJuda, no-Isakare, noZebuloni,
1Chr 2:2 noDani, noJosefa, noBenjamini, noNafetali, noGadi, no-Asheri.
1Chr 2:3 Amadodana kaJuda: ngo-Eri, no-Onani, noShela; labo abathathu bazalwa nguye kuBati Shuwa, umKhananikazi. Kepha u-Eri, izibulo likaJuda, wayemubi emehlweni kaJehova; wambulala.
1Chr 2:4 UTamari umalokazana wakhe wamzalela oPheresi noZera. Onke amadodana kaJuda ayeyisihlanu.
1Chr 2:5 Amadodana kaPheresi: ngoHesironi noHamule.
1Chr 2:6 Amadodana kaZera: ngoZimri, no-Ethani, noHemani, noKalikoli, noDara, eyisihlanu onke.
1Chr 2:7 Amadodana kaKarmi: ngo-Akari, umhluphi ka-Israyeli, owenza isiphambeko ngokuqalekisiweyo.
1Chr 2:8 Amadodana ka-Ethani: ngu-Azariya.
1Chr 2:9 Amadodana kaHesironi awazalelwayo: ngoJerameli, noRamu, noKelubayi.
1Chr 2:10 URamu wazala u-Aminadaba; u-Aminadaba wazala uNaheshoni, isikhulu sabantwana bakwaJuda;
1Chr 2:11 uNaheshoni wazala uSalima; uSalima wazala uBowazi;
1Chr 2:12 uBowazi wazala u-Obede; u-Obede wazala uJese.
1Chr 2:13 UJese wazala izibulo lakhe u-Eliyabi, no-Abinadaba owesibili, noShimeya owesithathu,
1Chr 2:14 noNethaneli owesine, noRadayi owesihlanu,
1Chr 2:15 no-Osemi owesithupha, noDavide owesikhombisa;
1Chr 2:16 odadewabo: ngoSeruya no-Abigayili. Amadodana kaSeruya: ngo-Abishayi, noJowabe, no-Asaheli, emathathu.
1Chr 2:17 U-Abigayili wazala u-Amasa; uyise ka-Amasa wayenguJetheri umIshmayeli.
1Chr 2:18 UKalebi indodana kaHesironi wazala ku-Azuba umkakhe nakuJeriyoti; amadodana akhe: ngoJesheri, noShobabi, no-Aridoni.
1Chr 2:19 Wafa u-Azuba; uKalebi wathatha u-Efrati, owamzalela uHure.
1Chr 2:20 UHure wazala u-Uri; u-Uri wazala uBesaleli.
1Chr 2:21 Ngasemuva uHesironi wangena kuyo indodakazi kaMakiri uyise kaGileyadi; wamthatha eseneminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha; wamzalela uSegubi.
1Chr 2:22 USegubi wazala uJayire, owayenemizi engamashumi amabili nantathu ezweni lakwaGileyadi.
1Chr 2:23 OGeshuri no-Aramu babaphuca imizi kaJayirem, kanye neKhenati nemizi yalo, imizi engamashumi ayisithupha. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaMakiri uyise kaGileyadi.
1Chr 2:24 Emva kokuba esefile uHesironi eKalebi Efratha, u-Abiya, umkaHesironi, wamzalela u-Ashuri uyise kaThekhowa.
1Chr 2:25 Amadodana kaJerameli, izibulo likaHesironi, ayenguRamu izibulo, noBuna, no-Oreni, no-Osemi, no-Ahiya.
1Chr 2:26 UJerameli wayenomunye umfazi ogama lakhe lalingu-Athara; wayengunina ka-Onamu.
1Chr 2:27 Amadodana kaRamu, izibulo likaJerameli, ayengoMahasi, noJamini, no-Ekheri.
1Chr 2:28 Amadodana ka-Onamu ayengoShamayi noJada; amadodana kaShamayi: ngoNadabi no-Abishuri.
1Chr 2:29 Igama lomka-Abishuri lalingu-Abihayili; wamzalela o-Ahibani noMolidi.
1Chr 2:30 Amadodana kaNadabi: ngoSeledi no-Aphayimi; kepha uSeledi wafa engenabantwana.
1Chr 2:31 Amadodana ka-Aphayimi: ngu-Ishi; amadodana ka-Ishi: nguSheshani; amadodana kaSheshani: ngu-Ahilayi.
1Chr 2:32 Amadodana kaJada umfowabo kaShamayi: ngoJetheri noJonathani; uJetheri wafa engenabantwana.
1Chr 2:33 Amadodana kaJonathani: ngoPheleti noZaza. Labo babe ngamadodana kaJerameli.
1Chr 2:34 Kepha uSheshani wayengenamadodana, enamadodakazi odwa. USheshani wayenenceku, eyaseGibithe, egama layo lalinguJariha.
1Chr 2:35 USheshani wanika uJariha inceku yakhe indodakazi yakhe ibe ngumkakhe; wamzalela u-Athayi.
1Chr 2:36 U-Athayi wazala uNathani; uNathani wazala uZabadi;
1Chr 2:37 uZabadi wazala u-Efilali; u-Efilali wazala u-Obede;
1Chr 2:38 u-Obede wazala uJehu; uJehu wazala u-Azariya;
1Chr 2:39 u-Azariya wazala uHelesi; uHelesi wazala u-Eleyasa;
1Chr 2:40 u-Eleyasa wazala uSisamayi; uSisamayi wazala uShalumi;
1Chr 2:41 uShalumi wazala uJekamiya; uJekamiya wazala u-Elishama.
1Chr 2:42 Amadodana kaKalebi umfowabo kaJerameli: nguMesha izibulo lakhe, owayenguyise kaZifi, namadodana kaMaresha, uyise kaHebroni.
1Chr 2:43 Amadodana kaHebroni: ngoKora, noTaphuwa, noRekemi, noShema.
1Chr 2:44 UShema wazala uRahamu uyise kaJorikeyamu; uRekemi wazala uShamayi.
1Chr 2:45 Indodana kaShamayi: nguMahoni; uMahoni wayenguyise kaBeti Suri.
1Chr 2:46 U-Efa, isancinza sikaKalebi, wazala oHarana, noMosa, noGazezi; uHarana wazala uGazezi.
1Chr 2:47 Amadodana kaJadayi: ngoRegemi, noJothamu, noGeshani, noPheleti, no-Efa, noShahafi.
1Chr 2:48 UMahakha, isancinza sikaKalebi, wazala oSheberi noThirihana.
1Chr 2:49 Wazala noShahafi uyise kaMadimana, noSheva uyise kaMakibena, noyise kaGibeya; indodakazi kaKalebi yayingu-Akisa.
1Chr 2:50 Laba babe ngamadodana kaKalebi: amadodana kaHure izibulo lika-Efratha: nguShobali uyise kaKiriyati Jeharimi,
1Chr 2:51 noSalima uyise kaBetlehema, noHarefi uyise kaBeti Gaderi.
1Chr 2:52 NoShobali uyise kaKiriyati Jeharimi wayenamadodana: nguHarowe nenxenye kaMenuhoti.
1Chr 2:53 Imindeni kaKiriyati Jeharimi yayingamaJetheri, namaPhuthi, namaShumati, namaMishirayiti; kubona kwavela amaSorati nama-Eshitawoli.
1Chr 2:54 Amadodana kaSalima: nguBetlehema, namaNethofa, no-Atharoti BetiJowabe, nenxenye yamaManahati, amaSori.
1Chr 2:55 Imindeni yababhali ababehlala eJabesi: ngamaThirati, namaShimeyati, namaSukati. Labo babe ngamaKheni avela kuHamati uyise wendlu kaRekabi.
1Chr 3:1 Laba babe ngamadodana kaDavide azalelwa wona eHebroni: izibulo ngu-Amnoni ku-Ahinohama umHizreyelikazi; owesibili nguDaniyeli ku-Abigayili umKarmelikazi;
1Chr 3:2 owesithathu ngu-Abisalomu indodana kaMahakha indodakazi kaTalimayi inkosi yaseGeshuri; owesine ngu-Adoniya indodana kaHagiti;
1Chr 3:3 owesihlanu nguShefathiya ku-Abithali; owesithupha ngu-Itereyamu ku-Egila umkakhe.
1Chr 3:4 Wazalelwa ayisithupha eHebroni; wabusa khona iminyaka eyisikhombisa nezinyanga eziyisithupha; eJerusalema wabusa iminyaka engamashumi amathathu nantathu.
1Chr 3:5 Yilaba azalelwa bona eJerusalema: ngoShimeya, noShobabi, noNathani, noSolomoni, bebane, kuBati Shuwa indodakazi ka-Amiyeli,
1Chr 3:6 noJibari, no-Elishama, no-Elifeleti,
1Chr 3:7 noNoga, noNefegi, noJafiya,
1Chr 3:8 no-Elishama, no-Eliyada, no-Elifeleti, beyisishiyagalolunye.
1Chr 3:9 Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaDavide ngaphandle kwamadodana ezancinza; uTamari wayengudadewabo.
1Chr 3:10 Indodana kaSolomoni yayinguRehobowamu; ngu-Abiya indodana yakhe; ngu-Asa indodana yakhe; nguJehoshafati indodana yakhe;
1Chr 3:11 nguJoramu indodana yakhe; ngu-Ahaziya indodana yakhe; nguJowashi indodana yakhe;
1Chr 3:12 ngu-Amasiya indodana yakhe; ngu-Azariya indodana yakhe; nguJothamu indodana yakhe;
1Chr 3:13 ngu-Ahazi indodana yakhe; nguHezekiya indodana yakhe; nguManase indodana yakhe;
1Chr 3:14 ngu-Amoni indodana yakhe; nguJosiya indodana yakhe.
1Chr 3:15 Amadodana kaJosiya: izibulo nguJohanani; owesibili nguJehoyakimi; owesithathu nguSedekiya; owesine nguShalumi.
1Chr 3:16 Amadodana kaJehoyakimi: nguJekoniya indodana yakhe noSedekiya indodana yakhe.
1Chr 3:17 Amadodana kaJekoniya umthunjwa: ngoSheyalitiyeli indodana yakhe,
1Chr 3:18 noMalikiramu, noPhedaya, noShenasari, noJekamiya, noHoshama, noNedabiya.
1Chr 3:19 Amadodana kaPhedaya: ngoZerubabele noShimeyi; amadodana kaZerubabele: ngoMeshulamu noHananiya uShelomiti wayengudadewabo
1Chr 3:20 noHashuba, no-Oheli, noBerekiya, noHasadiya, noJushabi Hesedi, beyisihlanu.
1Chr 3:21 Amadodana kaHananiya: ngoPhelathiya, noJeshaya, namadodana kaRefaya, namadodana ka-Arinani, namadodana ka-Obadiya, namadodana kaShekaniya.
1Chr 3:22 Amadodana kaShekaniya: nguShemaya; amadodana kaShemaya: ngoHathushi, no-Igali, noBariya, noNehariya, noShafati, beyisithupha.
1Chr 3:23 Amadodana kaNehariya: ngo-Eliyohenayi, noHezekiya, no-Azirikamu, bebathathu.
1Chr 3:24 Amadodana ka-Eliyohenayi: ngoHodaviya, no-Eliyashibi, noPhelaya, no-Akubi, noJohanani, noDelaya, no-Anani, beyisikhombisa.
1Chr 4:1 Amadodana kaJuda: ngoPheresi, noHesironi, noKarmi, noHure, noShobali.
1Chr 4:2 URewaya indodana kaShobali wazala uJahati; uJahati wazala o-Ahumayi noLahadi. Leyo yayiyimindeni yamaSorati.
1Chr 4:3 Yilaba abangabakayise ka-Etamu: oJizreyeli, no-Ishima, no-Idibashi, igama likadadewabo lalinguHaseleliponi
1Chr 4:4 noPhenuweli, uyise kaGedori, no-Ezeri, uyise kaHusha. Yilabo ababe ngamadodana kaHure izibulo lika-Efratha, uyise kaBetlehema.
1Chr 4:5 U-Ashuri uyise kaThekhowa wayenabafazi ababili, oHela noNahara.
1Chr 4:6 UNahara wamzalela o-Ahuzamu, noHeferi, noThemeni, noHawahashitari. Yilabo ababe ngamadodana kaNahara.
1Chr 4:7 Amadodana kaHela: ngoSereti, noJisihari, no-Ethinani.
1Chr 4:8 UKhosi wazala o-Anubi, noSobeba, nemindeni ka-Ahariheli indodana kaHarumu.
1Chr 4:9 UJabesi wayetuseka kunabafowabo; unina wamqamba igama lokuthi uJabesi, ethi: “Ngokuba ngamzala ngibuhlungu.”
1Chr 4:10 UJabesi wabiza uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, wathi: “Sengathi ungangibusisa nokungibusisa, wandise umkhawulo wami, isandla sakho sibe nami, ungivikele ebubini, ngingehlelwa ngubuhlungu.” UNkulunkulu wamnika akucelayo.
1Chr 4:11 UKelubi umfowabo kaShuba wazala uMehiri owayenguyise ka-Eshitoni.
1Chr 4:12 U-Eshitoni wazala uBeti Rafa, noPhaseya, noThehina uyise ka-Iri Nahashi. Yilabo ababe ngamadodana kaRekha.
1Chr 4:13 Amadodana kaKenazi: ngo-Otheniyeli noSeraya; amadodana ka-Otheniyeli: nguHathati.
1Chr 4:14 UMehonothayi wazala u-Ofira; uSeraya wazala uJowabe uyise wesigodi sabakhandi, ngokuba babe ngabakhandi.
1Chr 4:15 Amadodana kaKalebi indodana kaJefune: ngo-Iru, no-Ela, noNahamu, namadodana ka-Ela, noKenazi.
1Chr 4:16 Amadodana kaJehaleli: ngoZifi, noZifa, noThiriya, no-Asareli.
1Chr 4:17 Amadodana ka-Ezra: ngoJetheri, noMeredi, no-Eferi, noJaloni; wazala oMiriyamu, noShamayi, no-Ishiba uyise ka-Eshitemowa.
1Chr 4:18 Umkakhe umJudakazi wazala uJeredi uyise kaGedori, noHebere uyise kaSoko, noJekuthiyeli uyise kaZanowa. Kepha abanye babe ngamadodana kaBithiya indodakazi kaFaro eyathathwa nguMeredi.
1Chr 4:19 Amadodana omkaHodiya udadewabo kaNahamu ayenguyise kaKeyila umGarimi no-Eshitemowa umMahakha.
1Chr 4:20 Amadodana kaShimoni: ngo-Amnoni, noRina, noBeni Hanani, noThiloni. Amadodana ka-Ishi: ngoZoheti noBeni Zoheti.
1Chr 4:21 Amadodana kaShela indodana kaJuda: ngu-Eri, uyise kaLekha, noLahada uyise kaMaresha, nemindeni yendlu yabaluka ilineni elicolekileyo bendlu ka-Ashibeya,
1Chr 4:22 noJokimi, nabantu baseKhozeba, noJowashi, noSarafi ababebusa kwaMowabi, noJashubi Lehemi. Ngezasendulo kodwa lezi zindaba.
1Chr 4:23 Labo babe ngababumbi nabakhileyo eNethayimi naseGedera; bahlala khona nenkosi ngomsebenzi wayo.
1Chr 4:24 Amadodana kaSimeyoni: ngoNemuweli, noJamini, noJaribi, noZera, noShawule,
1Chr 4:25 noShalumi indodana yakhe, noMibisamu indodana yakhe, noMishima indodana yakhe.
1Chr 4:26 Amadodana kaMishima: ngoHamuweli indodana yakhe, noZakuri indodana yakhe, noShimeyi indodana yakhe.
1Chr 4:27 UShimeyi wayenamadodana ayishumi nesithupha namadodakazi ayisithupha; kepha abafowabo babengenabantwana abaningi, nomndeni wabo awandanga njengabantwana bakwaJuda.
1Chr 4:28 Bahlala eBeri Sheba, naseMolada, naseHasari Shuwali,
1Chr 4:29 naseBiliha, nase-Esemi, naseTholadi,
1Chr 4:30 naseBetuweli, naseHorma, naseSikilagi,
1Chr 4:31 naseBeti Marikaboti, naseHasari Susimi, naseBeti Biri, naseShaharayimi. Yileyo eyayiyimizi yabo kwaze kwabusa uDavide.
1Chr 4:32 Imizana yabo yayiyi-Etamu, ne-Ayini, neRimoni, neThokheni, ne-Ashani, imizi eyisihlanu,
1Chr 4:33 kanye nayo yonke imizana eyayiyizungeza le mizi kwaze kwaba seBali. Lezo zaziyizindawo zabo, bebhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo.
1Chr 4:34 Futhi oMeshobabi, noJamileki, noJosha indodana ka-Amasiya,
1Chr 4:35 noJoweli, noJehu kaJoshibiya kaSeraya ka-Asiyeli,
1Chr 4:36 no-Eliyohenayi, noJahakhoba, noJeshohaya, no-Asaya, no-Adiyeli, noJesimiyeli, noBenaya,
1Chr 4:37 noZiza kaShifi ka-Aloni kaJedaya kaShimri kaShemaya.
1Chr 4:38 Labo ababizwe ngamagama babeyizikhulu emindenini yabo; izindlu zawoyise zanda kakhulu.
1Chr 4:39 Baya ngasekungeneni eGedori ngasohlangothini lwasempumalanga kwesigodi ukufunela izimvu zabo idlelo.
1Chr 4:40 Bafumana idlelo elivundileyo nelihle; izwe lalibanzi nxazombili, lizolile, linokuthula, ngokuba ababehlala khona kuqala babe ngabakwaHamu.
1Chr 4:41 Labo abalotshwe ngamagama bafika ezinsukwini zikaHezekiya inkosi yakwaJuda, bachitha amatende abo namaMehuni afunyanwa khona, bawaqothula kuze kube namuhla, bahlala esikhundleni sabo, ngokuba kwakukhona idlelo lezimvu zabo lapho.
1Chr 4:42 Abanye babo, amadodana kaSimeyoni, abantu abangamakhulu ayisihlanu, baya entabeni yaseSeyiri benezinduna zabo oPhelathiya, noNehariya, noRefaya, no-Uziyeli, amadodana ka-Ishi.
1Chr 4:43 Bachitha insali yama-Amaleki ephunyukileyo, bahlala khona kuze kube namuhla.
1Chr 5:1 Amadodana kaRubeni, izibulo lika-Israyeli ngokuba wayeyizibulo; kepha njengokuba wangcolisa umbhede kayise, ubuzibulo bakhe banikwa amadodana kaJosefa indodana ka-Israyeli, futhi akabhalwa ngezizukulwane njengezibulo.
1Chr 5:2 Noma uJuda ebenamandla kunabafowabo, kwavela kuye umbusi, ubuzibulo nokho babungobukaJosefa.
1Chr 5:3 Amadodana-ke kaRubeni, izibulo lika-Israyeli: ngoHanoki, noPhalu, noHesironi, noKarmi.
1Chr 5:4 Amadodana kaJoweli: nguShemaya indodana yakhe, noGogi indodana yakhe, noShimeyi indodana yakhe,
1Chr 5:5 noMika indodana yakhe, noRewaya indodana yakhe, noBali indodana yakhe,
1Chr 5:6 noBera indodana yakhe, owathunjwa nguThiligati Phileneseri inkosi yase-Asiriya; wayeyisikhulu sabakwaRubeni.
1Chr 5:7 Nabafowabo ngemindeni yabo, bebhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo: ngoJehiyeli inhloko noZakariya,
1Chr 5:8 noBela ka-Azazi kaShema kaJoweli, owahlala e-Aroweri kwaze kwaba seNebo noBali Mehoni.
1Chr 5:9 Ngasempumalanga wakha kwaze kwaba sekuqaleni kwehlane elisuka emfuleni u-Ewufrathe, ngokuba izinkomo zabo zanda ezweni lakwaGileyadi.
1Chr 5:10 Emihleni kaSawule baphaka impi kumaHagiri, awa ngesandla sabo; bahlala ematendeni abo ngasempumalanga yonke yakwaGileyadi.
1Chr 5:11 Amadodana kaGadi ahlala malungana nabo ezweni laseBashani kwaze kwaba seSaleka:
1Chr 5:12 ngoJoweli inhloko, noShafamu owesibili, noJahanayi, noShafati eBashani;
1Chr 5:13 nabafowabo ngezindlu zawoyise: ngoMikayeli, noMeshulamu, noSheba, noJorayi, noJakani, noZiya, no-Ebere, beyisikhombisa.
1Chr 5:14 Labo babe ngamadodana ka-Abihayili kaHuri kaJarowa kaGileyadi kaMikayeli kaJeshishayi kaJahido kaBuzi;
1Chr 5:15 u-Ahi ka-Abidiyeli kaGuni wayeyinhloko yezindlu zawoyise.
1Chr 5:16 Bahlala kwaGileyadi eBashani nasemizini yalo nasemadlelweni onke aseSharoni kwaze kwaba semikhawulweni yawo.
1Chr 5:17 Bonke labo babhalwa ngezizukulwane zabo emihleni kaJothamu inkosi yakwaJuda nasemihleni kaJerobowamu inkosi yakwa-Israyeli.
1Chr 5:18 Amadodana kaRubeni, nabakwaGadi, nenxenye yesizwe sakwaManase, amadoda anamandla, amadoda aphatha ihawu nenkemba, ansala umnsalo, ayefunde ukulwa, ayeyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane nane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisithupha aphuma impi.
1Chr 5:19 Aphaka impi kumaHagiri, noJeturu, noNafishi, noNodabi.
1Chr 5:20 Asizwa ekulweni nabo, amaHagiri anikelwa ezandleni zawo nabo bonke ababe nawo, ngokuba akhala kuNkulunkulu empini, amncenga, ngokuba ayemethemba.
1Chr 5:21 Asusa izinkomo zabo, namakamela ayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, nezimvu eziyizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu amabili namashumi ayisihlanu, nezimbongolo eziyizinkulungwane ezimbili, nabantu abayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu.
1Chr 5:22 Ngokuba kwawa abaningi befile, lokhu impi yayingekaNkulunkulu. Ahlala esikhundleni sabo aze athunjwa.
1Chr 5:23 Abantwana benxenye yesizwe sakwaManase bahlala kulelo zwe, kusukela eBashani kuze kube seBali Hermoni naseSeniri nasentabeni yaseHermoni.
1Chr 5:24 Nazi izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise: o-Eferi, no-Ishi, no-Eliyeli, no-Aziriyeli, noJeremiya, noHodaviya, noJahidiyeli, amaqhawe anamandla, amadoda anegama, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise.
1Chr 5:25 Kepha baphambuka kuNkulunkulu wawoyise, balandela ngokuphinga onkulunkulu babantu balelo zwe, uNkulunkulu abachithayo phambi kwabo.
1Chr 5:26 UNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli wavusa umoya kaPhuli inkosi yase-Asiriya nomoya kaThiligati Philineseri inkosi yase-Asiriya, wabathumba: abakwaRubeni, nabakwaGadi, nenxenye yesizwe sakwaManase, wabayisa eHala, naseHabori, naseHara, nasemfuleni iGozani kuze kube namuhla.
1Chr 6:1 Amadodana kaLevi: ngoGereshoni, noKohati, noMerari.
1Chr 6:2 Amadodana kaKohati: ngo-Amramu, noJisihari, noHebroni, no-Uziyeli.
1Chr 6:3 Abantwana bakwa-Amramu: ngo-Aroni, noMose, noMiriyamu. Amadodana ka-Aroni: ngoNadabi, no-Abihu, no-Eleyazare, no-Itamari.
1Chr 6:4 U-Eleyazare wazala uFinehasi; uFinehasi wazala u-Abishuwa;
1Chr 6:5 u-Abishuwa wazala uBuki; uBuki wazala u-Uzi;
1Chr 6:6 u-Uzi wazala uZeraya; uZeraya wazala uMerayoti;
1Chr 6:7 uMerayoti wazala u-Amariya; u-Amariya wazala u-Ahithubi;
1Chr 6:8 u-Ahithubi wazala uSadoki; uSadoki wazala u-Ahimahasi;
1Chr 6:9 u-Ahimahasi wazala u-Azariya; u-Azariya wazala uJohanani;
1Chr 6:10 uJohanani wazala u-Azariya; nguye owayengumpristi ethempelini elakhiwa nguSolomoni eJerusalema;
1Chr 6:11 u-Azariya wazala u-Amariya; u-Amariya wazala u-Ahithubi;
1Chr 6:12 u-Ahithubi wazala uSadoki; uSadoki wazala uShalumi;
1Chr 6:13 uShalumi wazala uHilikiya; uHilikiya wazala u-Azariya;
1Chr 6:14 u-Azariya wazala uSeraya; uSeraya wazala uJehosadaki;
1Chr 6:15 kepha uJehosadaki wamuka lapho uJehova ethumba uJuda neJerusalema ngesandla sikaNebukadinesari.
1Chr 6:16 Amadodana kaLevi: ngoGereshomu, noKohati, noMerari.
1Chr 6:17 Nanka amagama amadodana kaGereshomu: oLibini noShimeyi.
1Chr 6:18 Amadodana kaKohati: ngo-Amramu, noJisihari, noHebroni, no-Uziyeli.
1Chr 6:19 Amadodana kaMerari: ngoMaheli noMushi. Nansi imindeni yamaLevi njengezindlu zawoyise:
1Chr 6:20 abakwaGereshomu: nguLibini indodana yakhe, noJahati indodana yakhe, noZima indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:21 noJowa indodana yakhe, no-Ido indodana yakhe, noZera indodana yakhe, noJewatherayi indodana yakhe.
1Chr 6:22 Amadodana kaKohati: ngu-Amindaba indodana yakhe, noKora indodana yakhe, no-Asiri indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:23 no-Elkana indodana yakhe, no-Ebiyasafa indodana yakhe, no-Asiri indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:24 noTathi indodana yakhe, no-Uriyeli indodana yakhe, no-Uziya indodana yakhe, noShawule indodana yakhe.
1Chr 6:25 Amadodana ka-Elkana: ngo-Amasayi no-Ahimoti.
1Chr 6:26 U-Elkana-ke, amadodana ka-Elkana: nguSofayi indodana yakhe, noNahati indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:27 no-Eliyabe indodana yakhe, noJerohamu indodana yakhe, no-Elkana indodana yakhe.
1Chr 6:28 Amadodana kaSamuweli: izibulo nguJoweli, nowesibili ngu-Abiya.
1Chr 6:29 Amadodana kaMerari: ngoMaheli, noLibini indodana yakhe, noShimeyi indodana yakhe, no-Uza indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:30 noShimeya indodana yakhe, noHagiya indodana yakhe, no-Asaya indodana yakhe.
1Chr 6:31 Nampa uDavide abamisela ukuhola ukuhlabelela endlini kaJehova, umphongolo usubekiwe khona.
1Chr 6:32 Bakhonza ngokuhlabelela phambi kwetabernakele letende lokuhlangana, uSolomoni waze wakha indlu kaJehova eJerusalema. Bema emsebenzini wabo njengomthetho wabo.
1Chr 6:33 Yilaba ababemi namadodana abo: kumadodana amaKohati: nguHemani, umhlabeleli, kaJoweli kaSamuweli
1Chr 6:34 ka-Elkana kaJerohamu ka-Eliyeli kaThowa
1Chr 6:35 kaSufi ka-Elkana kaMahati ka-Amasayi
1Chr 6:36 ka-Elkana kaJoweli ka-Azariya kaZefaniya
1Chr 6:37 kaThati ka-Asiri ka-Ebiyasafa kaKora
1Chr 6:38 kaJisihari kaKohati kaLevi ka-Israyeli;
1Chr 6:39 futhi umfowabo u-Asafa owayemi ngakwesokunene sakhe, u-Asafa kaBerekiya kaShimeya
1Chr 6:40 kaMikayeli kaBahaseya kaNalikhiya
1Chr 6:41 ka-Ethini kaZera ka-Adaya
1Chr 6:42 ka-Ethani kaZima kaShimeyi
1Chr 6:43 kaJahati kaGereshomu kaLevi.
1Chr 6:44 Amadodana kaMerari abafowabo ayengakwesokunene: ngu-Ethani kaKishi ka-Abidi kaMaluki
1Chr 6:45 kaHashabiya ka-Amasiya kaHilikiya
1Chr 6:46 ka-Amisi kaBani kaShemeri
1Chr 6:47 kaMaheli kaMushi kaMerari kaLevi.
1Chr 6:48 Abafowabo amaLevi banikelelwa yonke inkonzo yetabernakele lendlu kaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 6:49 Kepha u-Aroni namadodana akhe bashiya iminikelo e-altare leminikelo yokushiswa nase-altare lempepho, benza nawo wonke umsebenzi wendawo engcwelengcwele, benzela u-Israyeli ukubuyisana njengakho konke ayale ngakho uMose inceku kaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 6:50 Nanka amadodana ka-Aroni: u-Eleyazare indodana yakhe, noFinehasi indodana yakhe, no-Abishuwa indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:51 noBuki indodana yakhe, no-Uzi indodana yakhe, noZeraya indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:52 noMerayoti indodana yakhe, no-Amariya indodana yakhe, no-Ahithubi indodana yakhe,
1Chr 6:53 noSadoki indodana yakhe, no-Ahimahasi indodana yakhe.
1Chr 6:54 Lezi ziyizindawo zawo zokuhlala njengamakamu awo emikhawulweni yawo: amadodana ka-Aroni emindeni yamaKohati ngokuba yiwona adliwa yinkatho yokuqala
1Chr 6:55 wona bawanika iHebroni ezweni lakwaJuda namadlelo alizungezayo.
1Chr 6:56 Kodwa amasimu omuzi nemizana yawo bakunika uKalebi, indodana kaJefune.
1Chr 6:57 Banika amadodana ka-Aroni imizi yokuphephela, iHebroni neLibina namadlelo awo, neJatiri, ne-Eshitemowa namadlelo awo,
1Chr 6:58 neHileni namadlelo alo, neDebiri namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:59 ne-Ashani namadlelo alo, neBetiShemeshi namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:60 nasesizweni sakwaBenjamini, iGeba namadlelo alo, ne-Alemeti namadlelo alo, ne-Anathoti namadlelo alo. Yonke imizi yawo ngemindeni yawo yayiyimizi eyishumi nantathu.
1Chr 6:61 Amadodana aseleyo kaKohati anikwa ngenkatho emndenini wesizwe, enxenyeni yesizwe, inxenye kaManase, imizi eyishumi,
1Chr 6:62 namadodana kaGereshomu ngemindeni yawo esizweni sakwa-Isakare, nasesizweni sakwa-Asheri, nasesizweni sakwaNafetali, nasesizweni sakwaManase, eBashani, imizi eyishumi nantathu,
1Chr 6:63 namadodana kaMerari ngenkatho ngemindeni yawo esizweni sakwaRubeni, nasesizweni sakwaGadi, nasesizweni sakwaZebuloni imizi eyishumi nambili.
1Chr 6:64 Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli banika amaLevi leyo mizi namadlelo ayo.
1Chr 6:65 Banika ngenkatho leyo mizi ebizwe ngamagama esizweni sabantwana bakwaJuda, nasesizweni sabantwana bakwaSimeyoni, nasesizweni sabantwana bakwaBenjamini.
1Chr 6:66 Eminye imindeni yamadodana kaKohati yayinemizi yemikhawulo yayo esizweni sakwa-Efrayimi.
1Chr 6:67 Bayinika imizi yokuphephela: iShekemi ezintabeni zakwa-Efrayimi namadlelo alo, neGezeri namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:68 neJokimeyamu namadlelo alo, neBeti Horoni namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:69 ne-Ajaloni namadlelo alo, neGati Rimoni namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:70 nasenxenyeni yesizwe sakwaManase i-Anere namadlelo alo, neBileyamu namadlelo alo, ibe ngeyomndeni oseleyo wamadodana kaKohati.
1Chr 6:71 Amadodana kaGereshomu anikwa emndenini wenxenye yesizwe sakwaManase iGolanu, eBashani, namadlelo alo ne-Ashitaroti namadlelo alo;
1Chr 6:72 nasesizweni sakwa-Isakare iKedeshi namadlelo alo, neDaberati namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:73 neRamoti namadlelo alo, ne-Anemi namadlelo alo;
1Chr 6:74 nasesizweni sakwa-Asheri iMashali namadlelo alo, ne-Abidoni namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:75 neHukoki namadlelo alo, neRehobe namadlelo alo;
1Chr 6:76 nasesizweni sakwaNafetali iKedeshi eGalile namadlelo alo, neHamoni namadlelo alo, neKiriyatayimi namadlelo alo.
1Chr 6:77 Aseleyo, amadodana kaMerari, anikwa esizweni sakwaZebuloni iRimono namadlelo alo neGhabori namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:78 naphesheya kweJordani ngaseJeriko ngasempumalanga kwaseJordani esizweni sakwaRubeni iBeseri ehlane namadlelo alo, neJahasa namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:79 neKedemoti namadlelo alo, neMefahati namadlelo alo;
1Chr 6:80 nasesizweni sakwaGadi iRamoti kwaGileyadi namadlelo alo, neMahanayimi namadlelo alo,
1Chr 6:81 neHeshiboni namadlelo alo, neJazeri namadlelo alo.
1Chr 7:1 Amadodana ka-Isakare: ngoThola, noPhuwa, noJashubi, noShimroni, bebane.
1Chr 7:2 Amadodana kaThola: ngo-Uzi, noRefaya, noJeriyeli, noJahemayi, no-Ibisamu, noShemuweli, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, abakwaThola, amaqhawe anamandla ngezizukulwane zawo; umumo wawo ngezinsuku zikaDavide wawuyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nambili namakhulu ayisithupha.
1Chr 7:3 Amadodana ka-Uzi: nguJizirahiya; amadodana kaJizirahiya: ngoMikayeli, no-Obadiya, noJoweli, noJishiya, beyisihlanu, beyizinhloko bonke.
1Chr 7:4 Kanye nawo kwakukhona ngezizukulwane zawo ngezindlu zawoyise amaviyo empi yokulwa, abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amathathu nesithupha, ngokuba babe nabafazi abaningi namadodana amaningi.
1Chr 7:5 Abafowabo kuyo yonke imindeni ka-Isakare, amaqhawe anamandla, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalombili nesikhombisa, bebhalwe bonke ngezizukulwane zabo.
1Chr 7:6 Amadodana kaBenjamini: ngoBela, noBekeri, noJediyayeli, bebathathu.
1Chr 7:7 Amadodana kaBela: ngo-Esiboni, no-Uzi, no-Uziyeli, noJerimoti, no-Iri, beyisihlanu, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe anamandla, beyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nambili namashumi amathathu nane, bebhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo.
1Chr 7:8 Amadodana kaBekeri: ngoZemira, noJowashi, no-Eliyezeri, no-Eliyohenayi, no-Omri, noJeremoti, no-Abiya, no-Anathoti, no-Alemeti. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaBekeri.
1Chr 7:9 Babhalwa ngezizukulwane zabo, beyizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe anamandla, beyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili namakhulu amabili.
1Chr 7:10 Amadodana kaJediyayeli: nguBilihani; amadodana kaBilihani: ngoJewushe, noBenjamini, no-Ehudi, noKhenahana, noZethani, noTharishishi, no-Ahishahari.
1Chr 7:11 Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaJediyayeli ngezinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe anamandla, beyizinkulungwane eziyishumi nesikhombisa namakhulu amabili abangaphuma impi ukuyokulwa.
1Chr 7:12 OShuphimi noHuphimi babe ngamadodana ka-Iri; uHushimi wayeyindodana ka-Aheri.
1Chr 7:13 Amadodana kaNafetali: ngoJasiyeli, noGuni, noJeseri, noShalumi, amadodana kaBiliha.
1Chr 7:14 Amadodana kaManase: ngu-Asiriyeli owamzalelayo umkakhe; isancinza sakhe umAramukazi sazala uMakiri uyise kaGileyadi.
1Chr 7:15 UMakiri wathathela oHuphimi noShuphimi abafazi; igama likadadewabo lalinguMahakha. Igama lowesibili lalinguSelofehadi; uSelofehadi wayenamadodakazi.
1Chr 7:16 UMahakha umkaMakiri wazala indodana, waqamba igama layo ngokuthi uPhereshi; igama lomfowabo lalinguShereshi; amadodana akhe ayengo-Ulamu noRakemi.
1Chr 7:17 Amadodana ka-Ulamu: nguBedani. Labo babe ngamadodana kaGileyadi kaMakiri kaManase.
1Chr 7:18 Udadewabo uHamoleketi wazala o-Ishihodi, no-Abiyezeri, noMahela.
1Chr 7:19 Amadodana kaShemida ayengo-Ahiyani, noShekemi, noLikihi, no-Aniyamu.
1Chr 7:20 Amadodana ka-Efrayimi: ngoShuthela, noBeredi indodana yakhe, noTahati indodana yakhe, no-Eleyada indodana yakhe, noTahati indodana yakhe,
1Chr 7:21 noZabadi indodana yakhe, noShuthela indodana yakhe, no-Ezeri no-Eleyadi ababulawa ngabantu baseGati ababezelwe kulelo zwe, ngokuba behla ukuthatha izinkomo zabo.
1Chr 7:22 U-Efrayimi uyise walila izinsuku eziningi; abafowabo beza ukumduduza.
1Chr 7:23 Wangena kumkakhe; wamitha, wazala indodana, waqamba igama layo ngokuthi uBeriya, ngokuba indlu yakhe yayisengozini.
1Chr 7:24 Indodakazi yakhe yayinguSheyera owakha iBeti Horoni laseNzansi nelaseNhla, ne-Uzeni Sheyera.
1Chr 7:25 URefa wayeyindodana yakhe, noReshefi, noThela indodana yakhe, noThahani indodana yakhe,
1Chr 7:26 noLadani indodana yakhe, no-Amihudi indodana yakhe, no-Elishama indodana yakhe,
1Chr 7:27 noNuni indodana yakhe, noJoshuwa indodana yakhe.
1Chr 7:28 Ifa labo nezindawo zabo zokuhlala kwakuyiBethele nemizana yalo, nangasempumalanga iNaharani, nangasentshonalanga iGezeri nemizana yalo, neShekemi nemizana yalo, kwaze kwaba se-Aya nemizana yalo;
1Chr 7:29 nangasemikhawulweni yabantwana bakwaManase iBeti Sheyani nemizana yalo, neThahanaki nemizana yalo, neMegido nemizana yalo, neDori nemizana yalo. Kuleyo kwahlala abantwana bakaJosefa indodana ka-Israyeli.
1Chr 7:30 Amadodana ka-Asheri: ngoJimna, no-Ishiva, no-Ishivi, noBeriya, kanye noSera udadewabo.
1Chr 7:31 Amadodana kaBeriya: ngoHebere noMalikiyeli owayenguyise kaBirizayiti.
1Chr 7:32 UHebere wazala oJafeleti, noShomeri, noHothamu, noShuwa udadewabo.
1Chr 7:33 Amadodana kaJafeleti: ngoPhasaki, noBimihali, no-Ashivati. Labo babe ngabantwana bakaJafeleti.
1Chr 7:34 Amadodana kaShemeri: ngo-Ahi, noRohiga, noJehuba, no-Aramu.
1Chr 7:35 Amadodana kaHelemi umfowabo: ngoSofa, noJimna, noSheleshi, no-Amali.
1Chr 7:36 Amadodana kaSofa: ngoShuwa, noHarineferi, noShuhali, noBeri, no-Imra,
1Chr 7:37 noBeseri, noHodi, noShama, noShilisha, noJitrani, noBeyera.
1Chr 7:38 Amadodana kaJetheri: ngoJefune, noPhisipha, no-Ara.
1Chr 7:39 Amadodana ka-Ula: ngo-Ara, noHaniyeli, noRisiya.
1Chr 7:40 Bonke labo babe ngabantwana baka-Asheri, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe akhethekileyo anamandla, izinhloko zezikhulu. Umumo wabo ubhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo ukuba balwe empini wawungabantu abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nesithupha.
1Chr 8:1 UBenjamini wazala uBela izibulo lakhe, no-Ashibeli owesibili, no-Ahara owesithathu,
1Chr 8:2 noNoha owesine, noRafa owesihlanu.
1Chr 8:3 UBela wayenamadodana: ngo-Adari, noGera, no-Abihudi,
1Chr 8:4 no-Abishuwa, noNahamani, no-Ahowa,
1Chr 8:5 noGera, noShefufani, noHuramu.
1Chr 8:6 Nanka amadodana ka-Ehudi, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise zabakhe eGeba, ezathunjelwa eManahati,
1Chr 8:7 zathunjwa ngoNahamani, no-Ahiya, noGera owazala o-Uza no-Ahihudi.
1Chr 8:8 UShaharayimi wazala abantwana ezweni lakwaMowabi esemukisile oHushimi noBahara omkakhe.
1Chr 8:9 Wazala kuHodeshi umkakhe oJobabi, noSibiya, noMesha, noMalikamu,
1Chr 8:10 noJewuse, noShakiya, noMirima. Labo babe ngamadodana akhe, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise.
1Chr 8:11 Wazala kuHushimi o-Abithubi no-Eliphahali.
1Chr 8:12 Amadodana ka-Eliphahali: ngo-Ebere, noMishamu, noShemedi, abakha i-Ono neLodi nemizana yawo,
1Chr 8:13 noBeriya, noShema, ababe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise zabakhe e-Ajaloni, abaxosha abakhe eGati;
1Chr 8:14 no-Ahiyo, noShashaki, noJeremoti,
1Chr 8:15 noZebadiya, no-Aradi, no-Edere,
1Chr 8:16 noMikayeli, noJishipha, noJoha, amadodana kaBeriya,
1Chr 8:17 noZebadiya, noMeshulamu, noHiziki, noHebere,
1Chr 8:18 no-Ishmerayi, noJiziliya, noJobabi, amadodana ka-Eliphahali,
1Chr 8:19 noJakimi, noZikiri, noZabidi,
1Chr 8:20 no-Eliyenayi, noSilethayi, no-Eliyeli,
1Chr 8:21 no-Adaya, noBeraya, noShimrati, amadodana kaShimeyi,
1Chr 8:22 noJishiphani, no-Ebere, no-Eliyeli,
1Chr 8:23 no-Abidoni, noZikiri, noHanani,
1Chr 8:24 noHananiya, no-Elamu, no-Anithothiya,
1Chr 8:25 no-Ifideya, noPhenuweli, amadodana kaShashaki,
1Chr 8:26 noShamusherayi, noShehariya, no-Athaliya,
1Chr 8:27 noJahareshiya, no-Eliya, noZikiri, amadodana kaJerohamu.
1Chr 8:28 Labo babe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, izinhloko ezizukulwaneni zabo, bahlala eJerusalema.
1Chr 8:29 EGibeyoni kwahlala uyise kaGibeyoni ogama lomkakhe lalinguMahakha;
1Chr 8:30 izibulo lakhe lalingu-Abidoni, kanye noSuri, noKishi, noBali, noNadabi,
1Chr 8:31 noGedori, no-Ahiyo, noZekeri.
1Chr 8:32 Kepha uMikiloti wazala uShimeya. Nabo bahlala nabafowabo eJerusalema malungana nabafowabo.
1Chr 8:33 UNeri wazala uKishi; uKishi wazala uSawule; uSawule wazala oJonathani, noMaliki Shuwa, no-Abinadaba, no-Eshi Bali.
1Chr 8:34 Indodana kaJonathani yayinguMeribi Bali; uMeribi Bali wazala uMika.
1Chr 8:35 Amadodana kaMika: ngoPhithoni, noMeleki, noThareya, no-Ahazi.
1Chr 8:36 U-Ahazi wazala uJehohada; uJehohada wazala o-Alemeti, no-Azimaveti, noZimri; uZimri wazala uMosa;
1Chr 8:37 uMosa wazala uBineya; uRafa wayeyindodana yakhe; ngu-Eleyasa indodana yakhe, ngu-Aseli indodana yakhe;
1Chr 8:38 u-Aseli wayenamadodana ayisithupha; amagama awo yilawa: o-Azirikamu, noBokeru, no-Ishmayeli, noShehariya, no-Obadiya, noHanani. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana ka-Aseli.
1Chr 8:39 Amadodana ka-Esheki umfowabo: ngu-Ulamu izibulo lakhe, noJewushe owesibili, no-Elifeleti owesithathu.
1Chr 8:40 Amadodana ka-Ulamu ayengamaqhawe anamandla, ansala umnsalo; ayenamadodana amaningi namadodana amadodana amaningi, eyikhulu namashumi ayisihlanu. Labo babe ngamadodana kaBenjamini.
1Chr 9:1 Wabhalwa-ke wonke u-Israyeli ngezizukulwane; bheka, balotshiwe encwadini yamakhosi akwa-Israyeli; uJuda wathunjelwa eBabele ngeziphambeko zakhe.
1Chr 9:2 Abakhileyo kuqala emafeni abo emizini yabo babe ngu-Israyeli, nabapristi, namaLevi, namaNethini.
1Chr 9:3 EJerusalema kwahlala kubantwana bakwaJuda, nakubantwana bakwaBenjamini, nakubantwana bakwa-Efrayimi noManase:
1Chr 9:4 ngu-Uthayi ka-Amihudi ka-Omri ka-Imri kaBani kubantwana bakwaPheresi kaJuda.
1Chr 9:5 KumaShiloni: ngu-Asaya izibulo namadodana akhe.
1Chr 9:6 Kumadodana kaZera: nguJehuweli nabafowabo, bengamakhulu ayisithupha namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye.
1Chr 9:7 Kumadodana kaBenjamini: nguSalu kaMeshulamu kaHodaviya kaHasenuwa,
1Chr 9:8 no-Ibineya indodana kaJerohamu, no-Ela ka-Uzi kaMikiri, noMeshulamu kaShefathiya kaRehuweli kaJibiniya,
1Chr 9:9 nabafowabo ngezizukulwane zabo, bengamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye namashumi ayisihlanu nesithupha. Bonke labo bantu babe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise ngokwezindlu zawoyise.
1Chr 9:10 Kubapristi: ngoJedaya, noJehoyaribi, noJakini,
1Chr 9:11 no-Azariya kaHilikiya kaMeshulamu kaSadoki kaMerayoti ka-Ahithubi, umphathi wendlu kaNkulunkulu,
1Chr 9:12 no-Adaya kaJerohamu kaPhashuri kaMalikhiya noMahasayi ka-Adiyeli kaJahizera kaMeshulamu kaMeshilemiti ka-Imeri,
1Chr 9:13 nabafowabo, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, beyinkulungwane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisithupha, amadoda ahlakaniphile emsebenzini wenkonzo yasendlini kaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 9:14 KumaLevi: nguShemaya kaHashubi ka-Azirikamu kaHashabiya kumadodana kaMerari,
1Chr 9:15 noBakibakari, noHereshi, noGalali, noMathaniya kaMika kaZikiri ka-Asafa,
1Chr 9:16 no-Obadiya kaShemaya kaGalali kaJeduthuni, noBerekiya ka-Asa ka-Elkana owahlala emizaneni yamaNethofa,
1Chr 9:17 nabalindisango oShalumi, no-Akubi, noThalimoni, no-Ahimani, nabafowabo; uShalumi wayeyinhloko.
1Chr 9:18 Kwaze kwaba kuleso sikhathi babe sesangweni lenkosi ngasempumalanga; babe ngabalindisango bekamu labantwana bakwaLevi.
1Chr 9:19 UShalumi kaKore ka-Ebiyasafa kaKora, nabafowabo bendlu kayise, amaKorahi, babephethe umsebenzi wenkonzo, bengabalindisango etabernakele; oyise babemele ikamu likaJehova bengabalindisango.
1Chr 9:20 UFinehasi indodana ka-Eleyazare wayengumbusi phezu kwabo ngesikhathi esidlulileyo. UJehova wayenaye.
1Chr 9:21 UZakariya indodana kaMeshelemiya wayengumlindisango etendeni lokuhlangana.
1Chr 9:22 Bonke labo ababekhethiwe ukuba babe ngabalindisango babe ngamakhulu amabili neshumi nambili. Babhalwa ngezizukulwane emizaneni yabo, bamiswa ngoDavide noSamuweli umboni ezikhundleni zabo.
1Chr 9:23 Bona nabantwana babo babephethe amasango endlu kaJehova, indlu yetende, belinda.
1Chr 9:24 Abalindi babekhona ezinhlangothini ezine: ngasempumalanga, nangasentshonalanga, nangasenyakatho, nangaseningizimu.
1Chr 9:25 Abafowabo emizaneni yabo babeyakungena emva kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa njalo izikhathi ngezikhathi ukuba babe nabo,
1Chr 9:26 ngokuba abalindi abane abakhulu ababe ngamaLevi babe sesikhundleni njalo, bephethe amakamelo nengcebo endlini kaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 9:27 Bahlala ebusuku bezungeza indlu kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba kwakungokwabo ukuyilinda, kwakungokwabo futhi ukuyivula ekuseni imihla ngemihla.
1Chr 9:28 Abanye babephethe izitsha zenkonzo, ngokuba zangeniswa ngokubalwa, zakhishwa ngokubalwa.
1Chr 9:29 Abanye kubo babemiselwe impahla, nezitsha zonke zendlu engcwele, nempuphu, newayini, namafutha, nenhlaka, namakha.
1Chr 9:30 Abanye bamadodana abapristi bagxoba amakha aba ngamafutha.
1Chr 9:31 UMatithiya, omunye wamaLevi, owayeyizibulo likaShalumi umKorahi wayenesikhundla sokubheka izinto ezenziwa amakhanzini.
1Chr 9:32 Abanye abafowabo bamadodana amaKohati babephethe izinkwa zokubukwa ukuba bazilungise onke amasabatha.
1Chr 9:33 Kepha abanye, abahlabeleli, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise zamaLevi, babe semakamelweni bekhululekile kokunye, ngokuba babe semsebenzini wabo imini nobusuku.
1Chr 9:34 Labo babe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise bamaLevi, izinhloko ezizukulwaneni zabo, bahlala eJerusalema.
1Chr 9:35 EGibeyoni kwahlala uyise kaGibeyoni uJehiyeli ogama lomkakhe lalinguMahakha,
1Chr 9:36 nendodana yakhe eyizibulo u-Abidoni, kanye noSuri, noKishi, noBali, noNeri, noNadabi,
1Chr 9:37 noGedori, no-Ahiyo, noZakariya, noMikiloti.
1Chr 9:38 UMikiloti wazala uShimeyamu. Nabo bahlala nabafowabo eJerusalema malungana nabafowabo.
1Chr 9:39 UNeri wazala uKishi; uKishi wazala uSawule; uSawule wazala oJonathani, noMaliki Shuwa, no-Abinadaba, no-Eshi Bali.
1Chr 9:40 Indodana kaJonathani yayinguMeribi Bali; uMeribi Bali wazala uMika.
1Chr 9:41 Amadodana kaMika: ngoPhithoni, noMeleki, noThareya, no-Ahazi.
1Chr 9:42 U-Ahazi wazala uJara; uJara wazala o-Alemeti, no-Azimaveti, noZimri; uZimri wazala uMosa;
1Chr 9:43 uMosa wazala uBineya; uRefaya wayeyindodana yakhe; ngu-Eleyasa indodana yakhe, ngu-Aseli indodana yakhe;
1Chr 9:44 u-Aseli wayenamadodana ayisithupha; amagama awo yilawa: o-Azirikamu, noBokeru, no-Ishmayeli, noShehariya, no-Obadiya, noHanani; labo babe ngamadodana ka-Aseli.
1Chr 10:1 AmaFilisti alwa no-Israyeli; abantu bakwa-Israyeli babaleka phambi kwamaFilisti, bawa begwaziwe entabeni yaseGilibowa.
1Chr 10:2 AmaFilisti axosha uSawule namadodana akhe; amaFilisti abulala oJonathani, no-Abinadaba, noMaliki Shuwa, amadodana kaSawule.
1Chr 10:3 Impi yaba nzima kuSawule; abacibishelayo bamfica; wakhathazeka ngenxa yabacibishelayo.
1Chr 10:4 USawule wayesethi odibini lwezikhali zakhe: Hosha inkemba yakho, ungigwaze ngayo, funa labo abangasokile bafike, bangone. Kepha aluvumanga udibi lwezikhali zakhe, ngokuba lwesaba kakhulu. Ngalokho uSawule wayithatha inkemba, wawela phezu kwayo.
1Chr 10:5 Udibi lwezikhali zakhe selubonile ukuthi uSawule ufile, lwawela nalo phezu kwenkemba, lwafa.
1Chr 10:6 Wafa-ke uSawule namadodana akhe amathathu; nendlu yakhe yonke yafa kanyekanye.
1Chr 10:7 Lapho bonke abantu bakwa-Israyeli ababe sesigodini bebona ukuthi babaleka nokuthi uSawule namadodana akhe bafile, bashiya imizi yabo, babaleka; amaFilisti afika, ahlala kuyo.
1Chr 10:8 Kwathi ngangomuso, lapho amaFilisti efika ukuphanga ababuleweyo, afumana uSawule namadodana akhe bewile entabeni yaseGilibowa.
1Chr 10:9 Amphanga, athatha ikhanda lakhe nezikhali zakhe, akuthuma ezweni lamaFilisti nxazonke ukukumemezela kuzo izithombe zawo nakubantu.
1Chr 10:10 Azibeka izikhali zakhe endlini yawonkulunkulu bawo, abethela ikhanda lakhe endlini kaDagoni.
1Chr 10:11 Selizwile iJabeshi Gileyadi konke amaFilisti ayekwenzile kuSawule,
1Chr 10:12 kwasuka onke amadoda anamandla, asithatha isidumbu sikaSawule nezidumbu zamadodana akhe, aziletha eJabeshi, awembela amathambo abo phansi kwe-oki eJabeshi, azila ukudla izinsuku eziyisikhombisa.
1Chr 10:13 Wafa kanjalo-ke uSawule ngesiphambeko sakhe aphambuka ngaso kuJehova ngenxa yezwi likaJehova angaligcinanga nangokuba kade eyile ukubhula konedlozi ukuba abuze kuye,
1Chr 10:14 engabuzanga kuJehova; ngalokho-ke wambulala, wabuyisela umbuso kuDavide indodana kaJese.
1Chr 11:1 Wonke u-Israyeli wabuthana kuDavide, wathi: “Bheka, thina siyithambo lakho nenyama yakho.
1Chr 11:2 Nangesikhathi esidlulileyo uSawule eseyinkosi, nguwe owakhipha nowangenisa u-Israyeli; uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho wathi kuwe: ‘Wena uyakwalusa abantu bami u-Israyeli, wena uyakuba ngumbusi wabantu bami u-Israyeli.’ ”
1Chr 11:3 Kwase kufika onke amalunga akwa-Israyeli enkosini eHebroni; uDavide wenza isivumelwano nawo eHebroni phambi kukaJehova; amgcoba uDavide ukuba abe yinkosi kwa-Israyeli njengezwi likaJehova ngesandla sikaSamuweli.
1Chr 11:4 UDavide naye wonke u-Israyeli baya eJerusalema eliyiJebusi; amaJebusi ayakhe kulelo zwe ayeselapho.
1Chr 11:5 Abakhileyo eJebusi bathi kuDavide: “Awuyikungena lapha.” UDavide wathatha nokho inqaba yaseSiyoni engumuzi kaDavide.
1Chr 11:6 UDavide wathi: “Lowo ochitha amaJebusi kuqala uyakuba yinhloko nenduna.” Kwenyuka kuqala uJowabe indodana kaSeruya, waba yinhloko.
1Chr 11:7 UDavide wahlala enqabeni; ngalokho bayibiza ngokuthi umuzi kaDavide.
1Chr 11:8 Wakha umuzi nxazonke kusukela eMilo kuya nxazonke; uJowabe wavusa okuseleyo komuzi.
1Chr 11:9 UDavide waqhubeka njalo ngokukhula, ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti wayenaye.
1Chr 11:10 Yilaba abayizinhloko zamaqhawe uDavide ayenazo, zibambelela kuye ngamandla ebukhosini bakhe kanye naye wonke u-Israyeli ukumbeka inkosi njengezwi likaJehova ngo-Israyeli.
1Chr 11:11 Nanku umumo wamaqhawe uDavide ayenawo: uJashobehamu indodana yomHakimoni, inhloko yamashumi amathathu; waphakamisela abangamakhulu amathathu umkhonto wakhe, wababulala ngasikhathi sinye.
1Chr 11:12 Emva kwakhe ngu-Eleyazare indodana kaDodo umAhohi owayengomunye wamaqhawe amathathu.
1Chr 11:13 WayenoDavide ePhasi Damimi; amaFilisti abuthana khona ukuyokulwa, lapho kwakukhona isiqephu sezwe esigcwele ibhali; abantu babaleka ebusweni bamaFilisti.
1Chr 11:14 Bema phakathi nesiqephu sezwe, basophula, bawabulala amaFilisti; uJehova wabasindisa ngokusindisa okukhulu.
1Chr 11:15 Kwehla abathathu kwabayizinhloko ezingamashumi amathathu, baya etsheni kuDavide emhumeni wase-Adulamu; impi yamaFilisti yayimise esiGodini samaRefa.
1Chr 11:16 UDavide wayesesenqabeni, ikhanda lamaFilisti laliseBetlehema.
1Chr 11:17 UDavide wanxanela, wathi: “Hawu, sengathi ngingaphuziswa amanzi asemthonjeni waseBetlehema owawungasesangweni.”
1Chr 11:18 Labo abathathu bafohla ikamu lamaFilisti, bakha amanzi emthonjeni waseBetlehema owawungasesangweni, bawathatha, bawaletha kuDavide; kepha uDavide akavumanga ukuwaphuza, kodwa wawathululela uJehova, wathi:
1Chr 11:19 “UNkulunkulu wami makangenqabele ukuba ngenze lokhu; ngiyakuphuza igazi lalaba bantu ababe sengozini na?” Ngokuba bawaletha besengozini; akavumanga ukuwaphuza. Lezo zinto zenziwa yilawa maqhawe amathathu.
1Chr 11:20 U-Abishayi umfowabo kaJowabe wayeyinhloko yabathathu, ngokuba waphakamisela abangamakhulu amathathu umkhonto wakhe, wababulala, waba negama phakathi kwalaba abathathu.
1Chr 11:21 Kulaba abathathu wayetusekile kunababili, waba yisikhulu sabo, kepha akafinyelelanga kwabathathu bokuqala.
1Chr 11:22 NoBenaya indodana kaJehoyada, indodana yendoda enamandla, owayenze imisebenzi emikhulu, owaseKabiseyeli, wabulala amaqhawe amabili akwaMowabi; futhi wehla, wabulala ingonyama phakathi komgodi ngosuku lweqhwa.
1Chr 11:23 Wabulala nowaseGibithe, umuntu omude, eyizingalo eziyisihlanu; esandleni sowaseGibithe kwakukhona umkhonto onjengogongolo lomaluki; wehlela kuye ephethe induku nje, wawuhlwitha umkhonto esandleni sowaseGibithe, wambulala ngomkhonto wakhe.
1Chr 11:24 Lezo zinto wazenza uBenaya indodana kaJehoyada, waba negama phakathi kwalawo maqhawe amathathu.
1Chr 11:25 Bheka, wayetusekile kunabangamashumi amathathu, kepha akafinyelelanga kwabathathu bokuqala; uDavide wambeka phezu kwabalindi bakhe.
1Chr 11:26 Amaqhawe anamandla nanka: u-Asaheli umfowabo kaJowabe, no-Elihanani indodana kaDodo waseBetlehema,
1Chr 11:27 noShamoti waseHarori, noHelesi wasePheloni,
1Chr 11:28 no-Ira indodana ka-Ikheshi waseThekhowa, no-Abiyezeri wase-Anathoti,
1Chr 11:29 noSibekayi umHushati, no-Ilayi umAhohi,
1Chr 11:30 noMaharayi waseNethofa, noHeledi indodana kaBahana waseNethofa,
1Chr 11:31 no-Ithayi indodana kaRibayi waseGibeya labantwana bakwaBenjamini, noBenaya wasePirathoni,
1Chr 11:32 noHurayi wangasemifudlaneni yakwaGahashi, no-Abiyeli wase-Araba,
1Chr 11:33 no-Azimaveti waseBaharumi, no-Eliyaba waseShahaliboni,
1Chr 11:34 namadodana kaHashemi waseGizoni, noJonathani indodana kaShage waseHarari,
1Chr 11:35 no-Ahiyamu indodana kaSakri waseHarari, no-Elifali indodana ka-Uri,
1Chr 11:36 noHeferi waseMekeri, no-Ahiya wasePheloni,
1Chr 11:37 noHesiro waseKarmeli, noNaharayi indodana ka-Ezibayi,
1Chr 11:38 noJoweli umfowabo kaNathani, noMibihari indodana kaHagiri,
1Chr 11:39 noSeleki wakwa-Amoni, noNaharayi waseBeroti, udibi lukaJowabe indodana kaSeruya,
1Chr 11:40 no-Ira waseJetheri, noGarebi waseJetheri,
1Chr 11:41 no-Uriya umHeti, noZabadi indodana ka-Ahilayi,
1Chr 11:42 no-Adina indodana kaShiza wakwaRubeni, inhloko yakwaRubeni, enabangamashumi amathathu,
1Chr 11:43 noHanani indodana kaMahakha, noJeshoshafati umMiteni,
1Chr 11:44 no-Uziya wase-Ashitaroti, noShama noJehiyeli amadodana kaHothamu wase-Aroweri,
1Chr 11:45 noJediyayeli indodana kaShimri, noJoha umfowabo umThisi,
1Chr 11:46 no-Eliyeli umMahavi, noJeribayi noJoshaviya amadodana ka-Elinahama, no-Itima wakwaMowabi,
1Chr 11:47 no-Eliyeli, no-Obede, noJahashiyeli umMesoba.
1Chr 12:1 Nampa abafika kuDavide eSikilagi esagogobele ebusweni bukaSawule indodana kaKishi; babe phakathi kwamaqhawe, abasizi bakhe empini.
1Chr 12:2 Babehlomile iminsalo, besebenzisa isandla sokunene nesokhohlo ekuphonseni amatshe nasekucibisheleni imicibisholo ngomnsalo; ababe kubafowabo bakaSawule kwaBenjamini kwakuyilaba:
1Chr 12:3 inhloko u-Ahiyezeri noJowashi amadodana kaShemaha waseGibeya, noJeziyeli noPheleti amadodana ka-Azimaveti, noBerakha, noJehu wase-Anathoti,
1Chr 12:4 no-Ishmaya waseGibeyoni, iqhawe phakathi kwabangamashumi amathathu, ebaphethe abangamashumi amathathu, noJeremiya, noJahaziyeli, noJohanani, noJozabadi waseGedera,
1Chr 12:5 no-Eluzayi, noJerimoti, noBehaliya, noShemariya, noShefathiya umHarufi,
1Chr 12:6 no-Elkana, noJishiya, no-Azareli, noJohezeri, noJashobehamu, amaKora,
1Chr 12:7 noJowela noZebadiya, amadodana kaJerohamu waseGedori.
1Chr 12:8 KwabakwaGadi abanye bazahlukanisa baya kuDavide enqabeni ehlane, amaqhawe anamandla, abantu abazilungiselele ukulwa, abakwazi ukuphatha isihlangu nomkhonto, ababuso babo bafana nobuso bezingonyama, abanejubane njengezinsephe ezintabeni:
1Chr 12:9 ngu-Ezeri inhloko, no-Obadiya owesibili, no-Eliyabe owesithathu,
1Chr 12:10 noMishimana owesine, noJeremiya owesihlanu,
1Chr 12:11 no-Athayi owesithupha, no-Eliyeli owesikhombisa,
1Chr 12:12 noJohanani owesishiyagalombili, no-Elizabadi owesishiyagalolunye,
1Chr 12:13 noJeremiya oweshumi, noMakibanayi oweshumi nanye.
1Chr 12:14 Lawo madodana kaGadi ayeyizinhloko zempi; encinyane kuwo yayilingana nekhulu, yalingana nenkulungwane.
1Chr 12:15 Yilabo ababewela iJordani ngenyanga yokuqala, ligcwele liphuphuma zonke izingu zalo; baxosha bonke abasezigodini ngasempumalanga nangasentshonalanga.
1Chr 12:16 Kwafika nabantwana bakwaBenjamini noJuda enqabeni kuDavide.
1Chr 12:17 UDavide waphuma ukubahlangabeza, wathatha, wathi kubo: “Uma nize nokuthula kimi ukungisiza, inhliziyo yami iyakuba nye nani, kepha uma kungukungikhohlisa ezitheni zami, lokhu kungekho okubi ezandleni zami, uNkulunkulu wawobaba makakubheke, akujezise.”
1Chr 12:18 Kwase kwehla umoya phezu kuka-Amasayi owayeyinhloko yabangamashumi amathathu, wathi: “Singabakho thina, Davide, sinawe, wena ndodana kaJese; ukuthula, ukuthula makube nawe, ukuthula makube nabakusizayo, ngokuba uNkulunkulu wakho uyakusiza.” Wayesebamukela uDavide, wabenza izinhloko zeviyo.
1Chr 12:19 Kwafika abanye kwabakwaManase kuDavide, lapho efika namaFilisti ukulwa noSawule, kepha abawasizanga, ngokuba izinduna zamaFilisti sezilulekene zammukisa, zathi: “Uyakuhlubukela enkosini yakhe uSawule, amakhanda ethu abe sengozini.”
1Chr 12:20 Ekuyeni kwakhe eSikilagi kwahlubukela kuye kwabakwaManase o-Adina, noJozabadi, noJediyayeli, noMikayeli, noJozabadi, no-Elihu, noSilethayi, izinhloko zezinkulungwane zabakwaManase.
1Chr 12:21 Bamsiza uDavide eviyweni, ngokuba babe ngamaqhawe anamandla bonke, beyizinduna zempi.
1Chr 12:22 Ngokuba imihla ngemihla bafika kuDavide ukumsiza, kwaze kwaba yimpi enkulu njengempi kaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 12:23 Nazi izibalo zezinhloko zababehlomele ukulwa abeza kuDavide eHebroni ukuba baguqulele umbuso kaSawule kuye njengezwi likaJehova.
1Chr 12:24 Abantwana bakwaJuda ababephethe izihlangu nemikhonto babeyizinkulungwane eziyisithupha namakhulu ayisishiyagalombili, behlomele ukulwa.
1Chr 12:25 Kubantwana bakwaSimeyoni amaqhawe anamandla okulwa yizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa nekhulu.
1Chr 12:26 Kubantwana bakwaLevi yizinkulungwane ezine namakhulu ayisithupha.
1Chr 12:27 UJehoyada wayengumholi wakwa-Aroni, enezinkulungwane ezintathu namakhulu ayisikhombisa,
1Chr 12:28 noSadoki insizwa eyiqhawe elinamandla, nasendlini kayise izinduna ezingamashumi amabili nambili.
1Chr 12:29 Kubantwana bakwaBenjamini, abafowabo bakaSawule, yizinkulungwane ezintathu, ngokuba kuze kube manje imvama yabo yayithembekile endlini kaSawule.
1Chr 12:30 Kubantwana bakwa-Efrayimi yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili namakhulu ayisishiyagalombili, amaqhawe anamandla, abantu abanegama ezindlini zawoyise.
1Chr 12:31 Kuyo inxenye yesizwe sakwaManase yizinkulungwane eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili, ezabizwa ngamagama ukuba zize zimbeke uDavide inkosi.
1Chr 12:32 Kubantwana bakwa-Isakare ngabazi ukuqonda izikhathi ukuba bazi okufanele ukwenziwa ngu-Israyeli; izinhloko zabo zazingamakhulu amabili; bonke abafowabo balalela izwi labo.
1Chr 12:33 KuZebuloni abangaphuma impi, bayihlele impi benezikhali zonke zokulwa, yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, bezihlela nganhliziyonye.
1Chr 12:34 KuNafetali yizinduna eziyinkulungwane, zinezinkulungwane ezingamashumi amathathu nesikhombisa eziphethe isihlangu nomkhonto.
1Chr 12:35 KwabakwaDani abangahlela impi yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nesishiyagalombili namakhulu ayisithupha.
1Chr 12:36 Ku-Asheri abangaphuma impi, bayihlele impi, yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane.
1Chr 12:37 Ngaphesheya kweJordani kwabakwaGadi nasenxenyeni yesizwe sakwaManase, benezikhali zonke zempi zokulwa, yizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amabili.
1Chr 12:38 Onke lawo madoda empi, angahlela impi, afika eHebroni ngezinhliziyo ezipheleleyo ukubeka uDavide inkosi kwa-Israyeli; nabo bonke abaseleyo bakwa-Israyeli babenhliziyonye ukumbeka uDavide inkosi.
1Chr 12:39 Babe lapho noDavide izinsuku ezintathu, bedla, bephuza, ngokuba abafowabo babebalungisele.
1Chr 12:40 Ababe seduze nabo kuze kube kwa-Isakare, nakwaZebuloni, nakwaNafetali baletha isinkwa ngezimbongolo, nangamakamela, nangeminyuzi, nangezinkabi, nokudla kwempuphu, nezigaxa zamakhiwane, nezigaxa zezithelo zomvini ezomileyo, newayini, namafutha, nezinkabi, nezimvu eziningi, ngokuba kwakukhona ukuthokoza kwa-Israyeli.
1Chr 13:1 UDavide welulekana nezinduna zezinkulungwane nezamakhulu, nabaholi bonke.
1Chr 13:2 UDavide wathi kulo lonke ibandla lakwa-Israyeli: “Uma kukuhle kini, uma kuvela kuJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, masihlakazeke sithumele kubafowethu abasele ezweni lonke lakwa-Israyeli kanye nabapristi namaLevi emizini yabo enamadlelo ukuba babuthane kithi,
1Chr 13:3 sibuyisele kithi umphongolo kaNkulunkulu wethu, ngokuba asiwufunanga ezinsukwini zikaSawule.”
1Chr 13:4 Lonke ibandla lathi liyakwenze njalo, ngokuba leyo nto yayilungile emehlweni abo bonke abantu.
1Chr 13:5 UDavide wayesebutha wonke u-Israyeli kusukela eSihori laseGibithe kuze kube sekuyeni eHamati ukususa umphongolo kaNkulunkulu eKiriyati Jeharimi.
1Chr 13:6 UDavide wenyukela kanye naye wonke u-Israyeli eBahala, okungukuthi iKiriyati Jeharimi elalingelakwaJuda, ukukhuphula khona umphongolo kaNkulunkulu uJehova ohlezi phezu kwamakherubi, owawubizwa ngegama lakhe.
1Chr 13:7 Bawuhambisa umphongolo kaNkulunkulu ngengqukumbane entsha, bewukhipha endlini ka-Abinadaba; o-Uza no-Ahiyo bashayela ingqukumbane.
1Chr 13:8 UDavide naye wonke u-Israyeli bathokoza ebusweni bukaNkulunkulu ngamandla onke ngamahubo, nangamahabhu, nangezingubhu, nangezigubhu, nangamasimbali, nangamacilongo.
1Chr 13:9 Ekufikeni kwabo esibuyeni sikaKidoni u-Uza welula isandla sakhe ukubamba umphongolo, ngokuba izinkabi zashelela.
1Chr 13:10 Intukuthelo kaJehova yamvuthela u-Uza, wamshaya, ngokuba welulela isandla emphongolweni; wafela khona lapho phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 13:11 UDavide wadabuka ngokuba uJehova emhlasele u-Uza, wayibiza leyo ndawo ngokuthi iPheresi-Uza kuze kube namuhla.
1Chr 13:12 UDavide wamesaba uNkulunkulu ngalolo suku; wathi: “Ngizakuletha kanjani umphongolo kaNkulunkulu kimi na?”
1Chr 13:13 UDavide akawuyisanga umphongolo kuye emzini kaDavide, kepha wawubuyisela eceleni endlini ka-Obede Edomi umGiti.
1Chr 13:14 Umphongolo kaNkulunkulu wahlala nabendlu ka-Obede Edomi endlini yakhe izinyanga ezintathu; uJehova wayibusisa indlu ka-Obede Edomi nakho konke anakho.
1Chr 14:1 UHiramu inkosi yaseTire wathuma izithunywa kuDavide, nemisedari, nabakhi, nababazi ukuba bamakhele indlu.
1Chr 14:2 UDavide waqonda ukuthi uJehova wayemmisile impela ukuba abe yinkosi kwa-Israyeli, ngokuba umbuso wakhe waphakanyiselwa phezulu ngenxa yabantu bakhe u-Israyeli.
1Chr 14:3 UDavide wathatha abanye abafazi eJerusalema, uDavide wazala amanye amadodana namadodakazi.
1Chr 14:4 Nanka amagama abantwana ayenabo eJerusalema: oShamuvwa, noShobabi, noNathani, noSolomoni,
1Chr 14:5 noJibari, no-Elishuwa, no-Elipheleti,
1Chr 14:6 noNoga, noNefegi, noJafiya,
1Chr 14:7 no-Elishama, noBeyeliyada, no-Elifeleti.
1Chr 14:8 AmaFilisti esezwile ukuthi uDavide ugcotshiwe ukuba abe yinkosi kwa-Israyeli wonke, onke amaFilisti enyuka ukumfuna uDavide; uDavide wakuzwa, waphuma ukuwahlasela.
1Chr 14:9 AmaFilisti esefikile ukungenela isiGodi samaRefa,
1Chr 14:10 uDavide wabuza kuNkulunkulu, wathi: “Ngenyukele ukuhlasela amaFilisti na? Uyakuwanikela esandleni sami na?” UJehova wathi kuye: “Yenyuka, ngokuba ngiyakuwanikela esandleni sakho.”
1Chr 14:11 Base benyukela eBali Pherasimi, uDavide wawachitha; uDavide wathi: “UNkulunkulu ufohlele izitha zami ngesandla sami njengokufohla kwamanzi.” Ngalokho baqamba igama laleyo ndawo ngokuthi iBali Pherasimi.
1Chr 14:12 Ashiya khona onkulunkulu bawo; uDavide wathi mabashiswe ngomlilo.
1Chr 14:13 AmaFilisti abuye angenela isigodi.
1Chr 14:14 UDavide waphinda wabuza kuNkulunkulu; uNkulunkulu wathi kuye: “Ungenyuki emva kwawo; wagwegwesele, uwafikele malungana namajikijolo.
1Chr 14:15 Kuyakuthi lapho usuzwa umsindo wokuhamba ezihlokweni zamajikijolo, uphume impi, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uphumile ngaphambi kwakho ukuchitha impi yamaFilisti.”
1Chr 14:16 UDavide wenza njengokumyala kukaNkulunkulu, bachitha impi yamaFilisti kusukela eGibeyoni kuze kube seGezeri.
1Chr 14:17 Igama likaDavide laphumela emazweni onke; uJehova wehlisela izizwe zonke ingebhe ngaye.
1Chr 15:1 Wazakhela izindlu emzini kaDavide; walungisela umphongolo kaNkulunkulu indawo, wawumisela itende.
1Chr 15:2 Khona uDavide wathi: “Umphongolo kaNkulunkulu nga ungathwalwa muntu, ngamaLevi kuphela, ngokuba yiwona akhethwe nguJehova ukuthwala umphongolo kaNkulunkulu nokumkhonza kuze kube phakade.”
1Chr 15:3 UDavide wabuthela wonke u-Israyeli eJerusalema ukukhuphulela umphongolo kaJehova endaweni yawo awulungisele yona.
1Chr 15:4 UDavide wabutha amadodana ka-Aroni namaLevi;
1Chr 15:5 kumadodana kaKohati: ngu-Uriyeli inhloko nabafowabo, beyikhulu namashumi amabili;
1Chr 15:6 kumadodana kaMerari: ngu-Asaya inhloko nabafowabo, bengamakhulu amabili namashumi amabili;
1Chr 15:7 kumadodana kaGereshomu: nguJoweli inhloko nabafowabo, beyikhulu namashumi amathathu;
1Chr 15:8 kumadodana ka-Elisafani: nguShemaya inhloko nabafowabo, bengamakhulu amabili;
1Chr 15:9 kumadodana kaHebroni: ngu-Eliyeli inhloko nabafowabo, bengamashumi ayisihiyagalombili;
1Chr 15:10 kumadodana ka-Uziyeli: ngu-Aminadaba inhloko nabafowabo, beyikhulu neshumi nambili.
1Chr 15:11 UDavide wabiza oSadoki no-Abiyathara abapristi, namaLevi o-Uriyeli, no-Asaya, noJoweli, noShemaya, no-Eliyeli, no-Aminadaba, wathi kubo:
1Chr 15:12 “Nina niyizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise bamaLevi; zingcweliseni nina nabafowenu ukuba niwukhuphulele umphongolo kaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli endaweni engiyilungisele wona.
1Chr 15:13 Ngokuba ngenxa yokungawuthwali kwenu kuqala uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wafohla kithina, ngokuba singamfunanga njengomthetho.”
1Chr 15:14 Base bezingcwelisa abapristi namaLevi ukuba bawukhuphule umphongolo kaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.
1Chr 15:15 Abantwana bamaLevi bawuthwala umphongolo kaNkulunkulu emahlombe abo ngezinti zawo njengokuyala kukaMose ngezwi likaJehova.
1Chr 15:16 UDavide washo ezinduneni zamaLevi ukuba zibeke abafowabo abahlabeleli, benezinto zokubetha, izingubhu, namahabhu, namasimbali, bakubethe, baphakamise izwi labo ngokuthokoza.
1Chr 15:17 AmaLevi ayesebeka uHemani indodana kaJoweli, nakubafowabo u-Asafa indodana kaBerekiya, nakumadodana kaMerari, abafowabo, u-Ethani indodana kaKushaya,
1Chr 15:18 bekanye nabo abafowabo besigaba sesibili: oZakariya, noBeni, noJahaziyeli, noShemiramoti, noJehiyeli, no-Uni, no-Eliyabe, noBenaya, noMahaseya, noMatithiya, no-Elifelehu, noMikineya, no-Obede Edomi, noJehiyeli, abalindisango,
1Chr 15:19 nabahlabeleli oHemani no-Asafa no-Ethani ukuba bakhalise amasimbali ethusi,
1Chr 15:20 noZakariya, no-Aziyeli, noShemiramoti, noJehiyeli, no-Uni, no-Eliyabe, noMahaseya, noBenaya ukuba babe nezingubhu ezilungiselwe i-Alamoti,
1Chr 15:21 noMatithiya, no-Elifelehu, noMikineya, no-Obede Edomi, noJehiyeli, no-Azaziya ukuba babe namahabhu alungiselwe iSheminiti ukuba bahole.
1Chr 15:22 UKhenaniya induna yamaLevi wayephethe umsebenzi wokuthwala; wayefundisa ukuthwala ngokuba wayekwazi.
1Chr 15:23 OBerekiya no-Elkana babe ngabalindisango bomphongolo.
1Chr 15:24 OShebaniya, noJehoshafati, noNethaneli, no-Amasayi, noZakariya, noBenaya, no-Eliyezeri, abapristi, bashaya amacilongo phambi komphongolo kaNkulunkulu; o-Obede Edomi noJehiya babe ngabalindisango bomphongolo.
1Chr 15:25 UDavide namalunga akwa-Israyeli nezinduna zezinkulungwane baya ukuwukhuphula umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova endlini ka-Obede Edomi ngokuthokoza;
1Chr 15:26 kwathi lapho uNkulunkulu esesizile amaLevi awuthwala umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova, anikela ngezinkunzi eziyisikhombisa nangezinqama eziyisikhombisa.
1Chr 15:27 UDavide wayembethe ingubo yelineni elicolekileyo kanye nawo onke amaLevi ayethwala umphongolo, nabahlabeleli, noKhenaniya induna yokuthwala kwabahlabeleli; uDavide wayenengubo yamahlombe yelineni.
1Chr 15:28 Wonke u-Israyeli wawukhuphula kanjalo umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova ngokukhamuluka nangezwi lomtshingo, nangamacilongo, nangamasimbali, ebetha izingubhu namahabhu.
1Chr 15:29 Kwathi lapho umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova usungena emzini kaDavide, uMikhali indodakazi kaSawule walunguza efasiteleni, wabona inkosi uDavide isina, idlala; wayidelela enhliziyweni yakhe.
1Chr 16:1 Bawungenisa umphongolo kaNkulunkulu, bawubeka phakathi netende uDavide ayelimisele wona; banikela ngeminikelo yokushiswa nangeminikelo yokuthula phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 16:2 UDavide eseqedile ukunikela ngomnikelo wokushiswa nangeminikelo yokuthula wababusisa abantu egameni likaJehova.
1Chr 16:3 Wabela bonke abantu bakwa-Israyeli, abesilisa nabesifazane, isinkwa saba sinye, nesicubu senyama, nesigaxa sezithelo zomvini ezomileyo.
1Chr 16:4 Wabela amaLevi athile ukukhonza phambi komphongolo kaJehova ukuba amkhumbule, ambonge, amdumise uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli:
1Chr 16:5 ngu-Asafa inhloko nabesigaba sakhe sesibili, oZakariya, noJehiyeli, noShemiramoti, noJehiyeli, noMatithiya, no-Eliyabe, noBenaya, no-Obede Edomi, noJehiyeli, benezingubhu namahabhu, kanye no-Asafa ephethe amasimbali, ewabetha,
1Chr 16:6 noBenaya noJahaziyeli abapristi, benamacilongo njalo phambi komphongolo wesivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu.
1Chr 16:7 Ngalolo suku uDavide wayeseqala ukuhlela ukuba uJehova abongwe ngesandla sika-Asafa nabafowabo.
1Chr 16:8 Bongani uJehova, nibize igama lakhe, nizazise phakathi kwabantu izenzo zakhe.
1Chr 16:9 Hlabelelani kuye, nimhubele, nikhulume ngezimangaliso zakhe zonke.
1Chr 16:10 Zibongeni egameni lakhe elingcwele; mazithokoze izinhliziyo zabamfuna uJehova.
1Chr 16:11 Funani uJehova namandla akhe, nifunisise ubuso bakhe njalo.
1Chr 16:12 Khumbulani izimangaliso zakhe azenzileyo, nezibonakaliso zakhe, nezahlulelo zomlomo wakhe,
1Chr 16:13 nina nzalo ka-Israyeli, inceku yakhe, nina bantwana bakaJakobe, abakhethiweyo bakhe.
1Chr 16:14 Yena unguJehova uNkulunkulu wethu; izahlulelo zakhe zisemhlabeni wonke.
1Chr 16:15 Khumbulani isivumelwano sakhe kuze kube phakade, izwi ayala ngalo izizukulwane eziyinkulungwane,
1Chr 16:16 avumelana kuso no-Abrahama, nesifungo sakhe ku-Isaka;
1Chr 16:17 wasiqinisa kuJakobe, saba ngumthetho, naku-Israyeli, saba yisivumelwano esiphakade,
1Chr 16:18 ethi: “Ngizakukunika izwe laseKhanani libe yisabelo sefa lakho,
1Chr 16:19 lapho naniyingcosana ngomumo, yebo, lapho naniyingcosana, futhi naniyizihambi kulo.”
1Chr 16:20 Bazulazula ezizweni ngezizwe, besuka kulo mbuso, beya kwabanye abantu.
1Chr 16:21 Akavumelanga muntu ukubahlupha, wajezisa amakhosi ngenxa yabo,
1Chr 16:22 ethi: “Ningathinti abagcotshiweyo bami, ningoni abaprofethi bami.”
1Chr 16:23 Hlabelelani kuJehova, mhlaba wonke, nimemeze insindiso yakhe imihla ngemihla.
1Chr 16:24 Landani inkazimulo yakhe phakathi kwabezizwe, izimangaliso zakhe phakathi kwabantu bonke.
1Chr 16:25 Ngokuba mkhulu uJehova, udumisekile kakhulu; uyesabeka phezu kwabo bonke onkulunkulu.
1Chr 16:26 Ngokuba bonke onkulunkulu babezizwe bayizithombe, kepha uJehova walenza izulu.
1Chr 16:27 Udumo nobukhosi kusebusweni bakhe; amandla nokuthokoza kusendaweni yakhe.
1Chr 16:28 Mnikeni uJehova nina mindeni yabantu, mnikeni uJehova inkazimulo namandla.
1Chr 16:29 Mnikeni uJehova inkazimulo yegama lakhe, nilethe umnikelo, nize phambi kwakhe, nikhuleke kuJehova ngobuhle bobungcwele.
1Chr 16:30 Thuthumelani ebusweni bakhe, mhlaba wonke; izwe lihlala liqinile, alinakushukunyiswa.
1Chr 16:31 Malijabule izulu, umhlaba uthokoze; makuthiwe ezizweni: UJehova uyinkosi.
1Chr 16:32 Maluhlokome ulwandle nokugcwala kwalo, amasimu ename nakho konke okukuwo.
1Chr 16:33 Khona imithi yehlathi iyakuhuba ngokujabula ebusweni bukaJehova, ngokuba uyeza ukwahlulela umhlaba.
