Job 4:11 Ibhubesi elinamandla liyabhubha ngokuswela impango; amawundlu ebhubesikazi ayahlakazeka.
Job 4:12 “Kwanyenyiselwa kimi izwi, indlebe yami yabamba ukunyenyezwa kwalo.
Job 4:13 Ngokudlala kwemicabango ivuswe yimibono yasebusuku, lapho abantu sebehlelwe ngubuthongo obunzima,
Job 4:14 ngafikelwa yingebhe nokuthuthumela okwaqhaqhazelisa onke amathambo ami.
Job 4:15 Kwadlula umoya ebusweni bami; uboya bomzimba wami bavuka.
Job 4:16 Kwema okuthile, kepha angaqonda ukubonakala kwakho; isimo sasiphambi kwamehlo ami; kwathula; ngase ngizwa izwi, lathi:
Job 4:17 ‘Umuntu ulungile kunoNkulunkulu na? Umuntukazana uhlambulukile kunoMenzi na?
Job 4:18 Bheka, nasezincekwini zakhe akethembi, nezingelosi zakhe uyazibeka icala;
Job 4:19 kakhulu kangakanani abahlezi ezindlini zodaka, abazisekelo zabo zisothulini, abachotshozwa njengenundu.
Job 4:20 Bagxotshwa kusukela ekuseni kuze kube kusihlwa; babhubha kuze kube phakade benganakwa muntu.
Job 4:21 Intambo yetende labo ayisishulwa yini phakathi kwabo, bafe bengazelele, na?’
Job 5:1 “Ake umemeze; ukhona okuphendulayo na? Uyakuphendukela kumuphi kwabangcwele na?
Job 5:2 Ngokuba isiwula siyabulawa ngukukhathazeka, nomhawu uyachitha oyisiphukuphuku.
Job 5:3 Mina ngibonile isiwula sigxilile, kepha ngaqalekisa indlu yaso ngokuzumayo.
Job 5:4 Abantwana baso bakude nokusindiswa, bachotshozwa esangweni; akakho obophulayo,
Job 5:5 abakuvuna kwabo kudliwa ngabalambileyo, bakukhipha nasemeveni; abanxanelayo basezela impahla yabo.
Job 5:6 Ngokuba usizi aluveli othulini, nokuhlupheka akuphumi emhlabathini,
Job 5:7 ngokuba umuntu uzalelwa ukuhlupheka, njengokuba izinhlansi ziqhashela phezulu.
Job 5:8 “Kodwa mina bengiyakumfuna uNkulunkulu; kuNkulunkulu bengiyakubeka indaba yami,
Job 5:9 yena owenza izinto ezinkulu ezingaphenyekiyo, izimangaliso ezingenakubalwa,
Job 5:10 yena onisa imvula emhlabeni, athume amanzi ebusweni bamasimu,
Job 5:11 ukuze aphakamise abayizimpofana nabadabukileyo baphakanyiselwe ukusindiswa.
Job 5:12 Uyachitha amacebo abanobuqili, ukuze izandla zabo zingabi nakufeza umgomo wabo.
Job 5:13 Uyabamba abahlakaniphileyo ebuqilini babo; isiluleko soyisigwegwe siyachithwa ngokuphuthuma.
Job 5:14 Emini bahlangana nobumnyama, baphumputha emini njengasebusuku.
Job 5:15 Uyasindisa enkembeni yemilomo yabo, yebo, abampofu esandleni sonamandla.
Job 5:16 Ompofu usenethemba; ububi buvala umlomo wabo.
Job 5:17 “Bheka, ubusisiwe lowo muntu uNkulunkulu amlayayo; ngalokho ungadeleli ukukhuzwa nguSomandla.
Job 5:18 Ngokuba uma ezwisa ubuhlungu, ubuye abophe; uyalimaza, kepha izandla zakhe zibuye zelaphe.
Job 5:19 Uyakophula ezinhluphekweni eziyisithupha; yebo, nakweziyisikhombisa awuyikuthintwa ngokubi.
Job 5:20 Endlaleni uyakukuhlenga ekufeni nasempini emandleni enkemba.
Job 5:21 Uyakufihlwa enkalivasini yolimi; awuyikwesaba lapho kufika ukuchitha.
Job 5:22 Uyakuhleka incithakalo nendlala, nezilo zomhlaba awuyikuzesaba.
Job 5:23 Ngokuba unesivumelwano namatshe asendle; izilo zasendle zihlalisana kahle nawe.
Job 5:24 Uyakwazi ukuthi itende lakho linokuthula; uyakuhambela indlu yakho, awuyikusilalelwa lutho.
Job 5:25 Uyakwazi ukuthi inzalo yakho iyakuba nkulu, abantwana bakho babe njengotshani bomhlaba.
Job 5:26 Uyakufika ethuneni usuthi ngobudala njengeqhinqa lamabele ngesikhathi salo.
Job 5:27 Bheka, lokho sikuphenyile; kunjalo; kuzwe, uzazele khona.”
Job 6:1 Wayesephendula uJobe ethi:
Job 6:2 “Sengathi ukuncokolozwa kwami ngabe kulinganiswe nokulinganiswa, inhlupheko yami ibekwe esilinganisweni kanyekanye.
Job 6:3 Ngokuba manje iyasinda kunesihlabathi solwandle; ngalokho amazwi ami ayengukubheda.
Job 6:4 Ngokuba imicibisholo kaSomandla ikimi; isihlungu sayo siphuzwa ngumoya wami; izesabiso zikaNkulunkulu ziyangehlela.
Job 6:5 Imbongolo yasendle iyakhala yini inotshani na? Inkabi iyakhonya isekudleni kwayo na?
Job 6:6 Okudumayo kungadliwa ngaphandle kukasawoti na? Kukhona ukuklwabusa kokumhlophe kweqanda na?
Job 6:7 Umphefumulo wami uyala ukukuthinta, kungukudla okunengekayo kimi.
Job 6:8 “Sengathi isicelo sami singenziwa, uNkulunkulu angiphe lokhu engikubhekayo.
Job 6:9 Yebo, sengathi uNkulunkulu angangichoboza, athukulule isandla sakhe, anginqume.
Job 6:10 Lokho ngakube kuhlale kube yinduduzo yami, yebo, ngabe ngijabule ebuhlungwini obungahawukeliyo ukuthi angigodlanga amazwi oNgcwele.
Job 6:11 Ayini amandla ami ukuba ngingaze ngethembe na? Ukuphela kwami kuyini ukuba ngingaze ngibekezele na?
Job 6:12 Pho, amandla ami angamandla amatshe yini? Inyama yami iyithusi na?
Job 6:13 Akusikho yini ukuthi alukho usizo kimi; ukusindiswa kususwa kimi.
Job 6:14 “Odangeleyo nga ehawukelwa ngumngane wakhe; kepha ukumesaba uSomandla kuyayekwa.
Job 6:15 Abafowethu bambuluzile njengomfula, njengemithonjana yemifula eshayo,
Job 6:16 emnyama ngeqhwa, lapho ungqoqwane ezisitheza khona,
Job 6:17 kepha ngesikhathi sokufudumala inyamalale, ishe endaweni yayo, lapho libalele.
Job 6:18 Abahamba ngezindlela zayo bayaphambuka, benyukela oqwathuleni, babhubhe.
Job 6:19 Izihambi zakwaThema zabheka; izindwendwe zakwaSheba zazihlalela.
Job 6:20 Zajabha, ngokuba zazibhekile; sezifike khona zadana.
Job 6:21 Ngokuba kalokhu seniyize nje; nibona okwesabisayo niyesaba.
Job 6:22 Ngasho yini ukuthi: ‘Ngipheni, ninginike isipho empahleni yenu,’ na?
Job 6:23 noma: ‘Ngikhululeni esandleni sesitha, ningihlenge esandleni sezidlova,’ na?
Job 6:24 “Ngifundiseni, khona ngiyakuthula mina, ningiqondise lapho ngiduke khona.
Job 6:25 Ukukhuluma okuqotho kunamandla, kepha ukusolwa nokusolwa yinina kusizani na?
Job 6:26 Nicabanga yini ukusola amazwi, lokhu ukukhuluma kophelelwa ithemba kungumoya nje na?
Job 6:27 Yebo, nenza inkatho ngentandane, nithengisa ngomngane wenu.
Job 6:28 Manje, qalani ukungibuka; kuyakuba sobala, uma ngiqamba amanga.
Job 6:29 Ake niphenduke, kungabikho ukungalungi, nibuye niphenduke; indaba yami ilungile.
Job 6:30 Kukhona ukungalungi olimini lwami yini, ulwanga lwami alunakuqonda okubi na?
Job 7:1 “Umuntu akasempini yini emhlabeni, imihla yakhe ayinjengemihla yomqashwa na?
Job 7:2 Njengenceku ekhefuzelela ithunzi, nanjengomqashwa obheka umvuzo wakhe,
Job 7:3 kanjalo ngithole ifa lezinyanga zokubi; ngimiselwe ubusuku bezinhlupheko.
Job 7:4 Lapho ngilala phansi, ngisho ngithi: ‘Ngingavuka nini,’ ngokuba ubusuku bude; ngigcwele ukubinyabinyeka kuze kuse.
Job 7:5 Inyama yami yembesiwe izimpethu namagade othuli; isikhumba sami siyaphola, sibuye sibhicike.
Job 7:6 “Imihla yami iyashesha kunesaluko, iphela ingenathemba.
Job 7:7 Khumbula ukuthi ukuphila kwami kungumoya; iso lami aliyikubuye libone okuhle.
Job 7:8 Iso longibonayo alisayikungibuka; amehlo akho esekimi, angisekho.
Job 7:9 Ifu liphela lihamba; kanjalo owehlele endaweni yabafileyo akasayikukhuphuka.
Job 7:10 Kasayikubuyela endlini yakhe; indawo yakhe ayisayikumazi.
Job 7:11 “Ngalokho nami angiyikubamba umlomo wami; ngiyakukhuluma osizini lomoya wami, ngikhale ngomunyu womphefumulo wami.
Job 7:12 Ngilulwandle yini, ngingumkhomo yini, ukuze ungibekele abalindi?
Job 7:13 Lapho ngithi umbhede wami uyakungiduduza, ukhukho lwami lungithwalise ukukhala kwami,
Job 7:14 uyangesabisa ngamaphupho, ungethusa ngemibono,
Job 7:15 ukuze umphefumulo wami ukhethe ukuklinywa nokufa kunalawa mathambo ami.
Job 7:16 Ngiyanengwa yiwo; mangingahlali njalo; ngiyeke, ngokuba imihla yami iyize.
Job 7:17 Uyini umuntu ukuba umkhulise, nokuba ubeke inhliziyo yakho kuye,
Job 7:18 nokuba umhambele ekuseni njalo, umhlole njalonjalo, na?
Job 7:19 Koze kube nini uyeka ukungibheka na? Ngiyeke, ngize ngiminze amathe ami.
Job 7:20 Noma ngonile, ngenzeni kuwe mlindi wabantu na? Ungimiseleni ngibe yisigcibisholo sakho, ngize ngibe ngumthwalo nakimi, na?
Job 7:21 Awuthetheleli ngani isiphambeko sami, ususe isono sami, na? Ngokuba manje ngiyakulala phansi othulini; uyakungifunisisa, kepha angiyikubakho.”
Job 8:1 Wayesethatha uBilidadi umShuhi, wathi:
Job 8:2 “Koze kube nini ukhuluma lezi zinto, amazwi akho abe ngumoya onamandla, na?
Job 8:3 UNkulunkulu uhlanekezela ukwahlulela yini? USomandla uphendukezela ukulunga na?
Job 8:4 Uma abantwana bakho bonile kuye, yena wabanikela emandleni ezono zabo,
Job 8:5 khona, uma wena ufunisisa uNkulunkulu, unxuse kuye uSomandla,
Job 8:6 uma uhlambulukile, futhi ulungile, khona yena uyakuvuka ngenxa yakho, aphumelelise ikhaya lokulunga kwakho.
Job 8:7 Ukuqala kwakho sekuyakuba ngokuncane, nokugcina kwakho kube ngokukhulu kakhulu.
Job 8:8 Ake ubuze ezizukulwaneni zakuqala, uzibhekise lokho abakuphenyileyo oyise bazo,
Job 8:9 ngokuba thina singabezolo nje, asinalwazi, lokhu imihla yethu emhlabeni iyithunzi;
Job 8:10 bona abayikukufundisa yini, bakutshele, bakhiphe amazwi ezinhliziyweni zabo, na?
Job 8:11 Umhlanga ungahluma lapho kungekho xhaphozi na? Incema ingamila kungekho manzi na?
Job 8:12 Uma iseluhlaza, ingakakhiwa, iyabuna phambi kwabo bonke utshani.
Job 8:13 “Zinjalo izindlela zabo bonke abakhohlwa uNkulunkulu: ithemba longenaNkulunkulu liyakuchitheka;
Job 8:14 ithemba lakhe liyakunqunywa, nesisekelo sakhe siyindlu yolwembu.
Job 8:15 Uyakwencika endlini yakhe, kepha ayiyikuma; uyakubambelela kuyo, kepha ayiyikuqina.
Job 8:16 Yena uluhlaza phambi kwelanga; imixhantela yakhe iyaxhantela ensimini yakhe.
Job 8:17 Izimpande zakhe ziyathandela enqwabeni yamatshe, aqhekeze indawo yamatshe.
Job 8:18 Uma echithwa endaweni yakhe, iyakumala ngokuthi: ‘Angizange ngikubone.’
Job 8:19 Bheka, injalo indlela yokuthokoza kwakhe; kuyakuvela abanye othulini.
Job 8:20 “UNkulunkulu akamlahli opheleleyo, kabambi isandla sababi,
Job 8:21 aze agcwalise umlomo wakho ngokuhleka, nezindebe zakho ngokumemeza.
Job 8:22 Abakuzondayo bayakwembeswa amahloni; itende lababi aliyobe lisabakho.”
Job 9:1 Wayesephendula uJobe ethi:
Job 9:2 “Ngeqiniso ngiyazi ukuthi kunjalo, kepha umuntu angaba elungile phambi kukaNkulunkulu na?
Job 9:3 Uma efuna ukuthetha amacala naye, angemphendule nakwelilodwa kwayinkulungwane.
Job 9:4 Ehlakaniphile enhliziyweni, eqinile emandleni, ngubani oziqinisele kuye, waphumelela,
Job 9:5 yena ogudluza izintaba ngokungazeleli, ezigumbuqela ngentukuthelo yakhe;
Job 9:6 ozamazamisa umhlaba usuke endaweni yawo, kuthuthumele izinsika zawo;
Job 9:7 oyala ilanga lingaphumi, avalele izinkanyezi;
Job 9:8 oweneka izulu yedwa, ahambe emazeni olwandle;
Job 9:9 owenza iBhere, neMpambano, nesiLimela, namaKamelo aseningizimu;
Job 9:10 owenza izinto ezinkulu ezingenakuhlolwa, yebo, izimangaliso ezingenakubalwa.
Job 9:11 Bheka, uyangidlula, ngingaboni; uyagudla, ngingezwa.
Job 9:12 Bheka, uyabamba; ngubani ongamkhalima na? Ngubani ongasho kuye ukuthi: ‘Wenzani na?’
Job 9:13 “UNkulunkulu akayikubuyisa intukuthelo yakhe; phansi kwakhe bayakhothama abasizi bakaRahabi.
Job 9:14 Pho, mina ngingamphendula ngithini, ngikhethe amazwi ami aqondene naye, na?
Job 9:15 Noma bengilungile, bengingenakumphendula, kepha nginxuse umahluleli wami.
Job 9:16 Uma bengimbizile abesengiphendula, bengingayikukholwa nokho ukuthi ubekile indlebe ezwini lami.
Job 9:17 Uyangilimaza ngesiphepho; uyandisa amanxeba ami ngeze.
Job 9:18 Kavumi ukuba ngiphefumule, kepha uyangigcwalisa ngomunyu.
Job 9:19 Uma kuyindaba yamandla, nangu onawo; uma yindaba yokwahlulela, ngubani ongimemayo na?
Job 9:20 Noma ngilungile, umlomo wami uyakungilahla; noma ngingenacala, uyakuthi ngonakele.
Job 9:21 Anginasici; anginakekeli umphefumulo wami; anginanzi ukuphila kwami.
Job 9:22 Ukuphela kunye nje; ngalokho ngithi: ‘Uyaqeda ongenasici kanye nomubi.’
Job 9:23 Uma isiswebhu sibulala ngokuzumayo, uyahleka ingozi yabangenacala.
Job 9:24 Umhlaba unikezwe esandleni sababi; uyasibekela ubuso babahluleli bawo; uma kungesiye, pho, ngubani na?
Job 9:25 “Imihla yami iyashesha kunesigijimi; iyabaleka ingabonanga okuhle.
Job 9:26 Itshuza njengomkhunjana womhlanga, njengokhozi olutheleka empangweni.
Job 9:27 Noma ngithi ngiyakukhohlwa ukukhala kwami, ngiyeke ukunyukubala kwami, ngincibilike,
Job 9:28 ngiyesaba nokho bonke ubuhlungu bami, ngiyazi ukuthi awuyikungibheka nginjengongenacala.
Job 9:29 Ngiyakulahlwa mina; ngikhandlekelani ize na?
Job 9:30 Noma ngizigeza ngamanzi eqhwa, ngihlambe izandla zami ngensipho,
Job 9:31 uyakungicwilisa nokho emgodini, izingubo zami zinengwe yimi.
Job 9:32 Ngokuba akasiye umuntu onjengami ukuba ngingase ngimphendule, siye kanyekanye ekwahlulelweni.
Job 9:33 Akukho mnqamulajuqu phakathi kwethu ongabeka isandla sakhe phezu kwethu sobabili.
Job 9:34 Makayisuse induku yakhe kimi; ingebhe ngaye mayingangesabisi.
Job 9:35 Khona ngiyakukhuluma, ngingamesabi, ngokuba anginjalo ngokwami.
Job 10:1 “Umphefumulo wami ukhathele ukuhamba kwami; ngiyazinikela ekukhaleni, ngikhulume ngomunyu womphefumulo wami.
Job 10:2 Ngiyakusho kuNkulunkulu ukuthi: ‘Ungangilahli; ngazise ukuthi uphikisanelani nami na?
Job 10:3 Kuhle yini kuwe ukuba ucindezele, ulahle umsebenzi wezandla zakho, ukhanye phezu kwamasu ababi, na?
Job 10:4 Amehlo enyama unawo na? Uyabona njengabantu na?
Job 10:5 Imihla yakho injengemihla yomuntu na? Neminyaka yakho injengezinsuku zabantu na?
Job 10:6 lokhu ufuna ukona kimi, ufunisisa isono sami,
Job 10:7 noma ukwazi ukuthi angimubi nokuthi akakho ongophula esandleni sakho.
Job 10:8 Izandla zakho zingibumbile, zangenza ngokupheleleyo nxazonke; nokho uyangichitha.
Job 10:9 Ake ukhumbule ukuthi ungenzile njengebumba; pho, uyakungibuyisela othulini na?
Job 10:10 Awungithululanga njengobisi, wangijiyisa njengoshizi, na?
Job 10:11 Awungembathisanga isikhumba nenyama, wangiphica ngamathambo nangemisipha, na?
Job 10:12 Ungenzele ukuphila nomusa; ukungihambela kwakho kulondile umoya wami.
Job 10:13 Kepha ufihlile enhliziyweni yakho lokhu; ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu kukuwe kokuthi:
Job 10:14 Uma ngona, uyangiqaphela; awuyikuthethelela ukona kwami.
Job 10:15 Uma nginecala, maye kimi! Noma bengilungile, bengingayikuphakamisa ikhanda lami, lokhu ngisuthi ngehlazo, ngibona ukuhlupheka kwami.
Job 10:16 Nokuba bengiziphakamisa, ubuyakungizingela njengengonyama, ubuye uzenze omangalisayo kimi.
Job 10:17 Ubuyakuletha kimi ofakazi abasha, wandise intukuthelo yakho kimi, amabandla ngamabandla angisukele.
Job 10:18 “ ‘Ungikhipheleni esizalweni na? Ngangiyakugqibuka lingakangiboni iso,
Job 10:19 ngibe njengokungathi ngingekho, ngiyiswe ethuneni ngisaphuma esiswini.
Job 10:20 Imihla yami ayiyingcosana na? Makapheze, angiyeke ukuba ngithokoze kancane,
Job 10:21 ngingakayi lapho ngingasayikubuya khona, izwe lobumnyama nelomthunzi wokufa,
Job 10:22 izwe lobumnyama obunjengesigayegaye nelomthunzi wokufa nelesiphithiphithi, lapho ukukhanya kunjengobumnyama.’ ”
Job 11:1 Wayesethatha uSofari waseNahama, wathi:
Job 11:2 “Awayikuphendulwa amazwi amaningi kangaka na? Umuntu oliphoshophosho angathethelelwa na?
Job 11:3 Ukugavuza kwakho kuthulisa abantu na? Nalapho ukloloda, akakho ongakuhlaza na?
Job 11:4 Ngokuba uthi: ‘Ukufundisa kwami kulungile; ngimhlophe emehlweni akho.’
Job 11:5 Sengathi uNkulunkulu angakhuluma, akuvulele izindebe zakhe,
Job 11:6 akwazise izimfihlakalo zokuhlakanipha, ngokuba ukuqonda kwakhe kuninginingi, uze wazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu, ukuba kube kuhle kuwe, wenza ukuba ikhohlakale inxenye yecala lakho.
Job 11:7 “Ungathola imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu na? Ungamfumana uSomandla kuze kube sekupheleleni kwakhe na?
Job 11:8 Kuphakeme njengezulu — ungenzani na? Kujulile kunendawo yabafileyo — ungazini na?
Job 11:9 Isilinganiso sakho side kunomhlaba, sibanzi kunolwandle.
Job 11:10 Uma edlula, avalele, abizele ekwahluleleni, ngubani ongamkhalima na?
Job 11:11 Ngokuba uyabazi abantu ababi; lapho ebona ukona, akayikukunaka na?
Job 11:12 Umuntu oyize uyakuba nengqondo, nxa ithole lembongolo yasendle lizalwa libe ngumuntu.
Job 11:13 “Uma ulungisa inhliziyo yakho, welulele izandla zakho kuye;
Job 11:14 uma udedisele kude ukona okusesandleni sakho, ungahlalisi ububi ematendeni akho,
Job 11:15 khona uyakuphakamisa ubuso bakho ungenamahloni, uqine, ungesabi.
Job 11:16 Ngokuba uyakukhohlwa ukuhlupheka kwakho, ukukhumbule kunjengamanzi adlulileyo.
Job 11:17 Ukuphila kwakho kuyakusa kunemini; noma kuhlwa, kuyakuba njengokusa nje.
Job 11:18 Uyakuba nokwethemba, ngokuba ithemba likhona; uyakuphendla, ulale ngokulondeka.
Job 11:19 Uyakulala, ungethuswa muntu; abaningi bayakuzincengela kuwe.
Job 11:20 Kepha amehlo ababi ayakufiphala; abayikuba nandawo yokuphephela; ithemba labo liyakuba ngukuphuma komphefumulo.”
Job 12:1 Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi:
Job 12:2 “Impela yinina eningabantu; ukuhlakanipha kuyakufa nani.
Job 12:3 Kodwa nami nginengqondo njengani, angahlulwa yinina; ngubani ongazazi izinto ezinje na?
Job 12:4 Ngiyisigcono somngane wami, ngowambiza uNkulunkulu, waphendula; olungileyo nongenasici uyisigcono.
Job 12:5 Emcabangweni wohlezi kahle ingozi iyadeleleka; kulungiselwe abazinyawo zabo zishelela.
Job 12:6 Amatende abacindezelayo anokuthula; abathukuthelisayo uNkulunkulu bayalondeka, abaletha unkulunkulu wabo ngezandla zabo.
Job 12:7 Kepha mawubuze izinkomo, ziyakukufundisa, nezinyoni zezulu, ziyakukutshela.
Job 12:8 Khuluma kuwo umhlaba, uyakukufundisa, nezinhlanzi zolwandle ziyakukulandisa.
Job 12:9 Ngubani ongaziyo ngakho konke lokho ukuthi isandla sikaJehova sikwenzile lokho na?
Job 12:10 Esandleni sakhe ukhona umphefumulo wakho konke okuphilayo, nomoya wenyama yabantu bonke.
Job 12:11 Indlebe ayivivinyi yini amazwi, njengolwanga lunambitha ukudla, na?
Job 12:12 Ezimpungeni kukhona ukuhlakanipha, nasebudeni bezinsuku ukuqonda.
Job 12:13 “Kuyena kukhona ukuhlakanipha namandla; unesu nokuqonda.
Job 12:14 Bheka, uyadiliza, kungabe kusakhiwa; uyavalela umuntu, kungabe kusavulwa.
Job 12:15 Bheka, uyavimba amanzi, ashe; uyawathumela agumbuqele umhlaba.
Job 12:16 Kuye kukhona amandla nokusizwa; odukisiweyo nodukileyo bakuye.
Job 12:17 Umukisa abaluleki bephangiwe; uyenza abahluleli babe yiziwula.
Job 12:18 Uthukulula izibopho zamakhosi, awabophe ezinkalweni ngamaketanga.
Job 12:19 Umukisa abapristi bephangiwe, aphenule abemiyo njalo.
Job 12:20 Uyasusa ulimi lwabathembekileyo, aphuce amalunga ukuqonda.
Job 12:21 Uthela izikhulu ngehlazo, akhumule imbonya yonamandla.
Job 12:22 Uyambula izinto ezijulileyo ebumnyameni, akhiphele ekukhanyeni ithunzi lokufa.
Job 12:23 Uyandisa izizwe, abesezibhubhisa; ukhulisa izizwe, abesezisusa.
Job 12:24 Uyamuka izinhloko zezizwe ezweni ingqondo yazo, azidukise ehlane elingenandlela.
Job 12:25 Ziyaphumputha ebumnyameni zingenakukhanya, uyazintengantengisa njengesidakwa.
Job 13:1 “Bheka, iso lami libone konke; indlebe yami ikuzwile, yakuqonda.
Job 13:2 Enikwaziyo ngiyakwazi nami; angahlulwa yinina.
Job 13:3 Kepha ngiyakukhuluma kuSomandla; ngifuna ukuphikisana noNkulunkulu.
Job 13:4 Kepha ningabaqambimanga; niyizinyanga ezingelutho nonke.
Job 13:5 Sengathi ningathula nokuthula, lokho kube ngukuhlakanipha kini.
Job 13:6 Ake nizwe ukuthetha kwami, niqaphele ukuzivikela kwezindebe zami.
Job 13:7 Niyakumkhulumela uNkulunkulu ngokubi, nimkhulumele ngenkohliso, na?
Job 13:8 Niyakubuvuma ubuso bakhe, nimmele uNkulunkulu, na?
Job 13:9 Kuhle yini, lapho eniphendla? Njengalokhu umuntu ekhohliswa niyakumkhohlisa na?
Job 13:10 Uyakunisola nokunisola, uma nivuna ubuso ngasese.
Job 13:11 Ubukhulu bakhe abuyikunethusa, nengebhe ngaye inehlele, na?
Job 13:12 Izikhumbuzo zenu ziyizaga zomlotha; izivikelo zenu ziyizivikelo zebumba.
Job 13:13 “Thulani, ningiyeke ukuba ngikhulume, kungehlele noma yini.
Job 13:14 Bengiyakuyithathelani inyama yami ngamazinyo ami, ngibeke ukuphila kwami esandleni sami, na?
Job 13:15 Bheka, uyakungibulala, anginathemba; nokho ngiyakuvikela izindlela zami ebusweni bakhe.
Job 13:16 Lokhu kuyakuba yinsindiso yami ukuthi ongenaNkulunkulu akezi phambi kwakhe.
Job 13:17 Zwisisani amazwi ami, ukusho kwami kube sezindlebeni zenu.
Job 13:18 Bhekani-ke, sengilungisile ukwahlulelwa kwami; ngiyazi ukuthi ngiyakuthethwa mina.
Job 13:19 Ngubani oyakuphikisana nami na? Ngokuba lapho bengiyakuthula, ngigqabuke.
Job 13:20 Izinto ezimbili kuphela ungazenzi kimi, ngize ngingacasheli ubuso bakho:
Job 13:21 masingasondeli kimi isandla sakho, ngingethuswa yingebhe ngawe.
Job 13:22 Khona mawubize, mina ngiyakuphendula, noma kukhulume mina, wena ungiphendule.
Job 13:23 Iziphambeko zami nezono zami zingakanani na? Ngazise izeqo zami nezono zami.
Job 13:24 Usithelani ubuso bakho, ungishaye isitha, na?
Job 13:25 Uyakwethusa iqabunga eliphephethwayo, uxoshe amabibi awomileyo, na?
Job 13:26 Ngokuba uloba okumunyu ngami, ungidlisa ifa lobubi bobusha bami;
Job 13:27 ufaka izinyawo zami ezingongolweni, uqaphela zonke izindlela zami, uzidwebela umudwa ngasematheni ezinyawo zami,
Job 13:28 noma nginyamalala njengokubolayo, njengengubo edliwe yizinundu.
Job 14:1 “Umuntu ozelwe ngowesifazane imihla yakhe mifushane, igcwele ukuyaluza.
Job 14:2 Uyavela njengembali, abune; ubaleka njengethunzi, angemi.
Job 14:3 Konje uvulela onjalo amehlo akho, ungingenise ekwahluleweni nawe, na?
Job 14:4 Ngubani ongaveza okuhlambulukileyo kukho okungcolileyo na? Kakho noyedwa.
Job 14:5 Uma imihla yakhe inqunyiwe, umumo wezinsuku zakhe ukuwe, ubekile umkhawulo wakhe, aze angadluli,
Job 14:6 ungambheki, aphumule, ukuze athokoze ngosuku lwakhe njengomqashwa.
Job 14:7 “Ngokuba kukhona ithemba emthini: uma unqunywa, ungabuye uhlume, nehlumela lawo aliyikuphela.
Job 14:8 Noma impande yawo iguga emhlabathini, nesiphunzi sawo sifela othulini,
Job 14:9 ngephunga lamanzi uyakuhluma, uveze izingatsha njengesithombo.
Job 14:10 Kepha umuntu ofileyo uphelile; umuntu ogqabukileyo uphi na?
Job 14:11 Njengamanzi anyamalele elwandle, nomfula oshileyo ome,
Job 14:12 kanjalo umuntu ulala phansi, angabe esavuka; lize lingabikho izulu abayikuvuka, bangaphaphanyiswa ebuthongweni babo.
Job 14:13 Sengathi ungangifihla endaweni yabafileyo, ungisithe kuze kudlule intukuthelo yakho, unginqumele isikhathi, ungikhumbule.
Job 14:14 Uma umuntu efa, uyakubuye aphile na? Bengiyakulinda zonke izinsuku zomshikashika wami, kuze kufike ukumuka kwami.
Job 14:15 Ubuyakubiza, mina ngiphendule; ubuyakulangazelela umsebenzi wezandla zakho,
Job 14:16 yebo, khona ubuyakubala izinyathelo zami, ungaqapheli isono sami.
Job 14:17 Isiphambeko besiyakuvalelwa esikhwameni, besewusibekela ukona kwami.
Job 14:18 “Impela intaba iyawa, idilike; idwala liyasuswa endaweni yalo;
Job 14:19 amanzi ayagubha amatshe; ukuphuphuma kwawo kuyakhukhula uthuli lomhlaba; kanjalo uyachitha nethemba lomuntu.
Job 14:20 Uyamsukela kuze kube phakade, amuke; uyaguqula ubuso bakhe, ummukise.
Job 14:21 Amadodana akhe ayadunyiswa, engazi yena; ayeyiswa, engakuqondi.
Job 14:22 Inyama yakhe iyezwa ubuhlungu bayo kuphela; umphefumulo wakhe uzidabukela wona kuphela.”
Job 15:1 Wayesethatha u-Elifazi umThemani, wathi:
Job 15:2 “Ohlakaniphileyo uyakuphendula ngokwazi okungumoya nje, agcwalise isisu ngomoya wasempumalanga, na?
Job 15:3 Aphikisane ngamazwi angasizi lutho nangezinkulumo ezingenalusizo na?
Job 15:4 Yebo, uyachitha ukwesaba, unciphisa ukuzindla phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Job 15:5 Ngokuba ububi bakho buyafundisa umlomo wakho; ukhetha ulimi lwabanobuqili.
Job 15:6 Ngumlomo wakho okulahlayo, akusimi; izindebe zakho ziyafakaza ngawe.
Job 15:7 Ungumuntu wokuqala owazalwayo na? Wavela ngaphambi kwezintaba na?
Job 15:8 Uzwile imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu, wazigodlela wedwa ukuhlakanipha na?
Job 15:9 Wazini esingayazi thina na? Uqonda ntoni engekho kithina na?
Job 15:10 Kithina kukhona izimpunga namakhehla amadala kunoyihlo.
Job 15:11 Zincane yini kuwe izinduduzo zikaNkulunkulu, nezwi elikhulunywa kahle kuwe na?
Job 15:12 Umukiselwani yinhliziyo yakho na? Kungani ukuba amehlo akho aphayizele,
Job 15:13 uphendulele kuNkulunkulu ukufutheka kwakho, ukhiphe amazwi emlonyeni wakho na?
Job 15:14 Uyini umuntu ukuba abe ngohlambulukileyo, nozelwe ngowesifazane ukuba alungisiswe, na?
Job 15:15 Bheka, nabangcwele bakhe akabethembi, nezulu alihlambulukile emehlweni akhe;
Job 15:16 kakhulu kangakanani onengekayo nowonakeleyo, umuntu ophuza ukona njengamanzi, na?
Job 15:17 “Ngiyakukwazisa, ungilalele; ngiyakukulandisa engikubonileyo
Job 15:18 lokho izihlakaniphi ezikubonakalisile, zikuthathe koyise, zingakufihlanga,
Job 15:19 zona ezaphiwa zodwa izwe, kungadabulanga kuzo umfokazi ngokuthi:
Job 15:20 Umuntu omubi uyazibinya imihla yonke, umumo weminyaka othukuselwe isidlwangudlwangu.
Job 15:21 Izwi lengebhe lisezindlebeni zakhe; lapho ehlezi kahle, uyakufikelwa ngumphangi.
Job 15:22 Akethembi ukuthi uyakubuya ebumnyameni; uyalindelwa yinkemba.
Job 15:23 Uyazulazulela ukudla: kuphi na? Uyazi ukuthi usuku lobumnyama selungasesandleni sakhe.
Job 15:24 Ukuhlupheka nosizi kuyamethusa; kuyamahlula njengenkosi ezilungiselele impi,
Job 15:25 ngokuba waselulela isandla sakhe kuNkulunkulu, wazigabisa kuSomandla.
Job 15:26 Wamdumela ngentamo elukhuni, nangamaqhubu adumbileyo amahawu akhe,
Job 15:27 ngokuba wasibekela ubuso bakhe ngamafutha akhe, wenza umvingqi okhalweni lwakhe.
Job 15:28 Wahlala emizini ebiyakuchithwa, nasezindlini ebezingahlalwa, ezaziyakuba ngamanxiwa nje.
Job 15:29 Akayikuceba, nemfuyo yakhe ayiyikuma, nokudla kwakhe akuyikukhothamela phansi.
Job 15:30 Akayikusuka ebumnyameni; ilangabi liyakushisa amagatsha akhe, amuke ngokuphefumula komlomo kaNkulunkulu.
Job 15:31 Makangethembi ezeni, ezikhohlisa, ngokuba ize liyakuba ngumvuzo wakhe.
Job 15:32 Kuyakufezwa kungakabi yisikhathi, negatsha lakhe alisayikuba luhlaza.
Job 15:33 Uyakuvuthulula igwanya lakhe njengomvini, alahle imbali yakhe njengomnqumo.
Job 15:34 Ngokuba ibandla labangenaNkulunkulu liyakuba yinyumba, umlilo uqede amatende abathengwa ngemivuzo.
Job 15:35 Bakhulelwe ingozi, bazala ukona; isisu sabo silungisela inkohliso.”
Job 16:1 Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi:
Job 16:2 “Ngizwile izinto eziningi ezinjalo; nina nonke ningabaduduzi ababi.
Job 16:3 Amazwi angumoya nje awayikuphela yini? Ucunulwa yintoni ukuba uphendule na?
Job 16:4 Nami ngingakhuluma njengani; uma imiphefumulo yenu ibisesikhundleni somphefumulo wami, bengiyakuhlanganisa amazwi ngani, ngininikinele ikhanda lami.
Job 16:5 Benginganiqinisa ngomlomo, induduzo yezindebe zami inidambise.
Job 16:6 “Noma ngikhuluma, ubuhlungu bami abudanjiswanga; noma ngiyeka, kuyini okumuka kimi na?
Job 16:7 Kepha manje ungikhathazile, uyichithile yonke indlu yami.
Job 16:8 Ungicindezele, kungubufakazi; ukonda kwami kuyangivukela, kufakaze ebusweni bami.
Job 16:9 Ulaka lwakhe luyangidwengula, lungizingele; uyangigedlela amazinyo; isitha sami singicijisela amehlo aso.
Job 16:10 Bangikhamisela imilomo yabo, bangimukula esihlathini ngenhlamba, bangihlanganyela.
Job 16:11 UNkulunkulu uyanginikela kubantu abonakeleyo, angiphonse esandleni sababi.
Job 16:12 Ngangihlezi kahle, wangichoboza; wangibamba ngentamo, wangiphahlaza; wangimisa ngibe yisigcibisholo.
Job 16:13 Abacibishelayo bakhe bangihaqa; uyaqhekeza izinso zami engenasihawu; uchithela inyongo yami emhlabathini.
Job 16:14 Uyangidiliza nokudiliza futhifuthi, angidumele njengeqhawe.
Job 16:15 “Ngithungile indwangu yamasaka phezu kwesikhumba sami. ngingcolisile uphondo lwami othulini.
Job 16:16 Ubuso bami bubomvu ngokukhala; ezinkosheni zami kukhona ithunzi lokufa,
Job 16:17 noma kungekho ubudlova ezandleni zami nokukhuleka kwami kulungile.
Job 16:18 Mhlaba, ungathukusi igazi lami; ukukhala kwami makungabi nandawo.
Job 16:19 Namanje bheka, ufakazi wami usezulwini; ummeli wami usezindaweni eziphakemeyo.
Job 16:20 Abangane bami bayangiklolodela; iso lami liphophoza izinyembezi kuNkulunkulu
Job 16:21 ukuba amphikele umuntu kuNkulunkulu nendodana yomuntu kumakhelwane wayo.
Job 16:22 Ngokuba iyingcosana iminyaka eyakubalwa, ngingakahambi indlela engingayikubuya kuyo.
Job 17:1 “Umoya wami usuchithekile, imihla yami iyacimeka; okwami sekuyithuna nje.
Job 17:2 Impela kukhona abangiklolodelayo, iso lami lisekucunuleni kwabo.
Job 17:3 Ake unginike isibambiso, ungimele; ngubani oyakuxhawulana nami na?
Job 17:4 Ngokuba uvalile izinhliziyo zabo zingaqondi; ngalokho awuyikubaphakamisa.
Job 17:5 Ochaka abangane bakhe ngenxa yesabelo, amehlo abantwana bakhe ayakufiphala.
Job 17:6 Ungibeke isaga sabantu, ngibe ngokhafulelwa ebusweni.
Job 17:7 Iso lami lifiphele ngosizi; onke amalungu ami anjengethunzi.
Job 17:8 Abaqotho bayethuswa yilokho; ongenacala uyavukela ongenaNkulunkulu.
Job 17:9 Kepha olungileyo ubambelela endleleni yakhe; onezandla ezihlanzekileyo ude eqina njalo.
Job 17:10 Nokho buyani nonke phela, nize; kodwa angiyikuthola phakathi kwenu ohlakaniphileyo.
Job 17:11 Imihla yami isidlulile, amasu ami anqunyiwe kanye nemicabango yami yenhliziyo.
Job 17:12 Ubusuku babenza imini, bathi: ‘Ukukhanya kuseduze nobumnyama.’
Job 17:13 Uma ngithemba ukuthi indawo yabafileyo iyindlu yami, ngendlalele ukhukho lwami ebumnyameni,
Job 17:14 ngibize ukubola ngokuthi ubaba nezimpethu ngokuthi umame nodadewethu,
Job 17:15 liphi, pho, ithemba lami na? Yebo, ithemba lami, ngubani oyakulibona na?
Job 17:16 Liyakwehlela emigoqweni yendawo yabafileyo, lapho kuyakuba khona ukuphumula othulini kanyekanye.”
Job 18:1 Wayesethatha uBilidadi umShuhi, wathi:
Job 18:2 “Koze kube nini nibekela amazwi ami izingibe na? Qondani, andukuba sikhulume.
Job 18:3 Kungani ukuba sithiwe siyizilwane, singcolile emehlweni enu, na?
Job 18:4 Wena ozidwengula olakeni lwakho, umhlaba uyakushiywa ngenxa yakho, nedwala lisuswe endaweni yalo, na?
Job 18:5 Yebo, nokukhanya komubi kuyakucimeka, nelangabi lomlilo wakhe aliyikukhanya.
Job 18:6 Ukukhanya kuyakufiphala etendeni lakhe, nesibani sakhe phezu kwakhe siyakucimeka.
Job 18:7 Izinyathelo zakhe ezinamandla ziyakufinyezwa; amasu akhe ayamlahla phansi.
Job 18:8 Ngokuba uyaphonswa yizinyawo zakhe enetheni, uhamba phezu kweveku.
Job 18:9 Isicupho siyakumbamba ngesithende; ifolo liyakumbamba.
Job 18:10 Uthukuselwe inkintshela emhlabathini, nesihibe emgwaqweni.
Job 18:11 Ingebhe iyakumethusa nxazonke; iyamzingela ezinyathelweni zakhe.
Job 18:12 Ububi buyakumlambela, ulungiselwe ingozi eceleni kwakhe.
Job 18:13 Amalungu omzimba wakhe ayakudliwa, yebo, ukufa okwesabekayo kuyakudla amalungu akhe.
Job 18:14 Uyakuhlwithwa etendeni lakhe alethembayo, ayiswe enkosini yengebhe.
Job 18:15 Etendeni lakhe bayakuhlala abangesibo abakhe, kuvumvuzelwe isibabule ekhaya lakhe.
Job 18:16 Izimpande zakhe ziyakoma ngaphansi; phezulu kuyabuna amagatsha akhe.
Job 18:17 Ukukhunjulwa kwakhe kuyakuphela emhlabeni, angabi negama ezweni.
Job 18:18 Uyakukhishwa ekukhanyeni, aqhutshelwe ebumnyameni, axoshwe ezweni.
Job 18:19 Akayikuba nandodana namzukulwana phakathi kwabantu bakhe; akuyikuba khona lapho egogobala khona.
Job 18:20 Abasentshonalanga bayethuswa lusuku lwakhe, nabasempumalanga babanjwa ngukwesaba.
Job 18:21 Impela zinjalo izindlu zaboni; injalo indawo engamazi uNkulunkulu.”
Job 19:1 Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi:
Job 19:2 “Koze kube nini nihlupha umphefumulo wami, ningiphohloze ngamazwi, na?
Job 19:3 Seningihlazisile kayishumi; aninamahloni okuthi ningiphathe kabi na?
Job 19:4 Uma impela ngidukile, ukuduka kwami kukimi ngedwa.
Job 19:5 Uma impela niyazikhukhumezela kimi, niphikisane nami ngehlazo lami,
Job 19:6 yazini-ke ukuthi uNkulunkulu ungihlanekezele, ungihaqe ngenetha.
Job 19:7 Bheka, ngikhala ngithi: ‘Ngubudlova!’ Kepha angiphendulwa; ngicela ukusizwa, kodwa akukho ukwahlulelwa.
Job 19:8 Uvalile indlela yami ukuze ngingabi nakudlula; ubeka ubumnyama emikhondweni yami.
Job 19:9 Ungikhumulile udumo lwami; ususile umqhele ekhanda lami.
Job 19:10 Ungidilizile nxazonke, sengimukile; usiphulile ithemba lami njengomuthi.
Job 19:11 Ungivuthisele intukuthelo yakhe, wangishaya njengezitha kuye.
Job 19:12 Amabutho akhe afika kanyekanye, alungise indlela ukuba angisukele; amisa nxazonke zetende lami.
Job 19:13 “Udedisile kimi abafowethu, nabazana nami sebahlukene impela nami.
Job 19:14 Izihlobo zami zingishiyile, nengazana nabo bangikhohliwe.
Job 19:15 Abagogobele endlini yami nezincekukazi zami bangishaya umfokazi; ngingowezizwe emehlweni abo.
Job 19:16 Ngibiza inceku yami, kayingiphenduli; ngiyayinxusa ngomlomo wami.
Job 19:17 Umoya wami mubi kumkami, ngiyanuka kubantwana besisu sikamame.
Job 19:18 Yebo, nezingane ziyangidelela; uma ngivuka, zikhuluma ngami.
Job 19:19 Ababeyizifuba zami bayanengwa yimi; labo ababengithanda sebengifulathele.
Job 19:20 Amathambo ami anamathela esikhumbeni sami nasenyameni yami; ngisinde ngokulambisa kuphela.
Job 19:21 Ngihawukeleni, ngihawukeleni, nina bangane bami, ngokuba isandla sikaNkulunkulu singithintile.
Job 19:22 Ningizingelelani njengoNkulunkulu, ningasuthi ngenyama yami na?
Job 19:23 “Sengathi amazwi ami angalotshwa! Sengathi angabhalwa encwadini,
Job 19:24 aqoshwe edwaleni ngepeni lensimbi nangomthofu, kuze kube phakade!
Job 19:25 Kepha mina ngiyazi ukuthi uMhlengi wami ukhona; ekupheleni uyakuma othulini.
Job 19:26 Nalapho sesishabalele isikhumba sami, ngiyakumbuka uNkulunkulu ngikhululekile enyameni yami,
Job 19:27 engiyakumbona uqobo lwami; amehlo ami ayakumbona, kungabi njengomfokazi; okuphakathi kwami kuyaphela esifubeni sami.
Job 19:28 Uma nithi: ‘Siyakumxosha yini pho! njengokuba impande yendaba ifumaniseka kimi,’
Job 19:29 yesabani inkemba, ngokuba ulaka lungolwezono ezifanele inkemba, ukuze nazi ukuthi ukwahlulelwa kukhona.”
Job 20:1 Wayesethatha uSofari umNahama, wathi:
Job 20:2 “Ngalokho imicabango yami iyangiphendula ngenxa yokushesha okuphakathi kwami.
Job 20:3 Ngiyezwa insolo engihlazisayo, kepha umoya wasengqondweni yami uyangiphendula.
Job 20:4 “Awukwazi yini ukuba lokhu kungokwasendulo, selokhu abantu babekwa emhlabeni,
Job 20:5 ukuthi ukujabula kwababi kufushane, nokuthokoza kwabangenaNkulunkulu kungokokuphazima kweso nje, na?
Job 20:6 Noma ubukhulu bakhe bukhuphukela ezulwini, nekhanda lakhe lifinyelela emafwini,
Job 20:7 uyakubhubha kuze kube phakade njengamasimba akhe; abambonayo bayakuthi: ‘Uphi na?’
Job 20:8 Uyakundiza njengephupho, angabe esafunyanwa; uyakuxoshwa njengombono wasebusuku.
Job 20:9 Iso elalimgqolozela alisamboni, nendawo yakhe ayisamboni.
Job 20:10 Abantwana bakhe bayakuzincengela kwabampofu, izandla zakhe zibuyise impahla yakhe.
Job 20:11 Amathambo akhe agcwele ubusha, kepha buyakulala phansi kanye naye othulini.
Job 20:12 “Noma ububi bumnandi emlonyeni wakhe, noma ebufihla phansi kolimi lwakhe,
Job 20:13 noma ebugodla engabushiyi, kepha ebugcina emlonyeni wakhe,
Job 20:14 kuyaguquka nokho ukudla kwakhe phakathi kwakhe, kube yinyongo yamabululu ezibilinini zakhe.
Job 20:15 Ugwinyile ingcebo; uyakubuye ayihlanze; uNkulunkulu uyakuyikhipha esiswini sakhe.
Job 20:16 Uyakumunca isihlungu samabululu; ulimi lwenyoka luyakumbulala.
Job 20:17 Akayikubuka imifula, iminonjana nemifudlana yezinyosi namangqanga.
Job 20:18 Lokho owakukhandlekelayo uyakukubuyisa, angakugwinyi; ngempahla ayitholileyo akayikujabula.
Job 20:19 Ngokuba ucindezele, washiya abampofu; uhlwithile indlu, angabuye ayakhe.
Job 20:20 “Ngokuba wayengazi ukuthula esiswini sakhe; kayikuphepha nalutho kulokho akufisayo.
Job 20:21 Akusalanga lutho angaludlanga; ngalokho inhlanhla yakhe ayiyikuma.
Job 20:22 Ekusutheni kokuvama kwakhe uyaminywa; izandla zakho konke ukuhlupheka ziyakumfikela.
Job 20:23 Kuyakuthi lapho eyakugcwalisa isisu sakhe, uNkulunkulu aphonse kuye ukuvutha kwentukuthelo yakhe, akunise phezu kwakhe esekudleni.
Job 20:24 Uyabalekela isikhali sensimbi, kepha ubhotshozwa ngumnsalo wethusi.
Job 20:25 Uyawukhipha uphume emzimbeni wakhe; nxa uphuma unyampuza enyongweni, abesehlelwa yingebhe.
Job 20:26 Ubumnyama bonke bubekelelwe ingcebo yakhe; umlilo ongavuthelwanga uyakuyidla, uchithe okusele etendeni lakhe.
Job 20:27 Izulu liyakwambula ububi bakhe, umhlaba umvukele.
Job 20:28 Imfuyo yendlu yakhe iyakumuka, inyamalale ngomuhla wentukuthelo.
Job 20:29 Lesi siyisabelo somuntu omubi esivela kuNkulunkulu, nefa alinqunyelweyo nguNkulunkulu.”
Job 21:1 Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi:
Job 21:2 “Yizwani nokuzwa amazwi ami; lokhu makube yinduduzo evela kini.
Job 21:3 Ngivumeleni ukuba nami ngikhulume; nalapho sengikhulumile, klolodani.
Job 21:4 “Mina-ke, ukukhala kwami kungomuntu na? Ngingekhathazeke na?
Job 21:5 Ngibukeni, nimangale, nibeke izandla emilonyeni yenu.
Job 21:6 Lapho ngikhumbula nje, ngishaywa luvalo; ukwesaba kubamba inyama yami.
Job 21:7 Ababi baphilelani, baze babe badala, yebo, bakhule emandleni, na?
Job 21:8 Inzalo yabo iyema phambi kwabo kanye nabo, nabantwana babo phambi kwamehlo abo.
Job 21:9 Izindlu zabo zinokuthula, azinangebhe; uswazi lukaNkulunkulu aluphezu kwabo.
Job 21:10 Inkunzi yabo iyakhwela, kayiphuthi; inkomo yabo iyazala, kayiphunzi.
Job 21:11 Bakhipha izingane zabo njengomhlambi; abantwana babo bayagida.
Job 21:12 Bahlabelela ngesigubhu nangehabhu, bathokoza ngezwi lomtshingo.
Job 21:13 Baqeda imihla yabo ngokuhle, behlela endaweni yabafileyo ngokuthula.
Job 21:14 Nokho bathi kuNkulunkulu: ‘Suka kithi, asifuni ukwazi izindlela zakho.
Job 21:15 USomandla uyini ukuba simkhonze na? Siyakuzuzani, uma sikhuleka kuye, na?’
Job 21:16 Bhekani, inhlanhla yabo ayisesandleni sabo; icebo lababi malibe kude nami.
Job 21:17 “Kukangaki isibani sababi sicimeka, nengozi ibehlela, babelwe izabelo ngentukuthelo, na?
Job 21:18 Babeyakuba njengezibi phambi komoya, nanjengamakhoba aphephethwa yisiphepho.
Job 21:19 UNkulunkulu ubekela abantwana babo ububi babo; yebo, kodwa makabuphindisele kubo uqobo ukuba babazi.
Job 21:20 Awabo amehlo mawabone ukuchithwa kwabo, bona baphuze ukufutheka kukaSomandla.
Job 21:21 Banokujabula kuni endlini yabo emva kwabo, lapho umumo wezinyanga zabo usunqunyiwe, na?
Job 21:22 UNkulunkulu uyakufundiswa ukwazi, yena owahlulela abaphakemeyo, na?
Job 21:23 “Omunye ufa esemi kahle kukho konke, ezinzile, enokuthula.
Job 21:24 Izinhlangothi zakhe zigcwele amafutha; umnkantsha wamathambo akhe umanzi.
Job 21:25 Omunye ufa enomphefumulo onomunyu, engazange adle okuhle.
Job 21:26 Balala phansi othulini kanyekanye; izimpethu ziyabasibekela.
Job 21:27 Bhekani, ngiyazi imicabango yenu, namacebo enu eniyakungona ngawo.
Job 21:28 Nithi: ‘Iphi indlu yezikhulu, liphi itende lokuhlala kwababi, na?’
Job 21:29 Anibuzanga abadlula endleleni, nibazi ubufakazi babo
Job 21:30 bokuthi omubi ugodlelwa usuku lokubhujiswa nokuthi bayamukiswa ngosuku lwentukuthelo, na?
Job 21:31 Ngubani oyakumtshela indlela yakhe ebusweni bakhe? Ngubani oyakumphindisela ngalokho akwenzileyo na?
Job 21:32 Uyayiswa ethuneni, kulindwe elibeni.
Job 21:33 Amagabade asesigodini ayakuba mnandi kuye; bonke abantu bayakudonswa emva kwakhe, njengokuba bengenakubalwa nababe phambi kwakhe.
Job 21:34 “Pho, ningiduduzelani ngeze, lokhu ezimpendulweni zenu kusele inkohliso nje, na?”
Job 22:1 Wayesethatha u-Elifazi umThemani, wathi:
Job 22:2 “Umuntu angaba yinsizakalo kuNkulunkulu ukuba ohlakaniphileyo abe nosizo kuye na?
Job 22:3 Kuyintokozo yini kuSomandla, uma ulungile, kuyinzuzo kuye, uma wenza izindlela zakho ziphelele, na?
Job 22:4 “Kungokumesaba kwakho akusolayo, angene nawe ekwahlulelweni, na?
Job 22:5 Ububi bakho abubukhulu yini? Izono zakho azinakuphela.
Job 22:6 Ngokuba uthathe ngeze izibambiso kumfowenu, wahlubula abampofu izingubo zabo.
Job 22:7 Awumphuzisanga owomileyo amanzi, wamgodlela olambileyo ukudla.
Job 22:8 Umuntu onamandla, izwe lingelakhe; onodumo uyahlala kulo.
Job 22:9 Umukisile abafelokazi bengenalutho; izingalo zezintandane zaphuliwe.
Job 22:10 Ngalokho izingibe ziyakuhaqa; uvalo oluzumayo luyakwethusa.
Job 22:11 Ukukhanya kwakho kuphenduke ubumnyama, ukuze ungaboni, nesikhukhula samanzi siyakusibekela.
Job 22:12 “UNkulunkulu akakho ekuphakameni kwezulu na? Bheka inhloko yezinkanyezi ukuthi iphakeme kangaka.
Job 22:13 Uthi wena: ‘UNkulunkulu wazini na? Angahlulela engale kwesigayegaye na?
Job 22:14 Amafu ayamsibekela ukuze angaboni; uyahamba esiyingelezini sezulu.’
Job 22:15 Uyakugcina indlela yamandulo eyahanjwa yizoni na?
Job 22:16 Yizo ezahlwitha kungakabi yisikhathi, ezisisekelo sazo sathululwa njengomfula,
Job 22:17 nezathi kuNkulunkulu: ‘Suka kithina, ngokuba uSomandla ubeyakwenzani kubo na?’
Job 22:18 Kepha nguye owayegcwalisa izindlu zabo ngokuhle. Amasu ababi akude nami.
Job 22:19 “Abalungileyo bayakukubona, bathokoze; abangenasici bayabaklododela ngokuthi:
Job 22:20 ‘Impela ababesivukela sebechithiwe, nabakushiyileyo umlilo ukuqedile.’
Job 22:21 “Mawujwayelane naye, ube nokuthula; ngalokho okuhle kuyakufika kuwe.
Job 22:22 Mawamukele umthetho emlonyeni wakhe, ubeke amazwi akhe enhliziyweni yakho.
Job 22:23 Uma ubuyela kuSomandla, uyakwakhiwa, uma udedisa okubi kude etendeni lakho,
Job 22:24 ubeke igolide lakho othulini, nelase-Ofiri phakathi kwamatshe eminonjana.
Job 22:25 USomandla uyakuba yigugu lakho, nesiliva elikhazimulayo kuwe,
Job 22:26 ngokuba lapho uyakuthokoza ngoSomandla, uphakamisele kuNkulunkulu ubuso bakho.
Job 22:27 Uyakukhuleka kuye, akuzwe, wena ugcwalise izithembiso zakho.
Job 22:28 Uma unquma indaba, uyakuyenzelwa, ukukhanya kukhanye ezindleleni zakho.
Job 22:29 Uma zehla, uyakuthi: ‘Phezulu!’ abesephakanyiswa ozithobileyo.
Job 22:30 Abantu abangemsulwa uyakubakhulula nabo, bakhululwe ngobumhlophe bezandla zakho.”
Job 23:1 Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi:
Job 23:2 “Nanamuhla ukukhala kwami kumunyu; isandla sami siyasinda ngokububula kwami.
Job 23:3 Sengathi ngingazi ukuthi ngiyakumtholaphi, ngize ngifike endlini yakhe,
Job 23:4 ngilungise ukwahlulelwa kwami phambi kwakhe, ngigcwalise umlomo wami ngezimpendulo.
Job 23:5 Bengiyakuwazi amazwi abeyakungiphendula ngawo, ngiqonde ukuthi ubeyakuthini kimi.
Job 23:6 Ubeyakuphikisana nami ngamandla akhe amakhulu na? Cha, ubeyakubhekisa kimi.
Job 23:7 Lapho olungileyo ubeyakuphikisana naye, mina ngikhululwe kumahluleli wami kuze kube phakade.
Job 23:8 Kodwa bheka, ngiya empumalanga, kepha akakho, nasentshonalanga, kepha angimboni,
Job 23:9 nangasenyakatho ekusebenzeni kwakhe, kepha akabonwa; ujikela ngaseningizimu, kepha akabonakali.
Job 23:10 Ngokuba uyayazi indlela yami; esengivivinyile, ngiyakuphuma njengegolide.
Job 23:11 Unyawo lwami lunamathele ezinyathelweni zakhe; ngigcinile indlela yakhe, angiphambukanga.
Job 23:12 Angichezukanga emyalweni wezindebe zakhe; ngizibekele amazwi akhe kunezimiso zami.
Job 23:13 “Kodwa uyinto inye, ngubani ongambuyisa na? Okufisayo umphefumulo wakhe, lokho uyakwenza.
Job 23:14 Uyakufeza engikumiselweyo; izinto eziningi ezinjalo zikuye.
Job 23:15 Ngalokho ngishaywa luvalo ebusweni bakhe; lapho ngikuqaphela, ngiyamesaba.
Job 23:16 NguNkulunkulu odangalisileyo inhliziyo yami, uSomandla ungethusile,
Job 23:17 ngokuba anginqunywanga, bungakafiki ubumnyama; wangifihlela ukuhlwa.
Job 24:1 “Kungani ukuba uSomandla angazibekeleli izikhathi zokwahlulela, abamaziyo babone imihla yakhe, na?
Job 24:2 Imincele iyasuswa; bahlwitha imihlambi, bayiklabise.
Job 24:3 Bamukisa imbongolo yezintandane, nenkomo yomfelokazi bayayithatha ibe yisibambiso.
Job 24:4 Bafuzula abaswelayo endleleni; abampofu bomhlaba bacasha ndawonye.
Job 24:5 Bheka, njengezimbongolo ehlane bayaphumela emisebenzini yabo befunisisa ukudla; ihlane lingukudla kwabo abakunika abantwana babo.
Job 24:6 Emasimini bavuna ifoliji; bakhothoza esivinini somubi.
Job 24:7 Ebusuku balala nqunu bengenangubo, bengenanto yokuzisibekela emakhazeni.
Job 24:8 Bamanzi ngezihlambi zasezintabeni; basingatha idwala bengenasiphephelo.
Job 24:9 Intandane ihlwithwa ebeleni, nengane yompofu ithathwa ibe yisibambiso,
Job 24:10 bahambe nqunu bengenangubo, bethwele izithungu, belambile.
Job 24:11 Benza amafutha phakathi kwezingange zabahluphi; banyathela izikhamo zewayini, kepha bayoma.
Job 24:12 Bexoshwe emzini abafayo bayabubula; imiphefumulo yabalimeleyo iyakhala, kepha uNkulunkulu akanaki lokho okubi.
Job 24:13 “Bakhona abakuhlubukile ukukhanya; abazi indlela yakho, abanamatheli emikhondweni yakho.
Job 24:14 Umbulali uvuka ekuseni, abulale ompofu noswelayo; ebusuku unjengesela.
Job 24:15 Iso lesiphingi libheka ukuhlwa ngokuthi: ‘Malingangiboni iso,’ sisithe ubuso baso.
Job 24:16 Bafohla izindlu sekumnyama; emini bayazivalela; ukukhanya abakwazi.
Job 24:17 Ngokuba ithunzi lokufa kubo bonke labo linjengokusa, lokhu beyazi ingebhe yethunzi lokufa.
Job 24:18 “Banejubane ebusweni bamanzi; izabelo zabo ziqalekisiwe emhlabeni; abasayikuphendukela endleleni yezivini.
Job 24:19 Ukoma nokushisa kuyaqeda amanzi eqhwa; kanjalo indawo yabafileyo labo abonileyo.
Job 24:20 Isizalo siyamkhohlwa; izimpethu ziyamsobozela; akasayikukhunjulwa; ukungalungi kuyaphulwa njengomuthi.
Job 24:21 Uyayidla inyumba engazaliyo; akenzeli umfelokazi okuhle.
Job 24:22 Uyadonsa namaqhawe ngamandla akhe; uyavuka; akakho osenethemba lokuphila.
Job 24:23 UNkulunkulu uyamnika ukuba alondeke, asekelwe; kepha amehlo akhe aphezu kwezindlela zabo.
Job 24:24 Bayaphakanyiswa; emva kwesikhashana abasekho; bayaphela njengabanye, bafe; babuna njengezihloko zezikhwebu.
Job 24:25 “Uma kungenjalo, ngubani ongangenza onamanga, awenze ize amazwi ami, na?”
Job 25:1 Wayesethatha uBilidadi umShuhi, wathi:
Job 25:2 “Ukubusa nokwesabeka kukuye owenza ukuthula ezindaweni zakhe eziphakemeyo.
Job 25:3 Ukhona yini ongabala izimpi zakhe, nokukhanya kwakhe akuphumeli bani na?
Job 25:4 Pho, umuntu angalunga kanjani kuNkulunkulu, nozelwe ngowesifazane angahlambuluka kanjani, na?
Job 25:5 Bheka, nenyanga ayinankazimulo, nezinkanyezi azihlambulukile emehlweni akhe.
Job 25:6 Pho, kakhulu kangakanani umuntu oyimpethu, nendodana yomuntu eyisibungu, na?”
Job 26:1 Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi:
Job 26:2 “Usizile kanjani ongenamandla! Usindisile kanjani ingalo engenamandla?
Job 26:3 Umlulekile kanjani ongenakuhlakanipha! Umemezile kangakanani ukuqonda!
Job 26:4 Utshelwe ngubani lawo mazwi, nomoya kabani waphuma kuwe, na?
Job 26:5 “Izithunzi ziyathuthumela phansi kwamanzi kanye nabakhelwane bawo.
Job 26:6 Indawo yabafileyo ize phambi kwakhe, nendawo yokubhubha ayinasisibekelo.
Job 26:7 Welula inyakatho phezu kwendawo engenalutho; uphanyeka umhlaba phezu kweze.
Job 26:8 Ubopha amanzi emafwini akhe; ifu alidabuki phansi kwawo.
Job 26:9 Uyasibekela ubuso besihlalo sakhe sobukhosi; uyeneka ifu lakhe phezu kwaso.
Job 26:10 Uyingiliza ngomudwa phezu kobuso bamanzi, kuze kuphele ukukhanya ebumnyameni.
Job 26:11 Izinsika zezulu ziyathuthumela; ziyethuswa ngokukhuza kwakhe.
Job 26:12 Ngamandla akhe uyanyakazisa amanzi; ngokuqonda kwakhe uyachitha uRahabi.
Job 26:13 Ngokuphefumula kwakhe izulu liyakhazimula; isandla sakhe sigwazile inyoka esheshayo.
Job 26:14 Bheka, lokhu kungamaphethelo nje ezindlela zakhe, izwi lokunyenyeza nje elizwakalayo ngaye; indumo yamandla akhe, ngubani obeyakuyiqonda na?”
Job 27:1 UJobe wabuye waphakamisa izwi lakhe, wathi:
Job 27:2 “Kuphila kukaNkulunkulu osusile ukwahlulelwa kwami, noSomandla owenze munyu umphefumulo wami,
Job 27:3 kusekhona ukuphefumula kimi, nomoya kaNkulunkulu usemakhaleni ami,
Job 27:4 izindebe zami aziyikukhuluma okubi, nolimi lwami aluyikukhipha inkohliso.
Job 27:5 Makube kude nami ukuba nginivumele; angiyikuzaphuca ukuphelela kwami ngize ngife.
Job 27:6 Ngibambelela ekulungeni kwami, angikuyeki; inhliziyo yami ayisoli nowodwa wemihla yami.
Job 27:7 “Isitha sami masibe njengomubi, nongisukelayo njengowonileyo.
Job 27:8 Liyini ithemba longenaNkulunkulu, nxa enqunywa, lapho uNkulunkulu esusa umphefumulo wakhe, na?
Job 27:9 UNkulunkulu uyakuzwa ukukhala kwakhe, lapho ehlelwa lusizi, na?
Job 27:10 Uyakuthokoza ngoSomandla, ambize uNkulunkulu ngezikhathi zonke, na?
Job 27:11 “Ngiyakunifundisa ngesandla sikaNkulunkulu; okukuSomandla angiyikukufihla.
Job 27:12 Bhekani, nina nonke nikubonile; kungani ukuba nizenze ize na?
Job 27:13 “Lokhu kuyisabelo somuntu omubi kuNkulunkulu, nefa lezidlwangudlwangu ezilamukela kuSomandla.
Job 27:14 Uma abantwana bakhe banda, bandela inkemba; inzalo yakhe ayiyikusutha ngokudla.
Job 27:15 Abasele kuye bayakumbelwa ekufeni, abafelokazi babo bangalili.
Job 27:16 Noma enqwabela isiliva njengothuli, alungise izambatho njengodaka,
Job 27:17 makakulungise, kepha kuyakwembathwa ngolungileyo, ongenacala abele isiliva.
Job 27:18 Uyakha indlu yakhe njengenundu, ibe njengedlangala elakhiwa ngumlindi.
Job 27:19 Uyalala enothile, angakuphindi kodwa; uyavula amehlo akhe, abe engasekho.
Job 27:20 Ingebhe iyamehlela njengamanzi; isivunguvungu siyamphephula ebusuku.
Job 27:21 Umoya wasempumalanga uyamthatha, amuke; uyambhengula endaweni yakhe.
Job 27:22 Uyacibishelwa engahawukelwa; uyabaleka nokubaleka esandleni sakhe.
Job 27:23 Abantu bayakumshayela ihlombe, bamncimfele ukuba asuke endaweni yakhe.
Job 28:1 “Impela ukhona umthapho wesiliva, nendawo yegolide abalicwengayo.
Job 28:2 Insimbi iyakhishwa emhlabathini; amatshe ayancibilikiswa abe yithusi.
Job 28:3 Ubumnyama bubekelwa umkhawulo; kuyacingwa kuze kube sekupheleni konke amatshe esigayegaye nethunzi lokufa.
Job 28:4 Baqhekeza umgodi kude nalapho behlala khona abantu, lapho bekhohlakele khona lunyawo; bayalenga, bajikajika kude nabantu.
Job 28:5 Umhlaba-ke, kuwona kuvela ukudla, kepha ngaphansi kwawo uyaphendukezelwa njengangomlilo.
Job 28:6 Amatshe awo ayindawo yamasafire; inothuli lwegolide.
Job 28:7 Lowo mgudu awaziwa yinqe, neso loheshe aliwubonanga.
Job 28:8 Izilwane ezinkulu azihambanga ngawo, nengonyama ayidlulanga ngawo.
Job 28:9 Uyelulela isandla sakhe etsheni lensengetsha, agumbuqele izintaba kwasezimpandeni zazo.
Job 28:10 Uqhekeza imihohoba emadwaleni; iso lakhe liyabona konke okuyigugu.
Job 28:11 Uyavimba imifula ukuba ingaconsi; imfihlakalo uyayikhiphela ekukhanyeni.
Job 28:12 “Kepha ukuhlakanipha kufumanisekaphi? Iphi indawo yokuqonda na?
Job 28:13 Umuntu kalazi inani lakho; akutholakali ezweni labaphilayo.
Job 28:14 Utwa luthi: ‘Akukho kimi;’ ulwandle luthi: ‘Akukho kimi.’
Job 28:15 Akunakuzuzwa ngegolide; intengo yakho ayinakulinganiswa nesiliva.
Job 28:16 Kungelingane negolide lase-Ofiri, neshohamu eliyigugu, nesafire.
Job 28:17 Igolide nengilazi kungelingane nakho; akunakwenaniswa ngezinto zegolide elicwengekileyo.
Job 28:18 Akunakukhulunywa ngekorali nangekristalu; intengo yakho iphezu kwamarubi.
Job 28:19 Itopazi laseKushe alinakulinganiswa nakho, kungelingane negolide elicwengekileyo.
Job 28:20 “Ukuhlakanipha kuvelaphi na? Indawo yokuqonda iphi na?
Job 28:21 Kusithekile emehlweni abo bonke abaphilayo, kufihliwe ezinyonini zezulu.
Job 28:22 Ukubhujiswa nokufa kuthi: ‘Ngezindlebe zethu sizwile amahemuhemu akho.’
Job 28:23 UNkulunkulu uyaqonda indlela yakho; yena uyazi indawo yakho.
Job 28:24 Ngokuba uyabeka imikhawulo yomhlaba, abone konke okuphansi kwezulu.
Job 28:25 Lapho emisela umoya ukusinda kwawo, elinganisa amanzi ngezilinganiso,
Job 28:26 lapho enzela imvula isimiso, nonyazi lokuduma indlela,
Job 28:27 khona wakubona, walanda ngakho, wakuhlela, wakuphenya.
Job 28:28 Wathi kubantu: ‘Bhekani, ukwesaba iNkosi lokhu kungukuhlakanipha; ukusuka ebubini kungukuqonda.’ ”
Job 29:1 UJobe wabuye waphakamisa izwi lakhe, wathi:
Job 29:2 “Sengathi nga nginjengasezinyangeni zakuqala, njengasemihleni uNkulunkulu angigcina ngayo,
Job 29:3 lapho isibani sakhe sasikhanya phezu kwekhanda lami, ngihamba ebumnyameni ngokukhanya kwakhe,
Job 29:4 yebo, njengasezinsukwini zokuvuthwa kwami, lapho ubuhlobo bukaNkulunkulu babuphezu kwetende lami;
Job 29:5 lapho uSomandla wabe esenami, nabantwana bami babe besangizungeza;
Job 29:6 lapho izinyathelo zami zagezwa ngamangqanga, nedwala elalingakimi langithelela imifula yamafutha.
Job 29:7 “Lapho ngaphuma ngaya esangweni ngasemzini, ngalungisa isihlalo sami esigcawini,
Job 29:8 izinsizwa zangibona, zacasha, nezimpunga zasuka zema,
Job 29:9 izikhulu zayeka ukukhuluma, zabeka izandla emilonyeni yazo;
Job 29:10 izwi labakhulu lathuliswa; izilimi zabo zanamathela olwangeni lwabo.
Job 29:11 Lapho indlebe yangizwa, yangibusisa, nalapho iso langibona, langifakazela.
Job 29:12 Ngokuba ngakhulula abampofu abakhalayo kanye nentandane engenamsizi.
Job 29:13 Isibusiso sobezakubhubha safika phezu kwami; ngenza inhliziyo yomfelokazi ukuba ihube ngokujabula.
Job 29:14 Ngembatha ukulunga, kwaba yisambatho kimi; ukwahlulelwa kwami kwakunjengengubo nomqhele kimi.
Job 29:15 Ngaba ngamehlo ezimpumputhe nezinyawo zezinyonga.
Job 29:16 Nganginguyise wabampofu; indaba yengingamaziyo ngayiphenya.
Job 29:17 Ngaphula imihlathi yowonayo, ngahlwitha impango emazinyweni akhe.
Job 29:18 “Ngase ngithi: ‘Ngiyakufa esidlekeni sami, ngandise izinsuku zami zibe ngangesihlabathi.
Job 29:19 Impande yami iyazivulela amanzi; amazolo alala ubusuku bonke egatsheni lami;
Job 29:20 udumo lwami lusha njalo kimi, umnsalo wami wenziwa musha esandleni sami.’
Job 29:21 “Abantu bangilalela belinda; bathula ngesiluleko sami.
Job 29:22 Emva kwamazwi ami ababe besakhuluma; amazwi ami aconsela phezu kwabo.
Job 29:23 Bangilindela njengemvula; bangikhamisela imilomo yabo njengokukhamisela imvula yamuva.
Job 29:24 Ngabahleka bengenakukholwa; ukukhanya kobuso bami kabakufiphazanga.
Job 29:25 Uma ngangikhethile izindlela zabo, ngangiyakuhlala emqoka, ngahlalisa okwenkosi empini, njengoduduza abalilayo.
Job 30:1 “Kepha manje abancane ngeminyaka kunami bayangihleka, oyise babo engangibadelela ukuba ngingababeki naphakathi kwezinja zezimvu zami.
Job 30:2 Yebo, namandla ezandla zabo angangisiza kanjani, abantu abaphelile iziphika, na?
Job 30:3 Bondile ngokuswela nangendlala; baququda ugwadule oluyize, olwaluyilohle nakuqala.
Job 30:4 Bayakha imifino kasawoti ezihlahleni; izimpande zezinwele zingukudla kwabo.
Job 30:5 Bayaxoshwa phakathi kwabantu; bamemeza emva kwabo njengasemva kwamasela.
Job 30:6 Bahlala ezigodini ezesabekayo, nesemihumeni yomhlaba, naseziweni.
Job 30:7 Bayakhonya phakathi kwezihlahla; phansi kwezimbabazane bayabuthana,
Job 30:8 bengabantwana beziwula, abantwana babangenamagama, beshaywa, bexoshwa ezweni.
Job 30:9 “Manje sengihaywa yibo, yebo, sengiyisaga sabo.
Job 30:10 Bayanengwa yimi, bemi kude nami; abayeki ukungikhafulela ngamathe.
Job 30:11 Bakhululile imichilo yabo, bangithobisa; balahlile itomu phambi kwami.
Job 30:12 Ngakwesokunene kuvuka amachwensa; agudlumeza izinyawo zami, anginqwabelela izindlela zokubhubhisa.
Job 30:13 Achitha umkhondo wami; asebenzela ukubhujiswa kwami engazibambi.
Job 30:14 Angena kungathi ngesikhala esibanzi; phakathi kwencithakalo atheleka phezu kwami.
Job 30:15 Ingebhe ithululwa phezu kwami; njengomoya luyaxoshwa udumo lwami; inhlalakahle yami iyadlula njengefu.
Job 30:16 “Manje umphefumulo wami uthululiwe phakathi kwami; izinsuku zosizi zingibambile.
Job 30:17 Ebusuku amathambo ami ayabhotshozwa, asuke kimi; ubuhlungu obungigedlayo abuphumuli.
Job 30:18 Ngamandla amakhulu umzimba wami wonakele; unamathela kimi njengentamo yesambatho sami.
Job 30:19 Ungiphonsile odakeni; sengifana nothuli nomlotha.
Job 30:20 “Ngikhala kuwe, kepha awungiphenduli; ngimi lapha, uyangibuka nje.
Job 30:21 Uyaguquka ukuze ungiphathe ngonya; ngamandla esandla sakho uyangizingela.
Job 30:22 Uyangiphakamisela emoyeni, ungikhwelisa kuwo, wenze ukuba ngincibilike ngokuhlokoma kwesivunguvungu.
Job 30:23 Ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi ungiyisa ekufeni nasendlini yokubuthana kwabaphilayo bonke.
Job 30:24 “Kepha umuntu angelule isandla sakhe encithakalweni, akhale uma esengozini, na?
Job 30:25 Angimkhalelanga yini ozinsuku zakhe zazilukhuni na? Umphefumulo wami awuhawukelanga abampofu na?
Job 30:26 Lapho ngabheka okuhle, kwafika okubi; ngalindela ukukhanya, kwafika ubumnyama.
Job 30:27 Izibilini zami ziyaxhuxhuzela, aziphumuli; izinsuku zosizi zingehlele.
Job 30:28 Ngihamba ngimnyama, kungenziwanga yilanga; ngisukuma ebandleni ngikhala.
Job 30:29 Ngingumfowabo wamakhanka, nomngane wezintshe.
Job 30:30 Isikhumba sami simnyama, siyebuza kimi; amathambo ami ashile ngokushisa.
Job 30:31 Ihabhu lami seliphenduke isililo, nomtshingo wami uyizwi labakhalayo.
Job 31:1 “Ngenza isivumelwano namehlo ami: ngingabuka kanjani intombi na?
Job 31:2 Ngokuba siyini isabelo ebesiyakuvela kuNkulunkulu phezulu, nefa likaSomandla ebeliyakuvela ekuphakameni, na?
Job 31:3 Akusikho ukubhubha kwabangalungile nengozi kwabenza okubi na?
Job 31:4 Yena akaboni izindlela zami, abale izinyathelo zami zonke, na?
Job 31:5 “Uma ngihambile ngamanga, nonyawo lwami luphuthume enkohlisweni,
Job 31:6 mangilinganiswe ngesilinganiso esilungileyo, ukuze uNkulunkulu azi ukuphelela kwami.
Job 31:7 Uma izinyathelo zami zichezukile endleleni, inhliziyo yami yalandela amehlo ami, uma kunamathela isisihla ezandleni zami,
Job 31:8 mangihlwanyele, kudle omunye, yebo, zisishulwe izithelo zami.
Job 31:9 “Uma inhliziyo yami iyengwe ngowesifazane, ngaqamekela ngasemnyango womakhelwane wami,
Job 31:10 umkami makasilele omunye, kuguqe abanye phezu kwakhe.
Job 31:11 Ngokuba lokho ngabe kuyicala, ngabe kungububi bokujeziswa.
Job 31:12 Ngokuba kungumlilo odlayo kuze kube sekubhujisweni, kusishulwe yonke inzuzo yami.
Job 31:13 “Uma ngidelele ukwahlulelwa kwenceku yami noma okwencekukazi yami, lapho bephikisana nami,
Job 31:14 ngiyakwenze njani, lapho uNkulunkulu evuka, nalapho engiphenya, ngingaphendula ngokuthini na?
Job 31:15 Owangenza mina esiswini, wabenza nabo; owasibumba esizalweni munye.
Job 31:16 “Uma nginqabele abampofu abakufisayo, ngenza amehlo omfelokazi ukuba afiphale,
Job 31:17 ngadla ucezu lwami lwesinkwa ngingedwa, ingaludlanga nentandane
Job 31:18 hhayi, ikhulele kimi kwasebusheni bami njengakuyise; kwasesizalweni sikamame ngangingumholi wabafelokazi
Job 31:19 uma ngibone obhubhile ngokuswela isambatho, kungekho okokuzimboza kompofu;
Job 31:20 uma ukhalo lwakhe lungangibusisanga, uma engafudunyezwanga nguboya bezimvu zami;
Job 31:21 uma ngiphakamisele intandane isandla sami, ngokuba ngabona usizo lwami esangweni,
Job 31:22 maliwe ihlombe lami esiphangeni, nengalo yami yaphulwe enkothweni yayo.
Job 31:23 Ngokuba ngesaba ukubhujiswa nguNkulunkulu; ngenxa yokuphakama kwakhe bengingenakwenza lutho.
Job 31:24 “Uma ngibeke igolide libe yithemba lami, ngathi egolideni elihle: ‘Ngithemba wena;’
Job 31:25 uma ngithokozile, ngokuba imfuyo yami inkulu nangokuba isandla sami sithole okuningi;
Job 31:26 uma ngibone ukukhanya ukuthi kuyakhazimula, nenyanga ukuthi ihamba ngencwazimulo,
Job 31:27 kwayengwa inhliziyo yami esitha, nomlomo wanga isandla sami,
Job 31:28 nalokho kwakungububi bokujeziswa, ngokuba ngangimphikile uNkulunkulu phezulu.
Job 31:29 “Uma ngithokozile ngengozi yongizondayo, ngaxhuma lapho eficwa ngokubi
Job 31:30 kepha angivumelanga ulimi lwami ukuba lone ngokucela ukuphila kwakhe ngesifungo
Job 31:31 uma abantu betende lami bengashongo ukuthi: ‘Ngubani ongathola umuntu ongasuthanga ngenyama yakhe na?’ —
Job 31:32 abafokazi kabalalanga phandle, ngavulela izihambi iminyango yami —
Job 31:33 uma ngisibekele iziphambeko zami njengo-Adamu ngokufihla ububi bami esifubeni sami,
Job 31:34 ngokuba ngesaba isixuku esikhulu, ngaba novalo lokudelelwa ngabomndeni, ngaze ngathula, angaphuma emnyango —
Job 31:35 sengathi angaba khona ongizwayo nantu uphawu lwami, makangiphendule uSomandla — ngibe nencwadi ayilobileyo omelana nami!
Job 31:36 Ngangiyakuyithwala emahlombe ami, ngiyibophe ibe ngumqhele kimi,
Job 31:37 ngimlandise ngomumo wezinyathelo zami, ngisondele kuye njengesikhulu.
Job 31:38 “Uma umhlaba wami ukhalile ngami, nemisele yawo ililile kanyekanye;
Job 31:39 uma ngidlile izithelo zawo ngingenamali, ngenza ukuba bafe abaniniwo,
Job 31:40 makuhlume ikhakhasi esikhundleni sikakolweni, kuvele ukhula endaweni yebhali.” Amazwi kaJobe asephelile.
Job 32:1 Lawo madoda amathathu ayeseyeka ukumphendula uJobe, ngokuba wayelungile emehlweni akhe.
Job 32:2 Lwase luvutha ulaka luka-Elihu, indodana kaBarakeli, umBuzi womndeni kaRamu; ulaka lwakhe lwavuthela uJobe, ngokuba wazithetha yena kunoNkulunkulu.
Job 32:3 Ulaka lwakhe lwavuthela nabangane bakhe abathathu, ngokuba noma bengafumananga impendulo, bamlahla nokho uJobe.
Job 32:4 U-Elihu wayelindele ukukhuluma kuJobe, ngokuba bona babebadala kunaye.
Job 32:5 Lapho u-Elihu esebona ukuthi ayikho impendulo emilonyeni yalawo madoda amathathu, lwavutha ulaka lwakhe.
Job 32:6 U-Elihu, indodana kaBarakeli, umBuzi, wayesethatha-ke, wathi: “Mina ngisemusha ngeminyaka, nina nibadala; ngalokho nganginamahloni, ngesaba ukunitshela umqondo wami.
Job 32:7 Ngathi: ‘Makukhulume izinsuku, ubuningi beminyaka bazise ukuhlakanipha.’
Job 32:8 Nokho kukhona umoya kumuntu; ukuphefumula kukaSomandla kuyabaqondisa.
Job 32:9 Abakhulu abahlakaniphile, nabadala abaqondi ukwahlulela.
Job 32:10 “Ngalokho ngithi: Ngizweni; nami ngiyakusho umqondo wami.
Job 32:11 Bhekani, ngilindele amazwi enu, ngabeka indlebe emiqondweni yenu, nisaphenya eniyakukusho.
Job 32:12 Nganilalela nina; bhekani, kwakungekho noyedwa owamahlula uJobe nowaphendula amazwi akhe phakathi kwenu.
Job 32:13 Maningasho ukuthi: ‘Sifumene ukuhlakanipha; uNkulunkulu angamphengulula, hhayi umuntu.’
Job 32:14 Akahlelelanga mina amazwi akhe; angiyikumphendula ngezinkulumo zenu.
Job 32:15 “Bayakhungatheka, abasaphenduli; baphelelwa ngamazwi.
Job 32:16 Ngibalindele yini, uma bengakhulumi, na? Ngokuba bemi bengasaphenduli.
Job 32:17 Nami ngiyakuphendula okwami, ngitshengise nami umqondo wami.
Job 32:18 Ngokuba ngigcwele amazwi; umoya phakathi kwami uyangiqhubezela.
Job 32:19 Bhekani, okuphakathi kwami kunjengewayini elingenambobo; kucishe ukuqhuma njengezimvaba ezintsha.
Job 32:20 Ngiyakukhuluma ukuba ngikhululeke; ngiyakuvula izindebe zami ukuba ngiphendule.
Job 32:21 Mangingakhethi ubuso bamuntu, ngingathophi nobani.
Job 32:22 Ngokuba angikwazi ukuthopha; uma kunjalo, uMenzi wami angangisusa masinyane.
Job 33:1 “Kepha manje, Jobe mawuzwe amazwi ami,
Job 33:2 Bheka-ke, sengivula umlomo wami; ulimi lwami lukhuluma emlonyeni wami.
Job 33:3 Amazwi ami avela enhliziyweni yami eqotho; okwaziwa yizindebe zami ziyakukhuluma ngesiminya.
Job 33:4 Umoya kaNkulunkulu ungenzile, nokuphefumula kukaSomandla kunginika ukuphila.
Job 33:5 Uma ukwazi, ngiphendule; zihlele phambi kwami, ume.
Job 33:6 Bheka, nginjengawe maqondana noNkulunkulu: ngibunjiwe nami ngebumba.
Job 33:7 Bheka, ingebhe ngami ayiyikukugebhezisa, nesandla sami esiphezu kwakho asiyikukusinda.
Job 33:8 “Impela wakhuluma ezindlebeni zami, ngezwa izwi lokukhuluma kwakho ukuthi:
Job 33:9 Ngimsulwa, anginasiphambeko; ngimhlophe, akukho okubi kimi.
Job 33:10 Bheka, uthola amathuba ngami, ungishaya isitha sakhe.
Job 33:11 Ufaka izinyawo zami ezingongolweni, aqaphele zonke izindlela zami.
Job 33:12 “Bheka, ngiyakuphendula ukuthi awuthethanga kahle lokho, ngokuba uNkulunkulu mkhulu kunomuntu.
Job 33:13 Umphikiselani ngokuthi: Akaphenduli nelilodwa lamazwi ami.
Job 33:14 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukhuluma kanye, yebo, nakabili, umuntu engakunaki.
Job 33:15 Ephusheni nasembonweni wasebusuku, lapho abantu behlelwe ngubuthongo obunzima, bozela emacansini,
Job 33:16 khona uyavula izindlebe zabantu, abeke uphawu ekufundisweni kwabo,
Job 33:17 ukuze aphambukise umuntu ekwenzeni kwakhe, anqume ukuzidla kumuntu;
Job 33:18 unqanda umphefumulo wakhe ekubhujisweni, nokuphila kwakhe ukuba kungachithwa ngomkhonto.
Job 33:19 Uyajeziswa ngobuhlungu nasecansini lakhe, nangokulwa okungapheliyo emathanjeni akhe.
Job 33:20 Inhliziyo iyanengwa ngukudla, nomphefumulo wakhe uzonda ukudla okade ukufisa.
Job 33:21 Inyama yakhe iyadliwa, ingabe isabonwa; amathambo akhe akade engabonakali aseqhamukile.
Job 33:22 Umphefumulo wakhe uyasondela egodini, nokuphila kwakhe kubabulali.
Job 33:23 “Uma kukhona ingelosi kuye, nehumusha noma yiliphi enkulungwaneni lokuba litshele umuntu okumlungeleyo,
Job 33:24 uNkulunkulu abeseba nomusa kuye, athi: ‘Mkhulule ukuba angehleli egodini, sengitholile ihlawulo,’
Job 33:25 inyama yakhe ibe ntsha kuneyomntwana, abuyele emihleni yobusha bakhe,
Job 33:26 khona uyakunxusa uNkulunkulu ukuba abe nomusa kuye, abone ubuso bakhe ngokujabula, abesebuyisela kumuntu ukulunga kwakhe.
Job 33:27 Usehlabelela phambi kwabantu, uthi: ‘Ngonile, ngahlanekezela ukulunga, kepha akwenziwanga kimi njengokufaneleyo:
Job 33:28 uhlengile umphefumulo wami ukuba ungadluleli egodini; ngiyakubona ukukhanya ngiphila.’
Job 33:29 “Bhekani, konke lokhu uNkulunkulu uyakwenza kabili, yebo, kathathu kumuntu
Job 33:30 ukuba abuyise umphefumulo wakhe egodini, akhanyiselwe ngokukhanya kwabaphilayo.
Job 33:31 Yizwa, Jobe, ungilalele; thula, mina ngizakukhuluma.
Job 33:32 Uma unamazwi, ngiphendule; khuluma, ngokuba ngifisa ukukuthethelela.
Job 33:33 Uma ungenawo, ngilalele wena; thula, ngiyakukufundisa ukuhlakanipha.”
Job 34:1 U-Elihu wathatha wathi:
Job 34:2 “Yizwani amazwi ami, nina zihlakaniphi, nibeke indlebe kimi nina zazi.
Job 34:3 Ngokuba indlebe iyavivinya amazwi, njengokuba ulwanga luzwa ukudla.
Job 34:4 Masizikhethele okulungileyo, sazi phakathi kwethu okuhle.
Job 34:5 Ngokuba uJobe uthe: ‘Ngilungile; uNkulunkulu ususile ukwahlulelwa kwami.
Job 34:6 Phezu kokwahlulelwa kwami ngishaywa onamanga; inxeba lami alinakupholiswa, noma ngingenasiphambeko.’
Job 34:7 Ngumuphi umuntu onjengoJobe ophuza usulu njengamanzi,
Job 34:8 ohamba ngokwazana nabenza okubi, ahambisane nabantu ababi, na?
Job 34:9 Ngokuba uthi: ‘Akunalusizo kumuntu ukuba azane noNkulunkulu.’
Job 34:10 “Ngalokho ngizweni nina bantu abanokuqonda; makube kude noNkulunkulu ukuba enze okubi, nakuSomandla ukuba enze ukona.
Job 34:11 Ngokuba uyabuyisela kumuntu njengokwenza kwakhe, atholise kube yilowo nalowo njengezindlela zakhe.
Job 34:12 Impela uNkulunkulu akenzi okubi; uSomandla kahlanekezeli ukwahlulela.
Job 34:13 Ngubani owambeka phezu komhlaba na? Ngubani owamisa izwe lonke na?
Job 34:14 Uma ebeyakuzibheka yena, azibuyisele umoya wakhe nomphefumulo wakhe,
Job 34:15 inyama yonke ibiyakufa kanyekanye, umuntu abuyele othulini.
Job 34:16 “Uma unengqondo, yizwa lokhu, ulalele izwi lokukhuluma kwami.
Job 34:17 Imbala ozonda ukwahlulela uyakubusa na? Uyakumlahla olungileyo nonamandla
Job 34:18 oshoyo enkosini ukuthi: ‘Muntu omubi,’ nasezikhulwini: ‘Mashinga,’
Job 34:19 ongakhethi ubuso bezikhulu, onganaki ocebileyo kunompofu, na? Ngokuba bonke bangumsebenzi wezandla zakhe.
Job 34:20 Bayafa ngokuphazima kweso; phakathi kwamabili abantu bayathuthumela, banyamalale; amaqhawe ayasuswa, kepha kungengasandla.
Job 34:21 “Ngokuba amehlo akhe akuzo izindlela zomuntu; ubona zonke izinyathelo zakhe.
Job 34:22 Abukho ubumnyama, nethunzi lokufa alikho, lapho abenza okubi bengacasha khona.
Job 34:23 Ngokuba akadingi ukuba abelokhu ebheka umuntu ukuba aye kuNkulunkulu ukwahlulelwa.
Job 34:24 Uyaphahlaza abanamandla, kungahlolwanga, amise abanye ezikhundleni zabo.
Job 34:25 Ngalokho uyazi imisebenzi yabo; uyabagumbuqela ebusuku, bachotshozwe.
Job 34:26 Uyabashaya njengababi endaweni lapho bebonwa khona,
Job 34:27 ngokuba bachezuka ekumlandeleni, abanakanga neyodwa yezindlela zakhe,
Job 34:28 baze benza ukuba ukukhala kwabampofu kufike kuye, wezwa ukukhala kwabahluphekayo.
Job 34:29 Lapho yena ethula, ngubani ongalahla, nalapho ethukusa ubuso bakhe, ngubani ongambona na? Ubusa ngokufananayo, noma kuyisizwe noma kungumuntu,
Job 34:30 ukuba kungabusi muntu ongenaNkulunkulu, abantu bacushwe.
Job 34:31 “Ngokuba ukhona oke wathi kuNkulunkulu: ‘Ngithweswe icala noma ngingonanga, na?
Job 34:32 Lokhu engingakuboni, ngifundise khona; uma ngenzile okubi, angisayikukuphinda.’
Job 34:33 Uyakuphindisela njengokuthanda kwakho, lokhu ukwenqaba, na? Ngokuba nguwe ozakukhetha, akusimina; khuluma okwaziyo.
Job 34:34 “Abantu abanokuqonda bayakusho kimi, yebo, nezihlakaniphi, lapho zingizwa, ziyakuthi:
Job 34:35 ‘UJobe ukhuluma engenalwazi; amazwi akhe awanangqondo.’
Job 34:36 Sengathi uJobe angavivinywa kuze kube sekupheleni, ngokuba uphendula njengabantu ababi.
Job 34:37 Ngokuba uyenezela ukuhlubuka esonweni sakhe; ushaya ihlombe phakathi kwethu, andise amazwi akhe kuNkulunkulu.”
Job 35:1 U-Elihu wathatha wathi:
Job 35:2 “Usho uthi lokhu kulungile na? Uthi: ‘Yilungelo lami kuNkulunkulu yini,’
Job 35:3 njengokuba uthi: ‘Kungisiza ngani?’ nokuthi: ‘Ngizuzeni kunalokho ebengiyakukuzuza, uma ngonile, na?’
Job 35:4 “Ngizakukuphendula mina ngamazwi, wena nabangane bakho.
Job 35:5 Bheka ngasezulwini, ubone, uqaphele amafu aphakeme kunawe.
Job 35:6 Uma wona, wenzani kuye na? Uma iziphambeko zakho ziziningi, wenzani kuyena na?
Job 35:7 Uma ulungile, umnikani yena, noma umukelani esandleni sakho na?
Job 35:8 Ububi bakho buqondene nomuntu onjengawe, nokulunga kwakho kuthintana nendodana yomuntu.
Job 35:9 “Abantu bakhala ngobuningi bezinkahlo; bakhala ngokusizwa ngenxa yengalo yabanamandla.
Job 35:10 Kepha akakho othi: ‘Uphi uNkulunkulu, uMenzi wami, ozwakalisa amahubo ebusuku,
Job 35:11 osifundisa phezu kwezilwane zomhlaba, asenze sihlakaniphe phezu kwezinyoni zezulu.’
Job 35:12 Lapho bayakhala ngokuzidla kwababi, kepha akaphenduli.
Job 35:13 Impela uNkulunkulu akezwa okuyize, uSomandla akayikukunakekela;
Job 35:14 kakhulu kangakanani, lapho uthi awumboni nokuthi, noma icala liphambi kwakhe, usamhlalela, na?
Job 35:15 Kepha manje, ngokuba intukuthelo yakhe ingajezisi, anganaki kakhulu iziphambeko,
Job 35:16 uJobe uvulela ize umlomo wakhe; uyandisa amazwi engenalwazi.”
Job 36:1 U-Elihu waqhubeka wathi:
Job 36:2 “Ngihlalele kancane, ngiyakukubonisa, ngokuba ngisenamazwi okummela uNkulunkulu.
Job 36:3 Ngiyakulanda kude ulwazi lwami, nginike uMenzi wami ukulunga.
Job 36:4 Impela amazwi ami awasiwo amanga; unawe ophelele ekwazini.
Job 36:5 “Bheka, uNkulunkulu unamandla, kepha kadeleli muntu; mkhulu emandleni okuqonda.
Job 36:6 Akenzi ukuba omubi aphile, kepha abampofu uyabanika ukwahlulelwa.
Job 36:7 Akabuyisi amehlo akhe kwabalungileyo, kepha ubahlalisa namakhosi ezihlalweni zobukhosi, baphakame kuze kube phakade.
Job 36:8 Uma beboshwa ngamaketanga, babanjwe ngezintambo zokuhlupheka,
Job 36:9 uyababonisa izenzo zabo neziphambeko zabo zokuthi baziphakamisile.
Job 36:10 Uyavulela izindlebe zabo ukulaywa, asho ukuba babuye ebubini.
Job 36:11 Uma belalela, bamkhonze, bayakuqeda imihla yabo ebuhleni neminyaka yabo kukho okumnandi.
Job 36:12 Kepha uma bengalaleli, bayakuphela ngenkemba, bafe bengenalwazi.
Job 36:13 “Abangesabi ngenhliziyo baqongelela ulaka; abakhali lapho ebabopha.
Job 36:14 Bafa besebasha, ukuphila kwabo kube njengokwezifebe zethempeli.
Job 36:15 Ukhulula ompofu ngobumpofu bakhe, avule indlebe yabo ngokuhlupheka.
Job 36:16 “Yebo, nga ekuvusa ukuba uphume emlonyeni wosizi, uye endaweni ebanzi, lapho kungekho kunyinyeka khona, kunone okubekwa etafuleni lakho.
Job 36:17 Kepha ugcwele ukwahlulelwa kwababi; ukwahlulela nokulunga kuyakubamba.
Job 36:18 Xwaya ukuba ulaka lungakuvusi usashaywa, ungachezukiswa ngobuningi bamahlawulo.
Job 36:19 Ukukhala kwakho kungakusiza ukuba ungahlali osizini, nazo zonke izikhwepha zamandla akho, na?
Job 36:20 Ungafisi ubusuku, lapho abantu beyakususwa ezindaweni zabo.
Job 36:21 Xwaya ukuba ungabhekisi ubuso bakho ebubini, ngokuba ukhethile lokho kunokuhlupheka.
Job 36:22 “Bheka, uNkulunkulu uphakeme ngamandla akhe; ngubani ofundisa njengaye na?
Job 36:23 Ngubani ommisele indlela yakhe na? Ngubani ongasho ukuthi: ‘Wenzile okubi,’ na?
Job 36:24 Khumbula ukukhulisa izenzo zakhe abahlabelela ngazo abantu.
Job 36:25 Bonke abantu bayazibona; abokufa bayazibuka besekude.
Job 36:26 Bheka, uNkulunkulu uphakeme, asimqondi; umumo weminyaka yakhe ayinakuphenywa.
Job 36:27 “Wenyusa amathonsi amanzi, abuye awathulule njengemvula enkungwini yakhe;
Job 36:28 amafu awenza ukuba aconse, awathele phezu kwabantu abaningi.
Job 36:29 Ukhona ongaqonda ukwenekeka kwamafu nokuduma kwedokodo lakhe na?
Job 36:30 Bheka, uyasakaza ukukhanya kwakhe ngakuye; uyasibekela ubuphansi bolwandle.
Job 36:31 Ngokuba ngalokho uyabahlulela abantu, aphane kakhulu ngokudla.
Job 36:32 Uyasibekela izandla zakhe ngokukhanya, akuyale ukuba kushaye isigcibisholo.
Job 36:33 Umsindo wakhe ulanda ngaye oshisekela ububi ngentukuthelo.
Job 37:1 “Yebo, ngenxa yalokho iyathuthumela inhliziyo yami, isuke endaweni yayo.
Job 37:2 Yizwani, nizwe indumo yezwi lakhe, nemvunge ephuma emlonyeni wakhe.
Job 37:3 Uyakukhipha phansi kwalo lonke izulu, nonyazi lwakhe luya emagumbini omhlaba.
Job 37:4 Emva kwalo kuduma izwi; uduma ngezwi lobukhosi bakhe; kalumisi unyazi, lapho lizwakala izwi lakhe.
Job 37:5 UNkulunkulu uyaduma ngezwi lakhe ngokumangalisayo; wenza izinto ezinkulu esingaziqondi.
Job 37:6 Ngokuba uthi eqhweni: ‘Khithika emhlabeni;’ kanjalo nasesihlambini semvula, yebo, ezihlambini zemvula zakhe ezinamandla.
Job 37:7 Uyanamathelisa izandla zabantu bonke ukuba bonke abantu bazi imisebenzi yakhe.
Job 37:8 Seziya izilwane ezikhundleni zazo, zihlale emihumeni yazo.
Job 37:9 Isikhwishikhwishi siphuma ekamelweni laso, namakhaza emimoyeni ehlakazayo.
Job 37:10 Ngokuphefumula kukaNkulunkulu kuvela ungqoqwane, ububanzi bamanzi buqine.
Job 37:11 Yebo, uyathwesa amafu ngokuswakama; uyeneka amafu onyazi lwakhe.
Job 37:12 Ayajika, aphenduke njengokunquma kwakhe ukuba enze konke awayalayo ebusweni bomhlaba owakhiweyo,
Job 37:13 awafikise abe luswazi, afike ngenxa yomhlaba noma ngenxa yomusa.
Job 37:14 “Beka indlebe kulokhu, Jobe; yima, uqonde izimangaliso zikaNkulunkulu.
Job 37:15 Uyazi yini ukuthi uNkulunkulu uwayala kanjani, enze ukuba unyazi lwamafu akhe lukhanye na?
Job 37:16 Uyaqonda yini ukulinganiswa kwamafu, izimangaliso zoPhelele olwazini,
Job 37:17 wena ozingubo zakho zifudumala, lapho ethulisa umhlaba ngeshisandlu, na?
Job 37:18 Ungeneka isibhakabhaka njengaye, esiqinile njengesibuko esibunjiweyo, na?
Job 37:19 Sifundise ukuthi siyakuthini kuye; asinakuhlela indaba yethu ngenxa yobumnyama.
Job 37:20 Uyakutshelwa ukuthi ngiyakhuluma na? Ukhona yini oshoyo ukuthi makabhubhe na?
Job 37:21 Manje, abantu abanakukubona ukukhanya okukhazimula esibhakabhakeni,
Job 37:22 Ngasenyakatho kuvela inkazimulo yegolide; uNkulunkulu wembethe ubukhosi obesabekayo.
Job 37:23 USomandla singemqonde; mkhulu ngamandla nangokwahlulela; ngokulunga kwakhe okukhulu akoni lutho.
Job 37:24 Ngalokho abantu bayamesaba; kepha akanaki abazishaya izihlakaniphi ngenhliziyo.”
Job 38:1 UJehova wayesemphendula uJobe esesikhwishikhwishini, ethi:
Job 38:2 “Ngubani lo owenza mnyama isiluleko ngamazwi angenalwazi na?
Job 38:3 Bopha izinkalo zakho njengendoda; ngizakukubuza, wena ungazise.
Job 38:4 Wawukuphi, lapho ngasekela umhlaba, na? Ngitshele, uma ukwazi ukuqonda.
Job 38:5 Ngubani owanquma izilinganiso zawo, ngokuba uyakwazi phela! Ngubani owelula umucu wokulinganisa phezu kwawo na?
Job 38:6 Izisekelo zawo zabekwa phezu kwani na? Ngubani owabeka itshe lawo legumbi,
Job 38:7 lapho izinkanyezi zokusa zahlabelela kanyekanye, nawo onke amadodana kaNkulunkulu ajabula, na?
Job 38:8 “Ngubani owavalela ulwandle ngezicabha, lapha lwabhoboka kungathi lwaphuma esiswini,
Job 38:9 lapho ngabeka amafu aba yisambatho salo, nesigayegaye saba yimbeleko yalo,
Job 38:10 nalapho ngalumisela umncele wami, ngamisa imigoqo nezicabha,
Job 38:11 ngathi: ‘Uyakufika lapha, kepha ungadluli; lapha amaza akho aziqhenyayo ayakumiswa,’ na?
Job 38:12 “Emihleni yakho uyalile ukusa, wazisa umthende wokusa indawo yawo
Job 38:13 ukuba ubambe amagumbi omhlaba, ababi bathintithwe kuwo, na?
Job 38:14 Uguquka njengebumba lophawu lokunamathelisa; konke kuqhamuka kungathi kwembesiwe.
Job 38:15 Ababi sebenqatshelwe ukukhanya kwabo, nengalo ephakemeyo yaphuliwe.
Job 38:16 “Wake wangena emithonjeni yolwandle, wahamba phansi otweni, na?
Job 38:17 Amasango okufa uwavulelwe, wabona amasango ethunzi lokufa, na?
Job 38:18 Uqondile ububanzi bomhlaba na? Yisho, uma ukwazi konke.
Job 38:19 “Iphi indlela eya lapho kuhlala khona ukukhanya, nobumnyama-ke, iphi indawo yabo,
Job 38:20 ukuze ukuyise emkhawulweni wakho, uqonde imikhondo yendlu yakho, na?
Job 38:21 Angithi uyakwazi, ngokuba wawusuzelwe, nomumo wemihla yakho mkhulu, na?
Job 38:22 “Wake wangena ezinqolobaneni zeqhwa, wabona izinqwaba zesichotho,
Job 38:23 engiziqongelele isikhathi sokuhlupheka nosuku lokulwa nolwempi, na?
Job 38:24 Iphi indlela eya lapho ukukhanya kwahlukaniselwa khona, nalapho umoya wasempumalanga uhlakazekela khona emhlabeni, na?
Job 38:25 Ngubani ovulele ukuchichima kwamanzi umsele nonyazi lokuduma indlela,
Job 38:26 ukunisa imvula emhlabeni lapho kungekho muntu khona, nasehlane elingenamuntu,
Job 38:27 ukusuthisa ihlane kwahlongasibi, nokuhlumisa uhlaza, na?
Job 38:28 Kukhona uyise wemvula na? Ngubani owazala amathonsi amazolo na?
Job 38:29 Iqhwa lavela esiswini sikabani, nesithwathwa sazalwa ngubani, na?
Job 38:30 Amanzi ayacasha kungathi ayitshe; ubuso botwa buhlangene.
Job 38:31 “Ungabopha amaketanga esiLimela, uthukulule izintambo zeMpambano, na?
Job 38:32 Ungakhipha izinkanyezi ngesikhathi sazo, uhole iBhere nabantwana balo, na?
Job 38:33 Uyazazi izimiso zasezulwini, umise ukumisa kwazo emhlabeni, na?
Job 38:34 “Ungaphakamisela izwi lakho emafwini, ukuze amanzi amaningi akusibekele, na?
Job 38:35 Ungathuma imibani ukuba ihambe, isho kuwe, ithi: ‘Bheka, silapha’?
Job 38:36 Ngubani obeke ukuhlakanipha phakathi komuntu, ngubani onika ukuqonda enhliziyweni na?
Job 38:37 Ngubani ongabala amafu ngokuhlakanipha, ngubani ongathulula izimvaba zasezulwini,
Job 38:38 lapho uthuli luphenduka isigaxa, namagabade anamathelane, na?
Job 38:39 “Uyazingelela ibhubesikazi impango, usuthise iphango lamabhongo,
Job 38:40 lapho elala emihumeni yawo, ehlezi esikhundleni eqamekele, na?
Job 38:41 Ngubani olungisela igwababa ukudla kwalo, lapho amaphuphu alo ekhala kuNkulunkulu, ezulazula ngokuswela ukudla, na?
Job 39:1 “Uyazi yini isikhathi sokuzala kwamagogo, uqaphela ukuzala kwezindluzelekazi, na?
Job 39:2 Ungazibala izinyanga eziziqedayo, uyasazi isikhathi ezizala ngaso, na?
Job 39:3 Ziyakhonkobala, zizala amazinyane azo, zikhiphe okwemihlelo yazo.
Job 39:4 Amazinyane azo aqina, akhulela endle; ayahamba, angabe esabuyela kuzo futhi.
Job 39:5 “Ngubani ovumele imbongolo yasendle ukuba ihambe; ngubani owathukulula izintambo zayo,
Job 39:6 engenza ihlane libe yindlu yayo, nezwe likasawoti libe yindawo yayo yokuhlala, na?
Job 39:7 Ihleka umsindo wedolobha, ingezwa ukumemeza komshayeli.
Job 39:8 Okufunyanwa ezintabeni kuyidlelo layo: ifuna zonke izinto eziluhlaza.
Job 39:9 “Inyathi iyakuthanda ukukhonza, ihlale ebusuku emkhombeni wakho, na?
Job 39:10 Ungayibophela inyathi ngentambo emseleni, ibhuqe izigodi emva kwakho, na?
Job 39:11 Ungayethemba, ngokuba amandla ayo makhulu, ushiye umshikashika wakho kuyo, na?
Job 39:12 Ungakholwa yiyo ukuba ibuyise imbewu yakho, iyibuthele esibuyeni sakho, na?
Job 39:13 “Amaphiko entshe ayaphaphaza, kepha angamakhombe nezimpaphe zothando na?
Job 39:14 Ngokuba iyashiya amaqanda ayo emhlabathini, iwafudumeze othulini.
Job 39:15 Iyakhohlwa ukuthi unyawo lungawachoboza nokuthi isilwane sasendle singawanyathela.
Job 39:16 Iphatha kalukhuni amazinyane ayo, kungathi awasiwo awayo; ayinangebhe yokuthi umshikashika wayo ungaba yize.
Job 39:17 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu wayenza ukuba ikhohlwe ukuhlakanipha, akayabelanga ukuqonda.
Job 39:18 Lapho indizela phezulu, ihleka amahhashi nabagibeli bawo.
Job 39:19 “Nguwe onika ihhashi amandla alo, wembathisile intamo yalo umhlwenga oyephuzelayo, na?
Job 39:20 Ulenze ukuba lixhume njengenkumbi na? Indumo yokuthimula kwalo iyesabeka.
Job 39:21 Liyaphanda ezigodini, liyesasa ngamandla alo, liyaphuma ukuhlangana nezimpi.
Job 39:22 Liyahleka ingebhe, alesabi, alibuyi phambi kwenkemba.
Job 39:23 Isambo siyalikhehlezela nomkhonto okhazimulayo, nengcula.
Job 39:24 Ngolaka lwalo nangokufutheka kwalo liyagwinya umhlabathi; alimi ngokukhala kwecilongo.
Job 39:25 Ekuzwakaleni kwecilongo lithi: ‘Nakho-ke;’ lihogela ukulwa kusekude, nendumo yezinduna nokumemeza kwazo.
Job 39:26 “Uklebe uyandiza ngokuqonda kwakho, awelulele ngaseningizimu amaphiko akhe, na?
Job 39:27 Ukhozi lwenyukela phezulu ngezwi lakho, lwakhe isidleke salo phezulu, na?
Job 39:28 Luhlala esiweni, lwakha khona, eweni ledwala eliyinqaba yalo.
Job 39:29 Lulapho luhlola ukudla kwalo; amehlo alo akubona kusekude.
Job 39:30 Amazinyane alo amunca igazi; lapho kukhona abagwaziweyo, lukhona nalo.”
Job 40:1 UJehova wayesemphendula uJobe, wathi:
Job 40:2 “Osolayo uyakuphikisana noSomandla na? Omkhuza uNkulunkulu makaphendule.”
Job 40:3 UJobe wamphendula uJehova, wathi:
Job 40:4 “Bheka, angiyinto yalutho; ngingakuphendula ngokuthini na? Ngibeka isandla sami emlonyeni wami.
Job 40:5 Ngikhulumile kanye, angisayikuphendula, yebo, kabili, kepha angiqhubeki.”
Job 40:6 UJehova wayesemphendula uJobe esesikhwishikhwishini, wathi:
Job 40:7 “Bopha izinkalo zakho njengendoda; ngizakukubuza, wena ungazise.
Job 40:8 Imbala uyachitha ukwahlulela kwami, ungilahle ukuba ube ngolungileyo, na?
Job 40:9 Unengalo njengoNkulunkulu, ungaduma ngezwi elinjengelakhe, na?
Job 40:10 Zihlobise ngobukhosi nangokuphakama, wembathe udumo nenkazimulo.
Job 40:11 Thulula ukuphuphuma kwentukuthelo yakho, ubheke bonke abazidlayo, ubathobise.
Job 40:12 Bheka bonke abaziphakamisayo, ubehlise phansi, unyathele ababi ezindaweni zabo.
Job 40:13 Bafihle othulini kanyekanye, ubophe ubuso babo endaweni ethukusiweyo.
Job 40:14 Khona ngiyakukudumisa nami ngokuthi isandla sakho sokunene singakusindisa.
