Job 40:15 “Ake ubheke uBehemoti engamenza kanye nawe; uyadla utshani njengenkabi.
Job 40:16 Bheka-ke, amandla akhe asezinkalweni zakhe, nezikhwepha zakhe zisemisipheni yesisu sakhe.
Job 40:17 Uqinisa umsila wakhe njengomsedari; imisipha yamathanga akhe yalukene.
Job 40:18 Amathambo akhe anjengemibhobo yethusi; izimbambo zakhe zinjengemigoqo yensimbi.
Job 40:19 Ungowokuqala wezidalwa zikaNkulunkulu; ekwenziweni waphiwa inkemba yakhe.
Job 40:20 Izintaba ziyamvezela ukudla, lapho kudlala khona izilwane zonke zasendle.
Job 40:21 Ulala phansi kwezihlahla ezinomthunzi ekusitheni kwemihlanga nasemaxhaphozini.
Job 40:22 Izihlahla ezinomthunzi ziyamsibekela ngomthunzi wazo; iminyezane yasemfuleni iyamphahla.
Job 40:23 Bheka, noma kuphuphuma umfula, akethuki; uyaqalaba, noma iJordani ligijigijimela emlonyeni wakhe.
Job 40:24 Angabanjwa ebhekile, liqhunjuzelwe ikhala lakhe umkhala, na?
Job 41:1 “Ungakhipha uLeviyathani ngodobo, ucindezele phansi ulimi lwakhe ngentambo, na?
Job 41:2 Ungafaka igoda lomhlanga ekhaleni lakhe, ubhoboze umhlathi wakhe ngodobo, na?
Job 41:3 Uyakwenza imikhuleko eminingi kuwe, akhulume kuwe amazwi athambileyo, na?
Job 41:4 Uyakwenza isivumelwano nawe ukuba umthathe abe yinceku kuze kube phakade na?
Job 41:5 Ungadlala naye njengenyoni, umbophele amantombazana akho, na?
Job 41:6 Abathengi bangathengiselana ngaye, bamahlukanise phakathi kwabahwebi, na?
Job 41:7 Ungagcwalisa isikhumba sakhe ngezinhlendla, nekhanda lakhe ngamathatha ezinhlanzi, na?
Job 41:8 Beka isandla sakho kuye; khumbula ukulwa; awusayikukuphinda.
Job 41:9 Bheka, ithemba lakho liyakhohlisa; nangokumbona nje uyawiswa phansi.
Job 41:10 Akakho onesibindi sokumvusa. Ngubani, pho, ongema phambi kwami na?
Job 41:11 Ngubani ongandulele ukuba ngimbuyisele na? Konke okuphansi kwezulu kungokwami.
Job 41:12 “Angiyikuthula ngezitho zakhe, nangendaba yamandla akhe, nangesimo sakhe esihle.
Job 41:13 Ngubani ongakhumula isambatho sakhe esingaphandle; ngubani ongangena phakathi kwemihlathi yakhe emibili na?
Job 41:14 Izicabha zobuso bakhe ngubani ongazivula na? Amazinyo akhe ayesabeka nxazonke.
Job 41:15 Umhlane wakhe uyizinhla zezihlangu; zinamathelisiwe njengangophawu.
Job 41:16 Zisondelene esinye kwesinye, kungangeni moya phakathi kwazo.
Job 41:17 Zinamathelene; zibambelene, azinakwahlukaniswa.
Job 41:18 Ukuthimula kwakhe kubengezela ngokukhanya; amehlo akhe anjengezinkophe zokusa.
Job 41:19 Emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma izihlanti, nezinhlansi zomlilo ziyaqhasha.
Job 41:20 Emakhaleni akhe kuphuma umusi njengasesocweni esibilayo nasemihlangeni eshayo.
Job 41:21 Ukuphefumula kwakhe kokhela amalahle, nelangabi liphuma emlonyeni wakhe.
Job 41:22 Entanyeni yakhe kuhlala amandla, nengebhe iyaxhuma phambi kwakhe.
Job 41:23 Amanya enyama yakhe anamathelene; abunjiwe kuye, awanakususwa.
Job 41:24 Inhliziyo yakhe iqinile njengetshe, yebo, iqinile njengetshe lokusila elingaphansi.
Job 41:25 Ekuvukeni kwakhe abanamandla bayesaba; ngenxa yevuso baphela amandla.
Job 41:26 Noma inkemba ifinyelela kuye, ayinakusiza, noma umkhonto nomcibisholo nengcula.
Job 41:27 Insimbi uyishaya utshani, nethusi ibunga.
Job 41:28 Umcibisholo awunakumxosha; amatshe endwayimana aphenduka amabibi kuye.
Job 41:29 Izagila uzishaya amabibi; uyahleka ukugunquza kwengcula.
Job 41:30 Ingaphansi lakhe linjengezindengezi ezibukhali; uyenaba njengesibhuqo odakeni.
Job 41:31 Wenza inzulu ibile njengekhanzi; wenza ulwandle lufane nomfuma wamafutha.
Job 41:32 Wenza umgudu ukhazimule emva kwakhe; kungathi utwa lungwevu.
Job 41:33 Emhlabeni akukho okufana naye owenziwa abe ngongesabiyo.
Job 41:34 Ubona konke okuphakemeyo; uyinkosi phezu kwabo bonke abantwana bokuzikhukhumeza.”
Job 42:1 UJobe wayesemphendula uJehova, wathi:
Job 42:2 “Ngiyazi ukuthi ungenza konke; alinakuvinjwa icebo lakho.
Job 42:3 Ngubani ositheza iziluleko engenakwazi na? Ngikhulumile lokho ngingakuqondanga, izimangaliso ezinkulu kunami ebengingazazi.
Job 42:4 “Ake ungizwe, kukhulume mina; ngiyakukubuza, wena ungazise.
Job 42:5 Ngangizwile ngawe ngokuzwa kwezindlebe, kepha manje iso lami liyakubona.
Job 42:6 Ngalokho ngiyazinenga, ngizisole othulini nasemlotheni.”
Job 42:7 Kwathi lapho uJehova esekhulumile lawo mazwi kuJobe, uJehova wathi ku-Elifazi umThemani: “Intukuthelo yami iyavuthela wena nabangane bakho ababili, ngokuba anikhulumanga okulungileyo ngami njengenceku yami uJobe.
Job 42:8 Ngalokho zithatheleni izinkunzi eziyisikhombisa nezinqama eziyisikhombisa, niye encekwini yami uJobe, nizinikelele ngazo zibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa; uJobe inceku yami uyakunikhulekela, ngokuba uma ngivuma ubuso bakhe, angiyikwenza kini njengobuwula benu, lokhu ningakhulumanga okulungileyo ngami njengenceku yami uJobe.”
Job 42:9 Base behamba u-Elifazi umThemani, noBilidadi umShuhi, noSofari umNahama, benza njengokukhuluma kukaJehova kubo; uJehova wavuma-ke ubuso bukaJobe.
Job 42:10 UJehova wambuyisa uJobe ekuhluphekeni, lapho ekhulekela abangane bakhe; wenezela kukho konke uJobe ayenakho ngokukuphinda kabili.
Job 42:11 Kwase kufika kuye bonke abafowabo, nabo bonke odadewabo, nabo bonke ababazana naye ngaphambili, badla endlini yakhe; bamkhalela, bamduduza ngakho konke okubi uJehova amehlisele khona, yilowo nalowo wamnika uhlamvu lwemali necici legolide.
Job 42:12 Kanjalo uJehova wabusisa ukugcina kukaJobe kunokuqala kwakhe; waba nezimvu eziyizinkulungwane eziyishumi nane, namakamela ayizinkulungwane eziyisithupha, namabhangqa ayinkulungwane ezinkabi, nezimbongolo zezinsikazi eziyinkulungwane.
Job 42:13 Wayenamadodana ayisikhombisa namadodakazi amathathu.
Job 42:14 Wabiza igama leyokuqala ngokuthi uJemima, negama leyesibili ngokuthi uKesiya, negama leyesithathu ngokuthi uKereni Haphuki.
Job 42:15 Ezweni lonke akufunyanwanga abesifazane abahle njengamadodakazi kaJobe; uyise wabanika ifa phakathi kwabanewabo.
Job 42:16 Emva kwalokho uJobe wayesekhona iminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amane, wabona amadodana akhe namadodana amadodana akhe kwaze kwaba yizizukulwane ezine.
Job 42:17 Wafa-ke uJobe esemdala, esanelisiwe yizinsuku.
Ps 1:1 Ubusisiwe umuntu ongahambi ngeziluleko zababi, ongemi endleleni yezoni, ongahlali enkundleni yabaklolodayo,
Ps 1:2 kepha okuthokoza kwakhe kusemthethweni kaJehova, ozindla ngomthetho wakhe imini nobusuku.
Ps 1:3 Unjengomuthi otshaliwe ngasemifuleni yamanzi, othela isithelo sawo ngesikhathi sawo, oqabunga lawo lingabuni, nakho konke akwenzayo uyakuba nenhlanhla kukho.
Ps 1:4 Ababi abanjalo, kepha banjengamakhoba aphephethwa ngumoya.
Ps 1:5 Ngalokho ababi abayikuma ekwahlulelweni, nezoni ebandleni labalungileyo.
Ps 1:6 Ngokuba uJehova uyayazi indlela yabalungileyo, kodwa indlela yababi yobhubha.
Ps 2:1 Kungani ukuba abezizwe baxokozele, nabantu bazindle ngokuyize na?
Ps 2:2 Amakhosi omhlaba ayazihlanganisa, nababusi baceba icebo ngoJehova nangogcotshiweyo wakhe ngokuthi:
Ps 2:3 “Masigqabule izibopho zabo, silahle izintambo zabo, zisuke kithina.”
Ps 2:4 Yena ohlezi ezulwini uyahleka, iNkosi iyabadelela.
Ps 2:5 Ibisikhuluma kubo ngentukuthelo yayo, ibethuse ngolaka lwayo, ithi:
Ps 2:6 “Nokho ngibekile iNkosi yami eSiyoni, intaba yami engcwele.”
Ps 2:7 Ngizakulanda ngesinqumo: uJehova wathi kimi: “Uyindodana yami wena; namuhla ngikuzele.
Ps 2:8 Cela kimi, ngikunike abezizwe babe yifa lakho, nemikhawulo yomhlaba ibe yimfuyo yakho.
Ps 2:9 Uzakubaphula ngentonga yensimbi, ubaphahlaze njengesitsha sombumbi.”
Ps 2:10 Ngakho hlakaniphani nina makhosi; yalekani nina bahluleli bomhlaba.
Ps 2:11 Mkhonzeni uJehova ngokwesaba, nethabe ngokuthuthumela.
Ps 2:12 Yangeni indodana, ingaze ithukuthele, nibhubhe endleleni, ngokuba ulaka lwayo luyakuvutha masinyane. Babusisiwe bonke abaphephela kuyo.
Ps 3:1 Ihubo likaDavide ebalekela u-Abisalomu indodana yakhe. Hhawu, Jehova, ziningi izitha zami. Baningi abangivukelayo.
Ps 3:2 Baningi abathi emphefumulweni wami: “Akukho ukusinda kwakhe kuNkulunkulu.” Sela
Ps 3:3 Kepha wena Jehova uyisihlangu kimi, uludumo lwami nophakamisa ikhanda lami.
Ps 3:4 Ngezwi lami ngiyakhala kuJehova; yena uyangiphendula esentabeni yakhe engcwele. Sela
Ps 3:5 Ngalala phansi, ngazunywa ngubuthongo; ngavuka, ngokuba uJehova ungiphasile.
Ps 3:6 Angesabi amashumi ezinkulungwane zabantu abangihaqile nxazonke.
Ps 3:7 Vuka, Jehova, ungisindise, Nkulunkulu wami, ngokuba zonke izitha zami uzishayile emhlathini, amazinyo ababi uwaphulile.
Ps 3:8 Insindiso ingekaJehova; isibusiso sakho masibe kubantu bakho. Sela
Ps 4:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngiphendule ekukhaleni kwami, Nkulunkulu wokulunga kwami. Ekucindezelweni wangenzela indawo; yiba nomusa kimi, uzwe umkhuleko wami.
Ps 4:2 Madodana abantu, koze kube nini ubukhosi bami budunyazwa na? Koze kube nini nithanda okuyize, nifuna amanga, na? Sela
Ps 4:3 Yazini ukuthi uJehova uzahlukanisele omesabayo; uJehova uyezwa lapha ngikhala kuye.
Ps 4:4 Thukuthelani ningoni; zindlani enhliziyweni yenu okhukhweni lwenu, nithule. Sela
Ps 4:5 Nikelani iminikelo yokulunga, nethembe uJehova.
Ps 4:6 Baningi abathi: “Ngubani oyakusibonisa okuhle na?” Jehova, phakamisa ukukhanya kobuso bakho phezu kwethu.
Ps 4:7 Ubeke injabulo enhliziyweni yami edlula eyamabele abo newayini labo sekuvamile.
Ps 4:8 Ngizakucambalala ngokuthula, ngilale ubuthongo, ngokuba wena Jehova wedwa ungihlalisa ngokulondeka.
Ps 5:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeNehiloti. Ihubo likaDavide. Yizwa amazwi ami, Jehova, uqaphele ukuzindla kwami.
Ps 5:2 Yizwa izwi lokukhala kwami, Nkosi yami, Nkulunkulu wami, ngokuba ngithandaza kuwe.
Ps 5:3 Jehova, ekuseni uyalizwa izwi lami; ekuseni ngiyakuzibika kuwe, ngilinde.
Ps 5:4 Ngokuba wena awusiye uNkulunkulu othanda okubi; omubi akanakuhlala kuwe.
Ps 5:5 Abazidlayo abayikuma phambi kwamehlo akho; uyabazonda bonke abenza okubi.
Ps 5:6 Uyabhubhisa abakhuluma amanga; uJehova uyamenyanya umuntu wegazi nowenkohliso.
Ps 5:7 Kepha mina ngiyakungena endlini yakho ngobuningi bomusa wakho, ngikhothame ngokukuhlonipha, ngibhekene nendawo yakho engcwele.
Ps 5:8 Jehova, ngihole ngokulunga kwakho ngenxa yezitha zami, ulungise indlela yakho phambi kobuso bami.
Ps 5:9 Ngokuba alikho iqiniso emlonyeni wabo; izibilini zabo zingukonakala: umphimbo wabo uyithuna elivulekileyo; bayathopha ngolimi lwabo.
Ps 5:10 Balahle ngecala, Nkulunkulu. Mabawe ngenxa yamacebo abo, ubawise ngobuningi beziphambeko zabo, ngokuba bahlubukile kuwe.
Ps 5:11 Kepha mabajabule bonke abathemba kuwe, bahalalise kuze kube phakade, abathanda igama lakho bethabela kuwe.
Ps 5:12 Ngokuba wena Jehova uyambusisa olungileyo; umphahla ngomusa njengesihlangu.
Ps 6:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. NgeSheminti. Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, ungangijezisi ngentukuthelo yakho, ungangishayi ngolaka lwakho.
Ps 6:2 Yiba nomusa kimi, Jehova, ngokuba ngidangele; ngiphilise, Jehova, ngokuba amathambo ami ayathuthumela,
Ps 6:3 nomphefumulo wami uyathuthumela, kepha wena Jehova, koze kube nini na?
Ps 6:4 Buya, Jehova, ukhulule umphefumulo wami, ungisindise ngenxa yesihawu sakho.
Ps 6:5 Ngokuba akukho ukukhumbula wena ekufeni; ngubani oyakukubonga endaweni yabafileyo na?
Ps 6:6 Ngikhathele ukububula kwami; ngimanzisa icansi lami njalo ebusuku, ngimanzisa ukhukho lwami ngezinyembezi zami.
Ps 6:7 Iso lami liyafiphala ngokudabuka; liyaguga ngenxa yezitha zami zonke.
Ps 6:8 Dedani kimi nina nonke enenza okubi, ngokuba uJehova ulizwile izwi lokukhala kwami;
Ps 6:9 uJehova uzwile ukunxusa kwami, uJehova uyamukela umkhuleko wami.
Ps 6:10 Zonke izitha zami ziyakujabha, zishaywe luvalo; ziyakuhlehla, zijabhe ngokuphazima kweso.
Ps 7:1 IShigayoni likaDavide alihubela uJehova ngenxa yamazwi kaKushe wakwaBenjamini. Jehova, Nkulunkulu wami, ngiyaphephela kuwe;
Ps 7:2 ngisindise kubo bonke abangizingelayo, ungikhulule, bangaze bawudwengule umphefumulo wami njengengonyama eklebhula, kungekho okhululayo.
Ps 7:3 Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, uma ngikwenzile lokho, uma kukhona okubi ezandleni zami,
Ps 7:4 uma ngiphindise okubi kohlalisene nami ngokuthula, ngaphanga isitha sami kungekho sici,
Ps 7:5 isitha masiwuzingele umphefumulo wami, siwufice, sikunyathele phansi ukuphila kwami, nesithunzi sami sisilahle phansi othulini. Sela
Ps 7:6 Sukuma, Jehova, ngentukuthelo yakho, uvuke ngenxa yolaka lwezitha zami, ungimele; ngokuba uyalezile ukwahlulela.
Ps 7:7 Umhlangano wezizwe mawukuphahle, ubuyele phezulu ngaphezu kwawo.
Ps 7:8 UJehova uyahlulela izizwe; ngahlulele, Jehova, ngokulunga kwami nangobuqotho bami obukimi.
Ps 7:9 Makuphele ukonakala kwababi, kepha olungileyo mawumqinise. Nguwe phela ohlola izinhliziyo nezinso, Nkulunkulu olungileyo.
Ps 7:10 Isihlangu sami sikuNkulunkulu osindisa abaqotho ngenhliziyo.
Ps 7:11 UNkulunkulu ungumahluleli olungileyo; unguNkulunkulu othukuthela imihla yonke.
Ps 7:12 Uma umuntu engaphenduki, uyakulola inkemba yakhe, ansale umnsalo wakhe, awulungisele,
Ps 7:13 izikhali zokubulala azibhekisele kuye; imicibisholo uyenza ishise.
Ps 7:14 Unemihelo ngobubi; ukhulelwe ngukona, uzala amanga.
Ps 7:15 Umgodi uwumba, uwugubha, kepha ukhalakathela egebeni alenzileyo.
Ps 7:16 Ukwelelesa kwakhe kubuyela ekhanda lakhe; ubudlwangudlwangu bakhe behlela okhakhayini lwakhe.
Ps 7:17 Ngizakumbonga uJehova ngokokulunga kwakhe, ngihubele igama likaJehova oPhezukonke.
Ps 8:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeGititi. Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova Nkosi yethu, igama lakho liyababazeka kangaka emhlabeni wonke! wena owabeka inkazimulo yakho ezulwini.
Ps 8:2 Ngomlomo wezingane nowabancelayo wagxilisa amandla ngenxa yabamelene nawe ukuba uthulise isitha nophindisayo.
Ps 8:3 Lapha ngibuka izulu lakho, umsebenzi weminwe yakho, inyanga nezinkanyezi ozimisileyo,
Ps 8:4 umuntu uyini ukuba umkhumbule, nendodana yomuntu ukuba uyinake na?
Ps 8:5 Wamenza waba ngaphansana kukaNkulunkulu, wamqhelisa ngenkazimulo nangobukhosi.
Ps 8:6 Wamenza abe ngumbusi phezu kwemisebenzi yezandla zakho; konke wakubeka phansi kwezinyawo zakhe:
Ps 8:7 izimvu, nezinkomo zonke, yebo, nezilwane zasendle,
Ps 8:8 nezinyoni zezulu, nezinhlanzi zolwandle, nakho konke okuhamba ezindleleni zolwandle.
Ps 8:9 Jehova Nkosi yethu, igama lakho liyababazeka kangaka emhlabeni wonke!
Ps 9:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ukufa kwendodana. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ngayo yonke inhliziyo yami; ngiyakulanda zonke izimangaliso zakho.
Ps 9:2 Ngiyakujabula, ngethabe kuwe; ngiyakudumisa igama lakho wena oPhezukonke,
Ps 9:3 ngokuba izitha zami zibuyela emuva, ziwa, zibhubha ebusweni bakho,
Ps 9:4 ngokuba ulimelele ilungelo lami nendaba yami, uhlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi, ungumahluleli olungileyo.
Ps 9:5 Ujezisile abezizwe, wabhubhisa ababi; igama labo ulesulile kuze kube phakade naphakade.
Ps 9:6 Izitha ziphelile, zachitheka kuze kube phakade; imizi wayisimbula, ukukhunjulwa kwayo kwaphela nya.
Ps 9:7 UJehova uyabusa kuze kube phakade; isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi usimisela ukwahlulela;
Ps 9:8 umhlaba uyakuwahlulela ngokulunga, athethe amacala ezizwe ngobuqotho.
Ps 9:9 UJehova uyinqaba yocindezelweyo, uyinqaba ezikhathini zokuhlupheka.
Ps 9:10 Nabalaziyo igama lakho bayakwethemba wena; ngokuba wena Jehova awubashiyi abakufunayo.
Ps 9:11 Hubani nimdumise uJehova ohlezi eSiyoni; memezelani ezizweni izenzo zakhe ezinkulu.
Ps 9:12 Ngokuba yena ophindisela igazi uyabakhumbula abahluphekayo; akakhohlwa ukukhala kwabo.
Ps 9:13 Yiba nomusa kimi, Jehova; kubone engihlupheka ngakho ngabangizondayo wena ongiphakamisa emasangweni okufa,
Ps 9:14 ukuze ngilande ngalo lonke udumo lwakho, ngethabe ngokusindisa kwakho emasangweni endodakazi yaseSiyoni.
Ps 9:15 Abezizwe bashone phansi egebeni abalenzileyo; unyawo lwabo lubhajwe esihibeni abasifihlileyo.
Ps 9:16 UJehova uzazisile, wahlulela; umcuphile omubi emsebenzini wezandla zakhe. Higayoni. Sela
Ps 9:17 Ababi bayakubuyela endaweni yabafileyo, bonke abezizwe abakhohlwa uNkulunkulu.
Ps 9:18 Ngokuba ompofu kayikukhohlakala njalo; ithemba labahluphekayo aliyikunyamalala kuze kube phakade.
Ps 9:19 Vuka, Jehova! Mawungavumi ukuba abantu bahlule; abezizwe mabahlulelwe ebusweni bakho.
Ps 9:20 Mabashaywe luvalo, Jehova; abezizwe mabazazi ukuthi bangabantu nje. Sela
Ps 10:1 Jehova, umeleni kude na? Uzifihlelani ubuso ezikhathini zokuhlupheka na?
Ps 10:2 Ngokuqhosha komubi ompofu uyahlupheka; mababanjwe ngamacebo abawacebileyo.
Ps 10:3 Ngokuba omubi uyazigabisa ngokufisa komphefumulo wakhe, nohulazayo uyamvalelisa, amdelele uJehova.
Ps 10:4 Omubi ngokuzikhukhumeza kobuso bakhe uthi: “Akanaki lutho; akakho uNkulunkulu,” injalo imicabango yakhe yonke.
Ps 10:5 Izindlela zakhe zithembekile izikhathi zonke; izahlulelo zakho ziphakeme kakhulu kunokubona kwakhe; zonke izitha zakhe uyazidelela.
Ps 10:6 Uthi enhliziyweni yakhe: “Angiyikuzanyazanyiswa; izizukulwane nezizukulwane angisoze ngehlelwa ngozi.”
Ps 10:7 Umlomo wakhe ugcwele isiqalekiso nenkohliso nobudlova; ngaphansi kolimi lwakhe kukhona ukwelelesa nokonakala.
Ps 10:8 Uhlezi ezindaweni zokuqamekela zemizi; ezindaweni ezisithekileyo uyambulala ongenacala; amehlo akhe ayamhlwaya othithibeleyo.
Ps 10:9 Endaweni esithekileyo uqamekela njengengonyama emphandwini wayo; uhlomele ukumbamba ohluphekileyo; uyambamba ohluphekileyo ngokumngenisa esihibeni sakhe.
Ps 10:10 Uyanyonyoba, uyakhothama, abathithibeleyo bawe ngamazipho akhe.
Ps 10:11 Uthi enhliziyweni yakhe: “UNkulunkulu ukhohliwe, ubusithezile ubuso bakhe; akasoze wakubona nanini.”
Ps 10:12 Vuka, Jehova! Nkulunkulu, phakamisa isandla sakho, ungakhohlwa abahluphekileyo.
Ps 10:13 Kungani ukuba omubi adelele uNkulunkulu, athi enhliziyweni yakhe: “Awuyikukunaka,” na?
Ps 10:14 Ubonile wena; ngokuba ukukhathazeka nokuhlupheka uyakubona wena ukuze ukubeke esandleni sakho; othithibeleyo uyazinikela kuwe; wena ungumsizi wentandane.
Ps 10:15 Yaphula ingalo yomubi; buphenyisise ububi besoni, ukuze ungabe usabufumana.
Ps 10:16 UJehova uyinkosi kuze kube phakade naphakade; abezizwe bayachithwa emhlabeni wakhe.
Ps 10:17 Jehova, uyakuzwa ukulangazela kwabamnene; uyaqinisa inhliziyo yabo, indlebe yakho uyibeka kubo
Ps 10:18 ukuba wahlulele intandane nocindezelweyo, ukuze umuntu wasemhlabeni angabe esabanga uvalo.
Ps 11:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngiyaphephela kuJehova; nisho kanjani kuwo umphefumulo wami ukuthi: “Balekela entabeni yenu njengenyoni, na?
Ps 11:2 Ngokuba bhekani, ababi bawunsala umnsalo wabo, babeka imicibisholo yabo entanjeni ukuba bacibishele ebumnyameni abaqotho ngenhliziyo.
Ps 11:3 Nxa izisekelo zidilizwa, olungileyo angenzani na?”
Ps 11:4 UJehova usethempelini lakhe elingcwele, uJehova, isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sisezulwini; amehlo akhe ayabuka, izinkophe zakhe ziyahlola abantwana babantu.
Ps 11:5 UJehova uyamhlola olungileyo; kepha omubi nothanda ubudlwangudlwangu umphefumulo wakhe uyamzonda.
Ps 11:6 Unisa izihibe phezu kwababi; umlilo nesibabule nomoya oshisayo kuyisabelo sendebe yabo.
Ps 11:7 Ngokuba uJehova ulungile, uyathanda ukulunga; oqotho uyakubheka ubuso bakhe.
Ps 12:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeSheminiti. Ihubo likaDavide. Siza, Jehova, ngokuba owesaba uNkulunkulu akasekho, ngokuba banyamalele abathembekileyo kubantwana babantu.
Ps 12:2 Bakhuluma amanga, kwaba yilowo nalowo kumakhelwane wakhe; ngezindebe ezithophayo bakhuluma nganhliziyombili.
Ps 12:3 UJehova uyakunquma zonke izindebe ezithophayo, ulimi olukhuluma amazwi amakhulu,
Ps 12:4 abathi: “Siyakunqoba ngolimi lwethu; izindebe zethu zinathi; ngubani oyinkosi phezu kwethu na?”
Ps 12:5 “Ngenxa yokubandezeka kwabahluphekileyo nangokububula kwabampofu ngizakuvuka kalokhu,” usho uJehova, “ngimbeke ekusindisweni akulangazelelayo.”
Ps 12:6 Amazwi kaJehova angamazwi ahlanzekileyo, anjengesiliva elihlanjululwe esithandweni emhlabathini, lihlanjululwe kasikhombisa.
Ps 12:7 Wena Jehova uyakubagcina, ubavikele kulesi sizukulwane kuze kube phakade.
Ps 12:8 Abangamesabi uNkulunkulu bayashanguza nxazonke, lapho amanyala ephakeme kubantwana babantu.
Ps 13:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Koze kube nini, Jehova, ungikhohlwa njalonjalo na? Koze kube nini usitheza ubuso bakho kimi na?
Ps 13:2 Koze kube nini ngikhathazeka emphefumulweni wami, nginosizi enhliziyweni yami usuku lonke, na? Koze kube nini isitha sami siziphakamisa phezu kwami na?
Ps 13:3 Bheka neno, ungiphendule, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami; khanyisa amehlo ami, ngize ngingalali ubuthongo bokufa,
Ps 13:4 ukuze isitha sami singasho ukuthi: “Ngimahlulile,” funa abamelene nami bethabe lapha ngintengayo.
Ps 13:5 Kepha ngiwuthembile umusa wakho; inhliziyo yami izakwethaba ngensindiso yakho;
Ps 13:6 ngizakuhlabelela kuJehova, ngokuba ungenzele okuhle.
Ps 14:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Isiwula sithi enhliziyweni yaso: “Akakho uNkulunkulu.” Yonakele, iyanengeka imisebenzi yabo; akakho owenza okuhle.
Ps 14:2 UJehova uyabuka esezulwini abantwana babantu ukucinga ukuba ukhona yini oqondayo, ofuna uNkulunkulu.
Ps 14:3 Baphambukile bonke, bonakele bonke; akakho owenza okuhle, akakho noyedwa.
Ps 14:4 Abaqondi lutho yini bonke abenza okubi, abadla abantu bami, njengokuba bedla isinkwa, bangakhuleki kuJehova, na?
Ps 14:5 Khona besaba nokwesaba, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukuso isizukulwane sabalungileyo.
Ps 14:6 Icebo lohluphekileyo niyalijabhisa, kepha uJehova uyisiphephelo sakhe.
Ps 14:7 Sengathi ukusindiswa kuka-Israyeli kungavela eSiyoni. Mhla uJehova ebuyisa ukuthunjwa kwabantu bakhe uJakobe uyakwethaba, u-Israyeli ajabule.
Ps 15:1 Jehova, ngubani oyakuhlala etendeni lakho na? Ngubani oyakwakha entabeni yakho engcwele na?
Ps 15:2 Yilowo ohamba ngobuqotho nowenza ukulunga, okhuluma iqiniso enhliziyweni yakhe,
Ps 15:3 ongahlebi ngolimi lwakhe, ongamoni umngane wakhe, nongamhlazi umakhelwane wakhe;
Ps 15:4 obuka onengekayo ngokuzakumenyanya, kepha ebazisa abamesabayo uNkulunkulu; ofunga ngokuzakumlimaza, nokho angalaphuli izwi lakhe;
Ps 15:5 ongatsheleki muntu imali yakhe ukuba izale, nongamukeli umvuzo ngongenacala; owenza lokhu akayikuzanyazanyiswa naphakade.
Ps 16:1 IMiktamu likaDavide. Ngilondoloze, Nkulunkulu, ngokuba ngiyaphephela kuwe.
Ps 16:2 Ngithi kuJehova: “Wena uyiNkosi yami; anginakho okuhle ngaphandle kwakho.”
Ps 16:3 Abangcwele abasemhlabeni, abayizikhulu, yonke intokozo yami ikubona.
Ps 16:4 Ziningi izinhlupheko zabazizuzela omunye unkulunkulu; angiyikunikela ngeminikelo yabo yegazi; angiyikuwaphatha amagama abo ngezindebe zami.
Ps 16:5 UJehova uyisabelo esahlukaniselwe mina, nendebe yami; wena uqinisa ifa lami.
Ps 16:6 Izabelo zingehlele ezindaweni ezinhle, yebo, nginalo ifa elihle.
Ps 16:7 Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ongilulekayo; nasebusuku izinso zami ziyangiyala.
Ps 16:8 Ngimbeke uJehova njalo phambi kwami, ngokuba ungakwesokunene sami, angiyikuzanyazanyiswa.
Ps 16:9 Ngakho-ke inhliziyo yami iyajabula, nomphefumulo wami uyethaba, nenyama yami iyakuhlala ngokwethemba.
Ps 16:10 Ngokuba awuyikunikela umphefumulo wami endaweni yabafileyo; awuyikuvuma ukuba ongcwele wakho abone ukubola.
Ps 16:11 Uyakungazisa indlela yokuphila; ukugcwala kwenjabulo kusebusweni bakho; intokozo isesandleni sakho sokunene kuze kube phakade.
Ps 17:1 Umkhuleko kaDavide. Yizwa ukulunga, Jehova, ulalele ukukhala kwami, ubeke indlebe emkhulekweni wami ophuma ezindebeni ezingenankohliso.
Ps 17:2 Ukwahlulelwa kwami makuvele ebusweni bakho; amehlo akho mawabheke okulungileyo.
Ps 17:3 Uyalinga inhliziyo yami; ungihambele ebusuku, uyangihlolisisa, awufumani lutho; ngiyahlosa ukuba umlomo wami ungaphambuki.
Ps 17:4 Emisebenzini yabantu ngiyazilinda, ezindleleni zezidlova ngezwi lezindebe zakho.
Ps 17:5 Izinyathelo zami zinamathela ezinyaweni zakho, izinyawo zami azisheleli.
Ps 17:6 Ngikhala kuwe, ngokuba uyangizwa, Nkulunkulu; beka indlebe yakho kimi, uzwe izwi lami.
Ps 17:7 Bonakalisa isihe sakho esimangalisayo wena osindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene labo abaphephela kuwe kwababahlaselayo.
Ps 17:8 Ngigcine njengenhlamvu yeso, ungisithe ethunzini lamaphiko akho
Ps 17:9 kubo ababi abangilimazayo, kuzo izitha zokuphila kwami ezingihaqileyo.
Ps 17:10 Bavalelwe ngamanoni abo, bakhuluma ngokuzidla ngomlomo wabo.
Ps 17:11 Noma siyaphi, bayangizungeza; amehlo abo bawabhekisa kukho ukungiwisa phansi emhlabathini.
Ps 17:12 Unjengengonyama ehahela ukubamba, njengebhongo lengonyama elilele ezindaweni ezisithekileyo.
Ps 17:13 Vuka, Jehova, umhlangabeze, umwise phansi; sindisa umphefumulo wami komubi ngenkemba yakho,
Ps 17:14 nakubantu ngesandla sakho, Jehova, abantu baleli zwe abasabelo sabo sikulokhu kuphila, nabasisu sabo usigcwalisa ngengcebo yakho, nabashiyela izingane zabo okusele kubo.
Ps 17:15 Kepha mina ngiyakubuka ubuso bakho ekulungeni, ngisuthe ngesimo sakho ekuvukeni kwami.
Ps 18:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide, inceku kaJehova, owakhuluma amazwi aleli hubo kuJehova mhla uJehova emsindisile esandleni sezitha zakhe zonke nasesandleni sikaSawule. Wathi: Ngiyakuthanda, Jehova, mandla ami.
Ps 18:2 Jehova uyidwala lami, nenqaba yami, nomkhululi wami; uNkulunkulu wami uyidwala lami engiphephela kulo, nesihlangu sami, nophondo lokusindiswa kwami, inqaba yami ephakemeyo.
Ps 18:3 Ngiyamemeza kuJehova odumisekayo, ngisindiswe ezitheni zami.
Ps 18:4 Izintambo zokufa zangizungelezela, izikhukhula zokona zangethusa.
Ps 18:5 Izintambo zasendaweni yabafileyo zangizungeza, izihibe zokufa zangehlela.
Ps 18:6 Ekuhluphekeni kwami ngambiza uJehova, ngakhala kuNkulunkulu wami; walizwa izwi lami esethempelini lakhe; ukukhala kwami phambi kwakhe kwangena ezindlebeni zakhe.
Ps 18:7 Umhlaba wawusuzamazama, wadikizela; izisekelo zezintaba zathuthumela, zagubhuzela ngokuba ethukuthele.
Ps 18:8 Kwenyuka umusi emakhaleni akhe, nomlilo odlayo emlonyeni wakhe; amalahle avutha kuye.
Ps 18:9 Wathobisa izulu, wehla; ubumnyama babuphansi kwezinyawo zakhe.
Ps 18:10 Wakhwela phezu kwekherubi, wandiza; washweza ngamaphiko omoya.
Ps 18:11 Ubumnyama wabenza isisibekelo, idokodo lakhe elimphahlayo; amanzi amnyama, amafu anzima.
Ps 18:12 Ekukhazimuleni okuphambi kwakhe amafu akhe abanga phambili, isichotho namalahle avuthayo.
Ps 18:13 UJehova waduma ezulwini; oPhezukonke walizwakalisa izwi lakhe: isichotho namalahle avuthayo.
Ps 18:14 Wathuma imicibisholo yakhe, wabangquzula, nemibani eminingi, wabadidizelisa.
Ps 18:15 Kwase kubonakala imisinga yamanzi; izisekelo zomhlaba zambulwa ngesijeziso sakho, Jehova, ngokufutha komoya wamakhala akho.
Ps 18:16 Waselula isandla sakhe ephezulu, wangibamba; wangikhipha emanzini amaningi.
Ps 18:17 Wangophula esitheni sami esinamandla nakubo abangizondayo, ngokuba base bengahlulile.
Ps 18:18 Bangihlasela ngosuku lwesigemegeme sami, kepha uJehova waba yinsika yami.
Ps 18:19 Wangiphumisela endaweni ebanzi; wangikhulula, ngokuba ebethokoza ngami.
Ps 18:20 UJehova wangivuza ngokokulunga kwami; wangibuyisela njengokuhlanzeka kwezandla zami.
Ps 18:21 Ngokuba ngizigcinile izindlela zikaJehova, angimukanga kuNkulunkulu wami ngokushinga.
Ps 18:22 Ngokuba yonke imithetho yakhe yayiphambi kwami, nezimiso zakhe angivumanga ukuba zisuke kimi.
Ps 18:23 Ngangiphelele kuye; ngabuxwaya ububi.
Ps 18:24 UJehova wayesebuyisela kimi njengokulunga kwami, njengokuhlanzeka kwezandla zami phambi kwamehlo akhe.
Ps 18:25 Kothembekileyo uyazibonakalisa uthembekile; kumuntu oqotho uzibonakalisa uqotho;
Ps 18:26 kohlanzekileyo uyazibonakalisa uhlanzekile; koyisigwegwe uyazibonakalisa unenkani.
Ps 18:27 Ngokuba wena uyabasindisa abantu abathobekileyo, kepha amehlo abaqhoshileyo uyawathobisa.
Ps 18:28 Ngokuba wena uyokhela isibani sami; uJehova uNkulunkulu wami uyakhanyisa ubumnyama bami.
Ps 18:29 Ngokuba ngawe ngingahlasela impi; ngoNkulunkulu wami ngingeqa ugange.
Ps 18:30 Indlela kaNkulunkulu iphelele; izwi likaJehova lihlanzekile; yena uyisihlangu kubo bonke abaphephela kuye.
Ps 18:31 Ngokuba ngubani onguNkulunkulu ngaphandle kukaJehova, ngubani oyidwala ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu wethu na?
Ps 18:32 uNkulunkulu ongibhincisa amandla, owenza indlela yami ilunge;
Ps 18:33 owenza izinyawo zami zibe njengezendluzelekazi, angimise emagqumeni ami;
Ps 18:34 ofundisa izandla zami ukulwa, ukuze izingalo zami zinsale umnsalo wethusi.
Ps 18:35 Wena unginikile isihlangu sensindiso yakho, isandla sakho sokunene singisekele, nobumnene bakho bungikhulisile.
Ps 18:36 Amabanga okunyathela kwami uwandisile; amaqakala ami awaxegi.
Ps 18:37 Ngazixosha izitha zami, ngazifica; angibuyanga ngingakaziqedi.
Ps 18:38 Ngaziphahlaza, zaze zahluleka ukuvuka; zawa phansi kwezinyawo zami.
Ps 18:39 Wangibhincisa amandla okulwa; ababengivukele wabathobisa phansi kwami.
Ps 18:40 Wangifulathelisela izitha zami, nabangizondayo ngabaqothula.
Ps 18:41 Bakhala, kepha akubangakho osindisayo, nakuJehova, kodwa akaze aphendula.
Ps 18:42 Ngabacolisisa njengothuli emoyeni; ngabalahla njengensila ezitaladini.
Ps 18:43 Wangikhulula ezimpini zabantu; wangimisa ngaba yinhloko yabezizwe; abantu engingabaziyo bangikhonza.
Ps 18:44 Banele ukungizwa nje ngendlebe, base bengilalela; abafo bazithoba phansi kwami.
Ps 18:45 Abafo babuna, baphuma ezinqabeni zabo bethuthumele.
Ps 18:46 UJehova usekhona, malidunyiswe iDwala lami; makaphakanyiswe uNkulunkulu wensindiso yami,
Ps 18:47 uNkulunkulu onginikile impindiselo, wathobisa izizwe phansi kwami;
Ps 18:48 ongikhululile ezitheni zami, yebo, ongiphakamisile phezu kwabangivukelayo, wangikhulula kumuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu.
Ps 18:49 Ngalokho-ke ngizakukubonga phakathi kwabezizwe, Jehova, ngilihubele igama lakho.
Ps 18:50 Uyenza insindiso ibe nkulu enkosini yakhe; uyenza umusa kogcotshiweyo wakhe uDavide nasenzalweni yakhe kuze kube phakade.
Ps 19:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Amazulu ayalanda ngenkazimulo kaJehova, nomkhathi ushumayela umsebenzi wezandla zakhe.
Ps 19:2 Usuku luyalandisa usuku inkulumo, nobusuku bushumayeza ubusuku ukwazi.
Ps 19:3 Akukho ukukhuluma, awakho amazwi, lapho izwi lingezwakali khona.
Ps 19:4 Isilinganiso sawo siphumele emhlabeni wonke namazwi awo emkhawulweni womhlaba. Ulimisele ilanga itende kulo.
Ps 19:5 Lona linjengomyeni ephuma ekamelweni lakhe; lijabulisa okweqhawe ukugijima endleleni yalo.
Ps 19:6 Ukuphuma kwalo kusemkhawulweni wezulu; ukuzungeza kwalo kuya ekugcineni kwalo; akukho okufihlelwe ukushisa kwalo.
Ps 19:7 Umthetho kaJehova uphelele, uvusa umphefumulo; ukufakaza kukaJehova kuqinisile, kuhlakaniphisa oyisiwula.
Ps 19:8 Imiyalo kaJehova ilungile, ijabulisa inhliziyo; umyalezo kaJehova uhlanzekile, ukhanyisa amehlo.
Ps 19:9 Ukumesaba uJehova kuhlanzekile, kumi kuze kube phakade; imithetho kaJehova iyiqiniso, ilungile yonke.
Ps 19:10 Inxanelekile kunegolide, kunegolide elihlanzekileyo eliningi; imnandi kunezinyosi, kunoju lwamakhekheba.
Ps 19:11 Nenceku yakho iyayalwa ngayo; oyigcinayo uyakuba nomvuzo omkhulu.
Ps 19:12 Ngubani owazi iziphosiso zakhe na? Ngithethelele kwezisithekileyo.
Ps 19:13 Yilonde inceku yakho nasezonweni ezihlazisayo; mazingabusi phezu kwami. Yikhona ngiyakube ngiphelele, ngingabe ngisaba necala eziphambekweni ezinkulu.
Ps 19:14 Amazwi omlomo wami nokuzindla kwenhliziyo yami makuthandeke ebusweni bakho, Jehova, dwala lami nomhlengi wami.
Ps 20:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. UJehova makakuphendule ngosuku lokuhlupheka; igama likaNkulunkulu kaJakobe malikuvikele.
Ps 20:2 Makakuthumele usizo lwasendlini engcwele, akusekele ngamandla aseSiyoni.
Ps 20:3 Makakhumbule yonke iminikelo yakho yokudliwa, awamukele umnikelo wakho wokushiswa. Sela
Ps 20:4 Makakunike njengokwenhliziyo yakho, afeze icebo lakho lonke.
Ps 20:5 Siyahalalisa ngensindiso yakho, siphakamise ibhandela egameni likaNkulunkulu wethu; uJehova makagcwalise zonke izicelo zakho.
Ps 20:6 Kalokhu ngiyazi ukuthi uJehova uyamsindisa ogcotshiweyo wakhe: esezulwini lakhe elingcwele uyamphendula ngamandla okusindisa esandla sakhe sokunene.
Ps 20:7 Abanye izinqola, abanye amahhashi, kepha thina sibonga igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu.
Ps 20:8 Bayathoba, bawe; kepha thina siyavuka, sime.
Ps 20:9 Sindisa, Jehova! INkosi mayisiphendule ngosuku lokukhala kwethu.
Ps 21:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, inkosi iyajabula ngamandla akho; iyethaba kangakanani ngensindiso yakho.
Ps 21:2 Uyinikile njengokwenhliziyo yayo, nesicelo sezindebe zayo awusinqabanga. Sela
Ps 21:3 Ngokuba wayihlangabeza ngezibusiso zokuhle; wafaka umqhele wegolide elihle ekhanda layo.
Ps 21:4 Yacela ukuphila kuwe, wayinika khona, izinsuku ezinde kuze kube phakade naphakade.
Ps 21:5 Inkulu inkazimulo yayo ngenxa yensindiso yakho; udumo nobukhosi ukubeka phezu kwayo.
Ps 21:6 Ngokuba uyibeka ukuba ibe yisibusiso kuze kube phakade; uyithokozisa ngenjabulo ebusweni bakho.
Ps 21:7 Ngokuba inkosi iyethemba uJehova, nangenxa yesihawu soPhezukonke ayiyikuzanyazanyiswa.
Ps 21:8 Isandla sakho siyakufumana zonke izitha zakho; esokunene sakho siyakubafumana abakuzondayo.
Ps 21:9 Uyakubenza babe njengesithando somlilo, nxa ubonakalisa ubuso bakho; uJehova uyakubagwinya ngentukuthelo yakhe, umlilo uyakubaqeda.
Ps 21:10 Isithelo sabo uyakusichitha emhlabeni kanye nenzalo yabo phakathi kwabantwana babantu.
Ps 21:11 Ngokuba babehlosa okubi, baceba icebo; kepha bayahluleka.
Ps 21:12 Ngokuba uyakubafulathelisa; ngosinga lomnsalo wakho uyakukhomba ebusweni babo.
Ps 21:13 Mawuphakame, Jehova, emandleni akho; thina siyakuhlabelela, sidumise amandla akho.
Ps 22:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Indluzelekazi yokusa. Ihubo likaDavide. Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungishiyeleni na? Ukude namazwi okubububula kwami nokusindiswa kwami.
Ps 22:2 Nkulunkulu wami, ngikhala emini, kepha awuphenduli, nasebusuku, ngingabi nakuthula.
Ps 22:3 Kepha wena ungoNgcwele ohlezi ezibongweni zika-Israyeli.
Ps 22:4 Obaba bethu babekwethemba; babethemba, wena wabakhulula.
Ps 22:5 Bakhala kuwe, bakhululwa; bethemba wena, abaze bajabha.
Ps 22:6 Kepha mina ngiyimphethu, angisiye umuntu; ngiyisithuko sabantu, ngiyindelelo yabantu.
Ps 22:7 Bonke abangibonayo bayangiklolodela, baphukule imilomo, banikine amakhanda,
Ps 22:8 bathi: “Zinikele kuJehova; makamsindise, amkhulule, njengokuba emthanda.”
Ps 22:9 Impela nguwe owangikhipha esizalweni, wangikhoselisa ngasemabeleni kamame.
Ps 22:10 Ngaphonswa phezu kwakho kwasesizalweni; unguNkulunkulu wami kwasesizalweni sikamame.
Ps 22:11 Ungabi kude nami, ngokuba inhlupheko iseduze, nosizayo akakho.
Ps 22:12 Izinkunzi eziningi zingibunganyele, ezinamandla zaseBashani zingizungezile.
Ps 22:13 Zingikhamisele umlomo wazo njengengonyama edwengulayo nebhodlayo.
Ps 22:14 Ngichithiwe njengamanzi; onke amathambo ami enyele; inhliziyo yami injengengcina, incibilikile phakathi kwezibilini zami.
Ps 22:15 Amandla ami omile njengodengezi; ulimi lwami lunamathela olwangeni lwami; ungibeka othulini lokufa.
Ps 22:16 Ngokuba izinja ziyangibungayela; umbonda wababi ungizungezile; izandla zami nezinyawo zami bazibhobozile.
Ps 22:17 Ngingabala onke amathambo ami; bayabukela, bangibuke bengiklibhizela.
Ps 22:18 Babelana izingubo zami, benzelana inkatho ngesambatho sami.
Ps 22:19 Kepha wena Jehova mawungabi kude, wena mandla ami, shesha ungisize.
Ps 22:20 Sindisa umphefumulo wami enkembeni, ukuphila kwami emandleni ezinja.
Ps 22:21 Ngisindise emlonyeni wengonyama; nasezimpondweni zezinyathi uyangizwa.
Ps 22:22 Ngiyakushumayeza abafowethu igama lakho, ngikudumise phakathi kwebandla.
Ps 22:23 Nina enesaba uJehova, mbongeni; nina nonke nzalo kaJakobe, mdumiseni, nimesabe nina nonke nzalo ka-Israyeli.
Ps 22:24 Ngokuba akadelelanga, akanengwanga yinhlupheko yohluphekayo; akamfihlelanga ubuso bakhe, kepha nalapha ekhala kuye, wezwa.
Ps 22:25 Kuyakuvela kuwe ukudumisa kwami ebandleni elikhulu; izithembiso zami ngiyakuzigcwalisa phambi kwabamesabayo.
Ps 22:26 Abamnene bayakudla, basuthe; abafuna uJehova bayakumdumisa; inhliziyo yenu mayiphile kuze kube phakade.
Ps 22:27 Imikhawulo yonke yomhlaba iyakukhumbula, iphendukele kuJehova, nezizukulwane zonke zezizwe ziyakukhuleka ebusweni bakho.
Ps 22:28 Ngokuba umbuso ungokaJehova; nguye obusa izizwe.
Ps 22:29 Bonke abacebileyo bomhlaba bayakudla, bakhuleke; bonke abehlela othulini bayakukhothama phambi kwakhe, naye ongenakugcina umphefumulo wakhe ekuphileni.
Ps 22:30 Inzalo iyakumkhonza; isizukulwane esizayo siyakulandiswa ngayo iNkosi.
Ps 22:31 Bayakuza bashumayele ukulunga kwayo kuso isizwe esiyakuzalwa ngokuthi ikwenzile.
Ps 23:1 Ihubo likaDavide. UJehova ungumalusi wami, angiyikuswela.
Ps 23:2 Uyangilalisa emadlelweni aluhlaza; uyangiyisa ngasemanzini okuphumula.
Ps 23:3 Ubuyisa umphefumulo wami; uyangihola ezindleleni zokulunga ngenxa yegama lakhe.
Ps 23:4 Noma ngihamba esigodini sethunzi lokufa, angesabi okubi, ngokuba wena unami, intonga yakho nodondolo lwakho ziyangiduduza.
Ps 23:5 Ulungisa itafula phambi kwami ebusweni bezitha zami; ugcoba ikhanda lami ngamafutha; indebe yami iyachichima.
Ps 23:6 Impela okuhle nomusa kuyakungilandela imihla yonke yokuphila kwami; ngiyakuhlala endlini kaJehova kuze kube phakade.
Ps 24:1 ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Umhlaba ungokaJehova nokugcwala kwawo, izwe nabakhileyo kulo.
Ps 24:2 Ngokuba yena wawusekela phezu kwezilwandle, wawumisa phezu kwemifula.
Ps 24:3 Ngubani oyakukhuphukela entabeni kaJehova, ngubani oyakuma endaweni yakhe engcwele na?
Ps 24:4 Yilowo onezandla ezingenacala nenhliziyo ehlanzekileyo, ongaphenduleli umphefumulo wakhe emangeni nongafungi ngenkohliso.
Ps 24:5 Uyakwamukela isibusiso kuJehova nokulunga kuNkulunkulu wensindiso yakhe.
Ps 24:6 Yilesi esiyisizukulwane sabamfunayo; bona abasinga ubuso bakho bangabantwana bakaJakobe. Sela
Ps 24:7 Phakamisani, masango, izinhloko zenu; nani minyango yaphakade, phakamani ukuba iNkosi yenkazimulo ingene.
Ps 24:8 Ingubani le Nkosi yenkazimulo na? InguJehova onamandla, oyiqhawe, uJehova oyiqhawe lokulwa.
Ps 24:9 Phakamisani, masango, izinhloko zenu; nani minyango yaphakade, phakamani ukuba iNkosi yenkazimulo ingene.
Ps 24:10 Ingubani le Nkosi yenkazimulo na? UJehova Sebawoti nguyena oyiNkosi yenkazimulo. Sela
Ps 25:1 ElikaDavide. Jehova, ngiphakamisela kuwena umphefumulo wami.
Ps 25:2 Nkulunkulu wami, ngiyethemba kuwe; mawungangijabhisi; izitha zami mazingethabi ngami.
Ps 25:3 Yebo, akuyikujabha noyedwa kwabakulindelayo; bayakujabha abaphambuka ngeze.
Ps 25:4 Ngazise imendo yakho, Jehova; ngifundise izindlela zakho.
Ps 25:5 Ngihambise eqinisweni lakho, ungifundise, ngokuba wena unguNkulunkulu wensindiso yami; ngilindela wena usuku lonke.
Ps 25:6 Khumbula, Jehova, ububele bakho nomusa wakho, ngokuba kukhona kwaphakade.
Ps 25:7 Ungazikhumbuli izono zobusha bami neziphambeko zami; ngikhumbule ngokomusa wakho ngenxa yobubele bakho, Jehova.
Ps 25:8 UJehova muhle, ulungile; ngalokho ufundisa izoni indlela.
Ps 25:9 Abathobekileyo ubaholela kokulungileyo, abathobekileyo ubafundisa indlela yakhe.
Ps 25:10 Zonke izindlela zikaJehova zingububele neqiniso kulabo abagcina isivumelwano sakhe nezifakazelo zakhe.
Ps 25:11 Ngenxa yegama lakho, Jehova, ngithethelele ukona kwami, ngokuba kukhulu.
Ps 25:12 Ngumuphi umuntu omesaba uJehova na? Nguyena oyakufundiswa nguye indlela ayakuyikhetha.
Ps 25:13 Umphefumulo wakhe uzakuhlala ngokwenama, inzalo yakhe iyakuzuza izwe.
Ps 25:14 Ubuhlobo bukaJehova bukubo abamesabayo; uyakubazisa isivumelwano sakhe.
Ps 25:15 Amehlo ami akuye uJehova njalo, ngokuba nguyena okhipha izinyawo zami enetheni.
Ps 25:16 Phendukela kimi, ube nomusa kimi, ngokuba nginesizungu, ngihluphekile.
Ps 25:17 Izinsizi zenhliziyo yami zikhulile; ngikhiphe ezinhluphekweni zami.
Ps 25:18 Bheka ukuhlupheka kwami nosizi lwami, ungithethelele zonke izono zami.
Ps 25:19 Bheka izitha zami, ngokuba ziningi; ziyangizonda ngenzondo yonya.
Ps 25:20 Londoloza umphefumulo wami, ungikhulule; mawungangijabhisi, ngokuba ngiphephela kuwe.
Ps 25:21 Ukulunga nobuqotho makungilondoloze, ngokuba ngilindele wena.
Ps 25:22 Nkulunkulu, hlenga u-Israyeli kuzo zonke izinkathazo zakhe.
Ps 26:1 ElikaDavide. Ngahlulele, Jehova, ngokuba ngihamba ekulungeni kwami; ngithemba uJehova, angiyikuntenga.
Ps 26:2 Ngivivinye, Jehova, ungilinge; hlolisisa izinso zami nenhliziyo yami.
Ps 26:3 Ngokuba ububele bakho buphambi kwamehlo ami; ngihamba eqinisweni lakho.
Ps 26:4 Angihlali nabantu bamanga, angihambelani nezimbulu.
Ps 26:5 Ngiyawuzonda umhlangano wabenza okubi, angihlali nababi.
Ps 26:6 Ngiyahlamba izandla zami ngingenacala, ngizungeza i-altare lakho, Jehova,
Ps 26:7 ukuba ngizwakalise izwi lokudumisa, ngilande ngazo zonke izimangaliso zakho.
Ps 26:8 Jehova, ngiyayithanda inkundla yendlu yakho nendawo lapho kuhlezi khona inkazimulo yakho.
Ps 26:9 Ungamukisi umphefumulo wami kanye nezoni nokuphila kwami kanye nabantu begazi
Ps 26:10 abanehlazo ezandleni zabo, nesokunene sabo sigcwele izipho zenkohliso.
Ps 26:11 Kepha mina ngihamba ekulungeni kwami; ngihlenge, ube nomusa kimi.
Ps 26:12 Unyawo lwami lumi ebaleni; ngizakudumisa uJehova emihlanganweni.
Ps 27:1 ElikaDavide. UJehova ungukukhanya kwami nensindiso yami; ngizakwesaba bani na? UJehova uyinqaba yokuphila kwami; ngizakuba novalo ngobani na?
Ps 27:2 Ekusondeleni kwababi ukuba badle inyama yami abamelene nami nezitha zami bayakhubeka, bawe.
Ps 27:3 Noma impi imisa ngakimi, inhliziyo yami ayesabi; noma ngivukelwa ngukulwa, nokho nginethemba.
Ps 27:4 Kunye engikucele kuJehova, ngiyakufuna khona: ukuba ngihlale endlini kaJehova izinsuku zonke zokuphila kwami ukubona ubuhle bukaJehova, ngibuke ithempeli lakhe.
Ps 27:5 Ngokuba uyangithukusa edokodweni lakhe ngosuku lokuhlupheka, angicashise ekusithekeni kwetende lakhe, angiphakamisele edwaleni.
Ps 27:6 Nakalokhu ikhanda lami lizakuphakama ngaphezu kwezitha zami ezingihaqileyo; ngizakunikela iminikelo yokwethaba etendeni lakhe, ngihlabelele, ngidumise uJehova ngogubhu.
Ps 27:7 Yizwa, Jehova, ngikhala ngezwi elikhulu; yiba nomusa kimi, ungiphendule.
Ps 27:8 Kuwena othi: “Funani ubuso bami,” inhliziyo yami ithi: “Ubuso bakho, Jehova, ngiyabufuna.”
Ps 27:9 Ungafihli ubuso bakho kimi, ungaxoshi inceku yakho ngokuthukuthela; wena ulusizo lwami, ungangilahli, ungangishiyi, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yami.
Ps 27:10 Ngokuba ubaba nomame bangishiyile, kodwa uJehova uzakungamukela.
Ps 27:11 Ngifundise indlela yakho, Jehova, ungihole endleleni ekhanyayo ngenxa yezitha zami.
Ps 27:12 Unganginikeli entandweni yezitha zami; ngokuba ofakazi bamanga bangivukele kanye nabafutha ukudlozomela.
Ps 27:13 Yeka, uma bengingathembanga ukubona okuhle kukaJehova ezweni labaphilayo!
Ps 27:14 Lindela uJehova, uqine, inhliziyo yakho ime isibindi; yebo, lindela uJehova.
Ps 28:1 ElikaDavide. Ngikhala kuwe Jehova; Dwala lami, ungabi yisithulu kimi, funa kuthi, uma uthula kimi, ngifane nabashona emgodini.
Ps 28:2 Yizwa izwi lokunxusa kwami, nxa ngikhala kuwe, ngiphakamisela izandla zami endaweni yakho engcwelengcwele.
Ps 28:3 Ungangimukisi kanye nababi nabenza okubi abakhuluma ukuthula nabakhelwane babo, kanti kukhona okubi ezinhliziyweni zabo.
Ps 28:4 Banike njengokwenza kwabo nanjengobubi bemisebenzi yabo; banike njengokwenza kwezandla zabo, baphindisele abakwenzileyo.
Ps 28:5 Ngokuba abayinaki imisebenzi kaJehova nokwenza kwezandla zakhe; uyakubadiliza, angabakhi.
Ps 28:6 Makabongwe uJehova, ngokuba ulizwile izwi lokunxusa kwami.
Ps 28:7 UJehova ungamandla ami nesihlangu sami; inhliziyo yami ithembe kuye, ngasizwa; ngakho-ke inhliziyo yami iyethaba; ngizakumdumisa ngesihlabelelo sami.
Ps 28:8 UJehova ungamandla abantu bakhe; uyinqaba yensindiso yogcotshiweyo wakhe.
Ps 28:9 Sindisa abantu bakho, ubusise ifa lakho, ubaluse, ubathwale kuze kube phakade.
Ps 29:1 Ihubo likaDavide. Mnikeni uJehova, nina madodana kaNkulunkulu, mnikeni uJehova udumo namandla.
Ps 29:2 Mnikeni uJehova udumo lwegama lakhe, nikhuleke kuJehova emvunulweni engcwele.
Ps 29:3 Izwi likaJehova liphezu kwamanzi, uNkulunkulu wenkazimulo uyaduma; uJehova uphezu kwamanzi amakhulu.
Ps 29:4 Izwi likaJehova linamandla; izwi likaJehova linenkazimulo.
Ps 29:5 Izwi likaJehova liyaphula imisedari; uJehova waphula imisedari yaseLebanoni.
Ps 29:6 ILebanoni ulitshekulisisa okwenkonyane, neSiriyoni njengethole lenyathi.
Ps 29:7 Izwi likaJehova lidabula amalangabi omlilo.
Ps 29:8 Izwi likaJehova lizamazamisa ihlane; uJehova uzamazamisa ihlane laseKadeshi.
Ps 29:9 Izwi likaJehova liphunzisa izimbabala; lihluba amahlathi; nasethempelini lakhe konke kuthi: “Udumo!”
Ps 29:10 UJehova wayehlezi ebusa phezu kukazamcolo; uJehova uhlezi eyinkosi kuze kube phakade.
Ps 29:11 UJehova uzakunika abantu bakhe amandla; uJehova uzakubusisa abantu bakhe ngokuthula.
Ps 30:1 Ihubo. Igama lokuvula indlu. ElikaDavide. Ngiyakuphakamisa, Jehova, ngokuba ungikhuphulile; awuvumanga ukuba izitha zami zijabule phezu kwami.
Ps 30:2 Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ngakhala kuwe, wangiphilisa.
Ps 30:3 Jehova, umphefumulo wami uwukhuphulile endaweni yabafileyo, wangiphilisa phakathi kwabashona emgodini.
Ps 30:4 Dumisani uJehova nina enimkhonzayo, nibonge igama lakhe elingcwele.
Ps 30:5 Ngokuba ukuthukuthela kwakhe kuba ngokomzuzwana nje, umusa wakhe uba ngowokuphila konke; kusihlwa kungena ukukhala, ekuseni ukujabula.
Ps 30:6 Mina ngithe ekubuseni kwami: Angisoze nganyakaziswa naphakade.
Ps 30:7 Jehova, ngomusa wakho ubuwenzile ukuba iqine intaba yami; wabufihla ubuso bakho, ngase ngithuthumela.
Ps 30:8 Ngakhala kuwe Jehova; nganxusa kuJehova, ngathi:
Ps 30:9 “Kukhona nzuzoni egazini lami nasekushoneni kwami egebeni na? Uthuli luzakukudumisa yini, lushumayele iqiniso lakho, na?
Ps 30:10 Yizwa, Jehova, ube nomusa kimi; Jehova, yiba ngumsizi wami.”
Ps 30:11 Waphendula ukukhala kwami kwaba ngukusina; wangikhumula izingubo zami zokulila, wangembathisa ukujabula,
Ps 30:12 ukuze umphefumulo wami ukudumise, ungathuli; Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ngizakukubonga kuze kube phakade.
Ps 31:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Ithemba lami ngilibeka kuwe Jehova; mawungangijabhisi naphakade; ngikhulule ngokulunga kwakho.
Ps 31:2 Beka kimi indlebe yakho, ungophule masinyane, ube yidwala eliqinileyo kimi, indlu yezinqaba yokungisindisa.
Ps 31:3 Ngokuba wena uyidwala lami nenqaba yami; ngenxa yegama lakho uyakungihola, ungiqondise.
Ps 31:4 Uyakungikhipha enetheni abangicuphe ngalo, ngokuba wena uyinqaba yami.
Ps 31:5 Ngibeka umoya wami esandleni sakho; uyangihlenga, Jehova Nkulunkulu othembekayo.
Ps 31:6 Ngiyabazonda abakhonza onkulunkulu abayize, kepha mina ngithemba uJehova.
Ps 31:7 Ngizakwethaba, ngijabule ngomusa wakho, ngokuba ukubonile ukuhlupheka kwami, wazinaka izinsizi zomphefumulo wami;
Ps 31:8 awunginikelanga esandleni sesitha, wazimisa izinyawo zami endaweni ebanzi.
Ps 31:9 Yiba nomusa kimi, Jehova, ngokuba ngiyahlupheka; iso lami liyafa usizi, nomphefumulo wami nomzimba wami.
Ps 31:10 Ngokuba ukuphila kwami kuphelela osizini, neminyaka yami ekububuleni; amandla ami aphelile ngokona kwami, namathambo ami ancunzekile.
Ps 31:11 Ngenxa yezitha zami zonke sengaba yisihlamba, ikakhulu kubakhelwane bami ngaba ngobesabisayo abangane bami; abangibona endleleni bayangibalekela.
Ps 31:12 Sengakhohlakala enhliziyweni njengofileyo; nginjengesitsha esifileyo.
Ps 31:13 Ngokuba ngikuzwile ukuhleba kwabaningi ngokwesabisayo nxazonke; besenza icebo ngami bahlosa ukubulala umphefumulo wami.
Ps 31:14 Kepha mina ngithemba wena Jehova; ngithi: “UnguNkulunkulu wami.”
Ps 31:15 Izikhathi zami zisesandleni sakho; ngikhulule esandleni sezitha zami nakwabangizingelayo.
Ps 31:16 Khanyisa ubuso bakho phezu kwenceku yakho; ngisindise ngomusa wakho.
Ps 31:17 Jehova, mawungangijabhisi, ngokuba ngiyakubiza; mabajabhiswe ababi, bathuliswe endaweni yabafileyo.
Ps 31:18 Mazithuliswe izindebe zamanga ezijivaza olungileyo ngokuzidla nangokweyisa.
Ps 31:19 Yeka ubukhulu bomusa wakho obagodlele wona abakwesabayo, owenzele bona ababalekela kuwe, phambi kwabantwana babantu.
Ps 31:20 Ubafihla ekusithekeni kobuso bakho ngenxa yezigungu zabantu; ubalondoloza edokodweni ekuxabaneni kwezilimi.
Ps 31:21 Makabongwe uJehova, ngokuba ungenzele umusa wakhe omangalisayo emzini oqinileyo.
Ps 31:22 Mina-ke ngithe ovalweni lwami: Ngixoshiwe emehlweni akho; nokho walizwa izwi lokunxusa kwami ekukhaleni kwami kuwe.
Ps 31:23 Mthandeni uJehova nina nonke enimkhonzayo; uJehova uyabalondoloza abakholekileyo, amphindisele kakhulu ozidlayo.
Ps 31:24 Qinani, inhliziyo yenu ibe nesibindi, nina nonke enithemba uJehova.
Ps 32:1 ElikaDavide. IMaskili. Ubusisiwe osiphambeko sakhe sithethelelwe, osono sakhe sisibekelwe.
Ps 32:2 Ubusisiwe umuntu uJehova angambaleli isiphambeko, kungekho nkohliso emoyeni wakhe.
Ps 32:3 Kwathi ngithule, amathambo ami aguga ngokububula kwami usuku lonke.
Ps 32:4 Ngokuba imini nobusuku isandla sakho sasinzima phezu kwami, uloya lwami loma njengokomisa kwehlobo. Sela
Ps 32:5 Ngasivuma isono sami kuwe, angisifihlanga isiphambeko sami; ngathi: “Ngizakuzivuma izono zami kuJehova,” wena wathethelela icala lesono sami. Sela
Ps 32:6 Ngakho-ke yilowo nalowo olungileyo makakhuleke kuwe ngesikhathi sokukufumana; impela kuyakuthi lapho amanzi amakhulu ekhukhula, angafinyeleli kuye.
Ps 32:7 Wena uyindawo yami yokucasha; uyangilondoloza ngingahlupheki; ungiphahla ngenjabulo yokukhululwa. Sela
Ps 32:8 Ngizakukufundisa, ngikubonise indlela ozakuhamba ngayo; ngizakukululeka ngeso lami.
Ps 32:9 Ningabi njengehhashi nembongolo engenangqondo; umkhala netomu yimvunulo yayo yokuyiqondisa, uma ingasondeli kuwe.
Ps 32:10 Omubi unezinhlupheko eziningi, kepha othemba uJehova umusa uyakumphahla.
Ps 32:11 Jabulani kuJehova, nethabe nina balungileyo, nethabe nina nonke baqotho ngenhliziyo.
Ps 33:1 Yethabani kuJehova nina balungileyo; ukudumisa kubafanele abaqotho.
Ps 33:2 Bongani uJehova ngehabhu; mdumiseni ngogubhu oluzintambo ziyishumi.
Ps 33:3 Mhubeleni ihubo elisha, nibethe kahle ngenhlokomo.
Ps 33:4 Ngokuba izwi likaJehova lilungile; zonke izenzo zakhe ziyakholeka.
Ps 33:5 Uthanda ukulunga nokwahlulela; umhlaba ugcwele umusa kaJehova.
Ps 33:6 Ngezwi likaJehova izulu lenziwa, namabandla onke ngomoya womlomo wakhe.
Ps 33:7 Ubuthela ndawonye amanzi olwandle njengenqwaba; uwabeka ajulileyo ezinqolobaneni.
Ps 33:8 Umhlaba wonke mawumesabe uJehova; bonke abakhileyo ezweni mabathuthumele phambi kwakhe.
Ps 33:9 Ngokuba wakhuluma, kwaba khona; wayaleza, kwema khona.
Ps 33:10 UJehova uchitha icebo labezizwe; uphuthisa imicabango yabantu.
Ps 33:11 Icebo likaJehova limi phakade, nemicabango yenhliziyo yakhe ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 33:12 Sibusisiwe isizwe esiNkulunkulu waso nguJehova, isizwe asikhethileyo sibe yifa lakhe.
Ps 33:13 UJehova uyabheka esezulwini; uyababona bonke abantwana babantu.
Ps 33:14 Esendaweni lapho ehlala khona uyababuka bonke abakhileyo ezweni,
Ps 33:15 yena owadala izinhliziyo zabo bonke, oqaphela zonke izenzo zabo.
Ps 33:16 Ayikho inkosi esindiswa ngobuningi bempi yayo; isiqhwaga asikhululwa ngobukhulu bamandla aso.
Ps 33:17 Ihhashi liyize ekusindiseni, alihlangulisi ngobukhulu bamandla alo.
Ps 33:18 Bheka, iso likaJehova liphezu kwabamesabayo, abathemba umusa wakhe,
Ps 33:19 ukuba akhulule umphefumulo wabo ekufeni, abaphilise endlaleni.
Ps 33:20 Umphefumulo wethu ulindela uJehova; ungukusiza kwethu nesihlangu sethu.
Ps 33:21 Ngalokho inhliziyo yethu ithokoza ngaye, ngokuba sithemba igama lakhe elingcwele.
Ps 33:22 Umusa wakho, Jehova, mawube phezu kwethu, njengalokhu sithemba wena.
Ps 34:1 ElikaDavide mhla ezishaya uhlanya phambi kuka-Abimeleki owamxosha waze wamuka. Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ngezikhathi zonke; ukudunyiswa kwakhe kuyakuba semlonyeni wami njalonjalo.
Ps 34:2 Umphefumulo wami uyakuzibonga ngoJehova; abathobekileyo bayakukuzwa, bajabule.
Ps 34:3 Mtuseni uJehova kanye nami, siphakamise igama lakhe kanyekanye.
Ps 34:4 Ngamfuna uJehova, wangiphendula; wangikhulula kulo lonke uvalo lwami.
Ps 34:5 Babheka kuye phezulu, bakhanya; ubuso babo abusoze bajabha.
Ps 34:6 Nasi isihlupheki esakhala, uJehova wezwa, wasikhulula kuzo zonke izinhlupheko zaso.
Ps 34:7 Ingelosi kaJehova iyamisa nxazonke kubo abamesabayo, ibakhulule.
Ps 34:8 Yizwani nibone ukuthi uJehova muhle; ubusisiwe lowo muntu ophephela kuye.
Ps 34:9 Mesabeni uJehova nina bangcwele bakhe, ngokuba abasweli lutho abamesabayo.
Ps 34:10 Amabhongo ezingonyama ayaswela, alambe, kepha abafuna uJehova abayikuswela lutho oluhle.
Ps 34:11 Zanini, bantwana, ningilalele; ngizakunifundisa ukumesaba uJehova.
Ps 34:12 Ngumuphi umuntu othanda ukuphila, ofisa izinsuku zokuba abone okuhle na?
Ps 34:13 Londa ulimi lwakho kokubi, nezindebe zakho kukho ukukhuluma inkohliso.
Ps 34:14 Deda kukho okubi, wenze okuhle; funa ukuthula, ukujonge.
Ps 34:15 Amehlo kaJehova akubo abalungileyo; izindlebe zakhe zikukho ukukhala kwabo.
Ps 34:16 Ubuso bukaJehova bumelene nabenza okubi ukuba achithe ukukhunjulwa kwabo emhlabeni.
Ps 34:17 Labo bayakhala, uJehova uyezwa; uyabakhulula kuzo zonke izinhlupheko zabo.
Ps 34:18 UJehova useduze nabo abanenhliziyo eyaphukileyo; uyabasindisa abanomoya odabukileyo.
Ps 34:19 Ziningi izinhlupheko zolungileyo, kepha uJehova uyamkhulula kuzo zonke.
Ps 34:20 Uyawagcina onke amathambo akhe; alaphulwa nelilodwa kuwo.
Ps 34:21 Okubi kuyakumbulala omubi; abazonda olungileyo bayakulahlwa ngecala.
Ps 34:22 UJehova ukhulula umphefumulo wezinceku zakhe; akakho kwabamethembayo oyakuba necala.
Ps 35:1 ElikaDavide. Phikisana, Jehova, nabaphikisana nami, ulwe nabo abalwa nami.
Ps 35:2 Thatha ihawu nesihlangu, uvuke, ungisize.
Ps 35:3 Hosha umkhonto, uvimbe indlela kwabangizingelayo; yisho kuwo umphefumulo wami, uthi: “Mina ngiyinsindiso yakho.”
Ps 35:4 Mabajabhe, bahlazeke abafuna umphefumulo wami; mababuyiselwe emuva, bajabhiswe abangisongelayo.
Ps 35:5 Mababe njengamakhoba emoyeni, ingelosi kaJehova ibadudule.
Ps 35:6 Indlela yabo mayibe mnyama, ibebushelezi, ingelosi kaJehova ibaxoshe.
Ps 35:7 Ngokuba bangenzele ngasesitha igebe lenetha labo, kungekho sici, bembele umphefumulo wami umgodi, kungekho cala.
Ps 35:8 Ukubhujiswa makumehlele engazelele; inetha lakhe alibeke ngasesitha malimbambe yena; makawele kulo kube ngukubhujiswa kwakhe.
Ps 35:9 Khona umphefumulo wami uzakwethaba kuJehova, uthokoze ngokusindisa kwakhe.
Ps 35:10 Onke amathambo ami azakuthi: “Jehova, ngubani onjengawe, wena okhulula ohluphekayo, yebo, ohluphekayo nompofu komphangayo, na?”
Ps 35:11 Ofakazi abangalungile bayasukuma, babuza kimi engingakwaziyo.
Ps 35:12 Bangiphindisela okubi ngokuhle; umphefumulo wami bawusozisele.
Ps 35:13 Kanti ekuguleni kwabo mina ngangembethe ezokuzila; umphefumulo wami ngawuhlupha ngokuzila ukudla; umkhuleko wami wabuyela esifubeni sami.
Ps 35:14 Ngahamba kungathi bekungumngane wami nomfowethu; njengokhalela unina ngakhothama ngokulila.
Ps 35:15 Kepha ekuweni kwami bahlekisa ngami, babuthana ndawonye; abashayi engingabaziyo bangibunganyela; badumaza bengayeki.
Ps 35:16 Njengezinteli ezikhonzela ucezu lwesinkwa bangigedlela amazinyo.
Ps 35:17 Nkosi, lokho uzakukubukela kuze kube nini na? Sindisa umphefumulo wami ekubhubhiseni kwabo, ukuphila kwami ezingonyameni ezingamabhongo.
Ps 35:18 Ngizakukubonga ebandleni elikhulu, ngikudumise phakathi kwabantu abaningi.
Ps 35:19 Mabangajabuli ngami abayizitha zami bengenasizathu; mabangaqwayizi amehlo abangizonda ngeze.
Ps 35:20 Ngokuba abakhulumi ukuthula, kepha baqamba amazwi enkohliso ngabazithuleleyo emhlabeni.
Ps 35:21 Yebo, bangikhamisela kakhulu umlomo wabo, bathi: “Ashila, ashila, iso lethu liyabona!”
Ps 35:22 Uyakubona, Jehova; mawungathuli; Nkosi, mawungabi kude nami.
Ps 35:23 Vuka, usukumele ukwahlulelwa kwami, Nkulunkulu wami, Nkosi yami, umele icala lami.
Ps 35:24 Ngahlulele ngokulunga kwakho, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami; mabangajabuli ngami.
Ps 35:25 Mabangasho enhliziyweni yabo ukuthi: “He, kwaya ngesifiso sethu!” Mabangasho ukuthi: “Simgwinyile.”
Ps 35:26 Mabajabhe, babe namahloni bonke abajabula ngokuhlupheka kwami; abazikhukhumeza ngami mabembathiswe ukujabha nendumazo.
Ps 35:27 Mabethabe, bajabule abathokoza ngokulunga kwami; mabathi njalonjalo: “Makadunyiswe uJehova othokoza ngenhlanhla yenceku yakhe.”
Ps 35:28 Ulimi lwami luzakushumayela ngokulunga kwakho, usuku lonke ngodumo lwakho.
Ps 36:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide, inceku kaJehova. Inkulumo yesiphambeko komubi, isekujuleni kwenhliziyo yami, ithi: Akukho ukumesaba uNkulunkulu phambi kwamehlo akhe.
Ps 36:2 Ngokuba ukonakala kwakhe kuyamthopha emehlweni akhe, ukuze kungafunyanwa, azondeke ngakho.
Ps 36:3 Amazwi omlomo wakhe angukona nenkohliso; ukuyekile ukuhlakanipha nokwenza okulungileyo.
Ps 36:4 Uceba okubi ecansini lakhe, uzimisa endleleni engalungile; okubi kakwenyanyi.
Ps 36:5 Jehova, ububele bakho bufinyelela ezulwini, nokuthembeka kwakho kuze kube semafwini.
Ps 36:6 Ukulunga kwakho kunjengezintaba ezinkulukazi, ukwahlulela kwakho kulutwa olukhulu; usindisa abantu nezilwane, Jehova.
Ps 36:7 Ububele bakho, Nkulunkulu, buyigugu elingaka; abantwana babantu bakhosela ethunzini lamaphiko akho.
Ps 36:8 Bayakusutha ngamanoni endlu yakho, ubaphuzise okomfula wokuthokoza kwakho.
Ps 36:9 Ngokuba ukuwe umthombo wokuphila; ekukhanyeni kwakho siyakubona ukukhanya.
Ps 36:10 Mawume umusa wakho kubo abakwaziyo, nokulunga kwakho kubo abaqotho ngenhliziyo.
Ps 36:11 Unyawo loziqhenyayo malungangifikeli; nesandla somubi masingangixoshi.
Ps 36:12 Bheka, bawile abenza okubi; bawiswe phansi, abasenakuvuka.
Ps 37:1 ElikaDavide. Ungazikhathazi ngababi, ungabi namhawu ngabenza okungalungile.
Ps 37:2 Ngokuba bayakusikwa masinyane njengotshani, babune njengemithana eluhlaza.
Ps 37:3 Themba kuJehova, wenze okulungileyo; hlala ezweni, uzondle ngokukholeka;
Ps 37:4 zithokozise ngoJehova, yikhona ezakukunika okufiswa yinhliziyo yakho.
Ps 37:5 Nikela indlela yakho esandleni sikaJehova, umethembe; yena uzakukwenza.
Ps 37:6 Uzakuhlalukisa ukulunga kwakho njengokukhanya, nokufanele wena njengemini.
Ps 37:7 Thula phambi kukaJehova, ulindele yena; ungakhathazeki ngonenhlanhla endleleni yakhe, ngomuntu osongoza amacebo amabi.
Ps 37:8 Pheza ukuthukuthela; yeka ulaka, ungakhathazeki; kubanga ukona nje.
Ps 37:9 Ngokuba ababi bazakuchithwa, kepha abalindela uJehova bazakudla ifa lomhlaba.
Ps 37:10 Kuse ngumzuzwana, omubi angabe esabakho; kuyakuthi lapho uhlola indawo yakhe, uyakube engasekho.
Ps 37:11 Kepha abathobekileyo bazakulidla ifa lomhlaba, bathokoze ngokuthula okukhulu.
Ps 37:12 Omubi uyamsongela olungileyo ngokubi, amgedlele amazinyo.
Ps 37:13 INkosi iyakumhleka, ngokuba iyabona ukuthi usuku lwakhe luyeza.
Ps 37:14 Ababi bahosha inkemba, bansale umnsalo wabo ukuba bamwise phansi ohluphekileyo nompofu, babulale abandlela ilungile.
Ps 37:15 Inkemba yabo izakungena kweyabo inhliziyo, iminsalo yabo yaphulwe.
Ps 37:16 Okuncane anakho olungileyo kungcono kunemfuyo yababi abaningi.
Ps 37:17 Ngokuba izingalo zababi ziyakwaphulwa, kepha uJehova uyabaphasa abalungileyo.
Ps 37:18 UJehova uyazazi izinsuku zabaqotho; ifa labo liyakuma kuze kube phakade.
Ps 37:19 Abayikujabha esikhathini esibi; bayakusutha ezinsukwini zendlala.
Ps 37:20 Ngokuba ababi bayakubhubha; izitha zikaJehova zinjengobuhle bamadlelo: ziyakunyamalala, zinyamalale njengentuthu.
Ps 37:21 Omubi uyatsheleka, angabuyiseli; kepha olungileyo unesihawu, aphane.
Ps 37:22 Ngokuba ababusisiweyo bakhe bazakulidla ifa lomhlaba, kepha abaqalekiswa nguye bazakuchithwa.
Ps 37:23 Izinyathelo zomuntu ziqiniswa nguJehova; uyayithanda indlela yakhe.
Ps 37:24 Noma ekhubeka, akayikuwa phansi, ngokuba uJehova uphasa isandla sakhe.
Ps 37:25 Kade ngimusha, manje sengimdala; angizange ngibone olungileyo eshiyiwe nenzalo yakhe iphanza ukudla.
Ps 37:26 Usuku lonke uyahawukela, atsheleke, nenzalo yakhe iyisibusiso.
Ps 37:27 Deda kokubi, wenze okuhle, uyakuhlala kuze kube phakade.
Ps 37:28 Ngokuba uJehova uthanda ukulunga, akabashiyi abangcwele bakhe; bayalondolozwa kuze kube phakade, kepha inzalo yababi iyachithwa.
Ps 37:29 Abalungileyo bazakudla ifa lomhlaba, bahlale kuwo njalonjalo.
Ps 37:30 Umlomo wolungileyo ushumayela ukuhlakanipha; ulimi lwakhe lukhuluma ukulunga.
Ps 37:31 Umthetho kaNkulunkulu wakhe usenhliziyweni yakhe; izinyathelo zakhe azisheleli.
Ps 37:32 Omubi uqaphela olungileyo, ufuna ukumbulala.
Ps 37:33 UJehova akayikumnikela esandleni sakhe; akayikumlahla lapho ahlulelwa khona.
Ps 37:34 Lindela uJehova, ulonde indlela yakhe; uzakukuphakamisa, udle ifa lomhlaba, ubukele lapho ababi bechithwa khona.
Ps 37:35 Ngambona omubi oyisidlova ezenabisile njengomuthi oluhlaza ogxilileyo;
Ps 37:36 kwathi lapho umuntu edlula, bheka, wayengasekho; ngamfuna, kepha akabe esafunyanwa.
Ps 37:37 Mbhekisise ongasolekiyo, umbone oqotho; ngokuba umuntu wokuthula, ukugcina kwakhe kuhle.
Ps 37:38 Kepha abaphambukayo bayakubhujiswa bonke; isikhathi sababi siyakunqunywa.
Ps 37:39 Ukusindiswa kwabalungileyo kuvela kuJehova; uyinqaba yabo esikhathini sokuhlupheka.
Ps 37:40 UJehova uyabasiza, abakhulule; ubakhulula kwababi, abasindise, ngokuba bayamethemba.
Ps 38:1 Ihubo likaDavide. Elokukhumbuza. Jehova, ungangijezisi ngentukuthelo yakho, ungangishayi ngolaka lwakho.
Ps 38:2 Ngokuba imicibisholo yakho ingihlabile; isandla sakho singicindezele kanzima.
Ps 38:3 Akukho ukuphila enyameni yami ngenxa yentukuthelo yakho; akukho ukuthula emathanjeni ami ngenxa yesono sami.
Ps 38:4 Ngokuba iziphambeko zami zeqile phezu kwekhanda lami; njengomthwalo osindayo ziyangisinda.
Ps 38:5 Izilonda zami ziyanuka, zichicha ubovu ngenxa yobuwula bami.
Ps 38:6 Ngikhonkobele, ngithotshisiwe kakhulu; usuku lonke ngihamba ngilila.
Ps 38:7 Ngokuba ukhalo lwami lutshutshumba kakhulu; akukho ukuphila enyameni yami.
Ps 38:8 Ngibuthakathaka, ngidubekile kabi; ngiyakhala ngenxa yokugqiha kwenhliziyo yami.
Ps 38:9 Nkosi, ukufisa kwami konke kuphambi kwakho; ukububula kwami akufihlekile kuwe.
Ps 38:10 Inhliziyo yami iyagquma kakhulu; amandla ami angishiyile, ngisho nokukhanya kwamehlo ami akusekho kimi.
Ps 38:11 Abathandekayo bami nabahlobo bami bemi kude nokuhlupheka kwami; abakwethu bemi kude laphaya.
Ps 38:12 Abafuna umphefumulo wami bayangicupha; abafuna ukungilimaza bakhuluma okubi, bazindla inkohliso usuku lonke.
Ps 38:13 Mina kodwa nginjengesithulu, angizwa; nginjengesimungulu esingavuli umlomo waso.
Ps 38:14 Yebo, nginjengomuntu ongezwayo; akukho ukuphikisa emlonyeni wakhe.
Ps 38:15 Ngokuba ngithemba wena Jehova; wena Nkosi Nkulunkulu wami uzakuphendula.
Ps 38:16 Ngokuba ngithe: “Funa bajabule ngami, ekusheleleni konyawo lwami bazikhukhumeze ngami.”
Ps 38:17 Ngokuba ngiseduze kokuwa, nobuhlungu bami buphambi kwami ngezikhathi zonke.
Ps 38:18 Ngokuba ngiyabika ukona kwami; ngiyadabuka ngesono sami.
Ps 38:19 Kepha izitha zami ziphilile, zinamandla; baningi abangizonda ngeze.
Ps 38:20 Abaphindisela okubi ngokuhle bamelene nami, ngokuba ngilandela okulungileyo.
Ps 38:21 Ungangishiyi, Jehova; Nkulunkulu wami, ungabi kude nami.
Ps 38:22 Phuthuma, ungisize, Nkosi, nsindiso yami.
Ps 39:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela; kuJeduthuni. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngithe: “Ngizakulinda izindlela zami ukuba ngingoni ngolimi lwami; ngizakugcina umlomo wami ngesifonyo, omubi esekhona phambi kwamehlo ami.”
Ps 39:2 Ngabindela impela, ngathula nakukho okuhle; kwavuswa ubuhlungu bami.
Ps 39:3 Inhliziyo yami yavutha phakathi kwami; kwaphembeka umlilo ngisazindla; ngakhuluma ngolimi lwami.
Ps 39:4 “Jehova, ngazise ukuphela kwami, nesilinganiso sezinsuku zami ukuba siyini; mangazi ukuthi ngingodlulayo.
Ps 39:5 Bheka, izinsuku zami wazenza zaba ngangobubanzi besandla; imihla yokuphila kwami ayilutho kuwe; impela yilowo nalowo muntu ungumoya nje, noma eqine kangakanani. Sela
Ps 39:6 “Impela umuntu uhamba njengesithunzi nje; impela uzikhathaza ngokuyize nje; unqwabela imfuyo, kepha akazi ukuthi ngubani ozakuyibutha.
Ps 39:7 “Kalokhu-ke, Nkosi, ngilindele ntoni na? Ithemba lami likuwe.
Ps 39:8 Ngisindise kuzo iziphambeko zami, ungangenzi isithuko sesiwula.
Ps 39:9 Ngiyathula, angivuli umlomo wami; ngokuba nguwe okwenzileyo.
Ps 39:10 Susa kimi ukushaya kwakho, ngokuba ngiyaqedwa ngukushaywa yisandla sakho.
Ps 39:11 Nxa ulaya umuntu ngesijeziso ngenxa yeziphambeko, ubuhle bakhe ubenza buphele njengenundu; yilowo nalowo muntu ungumoya nje. Sela
Ps 39:12 “Yizwa umkhuleko wami, Jehova, ulalele ukumemeza kwami; ungathuli ngezinyembezi zami, ngokuba ngingumfokazi kuwe; ngiyisihambi njengokhokho bami bonke.
Ps 39:13 Yeka ukungibuka, ngize ngincibilike, ngingakamuki lapha, ngingabe ngisabakho.”
Ps 40:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Bengilindela uJehova; wayesezikhothamisela kimi, wezwa ukukhala kwami.
Ps 40:2 Wangikhipha emgodini wokubhujiswa odakeni lobishi, wamisa izinyawo zami edwaleni, waqinisa izinyathelo zami.
Ps 40:3 Wabeka igama elisha emlonyeni wami, igama lokubonga uNkulunkulu wethu; abaningi bayakukubona, besabe, bamethembe uJehova.
Ps 40:4 Ubusisiwe umuntu obeka ithemba lakhe kuJehova, ongaphendukeli kwabazidlayo nakwabaphambukela emangeni.
Ps 40:5 Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ziningi izimangaliso zakho ozenzileyo, nezizindlo zakho ngathi; akukho okungafaniswa nawe; uma ngiyilanda, ngiyisho, miningi kunokuba ibalwe.
Ps 40:6 Umhlatshelo nomnikelo wokudla awuwuthandi; izindlebe zami uzibhobozile; umnikelo wokushiswa nomnikelo wesono awuwubizi.
Ps 40:7 Ngase ngithi: “Bheka, ngiyeza; encwadini esongwayo kulotshiwe ngami ukuthi:
Ps 40:8 Ngiyathanda ukwenza intando yakho, Nkulunkulu wami, nomthetho wakho usenhliziyweni yami.”
Ps 40:9 Ngishumayelile ukulunga ebandleni elikhulu; bheka, angizivalanga izindebe zami; Jehova, wena uyakwazi.
Ps 40:10 Ukulunga kwakho angikuthukusanga enhliziyweni yami; ngashumayela ukukholeka kwakho nensindiso yakho; umusa wakho neqiniso lakho angikufihlelanga ibandla elikhulu.
Ps 40:11 Wena Jehova ungangigodleli ububele bakho; umusa wakho neqiniso lakho makungilonde njalo.
Ps 40:12 Ngokuba izinhlupheko ezingenakubalwa zingihaqile, iziphambeko zami zingificile, angaze ngaba nakubona; ziningi kunezinwele zekhanda lami; inhliziyo yami ingishiyile.
Ps 40:13 Makuthandeke kuwe Jehova ukuba ungikhulule; Jehova, mawuphuthume ungisize.
Ps 40:14 Mabajabhe, babe namahloni bonke abafuna umphefumulo wami ukuba bawuhlwithe; abafisa ukulimala kwami mababuyiselwe emuva, bajabhiswe.
Ps 40:15 Mabashaqeke ngenxa yehlazo labo abathi kimi: “Ashila, ashila!”
Ps 40:16 Mabethabe, bajabule kuwe bonke abakufunayo; abathanda insindiso yakho mabasho njalo, bathi: “Makadunyiswe uJehova.”
Ps 40:17 Noma ngihlupheka, ngimpofu, iNkosi iyanginaka; wena ungumsizi wami noMsindisi wami; Nkulunkulu wami, mawungalibali.
Ps 41:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Ubusisiwe onakekela ohluphekayo; uJehova uyakumsindisa osukwini olubi.
Ps 41:2 UJehova uyakumlondoloza, amphilise; uyakubusiswa emhlabeni; awuyikumnikela entandweni yezitha zakhe.
Ps 41:3 UJehova uyakumphasa ecansini egula; wena uyakuguqula ukhukho lwakhe ekuguleni kwakhe.
Ps 41:4 Mina ngithi: “Jehova, ngihawukele, uphulukise umphefumulo wami, ngokuba ngonile kuwe.”
Ps 41:5 Izitha zami zikhuluma okubi ngami, zithi: “Uzakufa nini, igama lakhe lichitheke, na?”
Ps 41:6 Nalapho kuza ozongibona, ukhuluma amanga; inhliziyo yakhe izibuthela ukonakala, abesephuma akhulume ngakho.
Ps 41:7 Bonke abangizondayo banyenyezelana ngami: bangisongozela okubi, bathi:
Ps 41:8 “Into embi inamathele kuye; olele phansi kasayikululama.”
Ps 41:9 Yebo, nomhlobo wami ebengimethemba, obedla isinkwa sami, ungiphakamisele isithende sakhe.
Ps 41:10 Kepha wena Jehova, ngihawukele, ungilulamise, ukuze ngibaphindisele.
Ps 41:11 Ngalokho ngiyazi ukuthi uyangithanda, ngokuba isitha sami asihalalisi phezu kwami.
Ps 41:12 Mina uyangimisa ebuqothweni bami; uyangibeka phambi kobuso bakho kuze kube phakade.
Ps 41:13 Makabongwe uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade. Amen, Amen.
Ps 42:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. IMaskili lamadodana kaKora. Njengendluzele ilangazelela amanzi emifula, kanjalo umphefumulo wami ulangazelela wena Nkulunkulu.
Ps 42:2 Umphefumulo wami womela uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu ophilayo; ngiyakufika nini, ngibonakale phambi kukaNkulunkulu, na?
Ps 42:3 Izinyembezi zami zingukudla kwami imini nobusuku, ngokuba usuku lonke bathi kimi: “Uphi uNkulunkulu wakho na?”
Ps 42:4 Ngiyakukhumbula lokhu, ngithulule umphefumulo wami phakathi kwami, njengalokho ngangihamba esixukwini ngiya naso endlini kaNkulunkulu ngenhlokomo yokwethaba nokubonga, ibandla ligubha umkhosi.
Ps 42:5 Yini ukuba udangale, mphefumulo wami, uyaluze phakathi kwami, na? Methembe uNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngisezakumdumisa ngokusindisa kobuso bakhe.
Ps 42:6 Nkulunkulu wami, umphefumulo wami udangele phakathi kwami; ngakho-ke ngikhumbula wena ezweni laseJordani, nakwelamaHermoni, nasentabeni yaseMisari.
Ps 42:7 Utwa lubizana notwa ekuhlokomeni kwezimpophoma zakho; onke amadlambi akho namaza akho eqile phezu kwami.
Ps 42:8 Emini uJehova uyaleza umusa wakhe; ebusuku isihlabelelo sakhe sikimi, ngikhuleke kuNkulunkulu wokuphila kwami.
Ps 42:9 Ngizakuthi kuNkulunkulu, iDwala lami: “Ungikhohlweleni na? Ngihambelani ngilila, ngicindezelwe yisitha, na?”
Ps 42:10 Kunjengokuphohlozwa kwamathambo ami, nxa izitha zami zingiklolodela, zithi kimi usuku lonke: “Uphi uNkulunkulu wakho na?”
Ps 42:11 Yini ukuba udangale, mphefumulo wami, uyaluze phakathi kwami, na? Methembe uNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngisezakumdumisa yena oyinsindiso yobuso bami noNkulunkulu wami.
Ps 43:1 Ngahlulele, Nkulunkulu ungimele endabeni yami esizweni esingenamusa, ngikhulule kumuntu wenkohliso nongenakulunga.
Ps 43:2 Ngokuba wena Nkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sami; ungilahleleni na? Ngihambelani ngilila, ngicindezelwe yisitha, na?
Ps 43:3 Thuma ukukhanya kwakho neqiniso lakho, kungihole, kungiyise entabeni yakho engcwele nasezindlini zakho,
Ps 43:4 ngize ngifike kulo i-altare likaNkulunkulu, kuNkulunkulu wenjabulo yokwethaba kwami, ngikudumise ngehabhu, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wami.
Ps 43:5 Yini ukuba udangale, mphefumulo wami, uyaluze phakathi kwami, na? ngisezakumdumisa yena oyinsindiso yobuso bami noNkulunkulu wami.
Ps 44:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. IMaskili. Nkulunkulu, sizwile ngezindlebe zethu, okhokho besilandisa ngesenzo owasenzayo emihleni yabo, emihleni yasendulo.
Ps 44:2 Nguwe owabaxosha abezizwe ngesandla sakho, kepha bona wabatshala; wazichitha izizwe, kepha bona wabandisa.
Ps 44:3 Ngokuba abalidlanga izwe ngenkemba yabo, nengalo yabo ayibasindisanga; kepha kwaba yisandla sakho sokunene, nengalo yakho, nokukhanya kobuso bakho, ngokuba wawubathanda.
Ps 44:4 Wena Nkulunkulu uyinkosi yami; yaleza ukusindiswa kukaJakobe.
Ps 44:5 Ngawe sizakulahla phansi izitha zethu; ngegama lakho sizakunyathela abasivukelayo.
Ps 44:6 Ngokuba angiwethembi umnsalo wami, nenkemba yami ayingisindisi;
Ps 44:7 kepha nguwe owasisindisa ezitheni zethu, wajabhisa abasizondayo.
Ps 44:8 Sizincoma ngoNkulunkulu usuku lonke; igama lakho siyalibonga kuze kube phakade. Sela
Ps 44:9 Nokho ususilahlile, wasijabhisa; awusaphumi nezimpi zethu.
Ps 44:10 Usihlehlisela emuva esitheni; abasizondayo bayaziphangela.
Ps 44:11 Usinikezele ukudliwa njengezimvu, wasihlakaza phakathi kwabezizwe.
Ps 44:12 Uthengisa ngesizwe sakho ngokuyize; awuzuzi lutho ngokubiza ngaso.
Ps 44:13 Usenza isihlamba kubakhelwane bethu, inhlekiso nendumazo kwabasiphahlileyo.
Ps 44:14 Usenza isaga kwabezizwe, banikine ikhanda phakathi kwabantu.
Ps 44:15 Usuku lonke ukudunyazwa kwami kuphambi kwami, namahloni amboza ubuso bami
Ps 44:16 ngenxa yoklolodayo nojivazayo, ngenxa yesitha nomphindiseli.
Ps 44:17 Konke lokho kusehlele, kodwa asikukhohlwanga wena; asisaphulanga isivumelwano sakho.
Ps 44:18 Inhliziyo yethu ayibuyelanga emuva; izinyathelo zethu aziphambukanga endleleni yakho,
Ps 44:19 uze usiphahlaze endaweni yezimpungushe, usimboze ngethunzi lokufa.
Ps 44:20 Uma ngabe sikhohliwe igama likaNkulunkulu wethu, sazelulela izandla zethu kunkulunkulu mumbe,
Ps 44:21 uNkulunkulu ubengayikukuhlola na? Ngokuba yena uyazazi izimfihlakalo zenhliziyo.
Ps 44:22 Yebo, ngenxa yakho sibulawa usuku lonke, siphathiswa okwezimvu zokuhlatshwa.
Ps 44:23 Vuka, Nkosi! Ulaleleni na? Vuka, ungasilahli njalonjalo.
Ps 44:24 Ubufihlelani ubuso bakho, ukhohlwe ukuhlupheka nokucindezelwa kwethu, na?
Ps 44:25 Ngokuba umphefumulo wethu ukhothamele othulini; umzimba wethu unamathele emhlabathini.
Ps 44:26 Sukuma, usisize, usihlenge ngenxa yomusa wakho.
Ps 45:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Iminduze. Elamadodana kaKora. IMaskili. Igama lothando. Inhliziyo yami iyachichima ngendaba enhle; ngikhuluma igama engiliqambe ngenkosi; ulimi lwami lulusiba loloba ngokushesha.
Ps 45:2 Umuhle wena kunabantwana babantu; ubuhle buthululelwe ezindebeni zakho; ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu ukubusisile kuze kube phakade.
Ps 45:3 Bophela inkemba yakho okhalweni lwakho wena qhawe, kube ngukuphakama kwakho nobukhosi bakho.
Ps 45:4 Hlahlameleka ebukhosini bakho, uqhubeke ngenxa yeqiniso nokuthobeka nokulunga; isandla sakho sokunene siyakukufundisa izinto ezesabekayo.
Ps 45:5 Imicibisholo yakho ibukhali, izizwe ziyawa phansi kwakho; isenhliziyweni yezitha zenkosi.
Ps 45:6 Isihlalo sakho sobukhosi, Nkulunkulu, singesaphakade naphakade; intonga yobuqotho iyintonga yombuso wakho.
Ps 45:7 Ukuthandile ukulunga, wakuzonda okubi: ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcobile ngamafutha enjabulo ngokungaphezu kwabangane bakho.
Ps 45:8 Zonke izingubo zakho ziqholiwe ngenhlaka, nenhlaba, nekasiya; ezindlini zobukhosi zophondo lwendlovu ukubethwa kwezingubhu zezintambo kukujabulisile.
Ps 45:9 Amadodakazi amakhosi aphakathi kwabesifazane bakho abadumileyo; inkosikazi imi ngakwesokunene sakho, ihlobe igolide lase-Ofiri.
Ps 45:10 Mawuzwe-ke, ndodakazi, uqaphele, ubeke indlebe yakho, ukhohlwe isizwe sakini nendlu kayihlo,
Ps 45:11 yikhona inkosi izakubuthanda ubuhle bakho, ngokuba yona iyinkosi yakho, woyikhothamela.
Ps 45:12 Indodakazi yaseTire, yebo, nabacebileyo babantu bancenga umusa wakho ngesipho.
Ps 45:13 Indodakazi yenkosi inhle kakhulu, ilapho phakathi; ingubo yayo yalukiwe ngegolide.
Ps 45:14 Iyiswa enkosini igqoke izingubo ezifekethisiweyo; izintombi ezingabangane bayo ziyayilandela; ziyiswa kuwe.
Ps 45:15 Ziyiswa ngokujabula nangokwethaba, zingena endlini yenkosi.
Ps 45:16 Amadodana akho ayakuba sesikhundleni sawoyihlo; uyakuwabeka abe yizikhulu emhlabeni wonke.
Ps 45:17 Igama lakho ngiyakulenza likhunjulwe ezizukulwaneni zonke; ngakho-ke izizwe ziyakukubonga kuze kube phakade naphakade.
Ps 46:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. Nge-Alamoti. Igama. UNkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sethu namandla ethu; ufunyaniswa elusizo impela ekuhluphekeni.
Ps 46:2 Ngakho-ke asiyikwesaba nokuba kuguquka umhlaba, nezintaba zidilikela ekujuleni kolwandle,
Ps 46:3 nokuba amanzi alo ehlokoma, ekhephuza, nezintaba zizamazama ngokukhukhumala kwalo. Sela
Ps 46:4 Ukhona umfula omanzi awo athokozisa umuzi kaNkulunkulu, indlu engcwele yoPhezukonke.
Ps 46:5 UNkulunkulu uphakathi kwawo, awuyikuzanyazanyiswa; uNkulunkulu uyakuwusiza ngovivi lokusa.
Ps 46:6 Izizwe ziyaxokozela; imibuso iyazamazama; uphumisela izwi lakhe, umhlaba uncibilike.
Ps 46:7 UJehova Sebawoti unathi; uNkulunkulu kaJakobe uyinqaba yethu. Sela
Ps 46:8 Wozani nibone izenzo zikaJehova, izincithakalo azenzileyo emhlabeni.
Ps 46:9 Uphelisa ukulwa kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba; uyaphula umnsalo, anqume umkhonto, izinqola zempi azishise ngomlilo.

Ps 47:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Shayani izandla, zizwe zonke; hlokomani kuNkulunkulu ngezwi lokuhalalisa.
Ps 47:2 Ngokuba uJehova oPhezukonke uyesabeka; uyinkosi enkulu phezu komhlaba wonke.
Ps 47:3 Wathobisa abantu phansi kwethu, nezizwe phansi kwezinyawo zethu.
Ps 47:4 Wasikhethela ifa lethu, udumo lukaJakobe amthandayo. Sela
Ps 47:5 UNkulunkulu wenyukile ngokuhlokoma, uJehova ngokukhala kwecilongo.
Ps 47:6 Hubelani uNkulunkulu, hubani! Hubelani iNkosi yethu, hubani!
Ps 47:7 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyinkosi yomhlaba wonke; hubani ihubo!
Ps 47:8 UNkulunkulu uyabusa izizwe; uNkulunkulu uhlezi esihlalweni sakhe esingcwele sobukhosi.
Ps 47:9 Izikhulu zabantu zibuthene, zibe yisizwe sikaNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, ngokuba izihlangu zomhlaba zingezikaNkulunkulu; uphakeme kakhulu.
Ps 48:1 Igama. Ihubo lamadodana kaKora. Mkhulu uJehova, udunyiswa kakhulu emzini kaNkulunkulu wethu entabeni yakhe engcwele.
Ps 48:2 Inhle ngokuphakama, ingukuthokoza komhlaba wonke intaba yaseSiyoni emaceleni asenyakatho, umuzi weNkosi enkulu.
Ps 48:3 UNkulunkulu uyaziwa ezindlini zawo zobukhosi ukuthi uyinqaba.
Ps 48:4 Ngokuba bheka, amakhosi abuthana; aqhubeka kanyekanye.
Ps 48:5 Abona, ayesemangala; ashaywa luvalo, aphaphatheka.
Ps 48:6 Ehlelwa lapho ngukuthuthumela, yivuso njengakobelethayo.
Ps 48:7 Ngomoya wasempumalanga waphula imikhumbi yaseTharishishi.
Ps 48:8 Njengalokho sizwile, kanjalo sikubonile emzini kaJehova Sebawoti, emzini kaNkulunkulu wethu; uNkulunkulu uyakuwumisa kuze kube phakade. Sela
Ps 48:9 Siyazindla ngomusa wakho, Jehova, siphakathi ethempelini lakho.
Ps 48:10 Njengalo igama lakho, Nkulunkulu, kunjalo ukubongwa kwakho kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba; isandla sakho sokunene sigcwele ukulunga.
Ps 48:11 Mayijabule intaba yaseSiyoni, kwethabe amadodakazi akwaJuda ngenxa yezahlulelo zakho.
Ps 48:12 Zungezani iSiyoni, nilikake, nibale imibhoshongo yalo.
Ps 48:13 Qaphelani izindonga zalo, nidabule izindlu zalo zobukhosi, ukuze nilandisele isizukulwane esizayo.
Ps 48:14 Ngokuba lo Nkulunkulu, unguNkulunkulu wethu phakade naphakade; uzakusihola kuze kube sekufeni.
Ps 49:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Yizwani lokhu nonke nina bantu; bekani indlebe nina nonke enakhileyo ezweni,
Ps 49:2 abantukazana nezikhulu, abacebileyo nabampofu.
Ps 49:3 Umlomo wami uzakukhuluma ukuhlakanipha, ukuzindla kwenhliziyo yami kuzakuba ngokokuqonda.
Ps 49:4 Ngizakubeka indlebe yami kuso isaga, ngiphenye imfumbe yami ngehabhu.
Ps 49:5 Bengizakwesabelani ezinsukwini ezimbi, lapha ububi babangizingelayo bungihaqa,
Ps 49:6 labo abathemba imfuyo yabo bezigabisa ngomcebo wabo omkhulu, na?
Ps 49:7 Umuntu angemhlenge umfowabo, angemnike uNkulunkulu ihlawulo ngaye.
Ps 49:8 Ngokuba ukuhlengwa komphefumulo wabo kubiza kakhulu; akunakuphela nanini
Ps 49:9 ukuba aphile njalo, angaboni ukubola.
Ps 49:10 Qha, uyakubona ukuthi abahlakaniphileyo bayafa nokuthi isiwula kanye nesiphukuphuku ziyabhubha, imfuyo yabo bayishiyele abanye.
Ps 49:11 Ukucabanga kwabo kuthi izindlu zabo zizakuma kuze kube phakade, nemizi yabo ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane; amazwe abo bawabiza ngamagama abo.
Ps 49:12 Kepha umuntu, nokuba enodumo, akayikuma; ufana nezilwane ezibhubhayo.
Ps 49:13 Le ndlela yabo ingubuwula babo, balandelwa ngabavumela umlomo wabo. Sela
Ps 49:14 Baqhutshelwa endaweni yabafileyo njengezimvu; ukufa kuyakubalusa, abaqotho babuse phezu kwabo ngakusasa, isimo sabo siqedwe yindawo yabafileyo, bangabe besaba nandlu.
Ps 49:15 Kepha uNkulunkulu uyakuwukhulula umphefumulo wami esandleni sendawo yabafileyo, ngokuba uyakungamukela. Sela
Ps 49:16 Ungesabi, nxa umuntu eceba, nxa ubukhosi bendlu yakhe banda.
Ps 49:17 Ngokuba ekufeni kwakhe akayikuphatha lutho; ubukhosi bakhe abuyikwehla naye.
Ps 49:18 Noma ebusisa umphefumulo wakhe esaphila, futhi abantu bekudumisa, ngokuba uzondle kahle,
Ps 49:19 nokho uyakuya esizukulwaneni sawoyise; abayikukubona ukukhanya naphakade.
Ps 49:20 Umuntu onodumo engenakuqonda unjengezilwane ezibhubhayo.
Ps 50:1 Ihubo lika-Asafa. UNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke, uJehova, uyakhuluma, ubiza umhlaba kusukela ekuphumeni kwelanga kuze kube sekushoneni kwalo.
Ps 50:2 ESiyoni eliphelele ebuhleni uNkulunkulu uqhamile ekukhanyeni.
Ps 50:3 UNkulunkulu wethu uyeza, akayikuthula; umlilo udla phambi kwakhe; uphahlwe yisivunguvungu esikhulu.
Ps 50:4 Ubiza izulu ngaphezulu kanye nomhlaba ukuba ahlulele isizwe sakhe:
Ps 50:5 “Buthelani kimi abangcwele bami abenza isivumelwano nami ngomhlatshelo.”
Ps 50:6 Izulu lishumayela ukulunga kwakhe, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ungumahluleli. Sela
Ps 50:7 “Yizwa, sizwe sami, ngiyakukhuluma; Israyeli, ngizakufakaza kuwe ukuthi: NginguNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wakho.
Ps 50:8 Angiyikukujezisa ngenxa yemihlatshelo yakho; iminikelo yakho yokushiswa iphambi kwami njalo.
Ps 50:9 Angiyikuthatha nkunzi endlini yakho nampongo ezibayeni zakho.
Ps 50:10 Ngokuba zingezami zonke izilwane zehlathi, nezinkomo zasezintabeni eziyizinkulungwane.
Ps 50:11 Ngiyazazi zonke izinyoni zasezintabeni, nezilwane zasendle zaziwa yimi.
Ps 50:12 Uma bengilambile, bengingekutshele wena, ngokuba ungowami umhlaba wonke nokugcwala kwawo.
Ps 50:13 Ngiyakudla yini inyama yezinkunzi, ngiphuze igazi lezimpongo, na?
Ps 50:14 Nikela kuNkulunkulu umnikelo wokubonga, uzigcwalise izithembiso zakho koPhezukonke;
Ps 50:15 ngibize ngosuku lwenhlupheko; ngiyakukukhulula, wena uyakungidumisa.”
Ps 50:16 Kepha komubi uNkulunkulu uthi: “Yini ukuba ushumayele izimiso zami, uphathe isivumelwano sami ngomlomo wakho,
Ps 50:17 ingani uyazonda ukuqondiswa, amazwi ami uwalahla emva kwakho, na?
Ps 50:18 Uma ubona isela, uvumelana nalo; neziphingi uhlanganyela nazo.
Ps 50:19 Umlomo wakho uwuyekela ebubini; ulimi lwakho luqamba inkohliso.
Ps 50:20 Uhlala uhleba umfowenu; unyevuza indodana kanyoko.
Ps 50:21 Lokho ukwenzile, ngathula; ushaye sengathi nginjengawe; ngizakukulaya, ngikubeke phambi kwamehlo akho.
