Ps 50:22 “Qaphelani lokho nina enikhohlwa uNkulunkulu, funa nginidwengule, kungabikho osindisayo.
Ps 50:23 Onikela ngomnikelo wokubonga uyangidumisa; oqaphela indlela yakhe ngiyakumbonisa insindiso kaNkulunkulu.”
Ps 51:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide ekufikeni komprofethi uNathani kuye emva kokuya kwakhe kuBati Sheba. Ngihawukele, Nkulunkulu, ngokomusa wakho; yesula iziphambeko zami ngokobubele bakho obukhulu.
Ps 51:2 Ngigezisise ebubini bami, ungihlanze esonweni sami.
Ps 51:3 Ngokuba ngiyazazi iziphambeko zami; isono sami siphambi kwami njalo.
Ps 51:4 Ngonile kuwe wena wedwa, ngakwenza okubi emehlweni akho, ukuze uthiwe ulungile ekukhulumeni kwakho, uchache ekwahluleleni kwakho.
Ps 51:5 Bheka, ngazalelwa ebubini, umame wangithabatha esonweni.
Ps 51:6 Bheka, uthanda iqiniso ngaphakathi enhliziyweni; wongifundisa ukuhlakanipha ekujuleni kwenhliziyo.
Ps 51:7 Ngihlanze ngehisopi, ngihlambuluke; ngigeze, ngibe mhlophe kuneqhwa.
Ps 51:8 Ngizwise intokozo nenjabulo, ukuze ethabe amathambo owachobozileyo.
Ps 51:9 Fihla ubuso bakho ezonweni zami, wesule zonke izenzo zami ezimbi.
Ps 51:10 Nkulunkulu, dala kimi inhliziyo ehlanzekileyo, uvuse umoya oqinileyo phakathi kwami.
Ps 51:11 Ungangilahli ebusweni bakho, ungangemuki uMoya wakho oNgcwele.
Ps 51:12 Buyisela kimi ukuthokoza kwensindiso yakho, ungiphase ngomoya ovumayo.
Ps 51:13 Khona ngiyakufundisa abaphambukayo izindlela zakho; nezoni ziyakuphendukela kuwe.
Ps 51:14 Ngikhulule ecaleni legazi, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yami. Khona ulimi lwami luyakuhubela ukulunga kwakho.
Ps 51:15 Nkosi, vula izindebe zami, ukuze umlomo wami ulande ngodumo lwakho.
Ps 51:16 Ngokuba awuwuthandi umhlatshelo; noma bengizakukunika umnikelo wokushiswa, ubungayikuthokoza ngawo.
Ps 51:17 Iminikelo kaNkulunkulu ingumoya owaphukileyo; inhliziyo eyaphukileyo nedabukileyo, Nkulunkulu, awuyikuyidelela.
Ps 51:18 Lenzele iSiyoni okuhle ngokomusa wakho, uzakhe izingange zaseJerusalema.
Ps 51:19 Khona uyakuyijabulela iminikelo yokulunga eshiswayo neshiswa yonke; khona bayakunikela ngezinkunzi phezu kwe-altare lakho.
Ps 52:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. IMaskili likaDavide ekufikeni kukaDowegi wakwa-Edomi emazisa uSawule, ethi kuye: “UDavide ufikile endlini ka-Ahimeleki.” Uzigabiselani ngokubi wena siqhwaga na? Umusa kaNkulunkulu umi njalo.
Ps 52:2 Ulimi lwakho lusongoza okubi njengempuco eloliweyo, wena owenza amacebo.
Ps 52:3 Uthanda okubi kunokuhle, namanga kunokukhuluma ukulunga. Sela
Ps 52:4 Uthanda onke amazwi okubhubhisa wena lulimi lwenkohliso.
Ps 52:5 Ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu uyakukubhidliza kuze kube phakade; uyakukubamba, akukhiphe etendeni lakho, akusiphule ezweni labaphilayo. Sela
Ps 52:6 Abalungileyo bayakukubona, besabe; bayakumhleka, bathi:
Ps 52:7 “Bheka, nasi isiqhwaga esingamenzanga uNkulunkulu abe yinqaba yaso, kepha sethemba ingcebo yaso enkulu, siziqinisa ebubini baso.”
Ps 52:8 Kepha mina nginjengomnqumo oluhlaza endlini kaNkulunkulu; ngithemba umusa kaNkulunkulu njalonjalo kuze kube phakade naphakade.
Ps 52:9 Ngizakukudumisa kuze kube phakade, ngokuba ukwenzile; ngizakulindela igama lakho, ngokuba lihle phambi kwabangcwele bakho.
Ps 53:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeMahalati. IMaskili likaDavide. Isiwula sithi enhliziyweni yaso: “Akakho uNkulunkulu,” iziphambeko zabo zimbi, ziyanengeka; akakho owenza okuhle.
Ps 53:2 UNkulunkulu esezulwini uyababheka abantwana babantu ukubona uma kukhona yini onokuqonda, ofuna uNkulunkulu.
Ps 53:3 Baphambukile bonke, bonakele bonke; akakho owenza okuhle, akakho noyedwa.
Ps 53:4 Abanakwazi yini abenza okubi, abadla abantu bami njengalokhu bedla isinkwa, bengakhuleki kuNkulunkulu.
Ps 53:5 Besaba nokwesaba, lapho kungekho okwesabisayo; ngokuba uNkulunkulu wasakaza amathambo akhe owamisa ngakuwe; wena ubajabhisile, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ubalahlile.
Ps 53:6 Sengathi kungavela ukusindiswa kuka-Israyeli eSiyoni. Kuyakuthi lapho uNkulunkulu eguqula ukuthunjwa kwabantu bakhe, uJakobe ethabe, u-Israyeli ajabule.
Ps 54:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. IMaskili likaDavide ekufikeni kwabaseZifi bethi kuSawule: “UDavide ucashile kithina.” Nkulunkulu, ngisindise ngegama lakho, ngahlulele ngamandla akho.
Ps 54:2 Nkulunkulu, yizwa umkhuleko wami, ubeke indlebe emazwini omlomo wami.
Ps 54:3 Ngokuba abafo bangivukele; izidlova zifuna umphefumulo wami; azimbekile uNkulunkulu phambi kwazo. Sela
Ps 54:4 Bheka, uNkulunkulu ungumsizi wami; iNkosi ikubo abaphasa umphefumulo wami.
Ps 54:5 Uyabuyisela okubi ezitheni zami; zibhubhise ngokweqiniso lakho.
Ps 54:6 Ngizakunikela kuwe ngesihle; ngizakulibonga igama lakho, Jehova, ngokuba lihle.
Ps 54:7 Ngokuba ungikhululile ekuhluphekeni konke; neso lami libuka izitha zami, lidele.
Ps 55:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. IMaskili likaDavide. Lalela, Nkulunkulu, umkhuleko wami, ungazifihli ekunxuseni kwami.
Ps 55:2 Ngizwele, ungiphendule; ngiyayaluza ekukhaleni kwami, ngiyabubula
Ps 55:3 ngenxa yezwi lesitha, ngenxa yokucindezela komubi; ngokuba bagingqela okubi phezu kwami; bangizingela bethukuthele.
Ps 55:4 Inhliziyo yami iyathuthumela phakathi kwami; amavuso okufa angehlele.
Ps 55:5 Ngifikelwe luvalo nokuqhaqhazela; ngikhwelwe ngukwesaba okukhulu.
Ps 55:6 Besengithi: “Sengathi ngingaba namaphiko njengejuba; ngabe ngindizela ekudeni, ngihlale khona.”
Ps 55:7 Bheka, bengiyakubaleka, ngiye kude, ngingenise ehlane. Sela
Ps 55:8 Ngabe ngiphuthuma indawo yokuphepha emoyeni ovunguzayo nasesiphephweni.
Ps 55:9 Bachithe, Nkosi, uphambanise ulimi lwabo, ngokuba ngibonile ubudlwangudlwangu nokuxabana emzini.
Ps 55:10 Imini nobusuku bahamba bezungeza phezu kwezingange zawo; okubi nokushinga kuphakathi kwawo.
Ps 55:11 Ububi buphakathi kwawo; imbandezelo nenkohliso akusuki esigcawini sawo.
Ps 55:12 Ngokuba akusiso isitha esingiklolodelayo; ngabe ngiyakuthwala; akusiye ongizondayo oziphakamise phezu kwami; ngabe ngamcashela;
Ps 55:13 kepha nguwe ntanga yami, mhlobo wami nomngane wami.
Ps 55:14 Sasihlalisana kamnandi; sasiya endlini kaNkulunkulu kanye nebandla elithokozayo.
Ps 55:15 Ukufa makubazume, bashonele endaweni yabafileyo besezwa, ngokuba ububi busezindlini zabo nasezinhliziyweni zabo.
Ps 55:16 Mina ngizakukhala kuNkulunkulu; uJehova uzakungisindisa.
Ps 55:17 Kusihlwa nasekuseni nasemini ngizakuzikhalela, ngibubule, abeselizwa izwi lami.
Ps 55:18 Uyawuhlenga umphefumulo wami ngokuthula, bangasondeli kimi, ngokuba baningi abamelene nami.
Ps 55:19 UNkulunkulu uzakuzwa, abaphendule, yena okhona kwaphakade. Sela Yibona kambe okungekho kubo ukuphenduka, nabangamesabiyo uNkulunkulu.
Ps 55:20 Ubeka isandla ngakuye ohlalisene kahle naye; udumazile isivumelwano sakhe.
Ps 55:21 Umlomo wakhe ubushelezi kunephehlwa, kepha inhliziyo yakhe iyimpi; amazwi akhe athambile kunamafutha; nokho ayizinkemba ezikhokhiweyo.
Ps 55:22 Phonsa phezu kukaJehova umthwalo wakho, uzakukuphasa; akayikuvuma naphakade ukuba olungileyo azanyazanyiswe.
Ps 55:23 Wena Nkulunkulu uyakubaphonsa egodini lokubhubhisa; abantu begazi nenkohliso abayikufinyelela nasenxenyeni yezinsuku zabo; kepha mina ngizakwethemba wena.
Ps 56:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ijuba elithulayo emajukujukwini. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu, ekubanjweni kwakhe ngamaFilisti eGati. Yiba nomusa kimi, Nkulunkulu, ngokuba abantu bafuna ukungigwinya; usuku lonke bayangicindezela belwa.
Ps 56:2 Izitha zami zifuna ukungigwinya usuku lonke; ngokuba baningi abalwa nami ngokuzidla.
Ps 56:3 Mhla ngesabayo ngiyakwethemba wena.
Ps 56:4 KuNkulunkulu ngiyakudumisa izwi lakhe; ngithemba uNkulunkulu, angiyikwesaba; inyama ingangenzani na?
Ps 56:5 Amazwi ami bawahlanekezela usuku lonke; yonke imicabango yabo iqonde ukungona.
Ps 56:6 Bayabuthana, baqamekele, baqaphele izinyathelo zami, njengokuba beqamekela umphefumulo wami.
Ps 56:7 Bayakuphunyuka yini ebubini babo na? Diliza izizwe ngentukuthelo, Nkulunkulu.
Ps 56:8 Ukuzula kwami ukubalile wena; yetha izinyembezi zami egabheni lakho; azikho encwadini yakho na?
Ps 56:9 Khona izitha zami ziyakubuyela emuva mhla ngikhalayo; ngiyakwazi lokhu ukuthi uNkulunkulu unami.
Ps 56:10 KuNkulunkulu ngiyakulidumisa izwi; kuJehova ngiyakulidumisa izwi.
Ps 56:11 Ngiyethemba kuNkulunkulu, angiyikwesaba; umuntu angangenzani na?
Ps 56:12 Nkulunkulu, izithembiso zami kuwe ziphezu kwami; ngiyakunikela kuwe iminikelo yokubonga.
Ps 56:13 Ngokuba uwukhululile umphefumulo wami ekufeni nezinyawo zami ekuweni, ukuze ngihambe ebusweni bukaNkulunkulu ekukhanyeni kwabaphilayo.
Ps 57:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu, mhla ebalekela uSawule emphandwini. Yiba nomusa kimi, Nkulunkulu; yiba nomusa kimi. Ngokuba umphefumulo wami uphephela kuwe; ngifuna ukukhosela ethunzini lamaphiko akho, zize zidlule izinhlupheko.
Ps 57:2 Ngizakukhala kuNkulunkulu oPhezukonke, kuNkulunkulu ongifezelayo.
Ps 57:3 Uyakuthumela esezulwini, angisindise mhla ofuna ukungigwinya ekloloda. Sela UNkulunkulu uyakuthuma umusa wakhe neqiniso lakhe.
Ps 57:4 Umphefumulo wami uphakathi kwezingonyama; ngilala kwabavutha umlilo, abantwana babantu abamazinyo abo ayimikhonto nemicibisholo, abalulimi lwabo luyinkemba ebukhali.
Ps 57:5 Phakama, Nkulunkulu, phezu kwezulu, inkazimulo ibe phezu komhlaba wonke.
Ps 57:6 Izinyathelo zami bazibekele ugibe; umphefumulo wami ugobile; bembile igebe phambi kwami, kwakhalakathela bona kulo. Sela
Ps 57:7 Inhliziyo yami iduduzekile, Nkulunkulu; inhliziyo yami iduduzekile; ngizakuhlabelela, ngihube.
Ps 57:8 Vuka, mphefumulo wami; vukani, lugubhu nehabhu! Ngizakuvusa ukusa.
Ps 57:9 Ngizakukubonga, Nkosi, phakathi kwabantu, ngikudumise phakathi kwezizwe.
Ps 57:10 Ngokuba umusa wakho mkhulu kuze kube sezulwini, nokuthembeka kwakho kuze kube semafwini.
Ps 57:11 Phakama, Nkulunkulu, phezu kwezulu, inkazimulo yakho ibe phezu komhlaba wonke.
Ps 58:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu. Imbala nikhuluma ukulunga ngokuthula na? Madodana abantu, nahlulela ngobuqotho na?
Ps 58:2 Ingani enhliziyweni niphehla imisebenzi emibi; ezweni nilinganisa ngesilinganiso ukudluzula kwezandla zenu.
Ps 58:3 Ababi bahlubuka kwasesizalweni, abaqamba amanga baduka kwasesiswini.
Ps 58:4 Isihlungu sabo sinjengesihlungu senyoka; banjengebululu eliyisithulu, elivimba indlebe yalo,
Ps 58:5 lingalaleli izwi lezinyanga ezilumba amalumbo ngokuhlakanipha.
Ps 58:6 Yaphula amazinyo abo emlonyeni wabo, Nkulunkulu! Phohloza amazinyo omhlathi ezingonyama ezingamabhongo, Jehova!
Ps 58:7 Mabaphele njengamanzi agobhozayo; nxa ekhomba ngemicibisholo yakhe, mayibe sengathi iqundekile.
Ps 58:8 Mababe njengomnenke oncibilika, uphele, njengokuphuphume kowesifazane okungalibonanga ilanga.
Ps 58:9 Amabhodwe enu engakazizwa izinkuni zameva, uyakuziphephula, noma ziluhlaza noma zivutha.
Ps 58:10 Olungileyo uyakujabula ngokuba ebona impindiselo; uyakugeza izinyawo zakhe egazini lababi,
Ps 58:11 abantu baze bathi: “Impela ukhona umvuzo wolungileyo; impela ukhona uNkulunkulu owahlulelayo emhlabeni.”
Ps 59:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu, mhla uSawule ethumela, ethi mabayilinde indlu ukuba bambulale. Ngikhulule ezitheni zami, Nkulunkulu wami, ngivikele kwabangivukelayo;
Ps 59:2 ngikhulule kwabenza okubi, ngisindise kubantu begazi.
Ps 59:3 Ngokuba bheka, baqamekela umphefumulo wami; iziqhwaga ziyangihlanganyela, kungekho siphambeko, kungekho sono kimi, Jehova.
Ps 59:4 Ziyagijima, zizilungisele, kungekho cala kimi; vuka, ungihlangabeze, ubone.
Ps 59:5 Wena kambe, Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, vuka uphindisele bonke abezizwe, ungahawukeli namunye kwabahlubukileyo. Sela
Ps 59:6 Bayabuya kusihlwa, bahlaba umkhulungwane njengenja, bezula emzini.
Ps 59:7 Bheka, bayampompa ngomlomo wabo, kukhona izinkemba ezindebeni zabo, ngokuba bathi: “Ngubani ozwayo na?”
Ps 59:8 Kepha wena Jehova uyabahleka; uyabaklolodela bonke abezizwe.
Ps 59:9 Mandla ami, ngiyakulindela wena, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyinqaba yami.
Ps 59:10 UNkulunkulu wami uyakungihlangabeza ngomusa wakhe; uNkulunkulu uyakungibonisa izitha zami ngokwethaba.
Ps 59:11 Ungazibulali, funa abantu bami bakhohlwe; zizulise ngamandla akho, uzilahle phansi, Nkosi, sihlangu sethu.
Ps 59:12 Izwi lezindebe zazo liyisono somlomo wazo; mazibanjwe ekuzidleni kwazo nangenxa yesiqalekiso namanga eziwakhulumayo.
Ps 59:13 Ziqede ngokuthukuthela, ziqede zingabe zisabakho; mazazi ukuba nguNkulunkulu obusa kwaJakobe, kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba. Sela
Ps 59:14 Ziyabuya kusihlwa; zihlaba umkhulungwane njengenja, zizula emzini.
Ps 59:15 Zizulazulela ukudla; uma zingasuthi, zihlala nasebusuku.
Ps 59:16 Kepha mina ngizakuhlabelela ngamandla akho, ngethabele umusa wakho ekuseni, ngokuba uyinqaba yami, nesiphephelo ngosuku lokuhlupheka kwami.
Ps 59:17 Mandla ami, ngizakuhubela wena; ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyinqaba yami, unguNkulunkulu wami womusa.
Ps 60:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Umnduze; ubufakazi. IMiktamu likaDavide, ekulweni kwakhe nama-Aramu Naharayimi nama-Aramu Soba, uJowabe ebuya, enqoba abakwa-Edomi esiGodini Sikasawoti abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi nambili. Nkulunkulu usilahlile, usichithile; mawubuye usilulamise.
Ps 60:2 Uzamazamisile umhlaba, wawudabula izimfa; zivale izimfa zawo, ngokuba uyazamazama.
Ps 60:3 Isizwe sakho usibonisile izinto ezinzima; usiphuzisile iwayini, sabhuyazela.
Ps 60:4 Abakwesabayo ubanike ibhanela ukuba liphakanyiswe ngenxa yeqiniso. Sela
Ps 60:5 Ukuze abathandekayo bakho bakhululwe, sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, ungizwele.
Ps 60:6 UNkulunkulu ukhulumile ebungcweleni bakhe, wathi: “Ngiyakwethaba; ngiyakulidabula iShekemi, ngisilinganise isiGodi saseSukoti.
Ps 60:7 Ngowami uGileyadi, ngowami uManase; u-Efrayimi uyisivikelo sekhanda lami, uJuda uyintonga yami yokubusa.
Ps 60:8 UMowabi uyisitsha sami sokuhlambela; phezu kuka-Edomi ngiphonsa isicathulo sami; yethaba ngami, Filistiya.”
Ps 60:9 Ngubani oyakungiyisa emzini oqinileyo na? Ngubani oyakungiholela kwa-Edomi na?
Ps 60:10 Akusiwena Nkulunkulu osilahlileyo na? Nkulunkulu, awusaphumi nezimpi zethu.
Ps 60:11 Siphe ukuba sisizakale ekuhluphekeni, ngokuba ukusiza komuntu kuyize.
Ps 60:12 NgoNkulunkulu siyakwenza izenzo zamandla; yena uyakunyathela phansi izitha zethu.
Ps 61:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. ElikaDavide. Yizwa, Nkulunkulu, ukukhala kwami, ulalele umkhuleko wami.
Ps 61:2 Ngikhala kuwe ngisemkhawulweni womhlaba, lapho inhliziyo yami isebuthakathakeni; ngiholele edwaleni eliphakeme kunami.
Ps 61:3 Ngokuba ubuyisiphephelo sami, inqaba eqinileyo ngakuso isitha.
Ps 61:4 Ngiyakuhlala etendeni lakho kuze kube phakade; ngiyakukhosela ekusithekeni kwamaphiko akho. Sela
Ps 61:5 Ngokuba wena Nkulunkulu uzizwile izithembiso zami, wabanika ifa abalesaba igama lakho.
Ps 61:6 Uyakweleka izinsuku ezinsukwini zenkosi; iminyaka yayo iyakuba njengezizukulwane nezizukulwane.
Ps 61:7 Iyakuhlala phambi kukaNkulunkulu kuze kube phakade; yimisele umusa neqiniso ukuba kuyilondoloze.
Ps 61:8 Khona ngiyakulidumisa igama lakho kuze kube phakade, ukuze ngigcwalise izithembiso zami imihla ngemihla.
Ps 62:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. KuJeduthuni. Ihubo likaDavide. Umphefumulo wami uzithulele kuNkulunkulu kuphela; insindiso yami ivela kuye.
Ps 62:2 Nguye kuphela oyidwala lami nensindiso yami, inqaba yami; angiyikunyakaziswa kakhulu.
Ps 62:3 Koze kube nini nisukela umuntu ukuba nimbulale nonke njengodonga olwengemeyo nothango oludilikayo na?
Ps 62:4 Yebo, bathunga icebo lokumwisa ekuphakameni kwakhe, bathanda amanga; bayabusisa ngomlomo wabo, kepha ezibilinini zabo bayaqalekisa. Sela
Ps 62:5 Mphefumulo wami, zithulisele kuNkulunkulu kuphela, ngokuba ithemba lami livela kuye.
Ps 62:6 Nguye kuphela oyidwala lami nensindiso yami, inqaba yami; angiyikunyakaziswa.
Ps 62:7 Insindiso yami nodumo lwami kukuNkulunkulu; idwala lami eliqinileyo nesiphephelo sami kukuNkulunkulu.
Ps 62:8 Thembani kuye ngezikhathi zonke nina bantu, nithulule inhliziyo yenu phambi kwakhe; uNkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sethu. Sela
Ps 62:9 Abantwana babantu bangumoya nje, abantwana bezikhulu bangamanga; esilinganisweni bayakhuphuka, balula kunomoya bonke.
Ps 62:10 Maningakwethembi ukuqhwaga, ningazigabisi ngokuphangiweyo; uma imfuyo yanda, ningayibeki inhliziyo kuyo.
Ps 62:11 UNkulunkulu ukhulumile kanye, ngikuzwe kabili ukuthi amandla angakaNkulunkulu.
Ps 62:12 Nomusa ungowakho, Nkosi; ngokuba wena umphindisela umuntu njengokwenza kwakhe.
Ps 63:1 Ihubo likaDavide esehlane lakwaJuda. Nkulunkulu, wena unguNkulunkulu wami, ngiyakufuna ekuseni; umphefumulo wami womele wena; inyama yami ilangazelela wena ezweni elomileyo eligagadekileyo, lapho amanzi engekho khona.
Ps 63:2 Kanjalo ngikubheka endlini engcwele, ngibone amandla akho nenkazimulo yakho.
Ps 63:3 Ngokuba umusa wakho umnandi kunokuphila; izindebe zami ziyakukudumisa.
Ps 63:4 Ngiyakukubonga ngisaphila; ngiyakuphakamisa izandla zami egameni lakho.
Ps 63:5 Umphefumulo wami uyakusutha kungathi ngamanoni namafutha; umlomo wami uyakudumisa ngezindebe ezethabayo,
Ps 63:6 Nxa ngikukhumbula ecansini lami, ngizindla ngawe emilindweni yasebusuku.
Ps 63:7 Ngokuba ungisizile; ngiyakwethaba ethunzini lamaphiko akho.
Ps 63:8 Umphefumulo wami ubambelele kuwe; esokunene sakho siyangiphasa.
Ps 63:9 Kepha abafuna umphefumulo wami ukuwubulala bayakwehlela ezindaweni zomhlaba eziphansi.
Ps 63:10 Bayakunikelwa esandleni senkemba, babe yisabelo sezimpungushe.
Ps 63:11 Kepha inkosi iyakuthokoza ngoNkulunkulu; bonke abafunga yena bayakuzibonga; ngokuba umlomo wabakhuluma amanga uyakuvalwa.
Ps 64:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Yizwa, Nkulunkulu, izwi lami ekukhaleni kwami, ulondoloze ukuphila kwami evusweni lesitha.
Ps 64:2 Ngisithe esigungwini sababi nasesixukwini sabenza okubi,
Ps 64:3 abalola ulimi lwabo njengenkemba, bakhombe imicibisholo yabo engamazwi ababayo
Ps 64:4 ukuba bamdubule ongenacala ngasesitha, bamdubule ngokuzuma bengesabi.
Ps 64:5 Baqinela icebo elibi; bakhuluma ngokufihla izingibe; bathi: “Ngubani oyakusibona na?”
Ps 64:6 Basongoza izenzo ezimbi, bathi: “Siliqedile icebo elisongoziweyo,” izibilini nenhliziyo yomuntu kujulile.
Ps 64:7 Kepha uNkulunkulu uyakubadubula ngomcibisholo; bagwazwe ngokuzunywa.
Ps 64:8 Bayakuwiswa, baficwe lulimi lwabo; bonke abababonayo bayonikina ikhanda.
Ps 64:9 Bonke abantu bayashaywa luvalo; bayakushumayela izenzo zikaNkulunkulu, baqonde akwenzileyo.
Ps 64:10 Olungileyo uyakujabula kuJehova, aphephele kuye; bonke abaqotho ngenhliziyo bayakuzibonga.
Ps 65:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Igama. Udumiso luhlalela wena Nkulunkulu eSiyoni, nesithembiso siyakugcwaliswa kuwe.
Ps 65:2 Wena ozwayo imikhuleko, beza kuwe bonke abantu.
Ps 65:3 Izenzo ezimbi zangahlula; iziphambeko zethu uyaziyekela.
Ps 65:4 Ubusisiwe omkhethayo wena, omsondezayo ukuba ahlale emagcekeni akho; siyakusutha ngokuhle kwendlu yakho, ithempeli lakho elingcwele.
Ps 65:5 Uyakusiphendula ngezenzo ezesabekayo ekulungeni, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yethu, wena oyithemba lemikhawulo yonke yomhlaba nelolwandle olukude;
Ps 65:6 yena omisa izintaba ngamandla akhe, obhince amandla;
Ps 65:7 othulisa ukuduma kwezilwandle, inhlokomo yamaza azo nomsindo wabantu.
Ps 65:8 Abakhile emikhawulweni yomhlaba bayesaba ngezibonakaliso zakho; uyethabisa impumalanga nentshonalanga.
Ps 65:9 Uhambela umhlaba, unisa imvula, uwuvundisa kakhulu; umfula kaNkulunkulu ugcwele amanzi; ubalungisela abantu ukudla, ngokuba uwulungisa kanjalo umhlaba.
Ps 65:10 Umatisa imisele yawo, ulalisa amasoyi awo; uwuthambisa ngezihlambi, ubusise okumila kuwo.
Ps 65:11 Umnyaka uyawuhlobisa ngobumnene bakho, nemikhondo yakho iconsa amafutha.
Ps 65:12 Amadlelo asehlane ayaconsa; amagquma abhinca injabulo.
Ps 65:13 Amadlelo embethe izimvu, nezigodi zisibekelwe ngamabele; konke kuyajabula, kuhlabelele.
Ps 66:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Igama. Ihubo. Mhubeleni ngenjabulo uNkulunkulu, mhlaba wonke.
Ps 66:2 Hlabelelelani inkazimulo yegama lakhe, nibabaze ukudunyiswa kwakhe.
Ps 66:3 Yishoni kuNkulunkulu, nithi: “Yeka ukwesabeka kwemisebenzi yakho. Ngenxa yobukhulu bamandla akho izitha zakho ziyakuzithoba phansi kwakho.
Ps 66:4 Umhlaba wonke uyakukhuleka kuwe, ukudumise; bayakuhubela igama lakho.” Sela
Ps 66:5 Wozani nibone izenzo zikaNkulunkulu; uyesabeka ekwenzeni kwakhe kubantwana babantu.
Ps 66:6 Ulwandle waluguqula lwaba yizwe elomileyo; bawela umfula ngezinyawo; lapho sathokoza kuye.
Ps 66:7 Ubusa ngamandla akhe kuze kube phakade; amehlo akhe ayahlozinga izizwe; abanenkani mabangaziphakamisi. Sela
Ps 66:8 Bongani uNkulunkulu wethu nina zizwe, nizwakalise izwi lokudunyiswa kwakhe
Ps 66:9 ogcina umphefumulo wethu ekuphileni, engaluvumeli unyawo lwethu lushelele.
Ps 66:10 Ngokuba wena Nkulunkulu usilingile, wasihlanza njengokuhlanzwa kwesiliva.
Ps 66:11 Wasingenisa enetheni; wabeka umthwalo onzima ezinkalweni zethu.
Ps 66:12 Wavumela abantu ukuba bakhwele phezu kwamakhanda ethu; sangena emlilweni nasemanzini; kepha wasikhiphela ekubuseni.
Ps 66:13 Ngiyakungena endlini yakho ngineminikelo yokushiswa; ngizakugcwalisa kuwe izithembiso zami
Ps 66:14 ezaphinyiselwa yizindebe zami, zakhulunywa ngumlomo wami ngisekuhluphekeni.
Ps 66:15 Ngiyakunikela kuwe iminikelo yokushiswa yezinonileyo kanye nephunga lezinqama; ngiyakunikela ngezinkunzi nangezimpongo. Sela
Ps 66:16 Wozani nizwe nina nonke enesaba uNkulunkulu; ngizakulandisa akwenzele umphefumulo wami.
Ps 66:17 Ngakhala kuye ngomlomo wami; ukudumisa kwakuphansi kolimi lwami.
Ps 66:18 Uma bengiqonde ububi enhliziyweni yami, ibingayikungizwa iNkosi.
Ps 66:19 Ngempela uNkulunkulu uzwile, walalela izwi lomkhuleko wami.
Ps 66:20 Makabongwe uNkulunkulu ongalahlanga umkhuleko wami nomusa wakhe kimi.
Ps 67:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. Ihubo. Igama. UNkulunkulu makabe nomusa kithina, asibusise; makakhanyise ubuso bakhe phezu kwethu, Sela
Ps 67:2 ukuze indlela yakho yaziwe emhlabeni, insindiso yakho kubo bonke abezizwe.
Ps 67:3 Abantu mabakubonge, Nkulunkulu; mabakubonge abantu bonke.
Ps 67:4 Izizwe mazijabule, zethabe; ngokuba izizwe uzahlulela ngokulunga, uzihola izizwe emhlabeni. Sela
Ps 67:5 Abantu mabakubonge, Nkulunkulu; mabakubonge abantu bonke.
Ps 67:6 Umhlaba uthelile izithelo zawo; uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wethu, uyasibusisa.
Ps 67:7 UNkulunkulu uyasibusisa; imikhawulo yonke yomhlaba iyakumesaba.
Ps 68:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Igama. Makavuke uNkulunkulu, zihlakazeke izitha zakhe; abamzondayo babaleka phambi kwakhe.
Ps 68:2 Bamukiswa njengokumukiswa komusi; njengokuncibilika kwengcina phambi komlilo ababi bachithwa phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Ps 68:3 Kepha abalungileyo bayajabula; bayethaba phambi kukaNkulunkulu bethokoza nokuthokoza.
Ps 68:4 Hlabelelani kuNkulunkulu, nidumise igama lakhe; menzeleni umendo lowo odabula amahlane; igama lakhe linguJehova; yethabani phambi kwakhe,
Ps 68:5 uyise wezintandane, umahluleli wabafelokazi, uNkulunkulu endlini yakhe engcwele,
Ps 68:6 uNkulunkulu ohlalisa imihlalaqha ezindlini, akhiphele iziboshwa ekubuseni; ngabahlubukileyo bodwa abakhe ezweni elomileyo.
Ps 68:7 Nkulunkulu, ekuphumeni kwakho phambi kwabantu bakho, ekudabuleni kwakho ihlane, Sela
Ps 68:8 umhlaba wazamazama, izulu laconsa phambi kukaNkulunkulu, neSinayi lazamazama phambi kukaNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.
Ps 68:9 Wanisa imvula enkulu, Nkulunkulu; ifa lakho selahlulekile, waliqinisa.
Ps 68:10 Ibandla lakho lakha kulo; ngobuhle bakho wabalungisela abahluphekayo, Nkulunkulu.
Ps 68:11 INkosi iphumisa izwi; abesifazane ababika indaba ejabulisayo bayisixuku esikhulu.
Ps 68:12 Amakhosi ezimpi ayabaleka; ayabaleka wona; isifazane esihlezi ekhaya sabela impango.
Ps 68:13 Nxa nilala phakathi kwezibaya, kunjengamaphiko ejuba asibekelwa ngesiliva, izimpaphe zamaphiko alo ngegolide elikhazimulayo.
Ps 68:14 Nxa uSomandla ehlakaza amakhosi kulo, likhithika iqhwa eSalimoni.
Ps 68:15 Intaba yaseBashani iyintaba kaNkulunkulu; intaba yaseBashani iyintaba eneziqongo.
Ps 68:16 Nina zintaba ezineziqongo, yini ukuba niyibuke ngomhawu intaba uNkulunkulu athanda ukuhlala kuyo na? Yebo, uJehova uyakuhlala kuyo kuze kube phakade.
Ps 68:17 Izinqola zikaNkulunkulu ziyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili, izinkulungwane nezinkulungwane; iNkosi iphakathi kwazo; iSinayi lisendaweni engcwele.
Ps 68:18 Wena wenyukela phezulu, wathumba izithunjwa, wamukela izipho kubantu nakwabahlubukileyo, ukuze uJehova uNkulunkulu ahlale khona.
Ps 68:19 Mayibongwe iNkosi. Iyasithwala imihla ngemihla; uNkulunkulu uyinsindiso yethu. Sela
Ps 68:20 Kithina uNkulunkulu unguNkulunkulu wezinkululo; ukukhipha ekufeni kungokukaJehova iNkosi.
Ps 68:21 Impela uNkulunkulu uyakuliphohloza ikhanda lezitha zakhe, ukhakhayi olunesihluthu lwalowo osahamba ezonweni zakhe.
Ps 68:22 INkosi yathi: “Ngiyakubabuyisa eBashani, ngibabuyise ekujuleni kolwandle
Ps 68:23 ukuba unyawo lwakho ulucwilise egazini, ulimi lwezinja zakho lube nesabelo salo ezitheni.”
Ps 68:24 Bayazibona izindwendwe zakho, Nkulunkulu, izindwendwe zikaNkulunkulu wami, iNkosi yami, ziya endlini engcwele.
Ps 68:25 Ngaphambili kuhamba abahlabeleli, ngasemuva abashaya ugubhu, ngaphakathi izintombi ezishaya izingubhu.
Ps 68:26 Bongani uNkulunkulu emihlanganweni; bongani iNkosi, nina bomthombo ka-Israyeli.
Ps 68:27 Nango uBenjamini, omncane, umbusi wabo, neviyo lezikhulu zakwaJuda, izikhulu zakwaZebuloni nezikhulu zakwaNafetali.
Ps 68:28 UNkulunkulu wakho ukumisele amandla akho; qinisa, Nkulunkulu, lokho ozenzela khona.
Ps 68:29 Ngenxa yethempeli lakho eJerusalema amakhosi ayakukulethela izipho.
Ps 68:30 Zikhuze izilwane zasemhlangeni, umhlambi wezinkunzi kanye namankonyane abantu, azithobise phansi ngezinqamu zesiliva; uyazihlakaza izizwe ezithanda ukulwa.
Ps 68:31 Izikhulu ziyakuvela eGibithe; amaKushe ayakwelulela ngokushesha izandla zawo kuNkulunkulu.
Ps 68:32 Nina mibuso yomhlaba mhubeleni uNkulunkulu, nidumise iNkosi, Sela
Ps 68:33 yona ekhwela phezu kwamazulu ezulu asendulo; bhekani, iyezwakalisa izwi layo, izwi elinamandla.
Ps 68:34 Nikani uNkulunkulu amandla; ubukhosi bakhe buphezu kuka-Israyeli; amandla akhe asemafwini.
Ps 68:35 Nkulunkulu, uyesabeka ezindaweni zakho ezingcwele; uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli nguyena owenzela abantu amandla nokuqina; makadunyiswe uNkulunkulu.
Ps 69:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Iminduze. ElikaDavide. Ngisindise, Nkulunkulu, ngokuba amanzi afikile emphefumulweni.
Ps 69:2 Ngishone odakeni lobishi olujulileyo, kungekho kuma; ngingene emanzini alutwa; imisinga iyangicwilisa.
Ps 69:3 Ngikhathele ukukhala kwami, umphimbo wami ushile; amehlo ami ayafiphala ekulindeleni uNkulunkulu wami.
Ps 69:4 Abangizonda ngeze baningi kunezinwele zekhanda lami; baningi abafuna ukungiqeda beyizitha zami kungekho sici; nengingakuphanganga ngakubuyisela.
Ps 69:5 Nkulunkulu, wena uyabazi ubuwula bami, nezono zami azifihlakele kuwe.
Ps 69:6 Mabangajabhiswa ngami abakulindeleyo, Nkosi Jehova Sebawoti; mabangahlazeki ngami abakufunayo, Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.
Ps 69:7 Ngokuba ngithwele isihlamba ngenxa yakho; ihlazo lisibekela ubuso bami.
Ps 69:8 Sengaba ngumfokazi kubafowethu, nowezizwe kubantwana bakamame.
Ps 69:9 Ngokuba ukushisekela indlu yakho kungidlile; izithuko zabakuthukayo zingehlele.
Ps 69:10 Ngakhala, umphefumulo wami wazila; kwaba ngukudunyazwa kwami.
Ps 69:11 Isaka ngalenza isambatho sami; ngaba yisaga kubo.
Ps 69:12 Abahlezi esangweni bakhuluma ngami; izidakwa ziyangihaya.
Ps 69:13 Kodwa mina, umkhuleko wami ukuwe Jehova esikhathini sokuzwelwa, Nkulunkulu; ngenxa yomusa wakho omkhulu ngiphendule eqinisweni lensindiso yakho.
Ps 69:14 Ngikhiphe odakeni, mangingashoni; mangisindiswe kubo abangizondayo, nasemanzini alutwa.
Ps 69:15 Isikhukhula samanzi masingangicwilisi, utwa lungangigwinyi, umgodi ungangivaleli emlonyeni wawo.
Ps 69:16 Ngiphendule, Jehova, ngokuba umusa wakho ulungile; uphendukele kimi ngokobubele bakho obukhulu.
Ps 69:17 Ungayifihleli inceku yakho ubuso bakho, ngokuba ngiyahlupheka; shesha ungiphendule.
Ps 69:18 Sondela kuwo umphefumulo wami, uwuhlenge, ngikhulule ngenxa yezitha zami.
Ps 69:19 Wena uyakwazi ukuthukwa kwami, namahloni ami nokudunyazwa kwami; zonke izitha zami ziphambi kwakho.
Ps 69:20 Ukuthukwa kuyaphulile inhliziyo yami, ngigula kakhulu; bengibheka ukuhawukelwa, kepha akwabakho, nabaduduzayo, kepha angibatholanga.
Ps 69:21 Banginika inyongo ibe ngukudla kwami; ekomeni kwami bangiphuzisa uviniga.
Ps 69:22 Itafula labo malibe yisihibe phambi kwabo, libe lugibe kwabahlezi bezithulele.
Ps 69:23 Amehlo abo mawafiphale, ukuze bangaboni; izinkalo zabo zintengezele njalo.
Ps 69:24 Thela phezu kwabo ukunengwa kwakho; intukuthelo yakho evuthayo mayibafice.
Ps 69:25 Umuzi wabo mawuchitheke; makungabikho ohlala ematendeni abo.
Ps 69:26 Ngokuba oshaywe nguwe bayamzingela, baxoxa ngobuhlungu bezinkubela zakho.
Ps 69:27 Yengezela ukona ekoneni kwabo; mabangezi ekulungeni kwakho.
Ps 69:28 Mabesulwe encwadini yabaphilayo, bangalotshwa kanye nabalungileyo.
Ps 69:29 Mina kodwa ngihluphekile, ngibuhlungu; insindiso yakho, Nkulunkulu mayingilondoloze.
Ps 69:30 Ngiyakulibonga ngehubo igama likaNkulunkulu, ngimphakamise ngokubonga.
Ps 69:31 Kuyakuthandeka kuJehova kunenkomo, kunenkunzi enezimpondo nezinselo.
Ps 69:32 Kuyakuthi abayizivi bekubona, bajabule; nina enifuna uNkulunkulu, inhliziyo yenu mayiphile.
Ps 69:33 Ngokuba uJehova uyabalalela abampofu, neziboshwa zakhe akazideleli.
Ps 69:34 Uyakubongwa yizulu nomhlaba, yizilwandle nakho konke okuphila kuzo.
Ps 69:35 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu uzakulisindisa iSiyoni, akhe imizi yakwaJuda; bazakuhlala khona, ibe yifa labo.
Ps 69:36 Inzalo yezinceku zakhe iyakulidla ifa; abathanda igama lakhe bayakuhlala kuyo.
Ps 70:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Elokukhumbuza. Nkulunkulu, phuthuma ungikhulule. Jehova, phuthuma ungisize.
Ps 70:2 Mabajabhe, bayangaze abafuna umphefumulo wami. Mababuyiselwe emuva, bajabhiswe abangifisela umonakalo.
Ps 70:3 Abathi ashila, ashila mababuyele emuva ngenxa yokuhlazeka kwabo.
Ps 70:4 Mabethabe, bajabule kuwe bonke abakufunayo; abathanda insindiso yakho mabasho njalonjalo, bathi: “Makabe mkhulu uNkulunkulu.”
Ps 70:5 Ngokuba mina ngihluphekile, ngimpofu; Nkulunkulu, ngiphuthumele. Wena uyinsizakalo yami nomkhululi wami; Jehova, ungalibali.
Ps 71:1 Jehova, ngiyethemba wena; mangingajabhi naphakade.
Ps 71:2 Ngikhulule ngokulunga kwakho, ungihlangulise; beka indlebe yakho kimi, ungisindise.
Ps 71:3 Yiba kimi idwala lokuhlala, ukuze ngiye kulo njalonjalo; ukuyalezile ukusindiswa kwami, ngokuba uyidwala lami nenqaba yami.
Ps 71:4 Nkulunkulu wami, ngikhulule esandleni somubi, esandleni songalungile nesonakeleyo.
Ps 71:5 Ngokuba wena uyithemba lami, Nkosi Jehova, ithemba lami kwasebusheni bami.
Ps 71:6 Ngencike kuwe kwasesiswini; nguwe owangikhipha ezibilinini zikamame; ukudumisa kwami kuyakuba ngawe njalo.
Ps 71:7 Nginjengesimangaliso kwabaningi, kepha wena uyisiphephelo sami esinamandla.
Ps 71:8 Umlomo wami uzakugcwala ukubonga wena, nalo udumo lwakho usuku lonke.
Ps 71:9 Ungangilahli esikhathini sobudala, ungangishiyi ekupheleni kwamandla ami,
Ps 71:10 ngokuba izitha zami zikhuluma ngami, nabawuhlomele umphefumulo wami bayahlebelana,
Ps 71:11 bathi: “UNkulunkulu umshiyile; zingelani nimbambe, ngokuba akakho osindisayo.”
Ps 71:12 Nkulunkulu, ungabi kude nami; Nkulunkulu, phuthuma ungisize.
Ps 71:13 Abamelene nomphefumulo wami mabajabhe, baphele; abangifunela umonakalo mabembathe amahloni nenhlamba.
Ps 71:14 Mina kodwa ngiyakwethemba njalo, ngengeze ukudumisa ekudunyisweni kwakho.
Ps 71:15 Umlomo wami uyakulanda ukulunga kwakho, nensindiso yakho lonke usuku; ngokuba anginakukubala.
Ps 71:16 Ngiyakuletha izenzo ezinqabileyo zeNkosi uJehova; ngiyakubonga ukulunga kwakho, okwakho kuphela.
Ps 71:17 Nkulunkulu, ungifundisile kwasebusheni bami; ngizilandile izimangaliso zakho kuze kube manje.
Ps 71:18 Futhi mawungangishiyi, nxa ngimdala, ngiyimpunga, ngize ngishumayele ingalo yakho kuso isizukulwane, amandla akho kubo bonke abezayo.
Ps 71:19 Ukulunga kwakho, Nkulunkulu, kufinyelele ezulwini; wena owenze izinto ezinkulu, Nkulunkulu, ngubani onjengawe na?
Ps 71:20 Wena owasizwisa izinhlupheko eziningi ezimbi, uyakubuye usiphilise, usikhuphule ezinzulwini zomhlaba.
Ps 71:21 Yandisa udumo lwami, ubuye ungiduduze.
Ps 71:22 Yikhona nami ngizakububonga ubuqotho bakho, Nkulunkulu wami, ngogubhu lwezintambo; ngizakukudumisa ngehabhu wena oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Ps 71:23 Izindebe zami zizakujabula, ngokuba ngizakukudumisa wena, nomphefumulo wami owuhlengileyo.
Ps 71:24 Ulimi lwami futhi luzakukhuluma lonke usuku ngokulunga; ngokuba badunyaziwe, bajabhisiwe abangifunela umonakalo.
Ps 72:1 ElikaSolomoni. Nkulunkulu, nika inkosi izahlulelo zakho nendodana yenkosi ukulunga kwakho.
Ps 72:2 Iyakwahlulela isizwe sakho ngeqiniso nezihlupheki zakho ngemfanelo.
Ps 72:3 Izintaba ziyakuletha ukuthula kubantu; kanjalo namagquma, ngokulunga.
Ps 72:4 Izakubahlulela abahluphekileyo kubantu, isindise abantwana babampofu, imphohloze onokhahlo.
Ps 72:5 Bayakwesaba wena, kusekhona ilanga nenyanga, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
Ps 72:6 Iyakwehla njengemvula edlelweni, njengesihlambi esimatisa umhlaba.
Ps 72:7 Ezinsukwini zayo olungileyo uyakuqhakaza, kuvame ukuthula, ize ingabikho inyanga.
Ps 72:8 Iyakubusa kusukela elwandle kuze kube selwandle, kusukela emfuleni kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba.
Ps 72:9 Abakhe ehlane bayakukhothama phambi kwayo; izitha zayo zizakukhotha uthuli.
Ps 72:10 Amakhosi aseTharishishi naweseziqhingini ayakuletha izipho; amakhosi aseSheba naseSeba ayakwethula izipho.
Ps 72:11 Onke amakhosi ayakuziwisa phambi kwayo; zonke izizwe ziyakuyikhonza.
Ps 72:12 Ngokuba iyakukhulula ompofu ozikhalela kuyo, nohluphekayo ongenamsizi.
Ps 72:13 Iyakuhawukela odangeleyo nompofu; iyakusindisa imiphefumulo yabampofu.
Ps 72:14 Iyakukhulula umphefumulo wabo okhahlweni nasendluzuleni; igazi labo liyakuba yigugu emehlweni ayo.
Ps 72:15 Iyakuphila, bayinike igolide laseSheba, bayithandazele njalo, bayibusise lonke usuku.
Ps 72:16 Kuyakuba khona inala kakolweni ezweni esiqongweni sezintaba; ukudla kwalo kuyakuhashazela njengeLebanoni; abemizi bayakukhahlela njengotshani bomhlaba.
Ps 72:17 Igama layo liyakuma kuze kube phakade; igama layo liyakuxhanta, lisekhona ilanga; bayakuzibusisa ngayo; bonke abezizwe bayakuthi ibusisiwe.
Ps 72:18 Makabongwe uJehova uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, onguye yedwa owenza izimangaliso.
Ps 72:19 Malibongwe igama lakhe lenkazimulo kuze kube phakade, umhlaba wonke ugcwale inkazimulo yakhe. Amen, Amen.
Ps 72:20 Imikhuleko kaDavide indodana kaJese isaphelile.
Ps 73:1 Ihubo lika-Asafa. Impela uNkulunkulu umnene ku-Israyeli, kubo abanenhliziyo ehlanzekileyo.
Ps 73:2 Kepha mina, izinyawo zami zicishe zakhubeka; kwaba kancane ukuba izinyathelo zami zishelele.
Ps 73:3 Ngokuba ngaba nomhawu ngabazidlayo, lapho ngibona ukubusa kwababi.
Ps 73:4 Ngokuba abanabuhlungu kuze kube sekufeni kwabo, namandla abo aqinile.
Ps 73:5 Abahlupheki njengabanye abantu; abahlushwa njengabanye abantu.
Ps 73:6 Ngakho-ke iqholo lingumnaka wabo; indluzula ibembesa njengengubo.
Ps 73:7 Amehlo abo aphinqekile ngokunona; imicabango yenhliziyo iyachichima.
Ps 73:8 Bayaklolodela; ebubini bakhuluma ngokukhahla; bakhuluma besekuphakamemi.
Ps 73:9 Umlomo wabo bawuphakamisela ezulwini; ulimi lwabo luhambela emhlabeni.
Ps 73:10 Ngakho-ke isizwe sakhe sibuyela lapha; amanzi amaningi bazimuncela wona.
Ps 73:11 Bathi: “UNkulunkulu wazi kanjani na? Imbala kukhona ukwazi koPhezukonke na?”
Ps 73:12 Bheka, laba bayibo ababi; bazinza njalo; bandisa imfuyo.
Ps 73:13 Impela ngiyihlanzele ize inhliziyo yami, ngahlamba izandla zami ngingenacala,
Ps 73:14 ngokuba ngahlushwa usuku lonke; kwasa ngijeziswa.
Ps 73:15 Uma bengithe, ngizakukhuluma kanjalo, bheka, ngabe ngisikhohlisile isizukulwane sabantwana bakho.
Ps 73:16 Kwathi ngicabanga ukuba ngikuqonde lokho, kwaba luhlupho emehlweni ami,
Ps 73:17 ngaze ngangena endlini engcwele kaNkulunkulu, ngaqaphelisisa ukugcina kwabo.
Ps 73:18 Impela ubabeka ezindaweni ezibushelezi; ubawisa babe yincithakalo.
Ps 73:19 Maye, bachithwa ngokuphazima kweso! Bashona, babhubha benovalo.
Ps 73:20 Njengephupho ekuphaphameni, Nkosi, uyakudelela umfanekiso wabo ekuvukeni kwakho.
Ps 73:21 Kwathi inhliziyo yami yaba nomunyu, kuhlaba ezinsweni zami,
Ps 73:22 ngaba yisiphukuphuku, angaqonda lutho; ngaba yisilwane kuwe.
Ps 73:23 Kepha mina ngiyakube ngikuwe njalo; ungibambile ngesandla sami sokunene.
Ps 73:24 Uyakungihola ngesiluleko sakho, andukuba ungamukele enkazimulweni.
Ps 73:25 Nginobani ezulwini na? Uma nginawe, angifuni lutho emhlabeni.
Ps 73:26 Inyama yami nenhliziyo yami iyaphela; nokho uNkulunkulu uyidwala lenhliziyo yami nesabelo sami kuze kube phakade.
Ps 73:27 Ngokuba bheka, abakude nawe bayakubhubha; uyabachitha bonke abahlubukayo kuwe ngokuphinga.
Ps 73:28 Kepha mina kungilungele ukusondela kuNkulunkulu; ngenzile iNkosi uJehova ibe yisiphephelo sami, ukuze ngishumayele zonke izenzo zakho.
Ps 74:1 IMaskili lika-Asafa. Nkulunkulu, usilahleleni kuze kube phakade na? Intukuthelo yakho ithunqelelani izimvu zedlelo lakho na?
Ps 74:2 Khumbula ibandla lakho owalizuza endulo, owalikhulula ukuba libe yisifunda sefa lakho, nentaba yaseSiyoni ohlala kuyo.
Ps 74:3 Lulamisela izinyawo zakho emidilikweni yaphakade; isitha sone konke endlini engcwele.
Ps 74:4 Izitha zakho zibhongile phakathi kwendlu yakho yokubuthana, zamisa izimpawu zazo zaba yizimpawu.
Ps 74:5 Zaba sengathi abantu baphakamisa amazembe emithini eminyeneyo.
Ps 74:6 Konke okubaziweyo kwayo sezikuphohloze ngembazo nangesando.
Ps 74:7 Zayokhela indlu yakho engcwele; indlu yegama lakho zayidumaza kwaze kwaba phansi emhlabathini.
Ps 74:8 Zathi enhliziyweni yazo: “Masibachithe kanyekanye,” zashisa zonke izindlu zokubuthana zikaNkulunkulu ezweni.
Ps 74:9 Izimpawu zethu asiziboni; akusekho mprofethi; akakho kithina owaziyo ukuthi koze kube nini.
Ps 74:10 Nkulunkulu, koze kube nini umcindezeli ethuka, isitha sihlambalaza igama lakho njalo, na?
Ps 74:11 Usihoshelani isandla sakho, isandla sakho sokunene, na? Sihoshe esifubeni sakho, uzichithe.
Ps 74:12 Nokho uNkulunkulu uyiNkosi yami kwaphakade eyenza insindiso emhlabeni.
Ps 74:13 Nguwena owahlukanisa ulwandle ngamandla akho, wachofoza amakhanda ezilo ezesabekayo emanzini.
Ps 74:14 Nguwena owaphohloza amakhanda kaLeviyathani, wamnika abe ngukudla kwezidalwa zasehlane.
Ps 74:15 Nguwena owaqhamukisa isiphethu nomfudlana; nguwe owomisa imifula egobhoza njalo.
Ps 74:16 Usuku ngolwakho, nobusuku ngobakho; nguwena owenza ukukhanya nelanga.
Ps 74:17 Nguwena owamisa yonke imikhawulo yomhlaba; nguwe owenza ihlobo nobusika.
Ps 74:18 Khumbula lokhu, Jehova, ukuthi isitha sithukile, nesizwe esinobuwula silihlambalazile igama lakho.
Ps 74:19 Ungawunikeli umphefumulo wejuba lakho esilwaneni; ungakhohlwa ukuphila kwezihlupheki zakho njalo.
Ps 74:20 Khumbula isivumelwano, ngokuba izindawo ezimnyama zezwe zigcwele izindlu zobudlova.
Ps 74:21 Ocindezelweyo makangabuyi ejabhile; ohluphekayo nompofu mababonge igama lakho.
Ps 74:22 Vuka, Nkulunkulu, uyimele indaba yakho; khumbula ukuthi uklolodelwa yiziwula usuku lonke.
Ps 74:23 Ungakhohlwa izwi lezitha zakho, ukuxokozela kwabakuvukelayo okwenyukela njalonjalo.
Ps 75:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. Ihubo lika-Asafa. Igama. Siyakubonga, Nkulunkulu, siyabonga; igama lakho liseduze; balanda izimangaliso zakho.
Ps 75:2 Lapho ngiyakugcina isikhathi esimisiweyo, ngiyakwahlulela ngokulunga.
Ps 75:3 Umhlaba uyancibilika nabo bonke abakhe kuwo; mina ngimisile izinsika zawo. Sela
Ps 75:4 Ngithe kwabazidlayo: “Ningazidli,” nakwababi: “Ningaphakamisi uphondo.
Ps 75:5 Ningaluphakamiseli phezulu uphondo lwenu, ningajoqi ngentamo elukhuni.”
Ps 75:6 Ngokuba ukuphakanyiswa akuveli empumalanga nasentshonalanga nasehlane lasezintabeni,
Ps 75:7 kepha uNkulunkulu ungumahluleli; omunye uyamehlisa, omunye amphakamise.
Ps 75:8 Ngokuba esandleni seNkosi kukhona isitsha; iwayini liyakhephuza; sigcwele ngeliqungiweyo, yona iyathulula ngaso; impela bonke ababi emhlabeni bayakuyimunca inhleze yalo, bayiphuze.
Ps 75:9 Kepha mina ngiyakumemezela ngakho kuze kube phakade, ngidumise uNkulunkulu kaJakobe.
Ps 75:10 Zonke izimpondo zababi ngiyakuzinquma; kepha izimpondo zolungileyo ziyakuphakanyiswa.
Ps 76:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. Ihubo lika-Asafa. Igama. UNkulunkulu uyaziwa kwaJuda, igama lakhe likhulu kwa-Israyeli.
Ps 76:2 Itabernakele lakhe liseSalema, nendlu yakhe iseSiyoni.
Ps 76:3 Waphula lapho imicibisholo yomnsalo, nesihlangu, nenkemba, nempi. Sela
Ps 76:4 Uyakhazimula ngobukhosi, lapho uvela ezintabeni zempango.
Ps 76:5 Bachithekile abaqinile ngenhliziyo, balele ubuthongo babo; amaqhawe awafumanisanga izandla zawo.
Ps 76:6 Ngokusola kwakho, Nkulunkulu kaJakobe, kwehlelwa ngubuthongo inqola kanye nehhashi.
Ps 76:7 Wena, yebo, wena uyesabeka; ngubani ongema ebusweni bakho ngesikhathi solaka lwakho na?
Ps 76:8 Wezwakalisa ukwahlulela kuvela ezulwini; umhlaba wesaba, wathula
Ps 76:9 mhla evuka uNkulunkulu ukuba ahlulele, asindise bonke abathobekileyo bomhlaba. Sela
Ps 76:10 Ngokuba ulaka lomuntu luyakukudumisa; insalelo yolaka uyakuyibhinca.
Ps 76:11 Thembisani, nigcwalise izithembiso kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. Bonke abamzungezileyo mabalethe izipho kuye owEsabekayo.
Ps 76:12 Uyanquma umoya wezikhulu, wesabeka kuwo amakhosi omhlaba.
Ps 77:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. KuJeduthuni. Elika-Asafa. Ihubo. Izwi lami ngiyakuliphakamisela kuNkulunkulu, ngikhale kuNkulunkulu ukuba angibekele indlebe.
Ps 77:2 Osukwini losizi lwami ngiyayifuna iNkosi; ebusuku isandla sami seluliwe, asidangali; umphefumulo wami wala ukududuzwa.
Ps 77:3 Ngiyamkhumbula uNkulunkulu ngibubula; ngiyazindla, umoya wami uyaphela amandla. Sela
Ps 77:4 Uzibambile izinkophe zamehlo ami, angavaleki; ngikhathazekile, angisakwazi ukukhuluma.
Ps 77:5 Ngiyazindla ngezinsuku zasendulo, ngeminyaka yaphakade.
Ps 77:6 Ebusuku ngiyakhumbula ukubetha kwami ugubhu, ngizindla enhliziyweni yami; nomoya wami uyahlolisisa.
Ps 77:7 INkosi iyakulahla kuze kube phakade na? Ayisenakuphinda ibe nomusa na?
Ps 77:8 Umusa wayo unqamukile njalo yini na? Isithembiso siphelile yini ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane na?
Ps 77:9 UNkulunkulu ukhohliwe ukuba abe nomusa na? Uvalele ububele bakhe ngolaka na? Sela
Ps 77:10 Ngase ngithi: “Yilokhu ukuhlupheka kwami, ngokuba isandla sokunene soPhezukonke siphendukile.”
Ps 77:11 Ngiyakukhumbula izenzo zikaJehova, yebo, ngikhumbule izimangaliso zasendulo,
Ps 77:12 ngicabange ngawo wonke umsebenzi wakho, ngizindle ngezenzo zakho.
Ps 77:13 Indlela yakho, Nkulunkulu, isebungcweleni; ngubani ongunkulunkulu omkhulu njengoNkulunkulu na?
Ps 77:14 Wena unguNkulunkulu owenza izimangaliso; amandla akho uwazisile ezizweni.
Ps 77:15 Ngengalo yamandla wasindisa abantu bakho, amadodana kaJakobe noJosefa. Sela
Ps 77:16 Amanzi akubona, Nkulunkulu, amanzi akubona, athuthumela, nezintwa zazamazama.
Ps 77:17 Amafu athela amanzi, izulu laduma, imicibisholo yakho yaphuma.
Ps 77:18 Izwi lokuduma kwakho lalisesivunguvungwini; imibani yakhanyisa izwe; umhlaba wadikizela, wazamazama.
Ps 77:19 Indlela yakho yayiselwandle, nomendo wakho wawusemanzini amaningi, kodwa izinyathelo zakho zazingaziwa.
Ps 77:20 Wahola abantu bakho njengezimvu ngesandla sikaMose no-Aroni.
Ps 78:1 IMaskili lika-Asafa. Zwanini, bantu bami, umthetho wami, nibeke izindlebe zenu emazwini omlomo wami.
Ps 78:2 Ngizakuvula umlomo wami ngomfanekiso, ngibonakalise izimfihlakalo zasendulo.
Ps 78:3 Esikuzwileyo sakwazi, nawobaba abasitshela khona,
Ps 78:4 asinakukufihla kubantwana babo, izindumiso zikaJehova zisitshele kuso isizukulwane esizayo, namandla akhe nezimangaliso zakhe azenzileyo.
Ps 78:5 Ngokuba wamisa ubufakazi kwaJakobe, wabeka umthetho kwa-Israyeli, ayala ngawo obaba ukuba bafundise abantwana babo,
Ps 78:6 ukuze isizukulwane esilandelayo sazi, abantwana abayakuzalwa, bavuke, batshele abantwana babo,
Ps 78:7 babeke ithemba labo kuNkulunkulu, bangakhohlwa imisebenzi kaNkulunkulu, kepha bagcine imiyalo yakhe.
Ps 78:8 Bangabi njengawoyise, isizukulwane esiphambeneyo nesihlubukayo, isizukulwane esingaqinisanga inhliziyo yaso, nesimoya waso wawungathembekile kuNkulunkulu.
Ps 78:9 Abantu bakwa-Efrayimi, sebehlomile bephethe iminsalo, babuyela emuva ngosuku lokulwa.
Ps 78:10 Abasigcinanga isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu, benqaba ukuhamba emthethweni wakhe,
Ps 78:11 bakhohlwa imisebenzi yakhe nezimangaliso zakhe abebabonisile zona.
Ps 78:12 Wazenza izimangaliso emehlweni awoyise ezweni laseGibithe endaweni yaseSowani.
Ps 78:13 Wahlukanisa ulwandle, wabawelisa; wamisa amanzi njengodonga.
Ps 78:14 Wabahola ngefu emini, nobusuku bonke ngokukhanya komlilo.
Ps 78:15 Waqhekeza amadwala ehlane, wabaphuzisa njengasotweni olujulileyo.
Ps 78:16 Waphumisa edwaleni izifufula, wehlisa amanzi njengemifula.
Ps 78:17 Nokho baqhubeka benza ukona kuye, baphambana noPhezukonke ehlane.
Ps 78:18 Bamlinga uNkulunkulu enhliziyweni yabo ngokucela ukudla abakufisayo.
Ps 78:19 Bakhuluma kabi ngoNkulunkulu, bathi: “UNkulunkulu angalungisa isithebe ehlane na?
Ps 78:20 Bhekani, washaya idwala, kwaphuma amanzi, nemifula yampompoza; kepha angabanika nesinkwa, alungisele abantu bakhe inyama, na?”
Ps 78:21 Ngalokho uJehova ekuzwa lokho wathukuthela, kwavutha umlilo ngoJakobe, ulaka lwavuka ngo-Israyeli;
Ps 78:22 ngokuba abakholwanga nguNkulunkulu, abathembanga ensindisweni yakhe.
Ps 78:23 Nokho wayala amafu phezulu, wavula iminyango yezulu,
Ps 78:24 wanisa phezu kwabo imana kube ngukudla, wabapha amabele ezulu;
Ps 78:25 abantu badla isinkwa sezingelosi, bathunyelwa ukudla ngokugcweleyo.
Ps 78:26 Waphumisa umoya wasempumalanga ezulwini; ngamandla akhe waqhuba umoya waseningizimu.
Ps 78:27 Wawisa phezu kwabo inyama njengothuli, nezinyoni ezinamaphiko njengesihlabathi solwandle.
Ps 78:28 Wakwehlisa phakathi kwekamu labo naphakathi kwezindlu zabo.
Ps 78:29 Badla, basuthiswa kakhulu; baphiwa abakufisayo.
Ps 78:30 Bebengakahlukani nokufisa kwabo, ukudla kwabo kusesemlonyeni wabo,
Ps 78:31 intukuthelo kaNkulunkulu yabavukela, wabulala abakhulupheleyo babo, wawisa phansi izinsizwa zakwa-Israyeli.
Ps 78:32 Nokho bona njalo, abakholwanga yizimangaliso zakhe.
Ps 78:33 Ngakho waqedela izinsuku zabo ezeni neminyaka yabo ovalweni.
Ps 78:34 Lapho ebabulala, bamfuna; babuye bamfunisisa uNkulunkulu.
Ps 78:35 Base bekhumbula ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyidwala labo; uNkulunkulu oPhezukonke ungumkhululi wabo.
Ps 78:36 Kepha bamthopha ngomlomo wabo, baqamba amanga kuye ngolimi lwabo;
Ps 78:37 ngokuba inhliziyo yabo yayingabambeleli kuye, bengathembekile esivumelwaneni sakhe.
Ps 78:38 Kepha yena enesihawu wathethelela ububi babo, akabhubhisanga; yebo, wabamba kaningi intukuthelo yakhe, akavusanga lonke ulaka lwakhe.
Ps 78:39 Wakhumbula ukuthi bayinyama, bangumoya odlulayo ongabuyiyo.
Ps 78:40 Kwaba kaningi kangakanani bephambana naye ehlane, bemdabukisa kwahlongasibi.
Ps 78:41 Babuye bamlinga uNkulunkulu, bamdabukisa oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Ps 78:42 Abakhumbulanga isandla sakhe nosuku abahlenga ngalo ezitheni,
Ps 78:43 lapho ezenza izibonakaliso zakhe eGibithe nezimangaliso zakhe endaweni yaseSowani.
Ps 78:44 Waphendula lapho imifula yabo nemifudlana yabo yaba yigazi, ukuze bangabi nakuphuza.
Ps 78:45 Wathumela phakathi kwabo izibawu ezabadlayo namasele ababhubhisayo.
Ps 78:46 Wanika imiswenya ukudla kwabo, nomsebenzi wabo isikhonyane.
Ps 78:47 Wabulala imivini yabo ngesichotho, nemikhiwane yabo ngesangquma.
Ps 78:48 Wanikela izinkomo zabo esichothweni nezimvu zabo kuyo imibani.
Ps 78:49 Waphonsa kubo ukuvutha kwentukuthelo yakhe, nolaka, nokufutheka, nokuhlupheka, ngokuthuma izithunywa zobubi.
Ps 78:50 Walungisela intukuthelo yakhe indlela; akaphephisanga umphefumulo wabo ekufeni, kepha wanikela ukuphila kwabo ezifweni.
Ps 78:51 Washaya amazibulo onke aseGibithe, okokuqala kwamandla abo ematendeni kaHamu.
Ps 78:52 Kepha waphumisa abantu bakhe njengezimvu; wabahola ehlane njengomhlambi.
Ps 78:53 Wabahola kahle, abaze besaba; kepha ulwandle lwasibekela izitha zabo.
Ps 78:54 Wabayisa emnceleni wakhe ongcwele, entabeni esasiyizuzile isandla sakhe sokunene.
Ps 78:55 Waxosha abezizwe phambi kwabo; edabula izwe wababela ifa, wahlalisa izizwe zakwa-Israyeli ematendeni azo.
Ps 78:56 Nokho bamlinga, baphambana noNkulunkulu oPhezukonke, abaze bagcina imiyalo yakhe.
Ps 78:57 Bahoshekela emuva, bakhohlisa njengawoyise, baphenduka njengomnsalo ogejayo.
Ps 78:58 Bamthukuthelisa ngezindawo zabo eziphakemeyo, bamcunula ngezithombe zabo.
Ps 78:59 UNkulunkulu ekuzwa lokho wathukuthela, wamlahla impela u-Israyeli.
Ps 78:60 Walishiya itebernakele laseShilo, itende abelimisile phakathi kwabantu.
Ps 78:61 Wanikela amandla akhe ekuthunjweni, nenkazimulo yakhe esandleni sesitha.
Ps 78:62 Wanikela abantu bakhe enkembeni, wathukuthelela ifa lakhe.
Ps 78:63 Izinsizwa zabo zadliwa ngumlilo; izintombi zabo azihutshelwanga.
Ps 78:64 Abapristi babo bawa ngenkemba; abafelokazi babo abaze balila.
Ps 78:65 Yayisivuka iNkosi njengokade elele, njengesiqhwaga esikade sahlulwa yiwayini,
Ps 78:66 yazishayela emuva izitha zayo, yazithela ngehlazo eliphakade.
Ps 78:67 Yalahla indlu kaJosefa, ayikhethanga isizwe sakwa-Efrayimi.
Ps 78:68 Kepha yakhetha isizwe sakwaJuda, intaba yaseSiyoni eyithandayo.
Ps 78:69 Yayakha indlu yayo engcwele njengezintaba nanjengomhlaba ewusekeleyo kuze kube phakade.
Ps 78:70 Yakhetha uDavide inceku yayo, yamthabatha ezibayeni zezimvu.
Ps 78:71 Esalandele izimvukazi ezenyisayo, yamthabatha ukuba abeluse abantu bayo uJakobe, nefa layo u-Israyeli.
Ps 78:72 Njalo wabelusa ngobuqotho benhliziyo yakhe, wabahola ngenhlakanipho yesandla sakhe.
Ps 79:1 Ihubo lika-Asafa. Nkulunkulu, abezizwe bangenile efeni lakho; bangcolisile ithempeli lakho elingcwele; benze iJerusalema libe yincithakalo.
Ps 79:2 Bazinikile izidumbu zezinceku zakho zibe ngukudla kwezinyoni zezulu, inyama yabakwesabayo kuzo izilo zomhlaba.
Ps 79:3 Bachithile igazi labo njengamanzi nxazonke zeJerusalema, akwababikho obembelayo.
Ps 79:4 Sesiyisihlamba kubakhelwane bethu, umbhinqo nenhlekiso kwabasiphahlileyo.
Ps 79:5 Koze kube nini, Jehova, uthukuthele njalo, ukushisekela kwakho kuvutha njengomlilo, na?
Ps 79:6 Thela ulaka lwakho phezu kwabezizwe abangakwaziyo naphezu kwemibuso engakhulekeli igama lakho.
Ps 79:7 Ngokuba sebemdlile uJakobe, umuzi wakhe sebewuchithile.
Ps 79:8 Mawungasibaleli amacala akuqala; umusa wakho mawusheshe usihlangabeze, ngokuba sesibuthakathaka kakhulu.
Ps 79:9 Sisize, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yethu, ngenxa yenkazimulo yegama lakho; usikhulule, usithethelele izono zethu ngenxa yegama lakho.
Ps 79:10 Bangasholoni abezizwe ukuthi: “Uphi uNkulunkulu wabo na?” Makwazeke kwabezizwe emehlweni ethu ukuphindiselwa kwegazi lezinceku zakho elichithiweyo.
Ps 79:11 Ukububula kwesiboshwa makuze phambi kwakho; londoloza ngobukhulu bengalo yakho asebengabantwana bokufa.
Ps 79:12 Buyisela kubakhelwane bethu, kuphindwe kasikhombisa esifubeni sabo inhlamba abakuhlambalaza ngayo, Nkosi.
Ps 79:13 Khona thina bantu bakho, izimvu zedlelo lakho, siyakukubonga kuze kube phakade, sishumayele udumo lwakho ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 80:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Iminduze; ubufakazi. Elika-Asafa. Ihubo. Yizwa, malusi ka-Israyeli, ohola uJosefa njengomhlambi, ohlezi phezu kwamakherubi; mawubonakale ngokukhazimula.
Ps 80:2 Vusa amandla akho phambi kuka-Efrayimi noBenjamini noManase, uze ukusisindisa.
Ps 80:3 Sibuyise, Nkulunkulu, ukhanyise ubuso bakho, khona siyakusindiswa.
Ps 80:4 Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, koze kube nini uthunqela ngolaka umkhuleko wabantu bakho na?
Ps 80:5 Wabapha isinkwa sezinyembezi, wabaphuzisa izinyembezi ngesilinganiso esikhulu.
Ps 80:6 Usenza sibe yinto ebangwa ngabakhelwane bethu, nezitha zethu zisihleka usulu.
Ps 80:7 Sibuyise, Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, ukhanyise ubuso bakho, khona siyakusindiswa.
Ps 80:8 Wakhipha umvini eGibithe, waxosha abezizwe, watshala wona.
Ps 80:9 Wawulungisela indawo phambi kwawo, wagxila, wagcwalisa umhlaba.
Ps 80:10 Izintaba zambozwa ngumthunzi wawo, nemisedari kaNkulunkulu ngamagatsha awo.
Ps 80:11 Wenabisa amagatsha awo, aze afika elwandle, namaxhantela awo, aze afika emfuleni.
Ps 80:12 Uzidilizeleni izintango zawo, baze bawukhe bonke abadlula ngendlela, na?
Ps 80:13 Ingulube yasehlathini iyawudla, nezilwane zasendle ziyawuqothula.
Ps 80:14 Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, mawubuye; bheka usezulwini, ubone, unakekele lo mvini,
Ps 80:15 yebo, lo mvini otshalwe ngesokunene sakho, nendodana ozikhulisele yona.
Ps 80:16 Ushiswe ngumlilo, unqunyiwe; bayakubhubha ngokukhuza kobuso bakho.
Ps 80:17 Isandla sakho masibe phezu kwendoda yesokunene sakho, phezu kwendodana yomuntu ozikhulisele yona;
Ps 80:18 khona asisayikuhoshekela emuva kuwe; siphilise, khona siyakukhuleka egameni lakho.
Ps 80:19 Sibuyise, Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti; ukhanyise ubuso bakho, khona siyakusindiswa.
Ps 81:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeGititi. Elika-Asafa. Halalisani uNkulunkulu amandla ethu, nimemeze ngokujabula kuNkulunkulu kaJakobe.
Ps 81:2 Hlabani ihubo, nithathe isigubhu nehabhu elihle nogubhu.
Ps 81:3 Bethani icilongo ekwethwaseni kwenyanga nasekuhlanganeni kwenyanga ngosuku lomkhosi wethu.
Ps 81:4 Ngokuba kuyisimiso kwa-Israyeli nomthetho kaNkulunkulu kaJakobe.
Ps 81:5 Kungubufakazi abumisayo kwaJosefa mhla ephuma ezweni laseGibithe. Ngizwa ulimi ebengingalwazi luthi:
Ps 81:6 “Ngasusa ihlombe lakhe emthwalweni, izandla zakhe zakhululeka eqomeni lokuthwala.
Ps 81:7 Wakhuleka usosizini, ngakukhulula; ngakuphendula ngisekusithekeni kokuduma, ngakuvivinya ngasemanzini aseMeriba. Sela
Ps 81:8 “Zwanini, bantu bami, ngizakufakaza kini ukuthi: O Israyeli, sengathi ungangilalela!
Ps 81:9 Makungabikho kuwe unkulunkulu omunye, ungakhuleki kunkulunkulu wabezizwe.
Ps 81:10 Mina nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho owakukhuphula ezweni laseGibithe; khamisa umlomo wakho, ngiwugcwalise.
Ps 81:11 “Kepha abantu bami abalalelanga izwi lami, u-Israyeli akanginakanga.
Ps 81:12 Ngase ngibayeka enkanini yenhliziyo yabo ukuba bahambe ngokuthanda kwabo.
Ps 81:13 “Sengathi abantu bami bangangizwa, u-Israyeli ahambe ezindleleni zami.
Ps 81:14 Bengiyakuthobisa masinyane izitha zabo, ngiselulele isandla sami kwabamelene nabo.
Ps 81:15 Abazondi bakaJehova bebeyakuzithobela kuye, kepha isikhathi sabantu bami besiyakuba khona kuze kube phakade.
Ps 81:16 Ubeyakubapha ukolweni omuhle; yebo, bengiyakubasuthisa ngezinyosi zasesiweni.”
Ps 82:1 Ihubo lika-Asafa. UNkulunkulu umi emhlanganweni wawonkulunkulu; uyahlulela phakathi kwawonkulunkulu.
Ps 82:2 Koze kube nini nahlulela ngokungalungile nikhetha ubuso bababi na? Sela
Ps 82:3 Yahlulelani ompofu nentandane, nimenzele okufaneleyo olusizi noswelayo.
Ps 82:4 Khululani oswelayo nompofu, nibophule esandleni sababi.
Ps 82:5 Abanakwazi, abanakuqonda, bahamba ebumnyameni; izisekelo zonke zomhlaba ziyazamazama.
Ps 82:6 Mina ngathi: “Ningonkulunkulu nina,” nonke ningamadodana oPhezukonke.
Ps 82:7 Kanti nokho niyakufa njengabantu nje, niwe njengesinye sezikhulu.
Ps 82:8 Vuka, Nkulunkulu, wahlulele umhlaba, ngokuba wena uyindlalifa yezizwe zonke.
Ps 83:1 Igama. Ihubo lika-Asafa. Nkulunkulu, ungathuli, ungalibali, ungali ukukhuluma, Nkulunkulu.
Ps 83:2 Ngokuba bheka, izitha zakho ziyaxokozela, nabakuzondayo baphakamisa ikhanda.
Ps 83:3 Ngobuqili benza uzungu ngabantu bakho, bacebisana ukulwa nabathukusiweyo bakho.
Ps 83:4 Bathi: “Wozani sibaqothule, bangabe besaba yisizwe, negama lika-Israyeli lingabe lisakhunjulwa.”
Ps 83:5 Baceba nganhliziyonye, benza isivumelwano ngawe:
Ps 83:6 amatende ka-Edomi naka-Ishmayeli, nakaMowabi nakaHagari,
Ps 83:7 noGebali, no-Amoni, no-Amaleki, neFilistiya nabakhile eTire.
Ps 83:8 Ne-Asiriya lahlangana nabo, laba yingalo yabantwana bakaLoti. Sela
Ps 83:9 Yenza kubo njengakuMidiyani, nakuSisera, nakuJabini ngasemfuleni iKishoni,
Ps 83:10 ababhubhela e-Eni Dori, baba ngumquba womhlabathi.
Ps 83:11 Amakhosana abo wenze abe njengo-Orebi noZebi, nabakhulu babo bonke njengoZeba noSalimuna
Ps 83:12 ababethi: “Masizithabathele amadlelo kaNkulunkulu.”
Ps 83:13 Nkulunkulu wami, benze babe njengezibi ezikhwishizayo, njengamakhoba amuka nomoya.
Ps 83:14 Njengomlilo oshisa ihlathi, njengelangabi elithungela izintaba,
Ps 83:15 baxoshe kanjalo ngesivunguvungu sakho, ubethuse ngesiphepho sakho.
Ps 83:16 Thela ubuso babo ngehlazo, baze bafune igama lakho, Jehova.
Ps 83:17 Mabahlazeke, baphele amandla kuze kube phakade; mabahluleke, babhubhe,
Ps 83:18 bazi ukuthi nguwe wedwa ogama lakho linguJehova; ungoPhezukonke emhlabeni wonke.
Ps 84:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeGititi. Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Zithandeka kangaka izindlu zakho, Jehova Sebawoti.
Ps 84:2 Umphefumulo wami ulangazelela, womela amagceke kaJehova; inhliziyo yami nomzimba wami kuyahuba ngokwethaba kuNkulunkulu ophilayo.
Ps 84:3 Ngokuba umzwilili ufumene indlu, nenkonjane isidleke sayo, lapho ibeka khona amazinyane ayo, ngisho ama-altare akho, Jehova Sebawoti, Nkosi yami, Nkulunkulu wami.
Ps 84:4 Babusisiwe abahlala endlini yakho; bayakuhlala bebonga wena. Sela
Ps 84:5 Ubusisiwe umuntu omandla akhe akuwe, abazindlela zakho zisezinhliziyweni zabo.
Ps 84:6 Bedabula imfunda yezinyembezi bayenza ibe yindawo yeziphethu; yebo, nemvula yokuqala iyayisibekela ngezibusiso.
Ps 84:7 Baqhubeka emandleni, baze babonakale phambi kukaNkulunkulu eSiyoni.
Ps 84:8 Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, yizwa umkhuleko wami, ubeke indlebe, Nkulunkulu kaJakobe. Sela
Ps 84:9 Wena Nkulunkulu, siHlangu sethu, bheka, ubuke ubuso bogcotshiweyo wakho.
Ps 84:10 Ngokuba usuku lunye emagcekeni akho luhle kunezinye eziyizinkulungwane. Ngiyakhetha ukulinda emnyango wendlu kaNkulunkulu wami kunokuhlala ematendeni ababi.
Ps 84:11 Ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu uyilanga nesihlangu; uJehova uyakupha umusa nodumo; akayikubenqabela okuhle abahamba ngobuqotho.
Ps 84:12 Jehova Sebawoti, ubusisiwe umuntu okwethembayo.
Ps 85:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora; Ihubo. Jehova, wabusisa izwe lakho, wambuyisa uJakobe ekuthunjweni.
Ps 85:2 Wasusa icala labantu bakho, wasibekela zonke izono zabo. Sela
Ps 85:3 Wamukisa yonke intukuthelo yakho, waphenduka ekuvutheni kolaka lwakho.
Ps 85:4 Sibuyise, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yethu, ulahle ukusicanukela kwakho.
Ps 85:5 Uyakusithukuthelela njalonjalo na? Uyakwelulela ulaka lwakho ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane na?
Ps 85:6 Awuzukusivusa, sibuye siphile, ukuze abantu bakho bathokoze ngawe, na?
Ps 85:7 Sitshengise umusa wakho, Jehova, usiphe insindiso yakho.
Ps 85:8 Mangizwe lokho uNkulunkulu uJehova azakukukhuluma; uyakhuluma ukuthula kubantu bakhe nakubo abamesabayo; mabangabuyeli ebuwuleni.
Ps 85:9 Impela insindiso yakhe iseduze nabamesabayo, ukuze kuhlale udumo ezweni lethu.
Ps 85:10 Kuyakuhlangabezana umusa neqiniso, kwangane ukulunga nokuthula.
Ps 85:11 Kuyakuhluma iqiniso emhlabeni, kulunguzele phansi nokulunga kwasezulwini.
Ps 85:12 Yebo, uJehova uyakuveza okuhle; izwe lethu liyakuthela izithelo zalo.
Ps 85:13 Ukulunga kuyakuhamba phambi kwakhe, kwenzele izinyawo zakhe indlela.
Ps 86:1 Umkhuleko kaDavide. Beka indlebe yakho, Jehova, ungiphendule, ngokuba ngilusizi, ngimpofu.
Ps 86:2 Londoloza umphefumulo wami, ngokuba ngingoqotho; wena Nkulunkulu wami, sindisa inceku yakho ekwethembayo.
Ps 86:3 Yiba nomusa kimi, Nkosi, ngokuba ngikhala kuwe usuku lonke.
Ps 86:4 Thokozisa umphefumulo wenceku yakho, ngokuba kuwena, Nkosi, ngiyawuphakamisela umphefumulo wami.
Ps 86:5 Ngokuba wena, Nkosi, umuhle, ungothethelelayo, unomusa omkhulu kubo bonke abakhala kuwe.
Ps 86:6 Jehova, beka indlebe ekukhulekeni kwami, ulalele izwi lokunxusa kwami.
Ps 86:7 Ngosuku losizi lwami ngikhala kuwe, ngokuba uzakungiphendula.
Ps 86:8 Phakathi kwawonkulunkulu akakho onjengawe Nkosi; akukho okunjengemisebenzi yakho.
Ps 86:9 Izizwe ozenzileyo ziyakufika zonke, zikhuleke phambi kwakho, Nkosi, zidumise igama lakho.
Ps 86:10 Ngokuba umkhulu wena, uyenza izimangaliso, unguNkulunkulu wena wedwa.
Ps 86:11 Ngifundise, Jehova, indlela yakho; ngiyakuhamba eqinisweni lakho; yenza inhliziyo yami iqonde ntonye, yesabe igama lakho.
Ps 86:12 Ngiyakukubonga, Nkosi Nkulunkulu wami, ngenhliziyo yonke yami, ngidumise igama lakho kuze kube phakade.
Ps 86:13 Ngokuba umusa wakho mkhulu phezu kwami, ukhululile umphefumulo wami endaweni yabafileyo ephansi.
Ps 86:14 Nkulunkulu, izideleli zingivukele, ibandla lezidlwangudlwangu lifuna umphefumulo wami; azibekanga wena phambi kwazo.
Ps 86:15 Kepha wena Nkosi unguNkulunkulu ohawukelayo, onomusa nokubekezela, uvame ubumnene nokuthembeka.
Ps 86:16 Phendukela kimi, ube nomusa kimi, uyiphe inceku yakho amandla akho, usindise indodana yencekukazi yakho.
Ps 86:17 Ngenzele isiboniselo sokuhle, ukuze abangizondayo babone, bajabhe, ngokuba wena Jehova uyangisiza, uyangiduduza.
Ps 87:1 Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Igama. Isisekelo asibekileyo sisezintabeni ezingcwele.
Ps 87:2 UJehova uyawathanda amasango aseSiyoni kunazo zonke izindlu zikaJakobe.
Ps 87:3 Okudumisekayo kukhulunywa ngawe, muzi kaNkulunkulu. Sela
Ps 87:4 Ngiyakubala uRahabi neBabele kulabo abangaziyo; yebo, iFilistiya neThire kanye neKushe azalelwa khona.
Ps 87:5 Kuyakuthiwa ngeSiyoni: “Yilo nalo wazalelwa khona; oPhezukonke uyaliqinisa.”
Ps 87:6 Mhla uJehova eloba izizwe uyakubala ukuthi lo wazalelwa khona. Sela
Ps 87:7 Abahubayo nabasinayo bathi: “Imithombo yami yonke ikuwe.”
Ps 88:1 Igama. Ihubo lamadodana kaKora. Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeMahalati Leyanoti. IMaskili likaHemani umEzra. Jehova Nkulunkulu wensindiso yami, ngikhala imini nobusuku phambi kwakho.
Ps 88:2 Umkhuleko wami mawufike ebusweni bakho, indlebe yakho uyibeke ekunxuseni kwami.
Ps 88:3 Ngokuba umphefumulo wami ugcwele izinsizi, ukuphila kwami kusondele endaweni yabafileyo.
Ps 88:4 Ngibalwa kanye nabashona emgodini, nginjengomuntu ofileyo.
Ps 88:5 Icansi lami liphakathi kwabafileyo; nginjengababuleweyo abalele ethuneni, ongasabakhumbuli, benqunyiwe esandleni sakho.
Ps 88:6 Ungibekile emgodini ojulile kunayo yonke, ebumnyameni, otweni.
Ps 88:7 Kuyangisinda ukuthukuthela kwakho; amadlambi akho onke ayangicindezela phansi. Sela
Ps 88:8 Engikade ngazana nabo ubaxoshele kude, wangenza ngibe yisinengiso kubo; ngivalelwe, ngingephume.
Ps 88:9 Iso lami liyafa ngosizi; ngikhala kuwe Jehova imihla yonke, ngizelulela izandla zami kuwe.
Ps 88:10 Abafileyo uyakubenzela isimangaliso na? Ziyakuvuka yini izithunzi, zikubonge, na? Sela
Ps 88:11 Kuyalandiswa yini ethuneni ngomusa wakho, nangokuthembeka kwakho endaweni yokubhujiswa na?
Ps 88:12 Izimangaliso zakho ziyaziwa yini ebumnyameni, nokulunga kwakho ezweni lokukhohlwa na?
Ps 88:13 Kepha mina, Jehova, ngikhala kuwe; ekuseni umkhuleko wami uyenyuka phambi kwakho.
Ps 88:14 Jehova, ulahlelani umphefumulo wami, ungifihlelelani ubuso bakho na?
Ps 88:15 Ngihluphekile, ngingofayo kusukela ebusheni bami; ngithwele ukwesabeka kwakho, ngiphelile.
Ps 88:16 Ulaka lwakho olushisayo lungehlele; ukwesabisa kwakho kungiqedile.
Ps 88:17 Kungizungeza njengamanzi imihla yonke, kungikaka kanyekanye.
Ps 88:18 Isihlobo nomngane ubaxoshele kude; ubumnyama bungumhlobo wami.
Ps 89:1 IMaskili lika-Ethani umEzra. Ngiyakuhlabelela ngomusa kaJehova kuze kube phakade, ngomlomo wami ngazise izizukulwane ngezizukulwane ukuthembeka kwakho.
Ps 89:2 Ngokuba ngithe: “Umusa uyakwakhiwa kuze kube phakade; ezulwini uyaqinisa ukuthembeka kwakho.”
Ps 89:3 Ngenzile isivumelwano nokhethiweyo wami, ngifungile kuye uDavide inceku yami ukuthi:
Ps 89:4 “Ngiyakuqinisa inzalo yakho kuze kube phakade, ngisakhe isihlalo sobukhosi ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.” Sela
Ps 89:5 Izimangaliso zakho, Jehova, ziyadunyiswa ngamazulu, ukuthembeka kwakho ebandleni labangcwele.
Ps 89:6 Ngokuba ngubani osemafwini ongalinganiswa noJehova na? Ngubani phakathi kwamadodana kaNkulunkulu ongafaniswa noJehova na?
Ps 89:7 UNkulunkulu uyesabeka kakhulu emhlanganweni wabangcwele; umelwe ukuhlonishwa yibo bonke abangakuye.
Ps 89:8 Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, ngubani onjengawe na? Unamandla, Jehova, nokuthembeka kwakho kuyakuhaqa.
Ps 89:9 Wena uyabusa ukukhukhumala kolwandle; uma kuphakama amadlambi alo, uyawathulisa.
Ps 89:10 Wena uchobozile uRahabi njengobuleweyo; uhlakazile izitha zakho ngengalo yakho enamandla.
Ps 89:11 Ngelakho izulu, ngowakho umhlaba; izwe nokugcwala kwalo, kukho konke ubeke isisekelo.
Ps 89:12 Inyakatho neningizimu wakudala wena; iThabori neHermoni kuyajabula egameni lakho.
Ps 89:13 Ingalo yakho inobuqhawe, isandla sakho sinamandla, esokunene sakho siphakeme.
Ps 89:14 Ukulunga nokwahlulela kuyisisekelo sesihlalo sakho sobukhosi; umusa neqiniso kuyahamba phambi kobuso bakho.
Ps 89:15 Sibusisiwe isizwe esikwazi ukuhlabelela ngenjabulo; siyahamba, Jehova, ekukhanyeni kobuso bakho.
Ps 89:16 Egameni lakho siyathokoza usuku lonke; ngokulunga kwakho siyaphakanyiswa.
Ps 89:17 Ngokuba wena uyinkazimulo yamandla abo; ngomusa wakho uphondo lwethu luyaphakama.
Ps 89:18 Ngokuba isihlangu sethu singesikaJehova; inkosi yethu ingeyoNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Ps 89:19 Ngaleso sikhathi wakhuluma ngombono kubo abakholwayo bakho, wathi: “Ngibekile usizo eqhaweni, ngiphakamisile okhethiwe phakathi kwabantu.
Ps 89:20 Ngifumene inceku yami uDavide, ngimgcobile ngamafutha ami angcwele.
Ps 89:21 Isandla sami siyakuba naye siqinile, ingalo yami iyakumqinisa.
Ps 89:22 Isitha asiyikumahlula, nendodana yobubi ayiyikumhlupha.
Ps 89:23 Ngiyakuchoboza izitha zakhe ebusweni bakhe, ngihluphe abamzondayo.
Ps 89:24 Ukuthembeka kwami nomusa wami kuyakuba naye; egameni lami luyakuphakama uphondo lwakhe.
Ps 89:25 Ngiyakubeka isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle, esokunene sakhe phezu kwemifula.
Ps 89:26 Uyakungibiza ngokuthi: ‘UnguBaba, unguNkulunkulu wami nedwala lensindiso yami.’
Ps 89:27 Ngiyakumenza abe yizibulo nophakamileyo kunamakhosi omhlaba.
Ps 89:28 Ngiyakumgcinela umusa wami kuze kube phakade; isivumelwano sami soba siqinile kuye.
Ps 89:29 Ngiyakwenza inzalo yakhe ime kuze kube phakade, isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sibe njengezinsuku zezulu.
Ps 89:30 “Uma abantwana bakhe beshiya umthetho wami bengahambi ngezahlulelo zami,
Ps 89:31 uma bephula izimiso zami bengagcini imiyalo yami,
Ps 89:32 ngiyakuhambela izono zabo ngenduku, namacala abo ngemivimbo.
Ps 89:33 Kepha umusa wami angiyikuwususa kuye, ngingaphikisi ukuthembeka kwami.
Ps 89:34 Angiyikwaphula isivumelwano sami, nokuphumileyo ezindebeni zami angiyikukuguqula.
Ps 89:35 Ngafunga kanye ubungcwele bami, angiyikuqamba amanga kuDavide.
Ps 89:36 Inzalo yakhe iyakuma phakade, isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sibe njengelanga phambi kwami.
Ps 89:37 Iyakuma phakade njengenyanga nanjengofakazi othembekileyo osemafwini.” Sela
Ps 89:38 Kepha usumlahlile, wamala, wamthukuthelela ogcotshiweyo wakho.
Ps 89:39 Uchithile isivumelwano senceku yakho, wadumaza umqhele wayo, wawuphonsa emhlabathini.
Ps 89:40 Udilizile zonke izindonga zakhe, wazenza izinqaba zakhe zaba yincithakalo.
Ps 89:41 Bonke abadlula ngendlela bayamphanga; waba yihlazo kwabakhelene naye.
Ps 89:42 Uphakamisile esokunene sabamelene naye, wajabulisa zonke izitha zakhe.
Ps 89:43 Futhi ubuyisele emuva usiko lwenkemba yakhe, awumvumelanga ukuma ekulweni.
Ps 89:44 Ususile inkazimulo yakhe, wawisa phansi emhlabathini isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi.
Ps 89:45 Ufinyezile izinsuku zobusha bakhe, wamthela ngamahloni. Sela
Ps 89:46 Koze kube nini uyakuzisitha, Jehova, nentukuthelo yakho ivutha njengomlilo, na?
Ps 89:47 Khumbula ukuthi isikhathi sami singakanani nokuthi wadalela ize bonke abantwana babantu.
Ps 89:48 Ngubani oyakuphila engayikubona ukufa, akhulule umphefumulo wakhe emandleni endawo yabafileyo, na? Sela
Ps 89:49 Nkosi, uphi umusa wakho wakuqala owawufungela kuDavide ngokuthembeka kwakho na?
Ps 89:50 Khumbula, Nkosi, ihlazo lezinceku zakho nokuthi ngithwele esifubeni sami ihlazo lezizwe eziningi kakhulu,
Ps 89:51 ezisola ngalo izitha zakho, Jehova, ezisola ngalo ukuhamba kogcotshiweyo wakho.
Ps 89:52 Makabongwe uJehova kuze kube phakade. Amen, Amen.
Ps 90:1 Umkhuleko kaMose, umuntu kaNkulunkulu. Nkosi, wena uyisiphephelo sethu ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 90:2 Kungakaveli izintaba, ungakawenzi umhlaba nezwe, kuthi kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade wena Nkulunkulu ukhona.
Ps 90:3 Uyambuyisela umuntu othulini, uthi: “Buyani, bantwana babantu.”
Ps 90:4 Ngokuba iminyaka eyinkulungwane emehlweni akho injengezolo selidlulile, nanjengomlindo ebusuku.
Ps 90:5 Uyabamukisa njengesikhukhula, banjengobuthongo; ekuseni banjengotshani obuhlumayo;
Ps 90:6 ekuseni buyakhahlela, buhlume; kusihlwa bunqunywe, bubune.
Ps 90:7 Ngokuba siyaqedwa yintukuthelo yakho, nangolaka lwakho siyabhubha.
Ps 90:8 Ubekile amacala ethu phambi kwakho, izono zethu ezifihliweyo ekukhanyeni kobuso bakho.
Ps 90:9 Ngokuba izinsuku zethu ziyadlula ngentukuthelo yakho; siyafeza iminyaka yethu njengephefu.
Ps 90:10 Izinsuku zeminyaka yethu zineminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa; kuthi uma ziziningi, zineminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili; nokho ukuvama kwazo kungukuhlupheka nelize, ngokuba zidlula masinyane, thina siyandiza, simuke.
Ps 90:11 Ngubani owaziyo amandla entukuthelo yakho nolaka lwakho olunjengakho ukwesabeka kwakho na?
Ps 90:12 Sifundise, Nkosi, ukubala izinsuku zethu, sizuze inhliziyo enokuhlakanipha.
Ps 90:13 Buya, Jehova! Koze kube nini na? Hawukela izinceku zakho.
Ps 90:14 Sisuthise ngomusa wakho, kuse sekuseni, ukuze sithokoze, sijabule izinsuku zethu zonke.
Ps 90:15 Sithokozise ngangezinsuku owasihlupha ngazo, nangangeminyaka esabona okubi ngayo.
Ps 90:16 Izenzo zakho mazibonakale kuzo izinceku zakho, nenkazimulo yakho kubantwana bazo.
Ps 90:17 Yebo, ubuhle beNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu abube phezu kwethu, umise umsebenzi wezandla zethu phezu kwethu; yebo, umsebenzi wezandla zethu uwumise.
Ps 91:1 Yena owakhile ekusithekeni koPhezukonke nohlezi emthunzini kaSomandla
Ps 91:2 uthi kuJehova: “Uyisiphephelo sami nenqaba yami noNkulunkulu wami engimethembayo.”
Ps 91:3 Ngokuba yena uyakukhipha ogibeni lomcuphi nasobhadaneni olubhubhisayo.
Ps 91:4 Ngezimpaphe zakhe uyakukusibekela, uphephele phansi kwamaphiko akhe; ukuthembeka kwakhe kuyisihlangu nehawu.
Ps 91:5 Awuyikwesaba ivuso lasebusuku, nomcibisholo ondizayo emini,
Ps 91:6 nobhadane oluhamba ebumnyameni, nesifo esibhubhisayo emini enkulu.
Ps 91:7 Bayakuwa abayizinkulungwane ngaseceleni kwakho, nabayizinkulungwane eziyishumi ngakwesokunene sakho, kepha akuyikufinyelela kuwe.
Ps 91:8 Uyakubuka nje ngamehlo akho, ubone ukuphindiselwa kwababi,
Ps 91:9 ngokuba uthi: Jehova, uyisiphephelo sami; oPhezukonke umenzile abe yinqaba yakho.
Ps 91:10 Awuyikwehlelwa ngokubi, nesifo asiyikusondela etendeni lakho.
Ps 91:11 Ngokuba uyakuyaleza izingelosi zakhe ngawe, zikulondoloze ezindleleni zakho zonke.
Ps 91:12 Ziyakukuthwala ngezandla, ungaqhuzuki ngonyawo lwakho etsheni.
Ps 91:13 Uyakunyathela ingonyama nebululu, unyathele phansi ibhongo lengonyama nodrako.
Ps 91:14 Ngenxa yokuba enamathele kimi, ngakho ngiyamkhulula; ngiyamphakamisa ngokuba elazi igama lami.
Ps 91:15 Uyakungibiza, ngimphendule; ngiyakuba naye esosizini, ngimkhulule, ngimdumise.
Ps 91:16 Ngiyakumsuthisa ngobude bezinsuku, ngimbonise insindiso yami.
Ps 92:1 Ihubo. Igama losuku lwesabatha. Kuhle ukumbonga uJehova nokuhubela igama lakho wena oPhezukonke;
Ps 92:2 ukushumayela umusa wakho ekuseni nokuthembeka kwakho ebusuku,
Ps 92:3 ngokubetha ugubhu olunezintambo eziyishumi, nomqangala, kanye nehabhu elizwakala kamnandi.
Ps 92:4 Ngokuba ungithokozisile, Jehova, ngezenzo zakho; ngiyakumemeza ngokujabula.
Ps 92:5 Yeka ubukhulu bezenzo zakho, Jehova. Imicabango yakho ijulile kakhulu.
Ps 92:6 Umuntu oyisilima angekucabange, nesiwula asikuboni.
Ps 92:7 Noma ababi behluma njengotshani, nezigangi noma ziqhakaza zonke, kuyenzeka ukuba babhujiswe kuze kube phakade.
Ps 92:8 Kepha wena Jehova uphakeme kuze kube phakade.
Ps 92:9 Ngokuba bheka, izitha zakho, Jehova, bheka, izitha zakho, ziyakubhubha; bonke abenza okubi bayakuhlakazwa.
Ps 92:10 Kepha uphondo lwami uyaluphakamisa njengolwenyathi, ngigcotshwa ngamafutha amasha.
Ps 92:11 Iso lami liyakubona ngokujabula izitha zami, nezindlebe zami ziyakuzwa ngokuthokoza ngababi abangivukelayo.
Ps 92:12 Olungileyo uyahluma njengesundu, uyakhula njengomsedari eLebanoni.
Ps 92:13 Batshaliwe endlini kaJehova, bamila emagcekeni kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Ps 92:14 Nasebudaleni bayakuthela izithelo, bahlume babe luhlaza,
Ps 92:15 ukuze bashumayele ukuthi uJehova ulungile; uyidwala lami okungekho kuye ukungalungi.
Ps 93:1 UJehova uyinkosi, wembethe ubukhosi; uJehova wembethe, ubhince amandla. Nezwe limi liqinile, lingazanyazanyiswa.
Ps 93:2 Isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi simi siqinile kwasendulo; wena ukhona kwaphakade.
Ps 93:3 Imifula iphakamisile, Jehova, imifula iphakamisile ukuholoba kwayo; imifula iphakamisa ukuduma kwayo.
Ps 93:4 UJehova ophakeme unamandla kunokuholoba kwamanzi amaningi, kunokuduma kwamadlambi olwandle.
Ps 93:5 Ukufakaza kwakho kuqinisekile kakhulu. Ubungcwele buyifanele indlu yakho, Jehova, kuze kube phakade.
Ps 94:1 Nkulunkulu wempindiselo, Jehova, Nkulunkulu wempindiselo, vela ukhanye.
Ps 94:2 Phakama, Mahluleli womhlaba, uphindisele kwabazidlayo izenzo zabo.
Ps 94:3 Jehova, koze kube nini ababi, koze kube nini ababi bethaba na?
Ps 94:4 Bayampompoza, bakhuluma amagangangozi; bayazidla bonke abenza okubi.
Ps 94:5 Isizwe sakho, Jehova, bayasiphohloza, nefa lakho balinyathela phansi.
Ps 94:6 Bayabhubhisa umfelokazi nomfokazi, nezintandane bayazibulala.
Ps 94:7 Bathi: “UJehova akaboni, uNkulunkulu kaJakobe akanaki.”
Ps 94:8 Qaphelani nina zithutha phakathi kwabantu; nani ziwula, niyakuqonda nini na?
Ps 94:9 Owenza indlebe kanakuzwa na? Owadala iso kanakubona na?
Ps 94:10 Othethisa abezizwe, yena ofundisa abantu ukwazi, kanakujezisa na?
Ps 94:11 UJehova uyayazi imicabango yabantu ukuba ingumoya nje.
Ps 94:12 Jehova, ubusisiwe lowo muntu omyalayo, omfundisayo ngomthetho wakho,
Ps 94:13 wenzela ukuba umphumuze ezinsukwini ezimbi, aze ambelwe umgodi lowo ongenamthetho.
Ps 94:14 Ngokuba uJehova akayikulahla abantu bakhe, nefa lakhe akayikulishiya.
Ps 94:15 Ngokuba ukulunga kuyakubuyela ekwahluleleni, bonke abaqotho ngenhliziyo bakulandele.
Ps 94:16 Ngubani oyakungimela phambi kwababi na? Ngubani oyakungelekelela kwabenza okubi na?
Ps 94:17 Uma uJehova ebengesilo usizo lwami, umphefumulo wami ubuyakushesha ukuhlala ekuthuleni kokufa.
Ps 94:18 Lapho ngithe unyawo lwami luyashelela, umusa wakho, Jehova, wangiphasa.
Ps 94:19 Kubo ubuninginingi bemicabango yenhliziyo yami ukududuza kwakho kwathokozisa umphefumulo wami.
Ps 94:20 Isihlalo sobubi singahlanganyela nawe yini, leso esisebenza okubi kungathi ngomthetho na?
Ps 94:21 Bahlangana ukuvukela umphefumulo wolungileyo; igazi elingenacala bayalilahla.
Ps 94:22 Kepha uJehova waba yinqaba yami, uNkulunkulu wami waba yiwa engiphephela kulo.
Ps 94:23 Uyaphindisela kubo ukushinga kwabo, abaqede ngobubi babo; uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu uyakubaqeda.
Ps 95:1 Wozani simhubele uJehova, sihlabelele ngenjabulo kulo idwala lensindiso yethu.
Ps 95:2 Masize phambi kobuso bakhe ngokubonga, sihlabelele kuye ngamahubo.
Ps 95:3 Ngokuba uJehova unguNkulunkulu omkhulu, uyinkosi enkulu phezu kwawonkulunkulu bonke.
Ps 95:4 Esandleni sakhe kukhona ukujula komhlaba; iziqongo zezintaba ngezakhe nazo.
Ps 95:5 Ulwandle ngolwakhe, walwenza; nomhlabathi owomileyo izandla zakhe zawubumba.
Ps 95:6 Wozani; masikhuleke, sikhothame, siguqe phambi kukaJehova, uMenzi wethu.
Ps 95:7 Ngokuba yena unguNkulunkulu wethu, thina singabantu bedlelo lakhe nezimvu zesandla sakhe. Namuhla, uma nilizwa izwi lakhe,
Ps 95:8 ningayenzi lukhuni inhliziyo yenu njengaseMeriba, njengasosukwini lwaseMasa ehlane,
Ps 95:9 lapho oyihlo bangilinga khona, bangivivinya, babona umsebenzi wami.
Ps 95:10 Iminyaka engamashumi amane nganengwa yileso sizukulwane, ngaze ngathi: “Bangabantu abanhliziyo zabo zidukile, abazazanga izindlela zami,”
Ps 95:11 engafunga ngabo olakeni lwami, ngathi: “Abasoze bangena ekuphumuleni kwami.”
Ps 96:1 Hlabelelani kuJehova ihubo elisha, nihlabelele kuJehova, mhlaba wonke.
Ps 96:2 Hlabelelani kuJehova, nibonge igama lakhe, nimemeze insindiso yakhe imihla ngemihla.
Ps 96:3 Landani inkazimulo yakhe phakathi kwabezizwe, izimangaliso zakhe phakathi kwabantu bonke.
Ps 96:4 Ngokuba mkhulu uJehova, udumisekile kakhulu; uyesabeka phezu kwabo bonke onkulunkulu.
Ps 96:5 Ngokuba bonke onkulunkulu babezizwe bayizithombe, kepha uJehova walenza izulu.
Ps 96:6 Udumo nobukhosi kusebusweni bakhe; amandla nenkazimulo kusendlini yakhe engcwele.
Ps 96:7 Mnikeni uJehova nina mindeni yabantu, mnikeni uJehova inkazimulo namandla.
Ps 96:8 Mnikeni uJehova inkazimulo yegama lakhe, nilethe umnikelo, ningene emagcekeni akhe.
Ps 96:9 Khulekani kuJehova, nihlobe ubungcwele; thuthumela ebusweni bakhe, mhlaba wonke.
Ps 96:10 Thanini phakathi kwabezizwe: “UJehova uyinkosi,” izwe lihlala liqinile, lingenakushukunyiswa; uthetha amacala ezizwe ngobuqotho.
Ps 96:11 Malijabule izulu, umhlaba uthokoze; maluhlokome ulwandle nokugcwala kwalo.
Ps 96:12 Mawename amasimu nakho konke okukuwo, ijabule imithi yonke yehlathi
Ps 96:13 ebusweni bukaJehova, ngokuba uyeza, yebo, uyeza ukwahlulela umhlaba; uyakwahlulela izwe ngokulunga, nezizwe ngokuthembeka kwakhe.
Ps 97:1 UJehova uyinkosi; umhlaba mawethabe, zijabule iziqhingi eziningi.
Ps 97:2 Amafu nobumnyama kuyamphahla; ukulunga nokwahlulela kuyisisekelo sesihlalo sakhe sobukhosi.
Ps 97:3 Umlilo uyahamba phambi kwakhe, udla izitha zakhe nxazonke.
Ps 97:4 Imibani yakhe ikhanyisa izwe; umhlaba uyakubona, uthuthumele.
Ps 97:5 Izintaba zincibilika njengengcina phambi kukaJehova, phambi kweNkosi yomhlaba wonke.
Ps 97:6 Amazulu ashumayela ukulunga kwakhe; izizwe zonke zibona inkazimulo yakhe.
Ps 97:7 Mabajabhe bonke abakhonza izithombe ezibaziweyo, abazigabisa ngezithombe. Mkhonzeni nina nonke bonkulunkulu.
Ps 97:8 ISiyoni liyezwa, liyajabula; ngenxa yezahlulelo zakho, Jehova.
Ps 97:9 Ngokuba wena Jehova uphezu komhlaba wonke, uphakeme kakhulu phezu kwawonkulunkulu bonke.
Ps 97:10 Nina enithanda uJehova zondani okubi; uyagcina imiphefumulo yabamkhonzayo; uyabasindisa ezandleni zababi.
Ps 97:11 Ukukhanya kuhlwanyelelwe olungileyo, ukujabula kuhlwanyelelwe abanhliziyo ziqotho.
Ps 97:12 Jabulani kuJehova nina balungileyo, nibonge igama lakhe elingcwele.
Ps 98:1 Ihubo. Mhubeleni uJehova igama elisha, ngokuba wenze izimangaliso; esokunene sakhe nengalo yakhe engcwele kumtholele ukunqoba.
Ps 98:2 UJehova wazisile insindiso yakhe; ukulunga kwakhe ukwambulile emehlweni abezizwe.
Ps 98:3 Ukhumbulile umusa wakhe nokuthembeka kwakhe kuyo indlu ka-Israyeli; imikhawulo yonke yomhlaba ibonile insindiso kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Ps 98:4 Hlokomani kuJehova ngezwi lokuhalalisa, nihlabelele ngenjabulo, nihube.
Ps 98:5 Mhubeleni uJehova ngehabhu, ngehabhu nangezwi lehubo.
Ps 98:6 Ngamacilongo nangokukhala komtshingo hlokomani ngezwi lokuhalalisa phambi kweNkosi uJehova.
Ps 98:7 Maludume ulwandle nokugcwala kwalo, izwe nabakhileyo kulo.
Ps 98:8 Imifula mayishaye ihlombe, izintaba zihalalise kanyekanye
Ps 98:9 ebusweni bukaJehova, ngokuba uyeza ukwahlulela umhlaba. Uyakwahlulela izwe ngokulunga nezizwe ngobuqotho.
Ps 99:1 UJehova uyinkosi; mabathuthumele abantu; uhlezi phezu kwamakherubi; mawuzamazame umhlaba.
Ps 99:2 UJehova mkhulu eSiyoni, uphakeme phezu kwezizwe zonke.
Ps 99:3 Mababonge igama lakho elikhulu nelesabekayo; ungcwele yena.
Ps 99:4 Amandla eNkosi athanda okulungileyo, umisile ubuqotho; ukwahlulela nokulunga ukwenzile kwaJakobe.
Ps 99:5 Mphakamiseni uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, nikhuleke ngasesanabelweni sezinyawo zakhe; ungcwele yena.
Ps 99:6 OMose no-Aroni babe phakathi kwabapristi bakhe; uSamuweli wayephakathi kwabakhulekayo egameni lakhe. Bakhuleka kuJehova, yena waphendula.
Ps 99:7 Wakhuluma kubo esensikeni yefu; bagcina ubufakazi bakhe nezimiso abanika zona.
Ps 99:8 Jehova Nkulunkulu wethu, wena ubaphendulile, waba kubo uNkulunkulu othethelelayo nophindiselayo ngezenzo zabo.
Ps 99:9 Mphakamiseni uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, nikhuleke ngasentabeni yakhe engcwele, ngokuba ungcwele uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu.
Ps 100:1 Ihubo lokudumisa. Hlokoma kuJehova ngezwi lokuhalalisa, mhlaba wonke.
Ps 100:2 Mkhonzeni uJehova ngokujabula, nisondele ebusweni bakhe ngokuhuba kwentokozo.
Ps 100:3 Yazini ukuthi uJehova unguNkulunkulu; nguye osenzileyo, akuthina, sibe ngabantu bakhe nezimvu zedlelo lakhe.
Ps 100:4 Ngenani emasangweni akhe ngokubonga, nasemagcekeni akhe ngokudumisa; mbongeni, nibusise igama lakhe.
Ps 100:5 Ngokuba muhle uJehova; umusa wakhe umi phakade, nokuthembeka kwakhe ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 101:1 ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Ngizakuhlabelela ngomusa nokwahlulela, ngikudumise wena Jehova.
Ps 101:2 Ngizakuqaphelisisa indlela engenacala. Uyakuza nini kimi na? Ngizakuhamba endlini yami ngenhliziyo engenacala.
Ps 101:3 Angizukubeka phambi kwamehlo ami into embi; ukwenza kwabahlubukayo ngiyakuzonda; akuyikunamathela kimi.
Ps 101:4 Inhliziyo ephambeneyo iyakusuka kimi; omubi angiyikumazi.
