Ps 101:5 Omhlebayo umakhelwane wakhe ngasese ngizakumqeda; onamehlo aqhoshayo nenhliziyo ezidlayo angiyikumvumela.
Ps 101:6 Amehlo ami akwabathembekileyo bomhlaba ukuba bahlale nami; ohamba endleleni engenacala uyakungikhonza.
Ps 101:7 Osebenza ukukhohlisa akayikuhlala endlini yami; okhuluma amanga akayikuma phambi kwamehlo ami.
Ps 101:8 Ekuseni imihla ngemihla ngiyakubaqeda bonke ababi bomhlaba, ukuze nginqume emzini kaJehova bonke abenzi bokubi.
Ps 102:1 Umkhuleko wohluphekayo, nxa ephela amandla, ethulula isikhalo sakhe phambi kukaJehova. Jehova, yizwa umkhuleko wami; ukukhala kwami makufinyelele kuwe.
Ps 102:2 Ungafihli ubuso bakho kimi ngosuku losizi lwami; beka indlebe yakho kimi, ngosuku engimemeza ngalo usheshe ungiphendule.
Ps 102:3 Ngokuba izinsuku zami ziphelile njengomusi; amathambo ashile njengezinkuni.
Ps 102:4 Inhliziyo yami ishayiwe, ibunile njengotshani, ngokuba ngiyakhohlwa ukudla isinkwa sami.
Ps 102:5 Ngenxa yezwi lokububula kwami amathambo ami anamathele enyameni yami.
Ps 102:6 Ngiyafana nevuba ehlane, nginjengesikhova kwahlongasibi.
Ps 102:7 Ngiyaqwasha, nginjengenyoni eyodwa ophahleni lwendlu.
Ps 102:8 Izitha zami ziyangithuka usuku lonke; abahlanya ngami bayangiqalekisa.
Ps 102:9 Ngokuba ngidlile umlotha njengesinkwa, nophuzo lwami ngiluxubanisile nezinyembezi.
Ps 102:10 Ngenxa yentukuthelo nolaka lwakho ungifukulile, wangilahla.
Ps 102:11 Izinsuku zami zinjengethunzi elandayo; mina uqobo ngiyabuna njengotshani.
Ps 102:12 Kepha wena Jehova uyakuhlala kuze kube phakade, nesikhumbuzo sakho ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 102:13 Uyakuvuka, uhawukele iSiyoni; sekuyisikhathi sokuliphatha ngomusa, yebo, isikhathi esimisiweyo sesifikile.
Ps 102:14 Ngokuba izinceku zalo ziyathokoza ngamatshe alo, zihawukele uthuli lwalo.
Ps 102:15 Khona abezizwe bayakulesaba igama likaJehova, amakhosi onke omhlaba inkazimulo yakho.
Ps 102:16 Ngokuba uJehova ulakhile iSiyoni, ubonakele enkazimulweni yakhe;
Ps 102:17 wanaka umkhuleko wabangenalutho, engawudeleli umthandazo wabo.
Ps 102:18 Lokhu kuyakulotshelwa isizukulwane esizayo; abantu abayakudalwa bayakudumisa uJehova.
Ps 102:19 Ngokuba ubheke phansi esekuphakameni kwakhe okungcwele, wabuka umhlaba esezulwini
Ps 102:20 ukuba ezwe ukububula kwesiboshwa, akhulule abantwana bokufa,
Ps 102:21 ukuze kumenyezelwe eSiyoni igama likaJehova nodumo lwakhe eJerusalema,
Ps 102:22 nxa izizwe zibuthana ndawonye kanye nemibuso ukumkhonza uJehova.
Ps 102:23 Wanciphisa amandla ami endleleni, wafinyeza izinsuku zami.
Ps 102:24 Ngithi: “Nkulunkulu wami, ungangisusi enxenyeni yezinsuku zami; iminyaka yakho isezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 102:25 Endulo wawusekela umhlaba, izulu lingumsebenzi wezandla zakho.
Ps 102:26 Kuyakubhubha lokhu, kepha uyakuma; yebo, kuyakuguga konke njengengubo; njengesambatho uyakukuguqula, kuguqulwe.
Ps 102:27 Kepha unguwe njalo, iminyaka yakho ayiyikuphela.
Ps 102:28 Abantwana bezinceku zakho bayakuhlala; inzalo yabo iyakuma phambi kwakho.”
Ps 103:1 Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami; konke okuphakathi kwami makubonge igama lakhe elingcwele.
Ps 103:2 Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami, ungakhohlwa imisebenzi yonke yakhe yomusa,
Ps 103:3 yena othethelela zonke izono zakho, owelapha zonke izifo zakho;
Ps 103:4 okhulula ukuphila kwakho ekubhujisweni, okuqhelisa ngomusa nangobubele;
Ps 103:5 osuthisa ukulangazela kwakho ngokuhle, ubusha bakho bubuyiswe njengokhozi.
Ps 103:6 UJehova ubenzela bonke abacindezelwayo ukulunga nokwahlulela.
Ps 103:7 Wamazisa uMose izindlela zakhe, nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli izenzo zakhe.
Ps 103:8 UJehova unobubele nesihawu; wephuza ukuthukuthela, kuvama umusa.
Ps 103:9 Akathethi njalonjalo; akagcini intukuthelo yakhe kuze kube phakade.
Ps 103:10 Akasiphathi njengokufanele izono zethu, akasivuzi njengokwamacala ethu.
Ps 103:11 Ngokuba njengokuphakama kwezulu phezu komhlaba unjalo umusa wakhe phezu kwabamesabayo.
Ps 103:12 Njengokuba impumalanga yahlukene nentshonalanga, udedisile kangaka kithi iziphambeko zethu.
Ps 103:13 Njengoyise ehawukela abantwana bakhe, kanjalo uJehova uyabahawukela abamesabayo.
Ps 103:14 Ngokuba uyakwazi ukubunjwa kwethu; uyakhumbula ukuthi siluthuli.
Ps 103:15 Izinsuku zomuntu zinjengotshani; uyakhahlela njengembali yasendle.
Ps 103:16 Ngokuba umoya uyadlula phezu kwayo, bese yinyamalala, nendawo yayo ingabe isayazi.
Ps 103:17 Kepha umusa kaJehova uphezu kwabamesabayo kwaphakade kuze kube phakade, nokulunga kwakhe kubantwana babantwana,
Ps 103:18 kubo abagcina isivumelwano sakhe bekhumbula iziyalezo zakhe ukuba bazenze.
Ps 103:19 UJehova umisile isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi ezulwini; nombuso wakhe ubusa phezu kwakho konke.
Ps 103:20 Bongani uJehova nina zingelosi zakhe, nina maqhawe anamandla enenza okwezwi lakhe nilalela ukukhuluma kwezwi lakhe.
Ps 103:21 Bongani uJehova nina mabandla onke akhe, nina zinceku zakhe enenza intando yakhe.
Ps 103:22 Bongani uJehova nina misebenzi yakhe yonke ezindaweni zonke zombuso wakhe. Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami.
Ps 104:1 Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami; Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, umkhulu, wembethe udumo nobukhosi;
Ps 104:2 ogqoka ukukhanya njengengubo, oweneka izulu njengendwangu;
Ps 104:3 obeka imishayo yezindlu zakhe emanzini, owenza amafu abe yinqola yakhe, ohamba ngamaphiko omoya;
Ps 104:4 owenza izingelosi zibe yimimoya, izikhonzi zakhe zibe yilangabi lomlilo.
Ps 104:5 Umisile umhlaba phezu kwezisekelo zawo, ukuze ungazanyazanyiswa kuze kube phakade naphakade.
Ps 104:6 Wawumboza ngolwandle njengengubo; amanzi ema phezu kwezintaba.
Ps 104:7 Ngokukhuza kwakho abaleka, ngezwi lokuduma kwakho ashesha asuka.
Ps 104:8 Enyuka izintaba, ehla izigodi, aze afika endaweni owawuyimisele wona.
Ps 104:9 Umisile umncele ukuba angaweqi, angabuyi ukusibekela umhlaba.
Ps 104:10 Uthumela imithombo ezigodini; yona igijima phakathi kwezintaba.
Ps 104:11 Iyaphuzisa izilwane zonke zasendle, izimbongolo zasendle zicime ukoma kwazo.
Ps 104:12 Izinyoni zezulu zakhile ngakuyo, zizwakalisa izwi lazo phakathi kwamagatsha.
Ps 104:13 Uphuzisa izintaba okuvela emakamelweni akhe; umhlaba uyaneliswa yisithelo semisebenzi yakho.
Ps 104:14 Uhlumisela izinkomo utshani nemifino yokusiza umuntu, ukuze aveze ukudla emhlabeni,
Ps 104:15 newayini elijabulisa inhliziyo yomuntu, namafutha okukhazimulisa ubuso, nesinkwa esiqinisa inhliziyo yomuntu.
Ps 104:16 Iyasutha imithi kaJehova, imisedari yaseLebanoni ayitshalileyo,
Ps 104:17 okwakhele kuyo izinyoni; ugolantethe unendlu yakhe kuyo imisayipuresi.
Ps 104:18 Izintaba eziphakemeyo ngezezimbuzi zasendle; amawa ayisiphephelo sezimbila.
Ps 104:19 Wenza inyanga ibe ngeyokwahlukanisa izikhathi; ilanga liyazi ukushona kwalo.
Ps 104:20 Wenza ubumnyama kube ngubusuku; phakathi kwabo kuphuma izilo zonke zasehlathini.
Ps 104:21 Izingonyama ezintsha zibhongela impango, zifuna ukudla kwazo kuNkulunkulu.
Ps 104:22 Liphuma ilanga, bese zibuyela phansi zilale emihumeni yazo.
Ps 104:23 Bese kuphuma umuntu, aye emsebenzini wakhe nasekukhandlekeni kwakhe kuze kuhlwe.
Ps 104:24 Jehova, yeka ubuningi bemisebenzi yakho; yonke uyenzile ngokuhlakanipha; umhlaba ugcwele izidalwa zakho.
Ps 104:25 Nantu ulwandle, lukhulu, lubanzi; lapho kukhona izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo ezingenakubalwa, izilwane ezincane nezinkulu.
Ps 104:26 Kuhamba khona imikhumbi, uLeviyathani lowo omenzile ukuba adlale kulo.
Ps 104:27 Zonke lezi zidalwa zibheka wena, ukuze uzinike ukudla kwazo ngesikhathi esiyiso.
Ps 104:28 Uyazinika ukudla, zibuthe; uvula isandla sakho, zisuthe ngokuhle.
Ps 104:29 Uyasitheza ubuso bakho, zethuke; uyasusa umphefumulo wazo, zife, zibuyele othulini lwazo.
Ps 104:30 Uyathumela umoya wakho, zidalwe; wenza bube busha ubuso bomhlaba.
Ps 104:31 Inkazimulo kaJehova mayime kuze kube phakade; uJehova kathokoze ngemisebenzi yakhe,
Ps 104:32 yena obheka umhlaba, besewuthuthumela, othinta izintaba, zithunqe.
Ps 104:33 Ngiyakumhubela uJehova kukho konke ukuphila kwami; ngiyakuhlabelela kuNkulunkulu wami ngisekhona.
Ps 104:34 Ukuzindla kwami makube mnandi kuye; mina mangithokoze kuJehova.
Ps 104:35 Izoni maziphele emhlabeni, kungabe kusaba khona ababi. Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami. Haleluya!
Ps 105:1 Bongani uJehova, nibize igama lakhe, nizazise phakathi kwabantu izenzo zakhe.
Ps 105:2 Hlabelelani kuye, nimhubele, nikhulume ngezimangaliso zakhe zonke.
Ps 105:3 Zibongeni egameni lakhe elingcwele; mazithokoze izinhliziyo zabamfunayo uJehova.
Ps 105:4 Funani uJehova namandla akhe, nifunisise ubuso bakhe njalo.
Ps 105:5 Khumbulani izimangaliso zakhe azenzileyo, nezibonakaliso zakhe, nezahlulelo zomlomo wakhe,
Ps 105:6 nina nzalo ka-Abrahama inceku yakhe, nina bantwana bakaJakobe, abakhethiweyo bakhe.
Ps 105:7 Yena unguJehova uNkulunkulu wethu; izahlulelo zakhe zisemhlabeni wonke.
Ps 105:8 Ukhumbulile isivumelwano sakhe kuze kube phakade, izwi ayala ngalo izizukulwane eziyinkulungwane,
Ps 105:9 avumelana kuso no-Abrahama, nesifungo sakhe ku-Isaka;
Ps 105:10 wasiqinisa kuJakobe, saba ngumthetho, naku-Israyeli, saba yisivumelwano esiphakade,
Ps 105:11 ethi: “Ngizakukunika izwe laseKhanani libe yisabelo sefa lakho,”
Ps 105:12 lapho babe yingcosana ngomumo, yebo, lapho babe yingcosana, futhi babe yizihambi kulo.
Ps 105:13 Bazulazula ezizweni ngezizwe, besuka kulo mbuso, beya kwabanye abantu.
Ps 105:14 Akavumelanga muntu ukubahlupha, wajezisa amakhosi ngenxa yabo,
Ps 105:15 ethi: “Ningathinti abagcotshiweyo bami, ningoni abaprofethi bami.”
Ps 105:16 Futhi wathuma indlala phezu kwezwe, walwaphula uzime lwesinkwa.
Ps 105:17 Wathuma indoda phambi kwabo: uJosefa wathengiswa abe yisigqila.
Ps 105:18 Balimaza izinyawo zakhe ngamaketanga, waboshwa ngensimbi.
Ps 105:19 Kwaze kwaba yisikhathi elagcwaliseka ngaso izwi lakhe, izwi likaJehova lamhola.
Ps 105:20 Inkosi yathuma yamthukulula, umbusi wabantu wamkhulula.
Ps 105:21 Wamenza umphathi wendlu yakhe nenduna yezinto zakhe zonke,
Ps 105:22 ukuze abophe izikhulu zakhe ngokuthanda kwakhe, afundise amalunga akhe ukuhlakanipha.
Ps 105:23 U-Israyeli wayesefika eGibithe, uJakobe wagogobala ezweni likaHamu.
Ps 105:24 Wandisa kakhulu abantu bakhe; wabenza babe namandla kunezitha zabo.
Ps 105:25 Wayiguqula inhliziyo yabo ukuba bazonde abantu bakhe, baphathe izinceku zakhe ngobuqili.
Ps 105:26 Wathuma uMose inceku yakhe, u-Aroni abemkhethile.
Ps 105:27 Benza phakathi kwabo izibonakaliso zakhe nezimangaliso ezweni likaHamu.
Ps 105:28 Wathuma ubumnyama, wenza kwaba mnyama, kepha baphambana namazwi akhe.
Ps 105:29 Waphendula amanzi abo aba yigazi; wabhubhisa izinhlanzi zabo.
Ps 105:30 Izwe labo lagcwala amasele nasezindlini zamakhosi abo.
Ps 105:31 Wakhuluma, kwavela izibawu nezinsensane eminceleni yabo yonke.
Ps 105:32 Wabanika isichotho saba yimvula yabo, amalangabi omlilo ezweni labo.
Ps 105:33 Washaya nemivini yabo nemikhiwane yabo; waphula imithi yasezweni labo.
Ps 105:34 Wakhuluma, kwavela isikhonyane nezinkumbi ezingenakubalwa.
Ps 105:35 Zona zadla imifino yonke yezwe lakubo, zaqothula nezithelo zomhlabathi wabo.
Ps 105:36 Washaya namazibulo onke ezweni lakubo, okokuqala kwamandla abo.
Ps 105:37 Wayesebakhipha benesiliva negolide, kungekho ontengezelayo emindenini yakubo.
Ps 105:38 IGibithe lajabula ekuphumeni kwabo, ngokuba ukwesaba kwabehlela.
Ps 105:39 Wendlala ifu lokubasibekela, nomlilo wokukhanyisa ebusuku.
Ps 105:40 Bacela, waletha izigwaca, wabasuthisa ngesinkwa sasezulwini.
Ps 105:41 Wavula idwala, kwampompoza amanzi, agobhoza emahlane njengomfula.
Ps 105:42 Ngokuba wakhumbula izwi lakhe elingcwele no-Abrahama inceku yakhe.
Ps 105:43 Wayesekhipha abantu bakhe ngokujabula, abakhethiweyo bakhe ngokuthokoza.
Ps 105:44 Wabapha amazwe abezizwe, badla isithelo somsebenzi wabantu
Ps 105:45 ukuba baqaphele izimiso zakhe, bagcine imithetho yakhe. Haleluya!
Ps 106:1 Haleluya! Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 106:2 Ngubani ongalanda izenzo zamandla zikaJehova, azwakalise lonke udumo lwakhe, na?
Ps 106:3 Babusisiwe abaqaphela ukwahlulela kwakhe, owenza ukulunga ngezikhathi zonke.
Ps 106:4 Ngikhumbule, Jehova, ngomusa onawo kubantu bakho, ungihambele ngensindiso yakho,
Ps 106:5 ukuze ngibone inhlanhla yabakhethiweyo bakho, ngithokoze ngentokozo yesizwe sakho, ngizibonge kanye nefa lakho.
Ps 106:6 Sonile kanye nawobaba; senzile okubi, sonakala.
Ps 106:7 Obaba abaqondanga izibonakaliso zakho eGibithe, abakhumbulanga ubuningi bezenzo zakho zomusa; bahlubuka ngaselwandle, uLwandle Olubomvu.
Ps 106:8 Nokho wabasindisa ngenxa yegama lakhe, ukuze abonakalise amandla akhe.
Ps 106:9 Wakhuza uLwandle Olubomvu, lwasha; wabaholela ekujuleni njengasehlane.
Ps 106:10 Wabasindisa esandleni sababazondayo, wabakhulula esandleni sesitha.
Ps 106:11 Amanzi asibekela izitha zabo; akwasala noyedwa kubo.
Ps 106:12 Khona bakholwa ngamazwi akhe, bahlabelela udumo lwakhe.
Ps 106:13 Bashesha bakhohlwa imisebenzi yakhe, abalindelanga isiluleko sakhe.
Ps 106:14 Bahaha nokuhaha ehlane, bamlinga uNkulunkulu kwahlongasibi.
Ps 106:15 Wabanika abakufisayo, kepha wathuma ukonda emiphefumulweni yabo.
Ps 106:16 Baba nomhawu ngoMose ekamu, nango-Aroni ongcwele kaJehova.
Ps 106:17 Umhlaba wavuleka, wamgwinya uDathani, wagqiba iviyo lika-Abiramu.
Ps 106:18 Kokheleka umlilo eviyweni labo; ilangabi lashisa laqeda ababi.
Ps 106:19 Benza ithole eHorebe; bakhuleka kuso isithombe esibunjiweyo.
Ps 106:20 Baguqula kanjalo inkazimulo yabo, yaba njengenkabi edla utshani.
Ps 106:21 Bakhohlwa uNkulunkulu umsindisi wabo owayezenzile izinto ezinkulu eGibithe,
Ps 106:22 izimangaliso ezweni likaHamu nokwesabekayo ngaseLwandle Olubomvu.
Ps 106:23 Wathi ubezakubabhubhisa, uma uMose okhethiweyo wakhe ebengemanga ebusweni bakhe ukubakhulumela, ukuze amyekise intukuthelo yakhe, funa ababhubhise.
Ps 106:24 Badelela izwe elihle, babengakholwa yizwi lakhe.
Ps 106:25 Bakhonona besematendeni abo; babengalaleli izwi likaJehova.
Ps 106:26 Ngalokho waphakamisa isandla sakhe ngakubo ukuba abawise ehlane,
Ps 106:27 awise nenzalo yabo phakathi kwabezizwe, abahlakaze emazweni.
Ps 106:28 Bazihlanganisa noBali Peyori, badla okuhlatshelwe abafileyo.
Ps 106:29 Bamcunula ngezenzo zabo; kwabhoboka isifo phakathi kwabo.
Ps 106:30 Wayesesuka uFinehasi, wahlulela; saphela isifo;
Ps 106:31 lokhu wakubalelwa njengokulunga ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane kuze kube phakade.
Ps 106:32 Bamcunula ngasemanzini aseMeriba; kwaba kubi kuMose ngenxa yabo.
Ps 106:33 Ngokuba baphambana noMoya wakhe; wakhuluma ngamawala ngomlomo wakhe.
Ps 106:34 Abababhubhisanga abantu uJehova abayaleza ngabo,
Ps 106:35 kepha bahlangana nabezizwe, bafunda imisebenzi yabo.
Ps 106:36 Bakhonza izithombe zabo, zaba lugibe kubo.
Ps 106:37 Amadodana namadodakazi abo bawahlabela amademoni.
Ps 106:38 Bachitha igazi elingenacala, igazi lamadodana abo namadodakazi abo abawahlabela izithombe zaseKhanani; izwe langcoliswa yigazi.
Ps 106:39 Bangcola kanjalo ngemisebenzi yabo, baphinga ezenzweni zabo.
Ps 106:40 Intukuthelo kaJehova yokheleka ngakubantu bakhe; ifa lakhe laba yisinengiso kuye.
Ps 106:41 Wabanikela esandleni sabezizwe; ababazondayo bababusa.
Ps 106:42 Izitha zabo zabacindezela, bathotshiswa phansi kwesandla sazo.
Ps 106:43 Kaningi wabakhulula; kepha bahlubuka ngecebo labo, bawiswa phansi ngobubi babo.
Ps 106:44 Nokho wanaka ukuhlupheka kwabo, esezwile ukukhala kwabo.
Ps 106:45 Wabakhumbulela isivumelwano sakhe; waphenduka ngokobuningi bomusa wakhe.
Ps 106:46 Wabatholisa ububele ebusweni babo bonke ababebathumbile.
Ps 106:47 Sisindise, Jehova Nkulunkulu wethu, sibuthe kwabezizwe ukuba sidumise igama lakho elingcwele, sethabe ekukudumiseni.
Ps 106:48 Makabongwe uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade. Abantu bonke mabathi: “Amen.” Haleluya!
Ps 107:1 Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 107:2 Mabasho njalo abahlengiweyo bakaJehova, abahlengileyo esandleni sesitha;
Ps 107:3 wababutha emazweni, empumalanga nasentshonalanga, enyakatho naselwandle.
Ps 107:4 Bazulazula ehlane ngendlela yakwahlongasibi, abafumananga umuzi wokuhlala.
Ps 107:5 Belambile, bomile, umphefumulo wabo waphela amandla phakathi kwabo.
Ps 107:6 Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo; wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo.
Ps 107:7 Wabahola ngendlela elungileyo ukuba baye emzini wokuhlala.
Ps 107:8 Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe nezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu.
Ps 107:9 Ngokuba usuthisa umphefumulo olangazelayo; umphefumulo olambayo uyawugcwalisa ngokuhle.
Ps 107:10 Babehlezi ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa beboshiwe osizini nasensimbini,
Ps 107:11 ngokuba babephambene namazwi kaNkulunkulu, babesidelele isiluleko soPhezukonke.
Ps 107:12 Wathobisa inhliziyo yabo ngokuhlupheka; bawa kungekho osizayo.
Ps 107:13 Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo, wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo.
Ps 107:14 Wabakhipha ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa, wagqabula izibopho zabo.
Ps 107:15 Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe nangezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu.
Ps 107:16 Ngokuba waphulile amasango ethusi, wanquma imigoqo yensimbi.
Ps 107:17 Babe yizithutha ngenxa yeziphambeko zabo; ngenxa yobubi babo babehlushwa.
Ps 107:18 Umphefumulo wabo wenyanya konke ukudla; basondela emasangweni okufa.
Ps 107:19 Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo; wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo.
Ps 107:20 Wathuma izwi lakhe, wabaphilisa, wabakhulula emathuneni abo.
Ps 107:21 Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe, nezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu.
Ps 107:22 Mabanikele iminikelo yokubonga, balande imisebenzi yakhe ngokwethaba.
Ps 107:23 Behlela elwandle ngemikhumbi, bathengiselana emanzini amakhulu.
Ps 107:24 Laba babona imisebenzi kaJehova nezimangaliso zakhe ekujuleni.
Ps 107:25 Ngokuba wakhuluma, wavusa umoya wesiphepho owaphakamisa amadlambi olwandle.
Ps 107:26 Bakhuphukela ezulwini, babuye behlela kuzo izintwa; umphefumulo wancibilika ngosizi.
Ps 107:27 Bayendayenda, bantengezela njengodakiweyo; konke ukuhlakanipha kwabo kwagwinywa.
Ps 107:28 Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo, wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo.
Ps 107:29 Wathulisa isiphepho, kwaze kwaba ngukuthula, kwathula namadlambi olwandle.
Ps 107:30 Base bethokoza, ngokuba kwaba ngukuthula; wabaholela ethekwini lokufisa kwabo.
Ps 107:31 Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe nangezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu.
Ps 107:32 Mabamphakamise ebandleni labantu, bamdumise emhlanganweni wamalunga.
Ps 107:33 Imifula wayiphendula ihlane, nemithombo yamanzi isigagadu,
Ps 107:34 nomhlabathi ovundileyo waba lugwadule lukasawoti ngenxa yobubi babahlezi khona.
Ps 107:35 Ihlane waliphendula amachibi amanzi, nomhlabathi owomileyo imithombo yamanzi.
Ps 107:36 Wabahlalisa khona abalambileyo, bakha khona umuzi wokuhlala.
Ps 107:37 Balima amasimu, batshala isivini, kwabathelela izithelo.
Ps 107:38 Wababusisa, banda kakhulu, akanciphisa izinkomo zabo.
Ps 107:39 Babuye bancipha, bathotshiswa ngokucindezelwa, nangobubi, nangosizi.
Ps 107:40 Wathela ukudelelwa phezu kwezikhulu, wabazulazulisa ehlane elingenandlela.
Ps 107:41 Nokho waphakamisa ompofu, wamkhipha osizini, enza imindeni njengomhlambi.
Ps 107:42 Olungileyo uyakukubona, ajabule; ububi bonke bumelwe ukuvala umlomo.
Ps 107:43 Ohlakaniphileyo makaqaphele lokhu; bayakuqonda umusa kaJehova.
Ps 108:1 Igama. Ihubo likaDavide. Inhliziyo yami iduduzekile, Nkulunkulu; ngizakuhlabelela, ngihube, ngisho nomphefumulo wami.
Ps 108:2 Vukani, lugubhu nehabhu! Ngizakuvusa ukusa.
Ps 108:3 Ngizakukubonga phakathi kwabantu, Jehova, ngikudumise phakathi kwezizwe.
Ps 108:4 Ngokuba umusa wakho mkhulu phezu kwezulu, nokuthembeka kwakho kuze kube semafwini.
Ps 108:5 Phakama, Nkulunkulu, phezu kwezulu, inkazimulo yakho ibe phezu komhlaba wonke.
Ps 108:6 Ukuze abathandekayo bakho bakhululwe, sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, ungizwele.
Ps 108:7 UNkulunkulu ukhulumile ebungcweleni bakhe, wathi: “Ngiyakwethaba; ngiyakulidabula iShekemi, ngisilinganise isiGodi saseSukoti.
Ps 108:8 Ngowami uGileyadi, ngowami uManase; u-Efrayimi uyisivikelo sekhanda lami, uJuda uyintonga yami yokubusa.
Ps 108:9 UMowabi uyisitsha sami sokuhlambela; phezu kuka-Edomi ngiphonsa isicathulo sami; phezu kweFilistiya ngiyethaba.”
Ps 108:10 Ngubani oyakungiyisa emzini oyinqaba na? Ngubani oyakungiholela kwa-Edomi na?
Ps 108:11 Akusiwena Nkulunkulu osilahlileyo na? Nkulunkulu, awusaphumi nezimpi zethu.
Ps 108:12 Siphe ukuba sisizakale ekuhluphekeni, ngokuba ukusiza komuntu kuyize.
Ps 108:13 NgoNkulunkulu siyakwenza izenzo zamandla; yena uyakunyathela phansi izitha zethu.
Ps 109:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Ungathuli, Nkulunkulu wokubonga kwami.
Ps 109:2 Ngokuba umlomo womubi nomlomo wenkohliso bawuvulile ngakimi; bakhulumile ngami ngolimi lwamanga.
Ps 109:3 Bangizungeza ngamazwi enzondo; balwa nami, kungekho sizathu.
Ps 109:4 Ngenxa yothando lwami bayangizonda, mina ngisemkhulekweni njalo.
Ps 109:5 Bangibuyisele okubi ngokuhle, nenzondo ngothando lwami.
Ps 109:6 Beka omubi phezu kwakhe; makume omelene naye ngasesandleni sakhe sokunene.
Ps 109:7 Ekwahlulelweni kwakhe makalahlwe yicala; umkhuleko wakhe mawube yisono.
Ps 109:8 Izinsuku zakhe mazibe yingcosana, omunye athathe isikhundla sakhe.
Ps 109:9 Abantwana bakhe mababe yizintandane, umkakhe abe ngumfelokazi.
Ps 109:10 Abantwana bakhe mababe yizintandane, baphanze, bacele bekude nezindawo zabo ezichithekileyo.
Ps 109:11 Umtsheleki makabambe konke anakho, abafo baphange izithelo zomsebenzi wakhe.
Ps 109:12 Makungabikho omenzela umusa, futhi kungabikho ohawukela izintandane zakhe.
Ps 109:13 Inzalo yakhe mayinqunywe; igama layo malesulwe esizukulwaneni esilandelayo.
Ps 109:14 Ububi bawoyise mabukhumbuleke kuJehova; masingesulwa isono sikanina.
Ps 109:15 Mabeme phambi kukaJehova njalo, kunqunywe isikhumbuzo sabo emhlabeni.
Ps 109:16 Ngokuba wayengakhumbuli ukwenza umusa, kepha wazingela umuntu odingayo nompofu nodabukile ngenhliziyo ukuba ababulale.
Ps 109:17 Wathanda ukuthuka, kweza phezu kwakhe; wayengathokozi ngesibusiso, sahlala kude naye.
Ps 109:18 Wagqoka ukuthuka njengesambatho, kwangena ezibilinini zakhe njengamanzi, nasemathanjeni akhe njengamafutha.
Ps 109:19 Makube kuye njengesambatho asembathayo nebhande azibopha ngalo isikhathi sonke.
Ps 109:20 Lokhu makube ngumvuzo wezitha, uvela kuJehova, nowabakhuluma kabi ngomphefumulo wami.
Ps 109:21 Kepha wena Jehova, Nkosi yami, ngiphathe ngokwegama lakho; njengokuba umusa wakho ulungile, ngisindise.
Ps 109:22 Ngokuba ngingodingayo nompofu; inhliziyo yami ilimele phakathi kwami.
Ps 109:23 Njengethunzi eselilide ngiyamuka; njengesikhonyane ngiyapheshulwa.
Ps 109:24 Amadolo ami abuthakathaka ngokuzila ukudla, nomzimba wami uswele ukukhuluphala.
Ps 109:25 Futhi ngaba yisihlamba kubona; bengibheka banikina amakhanda abo.
Ps 109:26 Ngisize, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ngisindise ngokomusa wakho,
Ps 109:27 ukuze bazi ukuthi lokhu kuyisandla sakho; wena Jehova ukwenzile.
Ps 109:28 Mabathuke bona, wena ubusise; nxa bevuka, mabajabhe; kepha inceku yakho mayithokoze.
Ps 109:29 Abamelene nami mabembeswe amahloni, bagqoke ukujabha njengesambatho.
Ps 109:30 Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ngomlomo wami, ngimdumise esixukwini.
Ps 109:31 Ngokuba uyakuma ngakwesokunene sompofu ukumsindisa kulabo abalahla umphefumulo wakhe.
Ps 110:1 ElikaDavide. Ihubo. UJehova wathi eNkosini yami: “Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, ngize ngenze izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo sezinyawo zakho.”
Ps 110:2 Intonga yamandla akho uJehova uyakuyelula eseSiyoni; busa wena phakathi kwezitha zakho.
Ps 110:3 Abantu bakho bayazinikela ngenjabulo ngosuku lwempi yakho; ebuhleni bobungcwele abasha bakho bavela njengamazolo esizalweni sokusa.
Ps 110:4 UJehova ufungile engayikuguquka, wathi: “Wena ungumpristi kuze kube phakade ngendlela kaMelkisedeki.”
Ps 110:5 INkosi ingakwesokunene sakho; iyakuchoboza amakhosi ngosuku lwentukuthelo yayo.
Ps 110:6 Iyakwahlulela phakathi kwabezizwe, kugcwale izidumbu, ichoboze amakhanda ezizweni eziningi.
Ps 110:7 Iyakuphuza emfuleni ngasendleleni; ngalokho iyakuphakamisa ikhanda.
Ps 111:1 Haleluya! Ngiyakubonga uJehova ngenhliziyo yami yonke emhlanganweni nasebandleni labaqotho.
Ps 111:2 Mikhulu imisebenzi kaJehova, iphenywa yibo bonke abathokoza ngayo.
Ps 111:3 Umsebenzi wakhe ungubukhosi nodumo, nokulunga kwakhe kumi phakade.
Ps 111:4 Wenzele izimangaliso zakhe isikhumbuzo; uJehova unomusa nobubele.
Ps 111:5 Abamesabayo ubapha ukudla; ukhumbula njalo isivumelwano sakhe.
Ps 111:6 Ubonisile abantu bakhe amandla emisebenzi yakhe ngokubapha ifa labezizwe.
Ps 111:7 Imisebenzi yezandla zakhe iyiqiniso nokwahlulela; imithetho yonke yakhe iqinile;
Ps 111:8 imisiwe ngeqiniso nangobuqotho.
Ps 111:9 Wabathumela abantu bakhe ukukhululwa; uyalezile isivumelwano sakhe kuze kube phakade; lingcwele, liyesabeka igama lakhe.
Ps 111:10 Ukumesaba uJehova kungukuqala kokuhlakanipha; banengqondo enhle bonke abakwenzayo. Udumo lwakhe lumi kuze kube phakade.
Ps 112:1 Haleluya! Ubusisiwe umuntu omesabayo uJehova, othokoza kakhulu ngemithetho yakhe.
Ps 112:2 Inzalo yakhe iyakuba namandla emhlabeni; isizukulwane sabaqotho siyakubusiswa.
Ps 112:3 Ingcebo nemfuyo kusendlini yakhe; ukulunga kwakhe kumi phakade.
Ps 112:4 Kuyabaphumela abalungileyo ukukhanya ebumnyameni: umusa, nobubele, nokulunga.
Ps 112:5 Umuntu omuhle nguye onomusa, otshelekayo, esekela izindaba zakhe ngokulunga.
Ps 112:6 Ngokuba akayikugudluka kuze kube phakade; olungileyo uyakukhunjulwa kuze kube phakade.
Ps 112:7 Akesabi imibiko emibi; inhliziyo yakhe iqinile, iyethemba uJehova.
Ps 112:8 Imisekile inhliziyo yakhe, ayesabi, aze azibuke izitha zakhe ziphansi.
Ps 112:9 Uyaphana, uyabanika abampofu; ukulunga kwakhe kumi kuze kube phakade; uphondo lwakhe luyakuphakama ngodumo.
Ps 112:10 Omubi uyakukubona, acunuke, agedle amazinyo akhe, abesephela; isifiso sababi siyakubhubha.

Ps 113:2 Malibongwe igama likaJehova kusukela kulesi sikhathi kuze kube phakade.

Ps 114:1 Kwathi ukuba u-Israyeli aphume eGibithe, indlu kaJakobe kubantu bolunye ulimi,
Ps 114:2 khona uJuda waba yindlu yakhe engcwele, u-Israyeli waba ngumbuso wakhe.
Ps 114:3 Ulwandle lwakubona, lwabaleka, iJordani labuyiselwa emuva.
Ps 114:4 Izintaba zatshekula njengezinqama, amagquma njengamawundlu.
Ps 114:5 Unani wena lulwandle ukuba ubaleke, nawe Jordani ukuba ubuyiselwe emuva,
Ps 114:6 nani zintaba ukuba nitshekule njengezinqama, nani magquma eninjengamawundlu, na?

Ps 114:8 yena ophendula idwala libe yichibi lamanzi, insengetsha ibe ngumthombo wamanzi.
Ps 115:1 Ungasiphi thina, Jehova, ungasiphi thina, kepha uliphe igama lakho inkazimulo ngenxa yomusa wakho nangenxa yeqiniso lakho.
Ps 115:2 Abezizwe bayakusho ngani ukuthi: “Uphi manje uNkulunkulu wabo na?”
Ps 115:3 Kepha uNkulunkulu wethu usezulwini; wenza konke akuthandayo.
Ps 115:4 Izithombe zabo ziyisiliva negolide, umsebenzi wezandla zomuntu.
Ps 115:5 Umlomo zinawo, kepha azikhulumi; amehlo zinawo, kepha aziboni.
Ps 115:6 Izindlebe zinazo, kepha azizwa; zinamakhala, kepha azihogeli.
Ps 115:7 Zinezandla, kepha aziphathi; zinezinyawo, kepha azihambi; azikhulumi ngomphimbo wazo.
Ps 115:8 Abazenzayo bayafana nazo, bonke abazethembayo.
Ps 115:9 Israyeli, themba kuJehova; yena ulusizo lwabo nesihlangu sabo.
Ps 115:10 O wena ndlu ka-Aroni, themba kuJehova; yena ulusizo lwabo nesihlangu sabo.
Ps 115:11 Nina enimesabayo uJehova thembani kuJehova; yena ulusizo lwabo nesihlangu sabo.
Ps 115:12 UJehova usikhumbulile; uyakubusisa, abusise indlu ka-Israyeli, abusise indlu ka-Aroni.
Ps 115:13 Uyakubusisa abamesabayo uJehova, abancane nabakhulu.
Ps 115:14 UJehova uyakunandisa, nina nabantwana benu.
Ps 115:15 Manibe ngababusisiweyo bakaJehova owenzile izulu nomhlaba.
Ps 115:16 Izulu liyizulu likaJehova, kepha umhlaba wawunika abantwana babantu.
Ps 115:17 Abafileyo abamdumnisi uJehova, qha, noyedwa kwabehlelayo ekuthuleni.
Ps 115:18 Kepha thina siyakumbonga uJehova kusukela kulesi sikhathi kuze kube phakade. Haleluya!
Ps 116:1 Ngiyamthanda uJehova, ngokuba uyezwa izwi lokukhuleka kwami.
Ps 116:2 Ngokuba ubekile indlebe kimi ngiyakukhuleka kuye zonke izinsuku zami.
Ps 116:3 Izintambo zokufa zangizungeza, nobuhlungu bendawo yabafileyo bangibamba; ngafumana ukuhlupheka nosizi.
Ps 116:4 Kepha ngabiza igama likaJehova, ngathi: “Ngiyakuncenga, Jehova, khulula umphefumulo wami.”
Ps 116:5 Unomusa uJehova, ulungile; uNkulunkulu wethu unobubele.
Ps 116:6 UJehova uyalondoloza ongenabuqili; ngithotshisiwe phansi wangisindisa.
Ps 116:7 Buyela ekuphumuleni kwakho, mphefumulo wami, ngokuba uJehova ukuphathe ngomusa.
Ps 116:8 Yebo, ukhululile umphefumulo wami ekufeni, amehlo ami ezinyembezini, nezinyawo zami ekuweni.
Ps 116:9 Ngiyakuhamba ebusweni bukaJehova ezweni labaphilayo.
Ps 116:10 Ngiyakholwa, ngalokho ngiyakhuluma; ngahlushwa kakhulu.
Ps 116:11 Ngathi osizini lwami: “Bonke abantu banamanga.”
Ps 116:12 Ngiyakubuyiselani kuJehova ngazo zonke izenzo zakhe ezinhle kimina na?
Ps 116:13 Ngiyakuthatha indebe yensindiso, ngibize igama likaJehova.
Ps 116:14 Izithembiso zami kuJehova ngiyakuzigcwalisa, yebo, nasebusweni babantu bakhe bonke.
Ps 116:15 Kuyigugu emehlweni kaJehova ukufa kwabangcwele bakhe.
Ps 116:16 Ngiyinceku yakho impela, Jehova; ngiyinceku yakho, indodana yencekukazi yakho; uthukululile izintambo zami.
Ps 116:17 Ngiyakunikela kuwe umnikelo wokubonga, ngibize igama likaJehova.
Ps 116:18 Izithembiso zami kuJehova ngiyakuzigcwalisa yebo, nasebusweni babantu bakhe bonke,
Ps 116:19 emagcekeni endlu kaJehova, phakathi kwakho, Jerusalema. Haleluya!
Ps 117:1 Dumisani uJehova nina bezizwe zonke, nimbabaze nina bantu bonke.
Ps 117:2 Ngokuba umusa wakhe mkhulu kithina; iqiniso likaJehova limi phakade. Haleluya!
Ps 118:1 Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 118:2 Makathi u-Israyeli: “Yebo, umusa wakhe umi phakade.”
Ps 118:3 Mayithi indlu ka-Aroni: “Yebo, umusa wakhe umi phakade.”
Ps 118:4 Mabathi abamesabayo uJehova: “Yebo, umusa wakhe umi phakade.”
Ps 118:5 Engcingweni yami ngakhuleka kuJehova, uJehova wangiphendula endaweni ebanzi.
Ps 118:6 UJehova ungakimi, angiyikwesaba; umuntu angangenzani na?
Ps 118:7 UJehova ungakimi ekanye nabangisizayo; ngalokho ngiyakubabuka bephansi abangizondayo.
Ps 118:8 Kuhle ukuphephela kuJehova kunokwethemba umuntu.
Ps 118:9 Kuhle ukuphephela kuJehova kunokwethemba izikhulu.
Ps 118:10 Bonke abezizwe bayangizungeza; egameni likaJehova ngiyakubachitha.
Ps 118:11 Bayangikaka, yebo, bayangizungeza; egameni likaJehova ngiyakubachitha.
Ps 118:12 Bayangibunganyela njengezinyosi, bacimeka njengomlilo wameva; egameni likaJehova ngiyakubachitha.
Ps 118:13 Bayangihlohloloza ukuba ngiwe, kepha uJehova uyangisiza.
Ps 118:14 UJehova ungamandla ami nesihlabelelo sami, waba yinsindiso yami.
Ps 118:15 Izwi lokwethaba nelokusindiswa lisezindlini zabalungileyo; esokunene sikaJehova senza okwamandla.
Ps 118:16 Esokunene sikaJehova siphakeme, esokunene sikaJehova sisebenza ngamandla.
Ps 118:17 Angiyikufa, kepha ngiyakuphila, ngishumayele imisebenzi kaJehova.
Ps 118:18 UJehova wangilaya nokungilaya, kodwa akanginikelanga ekufeni.
Ps 118:19 Ngivuleleni amasango okulunga, ngingene ngawo, ngimdumise uJehova.
Ps 118:20 Yileli isango likaJehova; olungileyo uyakungena ngalo.
Ps 118:21 Ngiyakukudumisa, ngokuba ungizwile, waba yinsindiso yami.
Ps 118:22 Itshe abalinqabayo abakhi selaba yinhloko yegumbi.
Ps 118:23 Lona lavela kuJehova; liyisimangaliso emehlweni ethu.
Ps 118:24 Yilolu usuku alwenzileyo uJehova; siyakwethaba, sithokoze ngalo.
Ps 118:25 Sindisa, Jehova! ngiyakuncenga; hlahlamelisa, Jehova! ngiyakucela.
Ps 118:26 Makabusiswe ozayo egameni likaJehova; siyanibusisa sisendlini kaJehova.
Ps 118:27 UJehova unguNkulunkulu, usikhanyisele; hlobisani umkhosi ngamahlamvu kuze kube sezimpondweni ze-altare.
Ps 118:28 Wena unguNkulunkulu wami, ngiyakukubonga; Nkulunkulu wami, ngiyakukuphakamisa.
Ps 118:29 Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 119:1 Babusisiwe abaqotho endleleni, abahamba ngemithetho kaJehova.
Ps 119:2 Babusisiwe abagcina ubufakazi bakhe, abamfuna ngenhliziyo yonke,
Ps 119:3 abangenzi ukungalungi, kepha behamba ezindleleni zakhe;
Ps 119:4 wena usiyalezile ukuba sizigcine ngokwempela.
Ps 119:5 Sengathi zingaqondiswa izindlela zami ukuba ngigcine izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:6 Khona angiyikujabha; ngiyakuhlonipha iziyalezo zonke zakho.
Ps 119:7 Ngiyakukubonga ngobuqotho benhliziyo, lapho ngifunda izahlulelo zakho ezilungileyo.
Ps 119:8 Izimiso zakho ngiyakuzigcina; ungangishiyi nakanci.
Ps 119:9 Insizwa iyakuyihlanza kanjani indlela yayo na? Ngokuqaphela okwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:10 Ngikufunile ngenhliziyo yami yonke; mangingaphambuki emiyalweni yakho.
Ps 119:11 Enhliziyweni yami ngiyalonda izwi lakho, ukuze ngingoni kuwe.
Ps 119:12 Mawubongwe wena Jehova, ungifundise izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:13 Ngomlomo wami ngimemezele zonke izahlulelo zomlomo wakho.
Ps 119:14 Ngithokoza ngendlela yobufakazi bakho njengemfuyo.
Ps 119:15 Ngiyakuzindla ngeziyalezo zakho, ngihloniphe izindlela zakho.
Ps 119:16 Ngiyakuthokoza ngezimiso zakho; angiyikukhohlwa izwi lakho.
Ps 119:17 Yenzele okuhle inceku yakho ukuba ngiphile, ngigcine izwi lakho.
Ps 119:18 Vula amehlo ami ukuba ngibone izimangaliso zasemthethweni wakho.
Ps 119:19 Ngingumfokazi emhlabeni; ungangifihleli imiyalo yakho.
Ps 119:20 Umphefumulo wami waphukile ngokulangazelela njalo izahlulelo zakho.
Ps 119:21 Uyakhuza abazidlayo, abaqalekisiweyo, abaduka emiyalweni yakho.
Ps 119:22 Susa kimi isihlamba nokudelelwa, ngokuba ngiyaqaphela ubufakazi bakho.
Ps 119:23 Yebo, izikhulu zihlezi zikhuluma ngami; inceku yakho iyazindla ngezimiso zakho.
Ps 119:24 Ubufakazi bakho buyintokozo yami, bungumluleki wami.
Ps 119:25 Umphefumulo wami unamathela othulini; ngiphilise ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:26 Ngimemezele izindlela zami, wena wangizwa; ngifundise izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:27 Ngiqondise indlela yeziyalezo zakho ukuba ngikhulume ngezimangaliso zakho.
Ps 119:28 Umphefumulo wami uyakhala ngosizi; ngivuse ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:29 Susa kimi indlela yamanga, ungiphe ngomusa umthetho wakho.
Ps 119:30 Ngikhethile indlela yeqiniso; izahlulelo zakho ngizibekile phambi kwami.
Ps 119:31 Ngibambelele ebufakazini bakho; ungangijabhisi, Jehova.
Ps 119:32 Ngiyakugijima ngendlela yemiyalo yakho, ngokuba uyakwandisa inhliziyo yami.
Ps 119:33 Ngitshengise, Jehova, indlela yezimiso zakho; ngiyakuyigcina kuze kube sekupheleni.
Ps 119:34 Ngiphe ingqondo, ukuze ngiqaphele umthetho wakho, ngiwugcine ngenhliziyo yami yonke.
Ps 119:35 Ngihambise endleleni yemiyalo yakho, ngokuba ngiyathokoza ngayo.
Ps 119:36 Thobisela inhliziyo yami ebufakazini bakho, kungabi sekuhaheni.
Ps 119:37 Phendula amehlo ami, angaboni okuyize, ungiphilise endleleni yakho.
Ps 119:38 Yigcwalise encekwini yakho inkulumo yakho eyenza ukuba wesatshwe.
Ps 119:39 Dlulisa isihlamba engisesabayo, ngokuba izahlulelo zakho zinhle.
Ps 119:40 Bheka, ngiyalangazelela iziyalezo zakho; ngiphilise ngokulunga kwakho.
Ps 119:41 Mawuze kimi umusa wakho, Jehova, insindiso yakho ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:42 Khona ngiyakumphendula ongithukayo, ngokuba ngiyalethemba izwi lakho.
Ps 119:43 Ungalisusi emlonyeni wami ngokupheleleyo izwi leqiniso, ngokuba ngiyethemba izahlulelo zakho.
Ps 119:44 Khona ngiyakuwugcina njalo umthetho wakho, yebo, kuze kube phakade.
Ps 119:45 Ngiyakuhamba endaweni ebanzi, ngokuba iziyalezo zakho ngiyazifuna.
Ps 119:46 Ngiyakukhuluma ngobufakazi bakho phambi kwamakhosi, ngingajabhi.
Ps 119:47 Ngiyakuthokoza ngemiyalo yakho engiyithandileyo.
Ps 119:48 Ngiyakuphakamisela izandla zami kuyo imiyalo yakho engiyithandileyo, ngizindle ngezimiso zakho.
Ps 119:49 Khumbula izwi encekwini yakho owangipha ithemba ngalo.
Ps 119:50 Lokhu kuyinduduzo ekuhluphekeni kwami, ngokuba izwi lakho lingiphilisile.
Ps 119:51 Abazidlayo bangihleka usulu kakhulu, kepha emthethweni wakho angichezuki.
Ps 119:52 Ngiyakhumbula izahlulelo zakho zasendulo, Jehova; ngiyaduduzeka.
Ps 119:53 Ukuvutha kolaka kungibambile ngenxa yababi abashiya umthetho wakho.
Ps 119:54 Zaba yizihlabelelo kimina izimiso zakho endlini yokugogobala kwami.
Ps 119:55 Ebusuku ngikhumbula igama lakho, Jehova, ngigcina umthetho wakho.
Ps 119:56 Lokhu kwaba ngokwami, ngokuba ngagcina iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:57 UJehova uyisabelo sami; ngithi ngiyakugcina amazwi akho.
Ps 119:58 Ngincenga ubuso bakho ngenhliziyo yami yonke; yiba nomusa kimi ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:59 Ngizindla ngezindlela zami, ngiqondisa izinyawo zami ebufakazini bakho.
Ps 119:60 Ngiyashesha, angilibali ukugcina imiyalo yakho.
Ps 119:61 Izintambo zababi ziyangizungeza, kepha angikhohlwa umthetho wakho.
Ps 119:62 Phakathi kobusuku ngiyakuvuka ngikubonge ngenxa yezahlulelo zakho ezilungileyo.
Ps 119:63 Ngingumngane wabo bonke abakwesabayo, abagcina iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:64 Umhlaba ugcwele umusa wakho, Jehova; ngifundise izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:65 Uyenzele inceku yakho okuhle, Jehova, ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:66 Ngifundise ukuqonda okuhle nokwazi, ngokuba ngikholwa yimiyalo yakho.
Ps 119:67 Ngingakahlupheki ngaduka, kepha manje sengiyaligcina izwi lakho.
Ps 119:68 Umuhle wena, futhi wenza okuhle; ngifundise izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:69 Abazidlayo baqamba amanga ngami; ngenhliziyo yonke yami ngiyakugcina iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:70 Inhliziyo yabo injengamafutha ingezwa lutho; kepha mina ngithokoza ngomthetho wakho.
Ps 119:71 Kwangilungela ukuba ngihlushwe, ukuze ngifunde izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:72 Umthetho womlomo wakho muhle kunezinkulungwane zegolide nezesiliva.
Ps 119:73 Izandla zakho zingenzile, zangibumba; ngiphe ingqondo, ukuze ngifunde imiyalo yakho.
Ps 119:74 Abakwesabayo bayakujabula lapho bengibona, ngokuba ngethemba izwi lakho.
Ps 119:75 Ngiyazi ukuthi izahlulelo zakho zilungile nokuthi wangilaya ngokuthembeka.
Ps 119:76 Umusa wakho mawube yinduduzo encekwini yakho ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:77 Ububele bakho mabuze kimi, ukuze ngiphile, ngokuba umthetho wakho uyintokozo yami.
Ps 119:78 Abazidlayo mabajabhe, ngokuba bangicindezele, kungekho sizathu; kepha mina ngiyakuzindla ngeziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:79 Mabaphendukele kimi abakwesabayo nabaziyo ubufakazi bakho.
Ps 119:80 Inhliziyo yami mayiphelele ezimisweni zakho, ukuze ngingajabhi.
Ps 119:81 Umphefumulo wami ulangazelela insindiso yakho; ngiyalethemba izwi lakho.
Ps 119:82 Amehlo ami alangazelela izwi lakho, ngithi: “Uyakungiduduza nini na?”
Ps 119:83 Nginjengemvaba emsini; izimiso zakho angizikhohlwa.
Ps 119:84 Zingaki izinsuku zenceku yakho? Uzakubahlulela nini abangizingelayo na?
Ps 119:85 Abazidlayo bangimbela imigodi, bona abaphambene nomthetho wakho.
Ps 119:86 Yonke imiyalo yakho ithembekile; bayangizingela ngamanga; ngisize.
Ps 119:87 Bacishe bangiqeda emhlabeni, kepha angishiyanga iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:88 Ngiphilise ngokomusa wakho, ukuze ngigcine ubufakazi bomlomo wakho.
Ps 119:89 Kuze kube phakade, Jehova, izwi lakho limi liqinile ezulwini.
Ps 119:90 Ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane ukuthembeka kwakho kukhona; wamisa umhlaba; usemi.
Ps 119:91 Ngokwezahlulelo zakho kusekhona nanamuhla, ngokuba konke kuyizinceku zakho.
Ps 119:92 Uma umthetho wakho ubungesiyo intokozo yami, ngabe ngibhubhele ekuhluphekeni kwami.
Ps 119:93 Angiyikukhohlwa kuze kube phakade iziyalezo zakho, ngokuba ungiphilisile ngazo.
Ps 119:94 Ngingowakho, ngisindise, ngokuba ngiyafuna iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:95 Ababi bahlalele ukungibhubhisa, kepha ngiyaqaphela ubufakazi bakho.
Ps 119:96 Ngibonile ukugcina kokuphelelyo konke, kepha umthetho wakho ubanzi kakhulu.
Ps 119:97 Ngiyawuthanda umthetho wakho kangaka. Usuku lonke ngizindla ngawo.
Ps 119:98 Ngemiyalo yakho ngiyahlakanipha kunezitha zami, ngokuba inami kuze kube phakade.
Ps 119:99 Ngiyaqonda kunabo bonke abangifundisayo, ngokuba ngizindla ngobufakazi bakho.
Ps 119:100 Nginokuqonda kunabadala, ngokuba ngigcina iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:101 Ngiyazinqanda izinyawo zami ezindleleni zonke zokubi, ukuze ngigcine izwi lakho.
Ps 119:102 Ezahlulelweni zakho angichezuki, ngokuba wena uyangifundisa.
Ps 119:103 Amnandi kangaka amazwi akho ekunambitheni kwami; adlula izinyosi emlonyeni wami.
Ps 119:104 Ngeziyalezo zakho ngiyathola ukuqonda; ngalokho ngiyazonda zonke izindlela zamanga.
Ps 119:105 Izwi lakho liyisibani ezinyaweni zami nokukhanya endleleni yami.
Ps 119:106 Ngifungile; ukulonda izahlulelo zakho ezilungileyo ngakugcina.
Ps 119:107 Ngiyahlupheka kakhulu; Jehova, ngiphilise ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:108 Jehova, yamukela iminikelo yesihle yomlomo wami, ungifundise izahlulelo zakho:
Ps 119:109 Umphefumulo wami usesandleni sami njalo; nokho umthetho wakho angiwukhohlwa.
Ps 119:110 Ababi bangibekele ugibe, kepha angiduki eziyalezweni zakho.
Ps 119:111 Ngidlile ifa lobufakazi bakho kuze kube phakade, ngokuba kuyintokozo yenhliziyo yami.
Ps 119:112 Ngithobisile inhliziyo yami ukwenza izimiso zakho njalo, yebo, kuze kube sekupheleni.
Ps 119:113 Ngiyabazonda abanhliziyo mbili, kepha umthetho wakho ngiyawuthanda.
Ps 119:114 Wena uyisiphephelo sami nesihlangu sami; ngiyethemba izwi lakho.
Ps 119:115 Sukani kimi nina enenza okubi, ngokuba ngiyakugcina imiyalo kaNkulunkulu wami.
Ps 119:116 Ngiphase ngokwezwi lakho, ukuze ngiphile, ngingajabhi ngethemba lami.
Ps 119:117 Ngisekele, ngize ngisindiswe, ngibheke njalo izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:118 Uyabadelela bonke abaduka ezimisweni zakho, ngokuba ubuqili babo buyize.
Ps 119:119 Uyabalahla bonke ababi bomhlaba njengendiva; ngalokho ngiyathanda ubufakazi bakho.
Ps 119:120 Inyama yami iyathuthumela ngovalo ngawe, ngiyesaba izahlulelo zakho.
Ps 119:121 Ngiyenza ukwahlulela nokulunga; unganginikeli kubo abahluphi bami.
Ps 119:122 Mela inceku yakho kube kuhle; abazidlayo mabangangicindezeli.
Ps 119:123 Amehlo ami ayalangazelela insindiso yakho nezwi lokulunga kwakho.
Ps 119:124 Yenza encekwini yakho ngokomusa wakho, ungifundise izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:125 Ngiyinceku yakho; ngiphe ingqondo ukuba ngazi ubufakazi bakho.
Ps 119:126 Kuyisikhathi sikaJehova sokusebenza, ngokuba bawenz' ize umthetho wakho.
Ps 119:127 Ngalokho ngiyathanda imiyalo yakho kunegolide, yebo, kunegolide elicwengekileyo.
Ps 119:128 Ngalokho ngiyavuma ukuthi imiyalo yakho yonke ilungile; ngiyazonda zonke izindlela zamanga.
Ps 119:129 Ubufakazi bakho buyisimangaliso; ngalokho umphefumulo wami uyabugcina.
Ps 119:130 Ukwambulwa kwamazwi akho kuyakhanyisa, yebo, kuyabaqondisa abangenalwazi.
Ps 119:131 Ngivula umlomo wami, ngikhefuzela, ngokuba ngiyalangazelela imiyalo yakho.
Ps 119:132 Bheka kimi, ube nomusa kimi njengokufanele abathanda igama lakho.
Ps 119:133 Qinisa izinyathelo zami ezwini lakho; makungangibusi nobubodwa ububi.
Ps 119:134 Ngihlenge ekuhlupheni kwabantu, ukuze ngigcine iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:135 Yikhanyisele inceku yakho ubuso bakho, ngifundise izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:136 Imifula yamanzi iyehlela emehlweni ami, ngokuba abagcini umthetho wakho.
Ps 119:137 Wena Jehova ulungile; izahlulelo zakho ziqotho.
Ps 119:138 Uyalezile ubufakazi bakho ngokulunga ngokuthembeka okukhulu.
Ps 119:139 Ukushisekela kwami kungidlile, ngokuba izitha zami zikhohliwe amazwi akho.
Ps 119:140 Izwi lakho licwebile kakhulu; ngalokho inceku yakho iyalithanda.
Ps 119:141 Ngimncane, ngidelelekile; iziyalezo zakho angizikhohlwa.
Ps 119:142 Ukulunga kwakho kungukulunga okuphakade; umthetho wakho uyiqiniso.
Ps 119:143 Ukuhlupheka nosizi kungehlele; imiyalo yakho iyintokozo yami.
Ps 119:144 Ukulunga kobufakazi bakho kumi phakade; ngiphe ukuqonda ukuba ngiphile.
Ps 119:145 Ngikhala ngenhliziyo yami yonke; ngizwe, Jehova; izimiso zakho ngiyakuzigcina.
Ps 119:146 Ngikhala kuwe, ngisindise; ngiyakugcina ubufakazi bakho.
Ps 119:147 Ngiyandulela uvivi lokusa ngikhala; ngiyethemba amazwi akho.
Ps 119:148 Amehlo ami ayandulela imilindo yobusuku ukuba ngizindle ngezwi lakho.
Ps 119:149 Yizwa izwi lami ngokomusa wakho, Jehova, ungiphilise ngokwezahlulelo zakho.
Ps 119:150 Bayasondela abalandela ukonakala; bakude nomthetho wakho.
Ps 119:151 Wena Jehova useduze; imiyalo yakho yonke iyiqiniso.
Ps 119:152 Kudala ngazile ngobufakazi bakho ukuthi ubusekele kuze kube phakade.
Ps 119:153 Bheka ukuhlupheka kwami, ungikhulule, ngokuba angikhohlwa umthetho wakho.
Ps 119:154 Mela indaba yami, ungihlenge, ungiphilise ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:155 Ukusindiswa kukude nababi, ngokuba abafuni izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:156 Ububele bakho, Jehova, bukhulu; ngiphilise ngokwezahlulelo zakho.
Ps 119:157 Abangizingelayo nabayizitha kimi baningi; kepha ebufakazini bakho angichezuki.
Ps 119:158 Lapho ngibona amambuka, ngiyadikibala, ngokuba awagcini izwi lakho.
Ps 119:159 Bheka ukuthi ngithanda kangaka iziyalezo zakho, Jehova; ngiphilise ngokomusa wakho.
Ps 119:160 Amazwi akho onke ayiqiniso; zonke izahlulelo zakho ezilungileyo zimi kuze kube phakade.
Ps 119:161 Izikhulu ziyangizingela, kungekho sizathu, kepha inhliziyo yami iyesaba izwi lakho.
Ps 119:162 Ngithokoza ngezwi lakho njengozuza impango enkulu.
Ps 119:163 Amanga ngiyawazonda, ngiyawenyanya; umthetho wakho ngiyawuthanda.
Ps 119:164 Kasikhombisa ngosuku ngiyakudumisa ngezahlulelo zokulunga kwakho.
Ps 119:165 Abathanda umthetho wakho banokuthula okukhulu; akukho sikhubekiso kubo.
Ps 119:166 Ngiyethemba insindiso yakho, Jehova; imiyalo yakho ngiyayenza.
Ps 119:167 Umphefumulo wami uyagcina ubufakazi bakho; ngiyabuthanda kakhulu.
Ps 119:168 Ngiyagcina iziyalezo zakho nobufakazi bakho, ngokuba izindlela zami zonke ziphambi kwakho.
Ps 119:169 Ukukhala kwami makusondele ebusweni bakho, Jehova; ngiqondise ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:170 Ukuncenga kwami makuze ebusweni bakho; ngihlenge ngokwezwi lakho.
Ps 119:171 Umlomo wami mawuchichime indumiso, ngokuba uyangifundisa izimiso zakho.
Ps 119:172 Ulimi lwami malukhulume izwi lakho, ngokuba imiyalo yakho yonke ilungile.
Ps 119:173 Isandla sakho masibe lusizo kimi, ngokuba ngikhethile iziyalezo zakho.
Ps 119:174 Ngiyalangazelela insindiso yakho, Jehova; umthetho wakho uyintokozo yami.
Ps 119:175 Umphefumulo wami mawuphile, ukudumise; izahlulelo zakho mazingisize.

Ps 120:4 Imicibisholo ebukhali yeqhawe namalahle omlilo.
Ps 120:5 Maye kimi! Ngokuba ngigogobele kwaMesheke, ngihlezi ematendeni akwaKedari.

Ps 121:3 Akayikuvuma ukuba unyawo lwakho lushelele; okulondolozayo akayikozela.
Ps 121:4 Bheka, olonda u-Israyeli akozeli, akalali.

Ps 122:3 Jerusalema, wena owakhiwe njengomuzi ohlanganisiwe ngokuqinileyo,
Ps 122:4 lapho imindeni ikhuphukela khona, imindeni kaJehova, ngokomthetho ka-Israyeli ukuba idumise igama likaJehova.
Ps 122:5 Ngokuba kumisiwe khona izihlalo zokwahlulela, izihlalo zobukhosi zendlu kaDavide.

Ps 122:7 Makube khona ukuthula phakathi kwezingange zakho, nenhlanhla ezindlini zakho zobukhosi.”

Ps 131:1 Igama lokukhuphuka. ElikaDavide. Jehova, inhliziyo yami ayikhukhumali, amehlo ami awaziphakamisi; angingeni ezindabeni ezinkulu nasezintweni ezingahlulayo.
Ps 131:2 Ngiduduzile, ngawuthulisa umphefumulo wami; njengomntwana olunyuliweyo kunina, njengolumulekileyo, unjalo umphefumulo wami phakathi kwami.

Ps 132:1 Igama lokukhuphuka. Jehova, mkhumbulele uDavide zonke izinhlupheko zakhe
Ps 132:2 ukuthi wafunga kuJehova, wenza isithembiso kuye onguMninimandla kaJakobe, ethi:
Ps 132:3 “Angiyikungena etendeni lendlu yami; angiyikwenyukela embhedeni wami;
Ps 132:4 angiyikunika amehlo ami ubuthongo, nezinkophe zami ukozela
Ps 132:5 ngingakatholeli uJehova indawo, indlu yonguMninimandla kaJakobe.”
Ps 132:6 Bheka, sizwile ngakho e-Efratha, sakufumana ezweni laseJari.
Ps 132:7 “Masingene endlini yakhe, sikhuleke ngasesenabelweni sezinyawo zakhe.
Ps 132:8 Vuka, Jehova, uye ekuphumuleni kwakho, wena nomphongolo wamandla akho.
Ps 132:9 Abapristi bakho mabembeswe ukulunga, abangcwele bakho bethabe.”
Ps 132:10 Ngenxa yenceku yakho uDavide mawungaphenduli ubuso bogcotshiweyo wakho.
Ps 132:11 UJehova ufungile kuDavide ngeqiniso, akabuyi kukho, ethi: “Owenzalo yomzimba wakho ngiyakumbeka esihlalweni sakho sobukhosi.
Ps 132:12 Uma abantwana bakho begcina isivumelwano sami nobufakazi bami engiyakubafundisa bona, khona abantwana babo bayakuhlala esihlalweni sakho kuze kube phakade.”
Ps 132:13 Ngokuba uJehova ukhethile iSiyoni; ulithandile libe yindawo yakhe yokuhlala:
Ps 132:14 “Yona ingeyokuphumula kwami kuze kube phakade; lapha ngiyakuhlala khona, ngokuba ngiyifunile.
Ps 132:15 Ngiyakubusisa kakhulu ukudla kwalo; abampofu balo ngiyakubasuthisa ngesinkwa.
Ps 132:16 Abapristi balo ngiyakubembesa insindiso; abangcwele balo bayakumemeza nokumemeza ngenjabulo.
Ps 132:17 “Ngiyakuhlumisa uphondo lukaDavide, ogcotshiweyo wami ngimlungisele isibani.
Ps 132:18 Izitha zalo ngiyakuzembesa ihlazo, kepha kuyena uqobo umqhele wakhe uyakukhazimula.”
Ps 133:1 Igama lokukhuphuka. ElikaDavide. Bheka, kuhle, kumnandi kangaka ukuba abazalwane bahlalisane ndawonye bemunye.
Ps 133:2 Kufana namafutha amahle ekhanda ehlela esilevini, isilevu sika-Aroni, ehlela nasemphethweni wezambatho zakhe.
Ps 133:3 Kufana namazolo aseHermoni ehlela ezintabeni zaseSiyoni. Ngokuba uJehova wayaleza khona isibusiso, yebo, ukuphila kuze kube phakade.

Ps 135:1 Haleluya! Dumisani igama likaJehova; mdumiseni nina zinceku zikaJehova
Ps 135:2 enimi endlini kaJehova emagcekeni endlu kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Ps 135:3 Dumisani uJehova, ngokuba uJehova muhle; hubelani igama lakhe, ngokuba limnandi.
Ps 135:4 Ngokuba uJehova uzikhethele uJakobe, no-Israyeli ukuba abe yimfuyo yakhe.
Ps 135:5 Impela ngiyazi ukuthi uJehova mkhulu nokuthi iNkosi yethu iphezu kwabo bonke onkulunkulu.
Ps 135:6 Konke uJehova akuthandayo uyakwenza ezulwini nasemhlabeni, emanzini nasezinzulwini zonke.
Ps 135:7 Ukhuphula izinkungu emikhawulweni yomhlaba, wenza imibani kube yimvula; ukhipha umoya ezingotsheni zakhe.
Ps 135:8 Washaya amazibulo aseGibithe, awabantu kanye nawezilwane.
Ps 135:9 Wathuma izibonakaliso nezimangaliso phakathi kwakho, Gibithe, phezu kukaFaro nezinceku zakhe zonke.
Ps 135:10 Washaya izizwe ezinkulu, wabulala amakhosi anamandla:
Ps 135:11 uSihoni inkosi yama-Amori, no-Ogi inkosi yaseBashani, nemibuso yonke yaseKhanani.
Ps 135:12 Wanika izwe labo laba yifa, laba yifa lika-Israyeli, isizwe sakhe.
Ps 135:13 Jehova, igama lakho limi phakade; isikhumbuzo sakho, Jehova, sisezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 135:14 Ngokuba uJehova uyakwahlulela abantu bakhe, ahawukele izinceku zakhe.
Ps 135:15 Izithombe zabezizwe ziyisiliva negolide, umsebenzi wezandla zomuntu.
Ps 135:16 Umlomo zinawo, kepha azikhulumi; amehlo zinawo, kodwa aziboni.
Ps 135:17 Izindlebe zinazo, kepha azizwa, nomoya awukho emlonyeni wazo.
Ps 135:18 Abazenzayo bayafana nazo, bonke abazethembayo.
Ps 135:19 Wena ndlu ka-Israyeli, mbonge uJehova; wena ndlu ka-Aroni, mbonge uJehova.
Ps 135:20 Wena ndlu kaLevi, mbonge uJehova; nina enimesabayo uJehova, mbongeni uJehova.
Ps 135:21 UJehova makabongwe eSiyoni, yena owakhe eJerusalema. Haleluya!
Ps 136:1 Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 136:2 Bongani uNkulunkulu wawonkulunkulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 136:3 Bongani iNkosi yamakhosi, ngokuba umusa wayo umi phakade;
Ps 136:4 yona engoyedwa owenza izimangaliso ezinkulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:5 owenzile izulu ngokuhlakanipha, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:6 owendlala umhlaba phezu kwamanzi, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:7 owenza izinkanyiso ezinkulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:8 ilanga ukuba libuse emini, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:9 inyanga nezinkanyezi ukuba zibuse ebusuku, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:10 owalishaya iGibithe, amazibulo alo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:11 owamkhipha u-Israyeli phakathi kwabo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:12 ngesandla esinamandla nangengalo eyeluliweyo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:13 owahlukanisa kabili uLwandle Olubomvu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:14 owawelisa u-Israyeli phakathi kwalo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:15 owachitha uFaro nempi yakhe eLwandle Olubomvu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:16 owahola abantu bakhe ehlane, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:17 owashaya amakhosi amakhulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:18 owabulala amakhosi adumileyo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:19 uSihoni inkosi yama-Amori, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:20 no-Ogi inkosi yaseBashani, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:21 owanika izwe labo laba yifa, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:22 laba yifa lika-Israyeli inceku yakhe, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:23 owasikhumbula sisephansi, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:24 owasikhulula ezitheni zethu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade;
Ps 136:25 onika inyama yonke ukudla, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 136:26 Bongani uNkulunkulu wezulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade.
Ps 137:1 Ngasemifuleni yaseBabele sahlala khona, sakhala, lapho sikhumbula iSiyoni.
Ps 137:2 Amahabhu ethu sawaphanyeka eminyezaneni ephakathi kwalo.
Ps 137:3 Ngokuba abasithumbileyo bacela ukuba sihlabelele igama, nabahluphi bethu bafuna injabulo, bethi: “Sihlabeleleni elinye lamagama aseSiyoni.”
Ps 137:4 Siyakuhlabelela kanjani ihubo likaJehova kwelinye izwe na?
Ps 137:5 Uma ngikhohlwa wena Jerusalema, masizikhohlwe isandla sami sokunene.
Ps 137:6 Ulimi lwami malunamathele olwangeni lwami, uma ngingakukhumbuli, uma ngingaphakamisi iJerusalema phezu kwentokozo yami enkulu.
Ps 137:7 Khumbula, Jehova, usuku lweJerusalema, ngenxa yabantwana bakwa-Edomi abathi: “Dilizani, dilizani, kuze kube sesisekelweni salo.”

Ps 137:9 Ubusisiwe oyakubamba abancane bakho, abaphahlaze edwaleni.
Ps 138:1 ElikaDavide. Ngiyakukubonga ngenhliziyo yami yonke; phambi kwawonkulunkulu ngiyakukuhubela.
Ps 138:2 Ngiyakukhuleka phambi kwethempeli lakho elingcwele, ngibonge igama lakho ngenxa yomusa wakho neqiniso lakho, ngokuba phezu kwakho konke uphakamisile igama lakho nezwi lakho.
Ps 138:3 Ngosuku engakhala ngalo wangiphendula; wangiqunga isibindi, wangipha amandla emphefumulweni wami.
Ps 138:4 Onke amakhosi omhlaba ayakukubonga, Jehova, lapho ezwile amazwi omlomo wakho.
Ps 138:5 Yebo, ayakuhlabelela ngezindlela zikaJehova, ngokuba inkulu inkazimulo kaJehova.
Ps 138:6 Ngokuba noma uJehova ephakeme, uyanakekela nokho ophansi; uyamazi ozidlayo ekude.
Ps 138:7 Noma ngihamba phakathi kwenhlupheko, uyakungiphilisa; uyakwelulela isandla sakho olakeni lwezitha zami, esokunene sakho singisindise.
Ps 138:8 UJehova uyakufeza okwami; Jehova, umusa wakho umi phakade; ungashiyi imisebenzi yezandla zakho.
Ps 139:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Jehova, uyangihlolisisa, uyangazi.
Ps 139:2 Uyakwazi ukuhlala kwami nokuvuka kwami, uqonda umcabango wami ukude.
Ps 139:3 Uyaphenya ukuhamba kwami nokulala kwami, wazana nezindlela zonke zami.
Ps 139:4 Ngokuba alikho izwi olimini lwami, Jehova, ongalaziyo ngokupheleleyo.
Ps 139:5 Ungizungezile ngasemuva nangaphambili, wabeka isandla sakho phezu kwami.
Ps 139:6 Ukwazi okunjalo kuyangimangalisa; kuphakeme, anginakufinyelela kukho.
Ps 139:7 Ngiyakuyaphi, ngisuke emoyeni wakho, na? Ngiyakubalekelaphi, ngimuke ebusweni bakho, na?
Ps 139:8 Uma ngikhuphukela ezulwini, wena ulapho; uma ngendlala icansi lami endaweni yabafileyo, nangu wena.
Ps 139:9 Uma ngithabatha amaphiko okusa, ngiye ngihlale emikhawulweni yolwandle,
Ps 139:10 nalapho isandla sakho siyakungihola, esokunene sakho singibambe.
Ps 139:11 Uma bengithi: “Ubumnyama mabungehlele, ukukhanya kube ngubusuku kimi,”
Ps 139:12 ubumnyama bebungayikuba mnyama kuwe, ngokuba ubusuku bebuyakukhanya njengemini, ubumnyama bufane nokukhanya.
Ps 139:13 Ngokuba wena uzenzile izinso zami, wangaluka esiswini sikamame.
Ps 139:14 Ngiyakukubonga, ngokuba ngenziwa ngokwesabekayo nangokumangalisayo; imisebenzi yakho iyamangalisa; umphefumulo wami uyakwazi kahle.
Ps 139:15 Amathambo ami ayengafihlekile kuwe, lapho ngenziwa ekusithekeni, ngibunjwa ezindaweni ezijulileyo zomhlaba.
Ps 139:16 Amehlo akho angibona ngiseyihlule; zonke izinsuku zami zalotshwa encwadini yakho, zanqunywa, lungakafiki nolulodwa kuzo.
Ps 139:17 Imicabango yakho, Nkulunkulu, ingamagugu kimi; bukhulu kangaka ubuningi bayo.
Ps 139:18 Uma bengiyakuyibala, miningi kunesihlabathi; lapho ngivuka, bengiyakuba nawe.
Ps 139:19 Sengathi ungabulala ababi, Nkulunkulu; ngalokho sukani kimi nina bantu begazi.
Ps 139:20 Bakhuluma ngamacebo ngawe, baliphatha ngeze igama lakho.
Ps 139:21 Jehova, angibazondi abakuzondayo na? Anginengwa ngabakuvukelayo na?
Ps 139:22 Ngiyabazonda ngenzondo epheleleyo; bayizitha kimi.
Ps 139:23 Ngihole, Nkulunkulu, wazi inhliziyo yami; ngilinge, wazi imicabango yami,
Ps 139:24 ubone, uma kukhona indlela yosizi kimi, ungiholele endleleni yaphakade.
Ps 140:1 Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngikhulule, Jehova, kumuntu omubi, ngilondoloze kumuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu.
Ps 140:2 Baceba okubi enhliziyweni yabo; izinsuku zonke baviva impi.
Ps 140:3 Bayalola ulimi lwabo njengenyoka; isihlungu samabululu siphansi kwezindebe zabo. Sela
Ps 140:4 Ngilondoloze ezandleni zomubi, ngilinde kumuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu, oceba ukukhuba izinyawo zami.
Ps 140:5 Abazidlayo bangifihlela ugibe; ngezintambo bendlala inetha; eceleni kwendlela bangibekela izihibe. Sela
Ps 140:6 Ngathi kuJehova: “UnguNkulunkulu wami wena.” Yizwa, Jehova, izwi lokunxusa kwami.
Ps 140:7 Jehova Nkosi yami, mandla ensindiso yami, uvikela ikhanda lami ngosuku lokulwa.
Ps 140:8 Ungazivumeli, Jehova, izifiso zababi; ungaphumelelisi amacebo abo, funa baziphakamise. Sela
Ps 140:9 Maqondana nesihlungu sabangizungezayo mabambozwe ngububi bomlomo wabo.
Ps 140:10 Amalahle ashisayo mawawele phezu kwabo; mabaphonswe emlilweni nasemigodini ejulileyo, bangabe besavuka.
Ps 140:11 Umuntu wamanga makangamiswa emhlabeni; ububi mabuzingele umuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu, abhujiswe.
Ps 140:12 Ngiyazi ukuthi uJehova uyakumela udaba lohluphekayo nokufaneleyo kwabampofu.
Ps 140:13 Impela abalungileyo bayakubonga igama lakho; abaqotho bayakuhlala ebusweni bakho.
Ps 141:1 Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, ngiyakhala kuwe, ngiphuthume; lalela izwi lami, nxa ngikhuleka kuwe.
Ps 141:2 Umkhuleko wami mawube njengempepho ebusweni bakho, nokuphakanyiswa kwezandla zami njengomnikelo wakusihlwa.
Ps 141:3 Jehova, bekela umlomo wami umlindi, ugcine umnyango wezindebe zami.
Ps 141:4 Ungaphenduleli inhliziyo yami entweni embi ukuba ngenze imisebenzi yobubi kanye nabantu abenza okubi, ngingadli izibilebile zabo.
Ps 141:5 Olungileyo makangishaye, kungumusa kimi; angisole, kungamafutha ekhanda; ikhanda lami malingawenqabi, ngokuba nasebubini babo umkhuleko wami uyobe usekhona.
Ps 141:6 Abahluleli babo bayakuphonswa eweni; bayakuzwa ukuthi amazwi ami amnandi.
Ps 141:7 Njengalokhu umuntu elima, eklaya umhlabathi, amathambo ethu ahlakazekile ngasemlonyeni wendawo yabafileyo.
Ps 141:8 Kepha amehlo ami akuwe Jehova Nkosi yami; ngiyakwethemba wena; ungathululi umphefumulo wami.
Ps 141:9 Ngihlenge ogibeni abangibekele lona, nasezihibeni zabenza okubi.
Ps 141:10 Ababi mabawele emanetheni abo, mina ngidlule kuwo.
Ps 142:1 IMaskili likaDavide esemhumeni. Umkhuleko. Ngiyakhala kuJehova ngezwi lami, ngincenga uJehova ngezwi lami.
Ps 142:2 Ngiyathulula ebusweni bakhe isikhalo sami, ngibonakalisa kuye inhlupheko yami.
Ps 142:3 Lapho umoya wami udangala phakathi kwami, wena uyawazi umkhondo wami; endleleni engihamba ngayo bangifihlele ugibe.
Ps 142:4 Bheka ngakwesokunene sami, ubone ukuthi akakho onginakekelayo; isiphephelo singiphuthele, akakho okhathalela umphefumulo wami.
Ps 142:5 Ngikhala kuwe Jehova, ngithi: “Wena uyisiphephelo sami nesabelo sami ezweni labaphilayo.”
Ps 142:6 Lalela ukukhala kwami, ngokuba ngicindezelekile kakhulu; ngikhulule kubo abangizingelayo, ngokuba banamandla kunami.
Ps 142:7 Khipha umphefumulo wami etilongweni ukuba ngibonge igama lakho; abalungileyo bayakungizungeza, ngokuba uyakungiphatha kahle.
Ps 143:1 Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, yizwa umkhuleko wami, ubeke indlebe ekuncengeni kwami; ungiphendule ngokuthembeka kwakho nokulunga kwakho.
Ps 143:2 Ungangeni ekwahluleleni nenceku yakho, ngokuba akukho muntu okhona olungile emehlweni akho.
Ps 143:3 Ngokuba isitha siyazingela umphefumulo wami, sicindezela phansi emhlabathini ukuphila kwami; singihlalisile ebumnyameni njengabakade bafa.
Ps 143:4 Umoya wami uphelile kimi; inhliziyo yami igongobele phakathi kwami.
Ps 143:5 Ngiyakhumbula izinsuku zasendulo, ngizindla ngemisebenzi yakho yonke, ngicabange ngezenzo zezandla zakho.
Ps 143:6 Ngiyazelulela izandla zami kuwe; umphefumulo wami womela wena njengomhlaba owomileyo. Sela
Ps 143:7 Shesha ungiphendule, Jehova; umoya wami uyaphela; ungangifihleli ubuso bakho, funa ngifane nabashona egodini.
Ps 143:8 Ngizwise umusa wakho ekuseni, ngokuba ngiyethemba kuwe; ngazise indlela engifanele ukuhamba ngayo, ngokuba ngiphakamisela kuwe umphefumulo wami.
Ps 143:9 Ngikhulule ezitheni zami; Jehova, ngicashe kuwe.
Ps 143:10 Ngifundise ukwenza intando yakho, ngokuba wena unguNkulunkulu wami; umoya wakho omuhle mawungihole emhlabathini olelezekileyo.
Ps 143:11 Jehova, ngiphilise ngenxa yegama lakho, ngokulunga kwakho uwukhiphe umphefumulo wami ekuhluphekeni.
Ps 143:12 Zinqume izitha zami ngomusa wakho, ubabhubhise bonke abahlupha umphefumulo wami, ngokuba ngiyinceku yakho.
Ps 144:1 ElikaDavide. Makabongwe uJehova, idwala lami, ofundisa izandla zami ukuhlasela neminwe yami ukulwa,
Ps 144:2 umusa wami nenqaba yami, umbhoshongo wami ophakemeyo nomkhululi wami, isihlangu sami, nengiphephela kuye, nothobisa abantu bami phansi kwami.
Ps 144:3 Jehova, uyini umuntu ukuba umazi, nendodana yomuntu ukuba uyikhumbule, na?
Ps 144:4 Umuntu ufana nomoya; izinsuku zakhe zinjengethunzi elidlulayo.
Ps 144:5 Thobisa amazulu akho, Jehova, wehle; thinta izintaba, zithunqe.
Ps 144:6 Imibani mayinyazime, ubahlakaze; thuma imicibisholo yakho, ubaphithizise.
Ps 144:7 Yelula isandla sakho phezulu, ungikhulule, ungophule emanzini amakhulu nasesandleni sabafokazi
Ps 144:8 abamlomo wabo ukhuluma inkohliso, nesandla sabo sokunene singesokunene samanga.
Ps 144:9 Ngiyakuhlabelela kuwe Nkulunkulu isihlabelelo esisha; ngogubhu olunezintambo eziyishumi ngiyakukuhubela.
Ps 144:10 Nguye onika amakhosi insindiso, okhulula inceku yakhe uDavide enkembeni elimazayo.
Ps 144:11 Ngikhulule, ungophule esandleni sabafokazi abamlomo wabo ukhuluma inkohliso, nesandla sabo sokunene singesokunene samanga.
Ps 144:12 Lapho amadodana ethu enjengezithombo ezikhulileyo ebusheni bazo, namadodakazi ethu enjengamatshe amagumbi abaziwe ngendlela yokwakhiwa kwezindlu zamakhosi;
Ps 144:13 lapho izingobo zethu zigcwele, ziveza izinhlobo ngezinhlobo, nezimvu zethu zizala ngezinkulungwane, yebo, ngezinkulungwane eziyishumi emadlelweni ethu;
Ps 144:14 lapho izinkabi zethu zithweswe kakhulu, nalapho kungekho ukufohla kwesitha nokungena empini nezikhalo ezitaladini zethu,
Ps 144:15 babusisiwe abantu abanjalo; babusisiwe abantu abaNkulunkulu wabo unguJehova.
Ps 145:1 Indumiso kaDavide. Ngiyakukuphakamisa wena Nkulunkulu wami, Nkosi, ngilituse igama lakho phakade naphakade.
Ps 145:2 Imihla yonke ngiyakukubonga, ngilidumise igama lakho phakade naphakade.
Ps 145:3 Mkhulu uJehova, umelwe ukudunyiswa kakhulu; ubukhulu bakhe abuphenyisiseki.
Ps 145:4 Isizukulwane siyakubabaza kwesinye imisebenzi yakho, simemezele izenzo zakho zamandla.
Ps 145:5 Ngiyakuzindla ngenkazimulo nodumo lobukhosi bakho nangezimangaliso zakho.
Ps 145:6 Abantu bayakukhuluma ngamandla ezenzo zakho ezesabekayo; ubukhulu bakho ngiyakubumemezela.
Ps 145:7 Bayakweneka kakhulu inkumbulo yobuhle bakho obukhulu, bahube ngokulunga kwakho.
Ps 145:8 UJehova unesihe nobumnene; uyephuza ukuthukuthela, mkhulu ngomusa.
Ps 145:9 UJehova muhle kubo bonke; uyayihawukela imisebenzi yakhe yonke.
Ps 145:10 Yonke imisebenzi yakho iyakukudumisa, abangcwele bakho bakubonge.
Ps 145:11 Ngenkazimulo yombuso wakho bayakukhuluma, bashumayele ngamandla akho
Ps 145:12 ukuba babazise abantwana babantu izenzo zakho zamandla nenkazimulo yobukhosi bombuso wakho.
Ps 145:13 Umbuso wakho ungumbuso kuze kube phakade; ubukhosi bakho busezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Ps 145:14 UJehova uyaphasa bonke abawayo, abavuse bonke abathotshisiweyo.
Ps 145:15 Amehlo abo bonke alinda wena; uyabanika ukudla ngesikhathi esiyiso.
Ps 145:16 Uyavula isandla sakho, usuthise ukufisa kwakho konke okuphilayo.
Ps 145:17 UJehova ulungile ezindleleni zakhe zonke, unomusa emisebenzini yakhe yonke.
Ps 145:18 UJehova useduze nabo bonke abambizayo, bonke abambizayo ngeqiniso.
Ps 145:19 Uyasuthisa ukufisa kwabamesabayo; uyezwa ukukhala kwabo, abasindise.
Ps 145:20 UJehova uyalondoloza bonke abamthandayo, kepha ababi bonke uyakubabhubhisa.
Ps 145:21 Umlomo wami uyakukhuluma udumo lukaJehova, inyama yonke ibonge igama lakhe elingcwele kuze kube phakade.
Ps 146:1 Haleluya! Dumisa uJehova, mphefumulo wami.
Ps 146:2 Ngisaphila ngiyakumdumisa uJehova, ngihube kuNkulunkulu wami ngisekhona.
Ps 146:3 Ningethembi ezikhulwini nasendodaneni yomuntu okungekho kuyo ukusiza.
Ps 146:4 Umoya wakhe uyaphuma, yena abuyele emhlabathini wakhe; ngalona lolo suku amacebo akhe ayaphela.
Ps 146:5 Ubusisiwe yena omsizi wakhe unguNkulunkulu kaJakobe, othemba lakhe likuJehova uNkulunkulu wakhe
Ps 146:6 owenzile izulu nomhlaba, nolwandle, nakho konke okuphakathi kwakho, ogcina iqiniso kuze kube phakade;
Ps 146:7 obenzela abacindezelweyo ukwahlulela, obapha abalambileyo ukudla; uJehova uyakhulula iziboshwa.
Ps 146:8 UJehova uyenza ukuba izimpumputhe zibone; uJehova uyavusa abathotshisiweyo; uJehova uyathanda abalungileyo.
Ps 146:9 UJehova uyalondoloza abafokazi; uyaphasa intandane nomfelokazi; kepha indlela yababi uyayiphambanisa.
Ps 146:10 UJehova uyabusa kuze kube phakade, uNkulunkulu wakho, Siyoni, ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. Haleluya!
Ps 147:1 Haleluya! Ngokuba kuhle ukuhlabelela kuNkulunkulu wethu, yebo, kumnandi; ukudumisa kufanele.
Ps 147:2 UJehova uyalakha iJerusalema; abaxoshiweyo bakwa-Israyeli uyababutha.
Ps 147:3 Uyaphilisa abenhliziyo echobozekileyo; izilonda zabo uyazibopha.
Ps 147:4 Uyabala inani lezinkanyezi, azibize zonke ngamagama.
Ps 147:5 INkosi yethu inkulu, makhulu amandla ayo; ukuqonda kwakhe akunakulinganiswa.
Ps 147:6 UJehova uyaphakamisa abathobekileyo; ababi uyabawisa phansi emhlabathini.
Ps 147:7 Hubelani uJehova ngokubonga, nimdumise uNkulunkulu wethu ngehabhu,
Ps 147:8 osibekela izulu ngamafu, olungisela umhlaba imvula, ohlumisa utshani ezintabeni.
Ps 147:9 Unika izinkomo ukudla kwazo, namazinyane egwababa akhalayo.
Ps 147:10 Akathokozi ngamandla ehhashi, akajabuleli imilenze yomuntu.
Ps 147:11 UJehova uyathokoza ngabamesabayo, abathemba umusa wakhe.
Ps 147:12 Jerusalema, mbabaze uJehova; Siyoni, mdumise uNkulunkulu wakho.
Ps 147:13 Ngokuba uqinisile imigoqo yamasango; ubusisile abantwana bakho phakathi kwakho.
Ps 147:14 Uyenza ukuthula emikhawulweni yakho; uyakusuthisa ngokolweni omuhle.
Ps 147:15 Uyathumela umyalo wakhe emhlabeni; izwi lakhe ligijima ngejubane elikhulu.
Ps 147:16 Uyanika iqhwa njengoboya; uhlakaza isithwathwa njengomlotha.
Ps 147:17 Uyaphonsa isichotho sakhe njengezinhlamvu; ngubani ongema phambi kwamakhaza akhe na?
Ps 147:18 Uyathuma izwi lakhe, likuncibilikise; uyavusa umoya wakhe, amanzi agobhoze.
Ps 147:19 Uyatshengisa izwi lakhe kuJakobe, izimiso zakhe nezahlulelo zakhe ku-Israyeli.
Ps 147:20 Akenzanga njalo kwesinye isizwe nesisodwa: izahlulelo zakhe asizazi. Haleluya!
Ps 148:1 Haleluya! Dumisani uJehova ezulwini, nimdumise kweliphezulu.
Ps 148:2 Mdumiseni nina zingelosi zakhe zonke, nimdumise nina mabandla akhe onke.
Ps 148:3 Mdumiseni nina langa nenyanga, nimdumise nina zinkanyezi zonke ezikhanyayo.
Ps 148:4 Mdumiseni nina mazulu amazulu, nina manzi aphezu kwezulu.
Ps 148:5 Makuthathe kudumise igama likaJehova, ngokuba wayaleza, kwadaleka.
Ps 148:6 Futhi wakumisa kuze kube phakade; washaya umthetho ongenakweqiwa.
Ps 148:7 Mdumiseni uJehova emhlabeni nina mikhomo nezintwa zonke,
Ps 148:8 nawe mlilo nesichotho, liqhwa nenkwezane, nawe siphepho esenza okwezwi lakhe,
Ps 148:9 nani zintaba namagquma onke, nani mithi ethelayo nayo yonke imisedari,
Ps 148:10 nani zilwane nezinkomo zonke, nani eninwabuzelayo nezinyoni ezindizayo,
Ps 148:11 nani makhosi omhlaba nabantu bonke, nani zikhulu nabahluleli bonke bomhlaba,
Ps 148:12 nani zinsizwa nezintombi, nani maxhegu nabafana.
Ps 148:13 Mabadumise igama likaJehova, ngokuba ngelakhe igama lodwa eliphakeme; inkazimulo yakhe iphezu komhlaba nezulu.
Ps 148:14 Usephakamisile uphondo lwabantu bakhe; ngalokho bayamdumisa abangcwele bakhe, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, abantu abaseduze naye. Haleluya!
Ps 149:1 Haleluya! Hlabelelani kuJehova igama elisha, indumiso yakhe emhlanganweni wabangcwele.
Ps 149:2 U-Israyeli makathokoze ngowamEnzayo, abantwana baseSiyoni bethabele iNkosi yabo.
Ps 149:3 Mabadumise igama lakhe ngokusina, bamhubele ngesigubhu nehabhu.
Ps 149:4 Ngokuba uJehova uyathokoza ngabantu bakhe; abathobekileyo uyabahlobisa ngensindiso.
Ps 149:5 Abalungileyo mabethabe ngobukhosi,
Ps 149:6 Ukumphakamisa uNkulunkulu makube semlonyeni wabo, nenkemba esika nhlangothi zombili esandleni sabo,
Ps 149:7 ukuba benze impindiselo kubo abezizwe nezijeziso kubantu,
Ps 149:8 babophe amakhosi abo ngamaketanga nabadumileyo babo ngezibopho zensimbi,
Ps 149:9 bafeze phezu kwabo isahlulelo esilotshiweyo; kuludumo kubo bonke abangcwele bakhe. Haleluya!
Ps 150:1 Haleluya! Dumisani uNkulunkulu endlini yakhe engcwele, nimdumise emkhathini wakhe wamandla.
Ps 150:2 Mdumiseni ngenxa yezenzo zakhe zamandla, nimdumise ngenxa yobukhosi bakhe obukhulu.
Ps 150:3 Mdumiseni ngezwi lecilongo, nimdumise ngogubhu nehabhu.
Ps 150:4 Mdumiseni ngesigubhu nokusina, nimdumise ngezingubhu ezinezintambo eziyishumi nemitshingo.
Ps 150:5 Mdumiseni ngamasimbali ancencethayo, nimdumise ngezinsimbi ezikhencezayo.
Ps 150:6 Konke okuphefumulayo makudumise uJehova. Haleluya!
Prov 1:1 Nazi izaga zika Solomoni indodana kaDavide, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli,
Prov 1:2 zokwazi ukuhlakanipha nokulaywa, nokwahlukanisa amazwi okuqonda,
Prov 1:3 nokwamukela ukulaywa kube ngukuhlakanipha, nokulunga, nokwahlulela, neqiniso,
Prov 1:4 nokunika abangenalwazi ukuhlakanipha, nezinsizwa ukwazi namasu,
Prov 1:5 ukuze ohlakaniphileyo ezwe, aqhubeke ekufundeni, noqondileyo athole iziluleko ezinhle
Prov 1:6 ukuba aqonde izaga nezimfihlakalo, namazwi abahlakaniphileyo nezimfumbe zabo.
Prov 1:7 Ukumesaba uJehova kungukuqala kokuhlakanipha; iziwula ziyadelela ukuhlakanipha nokulaywa.
Prov 1:8 Ndodana yami, yizwa ukulaya kukayihlo, ungawushiyi umthetho kanyoko,
Prov 1:9 ngokuba kuyakuba ngumqhele omuhle wekhanda lakho, nemigexo entanyeni yakho.
Prov 1:10 Ndodana yami, uma izoni zikuyenga, ungavumi.
Prov 1:11 Uma zithi: “Hamba nathi, siqamekele igazi, sibhacele ngeze ongenacala,
Prov 1:12 sibagwinye besezwa njengendawo yabafileyo, besaphilile njengabehlela egodini;
Prov 1:13 yonke impahla eyigugu siyakuyifumana, sigcwalise izindlu zethu ngempango;
Prov 1:14 yenza inkatho yakho phakathi kwethu, sibe nesikhwama sinye sonke,”
Prov 1:15 ndodana yami, ungahambi nazo endleleni, unqande unyawo lwakho emikhondweni yazo,
Prov 1:16 ngokuba izinyawo zazo zigijimela ebubini, zishesha ukuchitha igazi.
Prov 1:17 Ngokuba inetha lenekelwe ize emehlweni azo zonke izinyoni.
Prov 1:18 Kepha laba baqamekela elabo igazi, babhacela okwabo ukuphila.
Prov 1:19 Zinjalo izindlela zabo bonke abaphanga impango; iyasusa ukuphila komniniyo.
Prov 1:20 Ukuhlakanipha kuyamemeza emigwaqweni, kuyezwakalisa izwi lakho ezigcawini;
Prov 1:21 emashashalazini emigwaqo kuyaduma; ngasezikhaleni zamasango omuzi kuyakhuluma amazwi akho okuthi:
Prov 1:22 “Koze kube nini iziwula zithanda ubuwula, nezideleli zijabula ukudelela, neziwula zizonda ukwazi, na?
Prov 1:23 Buyani ngokusola kwami; bhekani, ngiyakuthulula umoya wami phezu kwenu, nginazise amazwi ami.
Prov 1:24 Ngokuba ngibizile, nala nina; ngelula isandla sami, akubangakho onakayo;
Prov 1:25 kepha nichithile konke ukululeka kwami, anivumanga ukusola kwami;
Prov 1:26 nami ngiyakuhleka ingozi yenu, ngiklolodele ukufika kwenikwesabayo,
Prov 1:27 lapho kufika njengesivunguvungu lokho enikwesabayo, nengozi yenu iza njengesikhwishikhwishi, lapho nehlelwa ngukuhlupheka nosizi.
Prov 1:28 “Khona bayakungibiza, kepha angiyikuphendula; bayakungifunisisa, kepha abayikungifumana
Prov 1:29 ngenxa yokuba babezonda ukwazi, kabakhethanga ukwesaba uJehova,
Prov 1:30 bengavumanga ukululeka kwami, bedelela konke ukusola kwami.
Prov 1:31 Ngalokho bayakudla izithelo zendlela yabo, basuthe ngamacebo abo.
Prov 1:32 Ngokuba ukuhlehla kwabangenalwazi kuyakubabulala, nokunganaki kweziwula kuyakubabhubhisa.
Prov 1:33 Kepha ongilalelayo uyakuhlala elondekile, agcineke, angabi naluvalo ngokubi.”
Prov 2:1 Ndodana yami, uma wamukela amazwi ami, uzibekelele imiyalo yami,
Prov 2:2 ukuze ubeke indlebe yakho ekuhlakanipheni, uthobisele ekuqondeni inhliziyo yakho,
Prov 2:3 yebo, uma ukhala ngengqondo, uzwakalisa izwi lakho ngokuqonda,
Prov 2:4 uma ukufuna njengesiliva, ukuphenya njengamagugu afihliweyo,
Prov 2:5 khona uyakuqonda ukumesaba uJehova, ufumane ukumazi uNkulunkulu.
Prov 2:6 Ngokuba uJehova uyanika ukuhlakanipha; emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma ukwazi nokuqonda.
Prov 2:7 Uyabekela abaqotho isibusiso, uyihawu kwabahamba bengenacala,
Prov 2:8 egcina izindlela zokulunga, elondoloza imikhondo yabathembekileyo bakhe.
Prov 2:9 Khona uyakuqonda ukulunga nokwahlulela, neqiniso, yebo, nezindlela zonke ezinhle.
Prov 2:10 Ngokuba ukuhlakanipha kuyakungena enhliziyweni yakho, ukwazi kube mnandi emphefumulweni wakho.
Prov 2:11 Amasu ayakukulinda, ukuqonda kukugcine,
Prov 2:12 ukuze wophulwe endleleni yobubi nakubantu abakhuluma okuphambeneyo,
Prov 2:13 abashiya imikhondo yobuqotho, ukuze bahambe ngezindlela zobumnyama;
Prov 2:14 abathokoza ngokwenza okubi, bajabulele ukuphambana kobubi;
Prov 2:15 abazindlela zabo ziyisigwegwe, nemikhondo yabo iphambene,
Prov 2:16 ukuba wophulwe kowesifazane ondindayo nakuye owezizwe onamazwi athophayo,
Prov 2:17 oshiya umngane wobusha bakhe, akhohlwe isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu wakhe,
Prov 2:18 ngokuba indlu yakhe ishonela ekufeni, nasezithunzini izindlela zakhe.
Prov 2:19 Bonke abangena kuye ababuyi, bangafinyeleli ezindleleni zokuphila.
Prov 2:20 Kanjalo uyakuhamba ezindleleni zabahle, ugcine imikhondo yabalungileyo.
Prov 2:21 Ngokuba abaqotho bayakuhlala ezweni, abapheleleyo basale kulo.
Prov 2:22 Kepha ababi bayakunqunywa ezweni, nabambuluzayo bayakusishulwa kulo.
Prov 3:1 Ndodana yami, ungakhohlwa umthetho wami, kepha inhliziyo yakho mayigcine imiyalo yami,
Prov 3:2 ngokuba iyakwenezela kuwe ubude bezinsuku, neminyaka yokuphila, nokuthula.
Prov 3:3 Isihhe neqiniso makungakushiyi; kubophe entanyeni yakho, ukulobe esibhebheni senhliziyo yakho,
Prov 3:4 ukuze uthole umusa nodumo oluhle emehlweni kaNkulunkulu nabantu.
Prov 3:5 Themba kuJehova ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, ungenciki kokwakho ukuqonda.
Prov 3:6 Mazise yena ezindleleni zakho zonke, uyakuqondisa imikhondo yakho.
Prov 3:7 Ungabi ngohlakaniphileyo emehlweni akho; mesabe uJehova, udede ebubini.
Prov 3:8 Lokho kuyakuba yimpilo emzimbeni wakho nokuhlunyelelwa kwamathambo akho.
Prov 3:9 Dumisa uJehova ngempahla yakho, nangolibo lwazo zonke izithelo zakho,
Prov 3:10 izinqolobane zakho zigcwale ngobuningi, nezikhamo zakho zichichime ngewayini elisha.
Prov 3:11 Ndodana yami, ungadeleli ukulaya kukaJehova, ungakhathazeki ngokusola kwakhe.
Prov 3:12 Ngokuba uJehova uyamlaya amthandayo, njengoyise indodana ayithandayo.
Prov 3:13 Ubusisiwe umuntu othola ukuhlakanipha nomuntu ozuza ingqondo,
Prov 3:14 ngokuba inzuzo yakho inhle kunenzuzo yesiliva, nokutholakalayo kukho kunegolide.
Prov 3:15 Kuyigugu kunamarubi, nakho konke ongakufisa akunakulinganiswa nakho.
Prov 3:16 Ubude bezinsuku busesandleni sakho sokunene, nakwesokhohlo kukhona ingcebo nodumo.
Prov 3:17 Izindlela zakho ziyizindlela zokumnandi; yonke imikhondo yakho ingukuthula.
Prov 3:18 Kungumuthi wokuphila kwabakubambayo, nababambelela kukho babusisiwe.
Prov 3:19 UJehova wasekela umhlaba ngokuhlakanipha; wamisa amazulu ngokuqonda.
Prov 3:20 Ngokwazi kwakhe izintwa zaqhekezwa, namafu aconsa amazolo.
Prov 3:21 Ndodana yami, lokho makungasuki emehlweni akho, ugcine ukuhlakanipha namasu,
Prov 3:22 kube ngukuphila emphefumulweni wakho nomusa entanyeni yakho.
Prov 3:23 Khona uyakuhamba indlela yakho ngokulondeka, ungaqhuzuli unyawo lwakho.
Prov 3:24 Lapho ulala phansi, awuyikwesaba lutho; nanxa usulale phansi, ubuthongo bakho buyakuba mnandi.
Prov 3:25 Ungethuswa luvalo oluzumayo nokuchithwa kwababi, lapho kufika,
Prov 3:26 ngokuba uJehova uyakuba yithemba lakho, agcine unyawo lwakho ukuba lungabhajwa.
Prov 3:27 Ungagodleli abaninikho okuhle, lapho kusemandleni esandla sakho ukukwenza.
Prov 3:28 Ungasho kumakhelwane wakho ukuthi: “Hamba, ubuye, ngiyakukunika kusasa,” lapho kukhona kuwe.
Prov 3:29 Ungacebi okubi ngomakhelwane wakho, lapho ehlezi nawe elondekile.
Prov 3:30 Ungaphikisani namuntu ngeze, uma engakonanga ngalutho.
Prov 3:31 Ungabi namhawu ngomuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu, ungakhethi neyodwa yezindlela zakhe,
Prov 3:32 ngokuba ophambeneyo uyisinengiso kuJehova. kepha abaqotho bayisifuba sakhe.
Prov 3:33 Isiqalekiso sikaJehova sisendlini yababi, kepha uyabusisa ikhaya labalungileyo.
Prov 3:34 Izideleli uyazidelela, kepha abathobekileyo ubapha umusa.
Prov 3:35 Abahlakaniphileyo bayakudla ifa lodumo, kepha iziwula ziyakuphiwa ihlazo.
Prov 4:1 Zwanini, madodana ami, ukulaya kukayise, nilalele, ukuze nazi ukuqonda.
Prov 4:2 Ngokuba ngiyaninika izifundiso ezinhle; ningawushiyi umthetho wami.
Prov 4:3 Ngokuba ngangiyindodana kubaba, ethambileyo neyodwa emehlweni kamame.
Prov 4:4 Wangifundisa, wathi kimi: “Inhliziyo yakho mayibambe amazwi ami; gcina imiyalo yami, uphile.
Prov 4:5 Zuza ukuhlakanipha, zuza ukuqonda; ungakhohlwa, ungachezuki emazwini omlomo wami;
Prov 4:6 ungakushiyi, kuyakukugcina; kuthande, kuyakukulondoloza.
Prov 4:7 Ukuqala kokuhlakanipha yilokhu: Zuza ukuhlakanipha; yebo, ngakho konke okutholileyo zuza ukuhlakanipha.
Prov 4:8 Kukhulise, kuyakukuphakamisa; kuyakukudumisa, lapho ukugona.
Prov 4:9 Kuyakunika ikhanda lakho umgexo womusa, kunikeze kuwe umqhele wodumo.”
Prov 4:10 Yizwa, ndodana yami, wamukele izwi lami; kuyakuthi iminyaka yokuphila kwakho ibe miningi.
Prov 4:11 Ngikufundisa ngendlela yokuhlakanipha; ngikuhola emikhondweni yobuqotho.
Prov 4:12 Ekuhambeni kwakho isinyathelo asiyikuvinjelwa, nasekugijimeni kwakho awuyikukhubeka.
Prov 4:13 Bambelela ekulayweni, ungakuyeki; kulonde, ngokuba kungukuphila kwakho.
Prov 4:14 Ungangeni emkhondweni wababi, ungahambi endleleni yabonakeleyo.
Prov 4:15 Yixwaye, ungadluli ngayo; chezuka kuyo, udlule.
Prov 4:16 Ngokuba abalali, uma bengenzanga okubi; ubuthongo buyasuswa, uma bengakhubekisanga muntu.
Prov 4:17 Ngokuba badla isinkwa sobubi, baphuza iwayini lobudlwangudlwangu.
Prov 4:18 Umkhondo wabalungileyo unjengokukhanya kokusa okuqhubeka ngokukhanya njalo kuze kube semini.
Prov 4:19 Indlela yababi injengobumnyama; abazi ukuthi bakhubeka ngani.
Prov 4:20 Ndodana yami, lalela amazwi ami, ubeke indlebe yakho kukho ukukhuluma kwami.
Prov 4:21 Makungachezuki emehlweni akho, ukugcine phakathi kwenhliziyo yakho,
Prov 4:22 ngokuba kungukuphila kwabakufumanayo nempilo yomzimba wonke wabo.
Prov 4:23 Phezu kwakho konke okugcinayo, gcina inhliziyo yakho, ngokuba kuyilapho kuvela khona ukuphila.
Prov 4:24 Susa kuwe ukuphambana komlomo, nezindebe eziyisigwegwe uzidedisele kude nawe.
Prov 4:25 Amehlo akho mawabheke phambili, nezinkophe zakho maziqonde phambi kwakho.
Prov 4:26 Yenza umkhondo wonyawo lwakho ukuba ulingane, ziqine zonke izindlela zakho.
Prov 4:27 Ungaphambuki ngakwesokunene nangakwesokhohlo; chezukisa unyawo lwakho ebubini.
Prov 5:1 Ndodana yami, lalela ukuhlakanipha kwami, ubeke indlebe yakho ekuqondeni kwami
Prov 5:2 ukuba ugcine amasu, nezindebe zakho zilonde ukwazi.
Prov 5:3 Ngokuba izindebe zowesifazane ondindayo ziconsa izinyosi; umlomo wakhe ubushelezi kunamafutha.
Prov 5:4 Kepha ekugcineni umunyu njengomhlonyane, ubukhali njengenkemba enezinhlangothi ezimbili.
Prov 5:5 Izinyawo zakhe ziyehlela ekufeni; izinyathelo zakhe zibambelela endaweni yabafileyo.
Prov 5:6 Akanaki umkhondo wokuphila; imikhondo yakhe iyaguquguquka, engazi.
Prov 5:7 Ngalokho, madodana ami, ngizweni, ningachezuki emazwini omlomo wami.
Prov 5:8 Dedisela kude naye indlela yakho, ungasondeli emnyango wendlu yakhe,
Prov 5:9 funa unike abanye udumo lwakho, naye ononya iminyaka yakho,
Prov 5:10 funa abezizwe basuthe ngamandla akho, umshikashika wakho ube sendlini yomfokazi,
Prov 5:11 uze ububule ekugcineni, lapho umzimba wakho nenyama yakho kuqediwe,
Prov 5:12 ngokuthi: “Yeka ukuzonda kwami ukulaywa nokudelela kwenhliziyo yami ukusolwa!
Prov 5:13 Angilalelanga izwi labafundisi bami, angibekanga indlebe yami kubo abangifundisayo.
Prov 5:14 Ngacishe ngaba sebubini bonke phakathi kwebandla nasemhlanganweni.”
Prov 5:15 Phuza amanzi emgodini wakho, amanzi agobhozayo emthonjeni wakho.
