Prov 5:16 Imithombo iyaphalala ngaphandle yini, nemifula yamanzi ezigcawini, na?
Prov 5:17 Mayibe ngeyakho wena wedwa, ingabi ngeyabafokazi kanye nawe.
Prov 5:18 Mawubusiswe umthombo wakho, uthokoze ngomfazi wobusha bakho.
Prov 5:19 Uyindluzelekazi ethandayo negogokazi elihle; amabele akhe mawakudelise ngesikhathi sonke, weqiwe njalo luthando lwakhe.
Prov 5:20 Ubuyakweqelwani ngowesifazane ondindayo, ndodana yami, ugone isifuba somfokazi, na?
Prov 5:21 Ngokuba izindlela zomuntu ziphambi kwamehlo kaNkulunkulu; uyenza yonke imikhondo yakhe ukuba ilingane.
Prov 5:22 Omubi uyakubanjwa ngububi bakhe, abhajwe ngezintambo zezono zakhe.
Prov 5:23 Uyakufa yena ngokuswela ukulaywa, nangobuningi bobuwula bakhe uyakuduka.
Prov 6:1 Ndodana yami, uma uyisibambiso somakhelwane wakho, uma uxhawulene nomfokazi,
Prov 6:2 ucushiwe ngamazwi omlomo wakho, ubanjiwe ngamazwi omlomo wakho,
Prov 6:3 yenza lokhu phela, ndodana yami, uzophule, lokhu ungene esandleni somakhelwane wakho: khothama phambi kwakhe, umncengisise.
Prov 6:4 Unganiki amehlo akho ubuthongo, nezinkophe zakho ukozela.
Prov 6:5 Zophule njengensephe kumzingeli nanjengenyoni esandleni somthiyi wezinyoni.
Prov 6:6 Yana entuthwaneni, vilandini, ubone izindlela zayo, uhlakaniphe,
Prov 6:7 yona ethi ingenamahluleli, nambonisi, nambusi,
Prov 6:8 ilungisa nokho ehlobo isinkwa sayo, ibuthe ngesikhathi sokuvuna ukudla kwayo.
Prov 6:9 Uyakulala kuze kube nini, vilandini? Uyakuvuka nini ebuthongweni bakho na?
Prov 6:10 Ubuthongo obuncane, ukozela okuncane, ukusonga izandla kancane kuze kulalwe,
Prov 6:11 bese kuthi ubumpofu bakho bufike njengomhambuma, nokuswela kwakho njengomuntu wesihlangu.
Prov 6:12 Umuntu omubi, umuntu wokona, nguye ohamba nomlomo ophambeneyo,
Prov 6:13 oqwayiza amehlo, eshudula ngezinyawo zakhe, ekhomba ngeminwe.
Prov 6:14 Ubuphoxo busenhliziyweni yakhe; uceba okubi ngesikhathi sonke; ususa ukuxabana.
Prov 6:15 Ngalokho ingozi yakhe iyakufika ngokuzumayo; ngokuphazima kweso uyakwaphulwa, kungabikho ukuphiliswa.
Prov 6:16 Kukhona izinto eziyisithupha azizondayo uJehova, yebo, eziyisikhombisa eziyizinengiso emphefumulweni wakhe:
Prov 6:17 amehlo azidlayo, nolimi lwamanga, nezandla ezichitha igazi elingenacala,
Prov 6:18 nenhliziyo eceba imicabango emibi, nezinyawo ezishesha ukugijimela ebubini,
Prov 6:19 nofakazi wamanga ophafuza inkohliso, obanga ukuxabana phakathi kwabazalwane.
Prov 6:20 Ndodana yami, gcina umyalo kayihlo, ungawushiyi umthetho kanyoko.
Prov 6:21 Yibophe enhliziyweni yakho njalo, uyithekeleze entanyeni yakho.
Prov 6:22 Mayikuhole ekuhambeni kwakho, ikulondoloze ekulaleni kwakho, ikhulume kuwe ekuvukeni kwakho.
Prov 6:23 Ngokuba imiyalo iyisibani, nomthetho ungukukhanya, nokusola ngokulaya kuyindlela yokuphila,
Prov 6:24 ukuze ugcinwe kowesifazane omubi, nasekuthopheni kolimi lowesifazane ondindayo.
Prov 6:25 Ungakhanuki ubuhle bakhe enhliziyweni yakho, angakubambi ngezinkophe zakhe.
Prov 6:26 Ngokuba intengo yowesifazane oyisiphingi iyiqebelengwane lesinkwa, kepha umfazi womuntu uzingela umphefumulo onqabileyo.
Prov 6:27 Umuntu angaphatha umlilo esifubeni sakhe, izingubo zakhe zingashi, na?
Prov 6:28 Umuntu angahamba phezu kwamalahle avuthayo, izinyawo zakhe zingahanguki, na?
Prov 6:29 Unjalo yena ongena kumkamakhelwane: akuyikuthiwa ongenacala noma yimuphi omthintileyo.
Prov 6:30 Abamdeleli yini oyisela ukuthi uyeba ukuba azisuthise lapho elambile na?
Prov 6:31 Uma efunyanwa, uyakubuyisa kasikhombisa, anikeze yonke impahla yendlu yakhe.
Prov 6:32 Ophinga nowesifazane akanakho ukuqonda; wenza lokho okuchitha umphefumulo wakhe.
Prov 6:33 Uyakuthola imivimbo nehlazo, nenhlamba yakhe ayiyikwesulwa.
Prov 6:34 Ngokuba isikhwele sendoda singukufutheka; ayiyikuyeka ngosuku lokuphindisela.
Prov 6:35 Ayiyikunaka neze ihlawulo; ayaneliswa, noma uphana ngezipho eziningi.
Prov 7:1 Ndodana yami, gcina amazwi ami, uzibekelele imiyalo yami.
Prov 7:2 Gcina imiyalo yami, uphile, nomthetho wami njengenhlamvu yeso lakho.
Prov 7:3 Yibophe eminweni yakho, uyilobe esibhebheni senhliziyo yakho.
Prov 7:4 Yisho kukho ukuhlakanipha: “Ungudadewethu,” ubize ukuqonda ngokuthi owazana nawe,
Prov 7:5 ukuze bakugcine kowesifazane ondindayo, kumfokazi owenza bushelezi amazwi akhe.
Prov 7:6 Ngokuba efasiteleni lendlu yami ngalunguza eheleni lami,
Prov 7:7 ngabheka phakathi kwabangenalwazi, ngabona phakathi kwabasha insizwa engenakuqonda,
Prov 7:8 edlula esitaladini eduze negumbi lakhe. iya endleleni yendlu yakhe,
Prov 7:9 sekuhwelela kusihlwa, esigayegayeni sobusuku nobumnyama.
Prov 7:10 Bheka, isihlangabezwa ngowesifazane; izingubo zakhe zingezesifebe, enobuqili enhliziyweni.
Prov 7:11 Uyanyakaza engenakuthula; izinyawo zakhe azihlali endlini yakhe;
Prov 7:12 manje usemigwaqweni, nangu usezigcawini, uqamekela emagumbini onke.
Prov 7:13 Useyayibamba, uyayanga; uthwala amehlo, uthi kuyo:
Prov 7:14 “Imihlatshelo yeminikelo yokuthula yayingifanele; namuhla sengigcwalisile izithembiso zami.
Prov 7:15 Ngalokho ngiphumile ukukuhlangabeza ukuba ngifunisise ubuso bakho; sengikutholile.
Prov 7:16 Ngendlele umbhede wami ngezindwangu zokumboza, nelineni elinemishwe laseGibithe.
Prov 7:17 Ngifafazile umbhede wami ngemure, nangomhlaba, nangokinamona.
Prov 7:18 Woza sizanelise ngothando kuze kuse, sijabule ngokuthandana.
Prov 7:19 Ngokuba indoda yami ayikho ekhaya; ihambile uhambo olude;
Prov 7:20 yaphatha isikhwama semali ngesandla sayo; iyakubuyela ekhaya ngosuku lokuhlangana kwenyanga.”
Prov 7:21 Uyamphambukisa ngamazwi akhe amaningi amahle; ngokuthopha kwezindebe zakhe uyamyenga.
Prov 7:22 Uyamlandela masinyane njengenkabi iya ekuhlatshweni nanjengamaketanga ehlela isiboshwa esiyisiwula,
Prov 7:23 umcibisholo uze uhlabe isibindi sakhe njengenyoni isheshela ogibeni, ingazi ukuthi lubekelwe ukuphila kwayo.
Prov 7:24 Ngalokho, bantwana, ngizweni, nilalele amazwi omlomo wami.
Prov 7:25 Inhliziyo yakho mayingaphambukeli ezindleleni zakhe, ungahambi emikhondweni yakhe.
Prov 7:26 Ngokuba uwisile phansi abaningi abalimeleyo; ababuleweyo bakhe bayisixuku esikhulu.
Prov 7:27 Indlu yakhe iyindlela eya endawemi yabafileyo, yehlela emakamelweni okufa.
Prov 8:1 Ukuhlakanipha akumemezi yini, nokuqonda akukhiphi izwi lakho na?
Prov 8:2 Kumi esiqongweni sezindawo eziphakemeyo, ngasendleleni phakathi kwemikhondo.
Prov 8:3 Ngaseceleni kwamasango, ngasekungeneni komuzi, lapho kungenwa ngeminyango, kuyamemeza ngokuthi:
Prov 8:4 “Ngiyanibiza nina madoda; izwi lami likumadodana abantu.
Prov 8:5 Qondani ukuhlakanipha nina eningenalwazi; nani ziwula, manibe nenhliziyo eqondileyo.
Prov 8:6 Zwanini, ngokuba ngiyakulanda okukhulu; ukukhamisa kwezindebe zami kuyakuba ngokulungileyo.
Prov 8:7 Ngokuba umlomo wami uyakukhuluma iqiniso; ububi buyisinengiso ezindebeni zami.
Prov 8:8 Onke amazwi omlomo wami asekulungeni; akukho okuyisigwegwe nokuphambeneyo kuwo.
Prov 8:9 Aqondile onke koqondayo; alungile kothola ukwazi.
Prov 8:10 Yamukelani ukufundisa kwami kunesiliva, nokwazi kunegolide elikhethekileyo.
Prov 8:11 Ngokuba ukuhlakanipha kuhle kunamarubi, nakho konke okungafiswa akunakulinganiswa nakho.
Prov 8:12 Mina kuhlakanipha ngakhile ekuqondeni, ngithola ukwazi namasu.
Prov 8:13 Ukumesaba uJehova kungukuzonda okubi; ukuzidla, nokuzikhukhumeza, nendlela embi, nomlomo wobuphoxo, ngiyakuzonda.
Prov 8:14 Kimina kukhona ukululeka nempumelelo; ngingukuqonda, nginamandla.
Prov 8:15 Amakhosi abusa ngami, nababusi bamisa ukulunga.
Prov 8:16 Izikhulu zibusa ngami, namakhosana, bonke abahluleli bomhlaba.
Prov 8:17 Ngiyathanda abangithandayo; abangifunayo bayakungifumana.
Prov 8:18 Ingcebo nodumo kukimi, ukunotha okumiyo nokulunga.
Prov 8:19 Isithelo sami sihle kunegolide, kunegolide elicwengekileyo, nenzuzo yami kunesiliva elikhethekileyo.
Prov 8:20 Ngiyahamba endleleni yokulunga, phakathi kwemikhondo yokwahlulela,
Prov 8:21 ukuze ngenze abangithandayo badle ifa lemfuyo, ngigcwalise izindlu zabo zengcebo.
Prov 8:22 “UJehova wangidala ngingukuqala kwendlela yakhe ngaphambi kwemisebenzi yamandulo.
Prov 8:23 Ngamiswa kwaphakade kwasekuqaleni, umhlaba ungakabikho.
Prov 8:24 Lungakabikho utwa ngazalwa, ingakabikho imithombo egcwele amanzi.
Prov 8:25 Zingakasekelwa izintaba, namagquma engakabikho, ngazalwa,
Prov 8:26 engakawenzi umhlaba namasimu, nokuqala kothuli lwezwe.
Prov 8:27 Ekulungiseni kwakhe izulu ngangikhona, nasekudwebeni kwakhe umkhathi ebusweni botwa.
Prov 8:28 Lapho enza ukuba isibhakabhaka phezulu siqine, nemithombo yotwa iphuphume ngamandla,
Prov 8:29 lapho emisela ulwandle umncele, ukuze amanzi angeqi izwi lakhe, nalapho emisa izisekelo zomhlaba,
Prov 8:30 khona nganginaye ngiyingcweti yomsebenzi, ngiyintokozo yakhe imihla ngemihla, ngijabula phambi kwakhe isikhathi sonke,
Prov 8:31 ngijabula ezweni lomhlaba wakhe, intokozo yami ikanye namadodana abantu.
Prov 8:32 “Ngalokho, bantwana, ngizweni, ngokuba babusisiwe abagcina izindlela zami.
Prov 8:33 Yizwani ukulaya, nihlakaniphe, ningakwenqabi.
Prov 8:34 Ubusisiwe umuntu ongizwayo, elinda imihla ngemihla ngasemasangweni ami, ehlala ngasezinsikeni zeminyango yami.
Prov 8:35 Ngokuba ongifumanayo, ufumana ukuphila, azuze umusa kuJehova.
Prov 8:36 Ongangifumani uyona umphefumulo wakhe; bonke abangizondayo bathanda ukufa.”
Prov 9:1 Ukuhlakanipha kwakhile indlu yakho; kuzibazile izinsika zakho eziyisikhombisa.
Prov 9:2 Kuhlabile umhlatshelo, kuvubele iwayini lakho; futhi kulungisile itafula lakho.
Prov 9:3 Kuthumile izintombi zakho, kuyamema emagqumeni aphakemeyo omuzi, kuthi:
Prov 9:4 “Ongenalwazi makaphambukele lapha,” kongenangqondo kuthi:
Prov 9:5 “Wozani nidle isinkwa sami, niliphuze iwayini engilivubeleyo.
Prov 9:6 Yekani ubuwula, niphile, nihambe ngendlela yokuqonda.
Prov 9:7 “Osola isideleli uzithathela inhlamba; othethisa omubi uzitholela isisihla.
Prov 9:8 Ungathethisi isideleli, funa sikuzonde; thethisa isihlakaniphi, siyakukuthanda.
Prov 9:9 Siphe isihlakaniphi, siyakwanda ngokuhlakanipha; fundisa olungileyo, uyakwenezela emfundweni.
Prov 9:10 “Ukuqala kokuhlakanipha kungukumesaba uJehova, nokumazi oNgcwele kungukuqonda.
Prov 9:11 Ngokuba ngami izinsuku zakho ziyakuba ziningi, neminyaka yokuphila kwakho iyakwenezelwa kuwe.
Prov 9:12 Uma uhlakaniphile, uzihlakaniphele; uma udelela, uyakukuthwala wena wedwa.”
Prov 9:13 Ubuwula bungowesifazane oyisithutha onomsindo, ongazi lutho.
Prov 9:14 Uhlezi ngasemnyango wendlu yakhe esihlalweni ezindaweni eziphakemeyo zomuzi
Prov 9:15 ukuba ameme abadlula endleleni, abaqonda emikhondweni yabo, ngokuthi:
Prov 9:16 “Ongenalwazi makaphambukele lapha,” kongenangqondo uthi:
Prov 9:17 “Amanzi ebiweyo amnandi, nesinkwa sentukuso singesenamisayo.”
Prov 9:18 Kepha akazi ukuthi kuyizithunzi ezilapho nokuthi izimenywa zakhe zisezigodini zendawo yabafileyo.
Prov 10:1 Nazi izaga zikaSolomoni: Indodana ehlakaniphileyo ithokozisa uyise, kepha indodana eyisiwula ilusizi kunina.
Prov 10:2 Ingcebo yobubi ayisizi lutho, kepha ukulunga kophula ekufeni.
Prov 10:3 UJehova akavumi ukuba olungileyo alambe, kepha isifiso somubi uyasihlohloloza.
Prov 10:4 Isandla esinobudenge siveza ubumpofu, kepha isandla sokukhuthala siyacebisa.
Prov 10:5 Obutha ehlobo uyindodana ehlakaniphileyo; olele ubuthongo ngesikhathi sokuvuna uyindodana ehlazisayo.
Prov 10:6 Izibusiso zisekhanda lolungileyo, kepha umlomo wababi uyafihla ubudlwangudlwangu.
Prov 10:7 Ukukhunjulwa kolungileyo kubusisekile, kepha igama lababi liyabola.
Prov 10:8 Ohlakaniphile ngenhliziyo uyakwamukela imiyalo, kepha isiwula esiphoshozayo siyakuwiswa.
Prov 10:9 Ohamba ngobuqotho uhamba ngokulondeka, kepha ohlanekezela izindlela zakhe uyakwaziwa.
Prov 10:10 Oqwayiza iso ubanga usizi, kepha osola ubuso nobuso uveza ukuthula.
Prov 10:11 Umlomo wolungileyo ungumthombo wokuphila, kepha umlomo wababi ufihla ubudlwangudlwangu.
Prov 10:12 Inzondo iyabanga ukuxabana, kepha uthando luyasibekela iziphambeko zonke.
Prov 10:13 Ezindebeni zoqondileyo kufunyanwa ukuhlakanipha, kepha uswazi lungolomhlane wongenangqondo.
Prov 10:14 Abahlakaniphileyo bayabekelela ukwazi, kepha umlomo wesiwula uyincithakalo eseduze.
Prov 10:15 Imfuyo yesicebi ingumuzi waso onamandla; incithakalo yabampofu ingubumpofu babo.
Prov 10:16 Umsebenzi wolungileyo ungowokuphila; inzuzo yababi ingeyokona.
Prov 10:17 Onaka ukulaywa usendleleni yokuphila, kepha owenqaba ukusolwa uyaduka.
Prov 10:18 Ofihla inzondo unezindebe zamanga; ophumisa inhlebo uyisiwula.
Prov 10:19 Lapho amazwi emaningi khona, akuphuthi ukuphambeka; obamba umlomo wakhe uhlakaniphile.
Prov 10:20 Ulimi lolungileyo luyisiliva elikhethekileyo; ingqondo yababi iyinto encane.
Prov 10:21 Izindebe zolungileyo ziyondla abaningi, kepha iziwula ziyafa ngokuswela ingqondo.
Prov 10:22 Isibusiso sikaJehova siyacebisa; akenezeli usizi kuso.
Prov 10:23 Ukwenza okubi kunjengokudlala kuso isiwula; kunjalo ukuhlakanipha kumuntu onengqondo.
Prov 10:24 Akwesabayo omubi kuyamehlela, nabakufisayo abalungileyo bayakuphiwa.
Prov 10:25 Lapho sidlula isivunguvungu, akasekho omubi, kepha olungileyo uyisisekelo esingunaphakade.
Prov 10:26 Njengoviniga emazinyweni nomusi emehlweni, linjalo ivila kwabalithumileyo.
Prov 10:27 Ukumesaba uJehova kuyandisa izinsuku, kepha iminyaka yababi iyancishiswa.
Prov 10:28 Ithemba labalungileyo liyakuba yintokozo, kepha abakwethembayo ababi kuyakubhubha.
Prov 10:29 Indlela kaJehova iyinqaba kopheleleyo, kepha incithakalo ikubenzi bokona.
Prov 10:30 Olungileyo akayikunyakaziswa kuze kube phakade, kepha ababi abayikuhlala ezweni.
Prov 10:31 Umlomo wolungileyo uyathela ukuhlakanipha, kepha ulimi oluphambeneyo luyakunqunywa.
Prov 10:32 Izindebe zolungileyo ziyakwazi okuhle, kepha umlomo wababi okuphambeneyo.
Prov 11:1 Isilinganiso esikhohlisayo siyisinengiso kuJehova, kepha isisindo esiyiso siyintokozo yakhe.
Prov 11:2 Lapho kufika ukuziqhenya, kufika nehlazo; kepha kwabathobekileyo kukhona ukuhlakanipha.
Prov 11:3 Ukuphelela kwabaqotho kuyabahola, kepha ukuphambanisa kwabambuluzayo kuyabachitha.
Prov 11:4 Ingcebo ayisizi ngosuku lolaka, kepha ukulunga kophula ekufeni.
Prov 11:5 Ukulunga kopheleleyo kuqondisa indlela yakhe, kepha omubi uyakuwa ngobubi bakhe.
Prov 11:6 Ukulunga kwabaqotho kuyabophula, kepha abambuluzayo babanjwa ezifisweni zabo.
Prov 11:7 Akwethembayo umuntu omubi kuyaphela ekufeni kwakhe, nethemba lobubi liyabhubha.
Prov 11:8 Olungileyo uyakhululwa osizini, kepha omubi ungena esikhundleni sakhe.
Prov 11:9 Ngomlomo umuntu ongenaNkulunkulu ubulala umakhelwane wakhe, kepha abalungileyo bayakhululwa ngokwazi.
Prov 11:10 Nxa abalungileyo behlezi kahle, umuzi uyathokoza; lapho bebhubha, kukhona ukwenanela.
Prov 11:11 Ngesibusiso sabaqotho umuzi uyaphakanyiswa, kepha ngomlomo wababi uyachithwa.
Prov 11:12 Odelela umakhelwane wakhe akanakuhlakanipha, kepha umuntu onengqondo uyazithulela.
Prov 11:13 Ohamba encetheza uyambula izimfihlakalo, kepha othembekile emoyeni uyayisibekela indaba.
Prov 11:14 Lapho kungekho iziluleko, abantu bayawa, kepha lapho kukhona abeluleki abaningi, lapho kukhona ukuphumelela.
Prov 11:15 Uyahlupheka nokuhlupheka omela umfokazi, kepha ozonda ukunika isibambiso ulondekile.
Prov 11:16 Owesifazane onomusa uzuza udumo, nezidlwangudlwangu zizuza ingcebo.
Prov 11:17 Umuntu onesihawu wenzela okuhle umphefumulo wakhe, kepha ononya uhlupha inyama yakhe.
Prov 11:18 Omubi uthola inzuzo yenkohliso, kepha ohlwanyela ukulunga unomvuzo oqinisekileyo.
Prov 11:19 Oqinile ekulungeni uyakuphila, kepha olandela okubi, kuyakuba ngukufa kwakhe.
Prov 11:20 Abanhliziyo ephambeneyo bayisinengiso kuJehova. kepha abapheleleyo endleleni yabo bayintokozo kuye.
Prov 11:21 Impela omubi akayekwa, kepha inzalo yabalungileyo iyakhululwa.
Prov 11:22 Njengendandatho yegolide empumulweni yengulube, unjalo owesifazane omuhle ongenangqondo.
Prov 11:23 Isifiso sabalungileyo singokuhle kuphela; ithemba lababi lilulaka.
Prov 11:24 Ukhona ohlakazayo; nokho uyenezelwa kakhulu; kepha ogodla kunokufaneleyo ubangelwa ukuswela kuphela.
Prov 11:25 Umphefumulo ophanayo uyakukhuluphaliswa; ophuzisayo uyakuphuziswa naye.
Prov 11:26 Ogodla amabele, abantu bayamqalekisa, kepha isibusiso siyakuba sekhanda lothengisa ngawo.
Prov 11:27 Ofuna okuhle ufuna okwamukelekayo, kepha ofuna okubi, kuyakumehlela.
Prov 11:28 Owethemba ingcebo yakhe uyakuwa, kepha abalungileyo bayakuhluma njengamaqabunga aluhlaza.
Prov 11:29 Okhathaza indlu yakhe uyakudla ifa lomoya, nesiwula siyakuba yinceku yonenhliziyo ehlakaniphileyo.
Prov 11:30 Isithelo solungileyo singumuthi wokuphila, nohlakaniphileyo uyazuza imiphefumulo.
Prov 11:31 Bheka, olungileyo uyavuzwa emhlabeni; kakhulu kangakanani omubi nesoni.
Prov 12:1 Othanda ukulaywa uthanda ukwazi; ozonda ukusolwa uyisiwula.
Prov 12:2 Omuhle uthola umusa kuJehova, kepha umuntu wamacebo uyamlahla.
Prov 12:3 Umuntu akanakuma ngobubi, kepha impande yabalungileyo ayiyikunyakaziswa.
Prov 12:4 Owesifazane okhutheleyo ungumqhele kuyo indoda yakhe, kepha ohlazisayo unjengokubola kwamathambo ayo.
Prov 12:5 Imicabango yabalungileyo ingeyokwahlulela, kepha iziluleko zababi ziyinkohliso.
Prov 12:6 Amazwi ababi aqamekela igazi, kepha umlomo wabaqotho uyabophula.
Prov 12:7 Ababi bayachithwa, bangabikho, kepha indlu yabalungileyo iyakuma.
Prov 12:8 Umuntu uyadunyiswa ngokokuhlakanipha kwakhe, kepha ophambene ngenhliziyo uyadelelwa.
Prov 12:9 Odelelwayo eyinceku udlula ozidumisayo eswele ukudla.
Prov 12:10 Olungileyo uyakunaka ukuphila kwesilwane sakhe, kepha isihhe sababi silunya.
Prov 12:11 Olima insimu yakhe uyakusutha ngokudla, kepha olandela amayiyane akanangqondo.
Prov 12:12 Ishinga lifisa impango yababi, kepha impande yabalungileyo iyathela.
Prov 12:13 Ngokuphambeka kwezindebe kukhona ugibe lomubi, kepha olungileyo uyaphuma ekuhluphekeni.
Prov 12:14 Umuntu uyasutha ngokuhle ngesithelo somlomo wakhe, nemisebenzi yezandla zomuntu iyabuyela kuye.
Prov 12:15 Indlela yesiwula ilungile emehlweni aso, kepha ohlakaniphileyo ulalela iziluleko.
Prov 12:16 Ukukhathazeka kwesiwula kuyaziwa ngosuku, kepha oqondileyo uyasibekela ihlazo.
Prov 12:17 Ophefumula iqiniso ulanda ngokulunga, kepha ufakazi wamanga ngenkohliso.
Prov 12:18 Bakhona abaphahluka njengokuhlaba kwenkemba, kepha izilimi zabahlakaniphileyo ziyimpiliso.
Prov 12:19 Indebe yeqiniso iyakuma kuze kube phakade, kepha ulimi lwamanga lungolomzuzwana nje.
Prov 12:20 Inkohliso isezinhliziyweni zabaceba okubi, kepha abaluleka ukuthula, kubona kukhona intokozo.
Prov 12:21 Olungileyo akayikwehlelwa nangokukodwa okubi, kepha ababi bayakugcwala ububi.
Prov 12:22 Izindebe zamanga ziyisinengiso kuJehova, kepha abenza iqiniso bayintokozo yakhe.
Prov 12:23 Umuntu oqondileyo uyafihla ukwazi, kepha izinhliziyo zeziwula zimemeza ubuwula.
Prov 12:24 Isandla sabakhutheleyo siyakubusa, kepha izidenge ziyakuphoqelwa umsebenzi.
Prov 12:25 Ukukhathazeka enhliziyweni yomuntu kuyayithobisa, kepha izwi elihle liyayithokozisa.
Prov 12:26 Olungileyo ungumholi womakhelwane wakhe, kepha indlela yababi iyabadukisa.
Prov 12:27 Isidenge asiyosi inyamazane yaso, kepha imfuyo enqabileyo ingeyokhutheleyo.
Prov 12:28 Endleleni yokulunga kukhona ukuphila, nalapho umkhondo wakho udlula khona, akukho ukufa.
Prov 13:1 Indodana ehlakaniphileyo iyalaywa nguyise, kepha isideleli asilaleli ukukhuzwa.
Prov 13:2 Umuntu uyadla okuhle ngesithelo somlomo wakhe, kepha umphefumulo wabambuluzayo uyadla ubudlwangudlwangu.
Prov 13:3 Olinda umlomo wakhe ugcina ukuphila kwakhe; okhamisa izindebe zakhe uyakuba nencithakalo.
Prov 13:4 Umphefumulo wevila uyafisa, ungatholi lutho, kepha imiphefumulo yabakhutheleyo iyakhuluphaliswa.
Prov 13:5 Olungileyo uyazonda amazwi amanga, kepha omubi ubanga amahloni, ahlazise.
Prov 13:6 Ukulunga kuyamlondoloza ondlela yakhe iphelele, kepha ububi buyachitha isoni.
Prov 13:7 Kukhona ozishaya ocebileyo, engenalutho kodwa; kukhona ozishaya ompofu, enemfuyo enkulu.
Prov 13:8 Ihlawulo lokuphila komuntu liyingcebo yakhe, kepha ompofu akezwa ukukhuzwa.
Prov 13:9 Ukukhanya kwabalungileyo kuyathokoza, kepha izibani zababi ziyacimeka.
Prov 13:10 Ngokuziqhenya kuvela ukuxabana kuphela, kepha kwabalulekwayo kukhona ukuhlakanipha.
Prov 13:11 Imfuyo etholakala kalula iyancipha, kepha obutha kancane kancane uyandiselwa.
Prov 13:12 Ithemba elilitshazisiweyo ligulisa inhliziyo; isifiso esigcwalisiweyo singumuthi wokuphila.
Prov 13:13 Odelela izwi uzehlisela ukubhujiswa, kepha owesaba imiyalo uyakuvuzwa.
Prov 13:14 Ukufundisa kohlakaniphileyo kungumthombo wokuphila, ukuze kudedwe ezihibeni zokufa.
Prov 13:15 Ukuqonda kahle kuveza umusa, kepha indlela yabambuluzayo ilukhuni.
Prov 13:16 Bonke abaqondileyo basebenza ngokwazi, kepha isiwula sihlakaza ubuwula.
Prov 13:17 Isithunywa esibi siwela ebubini, kepha isigijimi esithembekileyo siyimpiliso.
Prov 13:18 Ubumpofu nehlazo kukuye onqaba ukulaywa, kepha onaka ukusolwa uyadunyiswa.
Prov 13:19 Isifiso esigcwalisiweyo simnandi emphefumulweni, kepha ukudeda ebubini kuyisinengiso kuzo iziwula.
Prov 13:20 Ohamba nabahlakaniphileyo uyakuhlakanipha, kepha umngane weziwula uyakushoshozelwa yizo.
Prov 13:21 Ububi bulandela izoni, kepha abalungileyo bavuzwa ngokuhle.
Prov 13:22 Olungileyo ushiyela abantwana babantwana bakhe ifa, kepha ingcebo yesoni ibekelelwa olungileyo.
Prov 13:23 Emqathweni wabampofu kukhona ukudla okuningi, kepha kukhona okuchithwa ngenxa yokungalungi.
Prov 13:24 Oyeka uswazi uyazonda indodana yakhe, kepha oyithandayo uyayilaya ngesineke.
Prov 13:25 Olungileyo uyadla uze usuthe umphefumulo wakhe, kepha isisu sababi siyaswela.
Prov 14:1 Owesifazane ohlakaniphileyo uyakha indlu yakhe, kepha oyisiwula uyayidiliza ngezandla zakhe.
Prov 14:2 Ohamba ngobuqotho uyamesaba uJehova, kepha ophambanisa izindlela zakhe uyamdelela.
Prov 14:3 Emlonyeni wesiwula kukhona induku yokuziqhenya kwaso, kepha izindebe zabahlakaniphileyo ziyabalondoloza.
Prov 14:4 Lapho kungekho khona izinkomo, umkhombe awunalutho, kepha inzuzo inkulu ngamandla ezinkabi.
Prov 14:5 Ufakazi oqinisileyo akaqambi amanga, kepha ufakazi ongaqinisile uyaphafuza amanga.
Prov 14:6 Isideleli siyafuna ukuhlakanipha singakutholi, kepha ukwazi kulula koqondayo.
Prov 14:7 Suka phambi komuntu oyisiwula, ngokuba lapho awuboni izindebe zokwazi.
Prov 14:8 Ukuhlakanipha koqondileyo kungukuqonda indlela yakhe, kepha ubuwula beziwula buyinkohliso.
Prov 14:9 Iziwula ziyadelela umnikelo wecala, kepha phakathi kwabaqotho wamukelekile.
Prov 14:10 Inhliziyo iyazi ubumunyu bayo; umfokazi akahlanganyeli intokozo yayo.
Prov 14:11 Indlu yababi iyachithwa, kepha itende labaqotho liyahluma.
Prov 14:12 Kukhona indlela ebonakala sengathi ilungile kumuntu, kepha ukuphela kwayo kuyindlela yokufa.
Prov 14:13 Nasekuhlekeni inhliziyo inobuhlungu, nokuphela kwentokozo kulusizi.
Prov 14:14 Ohlehla ngenhliziyo uyasutha ngezindlela zakhe, nomuntu omuhle ngemisebenzi yakhe.
Prov 14:15 Ongenalwazi uyakholwa ngamazwi onke, kepha oqondileyo uyaqaphela ukunyathela kwakhe.
Prov 14:16 Ohlakaniphileyo uyesaba, udeda ebubini, kepha isiwula siyaqhosha, singanaki lutho.
Prov 14:17 Isififane siyenza ubuwula, kepha umuntu wamasu unokuthula.
Prov 14:18 Abangenalwazi badla ifa lobuwula, kepha abaqondileyo baqheliswa ngokwazi.
Prov 14:19 Ababi bakhothama phambi kwabalungileyo, namashinga ngasemasangweni abalungileyo.
Prov 14:20 Ompofu uyazondwa nangumakhelwane wakhe, kepha ocebileyo unabaningi abamthandayo.
Prov 14:21 Odelela umakhelwane wakhe uyona, kepha onomusa kwabampofu ubusisiwe.
Prov 14:22 Angithi bayaduka abaceba okubi na? Umusa neqiniso kuyakuba ngokwabaqamba okuhle.
Prov 14:23 Wonke umshikashika unenzuzo, kepha amazwi omlomo abanga ukuswela kuphela.
Prov 14:24 Umqhele wabahlakaniphileyo uyingcebo yabo, umgexo weziwula ungubuwula.
Prov 14:25 Ufakazi oqinisileyo uyophula imiphefumulo, kepha ophafuza amanga unenkohliso.
Prov 14:26 Ekumesabeni uJehova kukhona ithemba elinamandla; abantwana bakhe bayakuba nesiphephelo.
Prov 14:27 Ukumesaba uJehova kungumthombo wokuphila, ukuze kudedwe ezingibeni zokufa.
Prov 14:28 Udumo lwenkosi lungobuningi babantu, kepha ukuswela abantu kungukuchithwa kwesikhulu.
Prov 14:29 Owephuza ukuthukuthela unokuqonda okuningi, kepha isififane siyaphakamisa ubuwula.
Prov 14:30 Inhliziyo ezolileyo ingukuphila kwenyama, kepha umhawu ungukubola kwamathambo.
Prov 14:31 Ocindezela ompofu usola uMenzi wakhe, kepha onomusa koswelayo uyamdumisa.
Prov 14:32 Omubi uwiswa phansi ngobubi bakhe, kepha olungileyo unethemba ekufeni kwakhe.
Prov 14:33 Ukuhlakanipha kuhlezi enhliziyweni yonokuqonda, kepha phakathi kweziwula akwaziwa.
Prov 14:34 Ukulunga kuyaphakamisa isizwe, kepha ukona kuyihlazo kubantu.
Prov 14:35 Isisa senkosi sikuyo inceku enokuqonda, kepha intukuthelo yayo iyakuba kwehlazisayo.
Prov 15:1 Impendulo ethambileyo iyabuyisa ukufutheka, kepha izwi elilukhuni livusa ulaka.
Prov 15:2 Ulimi lwabahlakaniphileyo luveza kahle ukwazi, kepha umlomo weziwula uphafuza ubuwula.
Prov 15:3 Amehlo kaJehova asezindaweni zonke; aqaphela ababi nabahle.
Prov 15:4 Ulimi oluthulayo lungumuthi wokuphila, kepha ukuphambanisa kwalo kungukuchotshozwa komoya.
Prov 15:5 Isiwula siyadelela ukulaya kukayise, kepha onaka ukusolwa uyathola ukuqonda.
Prov 15:6 Endlini yolungileyo kukhona ingcebo eningi, kepha enzuzweni yababi kukhona ukuhlupheka.
Prov 15:7 Izindebe zabahlakaniphileyo ziyasakaza ukwazi, kepha izinhliziyo zeziwula azinjalo.
Prov 15:8 Umhlatshelo wababi uyisinengiso kuJehova, kepha umkhuleko wabaqotho uyintokozo yakhe.
Prov 15:9 Indlela yababi iyisinengiso kuJehova, kepha uyamthanda olandela ukulunga.
Prov 15:10 Ukulaywa kukhulu koyishiya indlela; ozonda ukusolwa uyakufa.
Prov 15:11 Indawo yabafileyo nokubhubha kuphambi kukaJehova; kakhulu kangakanani izinhliziyo zabantwana babantu.
Prov 15:12 Isideleli asithandi ukusolwa; asiyi kwabahlakaniphileyo.
Prov 15:13 Inhliziyo ethokozayo yenza ubuso bube buhle, kepha ngosizi lwenhliziyo uyachotshozwa umoya.
Prov 15:14 Inhliziyo yoqondileyo iyafuna ukwazi, kepha umlomo weziwula uyadla ubuwula.
Prov 15:15 Zonke izinsuku zohluphekayo zimbi, kepha onhliziyo yakhe yenamile unedili njalo.
Prov 15:16 Okuncane kanye nokumesaba uJehova kungcono kunengcebo eningi kanye nokukhathazeka.
Prov 15:17 Isidlo semifino lapho kukhona uthando singcono kunenkabi ekhuluphalisiweyo kanye nenzondo.
Prov 15:18 Umuntu ofuthayo uyavusa ukuxabana, kepha owephuza ukuthukuthela uthulisa ingxabano.
Prov 15:19 Indlela yevila injengothango lobobe, kepha umkhondo wabakhutheleyo ungumendo.
Prov 15:20 Indodana ehlakaniphileyo iyajabulisa uyise, kepha umuntu oyisiwula uyadelela unina.
Prov 15:21 Ubuwula buyintokozo kongenangqondo, kepha umuntu oqondileyo uyaqondisa ukuhamba kwakhe.
Prov 15:22 Lapho kungekho khona ukululekana, amasu ayachitheka, kepha ngobuningi babeluleki ayakuma.
Prov 15:23 Umuntu uyathokoza ngokuphendula komlomo wakhe, nezwi ngesikhathi salo lihle kangakanani!
Prov 15:24 Kohlakaniphileyo indlela yokuphila iya phezulu ukuba adede endaweni yabafileyo phansi.
Prov 15:25 Indlu yabaziqhenyayo uJehova uyayisiphula, kepha uyamisa umkhawulo womfelokazi.
Prov 15:26 Amacebo amabi ayisinengiso kuJehova, kepha amazwi acwebileyo ayamenamisa.
Prov 15:27 Ohahela inzuzo uhlupha indlu yakhe, kepha ozonda imivuzo uyakuphila.
Prov 15:28 Inhliziyo yolungileyo iyacabanga ukuphendula, kepha imilomo yababi iyaphafuza izinto ezimbi.
Prov 15:29 UJehova ukude nababi, kepha uyezwa imikhuleko yabalungileyo.
Prov 15:30 Ukukhanya kwamehlo kuyathokozisa inhliziyo, nezindaba ezinhle ziyanonisa amathambo.
Prov 15:31 Indlebe elalela ukusola kokuphila iyakuhlala phakathi kwabahlakaniphileyo.
Prov 15:32 Onqaba ukulaywa udelela umphefumulo wakhe, kepha olalela ukusolwa uzuza ingqondo.
Prov 15:33 Ukumesaba uJehova kungukulaywa kokuhlakanipha; ukuthobeka kuyandulela udumo.
Prov 16:1 Umuntu unamasu enhliziyweni, kepha impendulo yolimi ivela kuJehova.
Prov 16:2 Zonke izindlela zomuntu zimhlophe emehlweni akhe, kepha uJehova uyalinganisa imimoya.
Prov 16:3 Gingqela kuJehova imisebenzi yakho, ukuze kuqiniswe amasu akho.
Prov 16:4 UJehova wenzile konke kube nomgomo wakho; yebo, nomubi umenzele usuku olubi.
Prov 16:5 Bonke abazidlayo ngenhliziyo bayisinengiso kuJehova; impela abayikuyekwa.
Prov 16:6 Ngomusa neqiniso ukona kuyahlangulwa, nangokumesaba uJehova kudedwa ebubini.
Prov 16:7 Lapho izindlela zomuntu zimthokozisa uJehova, uzenza nezitha zakhe ukuba zihlalisane kahle naye.
Prov 16:8 Okuncane kanye nokulunga kungcono kunenzuzo enkulu kanye nokungalungi.
Prov 16:9 Inhliziyo yomuntu iceba indlela, kepha uJehova uyaqondisa izinyathelo zakhe.
Prov 16:10 Izimpendulo zikaNkulunkulu zisezindebeni zenkosi; umlomo wayo awuyikuphambuka ekwahluleleni.
Prov 16:11 Ukulinganisa nesilinganiso esilungileyo kungokukaJehova; zonke izisindo zasesikhwameni zingumsebenzi wakhe.
Prov 16:12 Ukwenza okubi kuyisinengiso emakhosini, ngokuba isihlalo sobukhosi simiswa ngokulunga.
Prov 16:13 Izindebe ezilungileyo ziyintokozo yamakhosi; amazwi abaqotho ayawathanda.
Prov 16:14 Intukuthelo yenkosi injengezithunywa zokufa, kepha umuntu ohlakaniphileyo uyayidambisa.
Prov 16:15 Ekukhanyeni kobuso benkosi kukhona ukuphila, nesisa sayo sinjengefu lemvula yamuva.
Prov 16:16 Kungcono kangakanani ukuzuza ukuhlakanipha kunegolide; yebo, ukuzuza ukuqonda nga kukhethwa kunesiliva.
Prov 16:17 Umendo wabaqotho ungukudeda ebubini; oqaphela indlela yakhe ulondoloza umphefumulo wakhe.
Prov 16:18 Ukuzidla kuyandulela ukubhujiswa, nomoya oziqhenyayo wandulela ukuwa.
Prov 16:19 Kungcono ukuba nomoya othobekileyo kanye nabathobekileyo, kunokwabelana impango nabazidlayo.
Prov 16:20 Onakekela izwi uyakufumana okuhle, nowethembayo kuJehova ubusisiwe.
Prov 16:21 Ohlakaniphile ngenhliziyo uyakubizwa ngokuthi oqondileyo, nobumnandi bezindebe buyandisa imfundiso.
Prov 16:22 Ukuqonda kungumthombo wokuphila konakho, kepha ubuwula bungukulaywa kweziwula.
Prov 16:23 Inhliziyo yohlakaniphileyo iyafundisa umlomo wakhe, yenezele imfundiso ezindebeni zakhe.
Prov 16:24 Amazwi amahle anjengamakhekheba oju; amnandi emphefumulweni, ayimpiliso emathanjeni.
Prov 16:25 Kukhona indlela eqondile phambi komuntu, kepha ukuphela kwayo kuyizindlela zokufa.
Prov 16:26 Iphango lesisebenzi liyasisebenzela, ngokuba umlomo waso uyasiqhuba.
Prov 16:27 Umuntu omubi uphanda okubi, nasezindebeni zakhe kunjengomlilo ohlangulayo.
Prov 16:28 Umuntu ophambeneyo usakaza ukuxabana, nomncethezi wahlukanisa abahlobo.
Prov 16:29 Umuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu uyenga umakhelwane wakhe, amhambise endleleni engenhle.
Prov 16:30 Ocimeza amehlo akhe uceba okuphambanisayo, noluma izindebe zakhe ufeza okubi.
Prov 16:31 Ubumpunga bungumqhele wodumo; bufumaniswa endleleni yokulunga.
Prov 16:32 Owephuza ukuthukuthela muhle kuneqhawe, nobusa umoya wakhe kunonqoba umuzi.
Prov 16:33 Inkatho yenzelwa emathangeni, kepha ukwahlulela kwayo kungokukaJehova.
Prov 17:1 Umthamo owomileyo kanye nokuthula ungcono kunendlu egcwele okuhlatshiweyo kanye nokuxabana.
Prov 17:2 Inceku eqondileyo iyabusa phezu kwendodana ehlazisayo; iyakudla ifa phakathi kwezelamani.
Prov 17:3 Ukhamba lokuncibilikisela lungolwesiliva, nesithando ngesegolide, kepha ovivinya izinhliziyo nguJehova.
Prov 17:4 Owenza okubi uqaphela izindebe zokona, nomqambimanga ubeka indlebe olimini olubi.
Prov 17:5 Oklolodela ompofu usola uMenzi wakhe, nothokoza ngengozi akayikuyekwa.
Prov 17:6 Abantwana babantwana bangumqhele wabadala, nodumo lwabantwana lungoyise.
Prov 17:7 Izindebe ezinobungcweti azifanele isiwula; kakhulu kangakanani umlomo wamanga isikhulu.
Prov 17:8 Isipho sinjengetshe elinqabileyo emehlweni omninilo: noma ebhekaphi, uyaphumelela.
Prov 17:9 Osibekela isiphambeko ufuna uthando, kepha onokondisa indaba wahlukanisa abahlobo.
Prov 17:10 Insolo ingena koqondileyo kunemivimbo eyikhulu koyisiwula.
Prov 17:11 Omubi ufuna ukuhlubuka kuphela; ngalokho kuyakuthunyelwa kuye isithunywa esinonya.
Prov 17:12 Umuntu makahlangane nebhere elaphuciwe amawundlu alo kunesiwula ebuwuleni baso.
Prov 17:13 Ophindisela okuhle ngokubi, ububi abuyikusuka endlini yakhe.
Prov 17:14 Ukuqala kokuxabana kunjengokuvula amanzi; ngalokho yeka inkani, ingakashisi.
Prov 17:15 Othetha omubi nolahla olungileyo bayisinengiso kuJehova bobabili.
Prov 17:16 Yini ukuba kube yimali esandleni sesiwula ukuthenga ukuhlakanipha, kungekho ukuqonda, na?
Prov 17:17 Umngane uthanda ngezikhathi zonke, nomzalwane uzalwa ekuhluphekeni.
Prov 17:18 Umuntu oswela ingqondo unikana nomunye izandla, abe yisibambiso phambi komakhelwane wakhe.
Prov 17:19 Othanda ukuxabana uthanda isiphambeko; owenza umnyango wakhe ukuba uphakame ufuna ukubhujiswa.
Prov 17:20 Onenhliziyo ephambeneyo akafumani okuhle; onolimi oluyisigwegwe uwela engozini.
Prov 17:21 Ozala isiwula kulusizi kuye; uyise wesiwula akathokozi.
Prov 17:22 Inhliziyo eyenamileyo iyikhambi elihle, kepha umoya owaphukileyo uyomisa amathambo.
Prov 17:23 Omubi uyamukela umvuzo okhishwa esifubeni ukuba aphambukise izindlela zokwahlulela.
Prov 17:24 Ukuhlakanipha kuphambi koqondileyo, kepha amehlo esiwula asemikhawulweni yomhlaba.
Prov 17:25 Indodana eyisiwula ilusizi kuyise nokubaba kowayizalayo.
Prov 17:26 Ukuhlawulisa olungileyo akukuhle, nokushaya abaqotho akulungile.
Prov 17:27 Obamba amazwi akhe unokwazi; onomoya opholileyo ungumuntu oqondileyo.
Prov 17:28 Nesiwula lapho sithule kuthiwa isihlakaniphi; ovala umlomo wakhe ungoqondileyo.
Prov 18:1 Ozahlukanisayo ufuna esakhe isifiso, uphika konke ukuhlakanipha.
Prov 18:2 Isiwula asithokozi ngokuqonda, kuphela ngokuveza okusenhliziyweni yakhe.
Prov 18:3 Lapho kufika omubi, kufika nokudelela; kanye nehlazo kukhona inhlamba.
Prov 18:4 Amazwi omlomo womuntu anjengamanzi ajulileyo, nomfula ogobhozayo, nomthombo wokuhlakanipha.
Prov 18:5 Ukukhetha ubuso bomubi ukuba olungileyo aphambukiswe ekwahlulelweni akukuhle.
Prov 18:6 Izindebe zesiwula ziletha ukuxabana, nomlomo waso ubiza imivimbo.
Prov 18:7 Umlomo wesiwula ungukubhujiswa kwaso, nezindebe zaso zilugibe lomphefumulo waso.
Prov 18:8 Amazwi omncethezi anjengezibiliboco; ayehlela kokuphakathi komuntu.
Prov 18:9 Ovilapha emsebenzini wakhe yena ungumfowabo wochithayo.
Prov 18:10 Igama likaJehova lingumbhoshongo onamandla; olungileyo ugijimela kuwo, alondeke.
Prov 18:11 Imfuyo yesicebi ingumuzi waso onamandla; injengogange oluphakemeyo emicabangweni yaso.
Prov 18:12 Ngaphambi kokubhujiswa inhliziyo yomuntu iyaziqhenya; ukuthobeka kwandulela udumo.
Prov 18:13 Obuyisa izwi engakezwa, kungubuwula nehlazo kuye.
Prov 18:14 Umoya womuntu uyasekela ubuthakathaka bakhe, kepha ngubani ongathwala umoya owaphukileyo na?
Prov 18:15 Inhliziyo yoqondileyo iyazuza ukwazi, nezindlebe zabalungileyo ziyafuna ukwazi.
Prov 18:16 Isipho somuntu siyamenzela indawo, simholele kwabakhulu.
Prov 18:17 Ongowokuqala ecaleni lakhe usengathi ulungile, kepha umakhelwane wakhe ufika, amphenye.
Prov 18:18 Inkatho iyaqeda ukuxabana, yahlukanise phakathi kwabanamandla.
Prov 18:19 Umzalwane owoniweyo ulukhuni kunomuzi onamandla, nokuxabana kunjengemigoqo yenqaba.
Prov 18:20 Isisu somuntu siyasutha ngesithelo somlomo wakhe, saneliswe ngokuthela kwezindebe zakhe.
Prov 18:21 Ukufa nokuphila kusemandleni olimi, nabaluthandayo bayakudla izithelo zalo.
Prov 18:22 Ofumana umfazi uthola okuhle; uzuzile isisa kuJehova.
Prov 18:23 Ompofu ukhuluma ngokuncenga, kepha isicebi siphendula kalukhuni.
Prov 18:24 Umuntu wabangane uyazilimaza, kepha kukhona abangane ababambelela kuneselamani.
Prov 19:1 Ungcono ompofu ohamba ekupheleleni kwakhe kunophambene ngezindebe zakhe eyisiwula.
Prov 19:2 Futhi akulungile ukuba umphefumulo ungabi nakwazi; oshesha ngezinyawo uyaduka.
Prov 19:3 Ubuwula bomuntu buchitha indlela yakhe, kepha inhliziyo yakhe iyamthukuthelela uJehova.
Prov 19:4 Imfuyo iyenezela abangane abaningi, kepha ompofu uyashiywa ngumngane wakhe.
Prov 19:5 Ufakazi wamanga akayekwa, nophafuza amanga akayikusinda.
Prov 19:6 Baningi abancenga izikhulu; bonke bangabangane bomuntu wezipho.
Prov 19:7 Bonke abazalwane bompofu bayamzonda; kakhulu kangakanani abangane badedela kude naye; uyabaxosha ngamazwi, kepha awasekho.
Prov 19:8 Ozuza ukuqonda uthanda umphefumulo wakhe; ogcina ingqondo uyakufumana okuhle.
Prov 19:9 Ufakazi wamanga akayekwa, nophafuza amanga uyakubhubha.
Prov 19:10 Ukutamasa akufanele isiwula; kakhulu kangakanani akufanele ukuba inceku ibuse phezu kwezikhulu.
Prov 19:11 Ukuhlakanipha komuntu kubambezela intukuthelo yakhe; kuludumo lwakhe ukudlula esiphambekweni.
Prov 19:12 Ukufutheka kwenkosi kunjengokubhonga kwengonyama, kepha isihhe sayo sinjengamazolo etshanini.
Prov 19:13 Indodana eyisiwula iyinhlupheko kayise, nokuxabana komfazi kungukuconsa njalonjalo.
Prov 19:14 Indlu nemfuyo kuyifa elivela koyise, kepha umfazi ohlakaniphileyo uvela kuJehova.
Prov 19:15 Ubuvila bushonisa ebuthongweni obunzima, nesidenge siyalamba.
Prov 19:16 Ogcina umyalo ulonda umphefumulo wakhe, kepha onganaki izindlela zakhe uyakufa.
Prov 19:17 Onomusa kompofu utsheleka uJehova, nomsebenzi wakhe uyawubuyisela kuye.
Prov 19:18 Yilaye indodana yakho, lisekhona ithemba; ungabhekisi inhliziyo yakho ukuyibulala.
Prov 19:19 Onolaka olukhulu uyathweswa ihlawulo, ngokuba uma umophula, umelwe ukukuphinda.
Prov 19:20 Yizwa isiluleko, wamukele ukulaywa, ukuze uhlakaniphe ekugcineni.
Prov 19:21 Kukhona amacebo amaningi enhliziyweni yomuntu, kepha isiluleko sikaJehova siyakuma.
Prov 19:22 Ukuthandwa komuntu kubangwa ngumusa wakhe; ompofu ungcono kunomuntu wamanga.
Prov 19:23 Ukumesaba uJehova kungokokuphila; onakho uhlezi anelisiwe, akahanjelwa ngububi.
Prov 19:24 Ivila liyafaka isandla salo esitsheni; alisibuyiseli nasemlonyeni walo.
Prov 19:25 Shaya isideleli, ongenalwazi uyakuthola ukuqonda; sola oqondileyo, uyakuqonda ukwazi.
Prov 19:26 Ochitha uyise noxosha unina uyindodana ehlazisayo nebanga amahloni.
Prov 19:27 Yeka, ndodana yami, ukulalela ukulaywa, uyakuduka emazwini okwazi.
Prov 19:28 Ufakazi omubi uyadelela ukwahlulela; umlomo wababi uyagwinya ukona.
Prov 19:29 Izahlulelo zilungiselwa izideleli, nemivimbo umhlane weziwula.
Prov 20:1 Iwayini liyisideleli, uphuzo olunamandla lungumxokozeli; bonke abaduka ngalo abahlakaniphile.
Prov 20:2 Ingebhe ngenkosi injengokubhonga kwengonyama; oyithukuthelisayo wona umphefumulo wakhe.
Prov 20:3 Kuludumo kumuntu ukuhlala kude nokuxabana, kepha zonke iziwula ziyaphikisana.
Prov 20:4 Ngenxa yobusika ivila aliyikulima; ngalokho uyakuthekela ngesikhathi sokuvuna, kungekho lutho.
Prov 20:5 Isiluleko enhliziyweni yomuntu sinjengamanzi ajulileyo, kepha umuntu oqondileyo uyakusikhipha.
Prov 20:6 Abantu abaningi bayamemezela, kube yilowo nalowo umusa wakhe, kepha ngubani ongafumana umuntu othembekileyo na?
Prov 20:7 Olungileyo ohamba ekupheleleni kwakhe, babusisiwe abantwana bakhe emva kwakhe.
Prov 20:8 Inkosi ehlezi esihlalweni sokwahlulela ihlakaza konke okubi ngamehlo ayo.
Prov 20:9 Ngubani ongasho ukuthi: “Ngihlanzile inhliziyo yami, sengihlambulukile ezonweni zami, na?”
Prov 20:10 Izisindo ezimbili nama-efa amabili, kokubili kuyisinengiso kuJehova.
Prov 20:11 Naye umntwana uyaziwa ngezenzo zakhe, uma isenzo sakhe sihlanzekile, noma siqotho.
Prov 20:12 Indlebe ezwayo neso elibonayo, uJehova wenzile kokubili.
Prov 20:13 Ungathandi ubuthongo, funa ufikelwe ngubumpofu; vula amehlo akho, uyakusutha ngesinkwa.
Prov 20:14 “Kubi, kubi,” kusho umthengi; kepha esehambile uyazigabisa.
Prov 20:15 Kukhona igolide namarubi amaningi, kepha ukwazi kwezindebe kuyigugu elinqabileyo.
Prov 20:16 Thatha ingubo yoyisibambiso somfokazi, umbambe abe yisibambiso omela abezizwe.
Prov 20:17 Isinkwa samanga simnandi kumuntu, kepha ngasemuva umlomo wakhe uyakugcwaliswa ngohlalwane.
Prov 20:18 Amacebo onke ayaqiniswa ngokululekana; yilwa impi ngamasu.
Prov 20:19 Ohamba encetheza uyambula izimfihlakalo; ngalokho ungahlangani naye ovula kakhulu umlomo wakhe.
Prov 20:20 Oqalekisa uyise nonina, isibani sakhe siyakucimeka esigayegayeni.
Prov 20:21 Imfuyo ingatholwa ngokushesha ekuqaleni, kepha ukuphela kwayo akuyikubusiswa.
Prov 20:22 Ungasho ukuthi: “Ngiyakuphindisela okubi,” yethemba kuJehova, uyakukusindisa.
Prov 20:23 Izisindo ezimbili ziyisinengiso kuJehova, nesilinganiso senkohliso asilungile.
Prov 20:24 Izinyathelo zomuntu zingezikaJehova; pho, umuntu angaqonda kanjani indlela yakhe na?
Prov 20:25 Kulugibe ukusho ngamawala ukuthi: “Kungcwele,” abesebuya acabange emva kwezithembiso zakhe.
Prov 20:26 Inkosi ehlakaniphileyo iyahlakaza ababi, iphindisele phezu kwabo ukushinga kwabo.
Prov 20:27 Umoya womuntu uyisibani sikaJehova, siphenya konke okuphakathi komuntu.
Prov 20:28 Umusa neqiniso kuyalonda inkosi; isihlalo sayo sobukhosi sisekelwa ngomusa.
Prov 20:29 Udumo lwabasha lungamandla abo, nesivunulo sabadala singubumpunga.
Prov 20:30 Imivimbo elimazayo ihlanza ububi, nezishayo okuphakathi komuntu.
Prov 21:1 Inhliziyo yenkosi isesandleni sikaJehova njengemifula yamanzi; uyayiphendulela lapho ethanda khona.
Prov 21:2 Zonke izindlela zomuntu zilungile emehlweni akhe, kepha uJehova ulinganisa izinhliziyo.
Prov 21:3 Ukwenza ukulunga nokwahlulela kukhethekile kuJehova kunemihlatshelo.
Prov 21:4 Ukuzidla kwamehlo nokuziqhenya kwenhliziyo, isibani sababi, kuyisono.
Prov 21:5 Imicabango yokhutheleyo isenzuzweni, kepha eyabo bonke abaphangisayo isekusweleni kuphela.
Prov 21:6 Ukuthola ingcebo ngolimi lwamanga kuyize elizulazuliswa, nezingibe zokufa.
Prov 21:7 Ukuchitha kwababi kuyabaqothula, ngokuba benqaba ukwenza ukulunga.
Prov 21:8 Indlela yothweswe icala iyinsongensonge, kepha ohlanzekileyo, isenzo sakhe silungile.
Prov 21:9 Kungcono ukuhlala egumbini lophahla kunokuhlala nowesifazane oxabanayo endlini ehlanganyelweyo.
Prov 21:10 Umphefumulo womubi ufisa okubi; umakhelwane wakhe kafumani isisa emehlweni akhe.
Prov 21:11 Lapho isideleli sihlawuliswa, ongenalwazi uyahlakanipha, nalapho ohlakaniphileyo efundiswa, uyathola ukwazi.
Prov 21:12 Olungileyo uyaqaphela indlu yomubi; ababi bayachithelwa ebubini.
Prov 21:13 Ovala indlebe yakhe ngokukhala kompofu naye uyakukhala angaphendulwa.
Prov 21:14 Isipho ekusithekeni siyadambisa ulaka, nomvuzo esifubeni ukufutheka okunamandla.
Prov 21:15 Kuyintokozo kolungileyo ukwenza ukwahlulela, kepha kwabenza ukona kuyincithakalo.
Prov 21:16 Umuntu oduka endleleni yokuhlakanipha uyakuphumula ebandleni lezithunzi.
Prov 21:17 Othanda injabulo uyakuba mpofu, nothanda iwayini namafutha kayikuceba.
Prov 21:18 Omubi uyihlawulo lolungileyo, nombuluzayo usesikhundleni sabaqotho.
Prov 21:19 Kungcono ukuhlala ezweni lasehlane kunokuhlala nowesifazane oxabanayo nothethayo.
Prov 21:20 Kukhona ingcebo enxanelekayo namafutha endlini yohlakaniphileyo, kepha umuntu oyisiwula uyakugwinya.
Prov 21:21 Olandela ukulunga nomusa uyafumana ukuphila, nokulunga, nodumo.
Prov 21:22 Ohlakaniphileyo angenyukela emzini wamaqhawe, awise phansi inqaba ayethembayo wona.
Prov 21:23 Ogcina umlomo wakhe nolimi lwakhe ulonda umphefumulo wakhe ezinsizini.
Prov 21:24 Ozidlayo nozigabisayo, yisideleli igama lakhe, yena osebenza ngokuziphakamisa okukhulu.
Prov 21:25 Isifiso sevila siyalibulala, ngokuba izandla zalo ziyenqaba ukusebenza.
Prov 21:26 Kuyafiswa nokufiswa usuku lonke, kepha olungileyo uyaphana engancishi.
Prov 21:27 Umhlatshelo wababi uyisinengiso; kakhulu kangakanani uma ulethwa ngomgomo omubi.
Prov 21:28 Ufakazi wamanga uyabhujiswa, kepha umuntu ozwileyo angakhuluma njalo.
Prov 21:29 Umuntu omubi uyenza lukhuni ubuso bakhe, kepha oqotho uyanaka indlela yakhe.
Prov 21:30 Akukho ukuhlakanipha, akukho ukuqonda, nesiluleko, okungamelana noJehova.
Prov 21:31 Ihhashi lilungiselwa usuku lokulwa, kepha ukusindiswa kungokukaJehova.
Prov 22:1 Igama elihle likhethekile kunengcebo enkulu, nomusa kunesiliva negolide.
Prov 22:2 Abacebileyo nabampofu bahlangene; uJehova ungumenzi wabo bonke.
Prov 22:3 Qqondileyo uyabona ububi, acashe, kepha abangenalwazi badlula nje, bahlupheke ngakho.
Prov 22:4 Umvuzo wokuthobeka kokumesaba uJehova uyingcebo, nodumo, nokuphila.
Prov 22:5 Ameva nezingibe kusendleleni yabaphambeneyo, kepha ogcina umphefumulo wakhe uyakudedela kude nakho.
Prov 22:6 Khulisa umntwana ngendlela eyakuba ngeyakhe; kuyakuthi lapho esekhulile, angasuki kuyo.
Prov 22:7 Isicebi sibusa phezu kwabampofu, nobolekayo uyisigqila somtshelekileyo.
Prov 22:8 Ohlwanyela ububi uyakuvuna usizi, nenduku yolaka lwakhe iyakuphela.
Prov 22:9 Oneso elimnene uyakubusiswa, ngokuba uyapha ompofu okwesinkwa sakhe.
Prov 22:10 Xosha isideleli, besekuphuma ukuxabana, kuphele ukuphikisana nehlazo.
Prov 22:11 Othanda inhlanzeko ngenhliziyo nonomusa emlonyeni wakhe ungumngane wenkosi.
Prov 22:12 Amehlo kaJehova anaka onokwazi, kepha uyachitha amazwi ombuluzayo.
Prov 22:13 Ivila lithi: “Kukhona ingonyama ngaphandle; ngiyakubulawa phandle esigcawini.”
Prov 22:14 Umlomo wowesifazane ondindayo ungumgodi ojulileyo; othukuthelelwayo nguJehova uyakuwela kuwo.
Prov 22:15 Ubuwula buboshelwe enhliziyweni yomntwana, kepha induku yokulaya iyabudedisela kude naye.
Prov 22:16 Ocindezela ompofu ukuba azandisele nophayo isicebi bayakuba ngabokuswela kuphela.
Prov 22:17 Beka indlebe yakho, uzwe amazwi ezihlakaniphi, ubeke ukufundisa kwami enhliziyweni yakho.
Prov 22:18 Ngokuba kumnandi, uma ukugcina phakathi kwakho, kubekwe kanyekanye ezindebeni zakho.
Prov 22:19 Ukuba ithemba lakho libe kuJehova, ngikwazisile khona namuhla, yebo, wena.
Prov 22:20 Angithi ngilobile kuwe nangaphambili ngeziluleko nangokwazi,
Prov 22:21 ukuze ngikwazise ukuthembeka kwamazwi eqiniso ukuba ubuyisele kwabakuthumileyo amazwi eqiniso, na?
Prov 22:22 Ungamphangi ompofu ngokuba empofu, ungamchobozi oswelayo esangweni,
Prov 22:23 ngokuba uJehova uyakumela indaba yabo, aphuce ababaphucayo umphefumulo wabo.
Prov 22:24 Ungabi ngumngane womuntu onolaka, ungahambi nomuntu onokufutheka,
Prov 22:25 funa ufunde izindlela zakhe, uthole ugibe lomphefumulo wakho.
Prov 22:26 Ungabi ngowabaxhawulanayo, nowabayizibambiso zezikwenetu;
Prov 22:27 uma kungekho ongakhokha ngakho, ubuyakususelwani umbhede wakho phansi kwakho na?
Prov 22:28 Ungasusi isikhonkwane esidala oyihlo abasimisileyo.
Prov 22:29 Uyambona umuntu ehlakaniphile emsebenzini wakhe na? Uyakuma phambi kwamakhosi, akayikuma phambi kwabantukazana nje.
Prov 23:1 Lapho uhlezi ekudleni nombusi, qonda nokuqonda ophambi kwakho,
Prov 23:2 ubeke umese emphinjeni wakho, uma ungumuntu wephango.
Prov 23:3 Unganxaneli izilovela zakhe, lokhu zingukudla okukhohlisayo.
Prov 23:4 Ungakhandlekeli ukuceba; kuyeke ngokuqonda kwakho.
Prov 23:5 Amehlo akho ayandizela kulokho, kepha akusekho, ngokuba kuyazenzela impela amaphiko njengokhozi olundizela ezulwini.
Prov 23:6 Ungadli ukudla koneso elibi, ungafisi izilovela zakhe,
Prov 23:7 ngokuba unjengozicabangelayo; uthi kuwe: “Yidla uphuze,” kepha inhliziyo yakhe ayikho kuwe.
Prov 23:8 Umthamo owudlileyo uyakuwuhlanza, uchithe amazwi akho amnandi.
Prov 23:9 Ungakhulumi ezindlebeni zesiwula, ngokuba siyakudelela ukuhlakanipha kwamazwi akho.
Prov 23:10 Ungasusi isikhonkwane esidala, ungangeni emasimini ezintandane,
Prov 23:11 ngokuba umhlengi wazo unamandla; uyakumela indaba yazo kuwe.
Prov 23:12 Beka inhliziyo yakho ekulayweni, nezindlebe zakho emazwini okwazi.
Prov 23:13 Ungayeki ukumlaya umntwana, ngokuba uma umshaya ngoswazi akayikufa.
Prov 23:14 Uyakumshaya ngoswazi, wophule umphefumulo wakhe endaweni yabafileyo.
Prov 23:15 Ndodana yami, uma inhliziyo yakho ihlakanipha, inhliziyo yami iyakuthokoza, yebo, eyami.
Prov 23:16 Izinso zami ziyakujabula, lapho izindebe zakho zikhuluma okulungileyo.
Prov 23:17 Inhliziyo yakho mayingabi namhawu ngezoni, kepha mawube sekumesabeni uJehova usuku lonke.
Prov 23:18 Ngokuba impela umvuzo ukhona, nethemba lakho aliyikunqunywa.
Prov 23:19 Yizwa wena ndodana yami, uhlakaniphe, uhole inhliziyo yakho ngendlela.
Prov 23:20 Ungabi phakathi kwezinseli zewayini nabayiziminzi zenyama.
Prov 23:21 Ngokuba inseli noyisiminzi bayakuba mpofu; ukozela kuyakwembathisa umuntu amanikiniki.
Prov 23:22 Lalela uyihlo owakuzalayo, ungamdeleli unyoko lapho esemdala.
Prov 23:23 Thenga iqiniso, ungathengisi ngalo, nokuhlakanipha, nokulaywa, nokuqonda.
Prov 23:24 Uyise wolungileyo uyakwethaba nokwethaba, nozala ohlakaniphileyo uyathokoza ngaye.
Prov 23:25 Mabathokoze uyihlo nonyoko, ethabe owakubelethayo.
Prov 23:26 Ndodana yami, ngiphe inhliziyo yakho, amehlo akho enamele izindlela zami.
Prov 23:27 Ngokuba isifebe singumgodi ojulileyo, nowesifazane ondindayo ungumhholo onyinyeneyo.
Prov 23:28 Uqamekela njengomphangi; uyandisa abambuluzayo phakathi kwabantu.
Prov 23:29 Ngubani othi: “Maye!” Ngubani othi: “Wo!” Ngubani oxabanayo? Ngubani okhalayo, ngubani onezilonda ngeze, na? Ngubani onamehlo aklwelayo na?
Prov 23:30 Yibo abalibala ngasewayinini, abaya ukunambitha iwayini elixutshanisiweyo.
Prov 23:31 Ungalibuki iwayini ukuthi libomvu, nokuthi liyacwebezela endebeni, ukuba lehle kalula.
Prov 23:32 Ngasekugcineni liyaluma njengenyoka, lihlabe njengebululu.
Prov 23:33 Amehlo akho ayakubona imihlola, inhliziyo yakho ikhulume okuphambeneyo.
Prov 23:34 Uyakuba njengolele ekujuleni kolwandle nohlezi esihlokweni sensika yomkhumbi.
Prov 23:35 Uyakuthi: “Bangishayile, angilimalanga; bangigalele, angikwazanga. Lapho ngivuka, ngiyakubuye ngilifune.”
Prov 24:1 Ungabi namhawu ngabantu ababi, ungafisi ukuba nabo.
Prov 24:2 Ngokuba izinhliziyo zabo ziceba ukuchitha, nezindebe zabo zikhuluma ngengozi.
Prov 24:3 Indlu iyakhiwa ngokuhlakanipha, iqiniswe ngokuqonda.
Prov 24:4 Amakamelo agcwaliswa ngokwazi, ngayo yonke ingcebo enqabileyo nemnandi.
Prov 24:5 Umuntu ohlakaniphileyo udlula onamandla, nomuntu onokwazi onezikhwepha.
Prov 24:6 Ngokuba ngokucabanga ungaphaka impi yakho, nokusinda kumi ngobuningi babeluleki.
Prov 24:7 Ukuhlakanipha kuphakeme kunesiwula; esangweni asivuli umlomo waso.
Prov 24:8 Ocabanga ukwenza okubi uyakubizwa ngokuthi owenza amacebo.
Prov 24:9 Ukuceba ubuwula kuyisono, nesideleli siyisinengiso kubantu.
Prov 24:10 Uma udangala ngosuku lokuhlupheka, amandla akho mancane.
Prov 24:11 Bophule abayiswa ekufeni; abakhubekiselwa ekubulaweni ubagodle.
Prov 24:12 Uma uthi: “Bheka, besingakwazi,” akakuqondi yini olinganisa izinhliziyo, nolonda umphefumulo wakho akakwazi, na? Futhi akayikuphindisela bonke abantu ngokwemisebenzi yabo na?
Prov 24:13 Ndodana yami, yidla izinyosi, ngokuba zimnandi, noju oluhle emlonyeni wakho.
Prov 24:14 Yazi ukuthi kunjalo ukuhlakanipha emphefumulweni wakho; uma ukutholile, kuyakuba khona isikhathi esizayo, nethemba lakho aliyikunqunywa.
Prov 24:15 Wena omubi ungaqamekeli indlu yolungileyo, ungachithi indawo yakhe yokuphumula.
Prov 24:16 Ngokuba olungileyo angawa kasikhombisa, abesebuye avuke, kepha ababi bayakukhubeka ngobubi.
Prov 24:17 Ungathokozi ngokuwa kwesitha sakho, nenhliziyo yakho mayingajabuli ngokukhubeka kwaso,
Prov 24:18 funa uJehova akubone, kube kubi emehlweni akhe, asuse intukuthelo yakhe kuso.
Prov 24:19 Ungazikhathazi ngabenza okubi, ungabi namhawu ngamashinga.
Prov 24:20 Ngokuba omubi akayikuba namvuzo, nesibani samashinga siyakucima.
Prov 24:21 Ndodana yami, yesaba uJehova nenkosi, ungahlangani nabahlubukayo.
Prov 24:22 Ngokuba ingozi yabo iyakuvuka masinyane; ngubani owazi ukuchithwa kweminyaka yabo na?
Prov 24:23 Nalawa angamazwi ahlakaniphileyo: Ukukhetha ubuso ekwahluleleni akukuhle.
Prov 24:24 Oshoyo komubi ukuthi: “Ulungile,” lowo abantu bayakumqalekisa, nezizwe ziyakumthukuthelela.
Prov 24:25 Kwabamthethisayo kuyakuba mnandi, kufike phezu kwabo isibusiso esihle.
Prov 24:26 Njengokwanga kwezindebe, injalo impendulo eqinisileyo.
Prov 24:27 Qeda umsebenzi wakho ngaphandle, uzilungiselele wona ensimini, wakhe ngasemuva indlu yakho.
Prov 24:28 Ungabi ngufakazi ngomakhelwane wakho kungekho sizathu; wothi ukhohlise ngezindebe zakho na?
Prov 24:29 Ungasho ukuthi: “Njengalokho ekwenzile kimi, kanjalo ngiyakwenza kuye, ngimphindisele umuntu njengesenzo sakhe.”
Prov 24:30 Ngadlula ensimini yomuntu oyivila, nasesivinini somuntu ongenangqondo;
Prov 24:31 bheka, kuso sonke kwakukhona izimbathi, sisibekelwe phezulu ngezimbabazane, nogange lwaso lwamatshe lwaludilizelwe phansi.
Prov 24:32 Ngabuka-ke mina, ngacabanga; ngabona, ngathola ukulaywa:
Prov 24:33 ubuthongo obuncane, ukozela okuncane, ukusonga izandla kancane kuze kulalwe,
Prov 24:34 besekuthi ubumpofu bakho bufike njengomhambuma, nokuswela kwakho njengomuntu wesihlangu.
Prov 25:1 Nalezi ziyizaga zikaSolomoni ezaphindwa ngamadoda kaHezekiya inkosi yakwaJuda.
Prov 25:2 Kuludumo lukaNkulunkulu ukusitha into, kepha udumo lwamakhosi lungukuphenya indaba.
Prov 25:3 Njengezulu ngokuphakama nomhlaba ngokujula, injalo inhliziyo yomuntu ngokuphenywa.
Prov 25:4 Susa amanyela esiliveni, bese kuthi kuphumele umkhandi isitsha.
Prov 25:5 Susa omubi phambi kwenkosi, bese kuthi isihlalo sayo sobukhosi siqiniswe ngokulunga.
Prov 25:6 Ungaziphakamisi phambi kwenkosi, ungemi endaweni yabakhulu.
Prov 25:7 Ngokuba kungcono ukuba kuthiwe kuwe: “Yenyuka lapha,” kunokuba wehliswe phambi kwesikhulu asesibonile amehlo akho.
Prov 25:8 Ungasheshi ukuphuma ukuyophikisana ukuba ungazi ukuthi uyakwenze njani ekugcineni, lapho umakhelwane wakho ekuhlazisile.
Prov 25:9 Mela indaba yakho nomakhelwane wakho, ungambuli imfihlakalo yomunye,
Prov 25:10 funa okuzwayo akuhlazise, nodumo lwakho lungabuyi.
Prov 25:11 Izwi elikhulunywayo ngesikhathi esiyiso linjengama-apula asezitsheni zesiliva.
Prov 25:12 Njengecici legolide nesivunulo segolide elicwengekileyo, unjalo umsoli ohlakaniphileyo endlebeni elalelayo.
Prov 25:13 Njengokubanda kweqhwa ngosuku lokuvuna, sinjalo isithunywa esithembekileyo kosithumileyo, ngokuba siyahlumelela inkosi yaso.
Prov 25:14 Njengamafu nomoya ngaphandle kwemvula kodwa, unjalo umuntu ozidumisa ngesipho angasiphiyo.
Prov 25:15 Ngokubekezela kade isikhulu singavunyiswa, nolimi oluthambileyo luyaphula amathambo.
Prov 25:16 Uma uthole izinyosi, yidla okwanele wena, funa udinwe, ubuye uhlanze.
Prov 25:17 Unyawo lwakho malungavami endlini yomakhelwane wakho, funa adinwe nguwe, abuye akuzonde.
Prov 25:18 Umuntu ofakazela amanga ngomakhelwane wakhe uyisando, nenkemba, nomcibisholo obukhali.
Prov 25:19 Ukwethemba ombuluzayo ngosuku lokuhlupheka kunjengezinyo elaphukileyo nonyawo olwenyeleyo.
Prov 25:20 Oyihlabelelela inhliziyo edabukileyo izihlabelelo unjengokhumula ibhantshi ngosuku lwamakhaza, nanjengoviniga esilondeni.
Prov 25:21 Uma okuzondayo elambile, mnike ukudla, adle; uma omile, muphe amanzi, aphuze.
Prov 25:22 Ngokuba uyakubuthela amalahle omlilo ekhanda lakhe, besekuthi uJehova akuvuze.
Prov 25:23 Umoya wasenyakatho uyaletha imvula, nolimi olunyenyayo ubuso obuthukutheleyo.
Prov 25:24 Kungcono ukuhlala egumbini lophahla kunokuhlala nowesifazane oxabanayo endlini ehlanganyelweyo.
Prov 25:25 Njengamanzi aqandayo emphefumulweni owomileyo, unjalo umbiko omuhle ovela ezweni elikude.
Prov 25:26 Njengomthombo odungekileyo nesiphethu esonakaleyo, unjalo olungileyo ozanyazanyiswa phambi komubi.
Prov 25:27 Ukudla izinyosi eziningi akukuhle, nokuzifunela udumo kakusilo udumo.
Prov 25:28 Njengomuzi odiliziweyo ungenalugange, unjalo umuntu omoya wakhe ungenakubanjwa.
Prov 26:1 Njengeqhwa ehlobo nemvula ngesikhathi sokuvuna, kanjalo udumo alufanele isiwula.
Prov 26:2 Njengomzwilili ekuhambeni kwawo nanjengenkonjane ekundizeni kwayo, kanjalo isiqalekiso esingenasizathu asizi.
Prov 26:3 Isiswebhu singesehhashi, netomu lingelembongolo, noswazi lungolomhlane weziwula.
Prov 26:4 Ungasiphenduli isiwula njengobuwula baso, funa ufane naso.
Prov 26:5 Phendula isiwula njengobuwula baso, funa sibe ngohlakaniphileyo emehlweni aso.
Prov 26:6 Othuma izwi ngesandla sesiwula unquma izinyawo zakhe, uphuza ingozi.
Prov 26:7 Imilenze yonyonga iyalengalenga; zinjalo izaga emilonyeni yeziwula.
Prov 26:8 Njengobopha itshe endwayimaneni, unjalo onika isiwula udumo.
Prov 26:9 Njengeva elingena esandleni sesidakwa, sinjalo isaga emlonyweni weziwula.
Prov 26:10 Ingqongqo yenza konke yodwa; oqasha isiwula uqasha abadlulayo nje.
Prov 26:11 Njengenja ebuyela ebuhlanzweni bayo, kanjalo isiwula siphinda ubuwula baso.
Prov 26:12 Uyabona umuntu ohlakaniphile emehlweni akhe na? Kukhona ithemba ngesiwula kunaye.
Prov 26:13 Ivila lithi: “Kukhona ingonyama endleleni nebhubesi esigcawini.”
Prov 26:14 Isicabha siphenduka ngezingibe zaso, nevila ecansini lalo.
Prov 26:15 Ivila liyafaka isandla salo esitsheni; kuyamkhathaza ukusibuyisela emlonyeni walo.
Prov 26:16 Ivila lihlakaniphile emehlweni alo kunabayisikhombisa abaphendula ngokuhlakanipha.
Prov 26:17 Odlula nje ehlanganyela ukuxabana okungesikho okwakhe unjengobamba inja ngezindlebe zayo.
Prov 26:18 Njengohlanya oluphonsa izikhuni nemicibisholo ebulalayo,
Prov 26:19 unjalo umuntu okhohlisa umakhelwane wakhe, ethi: “Angithi ngintelile nje na?”
Prov 26:20 Ngokuphela kwezinkuni umlilo uyacimeka, nalapho kungekho abancethezi, kuyabodla ukuxabana.
Prov 26:21 Njengamalahle othuthwini nezinkuni emlilweni, unjalo umuntu ophikisa ukuvusa inkani.
Prov 26:22 Amazwi omncethezi anjengesibiliboco: ayehlela kokuphakathi komuntu.
Prov 26:23 Izindebe ezishisayo nenhliziyo embi kunjengesitsha sebumba esinamekwe ngamanyela esiliva.
Prov 26:24 Ozondayo uyazenzisa ngezindebe zakhe, ubekelela inkohliso enhliziyweni yakhe.
Prov 26:25 Lapho enza izwi lakhe libe mnandi, ungakholwa nguye, ngokuba kukhona izinengiso eziyisikhombisa enhliziyweni yakhe.
Prov 26:26 Noma inzondo yakhe isibekelwa ngenzondo, ububi bakhe buyakwambulwa ebandleni.
Prov 26:27 Omba umgodi uyakuwela kuwo, nogingqa itshe, liyakubuyela phezu kwakhe.
Prov 26:28 Ulimi lwamanga luyazonda olubachobozileyo, nomlomo othophayo usebenza incithakalo.
Prov 27:1 Ungazigabisi ngolwakusasa, ngokuba awukwazi okungavela ngosuku.
Prov 27:2 Makakudumise omunye, kungabi ngumlomo wakho, kube ngumfokazi, kungabi yizindebe zakho.
Prov 27:3 Itshe liyasinda nesihlabathi sinzima, kepha ukukhathaza kwesiwula kuyasinda kunakho kokubili.
Prov 27:4 Ulaka lulunya nentukuthelo iyisikhukhula, kepha ngubani ongema phambi komhawu na?
Prov 27:5 Ukusola okusobala kungcono kunothando olufihliweyo.
Prov 27:6 Amanxeba othandayo athembekile, kepha ukwanga kwesitha kuyachichima.
Prov 27:7 Umphefumulo osuthiyo uyanengwa yizinyosi, kepha emphefumulweni olambileyo konke okubabayo kumnandi.
Prov 27:8 Njengenyoni esuka ibaleka esidlekeni sayo, unjalo umuntu obalekele indawo yakhe.
Prov 27:9 Amafutha nempepho kuyathokozisa inhliziyo; bunjalo ubumnandi bomuntu ngokululeka ngenhliziyo.
Prov 27:10 Ungashiyi umngane wakho nomngane kayihlo, ungangeni endlini yomfowenu ngosuku lwengozi yakho; ungcono umakhelwane oseduze kunomfowenu okude.
Prov 27:11 Ndodana yami, hlakanipha, uthokozise inhliziyo yami ukuba ngiphendule ongisolayo.
Prov 27:12 Oqondileyo uyabona ububi, acashe, kepha abangenalwazi badlula nje, bahlupheke ngakho.
Prov 27:13 Thatha ingubo yoyisibambiso somfokazi, umbambe abe yisibambiso omela abezizwe.
Prov 27:14 Obusisa umngane wakhe ngezwi elikhulu, evuka ekuseni, kuyakubalelwa kuye ukuthi kuyisiqalekiso.
Prov 27:15 Ukuconsa okunganqamukiyo ngosuku lwemvula nowesifazane oxabanayo kuyafana.
Prov 27:16 Omvimbela yena uvimbela umoya; isandla sakhe sokunene sihlangana namafutha nje.
Prov 27:17 Insimbi ilola insimbi, nomuntu ubuso bomunye.
Prov 27:18 Olonda umkhiwane uyakudla izithelo zawo, nolinda inkosi yakhe uyakudunyiswa.
Prov 27:19 Njengasemanzini ubuso bubhekana nobuso, injalo inhliziyo yomuntu kumuntu.
Prov 27:20 Indawo yabafileyo nokubhubha akusuthi, namehlo omuntu awasuthi.
Prov 27:21 Ukhamba lokuncibilikisela lungolwesiliva, nesithando ngesegolide, nomuntu unjengodumo lwakhe.
Prov 27:22 Noma ugqula isiwula ngembokodwe etsheni lokusila phakathi komqhazulo, ubuwula baso abuyikusuka kuso.
Prov 27:23 Yazi nokwazi ukuma kwezimvu zakho, ubeke inhliziyo yakho emihlambini yakho.
Prov 27:24 Ngokuba ingcebo ayiyikuhlala kuze kube phakade; umqhele uyahlala izizukulwane ngezizukulwane na?
Prov 27:25 Lapho utshani bumuka, nohlaza lubonakala, nemifino yezintaba ibuthwa,
Prov 27:26 kukhona izimvu zokuba wembathe, nezimpongo ukuba zibe yintengo yomhlaba.
Prov 27:27 Kuyakuba khona ubisi lwezimbuzi olwanele ukudla kwakho nokudla kwendlu yakho, nokuphila kwamantombazana akho.
Prov 28:1 Ababi bayabaleka, noma kungekho obaxoshayo, kepha abalungileyo banesibindi njengengonyama.
Prov 28:2 Ngesiphambeko salo izwe linezikhulu eziningi, kepha ngabantu abaqondileyo nabanokwazi liyakuma.
Prov 28:3 Umuntu oswelayo ocindezela abampofu unjengemvula ekhukhulayo engashiyi ukudla.
Prov 28:4 Abashiya umthetho badumisa ababi, kepha abagcina umthetho balwa nabo.
Prov 28:5 Abantu ababi abaqondi ukwahlulela, kepha abafuna uJehova baqonda konke.
Prov 28:6 Ungcono ompofu ohamba ekupheleleni kwakhe kunocebileyo ophambene ngezindlela zakhe.
Prov 28:7 Ogcina umthetho uyindodana eqondileyo, kepha ongumngane weziminzi uhlazisa uyise.
Prov 28:8 Owandisa imfuyo yakhe ngenzalo nangenzuzo uyibuthela onomusa kwabampofu.
Prov 28:9 Ophendula indlebe yakhe ekuzweni umthetho, nomkhuleko wakhe uyisinengiso.
Prov 28:10 Odukisela abaqotho endleleni embi uyakuwela emgodini wakhe, kepha abapheleleyo bayakudla ifa lokuhle.
Prov 28:11 Isicebi sihlakaniphile emehlweni aso, kepha ompofu oqondileyo uyakusifica.
Prov 28:12 Lapho abalungileyo bethokoza, udumo lukhulu, kepha ekuvukeni kwababi abantu bamelwe ukufunwa.
Prov 28:13 Ofihla iziphambeko zakhe akayikuphumelela, kepha ozivumayo azishiye uyakuthola umusa.
Prov 28:14 Ubusisiwe umuntu owesaba njalo, kepha oyenza lukhuni inhliziyo yakhe uyakuwela ebubini.
Prov 28:15 Njengengoyama ebhongayo nebhere elihahayo, unjalo umbusi omubi phezu kwabantu abampofu.
Prov 28:16 Wena sikhulu esingenakuqonda nesicindezelayo, ozonda inzuzo engalungile uyakwandiza izinsuku zakhe.
Prov 28:17 Umuntu osindwa yigazi lomunye uyakubalekela egodini; makangasizwa muntu.
Prov 28:18 Ohamba ekupheleleni uyakusinda, kepha ophambene ngezindlela zakhe uyakuwa kwenye yazo.
Prov 28:19 Olima insimu yakhe uyakusutha ngokudla, kepha olandela amayiyane uyakusutha ngobumpofu.
Prov 28:20 Umuntu othembekileyo uyakuvama izibusiso, kepha oshesha ukuceba akayikuyekwa.
Prov 28:21 Ukukhetha ubuso akukuhle; ngomthamo wesinkwa umuntu angenza isiphambeko.
Prov 28:22 Umuntu oneso elibi ushesha ukuba athole imfuyo; akazi ukuthi ukuswela kuyakumehlela.
Prov 28:23 Osola umuntu uyakuthola ngasemuva isisa kunothopha ngolimi lwakhe.
Prov 28:24 Ophanga uyise nonina, ethi: “Akusiso isiphambeko,” yena ungumngane wochithayo.
Prov 28:25 Onomoya ohahayo uyavusa ukuxabana, kepha owethemba kuJehova uyakukhuluphaliswa.
Prov 28:26 Owethemba enhliziyweni yakhe uyisiwula; kepha ohamba ngokuhlakanipha uyakhululwa.
Prov 28:27 Opha ompofu akayikuswela, kepha ositheza amehlo akhe uyakuba neziqalekiso eziningi.
Prov 28:28 Lapho ababi bevuka, umuntu uyacasha, kepha ngokubhubha kwabo abalungileyo bayanda.
Prov 29:1 Umuntu osolwayo, onentamo elukhuni kodwa, uyakwaphulwa ngokuphazima kweso, engenakuphulukiswa.
Prov 29:2 Abantu bayathokoza ngokwanda kwabalungileyo, kepha ngokubusa kwababi abantu bayabubula.
Prov 29:3 Umuntu othanda ukuhlakanipha uthokozisa uyise, kepha umngane wezifebe uchitha imfuyo yakhe.
Prov 29:4 Inkosi iqinisa izwe ngokwahlulela, kepha umuntu olithelisayo uyalichitha.
Prov 29:5 Umuntu othopha umakhelwane wakhe wenekela izinyawo zakhe inetha.
Prov 29:6 Esiphambekweni somuntu omubi kukhona ugibe, kepha olungileyo uyenanela, athokoze.
Prov 29:7 Olungileyo uyazi indaba yabampofu, kepha omubi akayiqondi.
Prov 29:8 Abantu abayizideleli bavusa umuzi, kepha abahlakaniphileyo babuyisa ulaka.
Prov 29:9 Uma ohlakaniphileyo ephikisene nesiwula, siyadlova sihleke, nokuthula akukho.
Prov 29:10 Abantu begazi bayazonda opheleleyo, kepha abaqotho banaka umphefumulo wakhe.
Prov 29:11 Isiwula sikhipha lonke ulaka lwaso, kepha ohlakaniphileyo uyalugodla ekugcineni.
Prov 29:12 Uma umbusi elalela indaba yamanga, zonke izinceku zakhe zimbi.
Prov 29:13 Ompofu nocindezelayo bandawonye; uJehova ukhanyisa amehlo abo bobabili.
Prov 29:14 Inkosi eyahlulela abampofu ngeqiniso, isihlalo sayo sobukhosi siyakuma phakade.
Prov 29:15 Uswazi nokusola kuyanika ukuhlakanipha, kepha umntwana oyekwayo uyahlazisa unina.
Prov 29:16 Ngokwanda kwababi kuyanda iziphambeko, kepha abalungileyo bayakubuka ukuwa kwabo.
Prov 29:17 Yilaye indodana yakho, iyakukuphumuza, yebo, iyakuthokozisa umphefumulo wakho.
Prov 29:18 Lapho kungekho mbono khona, abantu bayadlubulunda, kepha ogcina umthetho ubusisiwe.
Prov 29:19 Inceku ayisolwa ngamazwi, ngokuba noma iqonda ayilaleli.
Prov 29:20 Uyabona umuntu oshesha ngamazwi na? Kukhona ithemba ngesiwula kunangaye.
Prov 29:21 Inceku ekhuliswa kahle kwasebuntwaneni iyakuba yindodana ekugcineni.
Prov 29:22 Umuntu onolaka uvusa ukuxabana, nomuntu ofuthekayo uvama ukuphambeka.
Prov 29:23 Ukuzidla komuntu kuyamthobisa, kepha onomoya othobekileyo uyazuza udumo.
Prov 29:24 Ohlanganyela nesela uzonda umphefumulo wakhe; uyezwa isifungo, kepha akasidaluli.
Prov 29:25 Ukwesaba abantu kubeka ugibe, kepha owethemba uJehova uyalondeka.
Prov 29:26 Abaningi bafuna ubuso bombusi, kepha ukwahlulelwa komuntu kuvela kuJehova.
Prov 29:27 Umuntu owonakeleyo uyisinengiso kwabalungileyo, noqotho endleleni uyisinengiso komubi.
Prov 30:1 Amazwi ka-Aguri, indodana kaJakhe waseMasa. Yathi indoda ku-Ithiyeli, ko-Ithiyeli no-Ukhali:
Prov 30:2 “Impela ngiyisiwula kunabanye abantu, anginakuqonda komuntu.
Prov 30:3 Angifundanga ukuhlakanipha, ukuze ngazi oNgcwele.
Prov 30:4 Ngubani owenyukele ezulwini, wabuye wehla na? Ngubani oqoqele umoya ezandleni zakhe na? Ngubani obophile amanzi engutsheni yakhe na? Ngubani omisile yonke imikhawulo yomhlaba na? Ngubani igama lakhe, ngubani igama lendodana yakhe, uma ulazi, na?
Prov 30:5 “Onke amazwi kaNkulunkulu acwebile; uyisihlangu kwabaphephela kuye.
Prov 30:6 Ungenezeli emazwini akhe, funa akusole, ufunyanwe ungumqambimanga.
Prov 30:7 “Yizinto ezimbili engizicela kuwe: unganginqabeli nazo, ngingakafi.
Prov 30:8 Dedisela kude nami okuyize namanga, unganginiki ubumpofu nengcebo, kepha ngiphe isinkwa engisimiselweyo,
Prov 30:9 funa ngisuthe, ngikuphike ngithi: ‘UJehova ungubani na?’ funa ngibe mpofu, ngebe, ngilone igama likaNkulunkulu wami.
Prov 30:10 “Ungahlebi inceku enkosini yayo, funa ikuthuke, ube necala.
Prov 30:11 “Kukhona isizukulwane esithuka uyise, esingabusisi unina.
Prov 30:12 Kukhona isizukulwane esimhlophe emehlweni aso, esingahlanzwanga ensileni yaso.
Prov 30:13 Kukhona isizukulwane yeka ukuzidla kwaso! Nezinkophe zaso ziphakanyisiwe.
Prov 30:14 Kukhona isizukulwane esimazinyo aso ayizinkemba namazinyo emihlathi angomese bokuqeda abampofu emhlabeni, nabaswelayo phakathi kwabantu.
Prov 30:15 “Umnyundu unamadodakazi amabili athi: ‘Siphe, siphe.’ “Kukhona izinto ezintathu ezingasuthi, nezine ezingasho ukuthi: ‘Kwanele!’:
Prov 30:16 indawo yabafileyo, nesizalo esiyinyumba, nomhlaba ongasuthi ngamanzi, nomlilo ongasho ukuthi: ‘Kwanele!’
Prov 30:17 “Iso eliklolodela uyise nelidelela ukulalela unina liyakukhishwa ngamagwababa angasemfuleni, lidliwe ngamazinyane okhozi.
Prov 30:18 “Kukhona izinto ezintathu ezingahlula ngokumangalisa, yebo, ezine engingazaziyo:
Prov 30:19 indlela yokhozi emoyeni, nendlela yenyoka edwaleni, nendlela yomkhumbi phakathi kolwandle, nendlela yendoda entombini.
Prov 30:20 “Inje indlela yowesifazane ophingayo: uyadla, abesesula umlomo wakhe, athi: ‘Angenzanga isono.’
Prov 30:21 “Phansi kwezinto ezintathu umhlaba uyazamazama, yebo, phansi kwezine ongezithwale:
Prov 30:22 phansi kwenceku ekubekweni kwayo inkosi, nesiwula uma sisuthile ngokudla,
Prov 30:23 naphansi kwesaliwakazi ekuganeni kwaso, nencekukazi ekulidleni ifa lenkosikazi yayo.
Prov 30:24 “Kukhona izinto ezine ezincane emhlabeni, kepha zihlakaniphile kakhulu:
Prov 30:25 izintuthwane ziyisizwe esingenamandla, kanti ziyalungisa ukudla kwazo ehlobo;
Prov 30:26 izimbila ziyisizwe esibuthakathaka, kanti ziyakha izindlu zazo edwaleni;
Prov 30:27 izinkumbi azinankosi, kanti ziyaphuma zonke ngamaviyo;
Prov 30:28 isibankwa ungasibamba ngezandla zombili, kanti sisendlini yenkosi.
Prov 30:29 “Kukhona izinto ezintathu ezinyathela ngesizotha, yebo, ezine ezihamba ngesithunzi:
Prov 30:30 ingonyama, iqhawe ezilwaneni; ayihlehli nakusiphi;
Prov 30:31 nehhashi lempi kanye nempongo, nenkosi phambi kwempi yayo.
Prov 30:32 “Uma wenzile ubuwula ngokuziphakamisa. wacabanga okubi, beka isandla emlonyeni wakho.
Prov 30:33 Ngokuba ukuphehla ubisi kuveza iphehlwa, nokucindezelwa kwempumulo kuveza igazi; kanjalo ukucindezela ulaka kuveza ukuxabana.”
Prov 31:1 Amazwi kaLemuweli, inkosi yaseMasa, awafundiswa ngunina.
Prov 31:2 “Yini, ndodana yami, yini, ndodana yesizalo sami, yini, ndodana yezithembiso zami, na?
Prov 31:3 Unganiki abesifazane amandla akho, nezindlela zakho kwababhubhisa amakhosi.
Prov 31:4 “Akusikho okwamakhosi, Lemuweli, akusikho okwamakhosi ukuphuza iwayini, nokwababusi ukufisa uphuzo olunamandla,
Prov 31:5 funa baphuze, bakhohlwe izimiso, baguqule ukwahlulelwa kwabantwana bokuhlupheka.
Prov 31:6 Mnike obhubhayo uphuzo olunamandla nomunyu enhliziyweni iwayini.
Prov 31:7 Makaphuze akhohlwe ubumpofu bakhe, angabe esakhumbula usizi lwakhe.
Prov 31:8 “Sivulele isimungulu umlomo wakho, umele bonke abantwana abayizintandane.
Prov 31:9 Vula umlomo wakho, wahlulele ngokulunga, umele abahluphekayo nabampofu.”
Prov 31:10 Ngubani ongathola umfazi okhutheleyo na? Ngokuba inani lakhe lidlula kakhulu amarubi.
Prov 31:11 Inhliziyo yendoda yakhe iyethemba kuye; ayiyikuswela inzuzo.
Prov 31:12 Uyayenzela okuhle, kungabi ngokubi, zonke izinsuku zokuphila kwakhe.
Prov 31:13 Ufuna uboya bezimvu nefilakisi; usebenza ngezandla ezivumayo.
Prov 31:14 Unjengemikhumbi yabathengi; ulanda kude ukudla kwakhe.
Prov 31:15 Uyavuka kuse sebusuku, aphe abendlu yakhe ukudla namantombazana akhe imisebenzi yawo.
Prov 31:16 Ucabanga ngensimu, ayithenge; ngesithelo sezandla zakhe utshala isivini,
Prov 31:17 Uyabhinca okhalweni amandla; uyaqinisa izingalo zakhe.
Prov 31:18 Uyabona ukuthi ukuphatha kwakhe kunenzuzo; isibani sakhe asicimeki nasebusuku.
Prov 31:19 Uyabeka izandla zakhe othini lokuphotha izintambo, neminwe yakhe ibamba insimbi.
Prov 31:20 Ohluphekayo uyamvulela isandla sakhe, yebo, uzelulela abampofu izandla zakhe.
Prov 31:21 Akesatshiswa ngabendlu yakhe ngungqoqwane; ngokuba bonke abendlu yakhe bembathiswa okubomvu.
Prov 31:22 Uyazenzela izindwangu ezimbozayo; izambatho zakhe ziyilineni elicolekileyo nokububende.
Prov 31:23 Indoda yakhe iyaziwa emasangweni, lapho ihlezi namalunga ezwe.
Prov 31:24 Wenza izingubo zelineni, athengise ngazo, anikele kubathengi amabhande.
Prov 31:25 Amandla nesithunzi kungukwembatha kwakhe; uhleka usuku oluzayo.
Prov 31:26 Uyawuvula umlomo wakhe ngokuhlakanipha, nomthetho womusa usolimini lwakhe.
Prov 31:27 Uyaqaphela okwenziwayo endlini yakhe, akadli isinkwa sobuvila.
Prov 31:28 Abantwana bakhe bayasukuma, bambusise; nendoda yakhe iyamdumisa ngokuthi:
Prov 31:29 “Baningi abafazi abakhutheleyo, kepha wena ubadlula bonke.”
Prov 31:30 Ubuhle buyinkohliso, nokubukeka kuyize, kepha owesifazane owesaba uJehova uyakudunyiswa.
Prov 31:31 Muphe ezithelweni zezandla zakhe, izenzo zakhe zimdumise emasangweni.
Eccl 1:1 Amazwi oMshumayeli indodana kaDavide, inkosi yaseJerusalema.
Eccl 1:2 “Ize leze,” usho uMshumayeli, “ize leze, konke kuyize.”
Eccl 1:3 Kuyinzuzoni kumuntu ngawo wonke umshikashika wakhe awushikashikayo phansi kwelanga na?
Eccl 1:4 Isizukulwane siyamuka, isizukulwane siyeza, kepha umhlaba umi phakade.
Eccl 1:5 Ilanga liyaphuma, ilanga liyashona, lishesha ukuya endaweni yalo lapho liphuma khona.
Eccl 1:6 Umoya uya ngaseningizimu, uzungeze, uye ngasenyakatho; uzungazungeza njalo ekuhambeni kwawo, nasekuzungezeni kwawo umoya uyabuyela.
Eccl 1:7 Yonke imifula iyangena elwandle, kepha ulwandle alugcwali; endaweni eya kuyo imifula, ibuye iye khona njalo.
Eccl 1:8 Zonke izinto ziyakhandleka, akakho ongakuphimisa; iso alisuthi ngokubona, nendlebe ayigcwali ngokuzwa.
Eccl 1:9 Okwake kwaba khona yikho okuyakuba khona, nokwake kwenziwa yikho okuyakwenziwa; akukho okusha phansi kwelanga.
Eccl 1:10 Kukhona yini into okuthiwa ngayo: “Bheka, intsha le.” Yayikhona nasemandulo ayengaphambi kwethu.
Eccl 1:11 Akukho ukukhunjulwa kwase bephelile, nabalandelayo abayakufika abayikukhunjulwa nabo phakathi kwabalandela bona.
Eccl 1:12 Mina Mshumayeli ngangiyinkosi phezu kuka-Israyeli eJerusalema.
Eccl 1:13 Nganikela inhliziyo yami ukufuna nokuvivinya ngokuhlakanipha konke okwenziwa phansi kwezulu; kungumshikashika omubi uNkulunkulu awunikile amadodana abantu ukuba awushikashike.
Eccl 1:14 Ngiyibonile yonke imisebenzi eyenziwayo phansi kwelanga; bheka, konke kuyize nokufuna umoya.
Eccl 1:15 Okuyisigwegwe akunakuqondiswa, nokungekho akunakubalwa.
Eccl 1:16 Ngakhuluma mina nenhliziyo yami, ngathi: “Bheka, ngenzile ukuhlakanipha kube kukhulu, ngikwandisile kunabo bonke phambi kwami eJerusalema, yebo, inhliziyo yami ibonile kakhulu ukuhlakanipha nokwazi.”
Eccl 1:17 Nganikela inhliziyo yami ukwazi ukuhlakanipha nokwazi ubuhlanya nobuwula. Ngase ngibona ukuthi nalokho kwakungukufuna umoya.
Eccl 1:18 Ngokuba ekuhlakanipheni okuningi kukhona ukukhathazeka okuningi; owandisa ukwazi wandisa usizi.
Eccl 2:1 Ngase ngithi mina enhliziyweni yami: “Woza, ngizakukulinga ngentokozo; mawubone okuhle nje.” Kepha nalokho kwakuyize.
Eccl 2:2 Ngathi ngokuhleka: “Ngubuhlanya,” nangentokozo: “Yenzani na?”
Eccl 2:3 Ngaphenya enhliziyweni yami ukuba ngiyakuthokozisa kanjani umzimba wami ngewayini, inhliziyo ingihole nokho ngokuhlakanipha, nokuba ngibambe ubuwula, ngize ngibone ukuthi kuyini okuhle kumadodana abantu ukuba akwenze phansi kwezulu ezinsukwini zonke zokuphila kwawo.
Eccl 2:4 Ngazenzela imisebenzi emikhulu, ngazakhela izindlu, ngazitshalela izivini,
Eccl 2:5 ngazenzela izivande namahlathi, ngatshala khona imithi enezithelo zezinhlobo zonke,
Eccl 2:6 ngazenzela amachibi amanzi ukuba kuniselwe ngawo ihlathi lemithi emilayo.
Eccl 2:7 Ngathenga izinceku nezincekukazi, nganginazo ezazalwa endlini; yebo, nganginemfuyo enkulu yezinkomo neyezimvu phezu kwakho konke okwakuphambi kwami eJerusalema.
Eccl 2:8 Ngazibuthela futhi isiliva negolide, nemfuyo yamakhosi, nezifunda; ngathola abahlabeleli, abesilisa nabesifazane, nalokho athokoza ngakho amadodana abantu: isancinza, yebo, izancinza eziningi.
Eccl 2:9 Ngase ngikhula ngaba mkhulu kunabo bonke ababe phambi kwami eJerusalema. Nokuhlakanipha kwami kwakumi ngakimi.
Eccl 2:10 Konke amehlo ami akufisayo angikugodlanga kuwo; angenqabelanga inhliziyo yami neyodwa intokozo, ngokuba inhliziyo yami yathokoza ngawo wonke umshikashika wami; lokho kwakuyisabelo sami kuwo wonke umshikashika wami.
Eccl 2:11 Ngase ngibhekana nemisebenzi yonke ezaziyenzile izandla zami, nomshikashika engangishikashikile ukuwenza; bheka, konke kwakuyize nokufuna umoya, akukho nzuzo phansi kwelanga.
Eccl 2:12 Ngase ngiphenduka ukuba ngibone ukuhlakanipha, nokuhlanya, nobuwula, ngokuba angenzani umuntu olandela inkosi ngaphandle kwalokho okwenziweyo ngaphambili na?
Eccl 2:13 Ngase ngibona ukuthi ukuhlakanipha kudlula ubuwula njengalokhu ukukhanya kudlula ubumnyama.
Eccl 2:14 Ohlakaniphileyo unamehlo ekhanda lakhe, kepha isiwula sihamba ebumnyameni; nokho ngabona ukuthi umehlo munye wehlela bonke.
Eccl 2:15 Ngase ngithi enhliziyweni yami: “Njengokwehlelwa kwesiwula ngiyakwehlelwa nami; ngisidluleleni ngokuhlakanipha na?” Ngathi-ke enhliziyweni yami ukuba nalokho kwakuyize.
Eccl 2:16 Ngokuba akukho ukukhunjulwa kohlakaniphileyo nokwesiwula kuze kube phakade, lokhu ezinsukwini ezizayo konke kuyakube sekukhohlakele. Nohlakaniphileyo akafi njengesiwula na?
Eccl 2:17 Ngase ngizonda ukuphila, ngokuba umsebenzi owenziwa phansi kwelanga mubi kimi, lokhu konke kuyize nokufuna umoya nje.
Eccl 2:18 Yebo, ngazonda wonke umshikashika wami engangiwushikashika phansi kwelanga, lokhu ngabona ukuthi ngizakuwushiya kumuntu ofika emva kwami.
Eccl 2:19 Ngubani owaziyo, uma eyakuba ngumuntu ohlakaniphileyo noma isiwula na? Nokho uyakubusa phezu kwawo wonke umshikashika wami engiwushikashikile nengihlakaniphele kuwo phansi kwelanga. Nalokho kuyize.
Eccl 2:20 Ngase ngibuye ngaphela ithemba ngawo wonke umshikashika engangiwushikashikile phansi kwelanga.
Eccl 2:21 Ngokuba kukhona umuntu omshikashika wakhe wenziwe ngokuhlakanipha, nangokwazi, nangekhono, kepha nokho uyakuwunikeza kumuntu ongawushikashikanga kube yisabelo sakhe. Nalokho kuyize nobubi obukhulu.
Eccl 2:22 Ngokuba umuntu unanzuzoni yawo wonke umshikashika wakhe nokukhandleka kwenhliziyo yakhe akushikashikile phansi kwelanga na?
Eccl 2:23 Ngokuba zonke izinsuku zakhe zinobuhlungu, nomsebenzi wakhe ulusizi; yebo, nasebusuku inhliziyo yakhe ayiphumuli; nalokho kuyize.
Eccl 2:24 Akukho okuhle kumuntu kunalokhu kokuba adle, aphuze, abonise umphefumulo wakhe okuhle emshikashikeni wakhe, kepha nalokho ngakubona ukuthi kuvela esandleni sikaNkulunkulu.
Eccl 2:25 Ngokuba ngubani ongadla, ngubani ongajabula ngaphandle kwakhe na?
Eccl 2:26 Ngokuba umuntu omuhle kuNkulunkulu uyamnika ukuhlakanipha, nokwazi, nentokozo, kepha isoni usinika usizi lokuba sibuthe, siqongelele, ukuze simnike yena omuhle kuNkulunkulu. Nalokho kuyize nokufuna umoya.
Eccl 3:1 Konke kunesikhathi sakho, yonke indaba inomzuzu wayo phansi kwezulu.
Eccl 3:2 Kukhona isikhathi sokuzalwa nesikhathi sokufa, isikhathi sokutshala nesikhathi sokusiphula okutshaliweyo;
Eccl 3:3 isikhathi sokubulala nesikhathi sokuphilisa, isikhathi sokudiliza nesikhathi sokwakha;
Eccl 3:4 isikhathi sokukhala nesikhathi sokuhleka, isikhathi sokulila nesikhathi sokusina;
Eccl 3:5 isikhathi sokuphonsa amatshe nesikhathi sokuqoqa amatshe, isikhathi sokugona nesikhathi sokungagoni;
Eccl 3:6 isikhathi sokufuna nesikhathi sokulahlekelwa, isikhathi sokugcina nesikhathi sokuhlahla;
Eccl 3:7 isikhathi sokuklebhula nesikhathi sokuthunga, isikhathi sokuthula nesikhathi sokukhuluma;
Eccl 3:8 isikhathi sokuthanda nesikhathi sokuzonda, isikhathi sokulwa nesikhathi sokuzola.
Eccl 3:9 Unanzuzoni osebenzayo ngalokho akushikashikayo na?
Eccl 3:10 Ngibonile umshikashika uNkulunkulu awunikile amadodana abantu ukuba awushikashike.
Eccl 3:11 Wenzile konke kube kuhle esikhathini sakho, ubekile nokuphakade ezinhliziyweni zabo; nokho umuntu angefumane umsebenzi awenzile uNkulunkulu kwasekuqaleni kuze kube sekupheleni.
Eccl 3:12 Ngiyazi ukuthi akukho okuhle kubo kunokuba bathokoze, bazenzele okumnandi besekhona.
Eccl 3:13 Kepha futhi ukuba abantu bonke badle, baphuze, babone okuhle kuwo wonke umshikashika wabo kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu nalokho.
Eccl 3:14 Ngiyazi ukuthi konke akwenzayo uNkulunkulu kuyakuba khona kuze kube phakade; akukho okungenezelwa kukho, futhi akukho okungasuswa kukho. UNkulunkulu ukwenzile ukuba abantu besabe phambi kwakhe.
Eccl 3:15 Lokhu okukhona yikho okwakukhona, nalokhu okuyakuba khona kade kwakukhona; uNkulunkulu ufuna okudlulileyo.
Eccl 3:16 Futhi ngabona phansi kwelanga ukuthi kukhona okubi endaweni yokwahlulela nokuthi kukhona ukushinga endaweni yokulunga.
Eccl 3:17 Ngase ngithi enhliziyweni yami: “UNkulunkulu uyakwahlulela nolungileyo nomubi, ngokuba kukhona lapha isikhathi sezindaba zonke nesemisebenzi yonke.”
Eccl 3:18 Ngathi enhliziyweni yami: “Kungenxa yamadodana abantu ukuze uNkulunkulu awavivinye, wona azibonele ukuthi anjengezilwane nje.
Eccl 3:19 Ngokuba okwehlela amadodana abantu kwehlela nezilwane, into inye ikwehlela kokubili: njengalokhu kufa lokho, kuyafa nalokhu; kunomphefumulo munye, umuntu akazidluli ngalutho izilwane, ngokuba konke kuyize.
Eccl 3:20 Konke kuya endaweni inye; konke kuvela othulini, konke kubuyela othulini.
Eccl 3:21 Ngubani owaziyo ukuthi umoya wamadodana abantu ukhuphukela phezulu, nomoya wezilwane ukuthi wehlela phansi emhlabathini, na?”
Eccl 3:22 Ngase ngibona-ke ukuthi akukho okungcono kunokuba umuntu athokoze ngemisebenzi yakhe, lokhu kuyisabelo sakhe, ngokuba ngubani ongambuyisa ukuba abone okuyakuba semva kwakhe na?
Eccl 4:1 Ngase ngibuye ngabona konke ukucindezela okwenziwa phansi kwelanga; bheka izinyembezi zabacindezelwayo; babengenamduduzi. Ohlangothini lwababacindezelayo kwakukhona amandla, kepha bona babengenamduduzi.
Eccl 4:2 Ngase ngibusisa abafileyo asebafa kunabaphilayo abasekhona,
Eccl 4:3 kepha badlulwa bobabili nguye ongakabikho, ongabonanga umsebenzi omubi owenziwa phansi kwelanga.
Eccl 4:4 Futhi ngabona wonke umshikashika nakho konke okwenziwe ngekhono ukuthi kungumhawu womuntu ngomakhelwane wakhe. Nalokho kuyize nokufuna umoya.
Eccl 4:5 Isiwula siyasonga izandla zaso, sidle umzimba waso.
Eccl 4:6 Kungcono ukhweshe lokuthula kunezandla zombili zigcwele umshikashika kanye nokufuna umoya.
Eccl 4:7 Ngase ngibuye ngabona okunye okuyize phansi kwelanga:
Eccl 4:8 Kukhona oyedwa, kanaye owesibili, yebo, akanamntwana, kanamfowabo, nokho ukuphela komshikashika wakhe akukho, namehlo akhe awasuthi ngengcebo. Uthi: “Ngishikashikela-bani, ngiswezisela umphefumulo wami ngokuhle, na?” Nalokho kuyize nenhlupheko embi.
