Eccl 4:9 Kungcono ababili kunoyedwa, ngokuba banomvuzo omkhulu ngomshikashika wabo.
Eccl 4:10 Ngokuba uma bewa, omunye uyavusa umngane wakhe; kepha maye kuye oyedwa lapho ewa, engenawesibili wokumvusa!
Eccl 4:11 Futhi uma ababili belele ndawonye, banokufudumala, kepha oyedwa angafudumala kanjani na?
Eccl 4:12 Nakuba umuntu ahlula oyedwa, ababili bayakuma phambi kwakhe, nentambo emicu mithathu ayisheshi ukugqashuka.
Eccl 4:13 Kungcono umfana ompofu ohlakaniphileyo kunenkosi egugileyo eyisiwula, engasakwazi ukuxwayiswa,
Eccl 4:14 ngokuba waphuma etilongweni ukuba abe yinkosi, yebo, wazalwa embusweni wayo empofu.
Eccl 4:15 Ngabona bonke abaphilayo ababehamba phansi kwelanga bekanye nalowo mfana obeyakuma esikhundleni sakhe;
Eccl 4:16 kwakungekho ukuphela kwabantu bonke, bonke ayephambi kwabo; nokho abafika emuva abayikuthokoza ngaye. Impela nalokho kuyize nokufuna umoya.
Eccl 5:1 Gcina unyawo lwakho, lapho uya endlini kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba ukusondela ukuyokuzwa kungcono kunokunikela ngomhlatshelo weziwula, ngokuba azazi ukuthi zenza okubi.
Eccl 5:2 Ungabi namawala ngomlomo wakho, nenhliziyo yakho mayingasheshi ukukhipha izwi phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba uNkulunkulu usezulwini, wena usemhlabeni; ngalokho amazwi akho mawabe yingcosana.
Eccl 5:3 Ngokuba iphupho livela ngemisebenzi eminingi nephimbo lesiwula ngobuningi bamazwi.
Eccl 5:4 Lapho wenza isithembiso phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ungalibali ukusifeza, ngokuba akathokozi ngeziwula: feza lokhu okwethembisayo.
Eccl 5:5 Kungcono ukuba ungenzi isithembiso kunokuba uthembisa ungafezi.
Eccl 5:6 Ungavumeli umlomo wakho ukuba wonise inyama yakho, futhi ungasho phambi kwesithunywa sikaNkulunkulu ukuthi kuyiphutha; yini ukuba uNkulunkulu athukuthelele izwi lakho, achithe umsebenzi wezandla zakho, na?
Eccl 5:7 Ngokuba lapho kukhona amaphupho amaningi, kukhona nokuyize namazwi amaningi, kepha wena yesaba uNkulunkulu.
Eccl 5:8 Uma ubona ukudlovelwa kwabampofu nokuphangwa kokwahlulela nokokulunga ezweni, ungamangali ngakho, ngokuba omkhulu uqaphela omkhulu kunaye, futhi kukhona nabakhulu kunabo.
Eccl 5:9 Inkosi esebenzela amasimu iyinsizakalo yezwe kukho konke.
Eccl 5:10 Othanda imali akayikusutha ngemali, nothanda okuningi akaneliswa yizithelo; nalokho kuyize.
Eccl 5:11 Lapho okuhle kwanda, nabakudlayo bayanda; kulusizo luni kumninikho ngaphandle kokuba akubone ngamehlo akhe na?
Eccl 5:12 Ubuthongo besisebenzi bumnandi, noma sidla okuyingcosana noma okuningi, kepha ukusutha kocebileyo akumvumeli ukuba alale.
Eccl 5:13 Kukhona ububi obudabukisayo engibubonile phansi kwelanga: ingcebo egcinelwe umniniyo ukuba imlimaze;
Eccl 5:14 futhi uma ingcebo ichithwa ngengozi embi, indodana ayizalileyo ayinalutho esandleni sayo.
Eccl 5:15 Njengalokho aphuma esizalweni sikanina, uyakubuye amuke, ahambe ze njengasekufikeni kwakhe, engatholi lutho ngomshikashika wakhe, ahambe nalo esandleni sakhe.
Eccl 5:16 Nalokho kungububi obudabukisayo ukuthi uyamuka kukho konke njengokufika kwakhe; unanzuzoni ukuthi ushikashikele umoya na?
Eccl 5:17 Yebo, zonke izinsuku zakhe zisebumnyameni nasosizini, nasekukhathazekeni okuningi, nasekuguleni, nasekuthukutheleni.
Eccl 5:18 Bheka, engikubonile mina ukuthi kuhle nokumnandi kumuntu kungukudla, nokuphuza, nokubona okuhle kuwo wonke umshikashika wakhe awushikashikayo phansi kwelanga zonke izinsuku zokuphila kwakhe uNkulunkulu amnika zona; ngokuba lokhu kuyisabelo sakhe.
Eccl 5:19 Futhi bonke abantu uNkulunkulu abaphe ingcebo nemfuyo, abanike futhi namandla okudla kukho ukuba bathathe izabelo zabo, bathokoze ngomshikashika wabo lokho kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu.
Eccl 5:20 Ngokuba akakhumbuli kakhulu izinsuku zokuphila kwakhe, lokhu uNkulunkulu emnika intokozo enhliziyweni yakhe.
Eccl 6:1 Kukhona ububi engibubonile phansi kwelanga ukuthi bunzima phezu kwabantu:
Eccl 6:2 umuntu uNkulunkulu amnika ingcebo, nemfuyo, nodumo, aze angasweli lutho lomphefumulo wakhe kukho konke akufisayo, uNkulunkulu angamniki nokho amandla okudla kukho, kepha kudliwa ngumfokazi; lokho kuyize, kuyisifo esibi.
Eccl 6:3 Uma umuntu ezala abantwana abayikhulu, ehamba iminyaka eminingi, zibe ziningi izinsuku zeminyaka yakhe, kodwa umphefumulo wakhe ungasuthi ngokuhle, futhi angabi nakumbelwa, ngithi okuphuphumileyo kungcono kunaye,
Eccl 6:4 ngokuba kufika ngeze, kumuke ebumnyameni, igama lakho lisitshekelwa ngubumnyama.
Eccl 6:5 Nelanga akulibonanga, akwazi lutho; khona kunokuphumula kunaye.
Eccl 6:6 Yebo, noma ephila iminyaka eyinkulungwane ephindwa kabili, engaboni okuhle, abayi bonke endaweni inye na?
Eccl 6:7 Wonke umshikashika womuntu wenzelwa umlomo wakhe, nokho iphango alaneliswa.
Eccl 6:8 Ngokuba ohlakaniphileyo udluleleni isiwula, nompofu okwazi ukuhamba phambi kwabaphilileyo unantoni na?
Eccl 6:9 Kungcono ukubona kwamehlo kunokuzulazula kwesifiso; nalokhu kuyize nokufuna umoya.
Eccl 6:10 Okukhona kwake kwabizwa ngegama; kwaziwa ukuthi umuntu uyakuba yini; akanakwahlulelana nonamandla kunaye.
Eccl 6:11 Lokhu kukhona amazwi amaningi akwandisa okuyize, umuntu unanzuzoni na?
Eccl 6:12 Ngokuba ngubani okwaziyo okuhle okuyakuba ngokomuntu ekuhambeni kwakhe zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwakhe okuyize aziqedayo njengesithunzi na? Ngubani ongatshela umuntu okuyakuba semva kwakhe phansi kwelanga na?
Eccl 7:1 Igama elihle lingcono kunamafutha amahle, nosuku lokufa lungcono kunosuku lokuzalwa.
Eccl 7:2 Kungcono ukuya endlini yokulila kunokuya endlini yedili, ngokuba lokho kungukuphela kwabantu bonke; nophilayo makakubeke enhliziyweni yakhe.
Eccl 7:3 Usizi lungcono kunokuhleka, ngokuba ngokudabuka kobuso inhliziyo yenzelwa okuhle.
Eccl 7:4 Inhliziyo yabahlakaniphileyo isendlini yokulila, kepha inhliziyo yeziwula isendlini yentokozo.
Eccl 7:5 Kungcono ukuzwa ukukhuza kohlakaniphileyo kunokuba umuntu ezwe ukuhlabelela kweziwula.
Eccl 7:6 Njengokucacamba kwezintathawe eziphansi kwekhanzi, kunjalo ukuhleka kweziwula. Nalokho kuyize.
Eccl 7:7 Impela ukucindezela kuyamhlanyisa ohlakaniphileyo, nokuthengwa ngomvuzo kuchitha ingqondo.
Eccl 7:8 Kungcono ukuphela kwendaba kunokuqala kwayo; onomoya obekezelayo ungcono kunoziphakamisayo.
Eccl 7:9 Ungasheshi ukuthukuthela emoyeni wakho, ngokuba ulaka luhlala ezifubeni zeziwula.
Eccl 7:10 Ungasho ukuthi: “Kwenziwa kanjani ukuba izinsuku zokuqala zazizinhle kunalezi na?” Ngokuba awubuzi kanjalo ngokuhlakanipha.
Eccl 7:11 Ukuhlakanipha kuhle njengefa, yebo, kunenzuzo kwabalibonayo ilanga,
Eccl 7:12 ngokuba kusemthunzini wokuhlakanipha njengasemthunzini wemali, kepha inzuzo yokwazi ingeyokuba ukuhlakanipha kulondoloza ukuphila kwalowo onakho.
Eccl 7:13 Bona umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngubani ongelula lokho akugobileyo na?
Eccl 7:14 Yenama ngosuku lwenhlanhla, kepha ngosuku olubi qonda ukuthi nalolu uNkulunkulu ulwenzile njengalolo, ukuze umuntu angafumani lutho oluyakuba khona emva kwakhe.
Eccl 7:15 Konke ngikubonile emihleni yami eyize: kukhona olungileyo obhubhile ekulungeni kwakhe, kukhona nomubi owelula ukuphila kwakhe ebubini bakhe.
Eccl 7:16 Ungabi ngolungileyo ngokudluleleyo, ungazenzi ohlakaniphileyo kakhulu; uzichithelani na?
Eccl 7:17 Ungabi mubi ngokudluleleyo, ungabi yisiwula; uyakufelani kungakabi yisikhathi na?
Eccl 7:18 kuhle ukuba ubambelele kulokhu, yebo, ungabuyisi isandla sakho nakulokho, ngokuba owesaba uNkulunkulu uyakuphumelela kukho konke.
Eccl 7:19 Ukuhlakanipha kumenza ohlakaniphileyo ukuba abe namandla kunababusi abayishumi abasemzini.
Eccl 7:20 Ngokuba akukho muntu emhlabeni olungileyo kangaka ukuba enze okuhle, angoni.
Eccl 7:21 Ungabeki inhliziyo yakho emazwini onke akhulunywayo, funa uzwe inceku yakho ikuthuka,
Eccl 7:22 ngokuba kaninginingi inhliziyo yakho iyazi ukuba nawe ubathukile abanye.
Eccl 7:23 Konke lokho ngikuvivinyile ngokuhlakanipha, ngathi: “Ngiyakuhlakanipha,” kepha kwakusala kude nami.
Eccl 7:24 Okude nokujulile kakhulu, ngubani ongakufumana na?
Eccl 7:25 Ngase ngiphenduka ukuba inhliziyo yami yazi, ihlole, ifune ukuhlakanipha nendikimba yezindaba ukuyokwazi ububi ukuthi bungubuwula, nobuwula ukuthi bungubuhlanya.
Eccl 7:26 Ngase ngifumana okubaba kunokufa: owesifazane onhliziyo yakhe iyizingibe namanetha, nezandla zakhe ziyizibopho; omuhle phambi kukaNkulunkulu uyakuphunyuka kuye, kepha isoni siyakubanjwa nguye.
Eccl 7:27 “Bheka, nakhu engikufumene,” uthi uMshumayeli: “Ngibeka okunye kokunye ukuba ngithole indikimba yezindaba,
Eccl 7:28 nokusafunwa ngumphefumulo wami, ngingakakufumani kodwa: indoda inye phakathi kwenkulungwane ngiyifumene, kepha owesifazane phakathi kwabo bonke labo angimfumananga.
Eccl 7:29 Bheka, lokhu kuphela ngikufumene ukuthi uNkulunkulu wamenza umuntu waba qotho, kepha bona bafunile amacebo amaningi.”
Eccl 8:1 Ngubani onjengohlakaniphileyo na? Ngubani owazi ukuchasisela indaba na? Ukuhlakanipha komuntu kuyakhanyisa ubuso bakhe, nobulukhuni bobuso bakhe buyaguqulwa.
Eccl 8:2 Ngithi: Gcina izwi lenkosi ngenxa yesifungo ngoNkulunkulu.
Eccl 8:3 Ungasheshi ukusuka ebusweni bayo, ungemi endabeni embi, ngokuba yenza konke ekuthandayo.
Eccl 8:4 Ngokuba izwi lenkosi liyabusa; ngubani ongasho kuyo ukuthi: “Wenzani na?”
Eccl 8:5 Ogcina umyalo akayikwazi okubi: nenhliziyo yohlakaniphileyo iyakwazi isikhathi nokwahlulela,
Eccl 8:6 ngokuba kukhona isikhathi nokwahlulela ezindabeni zonke; nokho ububi bomuntu bukhulu phezu kwakhe,
Eccl 8:7 lokhu engazi okuyakuba khona, ngokuba ngubani ongamtshela ukuthi kuyakuba kanjani na?
Eccl 8:8 Akukho muntu onamandla phezu komoya ukuba awuthiye, futhi akakho obusa phezu kosuku lokufa; ukukhululwa akukho empini, nobubi abunakukhulula umninibo.
Eccl 8:9 Ngabona konke lokho, ngabeka inhliziyo yami kuyo yonke imisebenzi eyenziwa phansi kwelanga ngesikhathi lapho umuntu ebusa omunye kube ngukulimala kwakhe.
Eccl 8:10 Kanjalo ngabona ukuthi ababi bembelwa, ababengenile bephuma endaweni engcwele, bababazeka emzini lapho kade benza okunjalo; nalokho kuyize.
Eccl 8:11 Ngenxa yokuba ububi obenziwayo bungahlulelwa masinyane, ngalokho izinhliziyo zamadodana abantu phakathi kwawo zigcwele ukwenza okubi,
Eccl 8:12 ngangokuba isoni, noma senza okubi kayikhulu, kuyandiswa nokho izinsuku zaso. Kanti nokho ngiyazi ukuthi kuzakuba kuhle kwabamesabayo uNkulunkulu, lokhu besaba phambi kobuso bakhe;
Eccl 8:13 kodwa akuyikuba kuhle kwababi, nemihla yabo ayiyikwandiswa njengesithunzi, lokhu abesabi phambi kukaNkulunkulu.
Eccl 8:14 Kukhona okuyize okwenziwa emhlabeni kokuthi kukhona abalungileyo abehlelwa ngokomsebenzi wababi, nokuthi kukhona ababi abehlelwa ngokomsebenzi wabalungileyo; ngathi: “Nalokho kuyize.”
Eccl 8:15 Ngase ngibabaza intokozo, ngokuba umuntu akanakho okuhle phansi kwelanga kunokudla, nokuphuza, nokujabula; lokhu kuyakuhlala kuye emshikashikeni wakhe ezinsukwini zokuphila kwakhe aziphiweyo nguNkulunkulu phansi kwelanga.
Eccl 8:16 Lapho ngibeka inhliziyo yami ukukwazi ukuhlakanipha nokubona umshikashika owenziwa emhlabeni, ngokuba akakho obona ubuthongo ngamehlo akhe imini nobusuku,
Eccl 8:17 ngase ngiqonda wonke umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu ukuthi umuntu akanakuwubamba umsebenzi owenziwa phansi kwelanga, ngokuba noma umuntu eshikashikeka kangakanani ukuwuhlola, angewuthole, yebo, nakuba ohlakaniphileyo ecabanga ukuthi uyawazi, akanakuwuthola.
Eccl 9:1 Ngokuba konke lokho ngakubeka enhliziyweni yami ukuhlola konke lokho ukuthi abalungileyo nabahlakaniphileyo nemisebenzi yabo kusesandleni sikaNkulunkulu; noma kuluthando noma kuyinzondo, akukho muntu okwaziyo; konke kusebusweni babo.
Eccl 9:2 Konke kungabehlela bonke, olungileyo nomubi, omuhle nohlambulukileyo nongcolileyo, onikela ngomhlatshelo nongenawo umhlatshelo, omuhle abe njengesoni, ofungayo njengowesaba isifungo.
Eccl 9:3 Kubi lokhu kukho konke okwenziwa phansi kwelanga ukuthi bonke behlelwa yinto inye; ngalokho izinhliziyo zamadodana abantu zigcwele ububi, nobuhlanya busezinhliziyweni zabo besekhona, andukuba baye kwabafileyo.
Eccl 9:4 Ohlangene nabo bonke abaphilayo kukhona ithemba kuye, ngokuba inja ephilayo ingcono kunengonyama efileyo.
Eccl 9:5 Ngokuba abaphilayo bayazi ukuthi bayakufa, kepha abafileyo abazi lutho, futhi abasenawo umvuzo, ngokuba ukukhunjulwa kwabo sekukhohlakele.
Eccl 9:6 Uthando lwabo, nokuzonda kwabo, nomhawu wabo sekuphelile, futhi abasenaso isabelo nanini kukho konke okwenziwa phansi kwelanga.
Eccl 9:7 Hamba udle isinkwa sakho ngentokozo, uphuze iwayini ngenhliziyo enhle, ngokuba uNkulunkulu usevumile imisebenzi yakho.
Eccl 9:8 Izingubo zakho mazibe mhlophe ngezikhathi zonke, nekhanda lakho malingasweli amafutha.
Eccl 9:9 Thokoza ngokuphila nomkakho omthandayo zonke izinsuku zokuphila kwakho okuyize, oziphiwayo phansi kwelanga zonke izinsuku zakho eziyize, ngokuba lokhu kuyisabelo sakho kulokho kuphila ngomshikashika wakho owushikashikayo phansi kwelanga.
Eccl 9:10 Konke isandla sakho esikufumanayo ukukwenza, kwenze ngamandla akho, ngokuba akukho msebenzi, namcabango, nakwazi, nakuhlakanipha endaweni yabafileyo, lapho uya khona.
Eccl 9:11 Ngabuye ngabona phansi kwelanga ukuthi ukujaha akuyi ngabanejubane, nokulwa ngamaqhawe, nesinkwa ngabahlakaniphileyo, nengcebo ngabaqondileyo, nomusa ngabanokwazi, ngokuba bonke bahlangabezana nesikhathi nethuba.
Eccl 9:12 Ngokuba umuntu akasazi isikhathi sakhe; njengezinhlanzi ezibanjwa enetheni elibi nezinyoni ezibanjwa ogibeni, kanjalo amadodana abantu abekelwa isihibe ngesikhathi esibi, lapho siwehlela ngokuzumayo.
Eccl 9:13 Ngabona futhi ukuhlakanipha ngale ndlela phansi kwelanga, kwaba kukhulu kimi:
Eccl 9:14 kwakukhona umuzi omncane, unabantu abayingcosana phakathi kwawo; kwafika inkosi enkulu kuwo, yawuvimbezela, yakha izinqaba ezinkulu ngakuwo;
Eccl 9:15 kepha kwafunyanwa kuwo indoda empofu ehlakaniphileyo; yawukhulula umuzi ngokuhlakanipha kwayo, kodwa nokho akakho okhumbula leyo ndoda empofu.
Eccl 9:16 Ngase ngithi: “Ukuhlakanipha kuhle kunamandla,” kepha ukuhlakanipha kompofu kuyadelelwa, namazwi akhe awezwakali.
Eccl 9:17 Amazwi abahlakaniphileyo ezwakalayo ekuthuleni mahle kunokumemeza kobusa phakathi kweziwula.
Eccl 9:18 Ukuhlakanipha kungcono kunezikhali zokulwa, ngokuba oyedwa owonayo angachitha okuhle okuningi.
Eccl 10:1 Izimpukane ezifileyo zenza amafutha omthaki ukuba anuke, abile; kanjalo ubuwula obuncane bulingana nokuhlakanipha nodumo.
Eccl 10:2 Inhliziyo yohlakaniphileyo ingakwesokunene sakhe, kepha inhliziyo yesiwula ingakwesokhohlo.
Eccl 10:3 Yebo, nasendleleni esihamba ngayo isiwula, siyaphela ingqondo, sisho kubo bonke ukuthi siyisiwula.
Eccl 10:4 Uma umoya wombusi ukuvukela, ungashiyi indawo yakho, ngokuba ukubekezela kuvimba izono ezinkulu.
Eccl 10:5 Kukhona ububi engibubonile phansi kwelanga, bunjengephutha elivela kumbusi:
Eccl 10:6 ubuwula bubekwa ezindaweni eziningi eziphakemeyo, kepha abacebileyo bahlala kweziphansi.
Eccl 10:7 Ngibonile izinceku zikhwele amahhashi, nezikhulu zihamba phansi njengezinceku.
Eccl 10:8 Omba umgodi uyakuwela kuwo, nodiliza ugange uyakulunywa yinyoka.
Eccl 10:9 Okhipha amatshe uyakulinyazwa yiwo, nobanda izinkuni uyakuba sengozini ngazo.
Eccl 10:10 Uma insimbi ibuthuntu, umuntu engaloli usiko, uyakhamelela ngamandla; kepha okusizayo ukuphumelelisa kungukuhlakanipha.
Eccl 10:11 Uma inyoka iluma ingakalunjwa, umlumbi akasizi lutho.
Eccl 10:12 Amazwi omlomo wohlakaniphileyo anomusa, kepha izindebe zesiwula ziyasigwinya sona.
Eccl 10:13 Ukuqala kwamazwi omlomo waso angubuwula, nokugcina kokukhuluma kwaso kungubuhlanya obubi.
Eccl 10:14 Isiwula siyandisa amazwi, nokho umuntu akazi okuyakuba khona; nalokho okuyakuba ngasemva kwakhe, ngubani ongamtshela lokho na?
Eccl 10:15 Umshikashika weziwula uyaziqoba, ukuze zingazi nokuya emzini.
Eccl 10:16 Maye kuwe lizwe onkosi yakho ingumntwana, nezikhulu zakho zinedili ekuseni!
Eccl 10:17 Ubusisiwe wena lizwe onkosi yakho iyindodana yabakhulu, nezikhulu zakho zinedili ngesikhathi, ziziqinise, zingadakwa.
Eccl 10:18 Ngobuvila obukhulu indlu iyabola, nangokwenqena kwezandla iyavuza.
Eccl 10:19 Idili lenzelwa ukuhleka, newayini liyenamisa ukuphila, kepha imali iyimpendulo yakho konke.
Eccl 10:20 Ungayiqalekisi inkosi nasemicabangweni yakho, ungabathuki abacebileyo nasekamelweni lakho lokulala, ngokuba inyoni yezulu iyakulihambisa izwi, nokunamaphiko kuyakuyilanda indaba.
Eccl 11:1 Thuma isinkwa sakho ebusweni bamanzi, ngokuba uyakusifumana emva kwezinsuku eziningi.
Eccl 11:2 Yabela abayisikhombisa nabayisishiyagalombili, ngokuba awukwazi okubi okuyakuba semhlabeni.
Eccl 11:3 Uma amafu egcwele imvula, ayayithulula emhlabeni; futhi uma kuwa umuthi ngaseningizimu noma ngasenyakatho, endaweni lapho uwa khona umuthi, uyakuba lapho.
Eccl 11:4 Oqaphela umoya akayikuhlwanyela; obheka amafu kayikuvuna.
Eccl 11:5 Njengalokhu ungazi indlela yomoya ukuthi iphi, nokubunjwa kwamathambo esizalweni sokhulelweyo, kanjalo awuyazi nemisebenzi kaNkulunkulu owenza konke.
Eccl 11:6 Hlwanyela imbewu yakho kusasa, ungaphumuzi isandla sakho nakusihlwa, ngokuba awazi ukuthi yiyiphi eyakuphumelela, yilena noma yileyo, noma ziyakuba zinhle zombili ngokufanayo.
Eccl 11:7 Ukukhanya kumnandi, yebo, kuhle emehlweni ukubona ilanga.
Eccl 11:8 Noma umuntu ekhona iminyaka eminingi, makathokoze ngayo yonke, akhumbule nokho nezinsuku zobumnyama ukuthi njengokuba ziziningi, konke okufikayo kuyize.
Eccl 11:9 Thokoza, nsizwa, ebusheni bakho, inhliziyo yakho ikuphe ukwenama emihleni yobunsizwa bakho, uhambe ngezindlela zenhliziyo yakho njengokubona kwamehlo akho, kepha yazi ukuthi ngakho konke lokho uNkulunkulu uyakukungenisa ekwahlulelweni.
Eccl 11:10 Khipha usizi enhliziyweni yakho, udlulise okubi emzimbeni wakho, ngokuba ubusha nobunsizwa buyize.
Eccl 12:1 Futhi khumbula uMdali wakho emihleni yobusha bakho, zingakafiki izinsuku ezimbi, ingakasondeli iminyaka osho ngayo ukuthi: “Angithokozi ngayo,”
Eccl 12:2 yebo, lingakabi mnyama ilanga, nokukhanya, nenyanga, nezinkanyezi, namafu engakabuyi emva kwemvula,
Eccl 12:3 ngalolo suku lapho abalindi bendlu beyakuthuthumela, amadoda anamandla agobe, abasilikazi bayeke ngokuba beyingcosana, abalunguza emafasiteleni bafiphazelwe,
Eccl 12:4 iminyango ivalwe esitaladini, lapho umsindo wokusila uncipha, umuntu avuke ngezwi lenyoni, izintombi zonke zokuhlabelela zithuliswe;
Eccl 12:5 nalapho abantu besaba imimango izesabiso zibe sendleleni, umalimondi ukhahlele, intethe itotobe, izithelo zesihlahla sekaphari zingabe zisaba namandla, ngokuba umuntu useya endlini yakhe ephakade, nabalilayo bazulazula esitaladini;
Eccl 12:6 yebo, lingakagqabuki igoda lesiliva, nokhamba lwegolide lungakaphahlazwa, nembiza ingakafi ngasemthonjeni, nesondo lingakaphuki ngasemgodini wamanzi,
Eccl 12:7 uthuli lubuyele emhlabathini, njengokuba lwalunjalo, umoya ubuyele kuNkulunkulu owawunikayo.
Eccl 12:8 “Ize leze,” usho uMshumayeli, “konke kuyize.”
Eccl 12:9 Futhi ngokuba uMshumayeli wayehlakaniphile, wayefundisa abantu ukwazi, wazindla, waphenya walungisa izaga eziningi.
Eccl 12:10 UMshumayeli wafuna ukuthola amazwi anamisayo afanele ukulotshwa, amazwi eqiniso.
Eccl 12:11 Amazwi abahlakaniphileyo anjengezincijo, nezigaba zawo zinjengezipikili ezinamatheleyo, ephiwe nguMalusi munye.
Eccl 12:12 Kepha phezu kwalana, ndodana yami, mawuxwaye; ukwenza izincwadi eziningi akunakuphela, nokufunda okuningi kukhathaza umzimba.
Eccl 12:13 Nakhu ukuphela kwendaba, lapho sekuzwakele konke: Mesabe uNkulunkulu, ugcine imiyalo yakhe, ngokuba lokho kungokwabantu bonke.
Eccl 12:14 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyakuyisa uyakuyisa yonke imisebenzi ekwahlulelweni kanye nakho konke okufihliweyo, noma kuhle noma kubi.
Song 1:1 Isihlabelelo sezihlabelelo esingesikaSolomoni.
Song 1:2 Makangange ngokwanga komlomo wakhe! Ngokuba uthando lwakho lumnandi kunewayini.
Song 1:3 Amafutha akho anephunga elimnandi; igama lakho linjengamafutha athululiweyo; ngalokho izintombi ziyakuthanda.
Song 1:4 Ngidonse emva kwakho, sigijime; inkosi isingingenisile emakamelweni ayo. Siyakujabula, sithokoze ngawe, sikhulume ngothando lwakho kunewayini. Kufanele ukuba bakuthande.
Song 1:5 Ngimnyama, kepha ngimuhle, madodakazi aseJerusalema, njengamatende akwaKedari, njengezilenge zikaSolomoni.
Song 1:6 Ningangibuki ukuthi ngimnyamana, ngokuba ilanga lingifusile. Amadodana kamame angifutha, angenza umlindizivini, kepha isivini esingesami angisilindanga.
Song 1:7 Ngitshele wena othandwa ngumphefumulo wami ukuthi waluselaphi, uphumuzaphi umhlambi emini, ngokuba yini ukuba ngibe njengowesifazane odukileyo ngasemihlambini yabangane bakho na?
Song 1:8 Uma ungakwazi wena muhlekazi phakathi kwabesifazane, phuma uhambe ezinyathelweni zomhlambi, waluse amazinyane akho ngasematendeni abelusi.
Song 1:9 Ngikufanisa nehhashi lensikazi lezinqola zikaFaro, sithandwa sami.
Song 1:10 Izihlathi zakho zinhle kangakanani zinezintambo zobuhlalu, nentamo yakho ineminaka.
Song 1:11 Siyakukwenzela izintambo zobuhlalu begolide, namaqhosha esiliva.
Song 1:12 Inkosi isahlezi ngasetafuleni layo inadi lami lathaphuka iphunga lalo.
Song 1:13 Othandiweyo wami ungumshuqulu wemure kimi, olele phakathi kwamabele ami.
Song 1:14 Othandiweyo wami uyihlukuzo lezimbali zehena ezivinini zase-Eni Gedi.
Song 1:15 Bheka, umuhle, sithandwa sami! Bheka, umuhle! Unamehlo amajuba.
Song 1:16 Bheka, umuhle, othandiweyo wami! Yebo, umnandi, nesilili sethu siluhlaza.
Song 1:17 Imishayo yendlu yethu iyimisedari, nemiqhadi iyimisayipuresi.
Song 2:1 Ngiyintebe yaseSharoni, nomnduze wezigodi.
Song 2:2 Njengomnduze phakathi kwameva, sinjalo isithandwa sami phakathi kwezintombi.
Song 2:3 Njengomapula phakathi kwemithi yasehlathini, unjalo othandiweyo wami phakathi kwamadodana. Ngahlala phansi emthunzini wakhe ngokwenama okukhulu, nesithelo sakhe sasimnandi emlonyeni wami.
Song 2:4 Ungingenisile endlini yewayini, nebhandela lakhe phezu kwami liluthando.
Song 2:5 Ngiphaseni ngezigaxa zezithelo zomvini ezomileyo, ngihlumelele ngama-apula, ngokuba ngiyafa uthando.
Song 2:6 Isandla sakhe sokhohlo siphansi kwekhanda lami, nesokunene siyangigona.
Song 2:7 Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, ngezinsephe nangezindluzelekazi zasendle ukuba ningalunyakazisi, ningaluvusi uthando, lungakavumi.
Song 2:8 Nanto izwi lothandiweyo wami! Bheka, uyeza eqa ezintabeni, etshekula emagqumeni.
Song 2:9 Othandiweyo wami unjengensephe noma njengesixhumu sendluzele; bheka, umi emva kodonga lwakwethu; uyalunguza emafasiteleni, ubonakala ngaseheleni.
Song 2:10 Othandiweyo wami wakhuluma, wathi kimi: “Vuka, sithandwa sami, muhlekazi wami; woza sihambe,
Song 2:11 ngokuba bheka, ubusika budlulile; imvula isiphelile, yamuka;
Song 2:12 izimbali ziyabonakala emhlabeni, nesikhathi sokuthena imivini sesisondele, nezwi lehobhe liyezwakala ezweni lakithi.
Song 2:13 Umkhiwane uthela amakhiwane awo aluhlaza, imivini inezimbali, ithaphuka iphunga layo; vuka, sithandwa sami, muhlekazi wami; woza sihambe.”
Song 2:14 Juba lami elisemifantwini yamadwala nasekusithekeni kweziwa, mangibone ubuso bakho, ngizwe izwi lakho, ngokuba izwi lakho limnandi, nobuso bakho buhle.
Song 2:15 Sibambeleni izimpungushe, izimpungushe ezincane ezichitha izivini, ngokuba izivini zethu zinezimbali.
Song 2:16 Othandiweyo wami ungowami, mina ngingowakhe; uyalusa phakathi kweminduze.
Song 2:17 Kuze kuphole ilanga, namathunzi abaleke, mawube njengensephe, wena othandiweyo wami, nanjengesixhumu sendluzele ezintabeni eziqhekezekileyo.
Song 3:1 Ebusuku embhedeni wami ngamfuna othandwa ngumphefumulo wami; ngamfuna, kepha angimtholanga.
Song 3:2 Ngiyakuvuka, ngihambahambe emzini, ezitaladini nasezigcawini; ngiyakufuna othandwa ngumphefumulo wami; ngamfuna, kepha angimtholanga.
Song 3:3 Abalindi bangifumana behambahamba emzini: “Nimbonile othandwa ngumphefumulo wami na?”
Song 3:4 Ngangidlule kancane nje kubo; ngase ngimthola othandwa ngumphefumulo wami; ngambamba, angivumanga ukuba ahambe, ngaze ngamngenisa endlini kamame nasekamelweni lowangikhulisayo.
Song 3:5 Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, ngezinsephe nangezindluzelekazi zasendle ukuba ningalunyakazisi, ningaluvusi uthando, lungakavumi.
Song 3:6 Ngubani owenyuka ehlane njengezinsika zomusi, eqhole ngemure nangenhlaka, nangawo onke amakha omthengi, na?
Song 3:7 Bheka, luhlaka lukaSolomoni! Amaqhawe angamashumi ayisithupha aluzungezile emaqhaweni akwa-Israyeli.
Song 3:8 Onke aphethe izinkemba, afundile ukulwa; yilowo nalowo muntu unenkemba yakhe okhalweni lwakhe ngokwesaba ebusuku.
Song 3:9 Inkosi uSolomoni izenzele uhlaka ngemithi yaseLebanoni.
Song 3:10 Yenza izinsika zalo ngesiliva, nephansi lalo ngegolide, nesihlalo salo ngokububende, ubuphakathi balo bugandaywe ngothando lwamadodakazi aseJerusalema.
Song 3:11 Phumani nina madodakazi aseJerusalema, nibone inkosi uSolomoni, inomqhele eyawuqheliswa ngunina ngosuku lokugcagca kwayo nangomhla wokuthokoza kwenhliziyo yayo.
Song 4:1 Bheka, umuhle, sithandwa sami! Bheka, umuhle! Unamehlo amajuba emva kwemvakazi yakho; izinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi wezimbuzi owehla entabeni yakwaGileyadi.
Song 4:2 Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi wezimvukazi ezisand' ukugundwa, ezikhuphuka zigeziwe, zinamawele zonke, kungekho neyodwa phakathi kwazo efelweyo.
Song 4:3 Izindebe zakho zinjengomucu obomvu, umlomo wakho muhle; izihlathi zakho zinjengenxenye yepomegranati emva kwemvakazi yakho.
Song 4:4 Intamo yakho injengombhoshongo kaDavide owakhiwe ngemihlobiso, okuphanyekwa kuwo amahawu ayinkulungwane, onke eyizihlangu zamaqhawe.
Song 4:5 Amabele akho amabili anjengezixhumu ezimbili ezingamawele ensephe, ezidla phakathi kweminduze.
Song 4:6 Lize liphole ilanga namathunzi abaleke, ngiyakuya entabeni yemure nasegqumeni lenhlaka.
Song 4:7 Umuhle wonke, sithandwa sami, akukho sisihla kuwe.
Song 4:8 Woza umuke nami eLebanoni, makoti wami, umuke nami eLebanoni, wehle esiqongweni sase-Amana, nasesiqongweni saseSeniri naseHermoni, simuke emihumeni yezingonyama, nasezintabeni zezingwe.
Song 4:9 Ungaphucile inhliziyo yami, dadewethu, makoti wami; ungaphucile inhliziyo yami ngelinye lamehlo akho, ngomgexo munye wentamo yakho.
Song 4:10 Lumnandi kangakanani uthando lwakho, dadewethu, makoti wami! Luhle kangakanani uthando lwakho, kunewayini, nephunga lamafutha akho kunamakha onke!
Song 4:11 Izindebe zakho, makoti wami, ziyaconsa izinyosi; uju nobisi kukhona phansi kolimi lwakho, nephunga lezambatho zakho linjengephunga laseLebanoni.
Song 4:12 Uyinsimu ehluthulelweyo, dadewethu, makoti wami, umthombo ohluthulelweyo nesiphethu esibekwe uphawu.
Song 4:13 Amahlumela akho ayihlathi lamapomegranati anezithelo ezinqabileyo, ihena kanye nenadi,
Song 4:14 inadi nesafroni, nomhlanga nokinamona, kanye nemithi yonke yenhlaka, nemure nomhlaba, nawo onke amakha amahle.
Song 4:15 Siphethu sensimu, mthombo wamanzi aphilayo, sifufula saseLebanoni!
Song 4:16 Vuka, moya wasenyakatho, uze wena Ningizimu, uphephethe ensimini yami, ukuze amakha ayo athaphuke; othandiweyo wami makangene ensimini yakhe, adle izithelo zayo ezinqabileyo.
Song 5:1 Sengingenile ensimini yami, dadewethu, makoti wami; ngiyabutha imure lami namakha ami, ngiyadla amakhekheba ami kanye nezinyosi zami, ngiyaphuza iwayini lami kanye nobisi lwami. Yidlani, bangane, niphuze, nisuthe ngothando.
Song 5:2 Bengilele, kepha inhliziyo yami ibiphapheme; kuyizwi lothandiweyo wami elingqongqotha lithi: “Ngivulele, dadewethu, sithandwa sami, juba lami, opheleleyo wami, ngokuba ikhanda lami ligcwele amazolo, nesihluthu sami amaconsi asebusuku.”
Song 5:3 Ngikhumulile isambatho sami, ngingasifaka kanjani? Ngigezile izinyawo zami, ngingazingcoliselani na?
Song 5:4 Othandiweyo wayesengenisa isandla sakhe embotsheni, izibilini zami zamhawukela.
Song 5:5 Ngavuka ukumvulela othandiweyo wami; izandla zami zaconsa imure, neminwe yami imure elimanzi phezu kwezibambo zesihluthulelo.
Song 5:6 Ngamvulela-ke othandiweyo wami, kepha othandiweyo wami ubephendukile, wamuka; umphefumulo wami wawuphela ngokukhuluma kwakhe, ngamfuna, kepha angamthola; ngambiza, kodwa akaphendula.
Song 5:7 Abalindi bangifumana behambahamba emzini, bangishaya, bangilimaza; abalindi bezingange bangaphuca imvakazi yami.
Song 5:8 Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, uma nimfumana othandiweyo wami, ukuba nimtshele ukuthi ngiyafa uthando.
Song 5:9 Othandiweyo wakho udlula ngani omunye, wena muhlekazi phakathi kwabesifazane, na? Othandiweyo wakho udlula kuphi omunye ukuba usifungise kanjalo na?
Song 5:10 Othandiweyo wami uyakhazimula ngobumhlophe, ubomvu, uyabonakala phakathi kwezigidi.
Song 5:11 Ikhanda lakhe liyigolide elihle elicwengekileyo; isihluthu sakhe sinententezo, simnyama njengegwababa.
Song 5:12 Amehlo akhe anjengamajuba ngasemifuleni yamanzi, ageziwe ngobisi ehlezi ngasemifudlaneni egcweleyo.
Song 5:13 Izihlathi zakhe ziyizindima zamakha ezithaphuka iphunga, nezindebe zakhe ziyiminduze econsa imure elimanzi.
Song 5:14 Izingalo zakhe ziyizindilinga zegolide, okufakwe kuzo amakrisolithe; isidumbu sakhe sinjengokwenziwe ngophondo lwendlovu, sembesiwe ngamasafire.
Song 5:15 Imilenze yakhe iyizinsika zetshe elimhlophe ezisekelwe ezinyaweni zegolide elihle; ukubukeka kwakhe kunjengeLebanoni, kukhethekile njengemisedari.
Song 5:16 Umlomo wakhe umnandi, uyanxaneleka wonke; yilowo ongothandiweyo wami, yilowo ongumngane wami, nina madodakazi aseJerusalema.
Song 6:1 Othandiweyo wakho uyephi, wena muhlekazi phakathi kwabesifazane; ushonephi othandiweyo wakho ukuba simfune kanye nawe na?
Song 6:2 Othandiweyo wami wehlele ensimini yakhe, ezindimeni zamakha, ukuba aluse ensimini, akhe iminduze.
Song 6:3 Mina ngingowothandiweyo wami, nothandiweyo wami ungowami, lapho alusa phakathi kweminduze.
Song 6:4 Umuhle, sithandwa sami, njengeTirisa, umnandi njengeJerusalema, kepha wesabeka njengezimpi.
Song 6:5 Susa amehlo akho kimi, ngokuba ayangiphaphathekisa; izinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi wezimbuzi owehla entabeni yakwaGileyadi.
Song 6:6 Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi wezimvukazi ezikhuphuka zigeziwe, zinamawele zonke, kungekho neyodwa phakathi kwazo efelweyo.
Song 6:7 Izihlathi zakho zinjengenxenye yepomegranati emva kwemvakazi yakho.
Song 6:8 Amakhosikazi angamashumi ayisithupha, nezancinza zingamashumi ayisishiyagalombili, nezintombi azinakubalwa.
Song 6:9 Kepha ijuba lami, opheleleyo wami munye nje; ungoyedwa kunina, ungokhethiweyo wakhe owamzalayo. Amantombazana ayambona, athi ubusisiwe; amakhosikazi nezancinza bayamdumisa.
Song 6:10 Ngubani lo olunguza njengokusa, emuhle njengenyanga, ecwebile njengelanga, kepha esabeka njengezimpi, na?
Song 6:11 Ngehlela ensimini yamantongomane ukuyobona uhlaza lwesigodi, nokubona uma imivini iqhakazile, namapomegranati uma ekhahlele.
Song 6:12 Ngingakakwazi ukulangazela kwami kwangibeka enqoleni yabantu benkosana yami.
Song 6:13 Phenduka, phenduka, mShulamiti! Phenduka, phenduka ukuba sikubuke! Nibonani kumShulamiti? Kunjengokusina kwaseMahanayimi.
Song 7:1 Zinhle kangakanani izinyawo zakho ezicathulweni zazo, wena ndodakazi yesikhulu! Amathanga akho ayizindilinga anjengemihlobiso, umsebenzi wezandla zengcweti.
Song 7:2 Inkaba yakho ingumkhele oncweliweyo, ongasweli iwayini elixutshanisiweyo; isisu sakho siyinqwaba kakolweni, ibiyelwe ngeminduze.
Song 7:3 Amabele akho amabili anjengezixhumu ezimbili ezingamawele ensephe.
Song 7:4 Intamo yakho injengoMbhoshongo woPhondo lweNdlovu; amehlo akho angamachibi aseHeshiboni ngasesangweni laseBati Rabimi; impumulo yakho injengombhoshongo waseLebanoni obhekene neDamaseku.
Song 7:5 Ikhanda lakho kuwe linjengeKarmeli, nomyeko wekhanda lakho unjengokububende; kuboshiwe inkosi ngesiyendane.
Song 7:6 Umuhle, umnandi kangakanani wena othandwa ngenjabulo!
Song 7:7 Isimo sakho siyisundu, namabele akho omabili anjengamahlukuzo.
Song 7:8 Ngathi: “Ngiyakukhwela esundwini, ngibambe amagatsha alo.” Amabele akho mawabe ngamahlukuzo omvini, nephunga lokuphefumula kwakho njengama-apula,
Song 7:9 nomlomo wakho njengewayini elihle elihamba lehle kamnandi, lewuka ngezindebe nangamazinyo.
Song 7:10 Mina ngingowothandiweyo wami, uyanginxanela.
Song 7:11 Woza wena othandiweyo wami, siye endle, silale emizaneni.
Song 7:12 Masivuke ekuseni, siye ezivinini, sibone uma umvini uqhakazile, nezimbali zawo uma zivulekile, namapomegranati uma ekhahlele. Lapho ngiyakukunika uthando lwami.
Song 7:13 Amamandragora athaphuka iphunga, nangaseminyango yethu kukhona izinhlobo zonke zezithelo ezinqabileyo, ezintsha nezindala, engizibekele wena othandiweyo wami.
Song 8:1 Sengathi nga unjengomfowethu owancela amabele kamame! Uma bengikufumana phandle, bengiyakukwanga ngingadelelwa muntu.
Song 8:2 Bengiyakukuhola, ngikuyise endlini kamame; ubuyakungifundisa; bengiyakukuphuzisa iwayini eliyolisiweyo, amanzi ompomegranati wami.
Song 8:3 Isandla sakhe sokhohlo besiyakubaphansi kwekhanda lami, nesokunene sakhe besiyakungigona.
Song 8:4 Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, ukuba ningalunyakazisi, ningaluvusi uthando, lungakavumi.
Song 8:5 Ngubani owenyuka ehlane encike kothandiweyo wakhe na? Phansi komapula ngakuvusa; lapho unyoko wayenemihelo ngawe, khona lapho wayenemihelo owakuzalayo.
Song 8:6 Ngifake njengophawu enhliziyweni yakho, njengophawu engalweni yakho, ngokuba uthando lunamandla njengokufa; isikhwele silukhuni njengendawo yabafileyo; amalangabi alo angamalangabi omlilo, ilangabi likaJehova.
Song 8:7 Amanzi amaningi awanakulucima uthando, nemifula ayinakuluminzisa; uma umuntu ebeyakunika yonke impahla yendlu yakhe ngothando, nokho ubeyakwaliwa nokwaliwa.
Song 8:8 Sinodadewethu omncane, kanawo amabele; siyakwenza njani ngodadewethu ecelwa na?
Song 8:9 Uma elugange, siyakwakha phezu kwakhe umbhoshongwana wesiliva; uma eyisicabha, siyakumvalela ngamapulangwe omsedari.
Song 8:10 Ngilugange, namabele ami anjengemibhoshongo; khona ngaba semehlweni akhe njengofumene ukuthula.
Song 8:11 USolomoni wayenesivini eBali Hamoni; wasinika isivini kubaphathi; baletha, kwaba yilowo nalowo, izinhlamvu eziyinkulungwane zesiliva ngezithelo zaso.
Song 8:12 Isivini esingesami siphambi kwami; inkulungwane mayibe ngeyakho, Solomoni, namakhulu amabili abe ngawabaphathi bezithelo zaso.
Song 8:13 Wena ohlala emasimini, abangane balalela izwi lakho; ake ungizwise lona.
Song 8:14 Shesha, othandiweyo wami, ufane nensephe nesixhumo sendluzele ezintabeni zamakha.
Isa 1:1 Umbono ka-Isaya, indodana ka-Amose, awubonayo ngoJuda neJerusalema emihleni ka-Uziya, noJothamu, no-Ahazi, noHezekiya, amakhosi akwaJuda.
Isa 1:2 Yizwani, mazulu, ubeke indlebe, mhlaba, ngokuba uJehova ukhuluma uthi: “Ngikhulisile ngiphakamisile abantwana, kepha bangihlubukile.
Isa 1:3 Inkabi iyamazi umniniyo nembongolo umkhombe womnikaziyo; u-Israyeli akazi, isizwe sami asiqondi.”
Isa 1:4 Hawu, sizwe esonayo, bantu abasindwe ngububi, nzalo yababi, bantwana abonakeleyo! Bamshiyile uJehova, bamdelele oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, babuyele emuva.
Isa 1:5 Ningabe nisashaywa kuphi, nisaqhubeka ukwambuka, na? Lonke ikhanda liyagula, nayo yonke inhliziyo ibuthakathaka.
Isa 1:6 Kusukela ematheni onyawo kuze kube sekhanda akukho okuphelele, ngamanxeba nje, nemivimbo, nemidwa emisha; akukhanywanga ubovu, akuboshwanga, akuthanjiswanga ngamafutha.
Isa 1:7 Izwe lakini liyihlane, imizi yenu ishisiwe ngomlilo, umhlabathi wenu udliwa ngabafokazi phambi kwenu, kuyihlane njengokuchitha kwabafokazi.
Isa 1:8 Indodakazi yaseSiyoni isele njengexhiba esivinini, nanjengedladla ensimini yamaselwa, nanjengomuzi ovinjezelweyo.
Isa 1:9 Uma uJehova Sebawoti ebengasishiyelanga insali, besiyakuba njengeSodoma, sifane neGomora.
Isa 1:10 Yizwani izwi likaJehova nina babusi baseSodoma, nibeke indlebe ekufundiseni kukaNkulunkulu wethu nina bantu baseGomora.
Isa 1:11 “Iyini kimi imihlatshelo yenu eminingi na?” usho uJehova; “ngisuthile ngeminikelo yokushiswa yezinqama nangeyamanoni amathole akhuluphalisiweyo; negazi lezinkunzi nelamawundlu nelezimpongo angithokozi ngalo.
Isa 1:12 Lapho nifika ukubona ubuso bami, ngubani okubize lokhu esandleni senu ukuba ninyathele amagceke ami na?
Isa 1:13 Ningabe nisaletha iminikelo eyize yempuphu; impepho iyisinengiso kimi; ezokwethwasa kwenyanga namasabatha nokubiza imihlangano angivumi ububi kanye nemikhosi.
Isa 1:14 Ezokwethwasa zenu kwenyanga nemikhosi yenu emisiweyo kuyazondwa ngumphefumulo wami; kungumthwalo phezu kwami, ngikhathele ngukukuthwala.
Isa 1:15 Lapho nelula izandla zenu, ngiyakufihla kini amehlo ami; yebo, lapho nenza imikhuleko eminingi, angiyikuzwa; izandla zenu zigcwele igazi.
Isa 1:16 Gezani, nihlanzeke, nisuse ububi bezenzo zenu phambi kwamehlo ami, niyeke ukwenza okubi.
Isa 1:17 Fundani ukwenza okuhle, nifune ukwahlulela, niqondise abacindezeli, nahlulele izintandane, nimele umfelokazi.
Isa 1:18 “Wozani-ke, sithethe indaba,” usho uJehova; “noma izono zenu zibomvu kakhulu, ziyakuba mhlophe njengeqhwa; noma zibomvu njengokububende, ziyakuba njengoboya bezimvu.
Isa 1:19 Uma nivuma, nilalela, niyakudla okuhle kwezwe;
Isa 1:20 kepha uma nala, nihlubuka, niyakudliwa yinkemba,” ngokuba umlomo kaJehova ukhulumile.
Isa 1:21 Yeka umuzi othembekileyo waphenduka, waba yisifebe, wena owawugcwele ukwahlulela! Ukulunga kwakuhlezi khona, kepha manje ababulali.
Isa 1:22 Isiliva lakho seliphendukile amanyela; iwayini lakho lixubene namanzi.
Isa 1:23 Izikhulu zakho ziyizihlubuki nabangane bamasela; bonke bathanda izipho, balandela imivuzo; abahluleli izintandane, nendaba yomfelokazi ayifinyeleli kubo.
Isa 1:24 Ngalokho ithi iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, uMninimandla ka-Israyeli: “E, ngiyakuzikhulula kwabamelene nami, ngiziphindisele ezitheni zami,
Isa 1:25 ngibuyisele isandla sami kuwe, ngicwengisise impela amanyela akho, ngisuse lonke ithini lakho,
Isa 1:26 ngibuyisele abahluleli bakho njengakuqala, nabeluleki bakho njengasekuqaleni, andukuba ubizwe ngokuthi uMuzi Wokulunga, uMuzi Othembekileyo.”
Isa 1:27 ISiyoni liyakuhlengwa ngokwahlulela nabaphendukayo kulo ngokulunga.
Isa 1:28 Izihlubuki nezoni ziyakubhujiswa kanyekanye, nabamshiyayo uJehova bayakuqedwa.
Isa 1:29 “Yebo, bayakuba namahloni ngama-oki enawanxanelayo, niyangaze ngamasimu enawakhethayo.
Isa 1:30 Ngokuba niyakuba njenge-oki elimaqabunga alo abunile, nanjengensimu engenamanzi.
Isa 1:31 Abanamandla bayakuba njengefilakisi, nemisebenzi yabo njengenhlansi; bayakusha bobabili kanyekanye, akuyikubakho ocimayo.”
Isa 2:1 Indaba ayibonayo u-Isaya indodana ka-Amose ngoJuda neJerusalema.
Isa 2:2 Kuyakuthi ngezinsuku ezizayo intaba yendlu kaJehova iqiniswe esiqongweni sezintaba, iphakame kunamagquma, nezizwe zonke ziyakugobhozela khona.
Isa 2:3 Abantu abaningi bayakuhamba, bathi: “Wozani sikhuphukele entabeni kaJehova endlini kaNkulunkulu kaJakobe; uyakusifundisa izindlela zakhe, sihambe emikhondweni yakhe,” ngokuba umthetho uyakuvela eSiyoni, nezwi likaJehova eJerusalema.
Isa 2:4 Uyakwahlulela phakathi kwezizwe, anqume phakathi kwabantu abaningi; bayakukhanda izinkemba zabo zibe ngamakhuba, nemikhonto yabo ibe ngocelemba; isizwe asiyikuphakamisela isizwe inkemba, zingabe zisafunda ukulwa.
Isa 2:5 Wena ndlu kaJakobe, woza sihambe ekukhanyeni kukaJehova.
Isa 2:6 Ngokuba ushiyile abantu bakho, indlu kaJakobe, lokhu begcwele ezasempumalanga, behlola imihlola njengamaFilisti, bexhawulana nabantwana babezizwe.
Isa 2:7 Izwe lakubo ligcwele isiliva negolide, akukho ukuphela kwengcebo yabo; izwe lakubo ligcwele futhi namahhashi, nokuphela kwezinqola akukho.
Isa 2:8 Izwe lakubo ligcwele futhi nezithombe; bakhuleka kokwenziwe yizandla zabo nakwekwenzileyo iminwe yabo.
Isa 2:9 Kepha abantu bayakufoliswa, namadoda ayakuthotshiswa; abayikuthethelelwa.
Isa 2:10 Ngena edwaleni, ucashe othulini ngokwesabeka kukaJehova nangodumo lobukhosi bakhe.
Isa 2:11 Amehlo omuntu aziphakamisileyo ayakuthotshiswa, nokuzikhukhumeza kwamadoda kuyakufola, kuphakame uJehova kuphela ngalolo suku.
Isa 2:12 Ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti unosuku oluyakuba phezu kwakho konke okuzidlayo nokuzikhukhumezayo, naphezu kwakho konke okuphakemeyo, kuthotshiswe,
Isa 2:13 naphezu kwayo yonke imisedari yaseLebanoni, emide nephakemeyo, naphezu kwawo onke ama-oki aseBashani,
Isa 2:14 naphezu kwazo zonke izintaba ezinde, naphezu kwawo onke amagquma aphakemeyo,
Isa 2:15 naphezu kwayo yonke imibhoshongo ephakemeyo, naphezu kwazo zonke izingange eziqinisiweyo,
Isa 2:16 naphezu kwayo yonke imikhumbi yaseTharishishi, naphezu kwayo yonke imikhunjana enxanelekayo.
Isa 2:17 Ukuzikhukhumeza kwabantu kuyakufoliswa, nokuziphakamisa kwamadoda kuyakuthotshiswa, kuphakame uJehova kuphela ngalolo suku,
Isa 2:18 ziphele izithombe, zithi nya.
Isa 2:19 Bayakungena emihumeni yamadwala nasemigodini yomhlaba ngokwesabeka kukaJehova nangodumo lobukhosi bakhe, lapho evuka ukushaya umhlaba ngovalo.
Isa 2:20 Ngalolo suku abantu bayakulahla kuwo amavukuzi nakuwo amalulwane izithombe zabo zesiliva nezithombe zabo zegolide, abazenzele zona ukuba bakhuleke kuzo,
Isa 2:21 ukuze bangene emihumeni yamadwala nasemifantwini yeziwa ngokwesabeka kukaJehova nangodumo lobukhosi bakhe, lapho evuka ukushaya umhlaba ngovalo.
Isa 2:22 Bayekeni abantu okusemakhaleni abo kukhona ukuphefumula nje, ngokuba babalwa njengantoni na?
Isa 3:1 Ngokuba bheka, iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyasusa eJerusalema nakwaJuda uzime nodondolo, lonke uzime lwesinkwa nalo lonke uzime lwamanzi:
Isa 3:2 amaqhawe namadoda empi, abahluleli nabaprofethi, ababhuli namalunga,
Isa 3:3 izinduna zamashumi ayisihlanu nabantu abanodumo, abeluleki nezingcweti ezihlakaniphileyo, nabanolwazi lokulumba.
Isa 3:4 Ngiyakubanika abafana babe yizikhulu zabo, nezingane ziyakubabusa.
Isa 3:5 Abantu bayakucindezelana, kube yilowo nalowo, yebo, yilowo nalowo nomakhelwane wakhe; abantwana bayakubhensela abadala, nabadelelekileyo abanodumo.
Isa 3:6 Lapho umuntu eyakubamba umfowabo endlini kayise ethi: “Wena unengubo, yiba ngumbusi wethu, le ncithakalo ibe phansi kwesandla sakho,”
Isa 3:7 ngalona lolo suku uyakudazuluka athi: “Angiyikuba ngumelaphi, ngokuba endlini yami akukho sinkwa, akukho ngubo; ningangibeki umbusi wabantu.”
Isa 3:8 Ngokuba iJerusalema likhubekile, noJuda uwile, lokhu izilimi zabo nezenzo zabo ziphambene noJehova ukucunula amehlo enkazimulo yakhe.
Isa 3:9 Ukukhetha kwabo ubuso kuyafakaza ngabo; benza izono zabo obala njengeSodoma, abazifihli. Maye kuyo imiphefumulo yabo! Ngokuba bazenzele okubi.
Isa 3:10 Yishoni kolungileyo ukuthi kuyakuba kuhle kuye, ngokuba bayakudla izithelo zezenzo zabo.
Isa 3:11 Maye komubi! Kuyakuba kubi kuye, ngokuba uyakubuyiselwa izenzo zezandla zakhe.
Isa 3:12 Abantu bami-ke izingane ziyabacindezela, nabesifazane bayababusa. O bantu bami, abaniholayo bayanidukisa; bachitha indlela yemikhondo yakho.
Isa 3:13 UJehova usesukumile ukuyokulwa, umi ukuthetha amacala ezizwe.
Isa 3:14 UJehova uyakungena ekwahluleleni namalunga abantu bakhe nezikhulu zabo ngokuthi: “Yinina eniqedile isivini, impango yabampofu isezindlini zenu.
Isa 3:15 Nichobozeleni abantu bami, nigaye ubuso babampofu, na?” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti.
Isa 3:16 Wathi futhi uJehova: “Ngenxa yokuba amadodakazi aseSiyoni eziphakamisa, ehamba elula izintamo, eqhikiza amehlo, ehamba ecokama ekuhambeni kwawo, ekhenceza ngezinyawo zawo,
Isa 3:17 ngalokho iNkosi iyakuzenza izimpandla izinkakhayi zamadodakazi aseSiyoni, uJehova awanqunise.”
Isa 3:18 Ngalolo suku iNkosi iyakususa imihlobiso yawo: izigqizo, nemiqhele, nezimbedu ezinjengenyanga,
Isa 3:19 neziqhaza, namasongo, nezimvakazi,
Isa 3:20 nezigqoko, nemihlobiso yemilenze, nezibhamba, nemifuma, neziqu,
Isa 3:21 nezindandatho, namacici ekhala,
Isa 3:22 nezambatho zemikhosi, nezangaphezulu, namatshali, nezinqalathi,
Isa 3:23 nezibuko, nelineni elicolekileyo, nemishuqulo, nezilembu.
Isa 3:24 Kuyakuthi esikhundleni samakha kube ngukubola, nasesikhundleni sebhande igoda, nasesikhundleni sezinwele ezilungisiweyo impandla, nasesikhundleni sesidiya isibhamba sendwangu yamasaka, nasesikhundleni sobuhle isishada.
Isa 3:25 Amadoda akho ayakuwa ngenkemba namaqhawe akho ngokulwa.
Isa 3:26 Amasango alo ayakukhala, alile; liyakuba yize, lihlale emhlabathini.
Isa 4:1 Ngalolo suku abesifazane abayisikhombisa bayakubamba indoda inye, bathi: “Siyakudla isinkwa sethu, sembathe izingubo zethu. Masibizwe kuphela ngegama lakho, ususe ihlazo lethu.”
Isa 4:2 Ngalolo suku ihlumela likaJehova liyakuba lihle, libe nenkazimulo, nezithelo zomhlaba ziyakuba nodumo nobuhle kwabaphunyukileyo bakwa-Israyeli.
Isa 4:3 Kuyakuthi yena oshiyiwe eSiyoni naye osele eJerusalema, bathiwe bangcwele, bonke abalotshelwe ukuphila eJerusalema,
Isa 4:4 lapho iNkosi igezile insila yamadodakazi aseJerusalema, nalapho isihlanzile igazi laseJerusalema phakathi kwalo ngomoya wokwahlulela nangomoya wokushisa.
Isa 4:5 UJehova uyakudala phezu kwayo yonke indawo yentaba yaseSiyoni naphezu kwemihlangano yayo ifu nomusi emini nokukhanya kwelangabi lomlilo ebusuku, ngokuba phezu kwayo yonke inkazimulo kuyakuba khona isivikelo.
Isa 4:6 Kuyakuba khona idokodo, libe ngumthunzi ekushiseni kwemini nesiphephelo nesivikelo esivunguvungwini nasemvuleni.
Isa 5:1 Mangihlabelele ngothandiweyo wami, isihlabelelo sothandiweyo wami ngesivini sakhe. Othandiweyo wami wayenesivini egqumeni elivundile kakhulu;
Isa 5:2 wasimba, wakhipha amatshe aso, wasitshala ngomvini omuhle, wakha isiqongo sokulinda phakathi kwaso, waqopha isikhamo kuso, wethemba ukuthi siyakuthela izithelo zomvini, kepha saveza izithelo zasendle.
Isa 5:3 “Manje nina enakhileyo eJerusalema namadoda akwaJuda, ake nahlulele phakathi kwami nesivini sami.
Isa 5:4 Nga kwenziwani futhi esivinini sami engingakwenzanga kuso na? Kungani ukuba lapho ngithembe ukuthi siyakuthela izithelo zomvini, saveza izithelo zasendle, na?
Isa 5:5 Sengiyakunitshela engiyakukwenza kuso isivini sami: ngiyakususa uthango lwaso, ukuze sidliwe, ngidilize ugange lwaso, ukuze sinyathelwe.
Isa 5:6 Ngiyakusenza sibe yincithakalo; asiyikuthenwa, asiyikulinywa, kepha kuyakuvela amakhakhasi nameva; futhi ngiyakuyala amafu ukuba anganisi imvula phezu kwaso.”
Isa 5:7 Ngokuba isivini sikaJehova Sebawoti siyindlu ka-Israyeli, namadoda akwaJuda ayisithombo sakhe esithandekayo; wabheka ukwahlulela, kepha bheka, ngukucindezela, yebo, ukulunga, kepha bheka, ngukukhala.
Isa 5:8 Wo kubona abahlanganisa indlu nendlu, besondeza insimu nensimu, kuze kungabe kusaba khona indawo, kwakhe nina nodwa emhlabeni!
Isa 5:9 UJehova Sebawoti wathi ezindlebeni zami: “Impela izindlu eziningi ziyakuba yincithakalo, nezinkulu nezinhle zingabi namuntu ohlala kuzo.
Isa 5:10 Ngokuba ama-eka ayishumi esivini ayakuthela ibhati elilodwa, nehomere lembewu liyakuthela i-efa nje.”
Isa 5:11 Wo kubona abavuka ekuseni, ukuze balandele uphuzo olunamandla, balibale kuze kuhlwe, bashe iwayini!
Isa 5:12 Ihabu nogubhu, isigubhu negenkle, newayini kukhona emadilini abo, kepha abanakekeli imisebenzi kaJehova, nezenzo zezandla zakhe abaziboni.
Isa 5:13 Ngalokho abantu bami bayathunjwa bengazi, nabadumileyo babo bayalamba, nezixuku zabo zigangathekile ngokoma.
Isa 5:14 Ngalokho indawo yabafileyo yandisile isifiso sayo, yavula umlomo wayo ngokungalinganiswayo; kwehlela kuyo amakhosi abo, nesixuku sabo esixokozelayo, kanye nabajabulayo phakathi kwabo.
Isa 5:15 Abantu bayafoliswa, namadoda ayathotshiswa, namehlo abaziphakamisayo ayathotshiswa,
Isa 5:16 kepha uJehova Sebawoti uphakeme ekwahluleleni, uNkulunkulu oNgcwele ungcwelisiwe ngokulunga.
Isa 5:17 Amawundlu ayakuklaba njengasemadlelweni awo, nasezincithakalweni zabacebileyo kuyakuklaba amazinyane.
Isa 5:18 Wo kubona abadonsa ukona ngezintambo zamanga, nezono kungathi ngamagoda ezinqola,
Isa 5:19 abasho ukuthi: “Makaphuthume, asheshise umsebenzi wakhe ukuba siwubone, kusondele isiluleko soNgcwele ka-Israyeli, sifike ukuba sisazi!”
Isa 5:20 Wo kubona abasho okubi ukuthi kungokuhle, nokuhle ukuthi kungububi, ababeka ubumnyama bube ngukukhanya, nokukhanya kube ngubumnyama, babeke nokubabayo kube ngubumtoti, nobumtoti bube ngokubabayo!
Isa 5:21 Wo kubona abahlakaniphile emehlweni abo nabaqondile ekuboneni kwabo!
Isa 5:22 Wo kubona abangamaqhawe ngokuphuza iwayini namadoda anamandla ngokuxubanisa uphuzo olunamandla,
Isa 5:23 abathetha ababi ngenxa yemivuzo, basuse ukulunga kwabalungileyo!
Isa 5:24 Ngalokho njengolimi lomlilo ludla amabibi, nezikhotha ezomileyo zizika elangabini, impande yabo iyakuba njengokubola, nembali yabo iyakuthuquka njengebhuqu, ngokuba balahlile umthetho kaJehova Sebawoti, balidelela izwi loNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Isa 5:25 Ngalokho intukuthelo kaJehova iyavuthela isizwe sakhe; welulela isandla sakhe kuso, uyasishaya; izintaba ziyathuthumela, nezidumbu zabo ziyimfucumfucu phakathi ezitaladini; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe.
Isa 5:26 Uyakuphakamisela isizwe esikude ibhandela, asihlabele ikhwelo ekugcineni komhlaba; bheka, uyeza masinyane ngejubane.
Isa 5:27 Akakho oyakukhathala, akhubeke kuso; akakho oyakozela, alale; ibhande lezinkalo zabo aliyikuthukuluka, nomchilo wezicathulo zabo awuyikugqabuka,
Isa 5:28 bona abamicibisholo yabo ibukhali, nayo yonke iminsalo yabo insaliwe; izinyawo zamahhashi abo ziyakubalwa njengensengetsha, namasondo abo njengesivunguvungu.
Isa 5:29 Ukubhonga kwabo kunjengokwengonyamakazi, bayakubhonga njengamabhongo ebhubesi, yebo, bayakugwavuma, babambe impango yabo, bamuke nayo, kungekho oyophulayo.
Isa 5:30 Bayakugwavuma phezu kwabo ngalolo suku njengokuduma kolwandle; uma umuntu ebuka umhlaba, bheka, naso isigayegaye sobumnyama, nokukhanya kwenziwe mnyama ngamafu awo.
Isa 6:1 Ngomnyaka wokufa kwenkosi u-Uziya ngabona uJehova ehlezi esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi esiphezulu nesiphakemeyo, umsila wengubo yakhe ugcwalisa ithempeli.
Isa 6:2 Ngaphezu kwakhe kwakumi amaserafi; yilelo nalelo lalinamaphiko ayisithupha; ngamabili lamboza ubuso, nangamabili lamboza izinyawo, nangamabili landiza.
Isa 6:3 Elinye lamemeza kwelinye, lathi: “Ungcwele, ungcwele, ungcwele uJehova Sebawoti, wonke umhlaba ugcwele inkazimulo yakhe.”
Isa 6:4 Izinsika zomnyango zathuthumela ngezwi lomemezayo, indlu yagcwala umusi.
Isa 6:5 Ngase ngithi: “Maye kimi! Ngokuba ngiphelile, lokhu ngingumuntu ozindebe zakhe zingcolile, futhi ngihlezi phakathi kwabantu abazindebe zabo zingcolile, ngokuba amehlo ami abonile iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti.”
Isa 6:6 Kepha landizela kimi elinye lamaserafi liphethe ilahle elivuthayo esandleni salo, elalilithathe ngodlawu e-altare,
Isa 6:7 lathinta umlomo wami, lathi: “Bheka, lokhu kuthintile izindebe zakho; ububi bakho sebususiwe, nezono zakho zihlanguliwe.”
Isa 6:8 Futhi ngezwa izwi leNkosi lithi: “Ngiyakuthuma bani, ngubani oyakusiyela na?” Ngase ngithi: “Bheka, nangu mina; ngithume mina.”
Isa 6:9 Yathi: “Hamba usho kulaba bantu ukuthi: “ ‘Yizwani, yizwani, kepha ningaqondi; bonani, bonani, kepha ningazi.’
Isa 6:10 Yenza inhliziyo yalaba bantu ukuba ikhuluphale, nezindlebe zabo zibe buthuntu, ufiphaze amehlo abo, funa babone ngamehlo abo, bezwe ngezindlebe zabo, baqonde ngenhliziyo yabo, babuye, baphiliswe.”
Isa 6:11 Ngase ngithi: “Nkosi, koze kube nini na?” Yathi: “Kuze kuchithwe imizi, kungabe kusaba khona ohlala kuyo, nezindlu zingabe zisaba namuntu, nomhlaba uchitheke ube yize,
Isa 6:12 uJehova aze adedisele kude abantu, nencithakalo ibe nkulu ezweni.
Isa 6:13 Yebo, noma kusekhona inxenye yeshumi kulo, yona iyakubuye ishiswe njengomtherebinte ne-oki okusiqu sakho simi lapho kugawulwa khona; inzalo engcwele iyisiqu sakho.”
Isa 7:1 Kwathi ezinsukwini zika-Ahazi indodana kaJothamu ka-Uziya, inkosi yakwaJuda, uResini inkosi yase-Aramu noPheka indodana kaRemaliya, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, bakhuphukela eJerusalema ukulwa nalo, kepha babengenakulinqoba.
Isa 7:2 Kwatshelwa indlu kaDavide ukuthi: “I-Aramu limise kwa-Efrayimi.” Yayisiqhaqhazela inhliziyo yakhe nenhliziyo yabantu bakhe njengemithi yasehlathini ithuthumela ngomoya.
Isa 7:3 Kepha uJehova wathi ku-Isaya: “Mawuphume ukuhlangabeza u-Ahazi, wena noSheyari Jashubi indodana yakho, ngasekugcineni komsele wechibi lasenhla elingasendleleni yeNsimu Yomhlanzi,
Isa 7:4 usho kuye ukuthi: ‘Xwaya, uthule; ungesabi, nenhliziyo yakho mayingadangali ngemisila emibili yalezi zikhuni ezithunqayo, ngokuvutha kolaka lukaResini ne-Aramu nolwendodana kaRemaliya.
Isa 7:5 Ngokuba i-Aramu no-Efrayimi nendodana kaRemaliya bacebile okubi ngawe, bathi:
Isa 7:6 “Masikhuphukele kwelakwaJuda, silikhathaze, sizinqobele lona, sibeke inkosi phakathi kwalo, indodana kaThabeyeli,”
Isa 7:7 ngalokho isho iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ithi: “ ‘Akuyikuma, futhi akuyikwenzeka.
Isa 7:8 Ngokuba inhloko yase-Aramu iyiDamaseku, nenhloko yeDamaseku inguResini; phakathi kweminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu u-Efrayimi uyakwaphulwa angabe esaba yisizwe.
Isa 7:9 Inhloko yakwa-Efrayimi iyiSamariya, inhloko yeSamariya iyindodana kaRemaliya. Uma ningakholwa, impela aniyikuma.’ ”
Isa 7:10 UJehova waqhubeka ukukhuluma ku-Ahazi, wathi:
Isa 7:11 “Zicelele isibonakaliso kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, kujule endaweni yabafileyo, noma kuphakame phezulu.”
Isa 7:12 Kepha u-Ahazi wathi: “Angiyikucela, futhi angiyikumlinga uJehova.”
Isa 7:13 Wayesethi: “Ake uzwe wena ndlu kaDavide! Kuncane kuwe ukukhathaza abantu, ukuze nimkhathaze noNkulunkulu wami futhi na?
Isa 7:14 Ngalokho iNkosi uqobo iyakukunika isibonakaliso: bheka, intombi iyakukhulelwa, izale indodana, ibize igama layo ngokuthi u-Imanuweli.
Isa 7:15 Uyakudla amangqanga nezinyosi aze azi ukwala okubi, akhethe okuhle.
Isa 7:16 Ngokuba umntwana engakazi ukwala okubi nokukhetha okuhle, izwe okhathazwa ngamakhosi omabili alo liyakushiywa.
Isa 7:17 UJehova uyakuletha phezu kwakho, naphezu kwabantu bakho, naphezu kwendlu kayihlo izinsuku ezingafikanga kusukela osukwini u-Efrayimi asuka ngalo kwaJuda — yinkosi yase-Asiriya.”
Isa 7:18 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku uJehova ahlabele ikhwelo izimpukane ezingasekugcineni kwemifula yaseGibithe nezinyosi ezisezweni lase-Asiriya.
Isa 7:19 Ziyakufika, ziphumule zonke ezigodini ezineziwa, nasemifantwini yamadwala, nasemahlanzeni onke, nasemadlelweni onke.
Isa 7:20 Ngalolo suku iNkosi iyakuphucula ngensingo eqashiweyo ngaphesheya koMfula yinkosi yase-Asiriya ikhanda noboya bezinyawo, futhi iyakuqeda nesilevu.
Isa 7:21 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku indoda yondle isithole nezimvu ezimbili,
Isa 7:22 bese kuthi ngobuningi bobisi ezilwehlisayo idle amangqanga, ngokuba amangqanga nezinyosi bayakukudla bonke abasele ezweni.
Isa 7:23 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku yonke indawo lapho kukhona imivini eyinkulungwane, elingene nezinhlamvu eziyinkulungwane zesiliva, ibe ngeyamakhakhasi nameva.
Isa 7:24 Kuyakuyiwa khona nemicibisholo nomnsalo, ngokuba izwe lonke liyakuba ngamakhakhasi nameva.
Isa 7:25 Ezintabeni zonke ezilinywa ngegeja akuyikuyiwa khona ngokwesaba amakhakhasi nameva, kepha ziyakuba ngezokuqhubela izinkabi nezokunyathela kwezimvu.
Isa 8:1 UJehova wathi kimi: “Zithathele isibhebhe esikhulu, ubhale kuso ngokwendlela yomuntu ngokuthi uMahere Shalali Hashi Bazi.
Isa 8:2 Ngazifakazisela ofakazi abaqinisileyo, u-Uriya umpristi noZakariya indodana kaJeberekiya.”
Isa 8:3 Ngase ngiya kumprofethikazi; wakhulelwa, wazala indodana. Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “Biza igama layo ngokuthi uMahere Shalali Hashi Bazi.
Isa 8:4 Ngokuba umntwana engakazi ukumemeza ngokuthi baba nomame, kuyakususwa ingcebo yaseDamaseku nempango yaseSamariya phambi kwenkosi yase-Asiriya.”
Isa 8:5 UJehova wabuye wakhuluma kimi, wathi:
Isa 8:6 “Ngenxa yokuba laba bantu badelela amanzi aseShilowa ahamba kancane, bathokoza ngoResini nendodana kaRemaliya,
Isa 8:7 ngalokho bheka, iNkosi iyabakhuphulela amanzi omfula anamandla namaningi — yinkosi yase-Asiriya nabo bonke ubukhosi bayo — ukhuphuke phezu kwazo zonke izingu zawo, weqe nazo zonke izindonga zawo,
Isa 8:8 utheleke kwaJuda, ukhukhule, udlule, ufinyelele entanyeni, besewugcwalisa ngamaphiko awo eluliweyo ububanzi bezwe lakho, Imanuweli.”
Isa 8:9 Bhevani nina zizwe, niyakuphela amandla nokho; bekani indlebe nina mazwe onke akude: zibhinceni, kepha niyakudangala, yebo, zibhinceni, niyakuphela amandla nokho.
Isa 8:10 Lulekanani nokululekana, kepha kuyakuchithwa; khulumani izwi, kodwa aliyikuma, ngokuba uNkulunkulu unathi.
Isa 8:11 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukhulumile kanjalo kimi ngesandla esinamandla, wangiyala ukuba ngingahambi ngendlela yalaba bantu, wathi:
Isa 8:12 “Ningasho ukuthi kuluzungu konke abakushoyo laba bantu ukuthi kuluzungu, ningesabi abakwesabayo, nibe novalo ngakho.
Isa 8:13 UJehova Sebawoti, mngcweliseni yena, kube nguye enimesabayo, yebo, kube nguye eninovalo ngaye.
Isa 8:14 Uyakuba ngokungcwele, futhi abe yitshe lokukhubekisa, nedwala lokuwisa kuzo izindlu zombili zakwa-Israyeli, abe lugibe nesihibe kwabakhileyo eJerusalema.
Isa 8:15 Abaningi phakathi kwabo bayakukhubeka, bawe, baphuke, bacushwe, babanjwe.”
Isa 8:16 Bopha ubufakazi, uwunamathelise umthetho phakathi kwabafundi bami.
Isa 8:17 Ngiyakumlindela uJehova ositheza ubuso bakhe kuyo indlu kaJakobe, ngethembe kuye.
Isa 8:18 Bheka, mina, nabantwana uJehova anginike bona, siyizibonakaliso nezimangaliso kwa-Israyeli, ezivela kuJehova Sebawoti ohlezi entabeni yaseSiyoni.
Isa 8:19 Lapho bethi kini: “Funani kwabanamadlozi nakubathakathi” ababetha imilozi, banyenyeze pho, abantu abayikufuna uNkulunkulu wabo yini? Kuyiwe kwabafileyo ngabaphilayo na?
Isa 8:20 Emthethweni-ke nasebufakazini! Impela leli zwi abalikhulumayo alinakho ukusa.
Isa 8:21 Bayakudabula izwe bexinekile, belambile; kuyakuthi lapho belamba, bavuke ulaka, bathuke inkosi yabo noNkulunkulu wabo, babheke phezulu.
Isa 8:22 Bayakubheka nasemhlabeni; bheka, nakho ukuhlupheka, nobumnyama, nokuhwelela kosizi; yebo, bayakuxoshelwa esigayegayeni.
Isa 9:1 Kepha ukuhwelela akuyikuba khona kohluphekayo. Njengesikhathi esidlule senza ukuba kufiliswe izwe lakwaZebuloni nezwe lakwaNafetali, isikhathi esizayo siyakwenza ukuba ikhazimule indlela yolwandle ngaphesheya kweJordani, isifunda sabezizwe.
Isa 9:2 Abantu abahamba ebumnyameni babona ukukhanya okukhulu; abahlezi ezweni lethunzi lokufa ukukhanya kuyabakhanyisela.
Isa 9:3 Uyakwandisa isizwe, ukhulise intokozo yaso; bathokoza phambi kwakho njengokuthokoza ekuvuneni, njengalokhu abantu bethokoza ekwabeleni kwabo impango.
Isa 9:4 Ngokuba ijoka lomthwalo wabo, nenduku yamahlombe abo, noswazi lomhluphi wabo uyakwaphula njengasosukwini lukaMidiyani.
Isa 9:5 Ngokuba zonke izicathulo ezifakiweyo esiyaluyalwini sokulwa nezingubo ezigingqwe egazini ziyakuba ngezokushiswa, zidliwe ngumlilo.
Isa 9:6 Ngokuba sizalelwa umntwana, siphiwa indodana; umbuso uyakuba semahlombe akhe, negama lakhe liyakuthiwa uMluleki omangalisayo, uNkulunkulu onamandla, uYise ongunaphakade, iNkosi yokuthula.
Isa 9:7 Umbuso uyakuba mkhulu, ukuthula kungabi nakuphela esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaDavide nasembusweni wakhe, ukuze uqiniswe, usekelwe ngokwahlulela nangokulunga, kusukela manje kuze kube phakade. Ukushisekela kukaJehova Sebawoti kuyakwenza lokhu.
Isa 9:8 INkosi ithume izwi kuJakobe, lehlela kwa-Israyeli.
Isa 9:9 Bonke abantu bayakwazi, u-Efrayimi nabakhe eSamariya, abasho ekuziphakamiseni kwabo nasekuziqhenyeni kwenhliziyo ukuthi:
Isa 9:10 “Izitini ziwile, kepha siyakwakha ngamatshe abaziweyo; imithombe igawuliwe, kepha siyakutshala imisedari ezikhundleni zayo.”
Isa 9:11 UJehova uyabaphakamisela izitha zikaResini, ahlomise abamelene nabo,
Isa 9:12 i-Aramu ngaphambili namaFilisti ngasemuva, bamudle u-Israyeli ngomlomo okhamisiweyo; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe.
Isa 9:13 Abantu ababuyelanga nokho kobashayileyo, futhi abamfunanga uJehova Sebawoti.
Isa 9:14 Ngalokho uJehova uyanquma kwa-Israyeli ikhanda nomsila, igatsha lesundu nomhlanga, ngalusuku lunye.
Isa 9:15 Ilunga nophakemeyo bayikhanda, nomprofethi ofundisa amanga ungumsila.
Isa 9:16 Ngokuba abahola laba bantu bayabadukisa, nabaholwa yibo bayagwinywa.
Isa 9:17 Ngalokho iNkosi ayithokozi ngezinsizwa zabo, ayihawukeli izintandane nabafelokazi babo, ngokuba bonke bangabangenaNkulunkulu nabenza okubi, nayo yonke imilomo ikhuluma ubuwula; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe.
Isa 9:18 Ngokuba ububi bushisa njengomlilo, buqeda amakhakhasi nameva, buthungela ezihlahleni zamahlathi, zize zifuquke insika yomusi.
Isa 9:19 Ngentukuthelo kaJehova Sebawoti izwe lishisiwe; abantu bangukudla komlilo, akakho osindisa umfowabo.
Isa 9:20 Umuntu uyahlwitha ngakwesokunene, abe esalambile nokho, adle ngakwesokhohlo, kepha angasuthi; bayakudla, kube yilowo nalowo inyama yengalo yakhe,
Isa 9:21 uManase u-Efrayimi, no-Efrayimi uManase, bobabili basukele kanyekanye uJuda; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe.
Isa 10:1 Wo kubona abamisa izimiso ezimbi, nakubabhali ababhalisisa okuyingozi,
Isa 10:2 ukuchezukisa abampofu ekwahluleleni, nokwaphuca abaswelayo babantu bami umthetho, ukuze abafelokazi babe yimpango yabo, baqhwage izintandane.
Isa 10:3 Niyakwenze njani ngosuku lokuhanjelwa nasekuchithakaleni okuvela kude na? Niyakubalekela kubani ukuba nisizwe na? Niyakushiya kubani imfuyo yenu na?
Isa 10:4 Uma ningaguqi phakathi kwababoshiweyo, niyakuwa phakathi kwababuleweyo; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe.
Isa 10:5 “Wo kulo i-Asiriya, intonga yentukuthelo yami, nokusesandleni salo ukufutheka kwami kuyinduku.
Isa 10:6 Ngiyalithuma esizweni esingenaNkulunkulu, ngiliyaleze ngabantu bentukuthelo yami ukuba liphange impango, liqhwage, libenze okunyathelwayo njengodaka lwasezitaladini.
Isa 10:7 Nokho akusiwo umqondo walo, inhliziyo yalo ayicabangi kanjalo, kepha kusenhliziyweni yalo ukuchitha nokunquma izizwe ezingeyingcosana.
Isa 10:8 Ngokuba lithi: ‘Izikhulu zami zonke azisiwo amakhosi na?
Isa 10:9 IKalino alinjengeKharikemishi na? IHamati alinjenge-Aripadi na? ISamariya alinjengeDamaseku na?
Isa 10:10 Njengalokhu isandla sami siyitholile imibuso yezithombe ezimifanekiso yazo ebaziweyo yahlula eyaseJerusalema neyaseSamariya,
Isa 10:11 anginakwenza yini kulo iJerusalema nezithombe zalo, njengalokhu ngenzile kulo iSamariya nezithombe zalo, na?’ ”
Isa 10:12 Kuyakuthi lapho iNkosi isiqedile wonke umsebenzi wayo entabeni yaseSiyoni naseJerusalema, ijezise isithelo senhliziyo ezidlayo yenkosi yase-Asiriya nokuzikhukhumeza kwamehlo ayo aziphakamisayo.
Isa 10:13 Ngokuba uthi: “Ngamandla esandla sami ngikwenzile, nangokuhlakanipha kwami, ngokuba nginokuqonda; ngisusile imikhawulo yezizwe, ngiphangile ingcebo yazo, njengesiqhwaga ngawisa phansi abakhileyo khona.
Isa 10:14 Isandla sami sifumene imfuyo yabantu njengesidleke, nanjengalokhu umuntu ebutha amaqanda ashiyiweyo ngibuthile wonke umhlaba, akwababikho oshaya phiko, novula mlomo, notshiyozayo.”
Isa 10:15 Izembe liyakuzikhukhumeza kuye ogawula ngalo na? Isaha liyakuzikhulisa kuye oliqhubayo, njengokungathi induku izamazamisa abayiphakamisayo, nodondolo luphakamisa ongesiwo umuthi, na?
Isa 10:16 Ngalokho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyakuthuma ukonda phakathi kwabakhulupheleyo bakhe, nangaphansi kodumo lwakhe kuyakuphembeka ukushisa njengokushisa komlilo.
Isa 10:17 Ukukhanya kuka-Israyeli kuyakuba ngumlilo, oNgcwele wakhe abe yilangabi; kuyakushisa kuqede ameva akhe namakhakhasi akhe ngalusuku lunye.
Isa 10:18 Iyakuqeda udumo lwehlathi lakhe nensimu yakhe, umzimba nomphefumulo, kube njengesiguli esinyamalalayo.
Isa 10:19 Insali yemithi yakhe iyakuba yingcosana, ukuze ibhalwe ngumntwana.
Isa 10:20 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku insali yakwa-Israyeli nabasindileyo bendlu kaJakobe bangasenciki kobashayileyo, kepha bencike ngeqiniso kuJehova oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Isa 10:21 Insali iyakubuya, insali kaJakobe, ibuyele kuNkulunkulu onamandla.
Isa 10:22 Ngokuba noma abantu bakho, Israyeli, bengangesihlabathi solwandle, kuyakubuya phakathi kwabo insali nje; ukuchithwa kunqunyiwe, okuchichima ukulunga.
Isa 10:23 Ngokuba iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyakwenza ukubhujiswa okunqunyiweyo phakathi kwawo wonke umhlaba.
Isa 10:24 Ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, ithi: “We bantu bami, enakhe eSiyoni, ningalesabi i-Asiriya, lapho likushaya ngentonga yalo, liphakamisele kuwe udondolo lwalo ngendlela yaseGibithe.
Isa 10:25 Ngokuba kusezakuba yisikhashana nje kuze kuphele ukufutheka kwami, intukuthelo yami ibe sekuchithweni kwalo.”
Isa 10:26 UJehova Sebawoti uyakulivusela isiswebhu njengasekubulaweni kwabakwaMidiyani ngasedwaleni lika-Orebi, nentonga yakhe iyakuba phezu kolwandle, ayiphakamise ngendlela yaseGibithe.
Isa 10:27 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku umthwalo walo ususwe emahlombe akho nejoka lalo entanyeni yakho. Liyakhuphuka eRimoni,
Isa 10:28 liyeza e-Ayati, lidlula eMigroni; lethula impahla yalo eMikimashi;
Isa 10:29 badlula esikhaleni, ebusuku bahlala eGeba; iRama liyaqhaqhazela, iGibeya likaSawule liyabaleka.
Isa 10:30 Zamuluka ngezwi lakho, ndodakazi yaseGalimi; qaphela, Layishi, yiphendule, Anathoti.
Isa 10:31 IMadimena selibalekile, abakhileyo eGebimi bathutha impahla.
Isa 10:32 Namhla nje liyema ngaseNobi, linikinele isandla salo intaba yendodakazi yaseSiyoni, intaba yaseJerusalema.
Isa 10:33 Bheka, iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyanquma amagatsha ngokwesabekayo, kugawulwe abaphakemeyo, nabazikhukhumezayo behliswe.
Isa 10:34 Izihlahla zehlathi ziyacatshwa ngensimbi, neLebanoni liyawa ngoNamandla.
Isa 11:1 Kuyakuvela ihlumela esiqwini sikaJese, kuphume igatsha ezimpandeni zakhe.
Isa 11:2 UMoya kaJehova uyakuhlala phezu kwakhe, umoya wokuhlakanipha nowokuqonda, umoya wamasu nowamandla, umoya wokwazi nowokumesaba uJehova.
Isa 11:3 Intokozo yakhe iyakuba sekumesabeni uJehova; akayikwahlulela ngokubona kwamehlo akhe, anganqumi ngokuzwa kwezindlebe zakhe.
Isa 11:4 Kepha uyakwahlulela abampofu ngokulunga, anqume ngokufaneleyo abathobileyo bomhlaba, awushaye umhlaba ngentonga yomlomo wakhe, abulale ababi ngokuphefumula kwezindebe zakhe.
Isa 11:5 Ukulunga kuyakuba yibhande lezinkalo zakhe, ukuthembeka kube yibhande lamanyonga akhe.
Isa 11:6 Impisi iyakuhlala newundlu, ingwe ibuthise ndawonye nezinyane lembuzi, ithole nebhongo lengonyama kukhuluphaliswe kanyekanye, nomntwana omncane uyakukuqhuba.
Isa 11:7 Inkomo nebhere kuyakuklaba, amazinyane akho abuthise ndawonye, ingonyama idle utshani njengenkabi.
Isa 11:8 Umntwana oncelayo uyakudlala ngasemgodini webululu, olunyuliweyo elulele isandla sakhe esiseleni sikamantshingeyana.
Isa 11:9 Abayikwenza okubi, bangachithi entabeni yonke yami engcwele, ngokuba umhlaba uyakugcwala ukumazi uJehova njengamanzi asibekela ulwandle.
Isa 11:10 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku impande kaJese ime iyibhanela lezizwe; abezizwe bayakuyifuna, nendawo yayo iyakuba nodumo.
Isa 11:11 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku iNkosi ibuye yelule isandla sayo ngokwesibili ukuzuza insali yabantu bayo eyakusala e-Asiriya, naseGibithe, nasePhatirosi, naseKushe, nase-Elamu, naseShineyari, naseHamati, naseziqhingini zolwandle.
Isa 11:12 Iyakuphakamisela abezizwe ibhandela, ibuthe abaxoshiweyo bakwa-Israyeli, iqoqe abahlakazekileyo bakwaJuda emagumbini omane omhlaba.
Isa 11:13 Umhawu ka-Efrayimi uyakusuka, nabacindezela uJuda bayakunqunywa; u-Efrayimi akayikuba namhawu ngoJuda, noJuda kayikucindezela u-Efrayimi.
Isa 11:14 Kepha bayakundizela ehlombe lamaFilisti ngasentshonalanga, baphange kanyekanye abantu basempumalanga, belulele izandla zabo ngaku-Edomi noMowabi, abakwa-Amoni babalalele.
Isa 11:15 UJehova uyakuqalekisa itheku lolwandle lwaseGibithe, anikine isandla sakhe phezu koMfula ngokuhwamula komoya wakhe, awushaye ube yiminonjana eyisikhombisa, ukuze kuhanjwe ngezicathulo.
Isa 11:16 Kuyakuba khona umgwaqo wensali yabantu bakhe, eyakusala e-Asiriya, njengalokho kwakunjalo ku-Israyeli ngosuku lokukhuphuka kwakhe ezweni laseGibithe.
Isa 12:1 Uyakusho ngalolo suku ukuthi: “Ngiyakubonga, Jehova, ngokuba wangithukuthelela, kepha intukuthelo yakho isibuyile, uyangiduduza.
Isa 12:2 Bheka, uNkulunkulu uyinsindiso yami; nginethemba, angesabi, ngokuba uJehova, uJehova ungamandla ami nehubo lami, waba yinsindiso yami.”
Isa 12:3 Ngalokho niyakukha amanzi ngokujabula emithonjeni yensindiso.
Isa 12:4 Niyakusho ngalolo suku ukuthi: “Bongani uJehova, nibize igama lakhe, nizazise izenzo zakhe phakathi kwezizwe, nimemezele ukuthi igama lakhe liphakeme.
Isa 12:5 Hlabelelani kuJehova, ngokuba wenzile izinto ezinkulu; lokhu makwazeke emhlabeni wonke.
Isa 12:6 Memeza, ujabule wena ohlezi eSiyoni, ngokuba mkhulu oNgcwele ka-Israyeli phakathi kwakho.”
Isa 13:1 Isiprofetho ngeBabele asibonayo u-Isaya indodana ka-Amose.
Isa 13:2 Misani ibhanela entabeni elucwatha, nibaphakamisele izwi, nibaqhwebe ngezandla ukuba bangene emasangweni abakhulu.
Isa 13:3 Mina uqobo ngibayalile abangcwele bami, yebo, ngibizele amaqhawe ami okwentukuthelo yami, bona labo abami abajabula ngokuziqhenya.
Isa 13:4 Umsindo wesixuku ezintabeni kungathi ngowabantu abaningi! Umsindo wokuxokozela kwemibuso yabezizwe ihlangene! UJehova Sebawoti uyabutha impi yakhe.
Isa 13:5 Bavela ezweni elikude nasekugcineni kwezulu uJehova nezikhali zentukuthelo yakhe, ukuba bachithe umhlaba wonke.
Isa 13:6 Klewulani, ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele; njengencithakalo evela kuSomandla luyafika.
Isa 13:7 Ngalokho izandla zonke ziyadangala, nezinhliziyo zonke ziyaphela amandla.
Isa 13:8 Bayashaqeka, babanjwa yiminjunju nobuhlungu, bazibinya njengababelethayo. Babhekana omunye nomunye bemangala. Ubuso babo bungubuso bamalangabi.
Isa 13:9 Bheka, usuku lukaJehova luyeza, lunonya, lunokufutheka, lunokuvutha kolaka, ukuba lwenz'ize umhlaba, luchithe izoni zawo kuwo.
Isa 13:10 Ngokuba izinkanyezi zezulu nawondwenjana bazo akuyikukhanya; ilanga liyakuba mnyama ekuphumeni kwalo, nenyanga ayisayikukhipa ukukhanya kwayo.
Isa 13:11 Ngiyakulijezisa izwe ngobubi balo, nababi ngezono zabo, ngenze ukuba kuphele ukuzidla kwabaziqhenyayo, ngithobise ukuziphakamisa kwabacindezeli.
Isa 13:12 Ngiyakwenza umuntu abe yigugu kunegolide elihle, yebo, umuntukazana kunegolide elicwengekileyo.
Isa 13:13 Ngalokho ngiyakuzamazamisa izulu, umhlaba unyakaziswe endaweni yawo, ngentukuthelo kaJehova Sebawoti ngosuku lokuvutha kwentukuthelo yakhe.
Isa 13:14 Kuyakuthi njengensephe exoshwayo nezimvu ezingaqoqwa muntu, baphendukele, kube yilowo nalowo kubantu bakubo, babalekele, kube yilowo ezweni lakubo.
Isa 13:15 Bonke abatholwayo bayakugwazwa, nabo bonke ababanjwayo bayakuwa ngenkemba.
Isa 13:16 Izingane zabo ziyakuchotshozwa emehlweni abo, izindlu zabo ziphangwe, omkabo baphoqwe.
Isa 13:17 Bhekani, ngiyakubavusela amaMede angayikunaka isiliva, negolide angathokozi ngalo.
Isa 13:18 Iminsalo iyakuwisa phansi izinsizwa zabo; abayikuhawukela isithelo esisesizalweni, amehlo abo angabi nasihe kubantwana.
Isa 13:19 IBabele, umhlobiso wemibuso, isivunulo sokuzikhukhumeza kwamaKaledi, liyakuba njengokuchitha kukaNkulunkulu iSodoma neGomora.
Isa 13:20 Alisoze labuye lakhiwa, akusayikuhlalwa kulo ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane; umArabiya akayikumisa khona, nabelusi abayikulala lapho nemihlambi yabo.
Isa 13:21 Kepha izilwane zasehlane ziyakubuthisa khona, nezindlu zalo ziyakugcwala izikhova; kuyakuhlala lapho izintshe, namademoni ayakungqabashiya khona.
Isa 13:22 Izimpungushe ziyakukhala ezinqabeni zalo, namakhanka ezindlini zamakhosi; siseduze ukufika isikhathi salo, nezinsuku zalo aziyikwandiswa.
Isa 14:1 Ngokuba uJehova uyakumhawukela uJakobe, abuye amkhethe u-Israyeli, ababeke ezweni lakubo; nabafokazi bayakuzihlanganisa nabo, banamathele endlini kaJakobe.
Isa 14:2 Abantu bayakubathatha, babayise ezindaweni zabo; indlu yakwa-Israyeli iyakubenza ifa ezweni likaJehova, babe yizinceku nezincekukazi, babathumbe labo abakade bethunjiwe yibo, babuse phezu kwabacindezeli babo.
Isa 14:3 Kuyakuthi ngosuku uJehova akuphumuza ngalo ebuhlungwini bakho, nasekuhluphekeni kwakho, nasemsebenzini olukhuni obusetshenziswa ngawo,
Isa 14:4 uphakamise lesi saga ngenkosi yaseBabele, uthi: “Yeka ukuphela komcindezeli nokugcina kokubhensa!
Isa 14:5 UJehova waphulile udondolo lwababi nentonga yababusi
Isa 14:6 eyashaya abantu ngentukuthelo ngokushaya okunganqamukiyo, eyabusa izizwe ngolaka ngokuzingela okunganqandwanga.
Isa 14:7 Wonke umhlaba uyaphumula, usenokuthula; baqhumuka ngokuhlabelela.
Isa 14:8 Yebo, nemisayipuresi ithokoza ngawe, kanye nemisedari yaseLebanoni, ngokuthi: ‘Selokhu walaliswa phansi, akakho umgawuli okhuphukela kithina.’
Isa 14:9 Indawo yabafileyo ngaphansi inyakazisiwe ukuba ikuhlangabeze ekufikeni kwakho, ikuvusele izithunzi, zonke izikhulu zomhlaba, isukumise onke amakhosi ezizwe ezihlalweni zawo zobukhosi.
Isa 14:10 Onke ayakuthatha athi kuwe: Nawe usubuthakathaka njengathi, usufana nathi, na?
Isa 14:11 Ubukhosi bakho sebehliselwe endaweni yabafileyo, umsindo wezingubhu zenu; izimpethu zenekiwe ngaphansi kwakho, nezibungu ziyakusibekela.
Isa 14:12 “Yeka ukuwa kwakho ezulwini, khwezi elikhanyayo, ndodana yokusa, nokunqunyelwa kwakho phansi, wena owawuthobisa izizwe.
Isa 14:13 Wena wathi enhliziyweni yakho: ‘Ngiyakukhuphukela ezulwini, ngiphakamise isihlalo sami sobukhosi phezu kwezinkanyezi zikaNkulunkulu, ngihlale entabeni yomhlangano ngasekugcineni kwasenyakatho.
Isa 14:14 Ngiyakukhuphuka phezu kwezindawo eziphakemeyo zamafu, ngizenze ngibe ngangoPhezukonke.’
Isa 14:15 Kepha uyakwehliselwa endaweni yabafileyo, ekugcineni komgodi.
Isa 14:16 “Abakubonayo bayakugqolozela, bakuqaphele, bathi: ‘Nguye lo muntu owawuzamazamisa umhlaba, wanyakazisa imibuso,
Isa 14:17 owenza izwe laba yihlane, wayichitha imizi yalo, akavumela iziboshwa zakhe ukuba zigoduke, na?’
Isa 14:18 Onke amakhosi ezizwe, onke alala ngodumo, yileyo naleyo endlini yayo.
Isa 14:19 Kepha wena ulahliwe ngaphandle kwethuna lakho njengegatsha elinengekayo, ligqokwe ngababuleweyo, abahlatshwe yinkemba, abehlela ematsheni omgodi njengesidumbu esinyathelweyo.
Isa 14:20 Awuyikuhlanganiswa nabo ekumbelweni, ngokuba uchithile izwe lakho, wabulala abantu bakho; inzalo yababi ayisayikubizwa ngegama naphakade.
Isa 14:21 Lungiselani abantwana bakhe ukubulawa ngobubi bawoyise, ukuze bangavuki, badle ifa lomhlaba, bagcwalise ubuso bezwe ngemizi.”
Isa 14:22 “Ngiyakubavukela,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “nginqume eBabele igama, nensali, nendodana, nomzukulwana,” usho uJehova.
Isa 14:23 “Ngiyakulenza libe yifa likanondwebu namachibi amanzi, ngilishanele ngomshanelo wencithakalo,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Isa 14:24 UJehova Sebawoti ufungile, wathi: “Impela njengokulinganisa kwami kuyakuba njalo, nanjengokunquma kwami kuyakuma kanjalo
Isa 14:25 ukuthi ngiyakumaphula owase-Asiriya ezweni lami, ngimnyathele phansi ezintabeni zami; bese lisuka kubo ijoka lakhe, nomthwalo wakhe usuke emahlombe abo.”
Isa 14:26 Yilesi esiyisinqumo esinqunyiwe emhlabeni wonke; yilesi esiyisandla eseluliwe phezu kwezizwe zonke.
Isa 14:27 Ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti unqumile; ngubani ongakuchitha na? Isandla sakhe singeseluliweyo; ngubani ongasibuyisa na?
Isa 14:28 Ngomnyaka wokufa kwenkosi u-Ahazi kwavela lesi siprofetho.
Isa 14:29 Ungathokozi wena Filistiya lonke ngokuthi intonga ekushayileyo yaphukile, ngokuba empandeni yenyoka kuyakuphuma ibululu, nenzalo yalo iyakuba yinyoka endizayo.
Isa 14:30 Amazibulo abampofu ayakuklaba, nabaswelayo bayakulala belondekile; ngiyakubulala impande yakho ngendlala, nensali yakho iyakubhujiswa.
Isa 14:31 Klewula wena sango, dazuluka wena muzi, phela amandla wena Filistiya lonke! Ngokuba enyakatho kuvela umusi; akakho oyakwahlukana nebutho lakhe.
Isa 14:32 Izithunywa zesizwe ziyakuphendulwa ngokuthini na? Ukuthi nguJehova obeke isisekelo eSiyoni; abahluphekayo babantu bakhe bayakuphephela kulo.
Isa 15:1 Isiprofetho ngoMowabi. Impela ebusuku bunye i-Ari Mowabi linqotshiwe, lichithekile; impela ebusuku bunye iKhiri Mowabi linqotshiwe, lichithekile.
Isa 15:2 Bayakhuphukela ethempelini; iDiboni lenyukela ezindaweni eziphakemeyo ukuyokhala; uMowabi uyaklewula eNebo naseMedeba; onke amakhanda ayizimpandlana, zonke izilevu ziphuculiwe.
Isa 15:3 Ezitaladini zabo bayabhinca indwangu yamasaka, nasophahleni lwabo nasezigcawini zabo bayaklewula bonke, bamululeka izinyembezi.
Isa 15:4 IHeshiboni liyadazuluka kanye ne-Elehale; izwi labo lizwakala kuze kube naseJahasi; ngalokho amabutho akwaMowabi ayakhamuluka, umphefumulo wakhe uyathuthumela phakathi kwakhe.
Isa 15:5 Inhliziyo yami ikhalela uMowabi; ababalekileyo bakhe bayabalekela eSora, nase Egila Shelishiya; yebo, nasegqumeni laseLuhithe bakhuphukela bekhala, nasendleleni eya eHoronayimi, bephakamisa izwi lokudazuluka.
Isa 15:6 Ngokuba amanzi aseNimrimi ayincithakalo, notshani buyoma, uhlaza luyaphela, akusekho okuluhlaza.
Isa 15:7 Ngalokho okuseleyo abakutholileyo, nemfuyo yabo, bakuwelisa uMfula Weminyezane.
Isa 15:8 Ngokuba ukukhala kuzungeze imikhawulo yakwaMowabi, nokuklewula kwakhe kuze kube se-Egelayimi, nokububula kwakhe kuze kube seBeri Elimi.
Isa 15:9 Ngokuba amanzi aseDimoni agcwele igazi; yebo, ngiyakwehlisela iDimoni nokunye: ingonyama phezu kwabasindileyo bakwaMowabi, insali yezwe.
Isa 16:1 Thumani amawundlu ombusi wezwe aphume eSela ngasehlane, aye entabeni yendodakazi yaseSiyoni.
Isa 16:2 Kuyakuthi njengezinyoni ezizulazulayo, njengamaphuphu ahlakazekileyo, abe njalo amadodakazi akwaMowabi emazibukweni ase-Arinoni.
Isa 16:3 “Lulekanani, nenze izinqumo, ubeke isithunzi sakho njengobusuku phakathi kwemini, nithukuse abaxoshiweyo, ningadaluli ababalekileyo.
Isa 16:4 Abaxoshiweyo bakwaMowabi mabahlale kuwe; mawube yisivikelo kubo ebusweni bomchithi.” Lapho umcindezeli esephelile, nokuchitha sekuyekiwe, nabanyathelayo sebeqediwe ezweni,
Isa 16:5 kuyakumiswa isihlalo sobukhosi ngomusa, kuhlale kuso ngeqiniso etendeni likaDavide umahluleli ofuna ukwahlulela esheshisa ukulunga.
Isa 16:6 Sizwile ngokuziphakamisa kukaMowabi ukuthi uphakeme kakhulu, nangokuzidla kwakhe nokuziqhenya kwakhe nentukuthelo yakhe nokuphafuza kwakhe okuzenzisayo.
Isa 16:7 Ngalokho uMowabi uyaklewula ngoMowabi; bonke bayakuklewula. Niyakukhala ngezigaxa zezithelo zomvini ezomileyo zaseKhiri Haresheti nidabukile kakhulu.
Isa 16:8 Ngokuba amasimu aseHeshiboni abunile kanye nomvini waseSibima; amakhosi ezizwe achithile amagatsha awo; afinyelela naseJazeri, edukela nasehlane; amahlumela awo elulwa, awela ulwandle.
Isa 16:9 Ngalokho ngiyakukhalela umvini waseSibima njengokukhala kweJazeri, ngikumanzise, Heshiboni, ngezinyembezi zami, nawe Elehale, ngokuba phezu kwezithelo zakho nokuvuna kwakho kuwile ukumemeza kwempi.
Isa 16:10 Ukuthokoza kususiwe kanye nokujabula ensimini; nasezivinini akuhlatshelelwa, akujatshulwa; abanyathelayo abalinyatheli iwayini ezikhamweni; ngenze ukuba kuphele ukumemeza.
Isa 16:11 Ngalokho inhliziyo yami iyakhala njengehabhu ngoMowabi, nokuphakathi kwami ngeKhiri Heresi.
Isa 16:12 Kuyakuthi lapho uMowabi esebonakala, azikhathaze endaweni ephakemeyo, aye endlini yakhe engcwele ukuba athandaze, angaphumeleli.
Isa 16:13 Yileli izwi uJehova alikhulumayo ngoMowabi ngaleso sikhathi.
Isa 16:14 Kepha manje uJehova ukhulumile ukuthi: “Phakathi kweminyaka emithathu njengeminyaka yomqashwa udumo lukaMowabi luyakudelelwa, noma enezixuku eziningi; insali iyakuba ncane kakhulu, ingabi namandla.”
Isa 17:1 Isiprofetho ngeDamaseku. “IDamaseku liyakususwa, lingabe lisaba ngumuzi, libe yinxiwa nencithakalo
Isa 17:2 eshiyiwe kuze kube phakade, neyakuba ngeyemihlambi ebuthisa khona, ingesatshiswa muntu.
Isa 17:3 Inqaba iyakuphela kwa-Efrayimi, nombuso eDamaseku, nensali e-Aramu, kube njengodumo lwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Isa 17:4 “Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku udumo luka Jakobe lube buthakathaka, kuzace ukukhuluphala kwenyama yakhe.
Isa 17:5 Kuyakuba njengomvuni ovuna amabele asemi nengalo yakhe evuna izikhwebu, kube njengokukha izikhwebu esiGodini samaRefa.
Isa 17:6 Kepha umkhothozo uyakusala khona njengokushaywa kweminqumo: izithelo ezimbili noma ezintathu enhlokweni phezulu, ezine noma eziyisihlanu emagatsheni omuthi,” usho uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.
Isa 17:7 Ngalolo suku abantu bayakumbheka uMenzi wabo, namehlo abo ayakumbuka oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Isa 17:8 Abayikubheka ama-altare abo, umsebenzi wezandla zabo, bangabuki okwenziwe yiminwe yabo, o-Ashera nama-altare empepho.
Isa 17:9 Ngalolo suku imizi yabo enamandla iyakuba njengezindawo ezishiyiweyo zasehlathini nezaseziqongweni zezintaba abazishiya phambi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli zibe yincithakalo.
Isa 17:10 Ngokuba ukhohliwe uNkulunkulu wokusindiswa kwakho, awukhumbulanga idwala lamandla akho; ngalokho noma utshala izithombo ezimnandi, uhlwanyele amahlumela angaziwayo,
Isa 17:11 ngosuku lokutshala kwakho, lapho ubiyela, nangokusa kokuhlwanyela kwakho, lapho wenza ukuba kuqhakaze, ukuvuna kuyakubaleka ngosuku losizi nolobuhlungu obungenakupholiswa.
Isa 17:12 Wo kukho ukuhlokoma kwezizwe eziningi ezihlokoma njengokuhlokoma kwezilwandle, nomsindo wokuxokozela kwabezizwe abaxokozela njengokuxokozela kwamanzi amaningi.
Isa 17:13 Izizwe ziyaxokozela njengokuxokozela kwamanzi amaningi, kodwa uyakuzisola, zibalekele kude, zixoshwe njengamakhoba asezintabeni phambi komoya, nothuli olushwilayo phambi kwesiphepho.
Isa 17:14 Ngesikhathi sokuhlwa, bheka, yingebhe; kungakasi azisekho. Yilesi esiyisabelo sabasiphangayo, nenkatho yabasamukayo.
Isa 18:1 Wo kuwena lizwe lokuhashaza kwamaphiko eliphesheya komfula waseKushe,
