Isa 18:2 elithuma izigijimi ngolwandle nangemikhumbi yemihlanga phezu kwamanzi. Hambani nina zithunywa ezinejubane, niye esizweni esidephileyo nesikhazimulayo, kubantu abesabekayo lapha nasekudeni, isizwe esinamandla amakhulu nesinyathelayo, esilizwe laso lidatshulwe yimifula.
Isa 18:3 Nonke nina enakhileyo ezweni nani nonke enihlezi emhlabeni bhekani, lapho ibhanela liphakanyiswa ezintabeni; zwanini, lapho icilongo libethwa.
Isa 18:4 Ngokuba uJehova ushilo kimi kanje, wathi: “Ngiyakubheka ngithule, ngisendaweni yami, njengokubalela okukhazimula ekukhanyeni kwelanga, njengefu lamazolo ekufudumaleni ngesikhathi sokuvuna.”
Isa 18:5 Ngokuba kungakafiki ukuvuna, nokukhahlela sekuphelile, nembali isiphenduka isithelo esivuthiweyo, uyakunquma amahlumela ngawocelemba, awasike amagatsha, awasuse.
Isa 18:6 Ayakushiywa ndawonye abe ngawamanqe asezintabeni nawezilwane zasemhlabeni; amanqe ayakuhlala ehlobo phezu kwawo, nazo zonke izilwane zomhlaba ziyakuhlala ebusika phezu kwawo.
Isa 18:7 Ngaleso sikhathi kuyakulethwa isipho kuJehova Sebawoti yibo abantu abadephileyo nabakhazimulayo, sivela kubantu abesabekayo lapha nasekudeni, isizwe esinamandla amakhulu nesinyathelayo, esilizwe laso lidatshulwe yimifula, endaweni yegama likaJehova Sebawoti, intaba yaseSiyoni.
Isa 19:1 Isiprofetho ngeGibithe. Bheka, uJehova ukhwele phezu kwefu elinejubane, uyeza eGibithe; onkulunkulu baseGibithe bayathuthumela ebusweni bakhe, nezinhliziyo zabaseGibithe ziphela amandla phakathi kwabo.
Isa 19:2 “Ngiyakuvusa abaseGibithe ukuba bamelane nabaseGibithe, balwe, kube yilowo nalowo nomfowabo, kube yilowo nalowo nomakhelwane wakhe, umuzi nomuzi, umbuso nombuso.
Isa 19:3 Umoya waseGibithe uyakuba yize ngaphakathi kwalo; ngiyakuchitha amasu alo; bayakufuna onkulunkulu, nezinyanga, nabanamadlozi, nabathakathi.
Isa 19:4 Ngiyakubanikeza abaseGibithe esandleni senkosi elukhuni, nenkosi enamandla iyakubusa phezu kwabo,” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti.
Isa 19:5 Amanzi ayakuphela elwandle, umfula wome, ushe.
Isa 19:6 Imifula iyakunuka, imifudlana yaseGibithe iyakuncipha, yome, kubune umhlanga nebungu.
Isa 19:7 Kuyakuba khona uqwathule ngaseNayile, ngasogwini lweNayile, nakho konke okutshaliwe ngaseNayile kuyakoma, kuhlakazwe, kungabe kusababikho.
Isa 19:8 Abadobi bayakukhala, balile, bonke abaphonsa udobo eNayile; nabeneka amanetha emanzini bayakudabuka.
Isa 19:9 Bayakujabha abasebenza ngefilakisi eliklayiweyo kanye nabaluki belineni.
Isa 19:10 Izisekelo zalo ziyakwaphulwa, bonke abasebenza ngokuqashwa badabuke ngenhliziyo.
Isa 19:11 Izikhulu zaseSowani ziyiziwula impela, nesiluleko sabaluleki abahlakaniphileyo bakaFaro siphendukile ubuwula; ningasho kanjani kuFaro ukuthi: “Mina ngiyindodana yabahlakaniphileyo, ngiyindodana yamakhosi asendulo,” na?
Isa 19:12 Pho, baphi abahlakaniphileyo bakho na? Mabakutshele, bakwazise lokhu akucebile uJehova Sebawoti ngeGibithe.
Isa 19:13 Izikhulu zaseSowani ziphendukile iziwula, izikhulu zaseNofi zikhohlisiwe; balidukisile iGibithe abangamatshe amagumbi ezizwe zalo.
Isa 19:14 UJehova uthulule umoya ophambeneyo phakathi kwabo, baze balintengantengise iGibithe kuyo yonke imisebenzi yalo njengesidakwa sintengantenga ebuhlanzweni baso.
Isa 19:15 IGibithe aliyikuba namsebenzi oyakwenziwa yikhanda nomsila, negatsha lesundu nomhlanga.
Isa 19:16 Ngalolo suku iGibithe liyakuba njengabesifazane, lithuthumele, lesabe ukunikina kwesandla sikaJehova Sebawoti asinikina phezu kwalo.
Isa 19:17 Izwe lakwaJuda liyakuba yingebhe yeGibithe; njalo lapho likhunjuzwa ngalo, liyakwesaba icebo uJehova Sebawoti alicebe ngalo.
Isa 19:18 Ngalolo suku kuyakuba yimizi eyisihlanu ezweni laseGibithe eyakukhuluma ulimi lwaseKhanani, ifunge uJehova Sebawoti; omunye uyakuthiwa uMuzi Welanga.
Isa 19:19 Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona i-altare kuJehova phakathi kwezwe laseGibithe, nensika kuJehova emkhawulweni walo.
Isa 19:20 Liyakuba yisibonakaliso nobufakazi kuJehova Sebawoti ezweni laseGibithe, ngokuba bayakukhala kuJehova ngabacindezeli; yena uyakubathumela umsindisi nomvikeli, abophule.
Isa 19:21 UJehova uyakuzazisa eGibithe, nabaseGibithe bayakumazi uJehova ngalolo suku, bamkhonze ngomhlatshelo nomnikelo, benze izithembiso kuJehova, bazigcwalise.
Isa 19:22 UJehova uyakulishaya iGibithe, elishaya, abeseliphulukisa; bayakubuyela kuJehova, bamncenge, abaphulukise.
Isa 19:23 Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona umendo ophuma eGibithe uye e-Asiriya; i-Asiriya liyakungena eGibithe, iGibithe lingene e-Asiriya, iGibithe likhuleke kanye ne-Asiriya.
Isa 19:24 Ngalolo suku u-Israyeli uyakuba ngowesithathu kanye neGibithe ne-Asiriya, babe yisibusiso phakathi komhlaba,
Isa 19:25 uJehova Sebawoti ababusisa ngaso, ethi: “Malibusiswe iGibithe abantu bami, ne-Asiriya umsebenzi wezandla zami, no-Israyeli ifa lami.”
Isa 20:1 Ngomnyaka wokufika kukaTharithani e-Ashidodi, ethunywe nguSarigoni, inkosi yase-Asiriya, walwa ne-Ashidodi, walithatha,
Isa 20:2 ngaleso sikhathi uJehova wakhuluma ngesandla sika-Isaya indodana ka-Amose, wathi: “Hamba uthukulule indwangu yamasaka okhalweni lwakho, ukhumule izicathulo zakho ezinyaweni zakho.” Wenze njalo, wahamba ze, akafakanga nazicathulo.
Isa 20:3 UJehova wathi: “Njengalokhu inceku yami u-Isaya isihambe ze ingafakile nazicathulo iminyaka emithathu, iyisibonakaliso nesimangaliso eGibithe naseKushe,
Isa 20:4 kanjalo inkosi yase-Asiriya iyakumukisa abathunjwa baseGibithe nabaxoshiweyo baseKushe, abasha nabadala, behamba ze, bengafakile nazicathulo, izinqe zabo zihlubuliwe, kube yihlazo laseGibithe.
Isa 20:5 Bayakuphela amandla, babe namahloni ngeKushe ithemba labo nangeGibithe udumo lwabo.
Isa 20:6 Abakhileyo kuleli elingasogwini bayakuthi ngalolo suku: ‘Bheka, linjalo ithemba lethu esabalekela kulo ukuba sisizwe, sophulwe enkosini yase-Asiriya; pho-ke, thina siyakuphunyuka kanjani na?’ ”
Isa 21:1 Isiprofetho ngehlane lolwandle. Njengokudlula kwezivunguvungu eningizimu kuvela ehlane ezweni elesabekayo.
Isa 21:2 Ngitshelwe umbono olukhuni: umphangi uyaphanga, umchithi uyachitha. Yenyuka, Elamu, vimbezela, Mediya; konke ukukhala kwalo ngikwenza kuphele.
Isa 21:3 Ngalokho ukhalo lwami lugcwele imihelo; inkwantshu ingibambile njengenkwantshu yobelethayo; ngikhonkobele ukuba ngingezwa, ngiphele amandla ukuba ngingaboni.
Isa 21:4 Ngadukelwa yingqondo, ngashaywa luvalo; ukuhwelela engakulangazelela kwaphenduka ukuthuthumela kimi.
Isa 21:5 Ngukulungisa itafula yini? Ngukwendlala izindwangu, ukudla nokuphuza, na? Hhayi, sukumani, zikhulu, nicobe izihlangu.
Isa 21:6 Ngokuba ishilo kanje iNkosi, yathi: “Hamba umise umlindi ozakubika akubonayo.
Isa 21:7 Lapho ebona abamahhashi, amahhashi amabili ngamabili, nezinkweli zezimbongolo, nezinkweli zamakamela, uyakuqaphela nokuqaphela ngesineke esikhulu.”
Isa 21:8 Obonayo wayesememeza, wathi: “Nkosi yami, ngimi njalo emini embhoshongweni wami, ngihlezi ngisemlindelweni nasebusuku bonke.
Isa 21:9 Bheka, kuyeza isigaba samadoda, amahhashi amabili ngamabili. Wathatha wathi: ‘Liwile, liwile iBabele, nazo zonke izithombe ezibaziweyo zawonkulunkulu balo zidilizwe phansi.’ ”
Isa 21:10 Wena ongokubhuliweyo kwami kwesibuya sami, engikuzwileyo kuJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, khona ngiyanazisa.
Isa 21:11 Isiprofetho ngeDuma. Ukhona ongimemeza ngiseSeyiri, ethi: “Mlindi, yisikhathi sini sobusuku na? Mlindi, yisikhathi sini sobusuku na?”
Isa 21:12 Umlindi wathi: “Kuyeza ukusa, kepha kuse sebusuku. Uma nithanda ukubuza, buzani; buyani nize.”
Isa 21:13 Isiprofetho nge-Arabiya. Hlalani ebusuku ehlathini lase-Arabiya nina mahele aseDedanimi.
Isa 21:14 Owomileyo bamlethela amanzi abakhileyo ezweni laseThema, bahlangabeza ababalekayo nesinkwa.
Isa 21:15 Ngokuba babalekela izinkemba, izinkemba ezihoshiweyo, neminsalo ensaliweyo, nobunzima bempi.
Isa 21:16 Ngokuba iNkosi ishilo kimi kanje, yathi: “Phakathi komnyaka, njengeminyaka yomqashwa, udumo lonke lwaseKedari luyakuphela,
Isa 21:17 nensali yenani leminsalo yamaqhawe abaseKedari iyakuba ncane,” ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli ukhulumile.
Isa 22:1 Isiprofetho ngesiGodi Sombono. Yini, pho, ukuba ukhuphukele wonke ophahleni lwezindlu
Isa 22:2 wena muzi ogcwele ukumemeza, oxokozelayo, muzi othokozayo, na? Ababuleweyo bakho ababulawanga ngenkemba, kabafelanga empini.
Isa 22:3 Zonke izinduna zakho zibalekile kanyekanye, zaboshwa ngaphandle kweminsalo; zonke ezakho ezafunyanwayo zaboshwa kanyekanye, noma zazibalekele kude.
Isa 22:4 Ngalokho ngathi: “Ningangibheki, ngiyakukhala ngomunyu; ningazami ukungiduduza ngenxa yokuchithwa kwendodakazi yabantu bami.”
Isa 22:5 Ngokuba kulusuku lokukhathazeka, nolokunyathelwa phansi, nolokukhungatheka, oluvela eNkosini uJehova Sebawoti esiGodini Sombono kanye nokudilizwa kwezingange nokumemeza ezintabeni.
Isa 22:6 I-Elamu lathwala isambo phakathi kwezinqola, nabantu, namahhashi, neKhiri lambula isihlangu.
Isa 22:7 Kwathi izigodi zakho ezikhethekileyo zagcwala izinqola, nabamahhashi bazihlela nokuzihlela ngasesangweni.
Isa 22:8 Wasisusa isimbozo kwaJuda; wena wabheka ngalolo suku izikhali zasendlini yehlathi.
Isa 22:9 Nabona imifantu emzini kaDavide ukuthi yayiminingi, nawaqoqa amanzi asechibini lasenzansi.
Isa 22:10 Nazibala izindlu zaseJerusalema, nazidiliza izindlu ukuba niluqinise ugange.
Isa 22:11 Futhi nenzela amanzi echibi elidala umgodi phakathi kwezingange zombili, kepha anibhekanga kumenzi walokho, animnakanga okade wakunquma.
Isa 22:12 Ngalolo suku iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti yabizela ukukhala, nokulila, nobumpandla, nokubhinca indwangu yamasaka,
Isa 22:13 kepha bheka, nakhu ukujabula, nokuthokoza, nokubulala izinkabi, nokuhlaba izimvu, ukudla inyama nokuphuza iwayini, ngokuthi: “Masidle, siphuze, ngokuba ngomuso sizakufa.”
Isa 22:14 Kepha uJehova Sebawoti wazibonakalisa ezindlebeni zami, wathi: “Impela lesi sono asiyikuhlangulwa kini nize nife,” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti.
Isa 22:15 Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, ithi: “Hamba uye kuleyo nduna uShebina ophezu kwendlu, uthi:
Isa 22:16 ‘Wenzani lapha, futhi unobani lapha ukuba uziqophele lapha ithuna na? Uziqophela ithuna lakhe phezulu, uzikipilitela indawo yokuhlala edwaleni!’
Isa 22:17 “Bheka, uJehova uyakukulahla njengalokhu umuntu elahla, abambe nokubamba.
Isa 22:18 Uyakukuthandela nokukuthandela njengokuthandelweyo, akulahle njengegabade ezweni elibanzi. Uyakufela khona, lapho kuyakuba khona nezinqola zodumo lwakho wena hlazo lendlu yenkosi yakho.
Isa 22:19 Ngiyakukuhlohloloza esikhundleni sakho, ngikuwise endaweni yakho.
Isa 22:20 “Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku ngiyibize inceku yami u-Eliyakimi indodana kaHilikiya;
Isa 22:21 ngiyakumembathisa ingubo yakho, ngimqinise ngebhande lakho, nginikeze ukubusa kwakho esandleni sakhe, abe nguyise kwabakhileyo eJerusalema nakuyo indlu yakwaJuda.
Isa 22:22 Ngiyakubeka isihluthelelo sendlu kaDavide ehlombe lakhe; uyakuvula kungavali muntu, avale kungavuli muntu.
Isa 22:23 Ngiyakumbethelisa okwesipikili endaweni eqinileyo, abe yisihlalo sobukhosi esikhazimulayo endlini kayise.
Isa 22:24 Bayakuphanyeka phezu kwakhe lonke udumo lwendlu kayise, inzalo nabantwana, zonke izitsha ezincane, imicengezi nezinkamba.
Isa 22:25 “Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “isipikili esabethelwa endaweni eqinileyo siyakukhumuka, sinqanyulwe, siwe, nomthwalo obukuso unqunywe,” ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile.
Isa 23:1 Isiprofetho ngeTire. Klewulani nina, Mikhumbi yaseTharishishi, ngokuba lichithekile; indlu ayisekho, nokungena akusenakwenzeka; kwambulelwe kubo kuvela ezweni laseKitimi.
Isa 23:2 Thulani nina enakhileyo ngasogwini, nina abathengisi baseSidoni abanigcwalisile bedabula elwandle.
Isa 23:3 Emanzini amaningi imbewu yaseSihori nokuvuna kweNayile kwakuyinzuzo yalo; laliyindawo yokuthenga kuzo izizwe.
Isa 23:4 Yiba namahloni wena Sidoni, ngokuba lukhulumile ulwandle, inqaba yolwandle, ngokuthi: “Angibanga namihelo, angizalanga, angikhulisanga izinsizwa, angondlanga izintombi.”
Isa 23:5 Lapho kubikwa eGibithe, bayakuthuthumela ngokuzwa ngeTire.
Isa 23:6 Welani niye eTharishishi; klewulani nina enakhileyo ngasogwini.
Isa 23:7 Yilowo ongumuzi wenu ojabulayo, ubudala bawo busukela ezinsukwini zasendulo, owayiswa kude yizinyawo zawo ukuba uhlale khona, na?
Isa 23:8 Ngubani ocebe lokhu ngeTire eliqhelisayo, elibathengi balo bayizikhulu, nabahwebi balo bangabadumileyo bomhlaba, na?
Isa 23:9 NguJehova Sebawoti okucebileyo ukuba konakaliswe ukuziphakamisa kwabo bonke ubukhosi, badeleleke bonke abadumileyo bomhlaba.
Isa 23:10 Dabula izwe lakho njengeNayile, ndodakazi yaseTharishishi; akusekho bhande.
Isa 23:11 Welulile isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle, wazamazamisa imibuso; uJehova uyalezile ngeKhanani ukuba kuchithwe izinqaba zalo.
Isa 23:12 Wathi: “Awusayikujabula wena ntombi ehlazisiweyo, ndodakazi yaseSidoni; vuka, uwelele eKitimi; nalapho awuyikuthola ukuphumula.”
Isa 23:13 Bheka, izwe lamaKaledi, leso sizwe esingasekho, esanqunyelwa yi-Asiriya izilwane zasehlane, limisa imibhoshongo, lizenza ize izindlu zaso zamakhosi, lenza laba yincithakalo.
Isa 23:14 Klewulani nina mikhumbi yaseTharishishi, ngokuba inqaba yenu ichithekile.
Isa 23:15 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku iTire likhohlakale iminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa njengezinsuku zankosinye. Ngasekupheleni kweminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa kuyakuba khona kulo iTire njengasesihlabelelweni sesifebe:
Isa 23:16 “Thatha ihabhu, uhambahambe emzini wena sifebe esikhohlakeleyo, ubethe kamnandi, uhlabelele izihlabelelo eziningi, ukuze ukhunjulwe.”
Isa 23:17 Kuyakuthi ngasekupheleni kweminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa uJehova ahambele iTire, lona libuyele enzuzweni yalo, lifebe nayo yonke imibuso yezwe ebusweni bomhlaba.
Isa 23:18 Intengo yalo nenzuzo yalo iyakuba ngcwele kuJehova; ayiyikunqwabelwa, ilondolozwe, ngokuba intengo yalo iyakuba ngeyabahlala phambi kukaJehova, ukuze badle basuthe, babe nezingubo ezinhle.
Isa 24:1 Bheka, uJehova wenza ize umhlaba, awuchithe, agumbuqele ubuso bawo, ahlakaze abakhileyo kuwo.
Isa 24:2 Kuyakuthi njengakubantu kube njalo kumpristi, nanjengasencekwini kube njalo enkosini yayo, nanjengasencekukazini kube njalo enkosikazini yayo, nanjengakumthengi kube njalo kumthengisi, nanjengakotshelekayo kube njalo kobolekayo, nanjengakobiza inzalo kube njalo kokhokha inzalo.
Isa 24:3 Umhlaba uyakuba yize leze, uphangwe nokuphangwa, ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile izwi lakhe.
Isa 24:4 Umhlaba uyalila, ubune; izwe liyaphela amandla, linyamalale, abaphakemeyo bomhlaba badangale.
Isa 24:5 Umhlaba wonakalisiwe phansi kwabakhileyo kuwo, ngokuba beqile imithetho, badlulile ezimisweni, baphulile isivumelwano esiphakade.
Isa 24:6 Ngalokho isiqalekiso sidlile umhlaba, nabakhileyo kuwo batholiswa icala; ngalokho abakhileyo emhlabeni bayashiswa, kusale abantu abayingcosana nje.
Isa 24:7 Iwayini elisha liyalila, umvini uyahhuma, bonke ababethokoza ngenhliziyo bayabubula.
Isa 24:8 Ukujabula kwezigubhu kunqamukile, ukuxokozela kwabajabulayo kuphelile, nenjabulo yehabhu ikhawukile.
Isa 24:9 Abasayikuphuza iwayini ngesihlabelelo; uphuzo olunamandla luyakubaba kubo abaluphuzayo.
Isa 24:10 Umuzi oyihlane ubhidliziwe; zonke izindlu zivaliwe ukuba kungangeni muntu.
Isa 24:11 Kukhalwa ngewayini ezitaladini; yonke intokozo inyamalele; injabulo yezwe idlulile.
Isa 24:12 Emzini kusele incithakalo; isango livithiziwe, lachithwa.
Isa 24:13 Ngokuba kuyakuba njalo emhlabeni phakathi kwabantu, njengokushaywa kweminqumo nanjengokukhothoza, lapho sekuvuniwe.
Isa 24:14 Laba bayaphakamisa izwi labo, bamemeze; bajabula ngobukhosi bukaJehova entshonalanga.
Isa 24:15 Ngalokho mdumiseni uJehova empumalanga, nasogwini lolwandle igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.
Isa 24:16 Siyezwa amahubo avela emikhawulweni yomhlaba, athi: “Udumo malube koLungileyo!” Kepha mina ngithi: “Ngifile, ngifile! Maye kimi!” Abakhohlisi bakhohlisile, yebo, abakhohlisi bakhohlisile nokukhohlisa.
Isa 24:17 Ukwesaba, nomgodi, nogibe kuphezu kwakho wena owakhileyo emhlabeni.
Isa 24:18 Kuyakuthi obalekela umsindo wokwesaba awele emgodini; okhuphuka emgodini uyakubanjwa lugibe, ngokuba amafasitele aphezulu avuliwe, nezisekelo zomhlaba ziyazamazama.
Isa 24:19 Umhlaba uyaphuka nokwaphuka, umhlaba uyavithizwa nokuvithizwa, umhlaba uyazanyazanyiswa nokuzanyazanyiswa.
Isa 24:20 Umhlaba uyatengezela nokutengezela njengesidakwa, uyantengantenga njengexhiba; isiphambeko siyakuba nzima phezu kwawo, uwe, ungabe usavuka futhi.
Isa 24:21 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku uJehova ahambele ibandla lasezulwini phezulu, namakhosi omhlaba emhlabeni.
Isa 24:22 Bayakubuthelwa ndawonye njengeziboshwa zibuthelwa emgodini, bavalelwe etilongweni, bajeziswe emva kwezinsuku eziningi.
Isa 24:23 Inyanga ekhazimulayo isiyakuyangaza, nelanga elinkemuzelayo liyakujabha, ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti uyakuba yinkosi entabeni yaseSiyoni naseJerusalema, abe yinkazimulo phambi kwamalunga akhe.
Isa 25:1 Jehova, unguNkulunkulu wami; ngiyakukuphakamisa, ngidumise igama lakho, ngokuba wenzile izimangaliso, namasu asendulo, nokuthembeka, neqiniso.
Isa 25:2 Ngokuba wenzile umuzi waba yinqwaba, nomuzi obiyelweyo waba yincithakalo; indlu yamakhosi abafokazi ayiseyiwo umuzi, ayisayikwakhiwa futhi kuze kube phakade.
Isa 25:3 Ngalokho abantu abanamandla bayakukudumisa, imizi yezizwe ezinonya zikwesabe.
Isa 25:4 Ngokuba ubuyinqaba kwabampofu, inqaba kwabaswelayo ekucindezelweni kwabo, isiphephelo esivunguvungwini, umthunzi ekubaleleni, ngokuba umoya waba nonya, unjengesivunguvungu odongeni,
Isa 25:5 nanjengokushisa endaweni eyomileyo. Uyathobisa umsindo wabafokazi; njengokubalela ngomthunzi wefu, kanjalo ihubo labanonya liyakudanjiswa.
Isa 25:6 UJehova Sebawoti uyakwenzela abantu bonke idili lokukhulupheleyo kule ntaba, idili lewayini elinenhlese, okukhulupheleyo okunomnkantsha, iwayini elinenhlese elicwengekileyo.
Isa 25:7 Uyakuchitha kule ntaba ingaphandle lesimbozo esimboza abantu bonke, nomgubuzelo ogubuzela zonke izizwe.
Isa 25:8 Uyakugwinya ukufa kuze kube phakade; iNkosi uJehova iyakwesula izinyembezi ebusweni bonke, isuse amahloni abantu bakhe emhlabeni wonke, ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile.
Isa 25:9 Kuyakuthiwa ngalolo suku: “Bheka, lo unguNkulunkulu wethu; simhlalele, uyakusisindisa; lo unguJehova; simhlalele; siyakujabula, sithokoze ngensindiso yakhe.”
Isa 25:10 Ngokuba kule ntaba isandla sikaJehova siyakuphumula, noMowabi uyakunyathelwa phansi endaweni yakhe njengotshani bunyathelwa emgodini womquba.
Isa 25:11 Noma elula izandla zakhe phakathi kwawo njengohlambayo elula ukuba ahlambe, uyakuthobisa ukuziphakamisa kwakhe kanye nobuhlakani bezandla zakhe.
Isa 25:12 Izinqaba eziphakemeyo zezingange zakho uyakuzibhidliza, azithobise, azenze ukuba zithintane nomhlabathi nothuli.
Isa 26:1 Ngalolo suku lesi sihlabelelo siyakuhlatshelelwa ezweni lakwaJuda sokuthi: Umuzi onamandla sinawo; uyasimisela insindiso ibe yizingange nezindonga.
Isa 26:2 Vulani amasango ukuba isizwe esilungileyo esigcina iqiniso singene.
Isa 26:3 Inhliziyo eqinileyo uyayilinda ngokuthula okupheleleyo, ngokuba yethemba kuwe.
Isa 26:4 Thembani kuJehova kuze kube phakade, ngokuba uJehova, yebo, uJehova uyidwala elingunaphakade.
Isa 26:5 Ngokuba uthobisile ababehlezi phezulu, umuzi ophakemeyo; uyawubhidliza, uyawubhidliza kuze kube semhlabathini, awusondeze nasothulini.
Isa 26:6 Unyawo luyakuwunyathela phansi, izinyawo zabaswelayo, izinyathelo zabampofu.
Isa 26:7 Indlela yabalungileyo iqondile, umkhondo wabaqotho ulungile, uyawenza ukuba ulingane.
Isa 26:8 Yebo, ezindleleni zezahlulelo zakho, Jehova, sikuhlalele. Umphefumulo uyalangazelela igama lakho nesikhumbuzo sakho.
Isa 26:9 Ngomphefumulo wami ngikulangazelela ebusuku, yebo, ngomoya wami ophakathi kwami ngiyakufunisisa, ngokuba lapho izahlulelo zakho zisemhlabeni, abakhileyo bezwe bafunda ukulunga.
Isa 26:10 Uma omubi ephiwa umusa, akafundi ukulunga; ezweni lobuqotho uyakwenza ukonakala, angaboni ukuphakama kukaJehova.
Isa 26:11 Jehova, isandla sakho siphakeme, kepha kababoni; kodwa mababone ukushisekela kwakho abantu, babe namahloni; yebo, umlilo uyakuqeda izitha zakho.
Isa 26:12 Jehova, uyakusimisela ukuthula; ngokuba nayo yonke imisebenzi yethu senzelwe yona nguwe.
Isa 26:13 Jehova Nkulunkulu wethu, amanye amakhosi angaphandle kwakho asibusile, kepha kuwena wedwa siyadumisa igama lakho.
Isa 26:14 Abafileyo ababuyi baphile, izithunzi azibuyi zivuke; ngalokho wabahambela, wabachitha, wenza ukuba konke ukukhunjulwa kwabo kuphele.
Isa 26:15 Wandisa isizwe, Jehova, wandisa isizwe, wadunyiswa, wavula yonke imikhawulo yezwe.
Isa 26:16 Jehova, besekuhluphekeni bakuhambela, bazethula ngemikhuleko lapho belaywa nguwe.
Isa 26:17 Njengokhulelweyo osondela ukuba abelethe ezwiswa ubuhlungu, saba njalo phambi kobuso bakho, Jehova.
Isa 26:18 Sasikhulelwe, sasinobuhlungu, sabeletha kungathi umoya nje; asenzanga insindiso emhlabeni, nabayakwakha ezweni abasazalwa.
Isa 26:19 Kepha abafileyo bakho bayakubuye baphile, izidumbu zabo zivuke. Phaphamani, nijabule nina enihlala othulini, ngokuba amazolo akho angamazolo okukhanya, nomhlaba uyakubakhipha abafileyo.
Isa 26:20 Wozani, bantu bami, ningene emakamelweni enu, nizivalele iminyango, nicashe ngokuphazima kweso, kuze kudlule ulaka.
Isa 26:21 Ngokuba bhekani, uJehova uyaphuma endaweni yakhe ukuba ahambele ububi babakhileyo emhlabeni; umhlaba uyakubonakalisa igazi lawo, ungabe usabasibekela ababuleweyo babo.
Isa 27:1 Ngalolo suku uJehova uyakuhambela ngenkemba yakhe elukhuni enkulu nenamandla uLeviyathani, inyoka esheshayo, uLeviyathani, inyoka ethandelayo, abulale udrako oselwandle.
Isa 27:2 Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona isivini esinxanelekayo. “Hlabelelani ngaso.
Isa 27:3 Mina Jehova ngingumlindi waso, ngiyakusinisela njalo; funa soniwe, ngiyakusilinda ubusuku nemini.
Isa 27:4 Ukufutheka akukho kimi; sengathi kungaba khona amakhakhasi nameva! Bengiyakuwasukela ngokulwa, ngiwashise kanyekanye,
Isa 27:5 noma abambelele emandleni ami ukuba enze ukuthula nami, enzelane ukuthula nami.”
Isa 27:6 Ngezinsuku ezizayo uJakobe uyakugxila, u-Israyeli akhahlele, aqhakaze, bagcwalise ubuso bomhlaba ngezithelo.
Isa 27:7 Ubashayile njengalokho ebashayile ababashayayo na? Babulewe njengokubulawa kwababulewe nguye na?
Isa 27:8 Ngokubamukisa nangokubaxosha uyabajezisa; wabasusa ngomoya wakhe olukhuni ngosuku lomoya wasempumalanga.
Isa 27:9 Ngakho ububi bukaJakobe buyakuhlangulwa ngalokhu, lokhu kube yisithelo sonke sokususa isono sakhe, lapho enza ukuba onke amatshe e-altare avithizeke njengamatshe omcako, kungabe kusamiswa o-Ashera nama-altare empepho.
Isa 27:10 Ngokuba umuzi obiyelweyo uyize, nekhaya limukelwe, lishiyiwe njengehlane; ithole liyakuklaba khona, libuthise khona, lidle, liqede amahlamvu awo.
Isa 27:11 Lapho amagatsha awo esebunile, ayakwaphulwa, kufike abesifazane, baphembe umlilo kuwo, ngokuba bangabantu abangenakuqonda; ngalokho owabenzayo akayikubahawukela, nowababumbayo akayikuba namusa kubo.
Isa 27:12 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku uJehova avuthuze ezikhwetshini zasemfuleni kuze kube semfuleni waseGibithe, nibuthwe abanye ngabanye nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli.
Isa 27:13 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku libethwe icilongo elikhulu, kufike ababelahlekile ezweni lase-Asiriya nabaxoshiweyo ezweni laseGibithe, bakhuleke kuJehova entabeni engcwele eJerusalema.
Isa 28:1 Wo kuwo umqhele wokuziphakamisa wezidakwa zakwa-Efrayimi, nakuyo imbali ebunayo yobuhle bakhe obukhazimulayo, esenhloko yesigodi esivundileyo sabanqotshwe yiwayini.
Isa 28:2 Bheka, iNkosi inaye oqinileyo nonamandla; uyakuwisa phansi ngamandla njengesivunguvungu esinesichotho, nesiphepho esichithayo, nesiphihli samanzi esinamandla esikhukhulayo.
Isa 28:3 Umqhele wokuziphakamisa wezidakwa zakwa-Efrayimi uyakunyathelwa ngezinyawo,
Isa 28:4 imbali ebunayo yobuhle bakhe obukhazimulayo, esenhloko yesigodi esivundileyo, ibe njengekhiwane elivuthiwe kungakafiki ukuvuna; olibonayo uyalibuka, aligwinye, lise sesandleni sakhe.
Isa 28:5 Ngalolo suku uJehova Sebawoti uyakuba ngumqhele wobukhosi, nesicoco esihle kuyo insali yabantu bakhe,
Isa 28:6 nomoya wokwahlulela kohlezi ekwahluleleni, namandla kubo ababuyisa impi esangweni.
Isa 28:7 Nalabo baduka ngewayini; ngophuzo olunamandla bayatengezela; abapristi nabaprofethi bayaduka ngophuzo olunamandla, bayatengezela ngophuzo olunamandla; bayaduka ekuboneni, bakhubeka ekwahluleleni.
Isa 28:8 Yebo, onke amatafula agcwele ubuhlanzo nokungcola, kungabe kusabakho ndawo.
Isa 28:9 “Ngubani ayakumfundisa ukwazi, aqondise bani umbiko, na? Yibo abalunyuliweyo obisini, basuswa emabeleni, na?
Isa 28:10 Ngokuba kuyisiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, isiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, umthetho phezu komthetho, umthetho phezu komthetho, lapha ingcosana, nalapho ingcosana.”
Isa 28:11 Yebo, ngezindebe ezingingizayo nangolunye ulimi uyakukhuluma kulaba bantu
Isa 28:12 akade esho kubo ukuthi: “Lokhu kungukuphumula; phumuzani abayethileyo; lokhu kungukuhlunyelelwa,” kepha abathandanga ukuzwa.
Isa 28:13 Ngalokho izwi likaJehova liyakuba kubona isiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, isiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, umthetho phezu komthetho, umthetho phezu komthetho, lapha ingcosana, nalapho ingcosana, ukuze bahambe, bawe nyovane, baphuke, bacushwe, babanjwe.
Isa 28:14 Ngalokho yizwani izwi likaJehova nina bantu abadelelayo, enibusa laba bantu baseJerusalema.
Isa 28:15 Ngokuba nithe: “Senzile isivumelwano nokufa, sivumelene nendawo yabafileyo; lapho isiswebhu esikhukhulayo sidlula, asiyikusehlela thina, ngokuba senzile amanga abe yisiphephelo sethu, sicashile phansi kwenkohliso.”
Isa 28:16 Ngalokho ithi iNkosi uJehova: “Bheka, ngibeka eSiyoni itshe lesisekelo, itshe elivivinyekileyo, itshe legumbi elinqabileyo lesisekelo esiyiso; okholwayo kayikubaleka.
Isa 28:17 Ngiyakwenza ukwahlulela kube ngumucu wokulinganisa, nokulunga kube ngumthofu wokumisa, isichotho sihlwithe isiphephelo samanga, amanzi akhukhule indawo yokucasha.
Isa 28:18 Futhi isivumelwano senu nokufa siyakuchithwa, nokuvumelana kwenu nendawo yabafileyo akuyikuma; lapho isiswebhu esikhukhulayo sidlula, niyakunyathelwa phansi yiso.
Isa 28:19 Njalo lapho sidabula, siyakunibamba, ngokuba siyakudabula ukusa ngokusa imini nobusuku,” kube ngukwesaba kuphela, lapho umbiko uqondwa.
Isa 28:20 Ngokuba umbhede uyakuba mfushane kunokuba umuntu enabe kuwo, nengubo ibe ncane kunokuba umuntu azisonge ngayo.
Isa 28:21 Ngokuba uJehova uyakusukuma njengasentabeni yasePherasimi, athukuthele njengasesigodini saseGibeyoni, ukuze enze umsebenzi wakhe, umsebenzi wakhe ongavamile, afeze isenzo sakhe, isenzo sakhe esimangalisayo.
Isa 28:22 Ngalokho ningadeleli, funa izibopho zenu ziqiniswe, ngokuba ngizwile eNkosini uJehova Sebawoti ukuthi ukuphela kunqunyiwe phezu kwawo wonke umhlaba.
Isa 28:23 Bekani indlebe, nizwe izwi lami; lalelani, nizwe ukukhuluma kwami.
Isa 28:24 Umlimi, eyakutshala, ulima lonke usuku na? Uyaduba abhuqe umhlabathi wakhe njalo na?
Isa 28:25 Lapho esehlelembile ubuso bawo, angithi uhlwanyela amafitshizi, asakaze ikumini, atshale ukolweni ngezinhla, nebhali ezindaweni zalo, nokolweni ocolekileyo eceleni, na?
Isa 28:26 UNkulunkulu wakhe uyamhlakahlisa ngendlela eyiyo, amfundise.
Isa 28:27 Ngokuba amafitshizi awabhulwa ngesibhulo esibukhali, nesondo lengqukumbane kaliphendulwa phezu kwekumini, kepha amafitshizi ayavuthuzwa ngenduku nekumini ngothi.
Isa 28:28 Amabele esinkwa ayacolwa na? Cha, ngokuba awabhulwa nokubhulwa njalo; nakuba eqhuba isondo lengqukumbane namahhashi alo phezu kwawo, awacolisiswa.
Isa 28:29 Nalokho kuvela kuJehova Sebawoti oyisimangaliso ekululekeni nomkhulu emaswini.
Isa 29:1 Wo kuwe Ariyeli, Ariyeli, umuzi lapho amisa khona uDavide. Yengezelani umnyaka emnyakeni, imikhosi iyingilize,
Isa 29:2 ngize ngilicindezele i-Ariyeli, kube khona ukukhala nokububula, libe njenge-Ariyeli kimi.
Isa 29:3 Ngiyakumisa, ngikuhaqe nxazonke zakho, ngikuvimbezele ngezinqaba, ngikumisele izindonga.
Isa 29:4 Uyakubhidlizelwa phansi, ukhulume usemhlabathini; ukukhuluma kwakho kuyakuthotshiselwa phansi, kuphume othulini, izwi lakho libe njengelonedlozi livela emhlabathini, ukukhuluma kwakho kubethe imilozi othulini.
Isa 29:5 Kodwa isixuku sezitha zakho siyakuba njengebhuqu elicolekileyo, noquqaba lwabacindezeli njengamakhoba adlulayo, yebo, kuyakwenzakala ngokuzumayo ngokuphazima kweso.
Isa 29:6 Uyakuhanjelwa nguJehova Sebawoti ngokuduma nangokuzamazama, nangomsindo omkhulu, nangesivunguvungu, nangesiphepho, nangelangabi lomlilo oqothulayo.
Isa 29:7 Isixuku sezizwe zonke ezisukela i-Ariyeli, ezisukela lona kanye nenqaba yalo, nezilicindezelayo, siyakuba njengephupho nombono wasebusuku.
Isa 29:8 Kuyakuba njengolambileyo ephupha ukuthi uyadla, kepha evuka usenephango, noma njengowomileyo ephupha ukuthi uyaphuza, kepha evuka uyethile, womile; siyakuba njalo isixuku sezizwe zonke ezisukela intaba yaseSiyoni.
Isa 29:9 Zimangaliseni, nimangale; ziphuphuthiseni, niphuphutheke; badakiwe, kepha kungengewayini, bayatengezela, kodwa kungengaphuzo olunamandla.
Isa 29:10 Ngokuba uJehova uthulule phezu kwenu umoya wobuthongo obunzima; uwavalile amehlo enu, usibekele abaprofethi benu nezinhloko zenu ababoni.
Isa 29:11 Umbono wakho konke lokho wawusuba kini njengamazwi encwadi enamathelisiweyo enikwa owazi incwadi ngokuthi: “Ake ufunde lokhu,” abesethi yena: “Angikwazi, ngokuba inamathelisiwe,”
Isa 29:12 incwadi bese yinikwa ongayazi incwadi ngokuthi: “Ake ufunde lokhu,” abesethi yena: “Angiyazi incwadi.”
Isa 29:13 Yathi iNkosi: “Ngenxa yokuba laba bantu besondela, bangidumise ngemilomo yabo nangezindebe zabo, kodwa bazidedisele kude nami izinhliziyo zabo, nokungesaba kwabo kungumyalo wabantu abawufundisiweyo nje,
Isa 29:14 ngalokho ngiyakubuye ngenzele laba bantu izenzo ezimangalisayo, izimangaliso impela; ukuhlakanipha kwabahlakaniphileyo babo kuyakuphela, nokuqonda kwabaqondileyo babo kuyakusitheka.”
Isa 29:15 Wo kubona abajula ukuba basithezele uJehova isu labo, abamisebenzi yabo isebumnyameni, nabasho ukuthi: “Ngubani osibonayo, ngubani osaziyo, na?”
Isa 29:16 O ukuphendukezela kwenu! Ibumba liyakulinganiswa nombumbi yini, ukuze okwenziweyo kusho ngokwenzileyo ukuthi: “Yena akangenzanga,” na? noma okubunjiweyo kusho ngokubumbileyo ukuthi: “Akanakuqonda,” na?
Isa 29:17 Akuseyisikhashana nje iLebanoni lize liphenduke insimu, nensimu ithiwe ihlathi, na?
Isa 29:18 Ngalolo suku izithulu ziyakuzwa amazwi encwadi, namehlo ezimpumputhe ayakubona, engasenakufiphala ngesigayegaye nabumnyama.
Isa 29:19 Abathobekileyo bayakwandisa intokozo yabo kuJehova, nabampofu kubantu bayakujabula koNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Isa 29:20 Ngokuba umcindezeli akasayikuba khona, nesideleli siyakube singasekho, nabo bonke abazulumba ububi bayakube beqothuliwe,
Isa 29:21 ababemtholisa umuntu icala ngezwi nje, bambekela ugibe yena owathetha amacala esangweni, bachezukisa olungileyo ngento engelutho.
Isa 29:22 Ngalokho ngendlu kaJakobe usho kanje uJehova owamhlenga u-Abrahama, uthi: “UJakobe akasayikuba namahloni, nobuso bakhe abusayikuphaphatheka.
Isa 29:23 Ngokuba lapho ebona abantwana bakhe, umsebenzi wezandla zami phakathi kwakhe, bayakungcwelisa igama lami, yebo, bayakungcwelisa oNgcwele kaJakobe, bamesabe uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli.
Isa 29:24 Abaduka emoyeni bayakwazi, baqonde, nabakhononayo bayakufunda, bakwamukele.”
Isa 30:1 “Wo kubantwana abahlubukileyo,” usho uJehova, “abenza iziluleko, kungengezami nokho, nabenza isivumelwano, kungengesomoya wami kodwa, ukuze bengeze isono esonweni,
Isa 30:2 abahamba ukuba behlele eGibithe, bengacelanga emlonyeni wami, baziqinise emandleni kaFaro, baphephele emthunzini waseGibithe!
Isa 30:3 Ngalokho amandla kaFaro ayakuba ngamahloni kini, ukuphephela kwenu emthunzini waseGibithe kube ngukudumala kini.
Isa 30:4 Ngokuba noma izikhulu zakhe ziseSowani, nezithunywa zakhe zifinyelela eHanesi,
Isa 30:5 bonke bayakuba namahloni ngabantu abangenakubasiza, abangenansizakalo nanzuzo, kepha bengamahloni nehlazo kuphela.”
Isa 30:6 Isiprofetho ngezilwane zaseNingizimu. Badabula izwe losizi nelokuhlupheka, lapha kuvela khona ibhubesi nebhubesikazi, ibululu nenyoka endizayo, bethwala imfuyo yabo emihlane yezimbongolo nengcebo yabo phezu kwamalunda amakamela bakuyise kubantu abangenansizakalo.
Isa 30:7 IGibithe lisiza ngeze nangento engelutho; ngalokho ngilibize ngokuthi iRahabi elihlezi lithule.
Isa 30:8 Manje hamba ukulobe phambi kwabo esibhebheni, ukubhale encwadini ukuba kube ngubufakazi besikhathi esizayo kuze kube phakade.
Isa 30:9 Bangabantwana abahlubukileyo, abantwana abaqamba amanga, abantwana abangathandi ukuzwa umthetho kaJehova,
Isa 30:10 abathi kubaboni: “Ningabe nisabona,” nakubaprofethi: “Ningasiprofetheli okuqinisileyo, kepha khulumani kithina okuthophayo, niprofethe inkohliso;
Isa 30:11 phambukani endleleni, nichezuke emkhondweni, nimdedisele kithi oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.”
Isa 30:12 Ngalokho usho kanje oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Njengokuba nilidelela leli zwi, nethemba kukho ukucindezela nakukho okuphambeneyo, nencike kukho,
Isa 30:13 ngalokho lobu bubi buyakuba njengokomfantu lapho sekuzakuwa, kuvokomele ogangeni oluphakemeyo, ukudilika kwalo kufike ngokuzumayo ngokuphazima kweso.
Isa 30:14 Luyabhidlizwa njengokuphahlazwa kwesitsha sombumbi, esichotshozwa singahawukelwa, kungabe kusatholakala phakathi kwezihlephu nodengezi lokuthatha umlilo eziko, nolokucakula amanzi emgodini.”
Isa 30:15 Ngokuba yasho njalo iNkosi uJehova, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, yathi: “Niyakusindiswa ngokuphenduka nangokuphumula, amandla enu abe ngukuthula nangokwethemba; kepha anithandanga.
Isa 30:16 Kodwa nasho nathi: ‘Qha, siyakubaleka ngamahhashi,’ ngalokho niyakubaleka: ‘Sikhwele anejubane,’ ngalokho abanixoshayo bayakuba nejubane.
Isa 30:17 Inkulungwane iyakubaleka ngokusongela koyedwa; ngokusongela kwaba yisihlanu niyakubaleka, nize nishiywe njengensika esiqongweni sentaba nanjengebhanela phezu kwegquma.”
Isa 30:18 Ngalokho uJehova uyakulindela ukuba abe nomusa kini; nangalokhu uyakuphakama ukuba abe nesihe kini, ngokuba uJehova unguNkulunkulu wokwahlulela; babusisiwe bonke abamhlalelayo.
Isa 30:19 Ngokuba wena sizwe esakhe eSiyoni eJerusalema ungabe usakhala nokukhala; uyakuba nomusa impela kuwe ngezwi lokudazuluka kwakho; lapho elizwa, uyakuphendula.
Isa 30:20 Noma iNkosi iyakukunika isinkwa sosizi namanzi okuhlupheka, abafundisi bakho abasayikucasha, kodwa amehlo akho ayakubabona abafundisi bakho,
Isa 30:21 nezindlebe zakho ziyakuzwa izwi emva kwakho, lithi: “Nansi indlela; hambani ngayo,” noma niphambuka ngakwesokunene, noma niphambuka ngakwesokhohlo.
Isa 30:22 Niyakujivaza okunamekiweyo kwezithombe zenu ezibaziweyo zesiliva nesimbozo sezithombe zenu ezibunjiweyo zegolide; uyakuzihlakaza njengokungcolileyo, uthi kukho: “Suka lapha.”
Isa 30:23 Uyakunika imbewu yakho oyakuyihlwanyela emhlabathini imvula, aveze nesinkwa ezithelweni zomhlabathi oyakuvunda, uthele kakhulu; ngalolo suku izinkomo zakho ziyakuklaba emadlelweni abanzi.
Isa 30:24 Izinkabi nezimbongolo ezilima umhlabathi ziyakudla ukudla okuyolisiweyo, okweliweyo ngefosholo nangembenge.
Isa 30:25 Kuzo zonke izintaba eziphakemeyo nakuwo onke amagquma amade kuyakuba khona imifula nemifudlana yamanzi ngosuku lokuhlaba okukhulu, lapho kuyakuwa imibhoshongo.
Isa 30:26 Futhi ukukhanya kwenyanga kuyakuba njengokukhanya kwelanga, nokukhanya kwelanga kuyakuphindwa kasikhombisa njengokukhanya kwezimini eziyisikhombisa ngosuku uJehova abopha ngalo amanxeba abantu bakhe, aphulukise izilonda zemivimbo yabo.
Isa 30:27 Bheka, igama likaJehova livela kude, livutha ngolaka lwakhe, linzima ngamafu; izindebe zakhe zigcwele intukuthelo, nolimi lwakhe lunjengomlilo oqothulayo;
Isa 30:28 ukuphefumula kwakhe kunjengomfula okhukhulayo, uze ufinyelele entanyeni, ukuhlunga izizwe ngesihlungo sokubhubhisa; itomu elidukisayo liyakuba semihlathini yezizwe.
Isa 30:29 Niyakuhlabelela njengasebusuku lapho kugujwa umkhosi, nithokoze ngenhliziyo njengalokhu kuhanjwa ngemitshingo kuyiwe entabeni kaJehova kulo iDwala lika-Israyeli.
Isa 30:30 UJehova uyakulizwakalisa izwi lakhe elidumileyo, abonakalise ukwehla kwengalo yakhe ngokuvutha kolaka lwakhe, nangelangabi lomlilo oqothulayo, ngesivunguvungu, nangesiphepho, nangesichotho.
Isa 30:31 Ngokuba ngezwi likaJehova i-Asiriya liyakushaywa luvalo, lapho elishaya ngenduku.
Isa 30:32 Kuyakuthi njalo lapho induku enqunyiweyo idlula, uJehova ayibeka phezu kwalo, kube ngezigubhu nangamahabhu, alwe nalo ngengalo enikiniweyo.
Isa 30:33 Indawo yokushisela kade yahlelwa, yebo, yalungiselwa nenkosi; uyenze yajula, yaba banzi; igoqo layo lingumlilo nezinkuni eziningi, nokuphefumula kukaJehova kunjengomfula wesibabule; kuyayokhela.
Isa 31:1 Wo kubona abehlela eGibithe ukuba basizwe khona, bencike emahhashini, bethemba ezinqoleni, ngokuba ziningi, nakubo abamahhashi, ngokuba benamandla; kepha ababheki koNgcwele ka-Israyeli, noJehova abamfuni.
Isa 31:2 Nokho naye uhlakaniphile, uyakuletha okubi; akayikubuyisa amazwi akhe, kepha uyakuvukela indlu yababi nosizo lwabenza okubi.
Isa 31:3 AbaseGibithe bangabantu, abasiye uNkulunkulu, amahhashi abo ayinyama, awasiwo umoya, nalapho uJehova eyakwelula isandla sakhe uyakukhubeka naye osizayo, kuwe naye osizwayo, baphele bonke kanyekanye.
Isa 31:4 Ngokuba usho kanje kimi uJehova, uthi: “Njengengonyama ebhongayo, ibhongo lengonyama phezu kwempango yalo, lapho abelusi abaningi belibizelwe, aliyikwesaba izwi labo, lingazithobi ngomsindo wabo, kanjalo uJehova Sebawoti uyakwehla ukuba alwe entabeni yaseSiyoni nasegqumeni layo.
Isa 31:5 Njengezinyoni ezindizayo kanjalo uJehova, uJehova Sebawoti, uyakulivikela iJerusalema; uyakulivikela, alophule, alidlule, alikhulule.”
Isa 31:6 Buyelani kuye enimhlubukile ngokujulileyo kangako nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli.
Isa 31:7 Ngokuba ngalolo suku bayakulahla, kube yilowo nalowo izithombe zakhe zesiliva nezithombe zakhe zegolide, ezizenzile izandla zenu zaba yisono senu.
Isa 31:8 “I-Asiriya liyakuwa ngenkemba, kungengamuntu, nenkemba engesiyo eyomuntu iyakuliqeda; liyakubalekela usiko lwenkemba, kepha izinsizwa zalo ziyakuba yizinceku zempoqo.
Isa 31:9 Idwala lakhe liyakunyamalala ngovalo, nezikhulu zalo ziyakuphela amandla ngebhanela,” usho uJehova omlilo wakhe useSiyoni, nosithando sakhe siseJerusalema.
Isa 32:1 Bheka, kuyakuba khona inkosi ebusa ngokulunga, izikhulu zibuse ngokwahlulela.
Isa 32:2 Umuntu uyakuba yindawo yokucashela umoya nesivikelo esivunguvungwini njengemifula yamanzi endaweni eyomileyo, njengomthunzi wedwala ezweni eliyethileyo.
Isa 32:3 Amehlo ababonayo awayikuphuphutheka; izindlebe zabezwayo ziyakulalela.
Isa 32:4 Inhliziyo yephulukundlu iyakuqonda, ize ikwazi, nolimi lwezingingingi luyakushesha lukhulume kahle.
Isa 32:5 Isiwula asisayikubizwa ngokuthi sihloniphekile, nomkhohlisi akasayikuthiwa inkosi.
Isa 32:6 Ngokuba isiwula siyakukhuluma ubuwula, nenhliziyo yaso iyakusebenza ububi, yenze ukungamesabi uNkulunkulu, ikhulume okuphambene noNkulunkulu, yenze ukuba olambileyo abe nephango, nowomileyo ukuba aswele uphuzo lwakhe.
Isa 32:7 Izikhali zomkhohlisi zimbi; uhlela amacebo amabi, ukuze achithe izihlupheki ngamazwi amanga, nalapho ompofu ekhuluma ngokufaneleyo.
Isa 32:8 Onesizotha uceba okuzothileyo, nangokuzotha kwakhe uyakuma.
Isa 32:9 Vukani nina besifazane abazinzileyo, nizwe izwi lami; nina madodakazi azethembayo nibeke indlebe ekukhulumeni kwami.
Isa 32:10 Ezinsukwini ezidlula umnyaka niyakuhlushwa nina besifazane abazethembayo, ngokuba ukuvuna kwemivini kuyakuphela, nokubutha akuyikufika.
Isa 32:11 Qhaqhazelani nina besifazane abazinzileyo, nihlupheke nina enizethembayo; khumulani nizenze nqunu, nibhince indwangu yamasaka ezinkalweni zenu.
Isa 32:12 Zishayeni esifubeni ngenxa yamasimu amahle nemivini ethelayo.
Isa 32:13 Emhlabathini wabantu bami kuyakumila amakhakhasi nameva, yebo, kuzo zonke izindlu zokujabula emzini ojabulayo,
Isa 32:14 ngokuba izindlu zamakhosi zilahliwe, nomuzi onabantu abaningi ushiyiwe; igquma nombhoshongo kuyakuba yimihume kuze kube phakade, nenjabulo yezimbongolo zasendle, nedlelo lemihlambi,
Isa 32:15 uMoya aze athululwe phezu kwethu evela phezulu, nehlane liphenduke insimu, nensimu ithiwe ihlathi.
Isa 32:16 Ukwahlulela kuyakwakha ehlane, ukulunga kuhlale ensimini.
Isa 32:17 Umsebenzi wokulunga uyakuba ngukuthula, impumelelo yokulunga ibe ngukulondeka kuze kube phakade.
Isa 32:18 Abantu bami bayakuhlala ematendeni okuthula, nasezindlini ezilondekayo, nasezindaweni zokuphumula ezinokuthula.
Isa 32:19 Liyakuwisa isichotho, lize liwe ihlathi, nomuzi uyakuthotshiswa nokuthotshiswa.
Isa 32:20 Nibusisiwe nina enitshala ngasemanzini onke; nikhulula izinyawo zezinkabi nezezimbongolo.
Isa 33:1 Wo kuwena ochithayo, kungachithwanga wena, nakuwe okhohlisayo, kungakhohliswanga wena! Lapho uqede ukuchitha uyakuchithwa, nalapho usugcine ukukhohlisa, uyakukhohliswa nawe.
Isa 33:2 Jehova, yiba nomusa kithi, sihlalela wena. Yiba yingalo yethu ekuseni njalo, nokusindiswa kwethu ngesikhathi sokuhlupheka.
Isa 33:3 Ngezwi lokuhlokoma abantu bayabaleka; ngokuphakama kwakho izizwe ziyahlakazeka.
Isa 33:4 Impango iyakubuthwa njengokubutha kwecimbi, nanjengokuhlasela kwezinkumbi iyakuhlaselwa.
Isa 33:5 UJehova uphakeme, ngokuba uhlala phezulu; uligcwalisile iSiyoni ngokwahlulela nangokulunga.
Isa 33:6 Kuyakuba khona ukuqiniseka ngesikhathi sakho, ubuningi bokusindiswa nokuhlakanipha nokwazi; ukumesaba uJehova kuyingcebo yakhe.
Isa 33:7 Bheka, amaqhawe abo akhala ngaphandle; izithunywa zokuthula zikhala ngomunyu.
Isa 33:8 Imigwaqo iyize, izihambi seziphelile; isivumelwano saphuliwe; imizi ideleliwe; umuntu akanakekelewa.
Isa 33:9 Izwe liyalila, lidangele; iLebanoni linamahloni, liyabuna; iSharoni linjengehlane, iBashani neKarmeli kuyavuthulukisa.
Isa 33:10 “Sengiyakuvuka,” usho uJehova; “sengiyakuphakama; sengiyakuphakanyiswa.
Isa 33:11 Niyakukhulelwa yizikhotha ezomileyo, nizale amabibi; ukuphefumula kwenu kungumlilo oniqothulayo.
Isa 33:12 Abantu bayakushiswa njengokushiswa komcako, njengameva anqunyiweyo ashiswa ngomlilo.”
Isa 33:13 Yizwani nina enikude engikwenzileyo; nani eniseduze, vumani amandla ami.
Isa 33:14 Izoni zaseSiyoni ziyesaba, ukuthuthumela kubambile abangenaNkulunkulu. “Ngubani phakathi kwethu ongahlala nomlilo oqothulayo; ngubani phakathi kwethu ongahlala nokunkewuzela okuphakade na?”
Isa 33:15 Yena ohamba ngokulunga, okhuluma ngobuqotho, odelela inzuzo yokucindezela, othintitha izandla zakhe ukuze angamukeli imivuzo, ovala izindlebe zakhe ukuze angezwa ngegazi, ocimeza amehlo akhe ukuze angaboni okubi,
Isa 33:16 yena uyakuhlala ekuphakameni, izinqaba zamadwala zibe yisivikelo sakhe, aphiwe isinkwa sakhe, amanzi akhe athembeke.
Isa 33:17 Amehlo akho ayakuyibona inkosi ebuhleni bayo, ayakubona izwe elelulekele kude.
Isa 33:18 Inhliziyo yakho iyakucabanga ngovalo, ithi: “Uphi umbhali, uphi olinganisile intela, uphi obalile imibhoshongo na?”
Isa 33:19 Awuyikubona abantu abanobudlova, abantu abanokukhuluma okujulileyo ongenakukuzwa, nabalulimi lwabo olukwitizayo kungekho ongaluqonda.
Isa 33:20 Kepha bheka iSiyoni, umuzi wemikhosi yethu; amehlo akho mawabuke iJerusalema, indlu yokuthula, itende elingayikususwa, elizikhonkwane zalo aziyikusishulwa nanini, nelizintambo zalo aziyikugqashulwa neyodwa.
Isa 33:21 Kunalokho uJehova uyakuba nathi khona ebukhosini esikhundleni semifula nemifudlana ebanzi, lapho kungayikuhamba khona izikebhe ezinamaphini, nomkhumbi omkhulu ungadluli kuyo.
Isa 33:22 Ngokuba uJehova ungumahluleli wethu, uJehova ungumenzi wemithetho yethu, uJehova uyinkosi yethu; uyakusisindisa.
Isa 33:23 Izintambo zakho ziyaxega, azinakusiqinisa isiqu sensika yabo, azinakumeneka useyili; khona iyakwabelwa impango enkulu ephangiweyo; nezinyonga ziyakuthatha impango.
Isa 33:24 Abakhe khona abayikusho ukuthi: “Ngiyagula,” abantu abahlala khona bayakuthethelelwa ububi babo.
Isa 34:1 Sondelani nina zizwe, nizwe, nilalele nina bantu: makuzwe umhlaba nokugcwala kwawo, nezwe nakho konke okuvela kulo.
Isa 34:2 Ngokuba uJehova uthukuthelela izizwe zonke, ufuthekela yonke impi yazo; uziqalekisile, uzinikele ekubulaweni.
Isa 34:3 Ababuleweyo bazo balahliwe, nokunuka kuyenyuka ezidunjini zabo; izintaba zincibilika ngegazi labo.
Isa 34:4 Ibandla lonke lasezulwini liyaphela, izulu lisongwe njengomqulu; ibandla lonke liyawa njengokuwa kweqabunga emvinini nanjengokubunileyo emkhiwaneni.
Isa 34:5 Ngokuba inkemba yami izanelisile ngegazi ezulwini; bheka, iyakwehlela phezu kuka-Edomi naphezu kwabantu besiqalekiso sami ukuba ibahlulele.
Isa 34:6 UJehova unenkemba; igcwele igazi, inonile ngamanoni nangegazi lamawundlu nelezimbuzi, nangamanoni ezinso zezinqama, ngokuba uJehova uyanikela eBosira, unokuhlaba okukhulu ezweni lakwa-Edomi.
Isa 34:7 Izinyathi ziwa kanye nazo, nezinkunzana kanye nezinkunzi; izwe labo liyakugcwala igazi, nothuli lwabo luyakunona ngamanoni.
Isa 34:8 Ngokuba kulusuku lokuphindisela kukaJehova; ngumnyaka wokubuyisela ngendaba yaseSiyoni.
Isa 34:9 Imifudlana yakhona iyakuphenduka ikolitayi, uthuli lwakhona lube yisibabule, nezwe langakhona libe yikolitayi elivuthayo.
Isa 34:10 Aliyikucinywa ubusuku nemini; umusi walo uyakukhuphuka kuze kube phakade; izizukulwane ngezizukulwane liyakuba yize, akuyikulidabula muntu nanini nanini.
Isa 34:11 Liyakuba yifa levuba nelikanondwebu, kwakhe kulo isikhova negwababa; uyakwelula phezu kwalo intambo yencithakalo, nomthofu wokumisa wokuyize.
Isa 34:12 Phakathi kwabakhulu balo akakho oyakumemezela umbuso, nazo zonke izikhulu zalo ziyakuba yinto engelutho.
Isa 34:13 Ameva ayakukhuphukela ezindlini zamakhosi, izimbabazane namakhakhasi ezinqabeni zalo, libe yikhaya lamakhanka negceke lezintshe.
Isa 34:14 Izilwane zasehlane ziyakuhlangana nezimpungushe, nedemoni liyakukhala kumngane walo, kwakhe khona umkhovu, uzitholele indawo yokuphumula.
Isa 34:15 Lapho umantshingeyana uyakwakha ikhaya lakhe, azalele, achamisele, afukame ngomthunzi wakhe, kubuthane khona nawonhloyile, kube yilowo nalowo nomngane wakhe.
Isa 34:16 Funani encwadini kaJehova, nifunde; ayiyikusilala nento eyodwa kulokhu, ayikho eyakuswela umngane wayo, ngokuba ngumlomo wakhe okuyalezile, nomoya wakhe okuhlanganisile.
Isa 34:17 Nguye okwenzele inkatho; yisandla sakhe esikwabele ngentambo; kuyakudla ifa lalo kuze kube phakade, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane kuyakuhlala kulo.
Isa 35:1 Kuyakujabula ihlane nogwadule, kuthokoze uqwathule, lukhahlele njengentebe.
Isa 35:2 Luyakukhahlela kahle, luthokoze, yebo, luthokoze, luhube; luyakuphiwa udumo lweLebanoni, nobukhosi beKarmeli nobeSharoni, lubone inkazimulo kaJehova, nobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu wethu.
Isa 35:3 Qinisani izandla ezibuthakathaka, nimise amadolo axegayo.
Isa 35:4 Yishoni kwabanenhliziyo eyesabayo ukuthi: “Qinani, ningesabi; bhekani, uNkulunkulu wenu uyeza ngokuphindisela, impindiselo ivela kuNkulunkulu; nguye oza ukunisindisa.”
Isa 35:5 Khona amehlo ezimpumputhe ayakuvulwa, zivuleke nezindlebe zezithulu.
Isa 35:6 Khona unyonga luyakutshekula njengendluzele, nolimi lwesimungulu luyakuhuba, ngokuba ehlane kuyakubhoboka amanzi, nemifudlana kwahlongasibi.
Isa 35:7 Isihlabathi esibengezelayo siyakuba yichibi, isigagadu sibe yimithombo yamanzi; ekhaya lamakhanka lapho ayebuthisa khona kuyakuba khona igceke lomhlanga nekhwani.
Isa 35:8 Kuyakuba khona umendo nendlela eyakuthiwa iNdlela Yobungcwele; ongcolileyo akayikuhamba ngayo, kepha iyakuba ngeyabantu bakhe; abahamba ngayo, noma beyiziwula, abayikuduka kuyo.
Isa 35:9 Akuyikuba khona lapho ingonyama, nesilwane esihahayo asiyikukhuphukela khona; lokho akuyikufunyanwa khona, kepha abakhululiweyo bayakuhamba ngayo.
Isa 35:10 Abahlengiweyo bakaJehova bayakubuya baye eSiyoni ngokwethaba, intokozo engunaphakade ibe phezu kwamakhanda abo; bayakuthola ukujabula nokuthokoza, kubaleke usizi nokububula.
Isa 36:1 Kwathi ngomnyaka weshumi nane wenkosi uHezekiya, uSaneheribi, inkosi yase-Asiriya, wenyuka wahlasela yonke imizi ebiyelweyo yakwaJuda, wayithatha.
Isa 36:2 Inkosi yase-Asiriya yathuma uRabi Shake, asuke eLakishi, aye eJerusalema enkosini uHezekiya, enempi enkulu, wema ngasemseleni wechibi lasenhla, elingasendleleni yeNsimu Yomhlanzi.
Isa 36:3 Kwase kuphumela kuye u-Eliyakimi indodana kaHilikiya owayephezu kwendlu, noShebina umbhali, noJowa indodana ka-Asafa, umabhalana.
Isa 36:4 Wathi kubo uRabi Shake: “Ake nisho kuHezekiya, nithi: ‘Isho kanje inkosi enkulu, inkosi yase-Asiriya, ithi: Yithemba lini leli olethembayo na?
Isa 36:5 Wena uyakhuluma, kepha kungamazwi angawomlomo nje lana ngesu nangamandla okulwa. Pho, wethemba bani, lokhu ungihlubukile na?
Isa 36:6 Bheka, wethemba udondolo lwalo mhlanga ofecekileyo oyiGibithe; kepha uma umuntu ezimelela ngalo, luyangena esandleni sakhe, lusihlabe; unjalo uFaro inkosi yaseGibithe kubo bonke abamethembayo.
Isa 36:7 Kepha uma nithi kimi: “Siyamethemba uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu,” akusiye yini ozindawo zakhe eziphakemeyo nama-altare akhe akususile uHezekiya, wathi kuJuda nakulo iJerusalema: “Niyakukhuleka phambi kwaleli altare,” na?
Isa 36:8 “ ‘Ngalokho ake uvumelane nenkosi yami, inkosi yase-Asiriya, ngiyakukunika amahhashi ayizinkulungwane ezimbili, uma ungabeka izinkweli kuzo.
Isa 36:9 Pho, ungaphindisela emuva kanjani nenduna eyodwa ezincekwini ezincane zenkosi yami na? Nokho wethemba iGibithe ukuthola khona izinqola nabamahhashi.
Isa 36:10 Manje ngenyukele yini ngaphandle kukaJehova kuleli zwe ukuba ngilichithe, na? UJehova wathi kimi: “Yenyukela kulelo zwe, ulichithe.” ’ ”
Isa 36:11 Base bethi o-Eliyakimi noShebina noJowa kuRabi Shake: “Ake ukhulume ezincekwini zakho ngesi-Aramu, ngokuba siyaluzwa, ungakhulumi kithi ngolimi lwabaJuda ezindlebeni zabantu abasogangeni.”
Isa 36:12 Kepha uRabi Shake wathi: “Inkosi yami ingithumile yini enkosini yakho nakuwena ukukhuluma lawamazwi na? Hhayi kulaba bantu yini abahlezi ogangeni ukuba badle amasimba abo, baphuze umshobingo wabo kanye nani, na?”
Isa 36:13 Wayesema uRabi Shake, wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu ngolimi lwabaJuda, wathi: “Zwanini amazwi enkosi enkulu, inkosi yase-Asiriya.
Isa 36:14 Isho kanje inkosi, ithi: Maningakhohliswa nguHezekiya, ngokuba akayikuba namandla okunophula;
Isa 36:15 futhi uHezekiya makanganenzi nethembe uJehova ngokuthi: ‘UJehova uyakusophula nokusophula, nalo muzi awuyikunikelwa esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya.’
Isa 36:16 “Ningamlaleli uHezekiya, ngokuba inkosi yase-Asiriya isho kanje, ithi: Yenzani ukuthula nami, niphumele kimi, nidle, kube yilowo nalowo emvinini wakhe, kube yilowo nalowo emkhiwaneni wakhe, niphuze, kube yilowo nalowo amanzi omthombo wakhe,
Isa 36:17 ngize ngifike, nginiyise ezweni elinjengezwe lakini, izwe lamabele nelewayini, izwe lesinkwa nelezivini.
Isa 36:18 “Xwayani ukuba uHezekiya anganiyengi ngokuthi: ‘UJehova uyakusophula.’ Abanye onkulunkulu bezizwe bake bophula nokophula yini izwe lakubo esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya na?
Isa 36:19 Baphi onkulunkulu baseHamati nase-Aripadi; baphi onkulunkulu baseSefarivayimi na? Balophulile iSamariya esandleni sami na?
Isa 36:20 Ngobani phakathi kwabo bonke onkulunkulu balawa mazwe abophule izwe lakubo esandleni sami ukuba uJehova alophule iJerusalema esandleni sami na?”
Isa 36:21 Kepha bathula, abamphendulanga ngazwi, ngokuba umyalo wenkosi wathi: “Ningamphenduli.”
Isa 36:22 Base befika u-Eliyakimi indodana kaHilikiya owayephezu kwendlu, noShebina umbhali, noJowa indodana ka-Asafa, umabhalana, kuHezekiya, izingubo zabo ziklebhukile, bamlandisa amazwi kaRabi Shake.
Isa 37:1 Kwathi inkosi uHezekiya ikuzwile lokho, yaklebhula izingubo zayo, yazembesa indwangu yamasaka, yangena endlini kaJehova.
Isa 37:2 Yathuma u-Eliyakimi owayephezu kwendlu, noShebina umbhali, namalunga abapristi, bembeswe izindwangu zamasaka, ku-Isaya umprofethi, indodana ka-Amose.
Isa 37:3 Bathi kuye: “Usho kanje uHezekiya, uthi: Lolu suku lungusuku losizi nolokusolwa nolokudelelwa, ngokuba abantwana sebefikile ekuzalweni, kepha amandla okubeletha awakho.
Isa 37:4 Mhlawumbe uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho uyakuzwa amazwi kaRabi Shake othunywe yinkosi yase-Asiriya, inkosi yakhe, ukweyisa uNkulunkulu ophilayo, asole amazwi uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho awezwileyo; ngalokho phakamisela insali esafunyanwayo umkhuleko wakho.”
Isa 37:5 Izinceku zenkosi uHezekiya sezifikile ku-Isaya,
Isa 37:6 u-Isaya wathi kuzo: “Niyakusho kanje enkosini yenu, nithi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: Ungesabi lawo mazwi owezwileyo, izinceku zenkosi yase-Asiriya ezingithuke ngawo.
Isa 37:7 Bhekani, ngiyakubeka umoya kuyo, izwe amahemuhemu, ibuyele ezweni lakubo, ngiyiwise ngenkemba ezweni lakubo.’ ”
Isa 37:8 Wayesebuya uRabi Shake, wafumana inkosi yase-Asiriya ilwa neLibina, ngokuba wayezwile ukuthi isukile eLakishi.
Isa 37:9 Kepha isizwile ngoTirahaka, inkosi yaseKushe, ukuthi: “Uphumile ukulwa nawe,” lapho ikuzwa lokho, yathuma izithunywa kuHezekiya, yathi:
Isa 37:10 “Niyakukhuluma kanje kuHezekiya, inkosi yakwaJuda, nithi: UNkulunkulu wakho omethembayo makangakukhohlisi ngokuthi iJerusalema aliyikunikelwa esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya.
Isa 37:11 Bheka, wena uzwile okwenziwa ngamakhosi ase-Asiriya kuwo onke amazwe ngokuwachitha; pho, wena uyakophulwa na?
Isa 37:12 Onkulunkulu balezo zizwe ezachithwa ngobaba, iGozani, neHarana, neResefi, nabantwana base-Edene ababeseThelasari bazophula na?
Isa 37:13 Iphi inkosi yaseHamati, nenkosi yase-Aripadi, nenkosi yomuzi waseSefarivayimi, naseHena, nase-Iva na?”
Isa 37:14 UHezekiya wayamukela incwadi esandleni sezithunywa, wayifunda; uHezekiya wayesenyukela endlini kaJehova, wayeneka phambi kukaJehova.
Isa 37:15 UHezekiya wakhuleka phambi kukaJehova, wathi:
Isa 37:16 “Jehova Sebawoti, Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, ohlezi phezu kwamakherubi, wena unguNkulunkulu, wena wedwa, wemibuso yonke yomhlaba, wena wenzile izulu nomhlaba.
Isa 37:17 Beka indlebe yakho, Jehova, uzwe; vula amehlo akho, Jehova, ubone, uzwe onke amazwi kaSaneheribi athume ukweyisa ngawo uNkulunkulu ophilayo.
Isa 37:18 “Yiqiniso, Jehova; amakhosi ase-Asiriya achithile izizwe zonke namazwe azo,
Isa 37:19 alahlile onkulunkulu bawo emlilweni, ngokuba babengesibo onkulunkulu, babe ngumsebenzi wezandla zomuntu kuphela, umuthi namatshe; ngalokho abachithile.
Isa 37:20 Manje, Jehova Nkulunkulu wethu, sisindise esandleni sakhe ukuba yonke imibuso yomhlaba yazi ukuthi wena unguJehova, wena wedwa.”
Isa 37:21 U-Isaya indodana ka-Amose wathumela kuHezekiya, wathi: “Usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: Njengalokhu ukhuleke kimi ngoSaneheribi inkosi yase-Asiriya,
Isa 37:22 nanti izwi uJehova alikhulume ngaye ukuthi: “Ikudelele, yakuhleka usulu intombi, indodakazi yaseSiyoni; ikunikinele ikhanda indodakazi yaseJerusalema.
Isa 37:23 Weyise bani, wethuka bani, na? Uphakamisele bani izwi lakho, wabhekisa phezulu amehlo akho, na? NgoNgcwele ka-Israyeli!
Isa 37:24 Ngesandla sezinceku zakho uyijivazile iNkosi, wathi: ‘Ngobuningi bezinqola zami ngenyuke mina phezulu ezintabeni ngaphakathi kweLebanoni; ngigawula imisedari yalo emide nemisayipuresi yalo ekhethekileyo ngangena ekuphakameni kwalo kokugcina nasehlathini lalo eliminyeneyo.
Isa 37:25 Ngemba, ngaphuza amanzi; ngomisa ngamathe onyawo lwami yonke imifula yaseGibithe.’
Isa 37:26 “Awuzwanga ukuthi kade ngakwenza na? Emihleni yasendulo ngakunquma; manje sengikulethile ukuba uchithe imizi ebiyelweyo ibe yizinqwaba.
Isa 37:27 Abakhe kuyo babe namandla amancane, besaba, bajabha; baba njengotshani basendle, nembali notshani obuluhlaza, nokuluhlaza ezimpahleni zezindlu, namabele ahamukile engakakhuli.
Isa 37:28 “Kepha ukuhlala kwakho, nokuphuma kwakho, nokungena kwakho ngiyakwazi, nokubhovumula kwakho ngami.
Isa 37:29 Ngenxa yokubhovumula kwakho ngami, nangokuba ukuzidla kwakho kwenyukele ezindlebeni zami, ngiyakufaka ingwegwe yami emakhaleni akho netomu lami emlonyeni wakho, ngikubuyise ngendlela oweza ngayo.
Isa 37:30 “Lokhu kuyakuba yisibonakaliso kuwe: “Niyakudla ngalo mnyaka okuzikhulelayo, nangomnyaka wesibili isihlabane, nangomnyaka wesithathu hlwanyelani, nivune, nitshale izivini, nidle izithelo zazo.
Isa 37:31 Abasindileyo bendlu yakwaJuda abaseleyo bayakubuye bagxile phansi, bathele izithelo phezulu.
Isa 37:32 Ngokuba kuyakuphuma eJerusalema insali nasentabeni yaseSiyoni abayakusinda; ukushisekela kukaJehova Sebawoti kuyakufeza lokho.
Isa 37:33 “Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova ngenkosi yase-Asiriya, uthi: “Ayiyikungena kulo muzi, ayiyikucibishela mcibisholo khona; ayiyikubhekisa kuwo isihlangu, ayiyikunqwabela iduli ngakuwo.
Isa 37:34 Indlela eyafika ngayo iyakubuya ngayo; ayiyikungena kulo muzi,” usho uJehova.
Isa 37:35 “Ngiyakuwuvikela lo muzi ukuba ngiwusindise ngenxa yami nangenxa yenceku yami uDavide.”
Isa 37:36 Kwaphuma ingelosi kaJehova, yabulala ekamu labase-Asiriya abayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi ayisishiyagalombili nanhlanu; sekuvukwa ngakusasa, bheka, kwakuyizidumbu ezifileyo zodwa.
Isa 37:37 Wayesesuka uSaneheribi inkosi yase-Asiriya, wahamba, wabuya, wahlala eNineve.
Isa 37:38 Kwathi ekhuleka endlini kaNisiroki unkulunkulu wakhe, o-Adirameleki noSareseri amadodana akhe bambulala ngenkemba, babalekela ezweni lase-Ararati. U-Esari Hadoni indodana yakhe waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe.
Isa 38:1 Ngalezo zinsuku uHezekiya wagula, wayephansi kokufa. Kwafika kuye u-Isaya umprofethi, indodana ka-Amose, wathi kuye: “Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: Yalela indlu yakho, ngokuba uyakufa, awuyikusinda.”
Isa 38:2 UHezekiya wayesephendulela ubuso bakhe odongeni, wakhuleka kuJehova,
Isa 38:3 wathi: “Ngiyacela, Jehova: ake ukhumbule ukuthi ngihambile phambi kwakho ngeqiniso nangenhliziyo epheleleyo, ngenzile okuhle emehlweni akho.” Wayesekhala uHezekiya ngokukhala okukhulu.
Isa 38:4 Lafika ku-Isaya izwi likaJehova, lathi:
Isa 38:5 “Hamba, uthi kuHezekiya: ‘Usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu kaDavide uyihlo, uthi: Ngizwile umkhuleko wakho, ngibonile izinyembezi zakho; ngiyakwenezela ezinsukwini zakho iminyaka eyishumi nanhlanu.
Isa 38:6 Ngiyakophula wena nalo muzi esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya, ngiwuvikele lo muzi.
Isa 38:7 “ ‘Lesi siyakuba yisibonakaliso kuwe esivela kuJehova sokuthi uJehova uyakukwenza lokho akukhulumileyo:
Isa 38:8 bheka, isithunzi sezinyathelo ilanga elizehlile ezinyathelweni zelanga zika-Ahazi ngiyakusibuyisa izinyathelo eziyishumi.’ ” Ilanga labuya-ke izinyathelo eziyishumi ezinyathelweni elizehlileyo.
Isa 38:9 Ihubo likaHezekiya inkosi yakwaJuda lapho wayekade egula, wasinda ekuguleni kwakhe:
Isa 38:10 Ngathi: “Ngiphakathi nezinsuku zami ngiyakungena emasangweni endawo yabafileyo, ngaphuciwe inxenye yeminyaka yami.”
Isa 38:11 Ngathi: “Angiyikumbona uJehova, uJehova ezweni labaphilayo; angisayikubuka muntu nginabakhileyo bezwe.
Isa 38:12 Idokodo lami lisishuliwe, lasuswa kimi njengetende lomalusi; ngisongile ukuphila kwami njengomaluki; uyanginquma esalukweni; kusukela emini kuze kube sebusuku uyangiqeda.
Isa 38:13 Ngakhala kwaze kwaba sekuseni; njengengonyama uyaphula onke amathambo ami; kusukela emini kuze kube sebusuku uyangiqeda.
Isa 38:14 Ngatshiyozisa okwenkonjane, ngaliliselisa okwejuba; amehlo ami aphela ngokubheka phezulu; Nkosi, ngiyacindezelwa; yiba yisibambiso sami.”
Isa 38:15 Ngingakhuluma ngithini na? Ukhulumile kimi, ukwenzile yena. Ngiyakubinyabinyeka yonke iminyaka ngomunyu womphefumulo wami.
Isa 38:16 Nkosi, abantu baphila ngalokho, nokuphila komoya wami kukulokho kuphelele; ngalokho mawungiphulukise, ungiphilise.
Isa 38:17 Bheka, kwakungokuhle kimi ukuthi nganginomunyu; wena wawuthanda umphefumulo wami, waze waphuma egodini lokubhujiswa, ngokuba uzilahlile nyovane zonke izono zami.
Isa 38:18 Ngokuba indawo yabafileyo ayikubongi, nokufa akukudumisi; abehlela egodini ababheki ukuthembeka kwakho.
Isa 38:19 Abaphilayo, abaphilayo bayakubonga njengami namuhla; uyise uyabazisa abantwana ukuthembeka kwakho.
Isa 38:20 UJehova uyakungisindisa; ngalokho siyakubetha ngezingubhu ezinezintambo zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwethu endlini kaJehova.
Isa 38:21 U-Isaya wathi: “Mabathathe isigaxa samakhiwane, basibeke ethumbeni, uyakusinda.”
Isa 38:22 Kepha uHezekiya wathi: “Yisibonakaliso sini sokuba ngiyakwenyukela endlini kaJehova na?”
Isa 39:1 Ngaleso sikhathi uMerodaki Baladani indodana kaBaladani inkosi yaseBabele wathuma abanezincwadi nesipho kuHezekiya, lapho ezwile ukuthi kade egula, kepha usesimamile.
Isa 39:2 UHezekiya wathokoza ngabo, wababonisa indlu yengcebo yakhe, isiliva, negolide, namakha, namafutha amahle, nayo yonke indlu yezikhali zakhe, nakho konke okwafunyanwa engcebeni yakhe; akubangakho nto endlini yakhe nasembusweni wakhe wonke uHezekiya angababonisanga yona.
Isa 39:3 Wayesefika u-Isaya, umprofethi, enkosini uHezekiya, wathi kuye: “Batheni labo bantu; beze kuwe bevelaphi na?” Wathi uHezekiya: “Bavela ezweni elikude, iBabele, beze kimi.”
Isa 39:4 Wayesethi: “Baboneni endlini yakho na?” UHezekiya wathi: “Babone konke okusendlini yami; akukho nto phakathi kwengcebo yami engingababonisanga yona.”
Isa 39:5 U-Isaya wathi kuHezekiya: “Yizwa izwi likaJehova Sebawoti.
Isa 39:6 Bheka, izinsuku ziyeza, lapho konke okusendlini yakho nalokho oyihlo abakubekelele khona kuze kube namuhla kuyakuyiswa eBabele; akuyikusala lutho, usho uJehova.
Isa 39:7 Nasemadodaneni akho ayakuphuma kuwe, oyakuwazala, bayakuwathatha abe yizinceku endlini yobukhosi yenkosi yaseBabele.”
Isa 39:8 Wayesethi uHezekiya ku-Isaya: “Lihle izwi likaJehova olikhulumileyo.” Wathi futhi: “Ngokuba kuyakuba khona ukuthula nokulondeka emihleni yami.”
Isa 40:1 Duduzani, nibaduduze abantu bami, usho uNkulunkulu wenu.
Isa 40:2 Qungani iJerusalema isibindi, nimemeze kulo ukuthi ukulwa kwalo sekuphelile nokuthi buhlanguliwe ububi balo, ngokuba lamukeliswe esandleni sikaJehova ngokuphindiweyo ngazo zonke izono zalo.
Isa 40:3 Izwi liyamemeza lithi: “Lungisani ehlane indlela kaJehova, nihlelembe oqwathuleni umgwaqo kaNkulunkulu wethu.
Isa 40:4 Zonke izigodi ziyakuphakanyiswa, zonke izintaba namagquma kuyakwehliswa; amagebhugebhu ayakuhlelenjwa, nemigoxigoxi iyakuba yithafa.
Isa 40:5 Inkazimulo kaJehova iyakubonakaliswa, yonke inyama ikubone kanyekanye, ngokuba umlomo kaJehova ukhulumile.”
Isa 40:6 Izwi liyakhuluma lithi: “Memeza!” Ngathi: “Ngiyakumemezani na?” Inyama yonke ingutshani, bonke ubuhle bayo bunjengembali yasendle.
Isa 40:7 Utshani buyabuna, imbali iyavuthuluka, ngokuba umoya kaJehova uyaphephetha kukho. Impela abantu bangutshani.
Isa 40:8 Utshani buyabuna, imbali iyavuthuluka, kepha izwi likaNkulunkulu wethu limi kuze kube phakade.
Isa 40:9 Khuphukela entabeni ende, wena, Siyoni, obika okujabulisayo, uphakamise ngamandla izwi lakho, wena Jerusalema obika okujabulisayo, uliphakamise ungesabi, usho emizini yakwaJuda ukuthi: “Bhekani, nangu uNkulunkulu wenu.”
Isa 40:10 Bhekani, iNkosi uJehova iyeza ngamandla; ingalo yayo iyakumbusela; bhekani, umvuzo wayo inawo, inkokhelo yayo iphambi kwayo.
Isa 40:11 Iyakwalusa umhlambi wayo njengomalusi, ibuthe amawundlu ngemikhono yayo, iwagone esifubeni sayo, ihole kahle izindlezane.
Isa 40:12 Ngubani olinganise amanzi ngentende yesandla sakhe, walinganisa izulu ngeminwe eyeluliweyo, wahlanganisa uthuli esilinganisweni, walinganisa izintaba ngezikalo namagquma ngezisindo, na?
Isa 40:13 Ngubani oqondisile uMoya kaJehova, wamfundisa engumluleki wakhe, na?
Isa 40:14 Walulekana nobani waze wamqondisa, wamfundisa indlela yokwahlulela, wamnika ukwazi, wamazisa indlela yokuqonda, na?
Isa 40:15 Bheka, izizwe zinjengethonsi kwasesitsheni, zibalwa njengothuli lwesilinganiso; bheka, iziqhingi uyaziphakamisa njengothuli olucolekileyo.
Isa 40:16 ILebanoni alanele ukubaswa, nezilwane zalo azanele ukuba zibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa.
Isa 40:17 Zonke izizwe zinjengento engelutho phambi kwakhe, zibalwa njengokungelutho nokuyize kuye.
Isa 40:18 Niyakumfanisa uNkulunkulu nobani, nimlinganise namuphi umfanekiso, na?
Isa 40:19 Yisithombe yini esibunjiwe yisisebenzi, sanamekwa ngegolide ngumkhandi, sancibilikiselwa amaketanga esiliva, na?
Isa 40:20 Ompofu kunokuba anikele ngomnikelo onjalo uyakhetha umuthi ongaboliyo, azifunele isisebenzi esihlakaniphileyo ukuba simise isithombe esibaziweyo esingenakuzanyazanyiswa.
Isa 40:21 Anazi yini? Anizwa yini? Anitshelwanga yini kwasekuqaleni, aniqondanga kwasekusekelweni komhlaba, na?
Isa 40:22 Nguye ohlezi esiyingelezini somhlaba — abakhile kuwo banjengezintethe — noweneka izulu njengendwangu, alelule njengetende ukuba kuhlalwe kulo,
Isa 40:23 nowenza izikhulu zibe yinto engelutho, nabahluleli ukuba babe yize.
Isa 40:24 Yebo, banele ukutshalwa nje, yebo, banele ukuhlwanyelwa nje, yebo, isiqu sanele ukugxila emhlabathini, abesephephetha kubo, babune, isivunguvungu sibasuse njengamabibi.
Isa 40:25 “Niyakungifanisa nobani ukuba ngifane naye?” usho oNgcwele.
Isa 40:26 Phakamiselani amehlo enu phezulu, nibone. Ngubani odalile lezo zinto na? Nguye okhipha ibandla lazo ngezibalo, abize zonke ngamagama; ngobuningi bamandla akhe nangobukhulu bezikhwepha zakhe ayisilali neyodwa.
Isa 40:27 Usholoni wena Jakobe, ukhulumelani wena Israyeli, ukuthi: “Indlela yami isithekile kuJehova, ilungelo lami lidlulile kuNkulunkulu wami,” na?
Isa 40:28 Awazi yini? Awuzwanga na? UJehova unguNkulunkulu ongunaphakade; udalile imikhawulo yomhlaba; akapheli amandla, akakhathali, nokuqonda kwakhe akunakuphenywa.
Isa 40:29 Nguye omupha oyethileyo amandla, nakongenamandla uyandisa izikhwepha.
Isa 40:30 Izinsizwa ziyaphela amandla, zikhathale, nabasha bawa nokuwa,
Isa 40:31 kepha abamethembayo uJehova bayathola amandla amasha, bayakhuphuka ngamaphiko njengezinkozi, bagijime bengakhathali, bahambe bengapheli amandla.
Isa 41:1 “Thulani phambi kwami nina ziqhingi, izizwe zithole amandla amasha. Mazisondele, andukuba zikhulume, sisondelane ekwahluleleni.
Isa 41:2 “Ngubani ovusile ukulunga kuphume empumalanga, akubize ukuba kumlandele, anikele izizwe phambi kwakhe, amenze ukuba abuse amakhosi, abenze babe njengothuli ngenkemba yakhe, nanjengamabibi aphephezeliswayo ngomnsalo wakhe, na?
Isa 41:3 Uyabaxosha, adlule kahle ngezindlela angazihambanga ngezinyawo.
Isa 41:4 Ngubani okusebenzileyo, wakwenza, na? Nguye owazibiza izizukulwane kwasekuqaleni: mina Jehova engingowokuqala nenginguye nakwabokuphela.”
Isa 41:5 Iziqhingi ziyakubona, ziyesaba; imikhawulo yomhlaba iyathuthumela; isondele, isifikile.
Isa 41:6 Yilowo nalowo usiza umakhelwane wakhe; uthi komfowabo: “Yiba nesibindi.”
Isa 41:7 Umbazi uqunga umkhandi isibindi, nololonga ngesando uqunga oshaya isikhandelo isibindi, ethi ngokunamathelisa: “Kuhle,” ekubethela ngezipikili, funa kunyakaziswe.
Isa 41:8 “Kepha wena Israyeli, nceku yami, wena Jakobe engikukhethileyo, nzalo ka-Abrahama othandiweyo wami,
Isa 41:9 wena engikuthathile emikhawulweni yomhlaba, ngakubiza emagumbini awo, ngathi kuwe: ‘Wena uyinceku yami,’ ngikukhethile, angikulahlanga;
Isa 41:10 ungesabi, ngokuba mina nginawe; ungapheli amandla, ngokuba mina nginguNkulunkulu wakho; ngiyakuqinisa, futhi ngiyakusiza, yebo, ngiyakusekela ngesandla sokunene sokulunga kwami.
Isa 41:11 “Bheka, bonke abafuthekela wena bayakuba namahloni, bajabhe; abamelene nawe bayakuba njengento engelutho, babhubhe.
Isa 41:12 Uyakubafuna, ungabafumani kodwa, labo bantu abaxabana nawe; abalwa nawe bayakuba njengento engelutho nanjengeze.
Isa 41:13 Ngokuba yimina Jehova uNkulunkulu wakho obamba isandla sakho sokunene, nothi kuwe: Ungesabi, mina ngiyakusiza.
Isa 41:14 Ungesabi wena mpethu, Jakobe, nani bantu bakwa-Israyeli; mina ngiyakukusiza,” usho uJehova; uMhlengi wakho ungoNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Isa 41:15 “Bheka, ngiyakukwenza ukuba ube yisibhulo esisha esibukhali esinamazinyo; uyakubhula izintaba, uzicolisise, wenze amagquma abe njengamakhoba.
Isa 41:16 Uyakuwahlakaza, umoya uwasuse, isivunguvungu siwachithe; wena uyakuthokoza ngoJehova, uzibonge ngoNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Isa 41:17 “Abampofu nabaswelayo bafuna amanzi, kepha awakho, nolimi lwabo luphele ukoma; mina Jehova ngiyakubaphendula, mina Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli angiyikubashiya.
Isa 41:18 Ngiyakuvula imifula emadulini angenalutho nemithombo phakathi kwezigodi; ngiyakwenza ihlane libe yichibi lamanzi, nomhlabathi owomileyo ube yiziphethu zamanzi.
Isa 41:19 Ngiyakutshala umsedari ehlane, umtholo, nombomvana, nomnqumo, ngibeke kwahlongasibi umsayipuresi, nomthidari, nomkhoba kanyekanye,
Isa 41:20 ukuze babone, bazi, baqaphele, baqonde kanyekanye ukuthi isandla sikaJehova sikwenzile lokhu nokuthi oNgcwele ka-Israyeli wakudala.
Isa 41:21 “Lethani indaba yenu,” usho uJehova, “nisondeze izizathu zenu,” isho iNkosi kaJakobe.
Isa 41:22 “Mabazisondeze, basitshele okuyakwenzeka; izinto zakuqala ziyini na? Mabasitshele zona ukuba sizibeke ezinhliziyweni zethu, sazi ukuphela kwazo, noma nisizwise okuzayo.
Isa 41:23 Sitsheleni okuzayo ngesikhathi esizayo, sazi ukuthi ningonkulunkulu; yebo, yenzani okuhle noma okubi, simangale, sikubone kanyekanye.
Isa 41:24 Bhekani, nivela kokungekho, nemisebenzi yenu ayiyinto yalutho; uyisinengiso onikhethileyo.
Isa 41:25 “Ukhona engimvusile esenyakatho, wafika, nasempumalanga, ukuba abize igama lami; uyakwehlela phezu kwezikhulu njengaphezu kodaka, njengombumbi exova ibumba.
Isa 41:26 Ngubani owakushoyo kwasekuqaleni ukuba sazi, nangaphambili ukuba sisho sithi: ‘Uqinisile,’ na? Cha, akakho okumemezileyo, akakho nokuzwisileyo, akakho nozwayo amazwi enu.
Isa 41:27 Ngingowokuqala othi kulo iSiyoni: ‘Bheka, babheke,’ nginike iJerusalema umbiki wendaba ethokozisayo.
Isa 41:28 Kepha lapho ngibheka, akukho muntu, akakho phakathi kwabo umluleki ongaphendula ngazwi, lapho ngibabuzayo.
Isa 41:29 Bheka, bayize bonke; imisebenzi yabo ayiyinto yalutho, nezithombe zabo ezibunjiweyo zingumoya nokuyize.
Isa 42:1 “Bheka inceku yami engiyisekelayo, okhethiweyo wami othokoza ngaye umphefumulo wami; nginikele umoya wami phezu kwakhe, uyakukhiphela izizwe ukwahlulela.
Isa 42:2 Akayikukhala, adazuluke, angezwakalisi izwi lakhe ezitaladini.
Isa 42:3 Umhlanga ofecekileyo akayikuwaphula, umongo othunqayo akayikuwucima; uyakukhipha ukwahlulela ngeqiniso.
Isa 42:4 Akayikudangala, aphele amandla, aze amise ukwahlulela emhlabeni; neziqhingi ziyakuhlalela umthetho wakhe.”
Isa 42:5 Usho kanje uNkulunkulu uJehova owadala izulu, waleneka, nowawendlala umhlaba nokuvela kuwo, nowanika abantu abakuwo ukuphefumula nomoya kwabahamba kuwo, uthi:
Isa 42:6 “Mina Jehova ngikubizile ngokulunga, ngiyakubamba isandla sakho, ngikugcine, ngikubeke ube yisivumelwano sabantu nokukhanya kwabezizwe,
Isa 42:7 ukuze uvule amehlo ezimpumputhe, ukhiphe iziboshwa etilongweni nabahlezi ebumnyameni etilongweni.
Isa 42:8 “NginguJehova; yilo igama lami; angiyikunika omunye inkazimulo yami, nezithombe ezibaziweyo udumo lwami.
Isa 42:9 Izinto zakuqala zifikile, sengimemezela izinto ezintsha; zingakaqhamuki, ngiyanizwisa zona.”
Isa 42:10 Mhubeleni uJehova ihubo elisha, nodumo lwakhe, kusukela emikhawulweni yomhlaba, nina enehlela elwandle nakho konke okukulo, nina ziqhingi nabakhileyo kuzo.
Isa 42:11 Ihlane nemizi yalo makujabule nemizana abakhileyo kuyo abakwaKedari, bahube abakhile emadwaleni, benanele beseziqongweni zezintaba.
Isa 42:12 Mabanike uJehova udumo, bamemezele udumo lwakhe eziqhingini.
Isa 42:13 UJehova uyaphuma njengeqhawe; njengendoda yempi uyavusa ukushisekela kwakhe; uyakhala, yebo, uyabangalasa, enze ubuqhawe phezu kwezitha zakhe.
Isa 42:14 “Sekuyisikhathi eside ngithulile, ngathula ngazibamba; sengiyakukhala njengobelethayo, ngiphefuzele, ngibitoze kanyekanye.
Isa 42:15 Ngiyakwenza ize izintaba namagquma, ngomise yonke imifino yawo, ngenze imifula ibe yiziqhingi, ngenze amachibi ukuba ashe.
Isa 42:16 Ngiyakuhambisa izimpumputhe ngendlela ezingayaziyo; emikhondweni ezingayaziyo ngiyakuzihola; ngiyakwenza ubumnyama bube ngukukhanya phambi kwazo, namagebhugebhu ukuba ahlelenjwe; ngiyakwenza lezi zinto ngingazishiyi.
Isa 42:17 Bayakubuyiselwa emuva, bajabhe nokujabha labo abethemba ezithombeni ezibaziweyo, abasho ezithombeni ezibunjiweyo ukuthi: ‘Ningonkulunkulu bethu.’
Isa 42:18 “Yizwani nina zithulu; bhekani nina zimpumputhe, ukuze nibone.
Isa 42:19 Ngubani oyimpumputhe ngaphandle kwenceku yami, nesithulu njengesithunywa sami engisithumayo, na? Ngubani oyimpumputhe njengopheleleyo, oyimpumputhe njengenceku kaJehova, na?
Isa 42:20 Ubona izinto eziningi, kepha awuqapheli; izindlebe zakhe zivulekile, kepha akezwa.”
Isa 42:21 Kwaba kuhle kuJehova ngenxa yokulunga kwakhe ukuba akhulise umthetho, awudumise.
Isa 42:22 Kepha laba bangabantu abaphangiweyo nabamukiweyo; bonke bacushiwe emigodini, bafihliwe ematilongweni; bangabokuphangwa, akakho obophulayo, yebo, bayimpango, kungekho oshoyo ukuthi: “Buyisa.”
Isa 42:23 Ngubani phakathi kwenu obeka indlebe kulokhu, aqaphele, ezwele isikhathi esizayo, na?
Isa 42:24 Ngubani owanikela uJakobe ukuba aphangwe, no-Israyeli kubo abaphangi, na? Angithi nguJehova, esonile kuye, nabangavumanga ukuhamba ngezindlela zakhe, nabangawulalelanga umthetho wakhe?
Isa 42:25 Wayesethela phezu kwakhe ukufutheka kwentukuthelo yakhe, namandla empi; kwamvuthela nxazonke, kepha akakwazanga; kwamshisa, kepha akakubekanga enhliziyweni yakhe.
Isa 43:1 Kepha manje usho kanje uJehova owakudalayo wena Jakobe, nowakubumba wena Israyeli, uthi: “Ungesabi ngokuba ngikuhlengile, ngikubizile ngegama lakho; ungowami.
Isa 43:2 Lapho udabula emanzini, mina nginawe; nasemifuleni, ayiyikukukhukhula; lapho uhamba emlilweni, awuyikusha, nelangabi aliyikukushisa.
Isa 43:3 Ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, uMsindisi wakho; ngiyanika iGibithe libe yihlawulo lakho, iKushe neSheba esikhundleni sakho.
Isa 43:4 Ngenxa yokuba ubuyigugu emehlweni ami, futhi ubudumile, uthandekile kimi, ngiyakunika abantu esikhundleni sakho, nezizwe esikhundleni sokuphila kwakho.
Isa 43:5 Ungesabi, ngokuba nginawe; ngiyakuyiletha inzalo yakho iphume empumalanga, ngikubuthe nasentshonalanga.
Isa 43:6 Ngiyakusho kuyo inyakatho, ngithi: ‘Balethe,’ nakuyo iningizimu: ‘Ungabagodli.’ Lethani amadodana ami akude, namadodakazi ami ukuba aphume emikhawulweni yomhlaba,
Isa 43:7 onke abizwe ngegama lami, nengiwadalele inkazimulo yami, engiwabumbile nengiwenzile.”
Isa 43:8 Lethani abantu abayizimpumputhe abanamehlo nezithulu ezinezindlebe.
Isa 43:9 Izizwe zonke mazibuthelwe ndawonye, abantu bonke babuthane; ngubani phakathi kwabo ongamemezela lokhu, asizwise izinto zakuqala; mabalethe ofakazi babo ukuba balungisiswe, bezwe, bathi: “Kuyiqiniso.”
Isa 43:10 “Ningofakazi bami,” usho uJehova, “nenceku yami engiyikhethileyo ukuba nazi, ningethembe, niqonde ukuthi nginguye; ngaphambi kwami akwenziwanga uNkulunkulu, nangasemva kwami akayikuba khona.
Isa 43:11 Mina, mina nginguJehova, ngaphandle kwami akakho umsindisi.
Isa 43:12 Ngimemezele, ngisindisile, ngizwisile, kungakabikho unkulunkulu wabezizwe phakathi kwenu; yebo, ningofakazi bami,” usho uJehova, “mina nginguNkulunkulu.
Isa 43:13 Yebo, kwasendulo nginguye; akakho ongophula esandleni sami; lapho ngisebenza, ngubani ongakuvimbela na?”
Isa 43:14 Usho kanje uJehova, uMhlengi wenu, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Ngenxa yenu ngithumele eBabele, ngiyakwehlisa bonke njengababaleki, namaKaledi ngemikhumbi yokujabula kwawo.
Isa 43:15 NginguJehova oNgcwele wenu, uMdali ka-Israyeli, iNkosi yenu.”
Isa 43:16 Usho kanje uJehova owenza indlela elwandle, nomkhondo emanzini anamandla,
Isa 43:17 okhipha izinqola namahhashi, impi namandla; kuyalala kanyekanye, akusenakuvuka; kucishile, kucinyiwe njengomongo.
Isa 43:18 “Ningakhumbuli izinto zakuqala, ningazindli ngezindaba zasendulo.
Isa 43:19 Bhekani, ngiyakwenza okusha; kuyakuqhamuka manje, angithi niyakwazi na? Yebo, ngiyakwenza indlela ehlane nemifula kwahlongasibi.
Isa 43:20 Izilwane zasendle ziyakungidumisa, amakhanka nezintshe, ngokuba ngiveza amanzi ehlane nemifula kwahlongasibi ukuphuzisa abantu bami abakhethiweyo,
Isa 43:21 laba bantu engizenzele bona ukuba bashumayele udumo lwami.
Isa 43:22 “Kepha awungibizanga, Jakobe, ngokuba wadinwa yimi, Israyeli.
Isa 43:23 Awulethanga kimi izimvu zakho zomnikelo wokushiswa, awungidumisanga ngemihlatshelo yakho; angikukhonzisanga ngeminikelo, angikudinisanga ngenhlaka.
Isa 43:24 Awungithengelanga umhlanga othaphukayo ngemali, awungisuthisanga ngamanoni emihlatshelo yakho, kepha ungisebenzisile ngezono zakho, ungidinisile ngobubi bakho.
Isa 43:25 “Mina, mina nginguye owesula iziphambeko zakho ngenxa yami; angiyikukhumbula izono zakho.
Isa 43:26 Ngikhumbuze, masahlulelane; yisho wena ukuba ulungisiwe.
Isa 43:27 Uyihlo wokuqala wona, abahumushi bakho bangihlubukile.
Isa 43:28 Ngidumazile izikhulu zendlu engcwele, ngimenzile uJakobe abe yisiqalekiso, no-Israyeli abe yisithuko.
Isa 44:1 “Kepha yizwa manje, Jakobe, nceku yami, wena Israyeli engikukhethileyo.
Isa 44:2 Usho kanje uJehova owakudalayo, wakubumba kwasesiwini, oyakukusiza, uthi: Ungesabi, Jakobe, nceku yami, wena Jeshuruni engikukhethileyo.
Isa 44:3 Ngokuba ngiyakuthela amanzi phezu kokomileyo, nezikhukhula phezu kokushileyo, ngithulule uMoya wami phezu kwenzalo yakho, nesibusiso sami phezu kwabantwana bakho;
Isa 44:4 bayakuhluma phakathi kotshani njengeminyezane ngasemifudlaneni yamanzi.
Isa 44:5 Omunye uyakuthi: ‘NgingokaJehova;’ omunye uyakuzibiza ngegama likaJakobe, omunye azilobele uJehova esandleni sakhe, azidumise ngegama lika-Israyeli.”
Isa 44:6 “Usho kanje uJehova, iNkosi ka-Israyeli, noMhlengi wakhe, uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: Ngingowokuqala, ngingowokugcina, ngaphandle kwami akakho uNkulunkulu.
Isa 44:7 Ngubani ongabiza njengami, akumemezele, akubeke phambi kwami, kusukela ekusekeleni kwami abantu basendulo, na? Yebo, okuzayo nokuyakwenzeka mabakumemezele.
Isa 44:8 Ningesabi, ningabi naluvalo; angithi ngikuzwisile kusukela endulo, ngakumemezela, na? Nina ningofakazi bami. Kukhona uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami na? Cha, alikho iDwala; angilazi.”
Isa 44:9 Abenza isithombe esibaziweyo bayize bonke; izinto zabo ezithandekayo aziyikusiza; ofakazi babo ababoni, futhi abazi; bayakujabhiswa.
Isa 44:10 Ngubani owenzile uNkulunkulu, ngubani obumbile isithombe esibaziweyo esingesokusiza na?
Isa 44:11 Bheka, bonke abangane bakhe bayakujabha, nezisebenzi zingabantu nje. Mabahlangane bonke, beme; bayakwesaba, bajabhe kanyekanye.
Isa 44:12 Umkhandi wensimbi wenza imbazo, asebenze emalahleni, ayibumbe ngezando, ayisebenze ngamandla ezingalo zakhe; uyalamba, angabikho amandla; akaphuzi amanzi, uyadangala.
Isa 44:13 Umbazi uyelula intambo, adwebe umuthi ngokubomvu, awenze ngezibazo, adwebe ngekompasi, awenze ngomfanekiso womuntu, ngobuhle bomuntu, ukuba uhlale endlini.
Isa 44:14 Uyazigawulela imisedari, athathe imikhoba nama-oki, awaqinise phakathi kwemithi yehlathi; uyatshala umfire, imvula iwukhulise.
Isa 44:15 Bese kuba ngokomuntu ukuba abase ngakho; uthatha kuwo, othe; uyawuphemba, enze isinkwa; wenza unkulunkulu, akhuleke kuye, enze nesithombe esibaziweyo, akhothambele kuso.
Isa 44:16 Ushisa inxenye yawo emlilweni; phezu kwale nxenye uyadla inyama, ose izoso, asuthe; yebo, uyotha athi: “Halala! Sengifudumele, ngibonile umlilo.”
Isa 44:17 Ngokuseleyo kuwo uyakwenza unkulunkulu nesithombe; uyakhothamela kuso, akhuleke kuso, athandaze kuso, athi: “Ngophule; ungunkulunkulu wami.”
Isa 44:18 Abazi, abaqondi, ngokuba unamekile amehlo abo ukuze bangaboni, nezinhliziyo zabo ukuze bangaqondi.
Isa 44:19 Akakho okhumbulayo, nokwazi nokuqonda akukho kokuba kuthiwe: “Ngishisile inxenye yawo ngomlilo, ngenzile isinkwa phezu kwamalahle awo, ngosile inyama, ngayidla; ngingenza okuseleyo kuwo kube yisinengiso, ngikhothamele umbhuku womuthi,” na?
Isa 44:20 Udla umlotha; inhliziyo ekhohlisiweyo imdukisile; akanakophula umphefumulo wakhe nokuba athi: “Akukho yini amanga kwesokunene sami na?”
Isa 44:21 “Khumbula lezi zinto, Jakobe, wena Israyeli, ngokuba uyinceku yami; ngikubumbile, uyinceku yami; Israyeli, angiyikukhohlwa.
Isa 44:22 Ngesulile iziphambeko zakho njengefu, nezono zakho njengemilaza; buyela kimi, ngokuba ngikuhlengile.”
Isa 44:23 Thokozani, mazulu, ngokuba uJehova ukwenzile, nijabule nina zindawo eziphansi zomhlaba, niqhumuke ngokuhlabelela nina zintaba, nawe hlathi nayo yonke imithi ekuwe, ngokuba uJehova umhlengile uJakobe, ngokuhlabelela wazidumisa ngo-Israyeli.
Isa 44:24 Usho kanje uJehova uMhlengi wakho nowakubumba kwasesiswini, uthi: “NginguJehova owenza konke, oweneka izulu yedwa, nowendlala umhlaba ngokwakhe,
Isa 44:25 oshafisa izibonakaliso zabaprofethi bamanga, enze ababhuli ukuba bahlanye, obuyisela emuva abahlakaniphileyo, enze ukwazi kwabo kube ngubuwula;
Isa 44:26 ogcwalisa izwi lenceku yakhe, afeze ukululekana kwezithunywa zakhe, oshoyo ngalo iJerusalema, athi: ‘Liyakuba nabantu,’ nangemizi yakwaJuda ukuthi: ‘Iyakwakhiwa, ngibuye ngivuse incithakalo yakhona;’
Isa 44:27 oshoyo kuwo umsinga ukuthi: ‘Yisha, ngiyakomisa imifula yakho;’
Isa 44:28 oshoyo ngoKoresi ukuthi: ‘Ungumalusi wami, uyakufeza konke okwentando yami, athi ngeJerusalema: Liyakwakhiwa, nakulo ithempeli: Isisekelo sakho siyakubekwa.’ ”
Isa 45:1 “Usho kanje uJehova kogcotshiweyo wakhe, kuKoresi, osandla sakhe sokunene ngisibambile ukuba ngahlule izizwe phambi kwakhe, ngithukulule izinkalo zamakhosi, ngivule iminyango phambi kwakhe, amasango angabe esavalwa.
