Jer 48:44 “Obalekela ukwesaba uyakuwela emgodini, okhuphuka emgodini uyakubanjwa ogibeni, ngokuba ngiyakwehlisela phezu kwabo, phezu kukaMowabi, umnyaka wokujeziswa kwabo,” usho uJehova.
Jer 48:45 “Emthunzini waseHeshiboni ababalekileyo bayema bephelile amandla, ngokuba umlilo uphumile eHeshiboni, nelangabi phakathi kweSihoni; udlile amacele akwaMowabi, nokhakhayi lwamadoda omsindo okulwa.
Jer 48:46 Maye kuwena Mowabi! Abantu bakaKemoshi baphelile, ngokuba amadodana akho athunjiwe, namadodakazi akho ayiswe ekuthunjweni.
Jer 48:47 Kepha ngiyakubuyisa ukuthunjwa kukaMowabi ngezinsuku ezizayo,” usho uJehova. Kuphela lapha ukwahlulelwa kukaMowabi.
Jer 49:1 Ngabantwana bakwa-Amoni. Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “U-Israyeli kanamadodana, kanandlalifa, na? UMilkomu udleleni ifa likaGadi, abantu bakhe bahlale emizini yakhe, na?
Jer 49:2 Ngalokho bheka, izinsuku ziyeza,” usho uJehova, “lapho ngiyakwenza ukuba kuhlatshwe umkhosi wempi ngeRaba labantwana bakwa-Amoni; liyakuba yincithakalo, imizi yalo ishiswe ngomlilo, u-Israyeli abeselidla ifa lowalidla elakhe,” usho uJehova.
Jer 49:3 “Hhewula, Heshiboni, ngokuba i-Ayi lichithekile, nikhale, madodakazi aseRaba, nibhince izindwangu zamasaka, nilile, nigijime phakathi kwezintango, ngokuba uMilikomu uyakuya ekuthunjweni, abapristi bakhe nezikhulu zakhe kanyekanye.
Jer 49:4 Uzidumiselani ngezigodi, isigodi sakho esichichimayo, wena ndodakazi ehlubukayo, othemba engcebeni yakho ngokuthi: ‘Ngubani ongehlela mina, na?’
Jer 49:5 Bheka, ngiyakwehlisela phezu kwakho uvalo,” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, “luvela kubo bonke abakuzungezayo, nixoshwe, kube yilowo nalowo ngendlela yakhe, kungabikho obutha ababalekileyo.
Jer 49:6 “Kepha ngasemuva ngiyakubuyisa ukuthunjwa kwabantwana bakwa-Amoni,” usho uJehova.
Jer 49:7 Ngo-Edoni. Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Akusekho ukuhlakanipha eThemani na? Amasu aphelile kwabaqondileyo, ukuhlakanipha kwabo kunyamalele, na?
Jer 49:8 Balekani, nibuye, nihlale ezigoxini nina bakhileyo eDedani, ngokuba ngiyakwehlisela phezu kwakhe ingozi ka-Esawu ngesikhathi sokumhambela kwami.
Jer 49:9 Uma bekufika kuwe abavuna izithelo zomvini, abayikushiya umkhothozo; namasela ebusuku abeyakuchitha aze aneliswe.
Jer 49:10 Kepha mina ngiyakumhlubula u-Esawu, ngambule izindawo zakhe ezichithekileyo, kanakucasha; inzalo yakhe ichithekile, nabafowabo, nabakhelwane bakhe, yena abe engasekho.
Jer 49:11 Shiya izintandane zakho, mina ngiyakuziphilisa, abafelokazi bakho bethembe kimi.”
Jer 49:12 Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bheka, labo okwakungesibo okwabo ukuphuza indebe bayakuyiphuza nokuyiphuza; ubuyakuba ngongenacala na? Awuyikuba ngongenacala, ngokuba uyakuyiphuza nokuyiphuza.
Jer 49:13 Ngokuba ngizifungile,” usho uJehova, “ukuthi iBosira liyakuba yisimangaliso, nehlazo, nencithakalo, nesiqalekiso, yonke imizi yalo ibe yizincithakalo eziphakade.”
Jer 49:14 Ngizwile imibiko evela kuJehova; kuthunyiwe isithunywa phakathi kwezizwe ngokuthi: “Buthanani, nilihlasele, nisukele ukulwa.”
Jer 49:15 “Ngokuba bheka, ngiyakukwenza ube mncane phakathi kwezizwe, udelelwe phakathi kwabantu.
Jer 49:16 Ukwesabeka kwakho kukudukisile, ukuziqhenya kwenhliziyo yakho, wena ohlezi emifantwini yamawa ubambe isiqongo sentaba; noma wakha isidleke sakho njengokhozi, ngiyakukwehlisa khona,” usho uJehova.
Jer 49:17 “U-Edomi uyakuba yisimangaliso, kumangale yilowo nalowo odlula kuye, ancimfe ngenxa yezinhlupheko zakhe.
Jer 49:18 Njengasekuchithweni kweSodoma neGomora nemizi yangakhona,” usho uJehova, “akuyikuhlala muntu khona, nendodana yomuntu ayiyikugogobala khona.
Jer 49:19 “Bheka, njengengonyama ekhuphuka ezihlahleni zaseJordani, iye endaweni eyinqaba, ngiyakubazuma, ngibagijimise, basuke kuyo; nobani okhethwayo ngiyakumbeka phezu kwabo, ngokuba ngubani onjengami, ngubani onginqumelayo, ngumuphi umalusi oyakuma phambi kwami, na?”
Jer 49:20 Ngalokho yizwani isiluleko sikaJehova asinike ngo-Edomi namacebo awacebile ngabakhileyo eThemani ukuthi: Abancinyane bomhlambi bayakudonswa, basuswe, ikhaya labo limangale ngabo.
Jer 49:21 Ngomsindo wokuwa kwabo umhlaba uyazamazama; ngukukhala okumsindo wakho uzwakele ngaseLwandle Olubomvu.
Jer 49:22 Bheka, onjengokhozi uyakhuphuka, andize, elulele amaphiko akhe kulo iBosira; izinhliziyo zamaqhawe akwa-Edomi ziyakuba njengenhliziyo yowesifazane onemihelo.
Jer 49:23 NgeDamaseku. “IHamati ne-Aripadi kujabhile, ngokuba kuzwile imibiko emibi, kuphela amandla. Kuyahlupheka njengolwandle, akunakuthula.
Jer 49:24 IDamaseku selibuthakathaka, liyaphenduka ukuba libaleke; ingebhe ilibambile, ukudabuka nosizi kulibambile njengowesifazane obelethayo.
Jer 49:25 Yeka ukushiywa komuzi wodumo, umuzi wokuthokoza kwami!
Jer 49:26 Ngalokho izinsizwa zawo ziyakuwa ezitaladini zalo, nawo onke amadoda empi ayakuthuliswa ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Jer 49:27 “Ngiyakuphemba umlilo ogangeni lwaseDamaseku, uqede izindlu zobukhosi zikaBeni Hadadi.”
Jer 49:28 NgeKedari, nangemibuso yaseHasori ayinqobayo uNebukadinesari, inkosi yaseBabele. Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Sukani, nikhuphukele eKedari, nichithe abantwana basempumalanga.
Jer 49:29 Amatende abo nemihlambi yabo niyakukuthatha, bazithuthele izilenge zabo, nazo zonke izimpahla zabo, namakamela abo, bamemeze kubo, bathi: ‘Luvalo nxazonke.’
Jer 49:30 “Balekani, nizulazulele kude, nihlale ezigoxini nina bakhileyo eHasori,” usho uJehova, “ngokuba uNebukadinesari, inkosi yaseBabele wenze amasu ngani, waceba amacebo ngani.
Jer 49:31 “Sukani, nikhuphukele kuso isizwe esizinzileyo, esihlala ngokulondeka,” usho uJehova, “esingenazicabha nemigoqo, sakhe sodwa.
Jer 49:32 Amakamela aso ayakuba yimpango, nezinkomo zaso eziningi ziyakuphangwa. Ngiyakubahlakazela emimoyeni yonke, bonke abadilingiwe emaceleni amakhanda abo, ngehlisele phezu kwabo izingozi ezivela nxazonke,” usho uJehova.
Jer 49:33 “IHasori liyakuba yindawo yokuhlala kwamakhanka nencithakalo kuze kube phakade; akuyikuhlala muntu khona, nendodana yomuntu ayiyikugogobala khona.”
Jer 49:34 Izwi elafika kuJeremiya umprofethi nge-Elamu ekuqaleni kokubusa kukaSedekiya inkosi yakwaJuda, ngokuthi:
Jer 49:35 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakwaphula umnsalo we-Elamu, okokuqala kwamandla abo.
Jer 49:36 Ngiyakwehlisela phezu kwe-Elamu imimoya emine emikhawulweni yomine yezulu, ngibahlakazele kuyo yonke leyo mimoya, kungabe kusabakho sizwe lapho abaxoshiweyo base-Elamu bengayikufika khona.
Jer 49:37 Ngiyakwenza ukuba i-Elamu liphele amandla ngaphambi kwezitha zalo naphambi kwabafuna ukuphila kwabo, ngibehlisele okubi, ukufutheka kwentukuthelo yami,” usho uJehova, “ngithume inkemba emva kwabo, ngize ngibaqede.
Jer 49:38 Ngiyakubeka isihlalo sami sobukhosi e-Elamu, ngichithe khona inkosi nezikhulu,” usho uJehova.
Jer 49:39 “Kepha kuyakuthi ezinsukwini zokugcina ngibuyise ukuthunjwa kwe-Elamu,” usho uJehova.
Jer 50:1 Izwi uJehova alikhuluma ngeBabele, izwe lamaKaledi, ngesandla sikaJeremiya umprofethi.
Jer 50:2 “Memezani phakathi kwezizwe, nikuzwakalise, nimise ibhanela, nikuzwakalise, ningakufihli, nithi: ‘IBabele linqotshiwe, uBeli ujabhile, uMerodaki uphelile amandla; izithombe zalo zijabhile, imifanekiso yalo iphelile amandla.’
Jer 50:3 Ngokuba kukhuphukela kulo isizwe sivela enyakatho, esiyakwenza izwe lalo libe yincithakalo, kungabikho ohlala kulo; abantu nezilwane kuyakubaleka, kuhambe.
Jer 50:4 “Ngalezo zinsuku nangaleso sikhathi,” usho uJehova, “bayakufika abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, bona nabantwana bakwaJuda kanyekanye, behamba bekhala, befuna uJehova uNkulunkulu wabo.
Jer 50:5 Bayakubuza indlela yaseSiyoni, ubuso babo bubhekene nalo, bethi: Wozani nizihlanganise noJehova ngesivumelwano esiphakade esingenakukhohlakala.
Jer 50:6 “Abantu bami babe yizimvu ezilahlekileyo; abelusi babo babadukisile, babazulazulisa ezintabeni, basuka entabeni, baya egqumeni, bakhohlwa indawo yabo yokuphumula.
Jer 50:7 Bonke ababafumanayo babaqeda; abamelene nabo bathi: ‘Asitholi icala; ngokuba bonile kuJehova, ikhaya lokulunga, ithemba lawoyise, uJehova.’
Jer 50:8 “Balekani eBabele, niphume ezweni lamaKaledi, nibe njengezimpongo phambi kwezimvu.
Jer 50:9 Ngokuba bheka, ngiyakuvusa, ngenyusele eBabele ibandla lezizwe ezinkulu, livela ezweni lasenyakatho, lizihlelele lona, linqotshwe lapho; imicibisholo yalo iyakuba njengeyeqhawe eliphumelelayo, elingabuyi ze.
Jer 50:10 IKalideya liyakuba yimpango; bonke abaliphangayo bayakusutha,” usho uJehova.
Jer 50:11 “Noma nithokoza, noma nijabula nina baphangi befa lami, noma nixhuma njengesithokazi etshanini obuluhlaza, niyiyizela njengamahhashi anamandla,
Jer 50:12 unyoko uyakujabha kakhulu, owangizalayo ayangaze; bheka, uyakuba ngesokugcina sezizwe, ihlane, nomhlabathi owomileyo, nogwadule.
Jer 50:13 Ngenxa yentukuthelo kaJehova aliyikuhlalwa muntu, kepha liyakuba yincithakalo lonke; bonke abadlula eBabele bayakumangala, bancimfe ngenxa yazo zonke izinhlupheko zalo.
Jer 50:14 “Zihleleleni iBabele nxazonke nina nonke eninsala umnsalo, nicibishele kulo, ninganqandi imicibisholo, ngokuba lonile kuJehova.
Jer 50:15 Memezani kulo nxazonke; lizinikele, izisekelo zalo ziwile, izingange zalo zidiliziwe, ngokuba kuyimpindiselo kaJehova; phindiselani kulo, nenze kulo njengokwenza kwalo.
Jer 50:16 Nqumani umhlwanyeli eBabele nobamba isikela ngesikhathi sokuvuna; ngenxa yenkemba ecindezelayo yilowo nalowo uyakubheka abantu bakhe, yilowo nalowo abalekele ezweni lakubo.
Jer 50:17 “U-Israyeli uyimvu ezingelwayo; izingonyama zimxoshile. Kuqala wadliwa yinkosi yase-Asiriya, nangasemuva uNebukadinesari lo, inkosi yaseBabele, ugedlile amathambo akhe.”
Jer 50:18 Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakujezisa inkosi yaseBabele nezwe layo, njengalokho ngijezisile inkosi yase-Asiriya.
Jer 50:19 Ngiyakumbuyisela u-Israyeli ekhaya lakhe, aklabe eKarmeli naseBashani, umphefumulo wakhe waneliswe ezintabeni zakwa-Efrayimi nezakwaGileyadi.
Jer 50:20 Ngalezo zinsuku nangaleso sikhathi,” usho uJehova, “kuyakufunwa ukona kuka-Israyeli, akuyikubakho, nezono zakwaJuda, kepha aziyikufunyanwa, ngokuba ngiyakubathethelela engibashiya ukuba babe yinsali.
Jer 50:21 “Khuphukela ezweni laseMeratayimi, kulona nakwabakhileyo ePhekodi, uchithe, uqede nya emva kwabo,” usho uJehova, wenze konke engikuyale ngakho.
Jer 50:22 Kukhona umsindo wokulwa ezweni nowencithakalo enkulu.
Jer 50:23 Yeka ukunqunywa nokuchithwa kwesando somhlaba wonke, yeka ukwenziwa kweBabele incithakalo phakathi kwezizwe!
Jer 50:24 Ngakucupha, wabanjwa, Babele, ungakwazi; wafunyanwa, wabanjwa, ngokuba ulwile noNkulunkulu.
Jer 50:25 UJehova uvulile indlu yakhe yezikhali, ukhiphile izikhali zokufutheka kwakhe, ngokuba iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti inomsebenzi ezweni lamaKaledi.
Jer 50:26 Lifikeleni nivele emkhawulweni, nivule izinqolobane zalo, nilinqwabele libe yizinqwaba, niliqede nya, kungasali lutho kulo.
Jer 50:27 Hlabani zonke izinkunzi zalo; mazehlele ekuhlatshweni; wo kuzona! Ngokuba usuku lwazo lufikile, isikhathi sokuhanjelwa kwazo.
Jer 50:28 Yizwi lababalekayo nabaphunyuka ezweni laseBabele ukuba bamemeze eSiyoni impindiselo kaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, impindiselo ngethempeli lakhe!
Jer 50:29 “Bizani abacibishelayo, balwe neBabele, bonke abansala umnsalo, nimise nxazonke zalo, lingabi nophunyukayo, niliphindisele njengezenzo zalo, nenze kulo njengakho konke elikwenzileyo, ngokuba lizikhukhumezile kuJehova, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Jer 50:30 Ngalokho izinsizwa zalo ziyakuwa ezitaladini zalo, nawo onke amadoda alo empi ayakunqunywa ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova.
Jer 50:31 “Bheka, ngimelene nawe ozikhukhumezileyo,” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, “ngokuba usuku lwakho lufikile, isikhathi sokuhanjwelwa kwakho.
Jer 50:32 Ozikhukhumezayo uyakukhubeka, awe, angabi naye omvusayo; ngiyakuphemba umlilo emizini yakhe, udle konke okumzungezayo.”
Jer 50:33 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli nabantwana bakwaJuda bacindezelwe kanyekanye; bonke ababathumbileyo bababamba, abavumi ukuba bahambe.
Jer 50:34 Kepha umkhululi wabo unamandla, nguJehova Sebawoti igama lakhe; uyakumela nokumela indaba yabo ukuba aphumuze umhlaba, anyakazise abakhileyo eBabele.
Jer 50:35 “Makufike inkemba phezu kwamaKaledi,” usho uJehova, naphezu kwabakhileyo eBabele, naphezu kwezikhulu zalo, naphezu kwezihlakaniphi zalo.
Jer 50:36 Inkemba ifike phezu kwabaprofethi bamanga, babe yiziwula, inkemba ifike phezu kwamaqhawe alo, aphele amandla.
Jer 50:37 Inkemba ifike phezu kwamahhashi alo, naphezu kwezinqola zalo, naphezu kwayo yonke ingxubevange yabantu ephakathi kwalo, babe njengabesifazane; inkemba ifike phezu kwengcebo yalo, ize iphangwe.
Jer 50:38 Makufike ukusha phezu kwamanzi alo, aze ome, ngokuba yizwe elinezithombe ezibaziweyo, bahlanya ngemifanekiso yabo.
Jer 50:39 “Ngalokho izilwane zasehlane ziyakuhlala nezimpungushe, kuhlale khona nezintshe; alisayikuhlalwa kuze kube phakade, lingabe lisakhiwa izizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
Jer 50:40 Njengalokho uNkulunkulu wachitha iSodoma neGomora nemizi yawo eyakheleneyo,” usho uJehova, “kanjalo akuyikuhlala muntu khona, kungagogobali khona indodana yomuntu.
Jer 50:41 “Bheka, kuvela abantu enyakatho, isizwe esikhulu namakhosi amaningi, kuvuswe ekugcineni komhlaba.
Jer 50:42 Babamba umnsalo nomkhonto; banonya, abanamusa; izwi labo liduma njengolwandle; bakhwele amahhashi, behleliwe njengabantu abayakulwa nawe ndodakazi yaseBabele.
Jer 50:43 Inkosi yaseBabele izwile udumo lwabo, izandla zayo zaba buthakathaka; usizi luyibambile, nemihelo njengeyobelethayo.
Jer 50:44 Bheka, njengengonyama ekhuphuka ezihlahleni zaseJordani, iye endaweni eyinqaba, ngiyakubazuma, ngibagijimise, basuke kuyo; nobani okhethwayo ngiyakumbeka phezu kwabo, ngokuba ngubani onjengami, ngubani onginqumelayo, ngumuphi umalusi oyakuma phambi kwami, na?”
Jer 50:45 Ngalokho yizwani isiluleko sikaJehova asinike ngeBabele namacebo awacebe ngezwe lamaKaledi ukuthi: Abancinyane bomhlambi bayakudonswa, basuswe impela, ikhaya labo limangale ngabo.
Jer 50:46 Ngomsindo wokuthathwa kweBabele umhlaba uyazamazama, ukukhala kuzwakale phakathi kwezizwe.
Jer 51:1 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngiyakuvusela iBabele nabakhileyo eLebi Khamayi umoya womchithi.
Jer 51:2 Ngiyakuthuma abelayo eBabele, balele, balithulule, ngokuba ngosuku lobubi bayakuba kulo nxazonke.
Jer 51:3 Ocibishelayo uyakunsala umnsalo kogoba umnsalo khona, nakuye oziphakamisa ngebhantshi lakhe lensimbi; ningasindisi izinsizwa zalo, niqede nya impi yalo yonke.
Jer 51:4 Bayakuwa bebulewe ezweni lamaKaledi, begwaziwe ezitaladini zalo.
Jer 51:5 Ngokuba o-Israyeli noJuda abashiywanga nguNkulunkulu wabo, uJehova Sebawoti, noma izwe labo ligcwele icala koNgcwele ka-Israyeli.
Jer 51:6 “Balekani eBabele, yilowo nalowo akhulule ukuphila kwakhe, ninganqunywa ngokona kwalo, ngokuba kuyisikhathi sempindiselo kaJehova, uyakuliphindisela.
Jer 51:7 IBabele beliyindebe yegolide esandleni sikaJehova eyadakisa umhlaba wonke; izizwe zaliphuza iwayini lalo, ngalokho izizwe ziyahlanya.
Jer 51:8 IBabele seliwile ngokuzumayo, lachithwa; hhewulani ngalo, nithathele ubuhlungu balo ibhalisamu; mhlawumbe lingaphiliswa.
Jer 51:9 “Besiyakuliphilisa iBabele, kepha aliphiliswanga; lishiyeni, masihambe siye, kube yilowo nalowo ezweni lakubo, ngokuba ukwahlulelwa kwalo kufinyelela ezulwini, kuphakanyisiwe nasemafwini.
Jer 51:10 “UJehova uvezile imfanelo yethu; wozani silande eSiyoni umsebenzi kaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu.
Jer 51:11 “Lolani imicibisholo, nibambe izihlangu. UJehova uvusile umoya wamakhosi aseMediya, ngokuba icebo lakhe ngeBabele lingukuba alichithe, ngokuba lokhu kuyimpindiselo kaJehova, impindiselo ngethempeli lakhe.
Jer 51:12 Misani ibhanela ngasezingangeni zaseBabele, niqinise umlindo, nimise abalindi, nihlele abaqamekeli, ngokuba uJehova ukuhlosile, futhi wakwenza lokho owakukhuluma kwabakhileyo eBabele.
Jer 51:13 Wena ohlala ngasemanzini amakhulu, nonengcebo eningi, sekufikile ukugcina kwakho, isilinganiso sokuhaha kwakho.
Jer 51:14 UJehova Sebawoti uzifungile wathi: Noma ngikugcwalisile ngabantu njengangezinkumbi, bayakuhalalisa nokho ngawe.
Jer 51:15 “Wawenza umhlaba ngamandla akhe, walimisa izwe ngokuhlakanipha kwakhe, ngokuqonda kwakhe waleneka izulu.
Jer 51:16 Lapho elizwakalisa izwi lakhe, kungukuhlokoma kwamanzi ezulwini; uzikhuphula izinkungu emikhawulweni yomhlaba, enzele imvula unyazi, awukhiphe umoya endlini yengcebo.
Jer 51:17 “Bonke abantu bayiziphukuphuku, abanakwazi, bonke abakhandi bajabhiswa nezithombe zabo ezibaziweyo, ngokuba izithombe zabo ezibunjiweyo zingamanga, nomoya awukho kuzo.
Jer 51:18 Ziyize, zingumsebenzi wenkohliso; ngesikhathi sokuhanjelwa kwabo ziyakubhubha.
Jer 51:19 Oyisabelo sikaJakobe akanjengalezo, ngokuba nguye obumbile konke, yebo, nesizwe sefa lakhe; nguJehova Sebawoti igama lakhe.
Jer 51:20 “Uyizembe lami nezikhali zokulwa; ngiyaphahlaza izizwe ngawe, ngawe ngiyachitha imibuso,
Jer 51:21 ngiphahlaze ngawe ihhashi nenkweli yalo, ngiphahlaze ngawe inqola nohamba ngayo;
Jer 51:22 ngiphahlaze ngawe abesilisa nabesifazane, ngiphahlaze ngawe abadala nabasha, ngiphahlaze ngawe izinsizwa nezintombi;
Jer 51:23 ngiphahlaze ngawe umalusi nomhlambi wakhe, ngiphahlaze ngawe umlimi namabhanga akhe, ngiphahlaze ngawe izinduna nababusi.
Jer 51:24 “Ngiyakuphindisela iBabele nabo bonke abakhileyo eKalideya konke okubi kwabo abakwenzile eSiyoni emehlweni enu,” usho uJehova.
Jer 51:25 “Bheka, ngimelene nawe ntaba echithayo,” usho uJehova, “wena ochitha wonke umhlaba; ngiyakwelulela isandla sami kuwe, ngikugingqe emadwaleni, ngikwenze intaba eshisiweyo.
Jer 51:26 Abayikuthatha kuwe itshe legumbi netshe lesisekelo, ngokuba uyakuba yincithakalo kuze kube phakade,” usho uJehova.
Jer 51:27 “Misani ibhanela ezweni, nibethe amacilongo phakathi kwezizwe, ningcwelise izizwe ukuba zilwe nalo, nilibizele imibuso yase-Ararati, naseMini, nase-Ashikenaze, nibeke phezu kwalo umphathi wempi, nikhuphuke namahhashi anjengezinkumbi ezimahaye.
Jer 51:28 Lingcweliseleni izizwe, amakhosi aseMediya, nezinduna zalo, nababusi balo, nalo lonke izwe elibuswa yibo.
Jer 51:29 Umhlaba uyathuthumela, uqhaqhazele, ngokuba amacebo kaJehova ngeBabele emi okuba enze izwe laseBabele libe yincithakalo, kuze kungabikho ohlala khona.
Jer 51:30 Amaqhawe aseBabele ayekile ukulwa, ahlala ezinqabeni zawo; amandla awo aphelile, anjengabesifazane; izindlu zalo zishisiwe, imigoqo yalo yaphuliwe.
Jer 51:31 Isigijimi siyagijma, sihlangane nesinye, umbiki uhlangana nombiki ukutshela inkosi yaseBabele ukuthi umuzi wayo unqotshiwe nxazonke.
Jer 51:32 Amazibuko avinjiwe, umhlanga ushisiwe ngomlilo, amadoda empi ayesaba.”
Jer 51:33 Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Indodakazi yaseBabele injengesibuya ngesikhathi sokunyathelwa kwaso; kuse yisikhashana, sizakufika kuyo isikhathi sokuvuna.”
Jer 51:34 UNebukadinesari, inkosi yaseBabele ungidlile wangiqeda; ungenze isitsha esingenalutho, wangigwinya njengodrako; ugcwalisile isisu sakhe ngokumnandi kwami, wangixosha.
Jer 51:35 “Ubudlova engenzelwe bona mina nabayinyama yami mabube phezu kweBabele,” makasho njalo owakhileyo eSiyoni. “Igazi lami malibe phezu kwabakhileyo eKalideya;” malisho njalo iJerusalema.
Jer 51:36 Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakumela indaba yakho, ngikuphindisele, ngishise ulwandle lwalo, ngomise umthombo walo.
Jer 51:37 IBabele liyakuba yizinqwaba, nendawo yokuhlala kwamakhanka, nencithakalo, nento encimfelwayo, kungabikho ohlala khona.
Jer 51:38 Bayabhonga kanyekanye njengezingonyama, bakhale njengamabhongo ezingonyama.
Jer 51:39 Sebevuthile, ngiyakubenzela idili, ngibadakise ukuze baquleke, balale ubuthongo obuphakade, bangavuki,” usho uJehova.
Jer 51:40 “Ngiyakubehlisela ekuhlatshweni njengamawundlu, njengezinqama nezimpongo.
Jer 51:41 “Yeka ukunqotshwa kweSheshaki nokubanjwa kwelaliludumo lwawo wonke umhlaba! Yeka ukwenziwa kweBabele isimangaliso phakathi kwezizwe!
Jer 51:42 Ulwandle lukhuphukele iBabele, lisibekelwe ngamaza alo ahlokomayo.
Jer 51:43 Imizi yalo ichithekile; yizwe elomileyo, nehlane, izwe elingahlalwa muntu, kungadluli kulo indodana yomuntu.
Jer 51:44 Ngiyakuhambela uBeli eBabele, ngikhiphe emlonyeni wakhe lokhu akugwinyileyo; izizwe azisayikugobhozela kuye, ugange lwaseBabele luyakuwa.
Jer 51:45 “Phumani phakathi kwalo, bantu bami, nizikhulule, kube yilowo nalowo ekufuthekeni kwentukuthelo kaJehova.
Jer 51:46 Izinhliziyo zenu mazingadangali, ningesabi imibiko ezwakalayo ezweni, lapho kufika umbiko othile ngomunye umnyaka, bese kufika emva kwawo omunye ngomnyaka olandelayo, kube ngubudlova ezweni, umbusi avukele umbusi.
Jer 51:47 Ngalokho bheka, izinsuku ziyeza, lapho ngiyakujezisa izithombe ezibaziweyo zaseBabele, izwe lonke lalo lijabhe, bonke ababuleweyo balo bawe phakathi kwalo.
Jer 51:48 Bese kuqhumuka izulu nomhlaba, nakho konke okukukho, ngokuhlabelela ngeBabele, ngokuba abachithi bayakumfikela bevela enyakatho,” usho uJehova.
Jer 51:49 “Yebo, neBabele limelwe ukuwa, nina babuleweyo bakwa-Israyeli, njengalokho iBabele laliwelwa ngababuleweyo bomhlaba wonke.
Jer 51:50 Nina eniphunyukile enkembeni hambani, ningemi; khumbulani uJehova nisekude, iJerusalema lingene ezinhliziyweni zenu.
Jer 51:51 “Sijabhile, ngokuba sizwe inhlamba; amahloni asibekela ubuso bethu, ngokuba abafokazi bangenile ezindaweni ezingcwele endlini kaJehova.”
Jer 51:52 “Ngalokho bheka, izinsuku ziyeza,” usho uJehova, “lapho ngiyakuzihambela izithombe zalo ezibaziweyo, ababulawayo babubule ezweni lonke lalo.
Jer 51:53 Noma iBabele likhuphukela ezulwini, yebo, noma liqinisa inqaba yalo enamandla, kuyakuvela nokho kimi abachithi, balehlele,” usho uJehova.
Jer 51:54 “Ngumsindo wokukhala ovela eBabele, nowencithakalo enkulu ophuma ezweni lamaKaledi,
Jer 51:55 ngokuba uJehova uyalichitha iBabele, aqede phakathi kwalo umsindo omkhulu; amaza alo ayahlokoma njengamanzi amakhulu, nomsindo wokuhlokoma kwawo uyezwakala,
Jer 51:56 ngokuba umchithi uyalehlela, alehlele iBabele, amaqhawe alo ayabanjwa, neminsalo yawo iyaphulwa, ngokuba uJehova unguNkulunkulu wemivuzo, uyakhokha nokukhokha.
Jer 51:57 Ngiyakudakisa izikhulu zalo nezihlakaniphi zalo, nezinduna zalo, nababusi balo, namaqhawe alo; bayakulala ubuthongo obuphakade, bangavuki,” isho iNkosi egama layo linguJehova Sebawoti.
Jer 51:58 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Ugange olubanzi lwaseBabele luyakubhidlizwa nokubhidlizwa, namasango alo aphakemeyo ayakushiswa ngomlilo; abantu bakhandlekela ize nezizwe okomlilo, zikhathale.”
Jer 51:59 Izwi uJeremiya umprofethi ayala ngalo uSeraya indodana kaNeriya kaMakhaseya ekuhambeni kwakhe noSedekiya inkosi yakwaJuda eya eBabele ngomnyaka wesine wokubusa kwakhe. USeraya wayeyisikhulu sezindawo zokuphumula.
Jer 51:60 UJeremiya waloba encwadini konke okubi obekuyakwehlela iBabele, onke lawa mazwi alotshiwe ngeBabele.
Jer 51:61 UJeremiya wathi kuSeraya: “Ekufikeni kwakho eBabele bhekisisa ukuba ufunde onke lawa mazwi,
Jer 51:62 uthi: ‘Jehova, wena ukhulumile ngale ndawo ukuba uyinqume ukuze kungabikho muntu ohlala kuyo, umuntu nasilwane, ngokuba iyakuba yihlane kuze kube phakade.’
Jer 51:63 Lapho usuqedile ukuyifunda le ncwadi, uyakubopha itshe kuyo, uyiphonse e-Ewufrathe,
Jer 51:64 uthi: ‘Kanjalo iBabele liyakushona, lingabe lisavuka ngenxa yokubi engiyakulehlisela khona, lidangale.’ ” Kuphela lapha amazwi kaJeremiya.
Jer 52:1 USedekiya wayeneminyaka engamashumi amabili nanye ekuqaleni kwakhe ukubusa, wabusa iminyaka eyishumi nanye eJerusalema; igama likanina lalinguHamuthali indodakazi kaJeremiya waseLibina.
Jer 52:2 Wenza okubi emehlweni kaJehova njengakho konke akwenzileyo uJehoyakimi.
Jer 52:3 Ngokuba kwenzeka lokho eJerusalema nakwaJuda ngenxa yentukuthelo kaJehova, waze wabalahla ebusweni bakhe; uSedekiya wayihlubuka inkosi yaseBabele.
Jer 52:4 Kwathi ngomnyaka wesishiyagalolunye wokubusa kwakhe ngenyanga yeshumi, ngolweshumi lwenyanga, kwafika uNebukadinesari, inkosi yaseBabele, yena nayo yonke impi yakhe, eJerusalema, wamisa malungana nalo, bakha inqaba ngakulo nxazonke.
Jer 52:5 Wawusuvinjezelwa umuzi kwaze kwaba ngumnyaka weshumi nanye wenkosi uSedekiya.
Jer 52:6 Ngenyanga yesine ngolwesishiyagalolunye lwenyanga indlala yaba namandla emzini, akubangakho kudla kubantu bezwe.
Jer 52:7 Kepha wawusufohlwa umuzi, onke amadoda empi abaleka, aphuma emzini ebusuku ngendlela yesango phakathi kwezingange zombili ezazingasensimini yenkosi — amaKaledi ayekhona nxazonke zomuzi — ahamba ngendlela yase-Araba.
Jer 52:8 Kodwa impi yamaKaledi yayixosha inkosi, yamfica uSedekiya emathafeni aseJeriko, yonke impi yakhe yahlakazeka.
Jer 52:9 Ayeseyibamba inkosi, ayenyusela enkosini yaseBabele eRibila ezweni laseHamati, ayahlulela.
Jer 52:10 Inkosi yaseBabele yabulala amadodana kaSedekiya phambi kwamehlo akhe; yabulala nazo zonke izikhulu zakwaJuda eRibila.
Jer 52:11 Yakhipha namehlo kaSedekiya; inkosi yaseBabele yambopha ngamaketanga, yamyisa eBabele, yamfaka etilongweni kwaze kwaba sosukwini lokufa kwakhe.
Jer 52:12 Ngenyanga yesihlanu, ngolweshumi lwenyanga okwakungumnyaka weshumi nesishiyagalolunye wenkosi uNebukadinesari, inkosi yaseBabele, kwafika uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi, inceku yenkosi yaseBabele, eJerusalema.
Jer 52:13 Washisa indlu kaJehova nendlu yenkosi; nazo zonke izindlu zaseJerusalema, zonke izindlu ezinkulu, wazishisa ngomlilo.
Jer 52:14 Yonke impi yamaKaledi induna yabalindi eyayinayo yadiliza izingange zaseJerusalema nxazonke.
Jer 52:15 Abantu abathile abayizimpofana, nabantu abaseleyo ababesele emzini, nabahlubukileyo behlubukela enkosini yaseBabele, nesixuku esiseleyo uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wabathumba.
Jer 52:16 Kepha uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi washiya abantu abathile bezwe abayizimpofana ukuba baphathe izivini namasimu.
Jer 52:17 Izinsika zethusi ezazisendlini yenkosi, nezinqe, nolwandle lwethusi okwakusendlini kaJehova amaKaledi akuhlephula, athuthela lonke ithusi lakho eBabele.
Jer 52:18 Amakhanzi, namafosholo, nezizenze, nemicakulo, nezinkezo, nazo zonke izitsha zethusi ababekhonza ngazo akuthatha.
Jer 52:19 Izindebe, nemicengezi yomlilo, nezitsha, namakhanzi, nezinti zezibani, nezinkezo, nezinkamba, okwegolide lodwa nesiliva lodwa, nalokho induna yabalindi yakuthatha.
Jer 52:20 Izinsika zombili, nolwandle olwalulunye nje, nezinkabi eziyishumi nambili zethusi ezaziphansi kwezinye, inkosi uSolomoni eyayikwenzele indlu kaJehova, ithusi lazo zonke lezi zinto lalingenakulinganiswa.
Jer 52:21 Izinsika-ke, ukuphakama kwensika eyodwa kwakuyizingalo eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili; umucu oyizingalo eziyishumi nambili wawuyizungeza; uhlonze lwayo lwaluyiminwe emine, yayiyigobongo.
Jer 52:22 Kwakukhona isihloko sethusi; ukuphakama kwesihloko esisodwa kwakuyizingalo eziyisihlanu; kwakukhona nenetha namapomegranati phezu kwesihloko nxazonke, konke kwakungokwethusi; njengangale kwakunjalo nasensikeni yesibili enamapomegranati.
Jer 52:23 Kwakukhona amapomegranati angamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesithupha ngasemoyeni; onke amapomegranati asenetheni nxazonke ayeyikhulu.
Jer 52:24 Induna yabalindi yathatha uSeraya, umpristi omkhulu, noZefaniya, umpristi wesibili, nabalindimnyango abathathu;
Jer 52:25 yathatha emzini induna eyayimiswe phezu kwamadoda empi, nabantu abayisikhombisa kwaba besebusweni benkosi abafunyanwa emzini, nombhali wenduna yempi eyayibala abantu bezwe, nabantu bezwe abangamashumi ayisithupha abafunyanwa phakathi komuzi.
Jer 52:26 UNebuzaradani, induna yabalindi, wabathatha, wabayisa enkosini yaseBabele eRibila.
Jer 52:27 Inkosi yaseBabele yabashaya, yababulala eRibila ezweni laseHamati. Wathunjwa kanjalo uJuda ezweni lakubo.
Jer 52:28 Nampa abantu uNebukadinesari abathumbayo: ngomnyaka wesikhombisa abaJuda abayizinkulungwane ezintathu namashumi amabili nantathu,
Jer 52:29 nangomnyaka weshumi nesishiyagalombili kaNebukadinesari wathumba eJerusalema abantu abangamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili namashumi amathathu nambili.
Jer 52:30 Ngomnyaka wamashumi amabili nantathu kaNebukadinesari uNebuzaradani induna yabalindi wathumba abaJuda, abantu abangamakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi amane nanhlanu. Bonke abantu babe yizinkulungwane ezine namakhulu ayisithupha.
Jer 52:31 Kwathi ngomnyaka wamashumi amathathu nesikhombisa wokuthunjwa kukaJehoyakini, inkosi yakwaJuda, ngenyanga yeshumi nambili, ngolwamashumi amabili nanhlanu lwenyanga, u-Evili Merodaki inkosi yaseBabele ngomnyaka wokuqala wokubusa kwakhe waphakamisa ikhanda likaJehoyakini inkosi yakwaJuda, wamkhipha etilongweni,
Jer 52:32 wakhuluma kahle kuye, wabeka isihlalo sakhe phezu kwezihlalo zamakhosi ayenaye eBabele.
Jer 52:33 Waguqula izingubo zakhe zasetilongweni; wadla njalo phambi kwakhe zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwakhe.
Jer 52:34 Isabelo sakhe sasiyisabelo esimiyo semihla ngemihla, asiphiwa yinkosi yaseBabele zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwakhe kwaze kwaba sosukwini lokufa kwakhe.
Lam 1:1 Yeka ukuhlala kodwa komuzi owawunabantu abaningi! Usungumfelokazi owawunezizwe eziningi. Owawuyinkosikazi phakathi kwezifunda usungobuswayo.
Lam 1:2 Uyakhala nokukhala ebusuku, izinyembezi zawo zisezihlathini zawo; kawunamduduzi phakathi kwazo zonke izithandwa zawo; bonke abangane bawo bawuphathe ngenkohliso, sebe yizitha zawo.
Lam 1:3 UJuda uthunjiwe ngenxa yokuhlupheka nobugqila obuningi; uhlala phakathi kwabezizwe, katholi ukuphumula; bonke abamzingelayo bamfica ephakathi kobuhlungu.
Lam 1:4 Izindlela zaseSiyoni ziyalila ngokuba kungeziwa emikhosini emisiweyo; onke amasango achithekile, abapristi balo bayabubula; izintombi zalo ziyahlupheka, nalo linomunyu.
Lam 1:5 Abamelene nalo sebe yinhloko, izitha zalo zinokuthula, ngokuba uJehova ulihluphile ngenxa yobuningi beziphambeko zalo; izingane zalo ziye ekuthunjweni ebusweni bezitha.
Lam 1:6 Bonke ubukhosi bumukile endodakazini yaseSiyoni; izikhulu zalo sezinjengezindluzele ezingafumani idlelo, zihambile zingenamandla ebusweni babaxoshayo.
Lam 1:7 IJerusalema liyakhumbula ezinsukwini zokuhlupheka kwalo nezinsizi zalo konke okuhle okwakukhona ezinsukwini zasendulo; lapho abantu balo bewela esandleni sezitha, kungekho olisizayo, abamelene nalo balibona, bahleka ukuchithwa kwalo.
Lam 1:8 IJerusalema lalonile kakhulu; ngalokho seliyisinengiso; bonke ababelidumisa sebelidelela ngokuba bebone ubunqunu balo; seliyabubula nalo, libuyela emuva.
Lam 1:9 Ukungcola kwalo kwakusemaphethelweni alo, alikhumbulanga ukuphela kwalo; lehlile ngokumangalisayo, alinamduduzi. Bheka, Jehova, ukuhlupheka kwami, ngokuba isitha sizikhulisile.
Lam 1:10 Isitha selulile isandla saso phezu kwakho konke okumnandi kwalo, ngokuba sibonile ukuthi abezizwe bangene endlini yalo engcwele, owabayala ukuthi abayikungena ebandleni lakho.
Lam 1:11 Bonke abantu balo bayabubula, befuna isinkwa sabo; banika okumnandi kwabo ngokudla ukuba babuyise umphefumulo. Bheka, Jehova, ubhekisise, ngokuba ngiyadelelwa.
Lam 1:12 “Akulutho kinina nonke enidlula ngendlela na? Bhekani, nibone ukuba kukhona yini ubuhlungu obunjengobuhlungu bami engehlelwe yibo, uJehova angihluphe ngabo ngosuku lokufutheka kwentukuthelo yakhe.
Lam 1:13 “Ephezulu ungithumele umlilo emathanjeni ami, wawahlula; wenekele izinyawo zami inetha, wangibuyisela emuva. Ungenze incithakalo, ngiphele amandla usuku lonke.
Lam 1:14 “Iziphambeko zami zaboshwa ngesandla sakhe, zaba yijoka; zalukwa, sezisentanyeni yami; wakhubekisa amandla ami. INkosi inginikele esandleni sabo engingenakumelana nabo.
Lam 1:15 “INkosi ilahlile onke amaqhawe ami phakathi kwami; ingibizele umhlangano ukuphahlaza izinsizwa zami; iNkosi inyathele njengasesikhamweni sewayini intombi eyindodakazi yakwaJuda.
Lam 1:16 “Ngiyakhala ngalokhu; iso lami, iso lami liyamululeka izinyembezi, ngokuba umduduzi wami obeyakubuyisa umphefumulo wami ukude nami. Abantwana bami bachithekile, ngokuba isitha sahlulile.”
Lam 1:17 ISiyoni liyelula izandla zalo, akakho oliduduzayo. UJehova uyalile ngoJakobe ukuba abamzungezayo babe yizitha zakhe. IJerusalema linjengesinengiso phakathi kwabo.
Lam 1:18 “UJehova ulungile, ngokuba ngihlubukile izwi lakhe. Ake nizwe, bantu bonke, nibone ubuhlungu bami. Izintombi zami nezinsizwa zami ziye ekuthunjweni.
Lam 1:19 “Ngazibiza izithandwa zami, zangikhohlisa. Abapristi bami namalunga ami bafela emzini, besafuna ukudla ukuba babuyise umphefumulo wabo.
Lam 1:20 “Bheka, Jehova, ngokuba nginosizi; izibilini zami ziyaxhaphazela. Inhliziyo yami iphendukile phakathi kwami, ngokuba ngihlubukile nokuhlubuka. Endle yinkemba eyaphucayo, ekhaya ngukufa.
Lam 1:21 “Bezwile ukuthi ngiyabubula, kepha anginamduduzi. Zonke izitha zami zizwile ukuhlupheka kwami; ziyathokoza ukuthi nguwe okwenzileyo. Ululethile usuku olumemezileyo, kepha ziyakuba njengami.
Lam 1:22 “Mabufike bonke ububi bazo ebusweni bakho, wenze kuzo njengokwenza kwakho kimi ngenxa yazo zonke iziphambeko zami, ngokuba ukububula kwami kukhulu, nenhliziyo idangele.”
Lam 2:1 Yeka ukwembesa kweNkosi indodakazi yaseSiyoni amafu ngentukuthelo yayo. Uphonsile ubuhle buka-Israyeli emhlabeni busuke ezulwini, angasikhumbulanga isenabelo sezinyawo zayo ngosuku lwentukuthelo yayo.
Lam 2:2 INkosi igwinyile onke amakhaya kaJakobe ingahawukelanga. Ngentukuthelo yayo, ibhidlizile izinqaba zendodakazi yakwaJuda, yazidilizela emhlabathini, yangcolisa umbuso nezikhulu zawo.
Lam 2:3 Yanquma ngokufutheka kolaka lwayo zonke izimpondo zakwa-Israyeli, yabuyisela emuva isandla sayo sokunene ebusweni bezitha, yashisa uJakobe ngomlilo wamalangabi odla nxazonke.
Lam 2:4 Yansala umnsalo wayo njengesitha, yema njengomelene nathi ngesokunene sayo, yabulala konke okwakumnandi emehlweni ethu. Etendeni lendodakazi yaseSiyoni yathulula ukufutheka kwayo njengomlilo.
Lam 2:5 INkosi isinjengesitha, imgwinyile u-Israyeli; yagwinya zonke izindlu zakhe zobukhosi, yachitha izinqaba zakhe; yandisile endodakazini yakwaJuda ukukhala nokulila.
Lam 2:6 Yachitha idokodo layo njengelensimu, yaqeda indawo yayo yokuhlangana. UJehova wenza ukuba kukhohlakale imikhosi emisiweyo namasabatha eSiyoni, wadelela ngokufutheka kolaka lwakhe inkosi nompristi.
Lam 2:7 INkosi yalilahla i-altare layo, yanengwa yindlu yayo engcwele, yanikela izingange zezindlu zayo zamakhosi esandleni sesitha. Ziphakamise izwi endlini kaJehova njengasosukwini lomkhosi omisiweyo.
Lam 2:8 UJehova wayecebile ukuchitha ugange lwendodakazi yaseSiyoni; wawelula umucu wokulinganisa, akabuyisanga isandla sakhe ekuchitheni; wenza ukuba kukhale ugange nodonga, kudangale kanyekanye.
Lam 2:9 Amasango alo ashona emhlabathini; wachitha, wayaphula imigoqo yalo. Inkosi nezikhulu zalo baphakathi kwezizwe, lapho kungekho khona umthetho. Nabaprofethi balo abatholi mbono kuJehova.
Lam 2:10 Amalunga endodakazi yaseSiyoni ahlezi emhlabathini, athule; athele uthuli emakhanda awo, abhince indwangu yamasaka. Izintombi zaseJerusalema zithobisela phansi amakhanda azo.
Lam 2:11 Amehlo ami ayaphela izinyembezi, izibilini zami ziyaxhaphazela; isibindi sami sithululelwe emhlabathini ngenxa yokuchitheka kwendodakazi yabantu bami, ngokuba izingane nabancelayo bayadangala ezigcawini zomuzi.
Lam 2:12 Bathi konina: “Aphi amabele newayini?” lapho bedangala njengababulawayo ezigcawini zomuzi, imiphefumulo yabo ithululelwe ezifubeni zawonina.
Lam 2:13 Ngingafakaza ngokuthini ngawe, ngikufanise nani, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, na? Ngingakulinganisa nani ukuba ngikududuze, ntombi eyindodakazi yaseSiyoni na? Ngokuba ukuchitheka kwakho kukhulu njengolwandle. Ngubani ongakuphulukisa na?
Lam 2:14 Abaprofethi bakho bakubonele imibono eyize nobuwula; abambulanga ukona kwakho ukuba babuyise ukuthunjwa kwakho. Kepha bakubonele iziprofetho eziyize nezikhohlisayo.
Lam 2:15 Bonke abadlula ngendlela bakushayela ihlombe, bancimfe, banikine amakhanda abo ngenxa yendodakazi yaseJerusalema ngokuthi: “Yiwo lo muzi owawubizwa ngokuthi ubuhle obupheleleyo nentokozo yomhlaba wonke na?”
Lam 2:16 Zonke izitha zikukhamisela umlomo wazo, zincimfa, zigedla amazinyo, zithi: “Siwugwinyile. Impela yilo usuku esilulindele; sesilufumene, silubonile.”
Lam 2:17 UJehova wenzile lokhu abekucebile; uligcwalisile izwi lakhe, ayeyale ngalo ezinsukwini zasendulo; ubhidlizile engenasihawu, wenza ukuba isitha sithokoze phezu kwakho, waphakamisa uphondo lwabamelene nawe.
Lam 2:18 Izinhliziyo zabo zikhala eNkosini; wena lugange lwendodakazi yaseSiyoni, izinyembezi mazehle njengemifula imini nobusuku. Mawungazivumeli ukuphumula, inhlamvu yeso lakho ingayeki.
Lam 2:19 Vuka ukhale ebusuku ekuqaleni kwemilindo, uthulule inhliziyo yakho njengamanzi phambi kobuso beNkosi; phakamisa izandla zakho kuyo ngenxa yokuphila kwezingane ezidangala ngendlala ezingosini zezitaladi zonke.
Lam 2:20 “Bheka, Jehova, ubone ukuthi wenzile kanjalo kubani. Abesifazane bayakudla yini izithelo zabo, izingane eziphathiweyo kahle, na? Abaprofethi nabapristi bayakubulawa endlini engcwele yeNkosi, na?
Lam 2:21 “Balele phansi ezitaladini, abasha nabadala. Izintombi zami nezinsizwa zami ziwile ngenkemba. Wababulala ngosuku lwentukuthelo yakho, wabulala ungahawukelanga.
Lam 2:22 “Wabiza njengasosukwini lomhlangano izesabiso zami nxazonke; akubangakho ngosuku lwentukuthelo kaJehova owasindayo nowasalayo. Labo engangibaphathile, ngabondla, izitha zami zibaqedile.”
Lam 3:1 Ngingumuntu obone ukuhlupheka ngentonga yentukuthelo yakhe.
Lam 3:2 Ungiholile, wangihambisa ebumnyameni, kungesikho ekukhanyeni.
Lam 3:3 Impela uyangiphendulela isandla sakhe ephinda njalo zonke izinsuku.
Lam 3:4 Ugugisile inyama yami nesikhumba sami, waphula amathambo ami.
Lam 3:5 Ungakhele, wangihaqa ngenyongo nangokushikashikeka.
Lam 3:6 Ungihlalisile ebumnyameni njengabakade bafa.
Lam 3:7 Ungibiyele ukuze ngingaphumi, wenza amaketanga ami ukuba asinde.
Lam 3:8 Nalapho ngikhala ngicela ukusindiswa, uyavalela umkhuleko wami.
Lam 3:9 Ubiyele izindlela zami ngamatshe abaziweyo, wagwegwisa imikhondo yami.
Lam 3:10 Ukimi njengebhere eliqamekelayo nengonyama ezindaweni ezisithekileyo.
Lam 3:11 Wachezukisa izindlela zami, wangidwengula, wangenza incithakalo.
Lam 3:12 Wansala umnsalo wakhe, wangimisa ngibe yisigcibisholo somcibisholo.
Lam 3:13 Wahlaba izinso zami ngemicibisholo yesambo sakhe.
Lam 3:14 Sengingohlekwayo kubantu bonke, ngihaywa usuku lonke.
Lam 3:15 Wangisuthisa ngokubabayo, wangigcwalisa ngomhlonyane.
Lam 3:16 Waphula amazinyo ami ngohlalwane, wangembesa umlotha.
Lam 3:17 Walahla kude nokuthula umphefumulo wami, ngakhohlwa inhlanhla.
Lam 3:18 Ngathi: “Amandla ami nethemba lami kuJehova kuphelile.”
Lam 3:19 Khumbula ukuhlupheka kwami nosizi lwami, umhlonyane nenyongo.
Lam 3:20 Umphefumulo wami uyakukhumbula nokukukhumbula, uthobile phakathi kwami.
Lam 3:21 Kepha yilokhu engiyakukubuyisela enhliziyweni yami, ngalokho nginethemba:
Lam 3:22 ngumusa kaJehova ukuthi asiqediwe, ngokuba ububele bakhe abupheli.
Lam 3:23 Busha ekuseni njalo; ukuthembeka kwakho kukhulu.
Lam 3:24 UJehova uyisabelo sami, usho umphefumulo wami; ngakho ngiyakwethemba kuye.
Lam 3:25 UJehova muhle kwabamethembayo, kumphefumulo omfunayo.
Lam 3:26 Kuhle ukumethemba nokulindela ngokuthula ukusindisa kukaJehova.
Lam 3:27 Kuhle kumuntu ukuba athwale ijoka ebusheni bakhe.
Lam 3:28 Makahlale yedwa, athule, lapho emthwesa lona.
Lam 3:29 Makabeke umlomo wakhe othulini; mhlawumbe kungaba khona ithemba.
Lam 3:30 Makanike isihlathi sakhe komshayayo, asuthe ngenhlamba.
Lam 3:31 Ngokuba uJehova akayikulahla kuze kube phakade.
Lam 3:32 Ngokuba noma edabukisile, uyakuhawukela nokho ngokobukhulu bomusa wakhe.
Lam 3:33 Ngokuba akahluphi, angadabukisi abantwana babantu ngenxa yokuba ekuthanda.
Lam 3:34 Ukuphahlaza phansi kwezinyawo zonke iziboshwa zasemhlabeni,
Lam 3:35 nokuchezukisa imfanelo yomuntu phambi kobuso boPhezukonke,
Lam 3:36 nokona umuntu ecaleni lakhe, iNkosi ayikuboni lokhu na?
Lam 3:37 Kwasho ubani, kwenzakala, iNkosi ingakuyalelanga, na?
Lam 3:38 Akuphumi okuhle nokubi emlonyeni woPhezukonke na?
Lam 3:39 Ukhononelani umuntu ophilayo, umuntu ojeziswa ngezono zakhe, na?
Lam 3:40 Masiphenye, sicinge izindlela zethu, sibuyele kuJehova.
Lam 3:41 Masiphakamise izinhliziyo zethu kanye nezandla zethu kuNkulunkulu ezulwini.
Lam 3:42 Siphambukile, sahlubuka; wena awukuyekelanga.
Lam 3:43 Wazembesa ulaka, wasixosha, wabulala, ungahawukelanga.
Lam 3:44 Wazembesa ifu, ukuze imikhuleko yethu ingafinyeleli.
Lam 3:45 Usenze umphucuzo nemfucumfucu phakathi kwabantu.
Lam 3:46 Zonke izitha zethu zisikhamisele imilomo yazo.
Lam 3:47 Uvalo nomgodi kusehlele, ukubhujiswa nokuchithwa.
Lam 3:48 Iso lami liyamululeka imifula yamanzi ngenxa yokuchithwa kwendodakazi yabantu bami.
Lam 3:49 Iso lami liyamululeka, alinqamuki; akukho ukukhawuka,
Lam 3:50 aze abheke uJehova, abone esezulwini.
Lam 3:51 Iso lami lenza umphefumulo wami ube buhlungu ngenxa yawo onke amadodakazi omuzi wakithi.
Lam 3:52 Abayizitha zami ngeze bangizingele nokungizingela njengenyoni.
Lam 3:53 Banqume ukuphila kwami emgodini, bangiphonsa ngetshe.
Lam 3:54 Amanzi aminzisa ikhanda lami. Ngathi: “Nginqunyiwe.”
Lam 3:55 Ngalibiza igama lakho, Jehova, ngisemgodini phansi.
Lam 3:56 Wezwa izwi lami; ungasithezi indlebe yakho lapho ngikhalela ukusizwa.
Lam 3:57 Wasondela ngosuku lokubiza kwami, wathi: “Ungesabi.”
Lam 3:58 Nkosi, umela indaba yomphefumulo wami, uyahlenga ukuphila kwami.
Lam 3:59 Jehova, uyabona ukoniwa kwami; thetha indaba yami.
Lam 3:60 Uyabona konke ukuphindisa kwabo nawo onke amacebo abo ngami.
Lam 3:61 Uyezwa inhlamba yabo, Jehova, nawo onke amacebo abo ngami,
Lam 3:62 izindebe zabangivukeleyo nemicabango yabo ngami izinsuku zonke.
Lam 3:63 Bheka ukuhlala kwabo nokuvuka kwabo; ngihaywa yibo.
Lam 3:64 Uyakubaphindisela, Jehova, ngokwemisebenzi yezandla zabo.
Lam 3:65 Uyakubanika isimbozo senhliziyo, isiqalekiso sakho sibe phezu kwabo.
Lam 3:66 Uyakubaxosha ngentukuthelo, ubabhubhise, bangabe besaba khona phansi kwezulu likaJehova.
Lam 4:1 Yeka ukufiphala kwegolide nokuguquka kwegolide elihle! Amatshe endlu engcwele ahlakazekile ezingosini zazo zonke izitaladi.
Lam 4:2 Amadodana anqabileyo aseSiyoni, elingene negolide elihle, yeka ukuthiwa kwawo ayizitsha zebumba, imisebenzi yezandla zombumbi!
Lam 4:3 Namakhanka ehlisa, ancelise amazinyane awo. Indodakazi yabantu bami isinonya, njengezintshe zasehlane.
Lam 4:4 Ulimi loncelayo lunamathela olwangeni lwakhe ngokoma. Izingane zicela isinkwa, kepha akakho ozihlephulelayo.
Lam 4:5 Abakade bedla okumnandi sebechithakele ezitaladini. Ababekhuliswa ngokububende sebesingatha izala.
Lam 4:6 Ukona kwendodakazi yabantu bami kukhulu kunesono saseSodoma elachithwa ngokuphazima kweso, kungasondelanga zandla kulo.
Lam 4:7 Abakhulu balo babehlambulukile kunongqoqwane, babe mhlophe kunobisi; imizimba yabo yayibomvana kunekorali, isimo sabo sasinjengesafire.
Lam 4:8 Ubuso babo sebumnyama kunelahle, abaziwa ezitaladini. Isikhumba sabo sinamathela emathanjeni abo, sishwabene, saba njengomuthi.
Lam 4:9 Babe ngcono ababebulawa ngenkemba kunababebulawa ngendlala, ababuna behlatshiwe ngokuswela ukudla kwensimu.
Lam 4:10 Izandla zabesifazane abahawukelayo zapheka izingane zabo; zazingukudla kwabo ngokuchithwa kwendodakazi yabantu bami.
Lam 4:11 UJehova ufezile ukufutheka kwakhe, uthululile ukufutheka kwentukuthelo yakhe; uphembile umlilo eSiyoni oqedile izisekelo zalo.
Lam 4:12 Amakhosi omhlaba ayengakholwa kanye nabo bonke abakhileyo ezweni ukuthi abamelene nabo nezitha zabo babeyakungena emasangweni aseJerusalema.
Lam 4:13 Kungenxa yezono zabaprofethi balo nobubi babapristi balo ababechitha igazi labalungileyo phakathi kwalo.
Lam 4:14 Bazulazula njengezimpumputhe ezitaladini, bengcolile ngegazi ngangokuba zazingenakuthintwa izingubo zabo.
Lam 4:15 “Chezukani, ningcolile!” bamemeza kubo: “Chezukani, chezukani, ningathinti!” Lapho bebaleka bezulazula, bathi phakathi kwabezizwe: “Abasayikugogobala lapha.”
Lam 4:16 Ubuso bukaJehova buyabahlakaza, akasayikubanakekela. Abahloniphi ubuso babapristi, kababanga namusa kumalunga.
Lam 4:17 Amehlo ethu ayaphela ukubheka usizo lwethu oluyize; ekulindeni kwethu silindela isizwe esingenakusindisa.
Lam 4:18 Bazingela izinyathelo zethu ukuba singahambi ezigcawini zethu. Ukugcina kwethu kuseduze, izinsuku zethu zigcwele, yebo, ukugcina kwethu kufikile.
Lam 4:19 Abasixoshayo babenejubane kunezinkozi zezulu; basizingela ezintabeni, basiqamekela ehlane.
Lam 4:20 Umoya wamakhala ethu, ogcotshiweyo kaJehova, wabanjwa emigodini yabo, esathi ngaye: “Phansi kwethunzi lakhe siyakuphila phakathi kwezizwe.”
Lam 4:21 Jabula, uthokoze, ndodakazi yakwa-Edomi, ohlala ezweni lase-Uzi. Indebe iyakudlulela nakuwena; uyakudakwa, uzenze nqunu.
Lam 4:22 Ububi bakho sebuphelile, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, kasayikukuthumba. Ububi bakho, ndodakazi yakwa-Edomi, uyakubuhambela, azambule izono zakho.
Lam 5:1 Khumbula, Jehova, esehlelwe yikho; bheka, ubone ihlazo lethu.
Lam 5:2 Ifa lethu seliphendulelwe abafokazi, nezindlu zethu kwabezizwe.
Lam 5:3 Siyizintandane, asinababa; omame banjengabafelokazi.
Lam 5:4 Amanzi ethu siyawaphuza ngemali, izinkuni zethu ziza ngentengo.
Lam 5:5 Abasixoshayo basezintayeni zethu; sikhathele, asinakuphumula.
Lam 5:6 Sinike isandla sethu kulo iGibithe nakulo i-Asiriya ukuba sisuthe isinkwa.
Lam 5:7 Obaba bona abasekho; thina sithwala ububi babo.
Lam 5:8 Izigqila ziyasibusa; akakho osikhulula esandleni sabo.
Lam 5:9 Sithola ukudla kwethu ngokuzidela amathambo ngenxa yenkemba yasehlane.
Lam 5:10 Isikhumba sethu siyasha njengeziko ngokushisa kwendlala.
Lam 5:11 Balala nabesifazane eSiyoni, izintombi zasemizini yakwaJuda.
Lam 5:12 Izikhulu zaphanyekwa ngezandla zabo; ubuso babadala ababuhloniphanga.
Lam 5:13 Izinsizwa zathwala amatshe okugaya, abantwana bakhubeka phansi kwezinkuni.
Lam 5:14 Abadala baphelile esangweni, nezinsizwa ekuhlabeleleni kwazo.
Lam 5:15 Intokozo yenhliziyo yethu iphelile; ukusina kwethu kuphenduke ukulila.
Lam 5:16 Umqhele uwile ekhanda lethu. Maye kithina, ngokuba sonile!
Lam 5:17 Ngalokho inhliziyo yethu idangele; ngalezi zinto amehlo ethu afiphele,
Lam 5:18 ngenxa yentaba yaseSiyoni echithekile, zize zihambe kuyo izimpungushe.
Lam 5:19 Wena Jehova umi phakade; isihlalo sakho sobukhosi sikhona ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Lam 5:20 Usikhohlelwani kuze kube phakade, usishiye izinsuku eziningi, na?
Lam 5:21 Sibuyisele kuwe Jehova, siyakubuya; yenza izinsuku zethu zibe zintsha njengasendulo,
Lam 5:22 ngokuba usilahlile nokusilahla, wasithukuthelela kakhulu.
Ezek 1:1 Kwathi ngomnyaka wamashumi amathathu ngenyanga yesine ngolwesihlanu, ngiphakathi kwabathunjwa ngasemfuleni iKhebari, lavuleka izulu, ngabona imibono ngoNkulunkulu.
Ezek 1:2 Ngolwesihlanu lwenyanga ngomnyaka wesihlanu wokuthunjwa kukaJehoyakini
Ezek 1:3 izwi likaJehova lafika kuHezekeli umpristi, indodana kaBuzi, ezweni lamaKaledi ngasemfuleni iKhebari. Isandla sikaJehova sasiphezu kwakhe lapho.
Ezek 1:4 Ngabona, bheka, kwavela umoya wesivunguvungu enyakatho, ifu elikhulu elinomlilo ovuthayo nokukhanya nxazonke zalo, kuphuma phakathi kwalo kungathi ithusi elikhazimulayo, kuvela emlilweni.
Ezek 1:5 Phakathi kwakho kwaphuma umfanekiso wezidalwa ezine, nesimo sazo sasiyilesi: zafana nabantu,
Ezek 1:6 kepha yileso naleso sasinobuso obune, futhi sasinamaphiko amane;
Ezek 1:7 imilenze yazo yayiqondile, amathe ezinyawo zazo ayenjengamathe ezinyawo zethole; zazimenyezela njengethusi eliphucuziweyo.
Ezek 1:8 Zazinezandla zomuntu phansi kwamaphiko azo ezinhlangothini zazo zozine. Ubuso namaphiko alezi ezine kwakunje:
Ezek 1:9 amaphiko azo ayehlangene, elinye nelinye; aziphendukanga ekuhambeni kwazo, yileso naleso sahamba ngokuqonda kobuso baso.
Ezek 1:10 Isimo sobuso bazo sasingubuso bomuntu, zozine zinobuso bengonyama ngakwesokunene, zozine zinobuso benkomo ngakwesokhohlo, zozine zinobuso bokhozi futhi.
Ezek 1:11 Babunjalo ubuso bazo. Amaphiko azo ayahlukene phezulu; kuleso naleso amabili ayehlangene, elinye nelinye; amabili ayembesa imizimba yazo.
Ezek 1:12 Zahamba zonke ngokuqonda kobuso bazo, zaya khona, lapho umoya wayethanda ukuya khona, aziphendukanga ekuhambeni kwazo.
Ezek 1:13 Isimo sezidalwa sasinjengamalahle omlilo avutha njengezibani, ahambahamba phakathi kwezidalwa; umlilo wamenyezela, nasemlilweni kwaphuma unyazi.
Ezek 1:14 Izidalwa zagijima, zabuya njengombani.
Ezek 1:15 Ngisabuka izidalwa, bheka, nanto isondo emhlabathini eceleni kwezidalwa, kuleso naleso sazo zozine.
Ezek 1:16 Ukubonakala kwamasondo nokwenziwa kwawo kwakunjengekrisolithe, nezimo zawo omane zaziyintonye. Ukubonakala kwawo nokwenziwa kwawo kwakunjengokuba kukhona isondo phakathi kwesondo.
Ezek 1:17 Ekuhambeni kwawo aya ezinhlangothini zozine; awaphendukanga ekuhambeni kwawo.
Ezek 1:18 Amafelange awo ayephakeme, ayesabeka; amafelange omane ayegcwele amehlo nxazonke.
Ezek 1:19 Ekuhambeni kwezidalwa amasondo ahamba eceleni kwazo, nasekuphakanyisweni kwezidalwa emhlabeni namasondo aphakanyiswa.
Ezek 1:20 Lapho umoya wayethanda ukuya khona, aya khona, yebo, lapho umoya wayethanda khona; namasondo aphakanyiswa kanye nazo, ngokuba umoya wezidalwa wayesemasondweni.
Ezek 1:21 Ekuhambeni kwazo nawo ahamba; ekumeni kwazo nawo ema; ekuphakanyisweni kwazo emhlabeni aphakanyiswa namasondo kanye nazo, ngokuba umoya wezidalwa wayesemasondweni.
Ezek 1:22 Phezu kwamakhanda ezidalwa kwakukhona kungathi umkhathi unjengekristalu elimangalisayo, owenekwe phezu kwamakhanda azo phezulu.
Ezek 1:23 Phansi komkhathi amaphiko azo ayeqondene, elinye nelinye, yileso naleso sinamabili embesa imizimba yazo ngalapha, sinamabili embesa ngalapha.
Ezek 1:24 Ekuhambeni kwazo ngezwa umsindo wamaphiko azo njengomsindo wamanzi amaningi njengezwi likaSomandla, nomsindo wesidumo njengomsindo wempi; ekumeni kwazo zawehlisa amaphiko azo.
Ezek 1:25 Kwavela izwi phezu komkhathi owawuphezu kwamakhanda azo; ekumeni kwazo zawehlisa amaphiko azo.
Ezek 1:26 Phezu komkhathi owawuphezu kwamakhanda azo kwakunjengokungathi isihlalo sobukhosi, isimo saso sinjengetshe lesafire. Phezu kokwakunjengesihlalo sobukhosi kwakukhona okufana nomuntu phezu kwaso ngaphezulu.
Ezek 1:27 Ngase ngibona okunjengethusi elikhazimulayo, kufana nomlilo phakathi kwakho nxazonke, kusukela kokungathi ukhalo lwakhe kuya phezulu; kusukela kokungathi ukhalo lwakhe kuya ngaphansi ngabona okufana nomlilo; kwamenyezela nxazonke kwawo.
Ezek 1:28 Njengothingo olusemafwini ngosuku lwemvula kwabonakala kanjalo ukumenyezela nxazonke. Kwakunjengesimo senkazimulo kaJehova. Lapho ngiyibona, ngawa ngobuso, ngezwa izwi lokhulumayo.
Ezek 2:1 Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, yima ngezinyawo zakho, ngiyakukhuluma nawe.”
Ezek 2:2 Kwangena kimi uMoya esakhuluma kimi, wangimisa ngezinyawo zami, ngamuzwa owakhuluma kimi.
Ezek 2:3 Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, ngiyakuthuma kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, izizwe ezambukayo ezingihlubukile; bona nawoyise baphambukile kimi kuze kube namuhla.
Ezek 2:4 Bangabantwana abanobuso obulukhuni nenhliziyo enqala; ngiyakuthuma kubo; uyakuthi kubo: ‘Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi:’
Ezek 2:5 Bona-ke, noma bezwa noma benganaki, ngokuba bayindlu ehlubukayo, bayakwazi nokho ukuthi kade ekhona umprofethi phakathi kwabo.
Ezek 2:6 Wena ndodana yomuntu, ungabesabi, ungesabi namazwi abo, noma amakhakhasi nameva kukuwe, uhlezi phakathi kwawofezela; ungawesabi amazwi abo, ungapheli amandla ngobuso babo, ngokuba bayindlu ehlubukayo.
Ezek 2:7 Uyakukhuluma amazwi ami kubo, noma bezwa noma benganaki, ngokuba bangabahlubuki.
Ezek 2:8 Kepha wena ndodana yomuntu, yizwa engikukhulumayo kuwe, ungabi ngumhlubuki njengale ndlu ehlubukayo; vula umlomo wakho, udle engikunika khona.”
Ezek 2:9 Ngase ngibheka, naso isandla saselulelwe kimi, naphakathi kwaso, bheka, ngumqulu wencwadi.
Ezek 2:10 Waweneka phambi kwami; wawulotshiwe ngaphakathi nangaphandle, kubhaliwe kuwo izililo nezililiselo, nokuthi: “Maye!”
Ezek 3:1 Wayesethi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, yidla okufumanayo, udle lo mqulu, uye ukhulume kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli.”
Ezek 3:2 Ngavula umlomo wami, wangidlisa umqulu.
Ezek 3:3 Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, sidlise isisu sakho, ugcwalise izibilini zakho ngalo mqulu engikunika wona.” Ngase ngiwudla, wawumnandi emlonyeni wami njengezinyosi.
Ezek 3:4 Wayesethi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, hamba uye endlini yakwa-Israyeli, ukhulume kuyo ngamazwi ami.
Ezek 3:5 Ngokuba awuthunywa kubantu abankulumo yabo ilukhuni nolimi lwabo lungaqondakali, kepha endlini yakwa-Israyeli,
Ezek 3:6 kungekubantu abaningi abankulumo yabo ilukhuni nolimi lwabo lungaqondakali, ongawezwa amazwi abo. Impela uma bengikuthume kubo, bona babeyakukuzwa.
Ezek 3:7 Kepha indlu yakwa-Israyeli kayiyikukuzwa, ngokuba ayingizwa mina, lokhu indlu yakwa-Israyeli inebunzi elilukhuni nenhliziyo enqala.
Ezek 3:8 Bheka, ngenze ubuso bakho bube lukhuni njengobuso babo, nebunzi lakho libe nqala njengamabunzi abo.
Ezek 3:9 Ngenze ibunzi lakho njengedayimani, elilukhuni kunensengetsha; ungabesabi, ungapheli amandla ngobuso babo, noma beyindlu ehlubukayo.”
Ezek 3:10 Futhi wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, onke amazwi ami engiyakuwakhuluma kuwe wamukele enhliziyweni yakho, uzwe ngezindlebe zakho.
Ezek 3:11 Hamba uye kubathunjwa, kubantwana babantu bakho, ukhulume kubo, uthi kubo: ‘Isho njalo iNkosi uJehova,’ noma bezwa noma benganaki.”
Ezek 3:12 Wayesengiphakamisa uMoya, ngezwa emva kwami izwi lokuduma okukhulu, lathi: “Mayibusiswe inkazimulo kaJehova endaweni yakhe;”
Ezek 3:13 nomsindo wamaphiko ezidalwa athintanayo, nomsindo wamasondo eceleni kwazo, umsindo wokukhulu ukuduma.
Ezek 3:14 UMoya wayesengiphakamisa, wangisusa; ngahamba nginomunyu ngokufutheka komoya wami; isandla sikaJehova saba namandla phezu kwami.
Ezek 3:15 Ngafika kubathunjwa ngaseTheli Abibi ababehlezi ngasemfuleni iKhebari, lapho babehlala khona; ngahlala khona phakathi kwabo izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ngimangele.
Ezek 3:16 Kwathi ekugcineni kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi:
Ezek 3:17 “Ndodana yomuntu, ngikwenze umlindi kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli; ngalokho yizwa izwi emlonyeni wami, ungixwayisele bona.
Ezek 3:18 Lapho ngithi komubi: ‘Uyakufa nokufa,’ bese wungamxwayisi, ungakhulumi ukumxwayisa omubi ngendlela yakhe ukuba umsindise, yena lowo omubi uyakufela ezonweni zakhe, kepha igazi lakhe ngiyakulibiza esandleni sakho.
Ezek 3:19 Kepha wena, uma umxwayisa omubi, angaze abuya ebubini bakhe nasendleleni yakhe embi, uyakufela ezonweni zakhe, kepha wena uwophulile umphefumulo wakho.
Ezek 3:20 “Lapho olungileyo ephenduka ekulungeni kwakhe, enze okubi, ngibeke isikhubekiso phambi kwakhe, uyakufa. Uma ungamxwayisanga, uyakufela ezonweni zakhe, nezenzo zakhe ezilungileyo azenzileyo aziyikukhunjulwa, kepha igazi lakhe ngiyakulibiza esandleni sakho.
Ezek 3:21 Kepha uma umxwayisa olungileyo ukuba olungileyo angoni, abese engoni, uyakuphila nokuphila, ngokuba exwayile; wena-ke uwophulile umphefumulo wakho.”
Ezek 3:22 Isandla sikaJehova saba phezu kwami lapho, wathi kimi: “Suka, uphume uye ethafeni, ngiyakukhuluma nawe khona.”
Ezek 3:23 Ngasuka, ngaphuma ngaya ethafeni; bheka, inkazimulo kaJehova yayimi khona njengenkazimulo engayibona ngasemfuleni iKhebari, ngawa ngobuso bami.
Ezek 3:24 UMoya wayesengena kimi, wangimisa ngezinyawo zami, wakhuluma kimi, wathi kimi: “Hamba uzivalele endlini yakho.
Ezek 3:25 Kepha wena ndodana yomuntu, bheka, bayakufaka amagoda kuwe, bakubophe ngawo; awuyikuphumela phakathi kwabo.
Ezek 3:26 Ngiyakunamathelisa ulimi lwakho olwangeni lwakho ukuba ube yisimungulu, ungabi ngumuntu obayalayo, ngokuba bayindlu ehlubukayo.
Ezek 3:27 Kepha lapho ngikhuluma nawe, ngiyakuwuvula umlomo wakho, wena uthi kubo: ‘Isho njalo iNkosi uJehova.’ Ozwayo makezwe, onganakiyo kayeke, ngokuba bayindlu ehlubukayo.
Ezek 4:1 “Wena ndodana yomuntu, zithathele isitini, usibeke phambi kwakho, uqophe kuso umuzi, iJerusalema,
Ezek 4:2 uwuvimbezele, wakhe inqaba ngakuwo, uwunqwabele iduli, umise amakamu ngakuwo, ubeke ngakuwo nxazonke izinqama zokungqubuza.
Ezek 4:3 Zithathele ucwecwe lwensimbi, ulubeke lube ludonga lwensimbi phakathi kwakho nomuzi, uqondise ubuso bakho kuwo, wona uvinjezelwe, uvinjezelwe nguwe. Lokhu kuyakuba yisibonakaliso kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli.
Ezek 4:4 “Futhi lala ngohlangothi lwakho lwasokhohlo, ubeke ukona kuka-Israyeli phezu kwalo; ngokomumo wezinsuku zokulala kwakho ngalo uyakuthwala ukona kwabo.
Ezek 4:5 Ngokuba ngikunqumele iminyaka yokona kwabo ukuba ibe ngumumo wezinsuku, zingamakhulu amathathu namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye, bese wuthwala ukona kwendlu yakwa-Israyeli.
Ezek 4:6 “Nxa usuziqedile lezi, uyakulala ngohlangothi lwakho lokunene, uthwale ukona kwendlu yakwaJuda, ngikunqumele izinsuku ezingamashumi amane, yilolo nalolo suku lube ngumnyaka.
Ezek 4:7 Uyakubhekisa ubuso bakho kukho ukuvinjezelwa kweJerusalema, ingalo yakho yambuliwe, uprofethe ngalo.
Ezek 4:8 Bheka, ngifaka amagoda phezu kwakho, awuyikuphenduka uhlangothi ngohlangothi, uze uqede izinsuku zokuvimbezela kwakho.
Ezek 4:9 “Futhi zithathele ukolweni, nebhali, nobhontshisi, nembumba, nonyaluthi, nesipelite, ukubeke esitsheni sibe sinye, uzenzele isinkwa ngakho ngokomumo wezinsuku oyakulala ngazo ngohlangothi lwakho, izinsuku ezingamakhulu amathathu namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye, usidle.
Ezek 4:10 Ukudla kwakho oyakukudla kuyakuba ngesilinganiso, amashekeli angamashumi amabili ngosuku, ukudle izikhathi ngezikhathi.
Ezek 4:11 Namanzi uyakuwaphuza ngesilinganiso, inxenye yesithupha yehini, uphuze izikhathi ngezikhathi.
Ezek 4:12 Uyakukudla kungathi amaqebelengwane ebhali, uwenze phambi kwabo ngendle ephuma kumuntu.”
Ezek 4:13 Wathi uJehova: “Kanjalo nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayakusidla isinkwa sabo singcolile phakathi kwezizwe engiyakubaxoshela kuzo.”
Ezek 4:14 Ngase ngithi: “O Nkosi Jehova, bheka, umphefumulo wami awuzange ungcoliswe, ngokuba kusukela ebusheni bami kuze kube manje angidlanga okuzifeleyo nokudweshuliweyo, nenyama enengekayo ayingenanga emlonyeni wami.”
Ezek 4:15 Wathi kimi: “Bheka, ngikunike umquba esikhundleni sendle yomuntu; uyakusenza isinkwa sakho phezu kwawo.”
Ezek 4:16 Wathi futhi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, bheka, ngiyakwaphula uzime lwesinkwa eJerusalema, badle isinkwa ngesilinganiso ngokwesaba, baphuze amanzi ngesilinganiso ngokumangala
Ezek 4:17 ukuba baswele isinkwa namanzi, bamangale omunye nomunye, babune ebubini babo.
Ezek 5:1 “Wena ndodana yomuntu, zithathele inkemba ebukhali, uzithathele yona njengempuco yomgundi, uyihambise ekhanda lakho nasesilevini sakho, uzithathele isilinganiso sokulinganisa, wahlukanise izinwele.
Ezek 5:2 Inxenye yesithathu uyakuyishisa ngomlilo phakathi komuzi, seziphelile izinsuku zokuvinjezelwa, uthathe enye inxenye yesithathu, ugalele ngenkemba nxazonke zayo, nenye inxenye yesithathu uyihlakaze emoyeni, ngihoshe inkemba emva kwazo.
Ezek 5:3 Uyakuthatha khona eziyingcosana, uzibophele emiphethweni yengubo yakho.
Ezek 5:4 Futhi kuzona uyakuthatha, uziphonse phakathi komlilo, uzishise ngomlilo; kuyakuvela lapho umlilo, ungene endlini yonke yakwa-Israyeli.
Ezek 5:5 “Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Lokhu kuyiJerusalema; ngilibekile phakathi kwezizwe, namazwe ayalihaqa.
Ezek 5:6 Uhlubukile izahlulelo zami ngokwenza okubi kunezizwe, nezimiso zami kunamazwe alihaqayo, ngokuba balahlile izahlulelo zami nezimiso zami, abahambanga ngazo.
Ezek 5:7 “Ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Ngokuba nibanga umsindo kunezizwe ezinihaqayo, ningahambi ngezimiso zami, ningazigcinanga izahlulelo zami, ningenzanga ngemithetho yezizwe ezinihaqayo,
Ezek 5:8 ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Bheka, mina, yebo, mina ngimelene nawe; ngiyakwenza izahlulelo phakathi kwakho emehlweni ezizwe.
Ezek 5:9 Ngiyakwenza kuwe lokho engingazange ngikwenze, nengingasayikukwenza okunjengakho ngenxa yazo zonke izinengiso zakho.
Ezek 5:10 Ngalokho oyise bayakudla abantwana babo phakathi kwakho, abantwana badle oyise, ngenze izahlulelo phakathi kwakho, ngihlakaze kuyo yonke imimoya yonke insali yakho.
Ezek 5:11 Ngalokho, kuphila kwami, isho iNkosi uJehova, ngokuba uyingcolisile indlu yami engcwele ngakho konke okuzondekayo kwakho nangazo zonke izinengiso zakho, ngalokho ngiyakukunciphisa impela, iso lami lingahawukeli, ngingabi nabubele.
Ezek 5:12 Inxenye yesithathu yakho iyakufa ngesifo, baphele nangendlala phakathi kwakho; inxenye yesithathu iyakuwa ngenkemba nxazonke zakho, nenxenye yesithathu iyakuhlakazwa kuyo yonke imimoya, ngihoshe inkemba emva kwabo.
Ezek 5:13 “Isiyakuphela intukuthelo yami, nganelise ukufutheka kwami ngabo, ngiduduzeke; bayakwazi ukuthi mina Jehova ngikhulumile ngomhawu wami, lapho sengifezile ukufutheka kwami ngabo.
Ezek 5:14 “Ngiyakukwenza ube yincithakalo nehlazo phakathi kwezizwe ezikuhaqayo emehlweni abo bonke abadlulayo.
Ezek 5:15 Kuyakuba yihlazo, nesaga, nesifundiso, nesimangaliso kuzo izizwe ezikuhaqayo, lapho ngenza izahlulelo phakathi kwakho ngentukuthelo nangokufutheka nangezijeziso ezifuthayo. Mina Jehova ngikhulumile.
Ezek 5:16 Lapho ngithumela kini imicibisholo emibi yendlala eyakuba ngukuchitheka kwabo, engiyakuyithuma ukunichitha, ngiyakukhulisa indlala phezu kwenu, ngaphule uzime lwenu lwesinkwa,
Ezek 5:17 ngithumele kini indlala nezilwane ezimbi, zikwaphuce abantwana, kudlule phezu kwakho isifo negazi, ngehlisele inkemba phezu kwakho. Mina Jehova ngikhulumile.”
Ezek 6:1 Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi:
Ezek 6:2 “Ndodana yomuntu, bhekisa ubuso bakho ezintabeni zakwa-Israyeli, uprofethe ngazo, uthi:
Ezek 6:3 ‘Nina zintaba zakwa-Israyeli, yizwani izwi leNkosi uJehova kuzo izintaba nakuwo amagquma, kuyo imifula yamanzi nakuzo izigodi, lithi: Bhekani, ngiyakwehlisela phezu kwenu inkemba, ngichithe izindawo zenu eziphakemeyo.
Ezek 6:4 Ama-altare enu ayakuba yincithakalo, kwaphulwe ama-altare enu empepho, ngilahle ababuleweyo benu phambi kwezithombe zenu.
Ezek 6:5 Ngiyakubeka izidumbu zabantwana bakwa-Israyeli phambi kwezithombe zabo, ngihlakaze amathambo enu nxazonke zama-altare enu.
Ezek 6:6 Kuzo zonke izindawo zokuhlala kwenu imizi iyakuchithwa, izindawo eziphakemeyo zibe yincithakalo ukuba kuchithwe ama-altare enu, achitheke, kwaphulwe izithombe zenu ziphele, ama-altare enu empepho abhidlizwe, imisebenzi yenu ihlangulwe.
Ezek 6:7 Ababulawayo bayakuwa phakathi kwenu, nazi ukuthi mina nginguJehova.
Ezek 6:8 “ ‘Kepha ngiyakushiya insali, nibe nabayakuphepha enkembeni phakathi kwezizwe, lapho nihlakazeka emazweni.
Ezek 6:9 Abaphephayo benu bayakungikhumbula phakathi kwezizwe abayakuthunjelwa kuzo, lapho ngaphula izinhliziyo zabo eziphingayo, ezichezukile kimi, namehlo abo alandela izithombe zabo ukuba baphinge nazo, banengwe emehlweni abo ngokubi abakwenzileyo ezinengisweni zabo zonke.
Ezek 6:10 Bayakwazi ukuthi nginguJehova; angishongo ngeze ukuthi ngiyakwenza lokhu okubi kubo.
Ezek 6:11 “ ‘Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Shaya ngesandla sakho, udubhuze ngonyawo lwakho, uthi: “Maye, ngenxa yazo zonke izinengiso ezimbi zendlu yakwa-Israyeli!” Ngokuba bayakuwa ngenkemba, nangendlala, nangesifo.
Ezek 6:12 Okude uyakufa ngesifo, oseduze uyakuwa ngenkemba, oseleyo evinjezelwe uyakufa ngendlala, ngifeze kanjalo ukufutheka kwami kubo.
Ezek 6:13 Niyakwazi ukuthi nginguJehova, lapho ababuleweyo babo beyakuba phakathi kwezithombe zabo nxazonke zama-altare abo kuwo onke amagquma aphakemeyo, nakuzo zonke iziqongo zezintaba, naphansi kwayo yonke imithi eluhlaza, naphansi kwawo onke ama-oki adumbileyo, izindawo lapho bebenikela khona ngephunga elimnandi kuzo zonke izithombe zabo.
Ezek 6:14 Ngiyakuselulela kubo isandla sami, ngenze izwe libe yincithakalo nokuyize kunehlane laseDibila kuzo zonke izindawo zabo zokuhlala, bazi ukuthi nginguJehova.’ ”
Ezek 7:1 Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi:
Ezek 7:2 “Wena ndodana yomuntu, isho kanje iNkosi uJehova kulo izwe lakwa-Israyeli, ithi: Ukuphela! Ukuphela kufikile emagumbini omane ezwe.
Ezek 7:3 Ukuphela sekuphezu kwakho; ngiyakuthuma ukufutheka kwami, ngikwahlulele njengezindlela zakho, ngehlisele phezu kwakho zonke izinengiso zakho.
Ezek 7:4 Iso lami aliyikukuhawukela, ngingabi nabubele; ngiyakwehlisela izindlela zakho phezu kwakho, izinengiso zakho zibe phakathi kwakho; niyakwazi ukuthi nginguJehova.
Ezek 7:5 “Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Ingozi! Ingozi inye nje! Bheka, iyeza.
Ezek 7:6 Ukuphela kuyeza; ukuphela kuyeza, kuyakwehlela; bheka, kuyeza!
Ezek 7:7 Sekufikile kuwe ohlala ezweni; isikhathi sesifikile, usuku lusondele, olokukhathazeka, kungesilo olokujabula ezintabeni.
Ezek 7:8 Manje sengiyakuthulula masinyane ukufutheka kwami phezu kwakho, ngifeze intukuthelo yami kuwe, ngikwahlulele njengezindlela zakho, ngehlisele phezu kwakho zonke izinengiso zakho.
Ezek 7:9 Iso lami aliyikuhawukela, ngingabi nabubele, ngehlisele phezu kwakho njengezindlela zakho, izinengiso zakho zibe phakathi kwakho, nazi ukuthi mina Jehova ngiyashaya.
Ezek 7:10 “Bhekani usuku! Bhekani luyeza, sekuphezu kwakho; induku iyaqhakaza; ukuzidla kuyahluma.
Ezek 7:11 Ubudlova buyavuka, bube yintonga yokubi, kungasali muntu kubo nasesixukwini sabo, kungasali lutho emfuyweni yabo nasebukhosini babo.
Ezek 7:12 Isikhathi sesifikile, usuku lusondele; umthengi makangathokozi, nomthengisi makangalili, ngokuba ukufutheka kuphezu kwaso sonke isixuku sabo.
Ezek 7:13 Ngokuba umthengisi akayikubuyela kokuthengisiweyo, nakuba esekhona phakathi kwabaphilayo, ngokuba umbono wesixuku sonke awuyikubuya, futhi akuyikubakho muntu ongabambelela ekuphileni ngenxa yobubi bakhe.
Ezek 7:14 Babethile icilongo, balungisile konke, kepha akakho ophuma impi, ngokuba ukufutheka kwami kuphezu kwaso sonke isixuku sabo.
Ezek 7:15 “Yinkemba ngaphandle, yisifo nendlala ngaphakathi; osensimini uyakufa ngenkemba, osemzini uyakuqedwa yindlala nesifo.
Ezek 7:16 Abaphunyukileyo babo bayakuphunyuka, babe sezintabeni njengamajuba asezigodini, bakhale bonke, kube yilowo nalowo ngezono zakhe.
Ezek 7:17 Zonke izandla ziyakudangala, nawo onke amadolo abe buthakathaka njengamanzi.
Ezek 7:18 Bayakubhinca izindwangu zamasaka, uvalo lubasibekele, amahloni abe sebusweni bonke, nobumpandla kuwo onke amakhanda abo.
Ezek 7:19 Bayakuphonsa isiliva labo ezitaladini, igolide labo libe yinto engcolileyo, isiliva labo negolide labo kungabi namandla okubophula ngosuku lwentukuthelo kaJehova; abayikusuthisa imiphefumulo yabo, bangagcwalisi izibilini zabo, ngokuba kade kuyisikhubekiso sobubi babo.
Ezek 7:20 Ukukhazimula kwezimvunulo zakho bakubeka kwaba ngukuziqhenya, benza ngakho izithombe ezinengekayo nezizondekayo; ngalokho ngikwenzile kwaba yinto engcolileyo kubo.
Ezek 7:21 Ngiyakukunikela esandleni sabafokazi, kudliwe, nakwababi bomhlaba, kube yimpango, bakungcolise.
Ezek 7:22 Ngiyakufulathelisa ubuso bami kubo, balingcolise igugu lami, kungene kulo abaphangi, balingcolise.
Ezek 7:23 “Yenza iketanga, ngokuba izwe ligcwele amacala egazi, nomuzi ugcwele ubudlova.
Ezek 7:24 Ngiyakuletha izizwe ezimbi kakhulu, zidle izindlu zabo, ngiqede ukuzidla kwabanamandla, izindawo zabo ezingcwele zingcoliswe.
Ezek 7:25 Ukunqunywa kuyeza; bayakufuna ukuthula, kepha akuyikuba khona.
Ezek 7:26 Ingozi iyakwelanywa yingozi, umbiko ulandele umbiko; bayakufuna umbono womprofethi, kepha umthetho uyakuphela kumpristi nesiluleko kuwo amalunga.
Ezek 7:27 Inkosi iyakulila, isikhulu siyakwembatha incithakalo, nezandla zabantu bezwe ziyakuhlushwa; ngiyakwenza kubo njengezindlela zabo, ngibahlulele njengezimfanelo zabo, bazi ukuthi nginguJehova.”
Ezek 8:1 Kwathi ngomnyaka wesithupha ngenyanga yesithupha ngolwesihlanu lwenyanga lapho ngihlezi endlini yami, amalunga akwaJuda ehlezi ngaphambi kwami, isandla seNkosi uJehova sawela lapho phezu kwami.
Ezek 8:2 Ngase ngibona, bheka, kwakunjengokubonakala komlilo; kusukela kokungathi ukhalo kuya phansi kwakungumlilo, kusukela okhalweni kuya phezulu kwakunjengokukhazimula nanjengethusi elimenyezelayo.
Ezek 8:3 Wayeselula kungathi isandla, wangibamba ngesihluthu sekhanda lami; uMoya wangiphakamisa phakathi komhlaba nezulu, wangiyisa ngemibono kaNkulunkulu eJerusalema esivalweni sesango legceke elingaphakathi elibheke ngasenyakatho, lapho kwakukhona isihlalo sesithombe somhawu, esibanga umhawu.
Ezek 8:4 Bheka, inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli yayilapho njengokuyibona kwami esigodini.
Ezek 8:5 Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, ake uphakamise amehlo akho ngendlela yasenyakatho.” Ngase ngiwaphakamisa amehlo ami ngendlela yasenyakatho; bheka, ngasenyakatho kwesango lase-altare lesi sithombe somhawu sasisentubeni.
Ezek 8:6 Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, uyabona yini abakwenzayo, izinengiso ezinkulu indlu yakwa-Israyeli ezenzayo lapha ukuba ngidede kude nendlu yami engcwele na? Kepha uyakubuye ubone ezinye izinengiso ezinkulu.”
Ezek 8:7 Wayesengiyisa esangweni legceke. Ngabona, bheka, nanso imbobo ogangeni.
Ezek 8:8 Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, gebhula ogangeni.” Nanxa sengigebhulile ogangeni, bheka, nanko umnyango.
Ezek 8:9 Wayesethi kimi: “Ngena ubone izinengiso ezimbi abazenzayo lapha.”
Ezek 8:10 Ngangena, ngabona; bheka, zonke izimo zezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo, nezilwane ezinengekayo, nazo zonke izithombe zendlu ka-Israyeli kudwetshiwe odongeni nxazonke.
Ezek 8:11 Kwakumi phambi kwabo abantu abangamashumi ayisikhombisa bamalunga endlu yakwa-Israyeli, naphakathi kwabo uJahazaniya indodana kaShafani, kwaba yilowo nalowo enomcengezi wakhe womlilo esandleni sakhe, nephunga lefu lempepho lenyuka.
Ezek 8:12 Wayesethi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, uyabona yini akwenzayo amalunga endlu yakwa-Israyeli ebumnyameni, kube yilelo nalelo ekamelweni lalo lezithombe, na? Ngokuba athi: ‘UJehova akasiboni, uJehova ulishiyile izwe.’ ”
Ezek 8:13 Futhi wathi kimi: “Uyakubuye ubone ezinye izinengiso ezinkulu abazenzayo.”
Ezek 8:14 Wayesengiyisa esivalweni sesango lendlu kaJehova elingasenyakatho; bheka, nampo abesifazane behlezi belilela uTamuzi.
Ezek 8:15 Wathi kimi: “Uyakubona lokho wena ndodana yomuntu na? Uyakubuye ubone izinengiso ezinkulu kunalezi.”
Ezek 8:16 Wayesengingenisa egcekeni elingaphakathi lendlu kaJehova; bheka, ngasemnyango wethempeli likaJehova phakathi kompheme ne-altare kwakukhona kungathi amadoda angamashumi amabili nanhlanu efulathele ithempeli likaJehova, ubuso bawo bubhekene nempumalanga, ekhonza ilanga ngasempumalanga.
Ezek 8:17 Wathi kimi: “Uyakubona lokhu wena ndodana yomuntu na? Kuyinto elula kuyo indlu yakwaJuda ukwenza izinengiso abazenzayo lapho na? Ngokuba sebeligcwalisile izwe ngobudlova, babuye bangicunula. Bhekani, babeka amagatsha emakhaleni abo.
Ezek 8:18 Ngalokho ngiyakusebenza ngokufutheka; iso lami aliyikubahawukela, ngingabi nabubele; noma bememeza ezindlebeni zami ngezwi elikhulu, angiyikubezwa.”
Ezek 9:1 Wayesememeza ezindlebeni zami ngezwi elikhulu, ethi: “Mazisondele izijeziso zomuzi, kube yilowo nalowo abe nezikhali zokubulala esandleni sakhe.”
Ezek 9:2 Bheka, kwafika amadoda ayisithupha evela endleleni yasesangweni lasenhla, elingasenyakatho, yileyo naleyo inesikhali sokubulala esandleni sayo, enye phakathi kwawo yembethe ilineni, inophondo lukayinki womlobi ngasokhalweni lwayo. Angena, ema ngaseceleni le-altare lethusi.
Ezek 9:3 Inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli yayenyukile ekherubini eyayiphezu kwalo, yaya embundwini wendlu, wayibiza indoda eyembethe ilineni, eyayinophondo lukayinki womlobi ngasokhalweni lwayo.
Ezek 9:4 UJehova wathi kuyo: “Dabula emzini, phakathi kweJerusalema, ubeke uphawu emabunzini abantu ababubula bekhala ngazo zonke izinengiso ezenziwa phakathi kwalo.”
Ezek 9:5 Kwamanye washo ezindlebeni zami, wathi: “Dabulani emzini emva kwayo, nibulale, iso lenu lingahawukeli, ningabi nabubele,
Ezek 9:6 nibulale nichithe amaxhegu, nezinsizwa, nezintombi, nezingane, nabesifazane, ningasondeli kodwa kumuntu okukuye uphawu, niqale endlini yami engcwele.” Ayeseqala ngamadoda amadala ayephambi kwendlu.
Ezek 9:7 Wathi kuwo: “Ngcolisani indlu, nigcwalise amagceke ngababuleweyo. Phumani!” Aphuma, abulala emzini.
Ezek 9:8 Kwathi esabulala, kwasala mina; ngawa ngobuso, ngakhala ngathi: “Maye, Nkosi Jehova! Uyakubulala yonke insali yakwa-Israyeli ekutheleni kwakho ukufutheka kwakho phezu kweJerusalema na?”
Ezek 9:9 Wathi kimi: “Ububi bendlu yakwa-Israyeli neyakwaJuda bukhulu kakhulu impela, nezwe ligcwele igazi, nomuzi ugcwele ukuhlanekezela, ngokuba bathi: ‘UJehova ulishiyile izwe, uJehova akakuboni.’
Ezek 9:10 Nami-ke, iso lami aliyikubahawukela, ngingabi nabubele, kepha ngiyakwehlisela indlela yabo phezu kwekhanda labo.”
Ezek 9:11 Bheka, indoda eyembethe ilineni, inophondo lukayinki ngasokhalweni lwayo, yabuyisa izwi, yathi: “Ngenzile njengokungiyala kwakho.”
Ezek 10:1 Ngase ngibona, bheka, emkhathini owawuphezu kwamakhanda amakherubi kwabonakala okunjengetshe lesafire, kufana kungathi nesihlalo sobukhosi.
Ezek 10:2 Wakhuluma kuyo indoda eyembethe ilineni, wathi: “Ngena phakathi kwamasondo ayingilizayo phansi kwekherubi, ugcwalise izandla zakho zombili ngamalahle omlilo ophakathi kwamakherubi, uwahlakaze phezu komuzi.” Yangena phambi kwamehlo ami.
Ezek 10:3 Amakherubi ayemi ngakwesokunene kwendlu ekungeneni kwendoda, ifu lagcwalisa igceke elingaphakathi.
Ezek 10:4 Inkazimulo kaJehova yenyuka ekherubini, yaya embundwini wendlu; indlu yagcwala ifu, igceke lagcwala ukumenyezela kwenkazimulo kaJehova.
Ezek 10:5 Umsindo wamaphiko amakherubi wezwakala kwaze kwaba segcekeni elingaphandle njengezwi likaNkulunkulu uSomandla, lapho ekhuluma.
Ezek 10:6 Kwathi lapho eyala indoda eyembethe ilineni, ethi: “Thatha umlilo phakathi kwamasondo ayingilizayo phakathi kwamakherubi,” yangena, eceleni kwesondo.
Ezek 10:7 Ikherubi lelulela isandla salo liphakathi kwamakherubi kuwo umlilo owawuphakathi kwamakherubi, lawuthatha, lawubeka ezandleni zakhe owembethe ilineni; wawuthatha, waphuma.
Ezek 10:8 Kwabonakala kuwo amakherubi isimo sesandla somuntu phansi kwamaphiko awo.
Ezek 10:9 Ngabona, bheka, nanko amasondo amane eceleni kwamakherubi, elinye isondo eceleni kwelinye ikherubi nelinye isondo eceleni kwelinye ikherubi; ukubonakala kwamasondo kwakunjengetshe lekrisolithe.
Ezek 10:10 Kungathi omane ayenesimo sinye, njengalokho kwakukhona isondo phakathi kwesondo.
Ezek 10:11 Ekuhambeni kwawo aya ezinhlangothini zozine, awaphendukanga ekuhambeni kwawo, kepha lapho ikhanda lalibhekisa khona alilandela; awaphendukanga ekuhambeni kwawo.
Ezek 10:12 Wonke umzimba wawo, nemihlane yawo, nezandla zawo, namaphiko awo, namasondo kwakugcwele amehlo nxazonke; yebo, amasondo lawa omane ayenawo.
Ezek 10:13 Amasondo ayebizwa ezindlebeni zami ngokuthi ayingilizayo.
Ezek 10:14 Yilelo nalelo lalinobuso obune; ubuso bokuqala babungubuso bekherubi, ubuso besibili babungubuso bomuntu, obesithathu babungubuso bengonyama, nobesine babungubuso bokhozi.
Ezek 10:15 Amakherubi aziphakamisa; yilezi zidalwa engazibona ngasemfuleni iKhebari.
Ezek 10:16 Ekuhambeni kwamakherubi amasondo ahamba eceleni kwawo, nalapho amakherubi ephakamisa amaphiko awo ukwenyuka emhlabathini, amasondo awaphendukanga eceleni kwawo.
Ezek 10:17 Ekumeni kwawo nalawa ema; ekwenyukeni kwawo enyuka nawo, ngokuba umoya wezidalwa wayekuwo.
Ezek 10:18 Inkazimulo kaJehova yaphuma phezu kombundu wendlu, yema phezu kwamakherubi.
Ezek 10:19 Amakherubi aphakamisa amaphiko awo, enyuka emhlabathini phambi kwamehlo ami ekuphumeni kwawo, amasondo eseceleni kwawo; ema ngasesivalweni sesango lasempumalanga lendlu kaJehova; inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli yayiphezu kwawo.
Ezek 10:20 Yilezi zidalwa engazibona phansi kukaNkulunkulu ngasemfuleni iKhebari, ngazi ukuthi zazingamakherubi.
Ezek 10:21 Yilelo nalelo lalinobuso obune, yilelo lalinamaphiko amane, nesimo sezandla zomuntu sasiphansi kwamaphiko awo.
Ezek 10:22 Isimo sobuso bawo, bona babungubuso engabubona ngasemfuleni iKhebari, ukubonakala kwabo, yebo, bona uqobo lwabo; yilelo nalelo lahamba ngokuqonda kobuso balo.
Ezek 11:1 UMoya wangiphakamisa, wangiyisa esangweni lendlu kaJehova lasempumalanga, elibhekene nempumalanga; bheka, ngasesivalweni sesango kwakukhona amadoda angamashumi amabili nanhlanu; ngabona phakathi kwawo uJahazaniya indodana ka-Azuri noPhelathiya indodana kaBenaya, izikhulu zabantu.
Ezek 11:2 Wathi kimi: “Ndodana yomuntu, yilawa madoda aceba okubi, anika iziluleko ezimbi kulo muzi,
Ezek 11:3 athi: ‘Akuseduze yini ukuba kwakhiwe izindlu? Lo muzi uyikhanzi, thina siyinyama.’
Ezek 11:4 Ngalokho profetha ngabo, uprofethe, ndodana yomuntu.”
Ezek 11:5 UMoya kaJehova wehlela phezu kwami, wathi kimi: “Yisho uthi: Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: Nisho njalo nina ndlu ka-Israyeli; ngiyazi mina okungena emoyeni wenu.
Ezek 11:6 Nandisile ababuleweyo benu kulo muzi, nigcwalisile izitaladi zawo ngababuleweyo.
Ezek 11:7 “Ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Ababuleweyo benu enibabekile phakathi kwawo bayinyama, nawo uqobo uyikhanzi, kepha nina ngiyakunikhipha phakathi kwawo.
Ezek 11:8 Niyesabile inkemba; ngiyakunehlisela inkemba, isho iNkosi uJehova.
Ezek 11:9 Ngiyakunikhipha phakathi kwawo, ngininikele esandleni sabafokazi, ngahlulele phakathi kwenu.
Ezek 11:10 Niyakuwa ngenkemba, nginahlulele emkhawulweni wakwa-Israyeli; nazi ukuthi nginguJehova.
Ezek 11:11 Lo muzi awuyikuba yikhanzi, nani aniyikuba yinyama phakathi kwalo; ngiyakunahlulela emkhawulweni wakwa-Israyeli,
Ezek 11:12 nazi ukuthi nginguJehova, ngokuba anihambanga ngezimiso zami, nezahlulelo zami anizenzanga, kepha nenze njengezahlulelo zezizwe ezinihaqayo.”
Ezek 11:13 Kwathi lapho ngiprofetha, uPhelathiya indodana kaBenaya wafa. Ngase ngiwa ngobuso, ngakhala ngezwi elikhulu, ngathi: “O Nkosi Jehova, uyakwenza ukuba iphele insali yakwa-Israyeli na?”
Ezek 11:14 Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi:
Ezek 11:15 “Ndodana yomuntu, abafowenu, yebo, abafowenu abayizihlobo zakho nayo yonke indlu yakwa-Israyeli, bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema abashilo kubo ukuthi: ‘Dedani kuJehova; leli zwe linikiwe thina libe yifa.’
Ezek 11:16 “Thana ngabo: ‘Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Noma ngibadedisele kude phakathi kwezizwe, ngabahlakazela emazweni, ngaba yindlu engcwele nokho kubo isikhashana emazweni ababehlakazelwe kuwo.’
Ezek 11:17 “Ngalokho thana: ‘Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Ngiyakunibutha ezizweni, nginiqoqe emazweni enihlakazekelwe kuwo, ngininike izwe lakwa-Israyeli.’
Ezek 11:18 “Bayakufika khona, basuse lapho konke okuzondekayo kwalo nazo zonke izinengiso zalo.
Ezek 11:19 Ngiyakubanika inhliziyo ibe nye, ngibeke umoya omusha phakathi kwabo, ngikhiphe inhliziyo yetshe enyameni yabo, ngibanike inhliziyo yenyama
Ezek 11:20 ukuba bahambe ngezimiso zami, bagcine izahlulelo zami, bazenze, babe ngabantu bami, mina ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo.
Ezek 11:21 Kepha labo abanhliziyo zabo zilandela izinhliziyo zokuzondekayo kwabo nezinengiso zabo, ngiyakwehlisela phezu kwamakhanda abo indlela yabo, isho iNkosi uJehova.”
Ezek 11:22 Amakherubi ayesephakamisa amaphiko awo namasondo ayeseceleni kwawo; inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli yayiphezu kwawo.
Ezek 11:23 Inkazimulo kaJehova yakhuphuka phakathi komuzi, yema entabeni engasempumalanga komuzi.
Ezek 11:24 UMoya wayesengiphakamisa, wangiyisa ngombono ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu eKalideya kubathunjwa. Wase wenyuka kimi umbono engiwubonileyo.
Ezek 11:25 Ngase ngikhuluma kubathunjwa zonke izinto uJehova angibonisile zona.
Ezek 12:1 Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi:
Ezek 12:2 “Ndodana yomuntu, wena uhlala phakathi kwendlu ehlubukayo nabanamehlo okubona bengaboni kodwa, abanezindlebe zokuzwa bengezwa nokho, ngokuba bayindlu ehlubukayo.
Ezek 12:3 “Wena ndodana yomuntu, zenzele impahla yokuhamba, usuke emini emehlweni abo, umuke endaweni yakho emehlweni abo, uye kwenye; mhlawumbe bayakubona ukuthi bayindlu ehlubukayo.
Ezek 12:4 Uyakukhipha impahla yakho emini emehlweni abo njengempahla yokuhamba, wena uphume kusihlwa emehlweni abo njengokuphuma ukuya ekuthunjweni.
Ezek 12:5 Gebhula ogangeni emehlweni abo, uyikhiphe impahla khona.
Ezek 12:6 Uyakuyithwala ehlombe emehlweni abo, uyikhiphe sekumnyama, usibekele ubuso bakho, ukuze ungaboni izwe, ngokuba ngikubeke ukuba ube yisibonakaliso kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli.”
Ezek 12:7 Ngenza njengokungiyala kwakhe; ngayikhipha impahla yami emini njengempahla yokuhamba, kusihlwa ngagebhula ogangeni ngesandla, nanxa sekumnyama ngayikhipha, ngayithwala ehlombe emehlweni abo.
Ezek 12:8 Lase lifika izwi likaJehova ekuseni, lathi:
Ezek 12:9 “Ndodana yomuntu, ayishongo kuwe yini indlu yakwa-Israyeli, indlu ehlubukayo, yathi: ‘Wenzani na?’
Ezek 12:10 “Thana kubo: ‘Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Lesi siprofetho ngesesikhulu saseJerusalema nesabo bonke abendlu yakwa-Israyeli abaphakathi kwalo.’
Ezek 12:11 Thana: ‘Ngiyisibonakaliso senu;’ njengalokho ngenzile, kuyakwenziwa kanjalo kubo; bayakuya ekuthunjweni, baboshwe.
Ezek 12:12 “Isikhulu esiphakathi kwabo siyakuthwala ehlombe sekumnyama, siphume, bagebhule ogangeni ukuba bakhiphe khona, sisibekele usubo baso, ngokuba asiyikubona izwe ngamehlo aso.
Ezek 12:13 Ngiyakuleneka inetha lami phezu kwaso, sibanjwe ogibeni lwami; ngiyakusiyisa eBabele ezweni lamaKaledi. Kepha asiyikulibona, noma sifela khona.
Ezek 12:14 Bonke abasizungezayo ukusisiza namaviyo aso ngiyakubahlakazela kuyo yonke imimoya, ngihoshe inkemba emva kwabo.
