Hos 12:2 UJehova unokuphikisana noJuda futhi; uyakuhambela uJakobe ngenxa yezindlela zakhe, ambuyisele ngokwezenzo zakhe.
Hos 12:3 Esiswini wabamba umfowabo ngesithende, nasebudodeni bakhe walwa noNkulunkulu;
Hos 12:4 walwa nengelosi, wanqoba; wakhala, wanxusa kuyo; yamfumana eBethele, yakhuluma naye lapho.
Hos 12:5 NguJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti, nguJehova igama lakhe lodumo.
Hos 12:6 Ngalokho buyela wena kuNkulunkulu wakho, ugcine umusa nokulunga, ulindele uNkulunkulu wakho njalonjalo.
Hos 12:7 IKhanani linesilinganiso esikhohlisayo esandleni salo, lithanda ukukhahlameza.
Hos 12:8 U-Efrayimi uthi: “Impela ngicebile, ngithole imfuyo; kukho konke ukuzuza kwami abayikufumana bubi obuyisono.”
Hos 12:9 “Kepha mina nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho kwasezweni laseGibithe; ngisezakukuhlalisa ematendeni njengasezinsukwini zemikhosi emisiweyo.
Hos 12:10 Ngikhulumile kubaprofethi, ngandisile imibono, ngifanekisile ngesandla sabaprofethi.”
Hos 12:11 Uma iGileyadi linobubi, impela bayakuba ngabachithiwe; uma behlabela izinkunzi eGiligali, ama-altare abo ayakuba njengezinqwaba ngasemiseleni yamasimu.
Hos 12:12 UJakobe wabalekela ezweni lase-Aramu, u-Israyeli wakhonzela umfazi, walusa umhlambi ngenxa yomfazi.
Hos 12:13 UJehova wakhuphula u-Israyeli eGibithe ngomprofethi, wagcinwa ngomprofethi.
Hos 12:14 U-Efrayimi ucunulile ngokubabisayo; icala lakhe legazi liyakuphonswa phezu kwakhe; iNkosi yakhe ibuyisele kuye ihlazo lakhe.
Hos 13:1 Lapho u-Efrayimi ekhuluma, kwavela ukuthuthumela; wayephakeme kwa-Israyeli, kepha wazitholela icala ngoBali, wafa.
Hos 13:2 Manje benezela ekoneni, bazenzele imifanekiso ebunjiweyo ngesiliva labo nezithombe ngokuqonda kwabo, zonke ziyimisebenzi yezinyanga; bakhuluma ngabo, bathi: “Bahlaba abantu, kepha banga amathole.”
Hos 13:3 Ngalokho bayakuba njengamafu okusa, nanjengamazolo amuka ekuseni, nanjengamakhoba aphephethwa esibuyeni nomusi ophuma ngefasitele.
Hos 13:4 “Nokho nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho kwasezweni laseGibithe; ngaphandle kwami awazi Nkulunkulu, nomsindisi akakho ngaphandle kwami.
Hos 13:5 Mina ngakwazi ehlane ezweni lokoma.
Hos 13:6 Basutha njengamadlelo abo; basutha, nenhliziyo yabo yaphakama; ngalokho bangikhohliwe.
Hos 13:7 Ngase ngiba njengengonyama kubo, ngiqamekela endleleni njengengwe.
Hos 13:8 Ngitheleka phezu kwabo njengebhere elaphuciwe amawundlu alo, ngidwengula ubhedu lwenhliziyo, ngibadle njengengonyamakazi, isilwane sasendle sibaqaqe.
Hos 13:9 “Ngukuchithwa kwakho, Israyeli, ngokuba uphambene nami, usizo lwakho.
Hos 13:10 Iphi inkosi yakho manje ukuba ikusindise emizini yakho yonke; nabahluleli bakho, wena owathi: ‘Ngiphe inkosi nezikhulu’?
Hos 13:11 Ngikunike inkosi ngentukuthelo yami, ngayisusa ngolaka lwami.
Hos 13:12 Ububi buka-Efrayimi buboshiwe, isono sakhe sibekelelwe.
Hos 13:13 Imihelo yobelethayo iyakumehlela; uyindodana engahlakaniphile, ngokuba kuyisikhathi sokuba angemi lapho kuqhamuka abantwana.
Hos 13:14 “Ngiyakubahlenga esandleni sendawo yabafileyo, ngibahlawulele ekufeni; ziphi izifo zakho, kufa, kuphi ukuchitha kwakho, ndawo yabafileyo, na? Ukuguquka kufihlekile emehlweni ami.
Hos 13:15 “Noma enezithelo phakathi kwabafowabo, kuyakufika umoya wasempumalanga, umoya kaJehova ovela ehlane; besewujabha umthombo, isiphethu sishe; uyakuphanga ingcebo yakhe, zonke izinto ezinxanelekayo.
Hos 13:16 ISamariya liyakuthwala icala lalo, ngokuba lihlubukile uNkulunkulu walo; bayakuwa ngenkemba, izingane zabo zichotshozwe, abakhulelweyo babo baqaqwe.”
Hos 14:1 Buyela kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, Israyeli, ngokuba ukhubekile ngobubi bakho.
Hos 14:2 Thabathani amazwi, nibuyele kuJehova, nithi kuye: “Susa konke okubi, wamukele okuhle, sinikele ngemilomo yethu njengangezinkunzi.
Hos 14:3 I-Asiriya aliyikusisindisa, asisayikukhwela amahhashi, singasasho kuyo imisebenzi yezandla zethu ukuthi ngonkulunkulu bethu, ngokuba intandane iphiwa umusa kuwe.”
Hos 14:4 “Ngiyakuphulukisa ukuhlehla kwabo, ngibathande ngesihle, ngokuba intukuthelo yami ibuyile kubo.
Hos 14:5 Ngiyakuba njengamazolo ku-Israyeli; uyakukhahlela njengomnduze, enabise izimpande zakhe njengeLebanoni.
Hos 14:6 Imixhantela yakhe iyakuxhantela, ubuhle bakhe bube njengomnqumo, iphunga lakhe libe njengeLebanoni.
Hos 14:7 Bayakubuya, bahlale emthunzini wakhe, babuye baphile njengamabele, bakhahlele njengomvini, igama lakhe lodumo libe njengomvini waseLebanoni.
Hos 14:8 Efrayimi, ngisenendabani nezithombe na? Mina ngiyakumphendula, ngimbheke; nginjengomsayipuresi oluhlaza, kimina izithelo zakho ziyafunyanwa.”
Hos 14:9 Ngubani ohlakaniphile, aqonde lezi zinto; ngubani onomqondo, azazi, na? Ngokuba izindlela zikaJehova zilungile; abalungileyo bayakuhamba ngazo, kepha abaphambukayo bayakukhubeka ngazo.
Joel 1:1 Izwi likaJehova elafika kuJoweli indodana kaPhethuweli.
Joel 1:2 Yizwani lokhu nina badala, nibeke indlebe nina nonke enihlezi ezweni. Kwake kwaba khona emihleni yenu noma emihleni yawobaba na?
Joel 1:3 Kutsheleni abantwana benu, nabantwana benu abantwana babo, nabantwana babo esinye isizukulwane.
Joel 1:4 Okushiywe yisibotho kudliwe yisikhonyane, nokushiywe yisikhonyane kudliwe yizinkumbi, nokushiywe yizinkumbi kudliwe yinkasa.
Joel 1:5 Phaphamani, zidakwa, nikhale, nihhewule nonke eniphuza iwayini ukuthi iwayini linqanyulelwe emlonyeni wenu.
Joel 1:6 Ngokuba kwenyukele ezweni lami isizwe esinamandla nesingenakubalwa; amazinyo aso angamazinyo engonyama, namazinyo aso emihlathi angawengonyamakazi.
Joel 1:7 Sichithile umvini wami, saxebula umkhiwane wami; siwuxhozile nokuwuxhoza, sawulahla, amagatsha awo sawenza aba mhlophe.
Joel 1:8 Khala njengentombi ebhince indwangu yamasaka ngomyeni wobusha bayo.
Joel 1:9 Iminikelo yempuphu neminikelo yokuphuzwa inqamukile endlini kaJehova; abapristi, izikhonzi zikaJehova, bayalila.
Joel 1:10 Amasimu achithekile, umhlabathi uyalila, ngokuba amabele achithiwe; iwayini elisha lishile, amafutha ayawuma.
Joel 1:11 Jabhani, balimi, nihhewule nina baphathi bezivini ngokolweni nangebhali, ngokuba isivuno samasimu sichithakele.
Joel 1:12 Umvini ubunile, imikhiwane iwumile; imipomegranati, namasundu, nemi-apula, nemithi yonke yasendle kubunile, ngokuba intokozo ibunile phakathi kwamadodana abantu.
Joel 1:13 Bhincani, nikhale, bapristi, nihhewule, nina zikhonzi ze-altare; wozani nilale bonke ubusuku ezindwangwini zamasaka, zikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu wami, ngokuba iminikelo yempuphu neminikelo yokuphuzwa kugodliwe endlini kaNkulunkulu wenu.
Joel 1:14 Ngcwelisani ukuzila ukudla, nibize umhlangano; buthani amalunga, yebo, bonke abakhe ezweni, endlini kaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, nikhale kuJehova.
Joel 1:15 Hawu lolo suku! Ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele, lufika njengokuchitha kuvela kuSomandla.
Joel 1:16 Akunqunywanga ukudla kwethu phambi kwamehlo ethu, intokozo nenjabulo endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu, na?
Joel 1:17 Imbewu iyabola phansi kwamagade ayo; izingobo zichithakele, izinqolobane zidiliziwe, ngokuba amabele omile.
Joel 1:18 Yeka, ukububula kwezilwane! Imihlambi yezinkomo ikhungathekile, ngokuba ayinadlelo, yebo, nemihlambi yezimvu izithwese icala.
Joel 1:19 Ngikhala kuwe Jehova, ngokuba amadlelo asehlane adliwe ngumlilo, nelangabi lishisile yonke imithi yasendle.
Joel 1:20 Yebo, nezilwane zasendle ziyakulangazelela, ngokuba imifula yamanzi ishile, nomlilo udlile amadlelo asehlane.
Joel 2:1 Bethani icilongo eSiyoni, nihlabe umkhosi entabeni yami engcwele; mabathuthumele bonke abakhe ezweni, ngokuba luyeza usuku lukaJehova, ngokuba lusondele;
Joel 2:2 usuku lobumnyama nolwesigayegaye, usuku lwamafu nolobumnyama obukhulu, njengokusa kwenekwe ezintabeni, abantu abaningi abanamandla abangazange babe ngabanjalo kwasendulo, nabangasoze baba ngabanjalo emva kwabo kuze kube naseminyakeni yezizukulwane ngezizukulwane.
Joel 2:3 Phambi kwabo kuyadla umlilo, nasemva kwabo kushisa ilangabi; izwe liphambi kwabo njengensimu yase-Edene, nangasemva kwabo kuyihlane lencithakalo, akukho okubabalekelayo.
Joel 2:4 Isimo sabo sinjengesimo samahhashi, bagijima njengabamahhashi.
Joel 2:5 Bangqabashiya ngomsindo wezinqola eziqongweni zezintaba, njengokuchochoza kwelangabi lomlilo elidla amabibi nanjengabantu abanamandla, abahlelelwe ukulwa.
Joel 2:6 Phambi kwabo abantu bayathuthumela, bonke ubuso buyaphaphatheka.
Joel 2:7 Bagijima njengamaqhawe, bakhwela ezingangeni njengamadoda empi; bahamba, kube yilowo nalowo ngendlela yakhe, abaphambanisi izindlela zabo.
Joel 2:8 Abahlohlolozani omunye nomunye; bahamba, kube yilowo nalowo ngendlela yakhe; baziphonsa phakathi kwezikhali, abakhawuli.
Joel 2:9 Batheleka emzini, bagijima ogangeni; bakhuphukela ezindlini, bangena ngamafasitele njengesela.
Joel 2:10 Umhlaba uyazamazama phambi kwabo, amazulu ayathuthumela; ilanga nenyanga kuphenduka ubumnyama, nezinkanyezi zisusa ukukhanya kwazo.
Joel 2:11 UJehova uzwakalisa izwi lakhe phambi kwempi yakhe, ngokuba ibandla lakhe likhulu kakhulu, nowenza izwi lakhe unamandla; yebo, usuku lukaJehova lukhulu, luyesabeka kakhulu; ngubani ongaluthwala na?
Joel 2:12 “Kepha manje,” usho uJehova, “phendukelani kimi ngenhliziyo yenu yonke, nangokuzila ukudla, nangokukhala, nangokulila.”
Joel 2:13 Niklebhule inhliziyo yenu, hhayi izingubo zenu, niphendukele kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, ngokuba yena unomusa, unobumnene, wephuza ukuthukuthela, unesihe esikhulu, uhawukela nomubi.
Joel 2:14 Ngubani owaziyo uma engayikubuya, ahawukele, ashiye isibusiso emva kwakhe, kube ngumnikelo wempuphu nomnikelo wokuphuzwa kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, na?
Joel 2:15 Bethani icilongo eSiyoni, ningcwelise ukuzila ukudla, nibize umhlangano;
Joel 2:16 buthani abantu, ningcwelise ibandla, niqoqe abadala, nibuthe izingane nabancelayo; umyeni makaphume ekamelweni lakhe, nomakoti emgonqweni wakhe.
Joel 2:17 Abapristi, izikhonzi zikaJehova, mabakhale phakathi kompheme ne-altare, bathi: “Hawukela abantu bakho, Jehova, unganikeli isabelo sakho sibe yinhlamba, ukuze abezizwe bababhinqe; yini ukuba basho phakathi kwabantu, bathi: ‘Uphi uNkulunkulu wabo na?’ ”
Joel 2:18 UJehova wayesehawukela izwe lakhe, wabahawukela abantu bakhe.
Joel 2:19 UJehova waphendula, wathi kubantu bakhe: “Bhekani, ngiyakunithumela amabele, newayini, namafutha, nisuthe ngakho, ngingabe ngisanenza inhlamba phakathi kwabezizwe.
Joel 2:20 “Ngiyakudedisela kude nani owasenyakatho, ngimxoshele ezweni elomileyo nelichithakeleyo, ubuso bakhe bube ngaselwandle lwasempumalanga, umuva wakhe ube ngaselwandle lwasentshonalanga, kukhuphuke ukunuka kwakhe, kwenyuke iphunga lakhe elibi;” ngokuba wenzile izinto ezinkulu.
Joel 2:21 Ungesabi, lizwe; jabula, uthokoze, ngokuba uJehova wenzile izinto ezinkulu.
Joel 2:22 Ningesabi, zilwane zasendle, ngokuba amadlelo asehlane ayahluma, nemithi ithela izithelo, umkhiwane nomvini kuveza amandla akho.
Joel 2:23 Jabulani, bantwana baseSiyoni, nithokoze kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, ngokuba uninika imvula yokuqala ngokulunga, unehlisela imvula, eyokuqala neyamuva, njengasekuqaleni.
Joel 2:24 Izibuya ziyakugcwala amabele, nezikhongozelo ziyakuchichima iwayini namafutha.
Joel 2:25 “Ngiyakubuyisela kini iminyaka eyadliwa yisikhonyane, nezinkumbi, nenkasa, nesibotho, impi yami enkulu engayithuma phakathi kwenu.
Joel 2:26 Niyakudla nokudla, nisuthe, nilidumise igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu oniphathe ngokumangalisayo; abantu bami abayikujabha kuze kube phakade.
Joel 2:27 Niyakwazi ukuthi ngiphakathi kuka-Israyeli nokuthi nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, akakho omunye; abantu bami abayikujabha kuze kube phakade.
Joel 2:28 “Kuyakuthi ngasemuva ngithulule uMoya wami phezu kwayo yonke inyama; amadodana enu namadodakazi enu ayakuprofetha, abadala benu baphuphe amaphupho, izinsizwa zenu zibone imibono;
Joel 2:29 naphezu kwezinceku nezincekukazi ngalezo zinsuku ngiyakuthulula uMoya wami.
Joel 2:30 Ngiyakuveza izimangaliso ezulwini nasemhlabeni, igazi, nomlilo, nezinsika zomusi.
Joel 2:31 Ilanga liyakuphenduka ubumnyama, inyanga ibe yigazi, lungakafiki usuku olukhulu nolwesabekayo lukaJehova.
Joel 2:32 Kuyakuthi bonke ababiza igama likaJehova bakhululwe, ngokuba entabeni yaseSiyoni naseJerusalema kuyakuba ngabasindileyo, njengalokho eshilo uJehova, naphakathi kwabaseleyo kube ngababizwa nguJehova.
Joel 3:1 “Ngokuba ngalezo zinsuku nangaleso sikhathi, lapho ngiyakubuyisa ukuthunjwa kukaJuda neJerusalema,
Joel 3:2 ngiyakubutha zonke izizwe, ngizehlisele esigodini sikaJehoshafati, ngahlulelane nazo khona ngenxa yabantu bami nesabelo sami u-Israyeli, ezibahlakazile phakathi kwezizwe, zabela izwe lami.
Joel 3:3 Zenza inkatho ngabantu bami, zanika umfana ngesifebe, zathengisa ngentombazana ngenxa yewayini, zaliphuza.
Joel 3:4 “Niyini kimi, nina Tire neSidoni, nayo yonke imikhawulo yaseFilistiya na? Niyakungibuyisela utho na? Uma ningibuyisela utho ngiyakushesha ngibuyisele masinyane phezu kwekhanda lenu izenzo zenu,
Joel 3:5 njengalokho nithathile isiliva lami negolide lami, nangenisa izinto zami ezinhle emathempelini enu,
Joel 3:6 nathengisa ngabantwana bakwaJuda nangabantwana baseJerusalema kumadodana aseJavani ukuba nibadedisele kude nemikhawulo yabo.
Joel 3:7 “Bhekani, ngiyakubavusa endaweni enithengisile kuyo ngabo, ngibuyisele ekhanda lenu isenzo senu.
Joel 3:8 Ngiyakuthengisa ngamadodana enu nangamadodakazi enu esandleni sabantwana bakwaJuda, bona bathengise ngabo kumaSheba, isizwe esikude,” ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile.
Joel 3:9 Memezelani lokhu phakathi kwabezizwe, ningcwelise impi, niwavuse amaqhawe; mawasondele, enyuke onke amadoda empi.
Joel 3:10 Khandani amakhuba enu abe yizinkemba, ocelemba benu babe yimikhonto, obuthakathaka asho ukuthi ngiyiqhawe.
Joel 3:11 Sheshani nifike nina bezizwe zonke nxazonke, nibuthane, wehlisele khona amaqhawe akho, Jehova.
Joel 3:12 “Mabazivuse abezizwe, benyukele esigodini sikaJehoshafati, ngokuba ngahlulele bonke abezizwe nxazonke.
Joel 3:13 Fakani isikela, ngokuba okuzakuvunwa sekuvuthiwe; ngokuba isikhamo sewayini sigcwele, nezikhongozelo ziyachichima, ngokuba ububi babo bukhulu.”
Joel 3:14 Yizixuku ngezixuku esigodini sokwahlulela, ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele esigodini sokwahlulela.
Joel 3:15 Ilanga nenyanga kuba mnyama, izinkanyezi zisusa ukukhanya kwazo.
Joel 3:16 UJehova uyaduma eseSiyoni, ezwakalise izwi lakhe eseJerusalema; izulu nomhlaba kuyazamazama, kepha uJehova uyisiphephelo sabantu bakhe, nenqaba yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli.
Joel 3:17 Bese nikwazi ukuthi nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu engihlala eSiyoni, intaba yami engcwele; iJerusalema liyakuba ngcwele, abafokazi abasayikulidabula.
Joel 3:18 “Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku izintaba ziconse iwayini elimnandi, amagquma agobhoze ubisi, yonke imifula yakwaJuda igobhoze amanzi; kuyakuvela umthombo endlini kaJehova oyakunisela isigodi saseShithimi.
Joel 3:19 IGibithe liyakuba yincithakalo, u-Edomi abe yihlane lencithakalo ngenxa yendluzula eyenziwe kubantwana bakwaJuda, ngokuba bachithile igazi elingenacala ezweni labo.
Joel 3:20 Kepha uJuda uyakuhlala kuze kube phakade, neJerusalema ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.
Joel 3:21 Ngiyakuphindisela igazi labo engingakaliphindiseli,” ngokuba uJehova wakhile eSiyoni.
Amos 1:1 Amazwi ka-Amose owayephakathi kwabelusi baseThekhowa, owabonayo ngo-Israyeli emihleni ka-Uziya, inkosi yakwaJuda, nasemihleni kaJerobowamu indodana kaJowashi, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, iminyaka emibili ngaphambi kokuzamazama komhlaba.
Amos 1:2 Wathi: “UJehova uyaduma eseSiyoni, ezwakalise izwi lakhe eseJerusalema; amadlelo abelusi ayakulila, nesiqongo saseKarmeli siyakubuna.”
Amos 1:3 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zaseDamaseku, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba babhula iGileyadi ngezibhulo ezibukhali zensimbi.
Amos 1:4 Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo endlini kaHazayeli, uqede izindlu zobukhosi zikaBeni Hadadi.
Amos 1:5 Ngiyakwaphula imigoqo yaseDamaseku, nginqume abakhileyo eBikati Aveni, nophethe intonga eBeti Edene, abantu base-Aramu bathunjelwe eKhiri,” usho uJehova.
Amos 1:6 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zaseGaza, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bathumba abantu ngokuthumba okupheleleyo ukuba babakhaphele ku-Edomi.
Amos 1:7 Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo ogangeni lwaseGaza, uqede izindlu zalo zamakhosi.
Amos 1:8 Ngiyakunquma abakhileyo e-Ashidodi, nophethe intonga e-Ashikeloni, ngiphendulele isandla sami e-Ekroni; nensali yamaFilisti iyakuphela,” isho iNkosi uJehova.
Amos 1:9 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zaseTire, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bakhaphela abantu ngokuthumba okupheleleyo ku-Edomi, bangakhumbuli isivumelwano sabazalwane.
Amos 1:10 Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo ogangeni lwaseTire, uqede izindlu zalo zamakhosi.”
Amos 1:11 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwa-Edomi, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba wamxosha umfowabo ngenkemba, walahla isihe sakhe, wagcina ulaka lwakhe, wayilondoloza intukuthelo yakhe.
Amos 1:12 Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo eThemani, uqede izindlu zamakhosi zaseBosira.”
Amos 1:13 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zabantwana bakwa-Amoni, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba baqaqile abakhulelweyo kwaGileyadi ukuba bayenze banzi imikhawulo yabo.
Amos 1:14 Kepha ngiyakuphemba umlilo ogangeni lwaseRaba, uqede izindlu zalo zamakhosi ngokumemeza ngosuku lokulwa, nangesiphepho ngosuku lwesivunguvungu.
Amos 1:15 Inkosi yabo iyakuya ekuthunjweni, yona nezikhulu zayo kanyekanye,” usho uJehova.
Amos 2:1 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwaMowabi, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba washisa amathambo enkosi yakwa-Edomi aba ngumcako.
Amos 2:2 Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo kwaMowabi, uqede izindlu zamakhosi zaseKeriyote, uMowabi afe ngokuxokozela, nangokumemeza, nangokukhala kwecilongo.
Amos 2:3 Ngiyakunquma umahluleli phakathi kwakhe, ngibulale zonke izikhulu zakhe kanye naye,” usho uJehova.
Amos 2:4 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwaJuda, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bawulahlile umthetho kaJehova, abagcinanga izimiso zakhe, namanga abo abadukisile, abawalandelayo nawoyise.
Amos 2:5 Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo kwaJuda, uqede izindlu zamakhosi zaseJerusalema.”
Amos 2:6 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwa-Israyeli, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bathengisile olungileyo ngesiliva, nompofu ngamabhangqa ezicathulo.
Amos 2:7 Bazondelela amakhanda abampofu ukuba abe sothulini lomhlabathi, bachezukisa indlela yabathobileyo; indoda noyise baya entombininye, ukuze balihlambalaze igama lami elingcwele,
Amos 2:8 bacambalale ezingutsheni ezithathwe zaba yisibambiso eceleni kwawo onke ama-altare, baphuze iwayini labahlawulisiweyo endlini kaNkulunkulu wabo.
Amos 2:9 “Nokho mina ngachitha ama-Amori ebusweni babo, akuphakama kwawo kwakunjengokuphakama kwemisedari, ayenamandla njengama-oki; kepha ngachitha nokho izithelo zawo phezulu nezimpande zawo phansi.
Amos 2:10 “Futhi mina nganikhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, nganihambisa iminyaka engamashumi amane ehlane ukuba nidle ifa lezwe lama-Amori.
Amos 2:11 Ngavusa kumadodana enu abaprofethi nasezinsizweni zenu amaNaziri. Akunjalo, nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, na?” usho uJehova.
Amos 2:12 “Kepha naphuzisa amaNaziri iwayini, ngokuthi: ‘Ningaprofethi.’
Amos 2:13 “Bhekani, ngiyakunicindezela endaweni yenu njengengqukumbane icindezela, igcwele izithungu.
Amos 2:14 Onejubane uyakuswela ukubaleka; onamandla akayikuqinisa amandla akhe, neqhawe aliyikuzikhulula.
Amos 2:15 Obambe umnsalo akayikuma; onejubane ngezinyawo zakhe kayikuzikhulula, nokhwele ihhashi akayikuzikhulula;
Amos 2:16 onesibindi phakathi kwamaqhawe uyakubaleka ze ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova.
Amos 3:1 Yizwani leli zwi uJehova alikhulumile ngani bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, ngawo wonke umndeni engawukhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, ngokuthi:
Amos 3:2 “Nginazile nina kuphela emindenini yonke yomhlaba; ngalokho ngiyakunihambela ngabo bonke ububi benu.”
Amos 3:3 Kuhamba ababili kanyekanye, uma bengavumelananga, na?
Amos 3:4 Ingonyama iyabhodla ehlathini, ingenampango, na? Ibongo lengonyama liyezwakalisa izwi lalo emphandwini walo, uma lingabambanga lutho, na?
Amos 3:5 Inyoni iwela ogibeni emhlabathini, ingenasihibe, na? Ugibe luyaxhuma emhlabathini, lungabambanga nokubamba, na?
Amos 3:6 Kungabethwa icilongo emzini, bangesabi abantu, na? Umuzi ungehlelwa ngokubi, engakwenzamga uJehova, na?
Amos 3:7 Ngokuba iNkosi uJehova ayenzi lutho, ingayambulanga imfihlakalo yayo ezincekwini zayo abaprofethi.
Amos 3:8 Ingonyama ibhongile, ngubani ongayikwesaba na? INkosi uJehova ikhulumile, ngubani ongayikuprofetha na?
Amos 3:9 Zwakalisani ezindlini zamakhosi zase-Ashidodi, nasezindlini zamakhosi zasezweni laseGibithe, nithi: “Buthanani ezintabeni zaseSamariya, nibone izidumo ezinkulu eziphakathi kwalo, nokucindezelwa okukulo.”
Amos 3:10 “Ngokuba abakwazi ukwenza okulungileyo,” usho uJehova; “babekelela ubudlova nokuphanga ezindlini zabo zamakhosi.”
Amos 3:11 Ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: “Isitha siyakulihaqa izwe, sehlise kini izinqaba zenu, ziphangwe izindlu zenu zamakhosi.”
Amos 3:12 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Njengalokhu umalusi ophula emlonyeni wengonyama imilenze emibili noma inxenye yendlebe, kanjalo abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayakophulwa, abahlala eSamariya ezingosini zezihlalo naphezu kwezingubo zikasilika zemibhede.”
Amos 3:13 “Yizwani, nifakaze ngendlu kaJakobe, isho iNkosi uJehova, uNkulunkulu Sebawoti.
Amos 3:14 “Ngokuba mhla ngiyakumhambela u-Israyeli ngeziphambeko zakhe, ngiyakuhambela nama-altare aseBethele, kunqunywe izimpondo ze-altare, ziwe phansi.
Amos 3:15 Ngiyakushaya indlu yasebusika kanye nendlu yasehlobo, kuphele izindlu zophondo lwendlovu, yebo, izindlu eziningi ziyakuphela,” usho uJehova.
Amos 4:1 Yizwani leli zwi, nina zinkomo zaseBashani enisentabeni yaseSamariya, enicindezela abaphansi, enichoboza abampofu, enithi emakhosini enu: “Lethani, siphuze.”
Amos 4:2 INkosi uJehova ifungile ubungcwele bayo ukuthi: “Bhekani, izinsuku ziyakunehlela lapho niyakususwa ngezingwegwe, nabaseleyo kini ngezindobo.
Amos 4:3 Niyakuphuma emifantwini, kube yilowo nalowo ngoqondene naye, nilahlwe eHermoni,” usho uJehova.
Amos 4:4 “Wozani eBethele, niphambeke, naseGiligali, nandise iziphambeko, nilethe imihlatshelo yenu ekuseni njalo, nokweshumi kwenu kanye ngezinsuku ezintathu,
Amos 4:5 nishise umnikelo wokubonga ngokuvutshelweyo, nimemezele iminikelo yesihle, niyizwakalise, ngokuba nithanda kanjalo, bantwana bakwa-Israyeli,” isho iNkosi uJehova.
Amos 4:6 “Mina nganinika ukuhlanzeka kwamazinyo emizini yenu yonke nokuswela isinkwa kuzo zonke izindawo zenu, kepha anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova.
Amos 4:7 “Futhi ngagodla kini imvula, kusasele izinyanga ezintathu ukuba kuvunwe, ngalinisa phezu komunye umuzi, komunye umuzi angilinisanga; esinye isiqephu saniselwa, nesiqephu esinganiselwanga sasha.
Amos 4:8 Kwase kuhamba imizi emibili noma emithathu, yaya komunye umuzi ukuyophuza amanzi, kodwa ayaneliswanga; kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova.
Amos 4:9 “Nganishaya ngokuhamuka nesikhutha; izivande zenu, nezivini zenu, nemikhiwane yenu, neminqumo yenu eminingi kwadliwa yisibotho, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova.
Amos 4:10 “Nganithumela isifo ngendlela yaseGibithe, ngazibulala izinsizwa zenu ngenkemba, ngathumba amahhashi enu, ngenza ukuba ukunuka kwekamu lenu kukhuphukele nasemakhaleni enu, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova.
Amos 4:11 “Nganichitha njengalokho uNkulunkulu achitha iSodoma neGomora; naninjengesikhuni esophulwe emlilweni, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova.
Amos 4:12 “Ngalokho ngiyakwenze njalo kuwe Israyeli; njengokuba ngiyakwenza lokhu kuwe, zilungiselele ukuhlangana noNkulunkulu wakho, Israyeli.”
Amos 4:13 Ngokuba bheka, owabumba izintaba, nowawudala umoya, otshela umuntu umqondo wakhe, owenza ukusa kube ngubumnyama, onyathela ezindaweni eziphakemeyo zomhlaba, igama lakhe linguJehova, uNkulunkulu Sebawoti.
Amos 5:1 Zwanini leli zwi engiliphakamisa phezu kwenu libe yisililo ngendlu ka-Israyeli.
Amos 5:2 “Iwile intombi yakwa-Israyeli, ayisayikuvuka; iphonsiwe phansi, akakho ongayivusa.”
Amos 5:3 Ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: “Umuzi owaphuma uyinkulungwane uyakushiya ikhulu, nowaphuma uyikhulu uyakushiya ishumi kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli.”
Amos 5:4 Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli, uthi: “Ngifuneni, niphile.
Amos 5:5 Kepha ningalifuni iBethele, ningangeni eGiligali, ningadluleli eBeri Sheba, ngokuba iGiligali liyakuthunjwa nokuthunjwa, neBethele liyakuba yize.”
Amos 5:6 Funani uJehova, niphile, funa afikele indlu kaJosefa njengomlilo, udle, kungekho owucimayo eBethele.
Amos 5:7 Nina enihlanekezela ukwahlulela kube ngumhlonyane, nilahle phansi ukulunga;
Amos 5:8 nimfune owenza isiLimela neMpambano, ophendula ithunzi lokufa libe ngukusa, ayenze imini ibe mnyama njengobusuku, obiza amanzi olwandle, awathululele ebusweni bomhlaba nguJehova igama lakhe
Amos 5:9 owenza ukuchitha ukuba kunyazime phezu kwabanamandla, nencithakalo ukuba yehlele izinqaba.
Amos 5:10 Bayamzonda ofakazela ukulunga esangweni; okhuluma ubuqotho banengwa nguye.
Amos 5:11 Ngalokho, ngokuba ninyathela abampofu, namukele kuye isipho samabele, noma nakha izindlu ngamatshe abaziweyo aniyikuhlala kuzo, nokuba nitshala izivini ezinhle aniyikuphuza iwayini lazo.
Amos 5:12 Ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi iziphambeko zenu ziningi nokuthi izono zenu zinkulu, nina enicindezela abalungileyo, namukela umvuzo, nenichezukisa abampofu esangweni.
Amos 5:13 Ngalokho ohlakaniphileyo uyakuthula ngaleso sikhathi, ngokuba kuyisikhathi esibi lesi.
Amos 5:14 Funani okuhle, hhayi okubi, ukuze niphile, abe nani uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti kanjalo, njengalokhu nisho.
Amos 5:15 Zondani okubi, nithande okuhle, nimise ukwahlulela esangweni; mhlawumbe uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti uyakuba nomusa kuyo insali yakwaJosefa.
Amos 5:16 Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti, iNkosi, uthi: “Ezigcawini zonke kuyakuba khona ukukhala, nakuzo zonke izitaladi bayakusho ukuthi: ‘Maye, maye!’ babize umlimi ukuba akhale, nabaziyo izililo ukuba balile;
Amos 5:17 nakuzo zonke izivini kuyakuba khona ukukhala, ngokuba ngiyakudlula phakathi kwakho,” usho uJehova.
Amos 5:18 Wo kinina enifisa usuku lukaJehova! Luyakunisizani usuku lukaJehova? Lungubumnyama, alusikho ukukhanya.
Amos 5:19 Kunjengalokhu umuntu ebalekela ingonyama, kuhlangane naye ibhere, noma engena endlini encike ngesandla odongeni, alunywe yinyoka.
Amos 5:20 Lungubumyama usuku lukaJehova, alusikho ukukhanya, nesigayegaye okungekho kuso ukukhazimula.
Amos 5:21 “Ngiyayizonda, ngiyayidelela imikhosi yenu, angenameli imihlangano yenu.
Amos 5:22 Noma ninikela kimi ngeminikelo yenu yokushiswa kanye neminikelo yenu yempuphu, angiyenameli, futhi angibheki iminikelo yenu yokubonga yamathole akhuluphalisiweyo.
Amos 5:23 Susa kimi umsindo wezihlabelelo zakho, angiyikuzwa imvunge yezingubhu zakho.
Amos 5:24 Kepha ukwahlulela makugobhoze njengamanzi, nokulunga njengomfula onganqamukiyo.
Amos 5:25 “Naletha kimi imihlatshelo neminikelo yempuphu ehlane iminyaka engamashumi amane, nina ndlu ka-Israyeli, na?
Amos 5:26 Seniyakuthwala uSakuti inkosi yenu noKhewani inkanyezi kankulunkulu wenu, izithombe zenu enizenzele zona.
Amos 5:27 Ngiyakunenza ukuba nithunjelwe ngaphesheya kweDamaseku,” usho uJehova ogama lakhe linguNkulunkulu Sebawoti.
Amos 6:1 Wo kwabazinzileyo eSiyoni, nabalondekile entabeni yaseSamariya, abaqhamileyo besokuqala sezizwe, efika kubo indlu yakwa-Israyeli!
Amos 6:2 Dlulelani eKaline, nibone; nisuke lapho, niye eHamati elikhulu, bese nehlela eGati lamaFilisti; bahle kunale mibuso yini, umkhawulo wabo mkhulu kunomkhawulo wenu na?
Amos 6:3 nina enidedisela kude usuku olubi, kepha nisondezile isihlalo sobudlova.
Amos 6:4 Balele emibhedeni yophondo lwendlovu, bacambalala ezinkukhweni zabo; badla amawundlu omhlambi namathole avela phakathi kwesibaya.
Amos 6:5 Bahaya ngomsindo wogubhu, baziqambela izinto zokubethwa njengoDavide.
Amos 6:6 Baphuza imikhele yewayini, bazigcoba ngamafutha amahle, kepha abadabuki ngokuchithwa kukaJosefa.
Amos 6:7 Ngalokho sebeyakuthunjwa phakathi kwabokuqala abathunjwayo, kusuke ukuxokozela kwabacambalalayo.
Amos 6:8 INkosi uJehova izifungile, usho uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti, yathi: “Ngiyanengwa ngukuzidla kukaJakobe, ngizonda izindlu zakhe zamakhosi; ngiyakukhaphela umuzi nokugcwala kwawo.”
Amos 6:9 Kuyakuthi uma kusele amadoda ayishumi endlini inye, afe.
Amos 6:10 Lapho umngane womuntu emphakamisa kanye noshisayo ukuba bakhiphe amathambo endlini, abesesho kophakathi kwendlu impela ukuthi: “Kusekhona muntu kuwe na?” yena esephendula athi: “Akusekho,” khona wothi: “Thula, ngokuba asinakuthinta igama likaJehova.”
Amos 6:11 Ngokuba bhekani, uJehova uyayaleza: uyakushaya indlu enkulu ibe yizihlephu, nendlu encane ibe yizingcezu.
Amos 6:12 Amahhashi ayagijima emadwaleni, kulinywa elwandle ngezinkabi, na? Ngokuba niphendulile ukwahlulela kwaba yisihlungu, nezithelo zokulunga zaba ngumhlonyane,
Amos 6:13 nina enithokoza ngento engelutho, nithi: “Asizithathelanga izimpondo ngamandla ethu na?”
Amos 6:14 “Ngokuba bhekani, ngiyakunivusela isizwe nina ndlu ka-Israyeli,” usho uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti; “bayakunicindezela kusukela ekuyeni eHamati kuze kube semfuleni wase-Araba.”
Amos 7:1 INkosi uJehova yangibonisa kanje: bheka, yayenza isikhonyane ekuqaleni kokumila kotshani bamuva; bheka, kwakungutshani bamuva emva kokusika kwenkosi.
Amos 7:2 Kwathi lapho sesidlile utshani bezwe, ngathi: “Nkosi Jehova, ake uthethelele; uJakobe uyakuma kanjani, ngokuba mncane.”
Amos 7:3 UJehova wazisola ngalokhu. “Akuyikubakho,” usho uJehova.
Amos 7:4 Yayisingibonisa kanje iNkosi uJehova: bheka, iNkosi uJehova yabiza ukulwa ngomlilo; wadla utwa olukhulu, wawusuyakudla futhi isabelo sikaJehova.
Amos 7:5 Ngase ngithi: “Nkosi Jehova, mawuyeke; uJakobe uyakuma kanjani, ngokuba mncane.”
Amos 7:6 UJehova wazisola ngalokhu. “Akuyikubakho,” isho iNkosi uJehova.
Amos 7:7 Wayesengibonisa kanje: bheka, iNkosi yayimi ngasogangeni olwakhiwe ngentambo yomthofu wokumisa, enentambo yomthofu wokumisa esandleni sakhe.
Amos 7:8 UJehova wathi kimi: “Amose, ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Intambo yomthofu wokumisa.” Yayisithi iNkosi: “Bhekani, ngiyakubeka intambo yomthofu wokumisa phakathi kwabantu bami u-Israyeli; angisayikubadlula.
Amos 7:9 “Izindawo eziphakemeyo zika-Isaka ziyakuchithwa, nezindlu ezingcwele zakwa-Israyeli ziyakuqothulwa, ngivukele indlu kaJerobowamu ngenkemba.”
Amos 7:10 U-Amasiya umpristi waseBethele wayesethumela kuJerobowamu inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, wathi: “U-Amose ukwenzele ugobe phakathi kwendlu yakwa-Israyeli; izwe alinakuthwala onke amazwi akhe.
Amos 7:11 Ngokuba u-Amose ushilo kanje, wathi: “UJerobowamu uyakufa ngenkemba, u-Israyeli athunjwe nokuthunjwa ezweni lakhe.”
Amos 7:12 U-Amasiya wayesethi ku-Amose: “Wena mboni, hamba, ubalekele ezweni lakwaJuda, udle khona isinkwa, uprofethe khona;
Amos 7:13 ungabe usaqhubeka kodwa ukuprofetha eBethele, ngokuba liyindlu engcwele yenkosi nendlu yombuso.”
Amos 7:14 Wayesephendula u-Amose, wathi ku-Amasiya: “Angisiye umprofethi mina, nendodana yomprofethi angisiyo, kepha ngangingumalusi, ngangitshala imithombe.
Amos 7:15 Kepha uJehova wangisusa ekulandeleni umhlambi; uJehova wathi kimi: ‘Hamba uprofethe kubantu bami u-Israyeli.’
Amos 7:16 Manje yizwa izwi likaJehova lokuthi: Wena uthi: “ ‘Ungaprofethi ngo-Israyeli, ungaconsisi izwi lakho phezu kwendlu ka-Isaka.’
Amos 7:17 “Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “ ‘Umkakho uyakufeba emzini, namadodana akho namadodakazi akho ayakuwa ngenkemba, nezwe liyakudatshulwa ngentambo; wena uyakufela ezweni elingcolileyo, u-Israyeli athunjwe nokuthunjwa ezweni lakhe.’ ”
Amos 8:1 INkosi uJehova yayisingibonisa kanje: bheka, nanto iqoma lezithelo zasehlobo.
Amos 8:2 Yathi: “Amose, ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Iqoma lezithelo zasehlobo.” Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “Ukuphela sekufikile kubantu bami u-Israyeli; angisayikumdlula.
Amos 8:3 “Izihlabelelo zethempeli ziyakuba ngukuhhewula ngalolo suku,” isho iNkosi uJehova; “izidumbu ziyakuba ziningi, zilahlwe ezindaweni zonke. Thulani!”
Amos 8:4 Yizwani lokhu nina enigwinya abampofu, nenichitha abaswelayo bezwe,
Amos 8:5 nithi: “Kuyakudlula nini ukwethwasa kwenyanga ukuba sithengise ngamabele, nesabatha ukuba sikhiphe ukolweni, senze i-efa libe lincane, senze ishekeli libe likhulu, senze izilinganiso ukuba zikhohlise,
Amos 8:6 ukuze sithenge abampofu ngesiliva nabaswelayo ngamabhangqa ezicathulo, sithengise ngamahlunge kakolweni.”
Amos 8:7 UJehova ufungile ukuziqhenya kukaJakobe ngokuthi: “Impela angiyikukhohlwa kuze kube phakade nesisodwa sezenzo zabo.
Amos 8:8 “Umhlaba awuyikuqhaqhazela ngalokho, balile bonke abakhileyo kuwo, na? Yebo, uyakukhukhumala wonke njengeNayile, unyakaze, ubuye ubohle njengomfula waseGibithe.
Amos 8:9 “Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku,” isho iNkosi uJehova, “ngilishonise ilanga emini, ngenze ukuba kube mnyama emhlabeni emini ekhanyayo.
Amos 8:10 Ngiyakuphendula imikhosi yenu ibe ngukukhala, nezihlabelelo zenu zonke zibe yizililo, ngibeke izindwangu zamasaka ezinkalweni zonke, nobumpandla kuwo onke amakhanda, ngikwenze kube njengokulilela indodana eyodwa, ukuphela kwakho kube njengosuku olumunyu.”
Amos 8:11 “Bhekani, izinsuku ziyeza,” isho iNkosi uJehova, “lapho ngiyakuthuma indlala ezweni, kungabi yindlala yezinkwa, kungabi ngukomela amanzi, kepha kube ngeyokuzwa amazwi kaJehova.
Amos 8:12 Bayakuzulazula kusukela elwandle kuze kube selwandle, kusukela enyakatho kuze kube sempumalanga, bahambahambe ukufuna izwi likaJehova, kepha abayikulifumana.
Amos 8:13 “Ngalolo suku izintombi ezinhle nezinsizwa ziyakudangala ukoma.
Amos 8:14 Abafunga icala laseSamariya, bathi: ‘Kuphila kukankulunkulu wakho, Dani,’ nokuthi: ‘Kuphila kothandiweyo wakho, Beri Sheba,’ bayakuwa, bangabe besavuka.”
Amos 9:1 Ngayibona iNkosi imi ngase-altare, yathi: “Shaya izihloko zezinsika, ukuze imigulugulu izamazame, uzaphule phezu kwamakhanda abo bonke; abaseleyo babo ngiyakubabulala ngenkemba; obalekayo kubo akayikubaleka, nophunyukayo kubo akayikuphunyuka.
Amos 9:2 Noma befohla endaweni yabafileyo, isandla sami siyakubakhipha khona; noma bekhuphukela ezulwini, ngiyakubehlisa khona.
Amos 9:3 Noma becasha esiqongweni saseKarmeli, ngiyakubafunisisa, ngibakhiphe khona; nakuba befihlekile emehlweni ami phakathi kolwandle, ngiyakuyala inyoka ukuba iphume khona, ibalume.
Amos 9:4 Noma beya ekuthunjweni phambi kwezitha zabo, ngiyakubiza inkemba ukuba iphume khona, ibabulale, ngibeke amehlo ami kubo kube kubi, kungabi kuhle.”
Amos 9:5 INkosi uNkulunkulu Sebawoti yiyo ethinta umhlaba, uncibilike, bakhale bonke abakhileyo kuwo; uyakukhukhumala wonke njengeNayile, ubuye ubohle njengomfula waseGibithe;
Amos 9:6 yiyona ewakhayo amakamelo ayo aphezulu ezulwini, isekele igobela lawo emhlabeni; yiyona ewabizayo amanzi olwandle, iwathululele ebusweni bomhlaba; nguJehova igama layo.
Amos 9:7 “Aninjengabantwana bakwaKushe kimi, nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, na?” usho uJehova. “Angikhuphulanga u-Israyeli ezweni laseGibithe, namaFilisti eKafitori, nama-Aramu eKhiri, na?”
Amos 9:8 “Bhekani, amehlo eNkosi uJehova akuwo umbuso owonayo; ngiyakuwuchitha ebusweni bomhlaba, ngingachithi nokho ngokupheleleyo indlu kaJakobe,” usho uJehova.
Amos 9:9 “Ngokuba bheka, ngiyakuyaleza, ngizulazulise indlu yakwa-Israyeli phakathi kwabo bonke abezizwe, njengalokhu kuhlungwa ngesihlungo, kepha akuyikuwela nembewu eyodwa emhlabathini.
Amos 9:10 Zonke izoni zabantu bami ziyakufa ngenkemba, zona ezithi: ‘Okubi akuyikusondela kithina, kusehlele.’ ”
Amos 9:11 “Ngalolo suku ngiyakumisa idokodo likaDavide eliwileyo, ngivale imifantu yalo; ngiyakumisa izihlephu zalo, ngilakhe njengasezinsukwini zasendulo,
Amos 9:12 ukuze badle ifa lensali yakwa-Edomi nelezizwe zonke ezabizwa ngegama lami,” usho uJehova okwenza lokhu.
Amos 9:13 “Bhekani, izinsuku ziyeza,” usho uJehova, “lapho olimayo eyakufica ovunayo, nonyathela izithelo zomvini ohlwanyela imbewu; izintaba ziyakuconsa iwayini, amagquma onke ancibilike.
Amos 9:14 Ngiyakubuyisa ukuthunjwa kwabantu bami u-Israyeli, bakhe imizi echithekileyo, bahlale kuyo; bayakutshala izivini, baphuze iwayini lazo; bayakwenza nezivande, badle izithelo zazo.
Amos 9:15 Ngiyakubatshala ezweni labo, bangabe besasishulwa ezweni labo engibanike lona,” usho uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho.
Obad 1:1 Umbono ka-Obadiya. Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova ngo-Edomi, ithi: Sizwile imibiko evela kuJehova, kuthunyiwe isithunywa phakathi kwabezizwe ngokuthi: “Vukani, simvukele ngokulwa.”
Obad 1:2 “Bheka, ngiyakukwenza ube mncane phakathi kwabezizwe; udeleleke kakhulu.
Obad 1:3 Ukuzidla kwenhliziyo yakho kukukhohlisile wena ohlezi emifantwini yamawa, ondawo yakho yokuhlala iphakeme, othi enhliziyweni yakho: Ngubani ongangehlisela phansi na?
Obad 1:4 Noma uphakama njengokhozi, kubekwe isidleke sakho phakathi kwezinkanyezi, ngiyakukwehlisa khona,” usho uJehova.
Obad 1:5 “Uma amasela efika kuwe, nabaphangi ebusuku yeka ukuchithwa kwakho bebengayikweba baze baneliswe na? Uma abavuna izithelo zomvini befika kuwe, bebengayikushiya umkhothozo na?
Obad 1:6 Yeka ukufunisiswa kuka-Esawu, yeka ukuphenywa kwamagugu akhe afihliweyo!
Obad 1:7 Bonke abantu besivumelwano sakho bayakukuxosha emkhawulweni; abantu ababehlalisana nawe ngokuthula bayakukukhohlisa, bakwahlule; abadla isinkwa sakho bayakubeka ugibe phansi kwakho; akakho oluqondayo.
Obad 1:8 “Angithi ngiyakuchitha abahlakaniphileyo kwa-Edomi ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “nokuqonda entabeni yakwa-Esawu, na?
Obad 1:9 Amaqhawe akho, Themani, ayakuphela amandla, ukuze yilowo nalowo anqunywe entabeni yakwa-Esawu ngokubulawa.
Obad 1:10 Ngenxa yendluzula eyenziwa kumfowenu uJakobe, amahloni ayakukusibekela, unqunywe kuze kube phakade.
Obad 1:11 Ngosuku owema kude ngalo, ngosuku abafokazi abasusa ngalo imfuyo yakhe, nabezizwe bangena ngamasango akhe, benza inkatho ngeJerusalema, nawe wawunjengomunye wabo.
Obad 1:12 Kepha ungabheki usuku lomfowenu ngosuku lobufokazi bakhe, ungathokozi ngabantwana bakwaJuda ngosuku lokuchithwa kwabo, ungaqhalazi ngosuku losizi.
Obad 1:13 Ungangeni ngesango labantu bami ngosuku lwesigemegeme sabo, ungabheki ukuhlupheka kwabo ngosuku lwesigemegeme sabo, ningabeki sandla emfuyweni yabo ngosuku lwesigemegeme sabo.
Obad 1:14 Ungemi enhlanganweni yezindlela ukunquma abaphunyukileyo bakhe, ungakhapheli abaseleyo bakhe ngosuku losizi.
Obad 1:15 “Ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele ezizweni zonke; njengokwenza kwakho kuyakwenziwa kanjalo kuwe; izenzo zakho ziyakubuyela ekhanda lakho.
Obad 1:16 Ngokuba njengalokho niphuzile entabeni yami engcwele, bayakuphuza kanjalo bonke abezizwe, baphuze, bagwinye, babe njengokungathi abazange babe khona.
Obad 1:17 Kepha entabeni yaseSiyoni kuyakuba khona abasindayo, ibe ngcwele, nendlu yakwaJakobe iyakudla ifa layo.
Obad 1:18 Indlu yakwaJakobe iyakuba ngumlilo, indlu kaJosefa ibe yilangabi, indlu ka-Esawu ibe ngamabibi, bawashise, bawaqede; akuyikubakho oseleyo endlini ka-Esawu,” ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile.
Obad 1:19 Abaseningizimu bayakudla ifa lentaba yakwa-Esawu, nabasehlanzeni ifa lamaFilisti, badle ifa lezwe lakwa-Efrayimi nezwe laseSamariya, uBenjamini adle iGileyadi.
Obad 1:20 Abathunjwa bale mpi yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli abaphakathi kwamaKhanani kuze kube seSarefati nabathunjwa baseJerusalema abaseSefaradi bayakudla ifa lemizi yaseningizimu.
Obad 1:21 Abasindisi bayakukhuphukela entabeni yaseSiyoni ukuyakwahlulela intaba yakwa-Esawu, umbuso besewuba ngokaJehova.
Jonah 1:1 Izwi likaJehova lafika kuJona indodana ka-Amithayi, lathi:
Jonah 1:2 “Suka uye eNineve, umuzi omkhulu, umemeze phezu kwalo, ngokuba ububi balo benyukele ebusweni bami.”
Jonah 1:3 Kepha uJona wasuka ebusweni bukaJehova ukuba abalekele eTharishishi, wehlela eJopha, wafumana umkhumbi obuyakuya eTharishishi; wakhokha imali yawo, wakhwela kuwo, ukuba ahambe nawo, aye eTharishishi, asuke ebusweni bukaJehova.
Jonah 1:4 Kodwa uJehova waphonsa umoya omkhulu elwandle, kwaba yisiphepho esikhulu elwandle; kwacatshangwa ukuthi umkhumbi uyakwaphulwa.
Jonah 1:5 Khona amatilosi esaba, akhala, kwaba yilelo nalelo kunkulunkulu walo, aphonsa elwandle impahla ebisemkhunjini ukuba ube lula kubo. Kepha uJona wayehlele phakathi komkhumbi, wayeselele ubuthongo.
Jonah 1:6 Kwase kusondela kuye induna yomkhumbi, yathi: “Unani wena olele ubuthongo na? Vuka, ubize uNkulunkulu wakho; mhlawumbe lo Nkulunkulu uyakusikhumbula ukuba singabhubhi.”
Jonah 1:7 Bathi, kwaba yilowo nalowo kumngane wakhe: “Wozani senze inkatho, sazi ukuthi kungenxa kabani lobu bubi buphezu kwethu.” Base benza inkatho; inkatho yamudla uJona.
Jonah 1:8 Base bethi kuye: “Ake usitshele ukuthi kungenxa kabani lobu bubi buphezu kwethu. Umsebenzi wakho uyini? Uvelaphi? Liphi izwe lakini, ungowasiphi isizwe na?”
Jonah 1:9 Wathi kubo: “NgingumHeberu; ngiyamesaba uJehova, uNkulunkulu wasezulwini, owenzile ulwandle nomhlabathi owomileyo.”
Jonah 1:10 Base besaba abantu ngokwesaba okukhulu, bathi kuye: “Kuyini lokhu okwenzileyo na?” Ngokuba base bazi ukuthi ubalekile ebusweni bukaJehova, lokhu ebatshelile.
Jonah 1:11 Base bethi kuye: “Siyakwenze njani kuwe, ukuze ulwandle luthule kithina,” ngokuba ulwandle luyaqhubeka lube nesivunguvungu.
Jonah 1:12 Wathi kubo: “Ngiphakamiseni, ningiphonse elwandle, bese luthula kini ulwandle, ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi lesi siphepho esikhulu siphezu kwenu ngenxa yami.”
Jonah 1:13 Kepha amadoda agwedla ukuba abuyele emhlabathini, kepha ahluleka, ngokuba ulwandle lwaqhubeka lwaba nesiphepho kuwo.
Jonah 1:14 Ayesekhala kuJehova, athi: “Siyakuncenga: masingabhubhi ngenxa yalo muntu, ungabeki phezu kwethu igazi elingenacala, ngokuba wena Jehova wenzile njengokuhlosa kwakho.”
Jonah 1:15 Amphakamisa uJona, amphonsa elwandle; ulwandle lwase lupheza ukufutha.
Jonah 1:16 Amadoda ayesesaba uJehova ngokwesaba okukhulu; ahlabela uJehova umhlatshelo, enza izithembiso.
Jonah 1:17 UJehova wamisela inhlanzi enkulu ukuba imgwinye uJona; uJona wayesezibilinini zenhlanzi izinsuku ezintathu nobusuku obuthathu.
Jonah 2:1 UJona wakhuleka kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakhe esezibilinini zenhlanzi,
Jonah 2:2 wathi: “Ekuhluphekeni kwami ngakhala kuJehova, wangiphendula; ngisesiswini sendawo yabafileyo ngamemeza, wezwa izwi lami.
Jonah 2:3 Wangiphonsa ekujuleni, enhliziyweni yolwandle, umfula wangihaqa; onke amadlambi akho namaza akho adlula phezu kwami.
Jonah 2:4 Ngathi mina: ‘Ngixoshiwe emehlweni akho;’ nokho ngiyakubuye ngibheke ithempeli lakho elingcwele.
Jonah 2:5 Amanzi angihaqa kwaze kwaba nasekuphileni kwami, utwa lwangikaka. Umhlanga wathandela ekhanda lami.
Jonah 2:6 Ngehla ngasemikhawulweni yezintaba; imigoqo yomhlaba yayisemva kwami kuze kube phakade. Kepha wakhuphula ukuphila kwami egodini, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami.
Jonah 2:7 “Lapho umphefumulo wami waphela amandla phakathi kwami, ngamkhumbula uJehova; umkhuleko wami wangena kuwe ethempelini lakho elingcwele.
Jonah 2:8 “Abagcina okungumoya nokuyize nje bashiya Othembekile kubo.
Jonah 2:9 Kepha mina ngiyakukuhlabela ngezwi lokudumisa, ngigcwalise engikuthembisileyo. Ukusindiswa kukuye uJehova.”
Jonah 2:10 UJehova wakhuluma kuyo inhlanzi, yamhlanzela uJona emhlabathini owomileyo.
Jonah 3:1 Izwi likaJehova lafika kuJona ngokwesibili, lathi:
Jonah 3:2 “Suka uye eNineve, umuzi omkhulu, umemezele kulo isimemezelo esikhulu engasikhuluma kuwe.”
Jonah 3:3 Wayesesuka uJona, waya eNineve njengezwi likaJehova. INineve lalingumuzi omkhulu kakhulu, uhambo lwezinsuku ezintathu.
Jonah 3:4 UJona waqala ukungena emzini, uhambo losuku lwaba lunye, wamemeza wathi: “Kusezakuba yizinsuku ezingamashumi amane, bese lichithwa iNineve.”
Jonah 3:5 Abantu baseNineve bakholwa nguNkulunkulu; bamemezela ukuzila ukudla, bembatha izindwangu zamasaka, kusukela kwabakhulu babo kwaze kwaba kwabancane.
Jonah 3:6 Kepha izwi lafinyelela enkosini yaseNineve; yasukuma esihlalweni sayo sobukhosi, yakhumula ingubo yayo, yazimboza ngendwangu yamasaka, yahlala phansi emlotheni.
Jonah 3:7 Yamemezela, yasho eNineve ngomthetho wenkosi nabakhulu bayo, yathi: “Makungabikho muntu onambitha utho, nasilwane, nankomo, namvu, bangadli, bangaphuzi manzi,
Jonah 3:8 kepha bambozwe ngendwangu yamasaka, umuntu nesilwane, kukhalwe kuNkulunkulu ngamandla, yebo, kubuyiswe yilowo nalowo endleleni yakhe embi nasebudloveni obusezandleni zakhe.
Jonah 3:9 Ngubani owaziyo uma uNkulunkulu engayikubuya, azisole, abuye ekufutheni kwentukuthelo yakhe, size singabhubhi, na?”
Jonah 3:10 Lapho uNkulunkulu esebona izenzo zabo ukuthi babuya endleleni yabo embi, uNkulunkulu wazisola ngokubi owayeshilo ukuthi uyakukwenza kubo, akakwenzanga.
Jonah 4:1 Kepha lokho kwaba kubi kakhulu kuJona, wathukuthela.
Jonah 4:2 Wakhuleka kuJehova, wathi: “Ngiyakuncenga, Jehova; lokho kwakungesilo izwi lami ngisekhona ezweni lakithi na? Ngalokho ngakwandulela ngokubalekela eTharishishi, ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi unguNkulunkulu onomusa nobumnene, wephuza ukuthukuthela, unesihe esikhulu, uzisola ngokubi;
Jonah 4:3 ngalokho, Jehova, ake ususe kimi ukuphila kwami, ngokuba kungcono kimi ukufa kunokuphila.”
Jonah 4:4 Wayesethi uJehova: “Wenza kahle ngokuthukuthela na?”
Jonah 4:5 UJona wayesephuma emzini, wahlala ngasempumalanga komuzi, wazenzela idokodo khona, wahlala phansi kwalo emthunzini, ukuze abone ukuthi kuyakwenziwa njani kuwo umuzi.
Jonah 4:6 UJehova uNkulunkulu walungisela umhlakuva, wawukhulisa phezu kukaJona ukuba ube ngumthunzi phezu kwekhanda lakhe ukumophula kokubi kwakhe. UJona wathokoza ngomhlakuva ngokuthokoza okukhulu.
Jonah 4:7 Kepha sekuzakuvela ukusa ngangomuso uNkulunkulu walungisela impehlwa; yawuphehla umhlakuva, wabuna.
Jonah 4:8 Kwathi ekuphumeni kwelanga uNkulunkulu walungisela umoya oshisayo wasempumalanga; ilanga lashaya ekhanda likaJona, waba nesiyezi, wazicelela ukuba afe, wathi: “Kungcono kimi ukufa kunokuphila.”
Jonah 4:9 Wayesethi uNkulunkulu kuJona: “Wenza kahle ngokuthukuthela ngenxa yomhlakuva na?” Wathi: “Ngenza kahle ngokuthukuthela kuze kube sekufeni.”
Jonah 4:10 Wayesethi uJehova: “Wena wawuhawukela umhlakuva ongawukhandlekelanga nongawukhulisanga, owamila ebusuku bunye, wabhubha ebusuku bunye;
Jonah 4:11 mina-ke bengingayikulihawukela iNineve, umuzi omkhulu, okukuwo abantu abangaphezu kwezinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amabili abangakwazi ukwahlukanisa isandla sokunene nesokhohlo, kanye nezinkomo eziningi, na?”
Mic 1:1 Izwi likaJehova elafika kuMika waseMoresheti ezinsukwini zikaJothamu, no-Ahazi, noHezekiya, amakhosi akwaJuda, owalibona ngeSamariya neJerusalema.
Mic 1:2 Zwanini, bantu bonke, uqaphele, mhlaba nokugcwala kwakho, iNkosi uJehova ibe ngufakazi ngani, iNkosi isethempelini layo elingcwele.
Mic 1:3 Ngokuba bhekani, uJehova uphuma endaweni yakhe, ehle, anyathele ezindaweni eziphakemeyo zomhlaba.
Mic 1:4 Izintaba ziyakuncibilika phansi kwakhe, nezigodi ziyakuqhekezeka njengengcina phambi komlilo, njengamanzi athululwe emaweni.
Mic 1:5 Konke lokhu kungenxa yesiphambeko sikaJakobe nangezono zendlu yakwa-Israyeli. Siyini isiphambeko sikaJakobe? Asiyilo iSamariya na? Ziyini izindawo eziphakemeyo zakwaJuda? Aziyilo iJerusalema na?
Mic 1:6 “Ngiyakwenza iSamariya libe yizihlephu zasendle nendawo yokutshala izivini, ngiqulele amatshe alo esigodini, ngambule isisekelo salo.
Mic 1:7 Zonke izithombe zalo ezibaziweyo ziyakwaphulwa, nakho konke elikukhokhelweyo kuyakushiswa ngomlilo, nayo yonke imifanekiso ngiyakuyenza ukuba ibe yincithakalo, ngokuba likuqoqile ngenkokhelo yobufebe; kuyakubuye kube yinkokhelo yobufebe.”
Mic 1:8 Ngenxa yalokho ngiyakukhala, ngihhewule, ngihambe ngihlutshuliwe, ngihamba ze; ngenze isililo njengamakhanka, ngikhale njengezintshe.
Mic 1:9 Ngokuba amanxeba alo awanakuphulukiswa, lokhu sekufikile nakwaJuda, kufinyelela esangweni labantu bami naseJerusalema.
Mic 1:10 Ningakulandisi eGati, ningakhali e-Akha; eBeti Afera huquzelani othulini.
Mic 1:11 Dlulani nina enakhileyo eShafiri ngobunqunu nangehlazo; abakhe eSawanani abaphumi; ukukhala kwaseBeti Eseli akunivumeli ukuhlala khona.
Mic 1:12 Ngokuba abakhe eMaroti banemihelo ngokuhle, lokhu okubi kwehlile kuvela kuJehova, kwafika esangweni laseJerusalema.
Mic 1:13 Bophelani enqoleni ihhashi elinejubane, nina enakhileyo eLakishi; lona lalingukuqala kwezono kuyo indodakazi yaseSiyoni, ngokuba iziphambeko zakwa-Israyeli zafunyanwa kuwe.
Mic 1:14 Ngalokho uyakupha iMoresheti Gati isipho sokuvalelisana; izindlu zase-Akizibi ziyakuba yinkohliso kuwo amakhosi akwa-Israyeli.
Mic 1:15 Ngisezakwehlisa phezu kwenu enakhileyo eMaresha oyakunidla: udumo luka-Israyeli luyakufika e-Adulamu.
Mic 1:16 Ziphucule, zigunde ngenxa yabantwana bokwenama kwakho, wandise ubumpandla bakho njengenqe, ngokuba bayakuthunjwa kuwe.
Mic 2:1 Wo! kwabaceba ububi, benze okubi emibhedeni yabo! Ekukhanyeni kokusa bayakwenza, ngokuba kusemandleni ezandla zabo.
Mic 2:2 Bafisa amasimu, bawadluzule, nezindlu, bazisuse; bacindezela indoda nendlu yayo, umuntu nefa lakhe.
Mic 2:3 Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bhekani, ngiceba okubi ngalo mndeni, eningayikukhipha kukho izintamo zenu; futhi ningahambi ngokuzidla, ngokuba lokhu kuyisikhathi esibi.
Mic 2:4 Ngalolo suku bayakuphakamisa umfanekiso ngani, bakhale isililo, bathi: ‘Sichithiwe nokuchithwa; isabelo sabantu bami sinikwa omunye; yeka ukubuya kwakhe kimi; abahlubuki babelwa amasimu ethu.’ ”
Mic 2:5 Ngalokho akuyikubakho ophonsa intambo ngenkatho ebandleni likaJehova.
Mic 2:6 “Ningaprofethi,” baprofetha, basho njalo, “ningaprofethi ngalokho; ihlazo aliyikusifica.”
Mic 2:7 Kuyakushiwo, nina ndlu kaJakobe, ukuthi uMoya kaJehova unyinyekile; yizenzo zakhe lezi na? “Awamahle yini amazwi ami kohamba ngobuqotho?
Mic 2:8 Kepha kade bevukile abantu bami baba yizitha; nihlubula ingubo esambathweni sabadlula ngethemba, befulathele ukulwa.
Mic 2:9 Niyaxosha abesifazane babantu bami ezindlini zokuthokoza kwabo, nisusa ezinganeni zabo ubukhosi bami kuze kube phakade.
Mic 2:10 Sukumani nihambe, ngokuba lokhu akusikho ukuphumula kwenu; ngenxa yabayingcosana niyachitha ngokuchitha okunamandla.
Mic 2:11 Uma bekuhambahamba umuntu okhuluma umoya nje namanga, athi: ‘Ngiyakuprofetha kuwe ngewayini nangophuzo olunamandla,’ ubeyakuba ngumprofethi walaba bantu.
Mic 2:12 “Ngiyakukubutha, Jakobe, wonke wakho; ngiyakuqoqa nokuqoqa insali yakwa-Israyeli; ngiyakubabeka ndawonye njengezimvu zaseBosira, njengomhlambi phakathi kwedlelo lawo, kwenziwe ukukhamuluka okuvela kubantu.
Mic 2:13 Umfohli ukhuphuka ngaphambi kwabo; sebefohlile, badlulela esangweni, baphuma ngalo; inkosi yabo idlulile phambi kwabo, noJehova usesihlokweni sabo.”
Mic 3:1 Ngathi: “Zwanini nina zinhloko zakwaJakobe, nani zikhulu zendlu yakwa-Israyeli ukuthi: Akusikho okwenu ukwazi ukulunga
Mic 3:2 nina enizonda okuhle, nithanda okubi, enebula kubo isikhumba sabo, nenyama yabo emathanjeni abo,
Mic 3:3 enidla inyama yabantu bami, nihlinza kubo isikhumba sabo, naphula amathambo abo, yebo, nibaqoba njengokwasekhanzini nanjengenyama phakathi kwebhodwe.”
Mic 3:4 Khona bayakukhala kuJehova, kepha akayikubaphendula; uyakusitheza ubuso bakhe kubo ngaleso sikhathi ngenxa yokwenza kwabo izenzo zabo zibe zimbi.
Mic 3:5 Usho kanje uJehova: “Ngabaprofethi abadukisa abantu bami, abathi, bese nakho okokuhlafuna ngamazinyo abo, bamemeze bathi: ‘Ukuthula,’ nongabeki lutho emlonyeni wabo bamlungisele ukulwa.
Mic 3:6 Ngalokho ubusuku buyakunehlela ukuze ningabi nambono, kuhlwe kini, ningabe nisabhula; ilanga liyakushonela abaprofethi, usuku lube mnyama phezu kwabo.
Mic 3:7 Ababoni bayakuba namahloni, ababhuli bayangaze; bayakumboza amadevu abo bonke, ngokuba akuveli mpendulo kuNkulunkulu.”
Mic 3:8 Kepha mina ngigcwele amandla ngoMoya kaJehova ngokulunga nangobuqhawe ukuba ngimtshele uJakobe iziphambeko zakhe, u-Israyeli izono zakhe.
Mic 3:9 Ake nizwe lokhu nina zinhloko zendlu kaJakobe nani zikhulu zendlu yakwa-Israyeli eninengwa ngukwahlulelwa, nihlanekezela konke ukulunga,
Mic 3:10 enakha iSiyoni ngegazi neJerusalema ngobubi,
Mic 3:11 elizinhloko zalo zahlulela ngemivuzo, nelibapristi balo bafundisa ngenkokhelo, nelibaprofethi balo babhula ngemali, bencike nokho kuJehova, bethi: “UJehova akaphakathi kwethu na?” Asiyikwehlelwa ngokubi.
Mic 3:12 Ngalokho ngenxa yenu iSiyoni liyakulinywa njengensimu, iJerusalema libe yincithakalo, intaba yendlu ibe yizindawo eziphakemeyo zamahlathi.
Mic 4:1 Kepha kuyakuthi ngezinsuku ezizayo intaba yendlu kaJehova iqiniswe esiqongweni sezintaba, iphakame kunamagquma, nabantu bayakugobhozela khona.
Mic 4:2 Izizwe eziningi ziyakuhamba, zithi: “Wozani sikhuphukele entabeni kaJehova nasendlini kaNkulunkulu kaJakobe; uyakusifundisa izindlela zakhe, sihambe emikhondweni yakhe, ngokuba umthetho uyakuvela eSiyoni, nezwi likaJehova eJerusalema.
Mic 4:3 Uyakwahlulela phakathi kwezizwe eziningi, anqume phakathi kwezizwe ezinamandla ezikude; ziyakukhanda izinkemba zazo zibe ngamakhuba, imikhonto yazo ibe ngocelemba; isizwe asiyikuphakamisela isizwe inkemba, zingabe zisafuna ukulwa.
Mic 4:4 Bayakuhlala, kube yilowo nalowo phansi komvini wakhe naphansi komkhiwane wakhe; akakho oyakubesabisa, ngokuba umlomo kaJehova Sebawoti ukhulumile.
Mic 4:5 Ngokuba bonke abantu bahamba, kube yilowo nalowo ngegama likankulunkulu wakhe, kepha thina siyakuhamba ngegama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu kuze kube phakade naphakade.
Mic 4:6 “Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “ngiyakubutha abaqhugayo, ngiqoqe abaxoshiweyo nengenze okubi kubo,
Mic 4:7 ngenze abaqhugayo babe yinsali, abadediselwe kude babe yisizwe esinamandla; uJehova uyakubusa phezu kwabo entabeni yaseSiyoni kusukela manje kuze kube phakade.
Mic 4:8 Wena mbhoshongo womhlambi, negquma lendodakazi yaseSiyoni kuyakufika kuwe, yebo, ukubusa kokuqala kuyakufika, umbuso wendodakazi yaseJerusalema.”
Mic 4:9 Umemezelani manje ngokumemeza okungakho na? Ayikho inkosi kuwe, ubhubhile umluleki wakho, lokhu ubanjwe yimihelo njengobelethayo.
Mic 4:10 Yiba nemihelo, uzale, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni njengobelethayo, ngokuba manje uyakuphuma emzini, uhlale endle, ufike naseBabele, lapho uzakophulwa khona; lapho uJehova uyakukukhulula esandleni sezitha zakho.
Mic 4:11 Manje izizwe eziningi zikubuthanele; zithi: “Malingcoliswe, amehlo ethu alibuke iSiyoni.”
Mic 4:12 Kepha azazi imicabango kaJehova, aziqondi amasu akhe, ngokuba uzibuthile njengezithungu esibuyeni.
Mic 4:13 “Suka ubhule, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, ngokuba ngiyakwenza uphondo lwakho lube yinsimbi, nezinselo zakho ngizenze insimbi; uyakuchoboza abantu abaningi,” kwahlukaniselwe uJehova inzuzo yabo, nemfuyo yabo kuyo iNkosi yomhlaba wonke.
Mic 5:1 Buthana ngamaviyo, ndodakazi yamaviyo; usivimbezele, bayakumshaya umahluleli wakwa-Israyeli ngenduku esihlathini.
Mic 5:2 “Kepha wena Betlehema Efratha, omncane ukuba ube phakathi kwemindeni yakwaJuda, ngiyakuphunyelwa ngovela kuwe, ozakuba ngumbusi kwa-Israyeli, okuvela kwakhe kusukela endulo ezinsukwini zaphakade.”
Mic 5:3 Ngalokho bayakukhashelwa, bese yibuyela insali yabafowabo kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli.
Mic 5:4 Uyakuma, aluse ngamandla kaJehova nangokuphakama kwegama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakhe; sebeyakuhlala, ngokuba uzakuba mkhulu kuze kube semajukujukwini omhlaba.
Mic 5:5 Ukuthula kuyakuba yilokhu: lapho umAsiriya engena ezweni lakithi, anyathele ezindlini zethu zobukhosi, siyakumvusela abelusi abayisikhombisa nezikhulu zabantu eziyisishiyagalombili.
Mic 5:6 Bayakuchitha izwe lase-Asiriya ngenkemba, nezwe lakwaNimrode ezintubeni zalo, asophule kumAsiriya, lapho engena ezweni lakithi, nalapho enyathela emikhawulweni yethu.
Mic 5:7 Insali yakwaJakobe iyakuba phakathi kwabantu abaningi njengamazolo avela kuJehova, ngengezihlambi otshanini ezingahlaleli muntu, zingahlaleli abantwana babantu.
Mic 5:8 Insali yakwaJakobe iyakuba phakathi kwezizwe, phakathi kwabantu abaningi, njengengonyama phakathi kwezilwane zasehlathini, njengebhongo lengonyama phakathi kwemihlambi yezimvu, elithi lapho lidabula, linyathele, lidwengule, kungekho owophulayo.
Mic 5:9 Masiphakanyiswe isandla sakho phezu kwezitha zakho, zinqunywe zonke izitha zakho.
Mic 5:10 “Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “nginqume amahhashi akho phakathi kwakho, ngichithe izinqola zakho,
Mic 5:11 ngiyinqume imizi yasezweni lakho, ngizidilize zonke izinqaba zakho.
Mic 5:12 Ngiyakunquma ukulumba esandleni sakho, kungabe kusabakho kuwe abahlola imihlola.
Mic 5:13 Ngiyakunquma izithombe zakho ezibaziweyo nezinsika zakho phakathi kwakho, ungabe usakhonza imisebenzi yezandla zakho.
Mic 5:14 Ngiyakubasiphula o-Ashera bakho phakathi kwakho, ngiyichithe imizi yakho.
Mic 5:15 Ngiyakwenza impindiselo ngentukuthelo nangokufutheka kuzo izizwe ezingalalelanga.”
Mic 6:1 Ake nizwe akushoyo uJehova, ethi: “Suka ulwe phambi kwezintaba, uzwise amagquma izwi lakho.
Mic 6:2 Zwanini, zintaba, ukuphikisana kukaJehova, nani zisekelo zomhlaba eziqinileyo, ngokuba uJehova unokuphikisana nabantu bakhe, uyakumelana nabo.
Mic 6:3 “Bantu bami, ngenzeni kini; kuyini enginikhathaze ngakho na? Ngiphenduleni.
Mic 6:4 Nganikhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, nganihlenga endlini yezigqila, ngathuma phambi kwenu oMose, no-Aroni, noMiriyamu.
Mic 6:5 Bantu bami, ake nikhumbule okwacetshwa nguBalaki inkosi yakwaMowabi, nalokho amphendula ngakho uBileyamu indodana kaBeyori, nokwakuphakathi kweShithimi neGiligali, nize nazi izenzo ezilungileyo zikaJehova.”
Mic 6:6 Ngiyakusondela kuJehova nginantoni, ngikhothame kuNkulunkulu ophezulu, na? Ngiyakufika ngiphethe iminikelo yokushiswa, nginamathole amnyaka munye, na?
Mic 6:7 UJehova uyakwenamela izinkulungwane zezinqama nezinkulungwane eziyishumi zemifula yamafutha na? Ngiyakunika izibulo lami ngenxa yesiphambeko sami, isithelo sesisu sami ngenxa yesono senhliziyo yami, na?
Mic 6:8 Ukutshelile, muntu, okuhle; uJehova ufunani kuwe, kungabi ngukwenza ukulunga kuphela nokuthanda umusa, uhambe noNkulunkulu wakho ngokuthobeka, na?
Mic 6:9 Izwi likaJehova liyamemeza kuwo umuzi. Ukwesaba igama lakho ngukusindiswa; zwanini induku noyimisileyo.
Mic 6:10 Kusekhona inzuzo embi endlini yababi, ne-efa elincane eliqalekiswayo, na?
Mic 6:11 “Ukhona ohlanzekile onesilinganiso esibi nesikhwama sezisindo ezikhohlisayo na?
Mic 6:12 “Abacebileyo bawo bagcwele ubudlova, nabakhileyo kuwo bakhuluma amanga, nolimi lwabo lunenkohliso emlonyeni wabo.
Mic 6:13 Ngalokho mina ngiyakugulisa ngokushaya, ngikuchithe ngenxa yezono zakho.
Mic 6:14 Lapho udlayo, awuyikusutha, kube khona ukulamba phakathi kwakho; uyakususa, ungakhululi kodwa, nokukhululayo ngiyakukukhaphela enkembeni.
Mic 6:15 “Uyakutshala, ungavuni kodwa; uyakunyathela iminqumo, ungazigcobi kodwa ngamafutha, nezithelo zomvini, ungaliphuzi nokho iwayini.
Mic 6:16 Izimiso zika-Omri ziyagcinwa, nazo zonke izenzo zendlu ka-Ahabi; nihamba ngamacebo abo; ngalokho ngiyakunenza incithakalo nabakhileyo khona into encimfelwayo; niyakuthwala ihlazo labantu bami.”
Mic 7:1 Maye kimi! Ngokuba nginjengokuvunwa kwezithelo zasehlobo, njengokukhothozwa komvini; akukho hlukuzo lokudliwa; umphefumulo wami uyafisa ikhiwane eliyingqalabutho.
Mic 7:2 Abathembekileyo babhubhile emhlabeni, akakho oqotho phakathi kwabantu; bonke baqamekela igazi; bayazingelana, kube yilowo nalowo umfowabo ngenetha.
Mic 7:3 Izandla zabo ziphezu kokubi ukukuthuthukisa; isikhulu sinesicelo, umahluleli ubheka umvuzo; omkhulu ukhuluma ngesifiso somphefumulo wakhe; bayakwalukanisa.
Mic 7:4 Omuhle wabo unjengobobe, olungileyo mubi kunothango lwameva; usuku lwabalindi bakho nolokuhanjelwa kwakho lufikile; sekuyakuba ngukukhungatheka kubo.
Mic 7:5 Ningamethembi umngane, ningakholwa ngumhlobo; gcina iminyango yomlomo wakho kuye olala ngasesifubeni sakho.
Mic 7:6 Ngokuba indodana idelela uyise; indodakazi ivukela unina; umalokazana uvukela uninazala, nezitha zomuntu ngamadoda endlu yakhe.
Mic 7:7 Kepha mina ngiyakumbheka uJehova; ngiyakulindela uNkulunkulu wokusindiswa kwami; uNkulunkulu wami uyakungizwa.
Mic 7:8 Ungathokozi ngami, sitha sami; ngokuba uma ngiwile, ngiyakuvuka; lapho ngihlezi ebumnyameni, uJehova uzakuba ngukukhanya kwami.
Mic 7:9 Ngiyakuthwala ulaka lukaJehova, ngokuba ngonile kuye, aze amele indaba yami, angenzele ukwahlulelwa, angiphumisele ekukhanyeni, ngibone ukulunga kwakhe.
Mic 7:10 Isitha sami siyakukubona, sisitshekelwe ngamahloni, esona besithi kimi: “Uphi uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho?” Amehlo ami ayakusibona; manje siyakunyathelwa njengodaka lwasezitaladini.
Mic 7:11 Kuyakufika usuku lokwakha izingange zakho; ngalolo suku umkhawulo wakho uyakudediselwa kude.
Mic 7:12 Ngalolo suku bayakufika kuwe bevela e-Asiriya nasemizini yaseGibithe, kusukela eGibithe kuze kube seMfuleni, kusukela elwandle kuze kube selwandle, kusukela entabeni kuze kube sentabeni.
Mic 7:13 Kepha izwe liyakuba yincithakalo ngenxa yabakhileyo kulo ngezenzo zabo.
Mic 7:14 Yalusa abantu bakho ngentonga yakho, izimvu zefa lakho ezihlala zodwa ehlathini phakathi kweKarmeli; mazaluke eBashani nakwaGileyadi njengasezinsukwini zasendulo.
Mic 7:15 “Njengasezinsukwini zokuphuma kwakho ezweni laseGibithe ngiyakubabonisa izimangaliso.”
Mic 7:16 Abezizwe bayakubona, babe namahloni ngamandla abo onke, babeke isandla sabo emlonyeni wabo, izindlebe zabo zibe yizithulu.
Mic 7:17 Bayakukhotha uthuli njengenyoka, baphume bethuthumela njengezinto ezinabuzelayo emhlabathini ezindaweni zazo ezivalelweyo, bafike ngokuqhaqhazela kuJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, besabe ngenxa yakho.
Mic 7:18 Ngubani onguNkulunkulu onjengawe othethelela insali yefa lakho ububi bayo, uyiyekele isiphambeko sayo, na? Akabambeleli entukuthelweni yakhe kuze kube phakade, ngokuba wenamela umusa.
Mic 7:19 Uyakubuye asibekezelele, anyathele phansi ububi bethu; yebo, uyakuphonsa zonke izono zabo ekujuleni kolwandle.
Mic 7:20 Uyakunika uJakobe ukuthembeka no-Abrahama umusa owakufungela obaba kwasezinsukwini zasendulo.
Nah 1:1 Isiprofetho ngeNineve, incwadi yombono kaNahume wase-Elikoshi.
Nah 1:2 UJehova unguNkulunkulu oshisekelayo nophindiselayo; uJehova uyaphindisela, ugcwele ukufutheka; uJehova uphindisela kwabamelene naye, ugcinela izitha zakhe intukuthelo.
Nah 1:3 UJehova wephuza ukuthukuthela, mkhulu ngamandla, akenzi onecala abe msulwa; uJehova unendlela yakhe esivunguvungwini nasesiphephweni, namafu ayibhuqu lezinyawo zakhe.
Nah 1:4 Uyakhuza ulwandle, alomise, ashise nemifula yonke; iBashani liyawuma kanye neKarmeli, nezimbali zaseLebanoni ziyabuna.
Nah 1:5 Izintaba ziyathuthumela phambi kwakhe, amagquma ayancibilika; umhlaba uyaphakama ebusweni bakhe, yebo, nakho konke okuhlala kuwo.
Nah 1:6 Ngubani ongema ebusweni bentukuthelo yakhe na? Ngubani ongema ekufuthekeni kolaka lwakhe na? Ukufutheka kwakhe kuthululiwe njengomlilo, namadwala ayaqhekezeka phambi kwakhe.
Nah 1:7 UJehova muhle, uyinqaba ngosuku lwenhlupheko, uyabazi abaphephela kuye.
Nah 1:8 Kepha ngesikhukhula esiphuphumayo uyakuqeda indawo yakhona, axoshele izitha zakhe ebumnyameni.
Nah 1:9 Enikucebayo ngoJehova uyakuqeda yena; ukuhlupheka akuyikuvela ngokwesibili.
Nah 1:10 Lapho bethandela njengameva, benjengabaminzileyo ophuzweni lwabo, bayakuqedwa nokuqedwa njengamabibi omileyo.
Nah 1:11 Kuphume kuwe owamcebela uJehova okubi, wanika isiluleko esibi.
Nah 1:12 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Noma benamandla, futhi bebaningi, nokho bayakuqedwa, banyamalale; noma ngikuhluphile, angisayikukuhlupha.
Nah 1:13 Sengiyakulaphula ijoka eliphezu kwakho, ngigqabule izibopho zakho.”
Nah 1:14 Kepha uJehova uyalezile ngawe ukuthi akusayikuhlwanyelwa okwegama lakho; endlini yawonkulunkulu bakho ngiyakunquma izithombe ezibaziweyo nezibunjiweyo; ngiyakulungisa ithuna lakho, ngokuba awuyinto yalutho.
Nah 1:15 Bheka ezintabeni izinyawo zoletha izindaba ezinhle, omemezela ukuthula. Gubha imikhosi yakho, Juda, ugcwalise izithembiso zakho, ngokuba omubi akasayikudabula kuwe; unqunyiwe ngokupheleleyo.
Nah 2:1 Kukhuphukela umchithi kuwe; gcina inqaba, ulinde indlela, uqinise izinkalo zakho, uwenze amandla akho ukuba aqine.
Nah 2:2 Ngokuba uJehova uyabuyisa ukuphakama kukaJakobe njengokuphakama kuka-Israyeli, lokhu abathululayo bebathululile, bachitha amagatsha emivini yabo.
Nah 2:3 Izihlangu zamaqhawe akhe zibomvu, amadoda anamandla embethe okubomvu; izinqola zibengezela umlilo ensimbini ngosuku lokuzilungisela kwakhe; imikhonto iyaveva.
Nah 2:4 Izinqola ziyahlanya ezitaladini, ziyaficana ezigcawini; ukubonakala kwazo kunjengezimbaqa, zigijima njengemibani.
Nah 2:5 Useyakhumbula izikhulu zakhe, ziyakhubeka ekuhambeni kwazo; zisheshela izingange zakhona, izivikelo ziyalungiswa.
Nah 2:6 Amasango emifula ayavulwa, indlu yamakhosi iyancibilika.
Nah 2:7 Kunqunyiwe: liyambulwa, lisuswe; izincekukazi zalo zibubula ngezwi lamajuba, zibetha phezu kwezinhliziyo zazo.
Nah 2:8 Kepha iNineve linjengechibi lamanzi kwasendulo, nokho bayabaleka. “Yimani, yimani!” Kepha akakho ophendukayo.
Nah 2:9 Phangani isiliva! Phangani igolide! Ngokuba akukho ukuphela kokunqwatshelweyo nokukhazimula kwazo zonke izinto ezinxanelekayo.
Nah 2:10 Liyize, alisenalutho, lichithekile; inhliziyo iyancibilika, amadolo ayashayana, imihelo isezinkalweni zonke, nobuso babo bonke buphaphathekile.
Nah 2:11 Uphi umphandu wezingonyama, nedlelo lamabhongo ezingonyama, lapho kwahamba ingonyama nengonyamakazi nebhongo lengonyama, kungekho okwesabisayo na?
Nah 2:12 Ingonyama yadwengula okwanele amabhongo ayo, yabindela izingonyamakazi zayo; yagcwalisa imiphandu yayo ngempango nemigede yayo ngengcugco.
Nah 2:13 “Bheka, ngimelene nawe,” usho uJehova Sebawoti; “ngiyakushisa izinqola zakho emsini, inkemba idle amabhongo akho ezingonyama; ngiyakunquma impango yakho emhlabeni, nezwi lezithunywa zakho alisayikuzwakala.”
Nah 3:1 Wo kumuzi wezingazi! Wonke ugcwele amanga nempango, ukuphanga akupheli.
Nah 3:2 Ngukuqhuma kwesiswebhu, nomsindo wokugodlozela kwamasondo, namahhashi agadulayo, nezinqola ezixhumayo;
Nah 3:3 ngabamahhashi abasukelayo, nenkemba enjengelangabi, nomkhonto onyazimayo, abaningi ababuleweyo nenqwaba yezidumbu, kungekho ukuphela kwezidikadika; bakhubeka ngezidikadika zabo,
Nah 3:4 ngenxa yobuningi bobufebe besifebe esibukekayo, umnikazi wokulumba, esithengisa izizwe ngobufebe baso, nemindeni ngamalumbo aso.
Nah 3:5 “Bheka, ngimelene nawe,” usho uJehova Sebawoti; “ngiyakuphakamisa imiphetho yakho ebusweni bakho, ngibonise izizwe ubunqunu bakho, nemibuso ihlazo lakho.
Nah 3:6 Ngiyakuphonsa okunengakayo phezu kwakho, ngikuhlazise, ngikubeke ube yinto ebukwayo.
Nah 3:7 Kuyakuthi bonke abakubonayo bakubalekele, bathi: ‘INineve lichithekile, ngubani oyakulililela na?’ Ngiyakukufunelaphi abaduduzi na?”
Nah 3:8 Umuhle wena kuneNo Amoni elaliphakathi kwemifula, elalizungezwe ngamanzi, elilugange lwalo lwalululwandle, nelidonga lwalo lungamanzi, na?
Nah 3:9 IKushe neGibithe kwakungamandla alo angenakuphela; uPhuthi namaLubi babe ngabasizi bakho.
Nah 3:10 Nalo lamukiswa, laya ekuthunjweni, nezingane zalo zachotshozwa ezingosini zazo zonke izitaladi; benza inkatho ngezikhulu zalo, nabo bonke abakhulu balo baboshwa ngamaketanga.
Nah 3:11 Uyakudakwa nawe, ufihlwe; futhi uyakufuna inqaba yokubalekela izitha.
Nah 3:12 Zonke izinqaba zakho ziyimikhiwane enamakhiwane ayingqalabutho; uma inyakaziswa, awela emlonyeni wodlayo.
Nah 3:13 Bheka, abantu bakho phakathi kwakho bangabesifazane nje; amasango ezwe lakho avulekele impela izitha zakho, umlilo udlile imigoqo yakho.
Nah 3:14 Zikhelele amanzi okuvinjezelwa, uqinise izinqaba zakho; ngena odakeni, uxove ibumba, uqinise uhonela.
Nah 3:15 Lapho umlilo uyakukuqeda, inkemba ikunqume, ikudle njengenkasa; zandise njengenkasa, zandise njengesikhonyane!
Nah 3:16 Wandisile abathengisi bakho kunezinkanyezi zezulu; inkasa iyakhula, indize imuke.
Nah 3:17 Izikhulu zakho zinjengezinkumbi, nezinduna zakho zinjengamaqulo esikhonyane esihlezi phakathi kwezingange ngosuku olumakhaza, kepha lapho liphuma ilanga, sindize simuke, ingabe isaziwa indawo yaso ukuthi iphi.
Nah 3:18 Abelusi bakho balele, nkosi yase-Asiriya; abakhulu bakho bayaphumula; abantu bakho bahlakazekile ezintabeni, akakho obabuthayo.
Nah 3:19 Akukho ukupholiswa kokwaphulwa kwakho; umvimbo wakho unzima; bonke abezwa umbiko ngawe bashaya izandla ngawe, ngokuba ngubani ububi bakho obungadlulelanga njalo phezu kwakhe na?
Hab 1:1 Isiprofetho owasibonayo uHabakuki umprofethi.
Hab 1:2 Ngiyakukuncenga kuze kube nini, Jehova, ungezwa, ngikhala ngendluzula, ungasindisi, na?
Hab 1:3 Ungiboniselani ububi, ungibhekise ukukhathazeka na? Ngokuba ukuchitheka nendluzula kuphambi kwami; kukhona ukulwa, ukuxabana kuyaqhamuka.
Hab 1:4 Ngalokho umthetho uba buthakathaka, nokwahlulela akuphumi kuze kube nini, ngokuba omubi uhaqa olungileyo; ngalokho ukwahlulela kuphuma kuhlanekezelwe.
Hab 1:5 “Bonani phakathi kwabezizwe, nibheke, nimangale nokumangala, ngokuba wenza isenzo ezinsukwini zenu eningayikukholwa yiso, lapho silandwa.
Hab 1:6 Ngokuba bhekani, ngiyavusa amaKaledi, isizwe esibabayo nesiphulukundlelayo, esidabula ebubanzini bomhlaba ukuyokudla izindawo zokuhlala ezingeyizo ezaso.
Hab 1:7 Siyethusa, siyesabeka; kuphuma kuso ukwahlulela kwaso nesithunzi saso.
Hab 1:8 Amahhashi aso anejubane kunezingwe, anonya kunezimpisi zakusihlwa; abamahhashi baso bayaqinisela; yebo, bavela kude abamahhashi baso, bandiza njengokhozi oluphuthuma ukudla.
Hab 1:9 Zonke zifikela indluzula, ubuso bazo bujonga phambili; zibutha abathunjwa njengesihlabathi.
Hab 1:10 Yebo, sibhinqa amakhosi, nababusi balusulu kuso; sihleka zonke izinqaba, sinqwabela uthuli, sizithathe.
Hab 1:11 Bese sikhukhula njengomoya, sidlule, sizitholele icala, sona esimandla aso angunkulunkulu waso.”
Hab 1:12 Wena Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, oNgcwele, awungowasendulo na? Asiyikufa; Jehova, usinqumele ukwahlulelwa; wena Dwala, usimisele ukujeziswa.
Hab 1:13 Wena omehlo akho ahlambulukile ukuba ungaboni okubi, ungenakubheka ukuhlanekezela, ubhekelani abakhohlisayo, uthulelani lapho omubi egwinya olungileyo kunaye,
Hab 1:14 wenze abantu babe njengezinhlanzi zaselwandle, njengezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo ezingenambusi phezu kwazo na?
Hab 1:15 Uyabakhipha bonke ngodobo, abadonse ngenetha, ababuthe ngenetha lakhe elihudulwayo; ngalokho uyathokoza, uyajabula.
Hab 1:16 Ngalokho uyahlabela inetha lakhe, ashisele inetha lakhe elihudulwayo impepho, ngokuba isabelo sakhe siyanona ngakho, kube mnandi ukudla kwakhe.
Hab 1:17 Ngalokho uyakuthulula inetha lakhe, abulale njalo izizwe ngokunganqamukiyo, na?
Hab 2:1 Ngiyakuma endaweni yami yokulinda, ngigcule enqabeni, ngikhangele ukubona ukuthi uyakukhulumani kimi nokuthi ngiyakuphendulani ngokusola kwami.
Hab 2:2 UJehova wangiphendula wathi: “Wulobe umbono, uwuqophe ezibhebheni ukuba kufundwe kalula.
Hab 2:3 Ngokuba umbono usengowesikhathi esimisiweyo; uphuthuma ekupheleni, awuyikukhohlisa; noma ulibala, wulindele, ngokuba uyakufika nokufika, awuyikwephuza.
Hab 2:4 “Bheka, umphefumulo wakhe uziphakamisile, awuqotho phakathi kwakhe, kepha olungileyo uzakuphila ngokukholwa kwakhe.
Hab 2:5 Yebo, iwayini liyakhohlisa, lingumuntu okhukhumeleyo ongayikuma, owandisa ukufisa kwakhe njengendawo yabafileyo; unjengokufa: akasuthi; uyazibuthela zonke izizwe, uziqoqela bonke abantu.
Hab 2:6 “Bona abayikuphakamisa isaga nomfanekiso wemfumbe ngaye, bathi: “ ‘Wo kuyena owandisa okungesikho okwakhe koze kube nini na? — nozisindisa ngezibambiso!’
Hab 2:7 Abayikuvuka ngokuzumayo abakulumayo, bavuke abakuthuthumelisayo, ube yimpango yabo, na?
Hab 2:8 Ngokuba wena uphangile izizwe eziningi, bonke abanye abantu bayakuphanga wena, ngenxa yezingazi zabantu nendluzula eyenziwe ezweni, nasemzini, nakubo bonke abakhe kuwo.
Hab 2:9 “Wo kozuzela indlu yakhe inzuzo embi ukuba abeke isidleke sakhe phezulu ukuyophulwa esandleni sobubi!
Hab 2:10 Ucebele indlu yakho okubi ngokuchitha abantu abaningi, wona kuwo umphefumulo wakho.
Hab 2:11 Ngokuba amatshe ayakukhala esodongeni, nomshayo uyakuwaphendula usemithini.
Hab 2:12 “Wo kowakha umuzi ngezingazi, aqinise idolobha ngobubi!
Hab 2:13 Bheka, akuveli kuJehova Sebawoti ukuthi abantu bakhandlekela umlilo, izizwe zizikhathaze ngokuyize, na?
Hab 2:14 Ngokuba umhlaba uyakugcwala ukwazi inkazimulo kaJehova, njengamanzi asibekela ulwandle.
Hab 2:15 “Wo komphuzisa umngane wakhe, axube nokufutheka, amdakise, ukuze abuke ubunqunu bakhe!
Hab 2:16 Uyakusuthiswa ngehlazo esikhundleni senkazimulo, uphuze nawe, wambule ijwabu, indebe yesandla sokunene sikaJehova siphendulelwe kuwe, kube yihlazo phezu kodumo lwakho.
Hab 2:17 Ngokuba indluzula eyenziwe eLebanoni iyakukusibekela, ukuchithwa kwezilwane kukwesabise, ngenxa yezingazi zabantu nendluzula eyenziwe ezweni, nasemzini, nakubo bonke abakhe kuwo.
Hab 2:18 “Sisizani isithombe esibaziweyo, lokhu umbumbi waso esibaza, nesithombe esibunjiweyo nomfundisi wamanga, lokhu umbumbi waso ethemba kuso, ukuze enze izithombe eziyizimungulu, na?
Hab 2:19 Wo koshoyo kumuthi ukuthi: ‘Vuka!’ nakulo itshe eliyisimungulu: ‘Phaphama!’ Lokhu kungafundisa na? Bheka, kunamekwe ngegolide nangesiliva, kungekho neze umoya phakathi kwakho.
Hab 2:20 Kepha uJehova usethempelini lakhe elingcwele; thula phambi kwakhe, mhlaba wonke.”
Hab 3:1 Umkhuleko kaHabakuki umprofethi; ngeShigiyonoti.
Hab 3:2 Jehova, ngizwile umbiko ngawe, ngiyesaba izenzo zakho; zivuselele phakathi kwale minyaka, wenze ukuba zaziwe kule minyaka, ukhumbule umusa nasolakeni.
Hab 3:3 UNkulunkulu uvela eThemani, oNgcwele uphuma entabeni yasePharanu. Sela Udumo lwakhe lusibekela amazulu, nomhlaba ugcwele indumiso yakhe.
Hab 3:4 Kuqhamuka ukubengezela kunjengokukhanya; imisebe ivela esandleni sakhe, efihla lapho amandla akhe.
Hab 3:5 Ngaphambi kwakhe kuhamba isifo, amalangabi aphuma ezinyathelweni zakhe.
Hab 3:6 Uyema, uzamazamisa umhlaba; ubuka, uthuthumelisa izizwe; izintaba zaphakade ziyahlakazwa, namagquma amandulo akhothama yizindlela zakhe zaphakade.
Hab 3:7 Ngibona amatende aseKushani ephansi kosizi, izilenge zezwe lakwaMidiyani ziyathuthumela.
Hab 3:8 UJehova uyathukuthelela imifula na? Ulaka lwakho luvuthela imifula, nentukuthelo yakho ulwandle, lokhu ukhwele amahhashi akho, nezinqola zakho zokunqoba, na?
Hab 3:9 Umnsalo wakho uvele obala, wambuliwe, usuthile ngemicibisholo yesambo sakho. Sela Uqhekeza umhlaba ube yimifula.
Hab 3:10 Izintaba ziyakubona, zithuthumele; isikhukhula samanzi siyadlula; utwa luzwakalisa izwi lalo, luphakamisela phezulu izandla zalo.
Hab 3:11 Ilanga nenyanga kwema endaweni yakho ngokukhanya kwemicibisholo yakho egijimayo nangokubengezela kwemikhonto yakho ecwebezelayo.
Hab 3:12 Udabula umhlaba ngokuthukuthela, ubhula izizwe ngolaka.
Hab 3:13 Uphumela ukusindiswa kwabantu bakho, yebo, ukusindiswa kogcotshiweyo wakho; uphohloza uphahla endlini yababi, wambula isisekelo kuze kube sentanyeni. Sela
Hab 3:14 Ugwaza ikhanda lomholi wabo ngeyakhe imicibisholo, lapho besondela njengesivunguvungu ukungihlakaza, bejabula njengabayakudla ompofu ngasese.
Hab 3:15 Unyathela ulwandle ngamahhashi akho, inqaba yamanzi amaningi.
Hab 3:16 Ngiyezwa, kuyathuthumela okuphakathi kwami, izindebe zami ziyaqhaqhazela ngenhlokomo; ukubola kungena emathanjeni ami, ngithuthumela endaweni lapha ngimi khona, ngilindela usuku lokuhlupheka ukuze kukhuphuke lokhu okuyakucindezela abantu.
Hab 3:17 Noma umkhiwane ungakhahleli, kungabikho izithelo emvinini, umsebenzi womnqumo uphuthe, amasimu angavezi ukudla, izimvu zinqunywe esibayeni, kungabikho nkomo ezibayeni,
Hab 3:18 nokho mina ngiyakuthokoza ngoJehova, ngijabulele uNkulunkulu wokusindiswa kwami.
Hab 3:19 UJehova, iNkosi yami, ungamandla ami, wenza izinyawo zami zibe njengezezindluzelekazi, angenze ukuba ngihambe ezindaweni zami eziphakemeyo. Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu.
Zeph 1:1 Izwi likaJehova elafika kuZefaniya indodana kaKushi kaGedaliya ka-Amariya kaHezekiya ezinsukwini zikaJosiya indodana ka-Amoni, inkosi yakwaJuda.
Zeph 1:2 “Ngiyakuqothula nokuqothula konke, kusuke ebusweni bomhlaba,” usho uJehova.
Zeph 1:3 “Ngiyakuqothula abantu nezilwane, ngiqothule izinyoni zezulu nezinhlanzi zaselwandle, ngikhubekise ababi, nginqume abantu ebusweni bomhlaba,” usho uJehova.
Zeph 1:4 “Ngiyakwelula isandla sami phezu kukaJuda naphezu kwabo bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema, nginqume insali kaBali kule ndawo, negama labapristi bezithixo kanye nabapristi,
Zeph 1:5 nabakhuleka kulo ibandla lasezulwini phezu kwezindlu, nabakhuleka kuJehova bemfunga, befunga futhi uMilkomu,
Zeph 1:6 nababuyile ekumlandeleni uJehova, nabangamfunanga uJehova bengabuzanga ngaye.
Zeph 1:7 Thula phambi kobuso beNkosi uJehova, ngokuba usuku lukaJehova luseduze; uJehova ulungisile umhlatshelo, ungcwelisile abamenyiweyo bakhe.
Zeph 1:8 Kuyakuthi ngosuku lomhlatshelo kaJehova, ngihambele izikhulu, namadodana enkosi, nabo bonke abembethe isambatho sabezizwe.
Zeph 1:9 Ngalolo suku ngiyakuhambela bonke abeqa umbundu, begcwalisa indlu yamakhosi abo ngobudlova nangenkohliso.
Zeph 1:10 “Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “kuyakuba khona izwi lokukhala, livela eSangweni Lezinhlanzi, nokuhhewula, kuvela eNxenyeni Yesibili, nokufahlazeka okukhulu, kuvela emagqumeni.
Zeph 1:11 Hhewulani nina enakhe esiGqulweni, ngokuba bonke abantu abathengisayo bachithekile, bonke abathweswe isiliva banqunyiwe.
Zeph 1:12 Kuyakuthi ngaleso sikhathi ngicwaninge iJerusalema ngezibani, ngihambele abantu abajiyile enhleseni yabo, abathi ezinhliziyweni zabo: UJehova akenzi okuhle, akenzi nokubi.
Zeph 1:13 Ingcebo yabo iyakuba yimpango, nezindlu zabo incithakalo; bayakwakha izindlu, kepha abayikuhlala kuzo, batshale izivini, bangaliphuzi kodwa iwayini lazo.
Zeph 1:14 “Usuku olukhulu lukaJehova luseduze; luseduze, lushesha kakhulu; umsindo wosuku lukaJehova uyababa, neqhawe liyahhewula khona.
Zeph 1:15 Lolo suku lungusuku lolaka, usuku lokuhlupheka nolosizi, usuku lwencithakalo nolokuyize, usuku lobumnyama nolwesigayegaye, usuku lwamafu nolobumnyama obukhulu,
Zeph 1:16 usuku lwecilongo nolokuhlaba umkhosi ngasemizini ebiyelweyo nasemibhoshongweni yasezingosini.
Zeph 1:17 Ngiyakucindezela abantu, bahambe njengezimpumputhe, ngokuba bonile kuJehova; igazi labo liyakuthululwa njengothuli, nenyama yabo njengomquba.
Zeph 1:18 Nasiliva labo nagolide labo akuyikuba namandla okubophula ngosuku lwentukuthelo lukaJehova, kepha umhlaba wonke uyakudliwa ngumlilo womhawu wakhe, ngokuba uyakuqeda, yebo, aqede ngokuzumayo bonke abakhileyo ezweni.”
Zeph 2:1 Buthanani, yebo, buthana, sizwe esingenamahloni,
Zeph 2:2 isimiso singakazali lolo suku ludlula njengamakhoba lungakanehleli ulaka oluvuthayo lukaJehova, lungakafiki phezu kwenu usuku lolaka lukaJehova.
Zeph 2:3 Funani uJehova nina nonke bathobekileyo bomhlaba enisebenzile ukwahlulela kwakhe; funani ukulunga; funani ukuthobeka; mhlawumbe niyakusitshekelwa ngosuku lolaka lukaJehova.
Zeph 2:4 Ngokuba iGaza liyakushiywa, i-Ashikeloni libe yincithakalo; bayakulixosha i-Ashidodi emini, i-Ekroni lisishulwe.
Zeph 2:5 Wo kwabakhileyo ngasogwini lolwandle, isizwe samaKhereti! Izwi likaJehova liphezu kwakho, Khanani, lizwe lamaFilisiti. “Ngiyakukuchitha ukuze kungabikho ohlala khona.”
Zeph 2:6 Ugu lolwandle luyakuba ngamadlelo, lube nemigodi yabelusi nezibaya zezimvu.
Zeph 2:7 Ugu luyakuba ngolwensali yendlu yakwaJuda, yaluse kulo; ezindlini zase-Ashikeloni bayakubuthisa kusihlwa, ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu wabo uyakubahambela, abuyise ukuthunjwa kwabo.
Zeph 2:8 “Ngiyizwile inhlamba yakwaMowabi nezithuko zabantwana bakwa-Amoni abathuke ngazo abantu bami, bazikhulisela imikhawulo yabo.
Zeph 2:9 Ngalokho, kuphila kwami,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Impela uMowabi uyakuba njengeSodoma, nabantwana bakwa-Amoni njengeGomora, izwe lezimbabazane nelemigodi kasawoti nencithakalo yaphakade; insali yabantu bami iyakubaphanga, nabaseleyo besizwe sami bayakudla ifa labo.”
Zeph 2:10 Lokhu kuyakuba sesikhundleni sokuziphakamisa kwabo, ngokuba bathukile, bazikhulisela abantu bakaJehova Sebawoti.
Zeph 2:11 UJehova uyakwesabeka phezu kwabo, ngokuba uyakuzacisa bonke onkulunkulu bomhlaba, bakhuleke kuye, kube yilowo nalowo endaweni yakhe, zonke iziqhingi zezizwe.
Zeph 2:12 “Nani maKushe niyakubulawa ngenkemba yami.”
Zeph 2:13 Uyakwelulela isandla sakhe ngasenyakatho, achithe i-Asiriya, alenze iNineve libe yincithakalo, lome njengehlane.
Zeph 2:14 Imihlambi iyakubuthisa phakathi kwalo, zonke izilwane zesizwe, ivuba nonondwebu kuhlale ebusuku ezihlokweni zezinsika zalo, isikhova sikhale emafasiteleni, kube khona incithakalo emigulugulwini, ngokuba wambulile okwemisedari.
Zeph 2:15 Yiwo umuzi owajabula wahlala ulondekile, owathi enhliziyweni yawo: Mina ngikhona, akakho omunye; yeka ukuphenduka kwawo incithakalo nendawo yokubuthisa kwezilwane! Bonke abadlula kuwo bayakuncimfa, banikine isandla sabo.
Zeph 3:1 Wo kohlubukileyo nongcolileyo, muzi ocindezelayo!
Zeph 3:2 Awuzwa zwi, awamukeli ukulaywa, awumethembi uJehova, awusondelanga kuNkulunkulu wawo.
Zeph 3:3 Izikhulu zawo phakathi kwawo ziyizingonyama ezibhongayo; abahluleli bawo bayizimpisi zokuhlwa; abashiyeli lutho ingomuso.
