Zeph 3:4 Abaprofethi bawo bangamayiyane nabakhohlisi; abapristi bawo bayingcolisile indlu engcwele, bawudlovulile umthetho.
Zeph 3:5 UJehova ulungile phakathi kwawo, akenzi okubi; ekuseni njalo uveza ukwahlulela kwakhe ekukhanyeni, akuphuthi; kepha abangalungile abazi amahloni.
Zeph 3:6 “Nginqumile izizwe, imibhoshongo yazo yasezingosini ichithekile; ngichithile izitaladi zazo ukuze kungadluli muntu; imizi yazo iqothuliwe ukuze kungabikho muntu, kungabikho ohlala kuyo.
Zeph 3:7 Ngathi: ‘Nokho uyakungesaba, wamukele ukulaywa.’ Indawo yawo yokuhlala ayiyikunqunywa, kungenzeki konke engiwumisele khona; kepha bavuka ekuseni, benza okubi.
Zeph 3:8 Ngalokho, ngilindeleni,” usho uJehova, “kuze kube lusuku engivuka ngalo ukuba ngiphange, ngokuba kuyisinqumo sami ukubutha izizwe ukuba ngiqoqe imibuso, ukuze ngithulule phezu kwabo intukuthelo yami, lonke ulaka lwami oluvuthayo, ngokuba wonke umhlaba uyakudliwa ngumlilo womhawu wami.
Zeph 3:9 “Ngokuba lapho ngiyakunika abantu izindebe ezihlanzekileyo, ukuze bonke babize igama likaJehova, bamkhonze nganhliziyonye.
Zeph 3:10 Kusukela phesheya kwemifula yaseKushe abanxusa kimi, indodakazi yabahlakazekileyo bami, bayakuletha umnikelo wami.
Zeph 3:11 Ngalolo suku awusayikuba namahloni ngazo zonke izenzo zakho ophambuke ngazo kimi, ngokuba khona ngiyakususa phakathi kwakho abazidla ngokujabula, awusayikuziphakamisa entabeni yami engcwele.
Zeph 3:12 Kepha ngiyakushiya phakathi kwakho abantu abahluphekayo nabampofu; bayakwethemba igama likaJehova.
Zeph 3:13 Insali yakwa-Israyeli ayisayikwenza okubi, ingakhulumi amanga, kungafunyanwa emlonyeni wabo ulimi olukhohlisayo; yebo, bayakwaluka, babuthise, kungekho obesabisayo.”
Zeph 3:14 Hlabelela ngokujabula, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, umemeze, Israyeli, uthokoze, wethabe ngenhliziyo yonke, ndodakazi yaseJerusalema.
Zeph 3:15 UJehova ususile ukwahlulelwa kwakho, uxoshile izitha zakho. INkosi yakwa-Israyeli, uJehova, iphakathi kwakho; awusayikwesaba okubi.
Zeph 3:16 Ngalolo suku kuyakuthiwa kulo iJerusalema: “Ungesabi, Siyoni! Izandla zakho mazingadangali.
Zeph 3:17 UJehova uNkulunkulu wakho uphakathi kwakho, iqhawe eliyakukusindisa; uyakujabula ngawe ngentokozo, athule othandweni lwakhe, ethabe ngawe ngokuhlabelela.”
Zeph 3:18 “Abadabuka ngemikhosi ngiyakubabutha, ababahlukene nawe, usathwele ihlazo.
Zeph 3:19 Bhekani, ngaleso sikhathi ngiyakuphatha bonke abakuhluphayo, ngisindise abaqhugayo, ngibuthe abaxoshiweyo, ngibenze indumiso negama abahlazo labo lalisemhlabeni wonke.
Zeph 3:20 Ngaleso sikhathi ngiyakuningenisa, ngaleso sikhathi ngiyakunibutha, ngokuba ngiyakunenza igama nendumiso phakathi kwabantu bonke bomhlaba, lapho ngibuyisa ukuthunjwa kwenu phambi kwamehlo enu,” usho uJehova.
Hag 1:1 Ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu inkosi ngenyanga yesithupha ngosuku lokuqala lwenyanga lafika izwi likaJehova ngesandla sikaHagayi umprofethi kuZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli, umbusi wakwaJuda, nakuJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, ngokuthi:
Hag 1:2 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Laba bantu bathi: ‘Akukabi yisikhathi sokuza, isikhathi sokwakha indlu kaJehova.’ ”
Hag 1:3 Kwase kufika izwi likaJehova ngoHagayi umprofethi, lathi:
Hag 1:4 “Kuyisikhathi sokuba nihlale ezindlini zenu ezembesiweyo, le ndlu iseyize, na?”
Hag 1:5 Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bekani ezinhliziyweni zenu izindlela zenu.
Hag 1:6 Nihlwanyela okuningi, ningenisa okuyingcosana; niyadla, kepha anisuthi; niyaphuza, kepha ananeliswa; niyembatha, kepha akakho ofudumalayo; ozuza imali uyizuzela isikhwama esibhobokileyo.”
Hag 1:7 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bekani ezinhliziyweni zenu izindlela zenu.
Hag 1:8 Khuphukelani entabeni, nilethe imithi, nakhe indlu; ngiyakuyenamela, ngikhazimuliswe,” usho uJehova.
Hag 1:9 “Nabheka okuningi; bhekani, kwaphenduka okuncane; lapho nakuletha ekhaya, ngakuphephetha. Ngani na?” usho uJehova Sebawoti. “Ngenxa yendlu yami eyize, nina nisagijimela, kube yilowo nalowo endlini yakhe.
Hag 1:10 Ngalokho izulu livinjelwe kungabe kusabakho mazolo, nomhlaba uvinjelwe ungabe usaba nazithelo.
Hag 1:11 Ngase ngibiza ukoma phezu kwezwe, naphezu kwezintaba, naphezu kwamabele, naphezu kwewayini elisha, naphezu kwamafutha, naphezu kokuvezwa ngumhlaba, naphezu kwabantu, naphezu kwezinkomo, naphezu kwayo yonke imisebenzi yezandla.”
Hag 1:12 UZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli noJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, nayo yonke insali yabantu balalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wabo namazwi kaHagayi umprofethi, njengokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu wabo emthumile; abantu besaba phambi kukaJehova.
Hag 1:13 Wayesekhuluma uHagayi, isithunywa sikaJehova, ngesimemezelo sikaJehova kubantu, wathi: “Nginani,” usho uJehova.
Hag 1:14 UJehova wavuselela umoya kaZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli, umbusi wakwaJuda, nomoya kaJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, nomoya wensali yonke yabantu, bafika, benza umsebenzi endlini kaJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu wabo,
Hag 1:15 ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nane ngenyanga yesithupha ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu inkosi.
Hag 2:1 Ngenyanga yesikhombisa ngolwamashumi amabili nanye lwenyanga izwi likaJehova lafika ngesandla sikaHagayi umprofethi, lathi:
Hag 2:2 “Ake ukhulume kuZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli, umbusi wakwaJuda, nakuJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, nakuyo insali yabantu, uthi:
Hag 2:3 ‘Ngubani oseleyo phakathi kwenu owayibona le ndlu ekukhazimuleni kwayo kokuqala? Niyayibona injani manje na? Ayinjengento yalutho emehlweni enu na?
Hag 2:4 Kepha qina manje, Zerubabele,’ usho uJehova, ‘ube namandla, Joshuwa, ndodana kaJehosadaki, mpristi omkhulu, niqine nonke nina bantu bezwe,’ usho uJehova, ‘nisebenze ngokuba nginani,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Hag 2:5 ‘Isithembiso enganinika sona ekuphumeni kwenu eGibithe noMoya wami kuyakuhlala phakathi kwenu; ningesabi.’
Hag 2:6 “Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Kusezakuba yisikhashana nje ngizamazamisa amazulu nomhlaba, nolwandle, nomhlabathi owomileyo,
Hag 2:7 ngizamazamise nabo bonke abezizwe, kufike okunxanelekayo kwabo bonke abezizwe, ngiyigcwalise le ndlu ngenkazimulo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Hag 2:8 ‘Ngelami isiliva, ngelami igolide,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Hag 2:9 ‘Inkazimulo yokugcina yale ndlu iyakuba nkulu kuneyokuqala,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘nginike ukuthula kule ndawo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.”
Hag 2:10 Ngolwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga yesishiyagalolunye ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuHagayi umprofethi, lathi:
Hag 2:11 “Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Ake ubabuze abapristi ngomthetho, uthi:
Hag 2:12 Uma umuntu ephethe inyama engcwele emphethweni wengubo yakhe, ethinta ngomphetho wakhe isinkwa, noma ukudla, noma iwayini, noma amafutha, noma yikuphi ukudla, kuyakuba ngcwele na?’ ” Abapristi baphendula bathi: “Qha.”
Hag 2:13 Wayesethi uHagayi: “Uma ongcolile ngesidumbu ethinta noma yikuphi kulokhu, kuyakungcola na?” Abapristi baphendula bathi: “Kuyakungcola.”
Hag 2:14 Wayesethatha uHagayi, wathi: “ ‘Banjalo laba bantu, sinjalo lesi sizwe ngaphambi kwami,’ usho uJehova; ‘injalo futhi yonke imisebenzi yezandla zabo; nalokhu abakusondeza khona kungcolile.
Hag 2:15 “ ‘Ake nibeke ezinhliziyweni zenu manje, kusukela kulolu suku nangaphambili, ukuthi kungakabekwa itshe phezu kwetshe ethempelini likaJehova,
Hag 2:16 kusukela kulezo, lapho kwayiwa enqwabeni yezilinganiso ezingamashumi amabili, kwakuyishumi nje, nalapho kwayiwa ezikhamweni zewayini ukukha izitsha ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, kwakungamashumi amabili nje.
Hag 2:17 Nganishaya ngokuhamuka, nangesikhutha, nangesichotho kuyo yonke imisebenzi yezandla zenu, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,’ usho uJehova.
Hag 2:18 ‘Ake nikubeke ezinhliziyweni zenu, kusukela kulolu suku nangaphambili, kwasosukwini lwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga yesishiyagalolunye, kwasosukwini okwabekwa ngalo isisekelo sethempeli likaJehova, yebo, nikubeke ezinhliziyweni zenu.
Hag 2:19 Imbewu isesibuyeni na? Qha, imivini, nemikhiwane, namapomegranati, neminqumo akuthelanga; kepha kusukela kulolu suku ngiyakukubusisa.’ ”
Hag 2:20 Izwi likaJehova lafika ngokwesibili kuHagayi ngolwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga, lathi:
Hag 2:21 “Yisho kuZerubabele umbusi wakwaJuda, uthi: ‘Ngiyakuzamazamisa amazulu nomhlaba,
Hag 2:22 ngigumbuqele isihlalo sobukhosi semibuso, ngichithe amandla emibuso yabezizwe, ngigumbuqele izinqola nabakhwela kuzo; namahhashi ayakuwa nezinkweli zawo, kube yileyo naleyo ngenkemba yomfowabo.
Hag 2:23 “ ‘Ngalolo suku,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘ngiyakukuthatha, Zerubabele, nceku yami, ndodana kaSheyalitiyeli,’ usho uJehova, ‘ngikwenze indandatho, ngokuba ngikukhethile,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.”
Zech 1:1 Ngenyanga yesishiyagalombili ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya indodana kaBerekiya ka-Ido, umprofethi, lathi:
Zech 1:2 “UJehova wathukuthelela nokuthukuthelela oyihlo.
Zech 1:3 Kepha yisho wena kubo, uthi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Buyelani kimi,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘ngiyakubuyela kini,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Zech 1:4 Ningabi njengawoyihlo abaprofethi bokuqala abamemeza kubo, bathi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Ake nibuye ezindleleni zenu ezimbi nasezenzweni zenu ezimbi;’ kepha kabalalelanga, kabangiqaphelanga, usho uJehova.
Zech 1:5 Oyihlo baphi na? Nabaprofethi bakhona kuze kube phakade na?
Zech 1:6 Kanti amazwi ami nezimiso zami engayala ngakho izinceku zami abaprofethi akubaficanga yini oyihlo, baze baphenduka, bathi: ‘Njengalokho uJehova Sebawoti ebehlosa ukwenza kithi njengezindlela zethu nemisebenzi yethu, wenze kanjalo kithina, na?’ ”
Zech 1:7 Ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga yeshumi nanye eyinyanga kaShebati ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya indodana kaBerekiya ka-Ido, umprofethi, lathi:
Zech 1:8 Ngabona ebusuku; bheka, nango umuntu ekhwele ihhashi elibomvu, wema phakathi kwemibomvana eyayisesigodini, nasemva kwakhe kwakukhona amahhashi abomvu, nalufipha, namhlophe.
Zech 1:9 Ngase ngithi: “Bayini laba?” Ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yathi kimi: “Ngiyakukubonisa ukuthi bayini laba.”
Zech 1:10 Umuntu owayemi phakathi kwemibomvana wathatha wathi: “Laba yibo uJehova abathumile ukuba bahambahambe emhlabeni.”
Zech 1:11 Base bethatha, bathi kuyo ingelosi kaJehova eyayimi phakathi kwemibomvana: “Sihambahambile emhlabeni; bheka, wonke umhlaba uhlezi uthule.”
Zech 1:12 Yayisithatha ingelosi kaJehova, yathi: “Jehova Sebawoti, koze kube nini ungabi nasihe kulo iJerusalema nakuyo imizi yakwaJuda oyithukuthelele le minyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa na?”
Zech 1:13 UJehova wayesephendula ingelosi eyayikhuluma kimi ngamazwi amahle, amazwi amnandi.
Zech 1:14 Yayisithi kimi ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Memeza uthi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Ngihawukela iJerusalema neSiyoni ngokuhawukela okukhulu.
Zech 1:15 Ngentukuthelo enkulu ngiyathukuthelela izizwe ezizinzileyo, ngokuba lapho ngithukuthele kancane nje, zandisa okubi.’
Zech 1:16 “Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: ‘Ngiyakubuyela eJerusalema ngomusa, indlu yami yakhiwe kulo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘kwelulwe umucu wokulinganisa phezu kweJerusalema.’
Zech 1:17 “Phinda umemeze, uthi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Imizi yami isayakuchichima okuhle, uJehova abuye aliduduze iSiyoni, abuye alikhethe iJerusalema.’ ”
Zech 1:18 Ngase ngiphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, nazo izimpondo ezine.
Zech 1:19 Ngathi kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Ziyini lezi?” Yathi kimi: “Lezi ziyizimpondo ezihlakazile oJuda, no-Israyeli, neJerusalema.”
Zech 1:20 UJehova wayesengibonisa abakhandi abane bensimbi.
Zech 1:21 Ngathi: “Laba bafike ukwenzani na?” Wakhuluma wathi: “Leziya ziyizimpondo ezazimhlakaza uJuda ngangokuba kungabangakho muntu ophakamisa ikhanda lakhe, kepha laba bafikile ukubashaya ngovalo, bawise phansi izimpondo zabezizwe ezaziphakamisa uphondo ngezwe lakwaJuda ukuba lihlakazwe.”
Zech 2:1 Ngaphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, nango umuntu enentambo yokulinganisa esandleni sakhe.
Zech 2:2 Ngathi: “Uya ngaphi?” Wathi kimi: “Ngiya ukulinganisa iJerusalema, ngibone ukuthi bungakanani ububanzi balo, bungakanani nobude balo.”
Zech 2:3 Bheka, ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yayisiphuma, nenye ingelosi yaphuma ukuyihlangabeza,
Zech 2:4 yathi kuyo: “Gijima ukhulume kule nsizwa ukuthi iJerusalema liyakwakhiwa njengemizi engenanzingange ngenxa yobuningi babantu nezinkomo okuphakathi kwalo.
Zech 2:5 ‘Kepha mina,’ usho uJehova, ‘ngiyakuba lugange lomlilo kulo nxazonke, futhi ngibe yinkazimulo phakathi kwalo.’
Zech 2:6 “Hheyi, hheyi, balekelani izwe lasenyakatho!” usho uJehova, “ngokuba nginihlakazile njengemimoya yomine yezulu,” usho uJehova.
Zech 2:7 “Hheyi, zikhulule, uye eSiyoni, wena ohlezi nendodakazi yaseBabele!”
Zech 2:8 Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti ongithumile ukulanda inkazimulo yakhe ezizweni ezaziniphanga ngokuba othinta nina uthinta inhlamvu yeso lakhe uthi:
Zech 2:9 “Bhekani, ngiyakuqhweba ngesandla phezu kwabo, babe yimpango yababebakhonza, nazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumileyo.
Zech 2:10 “Hlabelela ngokujabula, uthokoze, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, ngokuba bhekani, ngiyeza, ngiyakuhlala phakathi kwakho,” usho uJehova.
Zech 2:11 “Izizwe eziningi ziyakuzihlanganisa noJehova ngalolo suku, zibe ngabantu bami; ngiyakuhlala phakathi kwakho, wazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumile kuwe.
Zech 2:12 UJehova uyakudla ifa lakwaJuda, libe yisabelo sakhe ezweni elingcwele, abuye akhethe iJerusalema.
Zech 2:13 Thula, nyama yonke, phambi kukaJehova, ngokuba uvukile, waphuma endaweni yakhe engcwele.”
Zech 3:1 Wayesengibonisa uJoshuwa umpristi omkhulu emi phambi kwengelosi kaJehova, noSathane emi ngakwesokunene sakhe ukumelana naye.
Zech 3:2 UJehova wathi kuSathane: “UJehova uyakukukhuza, Sathane, yebo, uJehova olikhethile iJerusalema uyakukukhuza; lo akasiso isikhuni esophulwe emlilweni na?”
Zech 3:3 UJoshuwa wayembethe izingubo ezingcolileyo; wayemi phambi kwengelosi.
Zech 3:4 Yathatha yasho kwababemi phambi kwayo, yathi: “Mkhumuleni izingubo ezingcolileyo.” Kuyena yathi: “Bheka, ngidedisile kuwe ububi bakho; ngiyakukwembathisa ezobukhosi.”
Zech 3:5 Ngase ngithi: “Mababeke isigqoko esihlanzekileyo ekhanda lakhe.” Base bebeka isigqoko esihlanzekileyo ekhanda lakhe, bamembathisa izingubo, ingelosi kaJehova isemi khona.
Zech 3:6 Ingelosi kaJehova yagomela kuJoshuwa, yathi:
Zech 3:7 “Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Uma uhamba ngezindlela zami, ugcine inkonzo yami, uyakwahlulela endlini yami, ugcine namagceke ami; ngiyakukunika ukuba uhambe phakathi kwalaba abemi lapha.
Zech 3:8 “ ‘Ake uzwe, Joshuwa, mpristi omkhulu, wena nabangane bakho abahlala phambi kwakho, ngokuba bangabantu abayisibonakaliso: bhekani, ngiyakuveza inceku yami, uHlumela.
Zech 3:9 Ngokuba bheka, itshe engilibeke phambi kukaJoshuwa kukhona amehlo ayisikhombisa etsheni lilodwa ngiyakuqopha ukuqoshwa kwalo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘ngidedisele kude ububi balelo zwe ngalusuku lunye.
Zech 3:10 “ ‘Ngalolo suku,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘niyakumema, kube yilowo nalowo umngane wakhe phansi komvini naphansi komkhiwane.’ ”
Zech 4:1 Ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yabuya, yangivusa njengomuntu evuswa ebuthongweni bakhe.
Zech 4:2 Yathi kimi: “Ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Ngibona, bheka, uthi lwezibani luyigolide lonke, lunembizana yalo phezu kwalo, nezibani zalo eziyisikhombisa zikulo; kukhona imibhobho eyisikhombisa kuleso naleso sibani esiphezu kwalo,
Zech 4:3 neminqumo emibili eseceleni kwalo, omunye ungakwesokunene sembizana, nomunye ungakwesokhohlo sayo.”
Zech 4:4 Ngathatha ngasho kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami, ngathi: “Ziyini lezi, nkosi?”
Zech 4:5 Ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yaphendula, yathi kimi: “Awazi yini ukuthi ziyini lezi?” Ngathi: “Qha, nkosi.”
Zech 4:6 Yayisithatha isho kimi, ithi: “Lokhu kuyizwi likaJehova kaZerubabele lokuthi: ‘Kungabi ngempi, kungabi ngamandla, kepha kube ngomoya wami kuphela,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Zech 4:7 “Ungubani wena ntaba enkulu? Phambi kukaZerubabele uyakuba yithafa; uyakukhipha itshe eliyinhloko ngokumemeza ukuthi: ‘Umusa, mawube kulo!’ ”
Zech 4:8 Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi:
Zech 4:9 “Izandla zikaZerubabele zibeke isisekelo sale ndlu, futhi izandla zakhe ziyakuyiqeda, wazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumile kini.
Zech 4:10 “Ngokuba ngubani oyakudelela usuku lwezinto ezincane, lapho ethokoza lawa mehlo ayisikhombisa kaJehova aqalaza emhlabeni wonke ukubona umthofu wokumisa esandleni sikaZerubabele, na?”
Zech 4:11 Ngase ngithatha, ngithi kuyo: “Iyini le minqumo emibili ngakwesokunene sothi lwezibani nangakwesokhohlo salo na?”
Zech 4:12 Ngathatha ngokwesibili, ngathi kuyo: “Ayini lawa magatsha amabili eminqumo aseceleni kwemibhobho emibili yegolide, athululwa ngayo amafutha egolide na?”
Zech 4:13 Yangiphendula yathi: “Awazi ukuthi ayini?” Ngathi: “Qha, nkosi.”
Zech 4:14 Yayisithi: “Lawa angabagcotshiweyo ababili abemi ngaseNkosini yomhlaba wonke.”
Zech 5:1 Ngabuye ngaphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, nanko umqulu wencwadi ondizayo.
Zech 5:2 Yathi kimi: “Ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Ngibona umqulu wencwadi ondizayo, ubude bawo buyizingalo ezingamashumi amabili, nobubanzi bawo buyizingalo eziyishumi.”
Zech 5:3 Yayisithi kimi: “Nasi isiqalekiso esiphumela ebusweni bomhlaba wonke, ngokuba ngokusho kwaso bonke abebayo bayakunqunywa lapha, nabo bonke abafungayo bayakunqunywa lapha ngokusho kwaso.
Zech 5:4 ‘Ngiyakusiphumisa,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘singene endlini yesela nasendlini yofunga amanga ngegama lami, sihlale phakathi kwendlu yakhe, siyiqede kanye nemithi yayo namatshe ayo.’ ”
Zech 5:5 Yayisiphuma ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami, yathi kimi: “Ake uphakamise amehlo akho, ubone ukuthi kuyini lokhu okuphumayo.”
Zech 5:6 Ngathi: “Kuyini?” Yathi: “Lokhu kuyi-efa eliphumayo.” Yabuye yathi: “Lokhu kungububi babo ezweni lonke.”
Zech 5:7 Bheka, isisibekelo somthofu saziphakamisa, kwakungowesifazane owahlala phakathi kwe-efa.
Zech 5:8 Yathi: “Lokhu kungububi.” Wamphonsa phakathi kwe-efa, waphonsa isisindo somthofu emlonyeni walo.
Zech 5:9 Ngase ngiphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, kwaphuma abesifazane ababili, umoya usemaphikweni abo; babe namaphiko njengamaphiko kanogolantethe, baliphakamisa i-efa emkhathini wezulu nomhlaba.
Zech 5:10 Ngase ngithi kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Laba baliyisaphi i-efa na?”
Zech 5:11 Yathi kimi: “Ukulakhela indlu ezweni laseShineyari; isilungisiwe liyakubekwa khona endaweni yalo.”
Zech 6:1 Ngabuye ngaphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, kwaphuma izinqola ezine phakathi kwezintaba ezimbili; izintaba zaziyizintaba zethusi.
Zech 6:2 Enqoleni yokuqala kwakukhona amahhashi abomvu, nasenqoleni yesibili amahhashi amnyama,
Zech 6:3 nasenqoleni yesithathu amahhashi amhlophe, nasenqoleni yesine amahhashi anala alufipha.
Zech 6:4 Ngase ngithatha, ngithi kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Ayini lana, nkosi?”
Zech 6:5 Ingelosi yaphendula, yathi kimi: “Lana ayimimoya yomine yezulu ephuma ekumeni phambi kweNkosi yomhlaba wonke.
Zech 6:6 Enamahhashi amnyama iphumela ezweni lasenyakatho; amhlophe ayawalandela; anala aphumela ezweni laseningizimu.”
Zech 6:7 Alufipha aphuma, afuna ukuhambahamba emhlabeni; yathi: “Hambani, nihambahambe emhlabeni.” Ayesehambahamba emhlabeni.
Zech 6:8 Yayisimemeza kimi, yakhuluma kimi, yathi: “Bheka, aphumela ezweni lasenyakatho, ayakuthulisa uMoya wami ezweni lasenyakatho.”
Zech 6:9 Lase lifika izwi likaJehova, lathi;
Zech 6:10 “Yamukela kubathunjwa, kuHelidayi, nakuThobiya, nakuJedaya izipho, uhambe wena ngalona lolo suku, ungene endlini kaJosiya indodana kaZefaniya, lapho befike khona bevela eBabele.
Zech 6:11 Lapho wamukele isiliva negolide, yenza umqhele, uwubeke ekhanda likaJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu,
Zech 6:12 usho kuye, uthi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: Bheka, kukhona indoda egama layo linguHlumela; uyakumila endaweni yakhe, akhe ithempeli likaJehova.
Zech 6:13 Yebo, yena uyakulakha ithempeli likaJehova, athwale ubukhosi, ahlale, abuse esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi, kube khona nompristi esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi, kube khona ukululekana ngokuthula phakathi kwabo bobabili.’
Zech 6:14 Imiqhele iyakuba yisikhumbuzo sikaHelemi, nesikaThobiya, nesikaJedaya, nesikaHeni, indodana kaZefaniya, ethempelini likaJehova.
Zech 6:15 Abakude bayakufika, bakhe ithempeli likaJehova, nazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumile kini. Kuyakwenzeka, uma nilalela nokulalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu.”
Zech 7:1 Kwathi ngomnyaka wesine wenkosi uDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya ngolwesine lwenyanga eyisishiyagalolunye, ekaKhisilevi.
Zech 7:2 IBethele lalithume oSareseri noRegemi Meleki namadoda abo ukunxusa kuJehova
Zech 7:3 nokukhuluma kubapristi abasendlini kaJehova Sebawoti nakubaprofethi ngokuthi: “Ngikhale ngenyanga yesihlanu, ngizile, njengalokho ngenzile le minyaka eminingi, na?”
Zech 7:4 Lase lifika izwi likaJehova Sebawoti kimi, lathi:
Zech 7:5 “Khuluma kubo bonke abantu bezwe nakubo abapristi, uthi: ‘Ekuzileni kwenu nasekulileni ngenyanga yesihlanu nangeyesikhombisa le minyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa nangizilela nokungizilela mina na?
Zech 7:6 Lapho nidlayo nalapho niphuzayo, anizidleli, niziphuzela nina, na?
Zech 7:7 Akusiwo lawa mazwi uJehova awamemezayo ngesandla sabaprofethi bokuqala, lapho iJerusalema lalakhiwe lisabusa, nalapho imizi yalo nxazonke zalo nelaseningizimu nehlanze kwakwakhiwe, na?’ ”
Zech 7:8 Izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya, lathi:
Zech 7:9 “Washo kanje uJehova Sebawoti, wathi: ‘Yahlulelani izahlulelo eziqinisileyo, nenze umusa nobubele, kube yilowo nalowo kumfowabo,
Zech 7:10 ningacindezeli abafelokazi, nezintandane, nabafokazi, nabampofu, kungabi ngoceba okubi ngomfowabo enhliziyweni yakhe.’
Zech 7:11 “Kepha bala ukulalela, baphekula ihlombe, benza izindlebe zabo zaba buthuntu ukuba bangezwa.
Zech 7:12 Benza izinhliziyo zabo zaba yidayimani, funa bezwe umthetho namazwi ayewathume uJehova Sebawoti ngoMoya wakhe ngesandla sabaprofethi bokuqala; ngalokho kwavela intukuthelo enkulu ivela kuJehova Sebawoti.
Zech 7:13 “ ‘Kwathi njengalokho wamemeza, bona bengezwanga, kanjalo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘bayakumemeza bona, ngingezwa mina.
Zech 7:14 Ngiyakubahlakazela phakathi kwezizwe zonke abangazazanga. Izwe selichithekile emva kwabo, ukuze kungabikho muntu odlulayo nobuyayo, ngokuba benza izwe elihle laba yincithakalo.’ ”
Zech 8:1 Izwi likaJehova Sebawoti lafika lathi:
Zech 8:2 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Ngihawukela iJerusalema ngokuhawukela okukhulu, yebo, ngilihawukela ngokufutheka okukhulu.”
Zech 8:3 Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngiyakubuyela eSiyoni, ngihlale phakathi kweJerusalema; iJerusalema liyakuthiwa uMuzi Weqiniso nentaba kaJehova Sebawoti iNtaba Engcwele.”
Zech 8:4 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Kusazakuhlala amaxhegu nezalukazi ezitaladini zaseJerusalema, yilowo nalowo abe nodondolo esandleni sakhe ngenxa yobuningi bezinsuku zakhe.
Zech 8:5 Izitaladi zasemzini ziyakugcwala abafana namantombazana bedlala ezitaladini zawo.”
Zech 8:6 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Uma kuyisimangaliso emehlweni ensali yalaba bantu ngalezo zinsuku, kuyakuba yisimangaliso emehlweni ami na?” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Zech 8:7 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bhekani, ngiyakusindisa abantu bami ezweni lasempumalanga nasezweni lasentshonalanga,
Zech 8:8 ngibahambise, bakhe phakathi kweJerusalema, babe ngabantu bami, mina ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo ngeqiniso nangokulunga.”
Zech 8:9 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Maziqine izandla zenu nina enizwa kulezi zinsuku lawa mazwi avela emlonyeni wabaprofethi ababe khona mhla sibekwa isisekelo sendlu kaJehova Sebawoti, ithempeli, ukuba yakhiwe.
Zech 8:10 Ngokuba ngaphambi kwalezo zinsuku kwakungekho nkokhelo yomuntu nanzuzo yenkomo, nakophumayo nakongenayo kwakungekho ukuthula ngenxa yesitha, ngokuba ngakhulula bonke abantu, kwaba yilowo nalowo wamelana nomfowabo.
Zech 8:11 Kepha angisayikuba njalo kuyo insali yalaba bantu njengasezinsukwini zakuqala,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Zech 8:12 “Ngokuba kuyakuba khona imbewu yokuthula; umvini uyakuthela izithelo zawo, umhlabathi uveze ukudla kwawo, amazulu anike amazolo awo, ngenze ukuba insali yalaba bantu idle ifa lazo zonke lezi zinto.
Zech 8:13 Kuyakuthi, njengalokho wawuyisiqalekiso phakathi kwabezizwe wena ndlu yakwaJuda nawe ndlu yakwa-Israyeli, kanjalo nginisindise, nibe yisibusiso; ningesabi, kepha maziqine izandla zenu.”
Zech 8:14 Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Njengalokho ngahlosa ukwenza okubi kini, lapho oyihlo babengithukuthelisa,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “ngingazisolanga,
Zech 8:15 kanjalo ngibuye ngahlosa kulezi zinsuku ukwenzela iJerusalema nendlu yakwaJuda okuhle; ningesabi.
Zech 8:16 Yilezi zinto eniyakuzenza: khulumani iqiniso, kube yilowo nalowo nomfowabo, nahlulele izahlulelo zeqiniso nezokuthula emasangweni enu,
Zech 8:17 ningacebi okubi ezinhliziyweni zenu, kube yilowo nalowo ngomakhelwane wakhe, ningathandi izifungo zamanga, ngokuba lezo zinto yilezo engizizondayo,” usho uJehova.
Zech 8:18 Izwi likaJehova Sebawoti lafika kimi, lathi:
Zech 8:19 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Ukuzila kwenyanga yesine, nokuzila kweyesihlanu, nokuzila kweyesikhombisa, nokuzila kweyeshumi kuyakuba ngukujabula nokuthokoza nemikhosi emihle kuyo indlu yakwaJuda; thandani iqiniso nokuthula.”
Zech 8:20 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Kusazakufika izizwe nabakhe emizini eminingi,
Zech 8:21 bahambe abakhileyo komunye, baye komunye, bathi: ‘Masiye impela ukunxusa ebusweni bukaJehova, simfune uJehova Sebawoti; nami ngiyakuhamba.’
Zech 8:22 Kuyakufika abantu abaningi nezizwe ezinamandla ukufuna uJehova Sebawoti eJerusalema nokunxusa ebusweni bukaJehova.”
Zech 8:23 Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Ngalezo zinsuku amadoda ayishumi azo zonke izilimi zabezizwe ayakubamba umphetho womuntu wakwaJuda ngokuthi: ‘Siyakuhamba nani, ngokuba sizwile ukuthi uNkulunkulu unani.’ ”
Zech 9:1 Isiprofetho sezwi likaJehova phezu kwezwe lakwaHadiraki; nalo iDamaseku liyakuba yindawo yokuhlala kwaso, ngokuba uJehova uneso kubantu, ikakhulu kuzo zonke izizwe zakwa-Israyeli,
Zech 9:2 kanye neHamati elikhawula kulo, neTire neSidoni, ngokuba kuhlakaniphile kakhulu.
Zech 9:3 ITire lazakhela inqaba, lanqwabela isiliva njengothuli, negolide elicwengekileyo njengodaka lwasezitaladini.
Zech 9:4 Bheka, iNkosi iyakulaphuca, iphonse imfuyo yalo elwandle, lona lidliwe ngumlilo.
Zech 9:5 I-Ashikeloni liyakukubona, lesabe, neGaza futhi, bese lithuthumela kakhulu, kanye ne-Ekroni, ngokuba ukwethemba kwalo kuyakujabha; inkosi iyakubhubha eGaza, ne-Ashikeloni aliyikuhlalwa.
Zech 9:6 E-Ashidodi kuyakuhlala umntwana wesihlahla; ngiyakunquma ukuziphakamisa kwamaFilisti.
Zech 9:7 Ngiyakukhipha igazi labo emlonyeni wabo, nezinengiso zabo phakathi kwamazinyo abo, nabo uqobo babe yinsali kuNkulunkulu wethu, babe ngababusi kwaJuda nase-Ekroni njengamaJebusi.
Zech 9:8 Ngiyakumisa ngibe yinqaba yendlu yami, ukuze kungabikho odlulayo nobuyayo; akusayikudlula mcindezeli kubo, ngokuba sengibonile ngawami amehlo.
Zech 9:9 Thokoza kakhulu, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni; jabula nokujabula, ndodakazi yaseJerusalema; bheka, iNkosi yakho iza kuwe, ilungile, inensindiso, ithobekile, ikhwele imbongolo, ithole, inkonyane yembongolokazi.
Zech 9:10 Ngiyakunquma inqola kwa-Efrayimi nehhashi eJerusalema, nomnsalo wokulwa uyakunqunywa; iyakukhuluma ukuthula kwabezizwe, nokubusa kwayo kuyakusukela elwandle kuze kufike elwandle, kusukela eMfuleni kuze kufike emajukujukwini omhlaba.
Zech 9:11 Nawe, ngenxa yegazi lesivumelwano sakho, ngikhiphile iziboshwa zakho emgodini okungekho kuwo amanzi.
Zech 9:12 Buyelani enqabeni, ziboshwa esezinethemba; namuhla ngiyanitshela ukuthi ngiyakubuyisela kini okuphindwe kabili.
Zech 9:13 Ngokuba ngizigobela uJuda njengomnsalo, ngibeka u-Efrayimi kuwo, ngivusela amadodana akho, Siyoni, kumadodana akho, Javani, ngikwenze inkemba yeqhawe.
Zech 9:14 UJehova abesebonakala phezu kwabo, umcibisholo wakhe uphume njengonyazi; iNkosi uJehova iyakubetha icilongo, ihambe ngezivunguvungu zaseningizimu.
Zech 9:15 UJehova Sebawoti uyakubavikela, badle, banyathele phansi amatshe endwayimana; bayakuphuza igazi labo njengewayini, bagcwale njengemikhele, njengamagumbi e-altare.
Zech 9:16 UJehova uNkulunkulu wabo uyakubasindisa ngalolo suku njengomhlambi wabantu bakhe, ngokuba bangamatshe omqhele abengezela phezu kwezwe lakhe.
Zech 9:17 Yeka ubuhle balo! Yeka ukubukeka kwalo! Amabele abo ayakuhlumisa izinsizwa zalo, newayini elisha izintombi zalo.
Zech 10:1 Celani kuJehova imvula ngesikhathi semvula yamuva, uJehova owenza imibani, abesebanika izihlambi zemvula, yilowo nalowo aphiwe utshani ezweni lakhe.
Zech 10:2 Ngokuba amatherafi akhulumile okuyize, nababhuli babone okungamanga; bakhuluma amaphupho angelutho, baduduza ngeze; ngalokho bayasuka njengezimvu, bathotshisiwe, ngokuba kungekho umalusi.
Zech 10:3 “Intukuthelo yami ivuthele abelusi; ngiyakujezisa izimpongo, ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti uyakuhambela umhlambi wakhe, indlu yakwaJuda, abenze babe njengehhashi elinobukhosi ekulweni.
Zech 10:4 Kuyena kuyakuphuma itshe legumbi, kuyena isikhonkwane, kuyena umnsalo wempi, kuyena bonke ababusi kanyekanye.
Zech 10:5 Bayakuba njengamaqhawe anyathela udaka ezitaladini ekulweni; bayakulwa, ngokuba uJehova unabo, nezinkweli zamahhashi ziyakujabha.
Zech 10:6 “Ngiyakuqinisa indlu yakwaJuda, ngisindise indlu yakwaJosefa, ngibabuyise, ngokuba nginomusa kubo, babe kungathi angizange ngibalahle, ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wabo; ngiyakubezwa.
Zech 10:7 U-Efrayimi uyakuba njengeqhawe; inhliziyo yabo iyakuthokoza njengangewayini; abantwana babo bayakukubona, bathokoze; inhliziyo yabo iyakujabula kuJehova.
Zech 10:8 Ngiyakubahlabela ikhwelo, ngibabuthe, ngokuba ngibahlengile; bayakwanda njengalokho kade banda.
Zech 10:9 Nalapho ngibahlwanyela phakathi kwabantu, bayakungikhumbula ezindaweni ezikude, baphile kanye nabantwana babo, babuye.
Zech 10:10 Ngiyakubabuyisa ezweni laseGibithe, ngibabuthe e-Asiriya, ngibangenise ezweni lakwaGileyadi naseLebanoni, abayikutholelwa indawo.
Zech 10:11 Bayakudabula elwandle lokuhlupheka, kushaywe amaza olwandle, nezintwa zonke zeNayile ziyakoma, kwehliswe ukuziphakamisa kwe-Asiriya, isuke intonga yaseGibithe.
Zech 10:12 Ngiyakubaqinisa kuJehova, bahambe egameni lakhe,” usho uJehova.
Zech 11:1 Vula iminyango yakho, Lebanoni, ukuba umlilo udle imisedari yakho.
Zech 11:2 Hhewula, msayipuresi, ngokuba umsedari uyawa, ngokuba emihle iyachithwa; hewulani nina ma-oki aseBashani, ngokuba ihlathi elingenakudatshulwa liyawa.
Zech 11:3 Izwi lokukhala kwabelusi! ngokuba udumo lwabo luyachithwa; izwi lokubhonga kwamabhongo ezingonyama! ngokuba ubuhle beJordani buyaqothulwa.
Zech 11:4 Usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu wami, uthi: “Yalusa izimvu zokuhlatshwa,
Zech 11:5 ezibathengi bazo bazihlaba, bengazithwesi icala bona kodwa, nezibathengisi bazo bathi: ‘Makabongwe uJehova, ngokuba ngiceba njalo,’ nezibelusi bazo bangazihawukeli.
Zech 11:6 Ngokuba angisayikubahawukela abakhileyo ezweni,” usho uJehova, “kepha bheka, ngiyakunikela abantu, kube yilowo nalowo esandleni somakhelwane wakhe nasesandleni senkosi yakhe; bona bayakushaya izwe labo, kepha angiyikubophula esandleni sabo.”
Zech 11:7 Ngase ngalusa izimvu zokuhlatshwa, izimvu ezihluphekayo. Ngazithathela izintonga ezimbili, enye ngayibiza ngokuthi uMusa, nenye ngayibiza ngokuthi uZibopho; ngalusa-ke izimvu.
Zech 11:8 Ngabanquma abelusi bobathathu ngenyanga inye, ngokuba umphefumulo wami wadinwa yibo, nganengwa ngumphefumulo wabo.
Zech 11:9 Ngase ngithi: “Angisayikunalusa; efayo mayife, eyakuchithwa mayichithwe, neziseleyo mazidle, kube yileyo naleyo inyama yenye.”
Zech 11:10 Ngase ngithatha induku yami uMusa, ngayinqamula, ukuze ngaphule isivumelwano sami engangisenzile nabantu bonke.
Zech 11:11 Saphulwa ngalona lolo suku, bese zazi izimvu ezihluphekayo ezangilalela ukuthi kwakuyizwi likaJehova.
Zech 11:12 Ngase ngithi kuzo: “Uma kukuhle emehlweni enu, ngipheni inkokhelo yami, kepha uma kungenjalo, yekani.” Zase zilinganisela inkokhelo yami izinhlamvu ezingamashumi amathathu zesiliva.
Zech 11:13 Wathi kimi uJehova: “Ziphonse kumbumbi,” inani elikhulu engilinganisiwe nalo yibo. Ngazamukela izinhlamvu ezingamashumi amathathu zesiliva, ngaziphonsa kumbumbi endlini kaJehova.
Zech 11:14 Ngase ngiyinqamula intonga yami yesibili, uZibopho, ukuba ngaphule ubuzalwane phakathi kukaJuda no-Israyeli.
Zech 11:15 UJehova wayesethi kimi: “Zithathele izikhali zomalusi oyisiwula.
Zech 11:16 Ngokuba bheka, ngiyakuvusa umalusi ezweni ongayikuhambela ezilahlekileyo, angafuni ezihlakazekileyo, angazelaphi ezaphukileyo, angaboneleli eziphilayo, kepha adle inyama yezikhulupheleyo, adwebule izinselo zazo.
Zech 11:17 “Maye kumalusi oyisiwula oshiya izimvu! Inkemba iyakuba sengalweni yakhe nasesweni lakhe lokunene; ingalo yakhe iyakubuna nokubuna, neso lakhe lokunene liyakufiphala nokufiphala.”
Zech 12:1 Isiprofetho. Izwi likaJehova ngo-Israyeli. UJehova oweneka amazulu, wabeka isisekelo somhlaba, wabumba umoya womuntu phakathi kwakhe, uthi:
Zech 12:2 “Bheka, ngiyakwenza iJerusalema libe yindebe yokutengezela kubo bonke abantu nxazonke nakulo iJuda ekuvinjezelweni kweJerusalema.
Zech 12:3 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku ngenze iJerusalema libe yitshe elisindayo kuzo zonke izizwe; zonke ezizithwesa lona ziyakusikwa nokusikwa; zonke izizwe zomhlaba ziyakulihlanganyela.
Zech 12:4 Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “ngiyakushaya onke amahhashi ngokugcwaneka nezinkweli zawo ngobuhlanya; ngiyakuvula amehlo ami phezu kwendlu yakwaJuda, ngishaye onke amahhashi abezizwe ngobumpumputhe.
Zech 12:5 Ababusi bakwaJuda bayakusho ezinhliziyweni zabo ukuthi: ‘Abakhileyo eJerusalema bangamandla ami kuJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu wabo.’
Zech 12:6 “Ngalolo suku ngiyakwenza ababusi bakwaJuda babe ngumcengezi womlilo phakathi kwemithi nobhaqa lomlilo phakathi kwezithungu; bayakuqeda bonke abantu nxazonke ngakwesokunene nangakwesokhohlo, iJerusalema libe lisahlala endaweni yalo eJerusalema.
Zech 12:7 “UJehova uyakusindisa amatende akwaJuda kuqala, ukuze udumo lwendlu yakwaDavide nodumo lwabakhileyo eJerusalema lungakhuliswa phezu kukaJuda.
Zech 12:8 Ngalolo suku uJehova uyakulondoloza abakhileyo eJerusalema; okhubekayo phakathi kwabo ngalolo suku uyakuba njengoDavide, indlu kaDavide ibe njengoNkulunkulu, njengengelosi kaJehova ngaphambi kwabo.
Zech 12:9 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku ngifune ukuchitha bonke abezizwe abahlasela iJerusalema.
Zech 12:10 “Ngiyakuthululela phezu kwendlu kaDavide naphezu kwabakhileyo eJerusalema umoya womusa nowokunxusa, bambheke abamgwazileyo, bamlilele njengokulilela ozelwe yedwa, babe nomunyu ngaye njengonomunyu ngezibulo lakhe.
Zech 12:11 Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona ukulila okukhulu eJerusalema njengokulila kweHadadi Rimoni esigodini saseMegidoni.
Zech 12:12 Izwe liyakulila imindeni ngemindeni ngokwayo: umndeni wendlu yakwaDavide ngokwawo nabesifazane bawo ngokwabo; umndeni wendlu yakwaNathani ngokwawo nabesifazane bawo ngokwabo;
Zech 12:13 umndeni wendlu yakwaLevi ngokwawo nabesifazane bawo ngokwabo; umndeni kaShimeyi ngokwawo nabesifazane bawo ngokwabo,
Zech 12:14 nayo yonke imindeni eseleyo, imindeni ngemindeni ngokwayo nabesifazane bayo ngokwabo.
Zech 13:1 “Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona umthombo ovulelwa izono nokungcola kwendlu kaDavide nabakhileyo eJerusalema.
Zech 13:2 “Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “nginqume amagama ezithombe ezweni, zingabe zisakhunjulwa, ngidlulise abaprofethi nawomoya abangcolileyo ezweni.
Zech 13:3 Kuyakuthi uma kusaprofetha umuntu, uyise nonina abamzalayo basho kuye ukuthi: ‘Awuyikuphila, ngokuba ukhuluma amanga egameni likaJehova,’ uyise nonina abamzalayo bamgwaze esaprofetha.
Zech 13:4 “Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku abaprofethi babe namahloni, kube yilowo nalowo ngombono wakhe ekuprofetheni kwakhe, bangembathi ingubo yoboya ukuyokhohlisa;
Zech 13:5 kepha uyakuthi: ‘Angisiye umprofethi, ngingumlimi womhlabathi, ngokuba umuntu wangithenga ebusheni bami.’
Zech 13:6 Uma sekuthiwa kuye: ‘Iyini leyo mivimbo esezandleni zakho na?’ uyakuthi: ‘Engashaywa ngayo endlini yabathandiweyo bami.’
Zech 13:7 “Vuka, nkemba, uvukele umalusi wami, uvukele umuntu ongumngane wami,” usho uJehova Sebawoti. “Shaya umalusi, zize zihlakazeke izimvu, bese ngiphendulela abancane isandla sami.
Zech 13:8 Kuyakuthi ezweni lonke,” usho uJehova, “kunqunywe izinxenye ezimbili kulo, zibhubhe, kusale eyesithathu kulo.
Zech 13:9 Ngiyakungenisa inxenye yesithathu emlilweni, ngibacwengisise njengokucwengisiswa kwesiliva, ngibavivinye njengokuvivinywa kwegolide; bayakubiza igama lami, ngibaphendule, ngithi: ‘Bangabantu bami;’ base bethi: ‘UJehova unguNkulunkulu wami.’ ”
Zech 14:1 Bheka, luyeza usuku lukaJehova, lapho impango yakho iyakwahlukaniswa phakathi kwakho.
Zech 14:2 Ngiyakubuthela iJerusalema bonke abezizwe ukuba balwe nalo; umuzi uyakuthathwa, izindlu ziphangwe, kuphoqwe abesifazane; inxenye yomuzi iyakumuka, iye ekuthunjweni, kepha abantu abaseleyo abayikunqunywa emzini.
Zech 14:3 UJehova uyakuphuma, alwe nalabo bezizwe njengasosukwini lwempi yakhe ngosuku lokulwa.
Zech 14:4 Izinyawo zakhe ziyakuma ngalolo suku eNtabeni Yeminqumo ephambi kweJerusalema ngasempumalanga, iNtaba Yeminqumo iqhekezeke phakathi ngasempumalanga nangasentshonalanga, kube yisigodi esikhulu kakhulu; inxenye yentaba iyakuqhekezekela ngasenyakatho nenxenye ngaseningizimu.
Zech 14:5 Niyakubalekela esigodini sezintaba zami, ngokuba isigodi sezintaba siyakufinyelela e-Aseli, yebo, niyakubaleka njengalokho nabalekela ukuzamazama komhlaba ngezinsuku zika-Uziya inkosi yakwaJuda; lapho kuzakufika uJehova uNkulunkulu wami nabo bonke abangcwele kanye nawe.
Zech 14:6 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku kungabikho ukukhanya, amakhaza nesithwathwa kuphela.
Zech 14:7 Kuyakuba lusuku ngokwalo olwaziwa nguJehova, kungabi yimini, kungabi ngubusuku, kepha kube ngukukhanya ngesikhathi sokuhlwa.
Zech 14:8 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku kuphume amanzi aphilayo eJerusalema, inxenye yawo ngaselwandle lwasempumalanga, inxenye yawo ngaselwandle lwasentshonalanga, kube sehlobo nasebusika.
Zech 14:9 UJehova uyakuba yiNkosi emhlabeni wonke; ngalolo suku uJehova uyakuba munye, negama lakhe libe linye.
Zech 14:10 Lonke izwe liyakuphenduka ithafa kusukela eGeba kuze kube seRimoni ngaseningizimu kwaseJerusalema; liyakuphakanyiswa, lihlale endaweni yalo, kusukela eSangweni likaBenjamini kuze kube sendaweni yesango lakuqala, kuze kube seSangweni Lasegumbini, kusukela eMbhoshongweni kaHananeli kuze kube sesikhamweni sewayini senkosi.
Zech 14:11 Kuyakuhlalwa kulo, kungabe kusabakho siqalekiso, kepha iJerusalema liyakuhlala ngokulondeka.
Zech 14:12 Yikho okuyakuba ngukushaya uJehova ayakushaya ngakho bonke abantu abalwe neJerusalema: inyama yabo iyakudleka besemi ngezinyawo zabo, namehlo abo ayakuphelela ezikhoxeni zawo, ulimi lwabo ludleke emlonyeni wabo.
Zech 14:13 Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku kube phakathi kwabo isidumo esikhulu esivela kuJehova, babambe, kube yilowo nalowo isandla somakhelwane wakhe, isandla sakhe sivukele isandla somakhelwane wakhe.
Zech 14:14 NoJuda uyakulwa eJerusalema, kubuthwe ingcebo yazo zonke izizwe ezizungezileyo, igolide, nesiliva, nezambatho, kube kuningi kakhulu.
Zech 14:15 Kuyakuba njalo ukushaywa kwamahhashi, neminyuzi, namakamela nezimbongolo, nazo zonke izilwane, okuyakuba khona kulawo makamu, njengalokho kushaywa.
Zech 14:16 Kuyakuthi bonke abaseleyo ezizweni zonke ezazilifikela iJerusalema bakhuphuke iminyaka ngeminyaka ukukhuleka eNkosini uJehova Sebawoti nokugubha umkhosi wamadokodo.
Zech 14:17 Kuyakuthi abangakhuphuki emindenini yomhlaba, baye eJerusalema ukukhuleka eNkosini uJehova Sebawoti, phezu kwabo kungabi yimvula.
Zech 14:18 Uma umndeni waseGibithe ungakhuphuki uze ufike, ayiyikuba naphezu kwawo; kepha kuyakuba khona ukushaywa uJehova ayakushaya ngakho izizwe ezingakhuphuki ukugubha umkhosi wamadokodo.
Zech 14:19 Lokhu kuyakuba yisijeziso seGibithe nesijeziso sazo zonke izizwe ezingakhuphuki ukugubha umkhosi wamadokodo.
Zech 14:20 Ngalolo suku kuyakulotshwa ezikhencezweni zamahhashi ukuthi: “Zahlukaniselwe uJehova,” amakhanzi asendlini kaJehova abe njengemikhele phambi kwe-altare.
Zech 14:21 Onke amakhanzi eJerusalema nakwaJuda ayakwahlukaniselwa uJehova Sebawoti; bonke abahlabayo bayakufika, bathathe kuwo, bapheke kuwo, kungabe kusabakho mthengisi ngalolo suku endlini kaJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 1:1 Isiprofetho. Izwi likaJehova ku-Israyeli ngesandla sikaMalaki.
Mal 1:2 “Nginithandile,” usho uJehova. “Nokho nithi: ‘Usithande kanjani na?’ “U-Esawu akasiye umfowabo kaJakobe na?” usho uJehova. “Ngamthanda uJakobe,
Mal 1:3 kepha u-Esawu ngamzonda, ngenza izintaba zakhe incithakalo, nefa lakhe ngalinika amakhanka asehlane.”
Mal 1:4 Uma u-Edomi ethi: “Sichithiwe, kepha siyakubuye sakhe izincithakalo,” usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bayakwakha bona, kepha mina ngiyakudiliza, babizwe ngokuthi uMkhawulo Wobubi, nabantu uJehova abathukuthelelayo kuze kube phakade.
Mal 1:5 Amehlo enu ayakukubona, bese nithi: ‘UJehova uyakuba mkhulu, kudlule nasemkhawulweni ka-Israyeli.’
Mal 1:6 “Indodana idumisa uyise, nenceku inkosi yayo; uma nginguyise, kuphi ukudunyiswa kwami? Uma ngiyinkosi, kuphi ukwesatshwa kwami?” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “kinina bapristi enilidelela igama lami.” Nokho nithi: “Silidelele kanjani igama lakho na?”
Mal 1:7 “Ngokunikela ngesinkwa esingcolileyo e-altare lami.” Bese nithi: “Sikungcolise ngani na?” “Ngokusho kwenu ukuthi: ‘Itafula likaJehova lidelelekile.’
Mal 1:8 Lapho ninikela ngesilwane esiyimpumputhe sibe ngumhlatshelo, akukubi na? Lapho ninikela ngesilwane esiqhugayo nesigulayo, akukubi na? Mawusisondeze kumbusi wakho; uyakuba nomusa kuwe na? Uyakukwamukela na?” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 1:9 “Manje ake ninxuse kuNkulunkulu ukuba abe nomusa kithi; njengokuba ninokunjalo ezandleni zenu, uyakunamukela na?” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 1:10 “Sengathi kungaba khona phakathi kwenu ongavala izicabha, ukuze ningabaseli ize e-altare lami! Angithokozi ngani,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “angiyikwamukela iminikelo ezandleni zenu.
Mal 1:11 Ngokuba kusukela ekuphumeni kwelanga kuze kube sekushoneni kwalo igama lami likhulu phakathi kwezizwe; ezindaweni zonke igama lami lishiselwa impepho kanye neminikelo ehlambulukileyo, ngokuba igama lami likhulu phakathi kwezizwe,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 1:12 “Kepha niyalihlambalaza ngokusho kwenu ukuthi: ‘Itafula leNkosi lingcolile lona, nesithelo salo, ukudla kwalo, sidelelekile.’
Mal 1:13 Nisho futhi ukuthi: ‘Bheka ukuhlupheka!’ bese nilincimfela,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “niletha okuthathwe ngobudlova, nokuqhugayo, nokugulayo, niletha kanjalo umnikelo; bengiyakwamukela lokhu esandleni senu na?” usho uJehova.
Mal 1:14 “Makaqalekiswe okhohlisayo, okukhona emhlambini wakhe iduna, kanti athembise, ahlabele iNkosi okonakeleyo; ngokuba ngiyinkosi enkulu,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “negama lami liyesabeka phakathi kwezizwe.”
Mal 2:1 “Manje lo myalo ungowenu bapristi.
Mal 2:2 Uma ningezwa, uma ningakubeki enhliziyweni ukunika igama lami udumo,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “ngiyakuthuma kini isiqalekiso, ngiqalekise izibusiso zenu, yebo, sengiziqalekisile, ngokuba anikubeki enhliziyweni.
Mal 2:3 “Bhekani, ngiyakusongela inzalo yenu ngenxa yenu, ngithele umquba ebusweni benu, umquba wemikhosi yenu, nisuselwe kuwo.
Mal 2:4 Niyakwazi ukuthi ngithumile kini lo myalo ukuba isivumelwano sami noLevi sime,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 2:5 “Isivumelwano sami naye sasingukuphila nokuthula, ngamnika khona ukuba esabe; wangesaba, waphela amandla phambi kwegama lami.
Mal 2:6 Umthetho weqiniso wawusemlonyeni wakhe, nobubi babungatholwa ezindebeni zakhe; wahamba nami ngokuthula nangobuqotho, wabuyisa abaningi ebubini.
Mal 2:7 “Ngokuba izindebe zompristi ziyakugcina ukwazi, kufunwe umthetho emlonyeni wakhe, ngokuba uyisithunywa sikaJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 2:8 Kepha nichezukile endleleni, nikhubekisile abaningi emthethweni; nisonakalisile isivumelwano sikaLevi,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 2:9 “Ngalokho mina nginenzile naba ngabadelelekileyo nabathotshisiweyo phambi kwabantu bonke njengokuba ningazigcinanga izindlela zami, kepha nikhethe ubuso emthethweni.
Mal 2:10 “Asinaye ubaba munye thina sonke? Asidalwanga nguNkulunkulu munye na? Sikhohlisanelani, kube yilowo nomfowabo, sisingcolisa isivumelwano sawobaba na?
Mal 2:11 “UJuda ukhohlisile, isinengiso senziwe kwa-Israyeli naseJerusalema, ngokuba uJuda uyingcolisile indlu engcwele kaJehova ayithandayo, waganwa yindodakazi kankulunkulu wabezizwe.
Mal 2:12 UJehova makanqume kumuntu owenza lokhu ufakazi nophendulayo ematendeni akwaJakobe kanye noletha umnikelo kuJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 2:13 “Ngokwesibili niyakwenza nalokhu: nisibekela i-altare likaJehova ngezinyembezi, nangokukhala, nangokububula, angabe esayinakekela iminikelo, ingabe isamukeleka esandleni senu.
Mal 2:14 Bese nithi-ke: ‘Ngani na?’ Ngokuba uJehova wayengufakazi phakathi kwakho nomfazi wobusha bakho omkhohlisile wena, noma engumngane wakho nomfazi wesivumelwano sakho.
Mal 2:15 “AkusiMunye osenzileyo, okusele kuye umoya wethu na? Ufunani lo Munye? Inzalo kaNkulunkulu. Ngalokho qaphelani umoya wenu ukuba ningamkhohlisi umfazi wobusha benu.
Mal 2:16 “Ngokuba ngiyazonda ukwahlukana,” usho uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, “nozisibekelayo ngobudlova njengesambatho,” usho uJehova Sebawoti. Ngalokho qaphelani umoya wenu ukuba ningakhohlisi.
Mal 2:17 Nimkhathazile uJehova ngamazwi enu. Nokho nithi: “Simkhathaze kanjani?” Ngokusho ukuthi: “Bonke abenza okubi bahle emehlweni kaJehova; yena uthokoza ngabo,” noma: “Uphi uNkulunkulu wokwahlulela na?”
Mal 3:1 “Bhekani, ngiyathuma isithunywa sami; siyakulungisa indlela phambi kwami. INkosi eniyifunayo iyakufika ngokuzumayo ethempelini layo; nesithunywa sesivumelwano enithokoza ngaso, bheka, siyeza,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 3:2 Ngubani ongathwala usuku lokufika kwaso? Ngubani oyakuma ekubonakaleni kwaso na? Ngokuba sinjengomlilo wocwengisisayo nensipho yomhlanzi.
Mal 3:3 Siyakuhlala sicwengisisa sihlanza isiliva, sihlambulule amadodana kaLevi, siwahluze njengegolide nesiliva, aze anikele ngeminikelo kuJehova ngokulunga.
Mal 3:4 Isiyakuba mihle kuJehova iminikelo yakwaJuda neyeJerusalema njengasezinsukwini zasendulo naseminyakeni yakuqala.
Mal 3:5 “Ngiyakusondela kini ukwahlulela, ngibe ngufakazi osheshayo ngabalumbi, nangeziphingi, nangabafunga amanga, nangabacindezela abaqashwa ngenkokhelo yabo, nabafelokazi, nezintandane, nabachezukisa abafokazi, bengangesabi mina,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 3:6 “Ngokuba mina Jehova angiguquki; ngalokho nina madodana kaJakobe aniqedwa.
Mal 3:7 Kusukela emihleni yawoyihlo nichezukile ezimisweni zami, anizigcinanga. Buyelani kimi, ngiyakubuyela kini,” usho uJehova Sebawoti. “Nokho nithi: ‘Siyakubuyela kanjani?’
Mal 3:8 “Umuntu angaphanga uNkulunkulu na? Nokho niyangiphanga. “Bese nithi: ‘Sikuphange kanjani na?’ “Ngokweshumi nangeminikelo.
Mal 3:9 Niqalekisiwe ngesiqalekiso, nokho niyangiphanga, sizwe sonke.
Mal 3:10 Ngenisani konke okweshumi endlini yengcebo ukuba kube ngukudla endlini yami, ningivivinye ngalokhu,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “uma ngingayikunivulela amafasitele asezulwini, nginithululele isibusiso kunokwaneleyo.
Mal 3:11 Ngenxa yenu ngiyakukhuza okudlayo, kungachithi izithelo zomhlabathi wenu, nemivini yenu ayiyikuphutha endle,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 3:12 “Zonke izizwe ziyakuthi nibusiswe, ngokuba niyakuba yizwe elithokozisayo,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 3:13 “Amazwi enu ayelukhuni kimi,” usho uJehova. “Nokho nithi: ‘Sikhulumeni ngawe na?’
Mal 3:14 “Nithi: ‘Kuyize ukukhonza uNkulunkulu; kuyinzuzoni ukuthi sigcinile imfanelo yakhe nokuthi sihambe ngokukhedamisa phambi kukaJehova Sebawoti na?
Mal 3:15 Kepha manje siyakuthi babusisiwe abaziqhenyayo; yebo, abenza okubi bayakhiwa; noma bemlinga uNkulunkulu, bayakhululwa.’ ”
Mal 3:16 Khona abamesabayo uJehova bakhuluma bodwa omunye nomunye; uJehova waqaphela, wezwa, kwalotshwa phambi kwakhe incwadi yokukhumbula ababemesaba uJehova, bezindla ngegama lakhe.
Mal 3:17 “Bayakuba ngabami,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “babe yimfuyo yami ngosuku engiyakulwenza, ngibahawukele, njengalokhu umuntu ehawukela indodana yakhe emkhonzayo.
Mal 3:18 Bese nibuya, nahlukanise abalungileyo nababi, abamkhonza uNkulunkulu nabangamkhonziyo.
Mal 4:1 “Ngokuba bheka, luyeza usuku, luvutha njengeziko; bonke abaziqhenyayo nabo bonke abenza okubi bayakuba ngamabibi; luyakubashisa lolo suku oluzayo,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “lungabashiyeli mpande nagatsha.
Mal 4:2 Kepha kinina enilesabayo igama lami kuyakuphuma ilanga lokulunga, linokuphilisa emaphikweni alo; niyakuphuma, nitshekule njengamathole esibaya.
Mal 4:3 Niyakunyathela phansi ababi, ngokuba bayakuba luthuli phansi kwamathe ezinyawo zenu ngosuku engilwenzayo,” usho uJehova Sebawoti.
Mal 4:4 “Khumbulani umthetho kaMose inceku yami engamyala ngawo eHorebe ngaye wonke u-Israyeli, waba yizimiso nezahlulelo.
Mal 4:5 “Bhekani, ngiyakuthuma kini u-Eliya umprofethi, lungakafiki usuku lukaJehova olukhulu nolwesabekayo.
Mal 4:6 Uyakuphendulela izinhliziyo zawoyise kubantwana nezinhliziyo zabantwana koyise, funa ngifike, ngishaye izwe ngesiqalekiso.”
Matt 1:1 Incwadi yokuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu, indodana kaDavide, indodana ka-Abrahama.
Matt 1:2 U-Abrahama wazala u-Isaka, u-Isaka wazala uJakobe, uJakobe wazala uJuda nabafowabo;
Matt 1:3 uJuda wazala oFaresi noZara kuTamari, uFaresi wazala u-Esiromu, u-Esiromu wazala u-Aramu;
Matt 1:4 u-Aramu wazala u-Aminadaba, u-Aminadaba wazala uNasoni, uNasoni wazala uSalimoni;
Matt 1:5 uSalimoni wazala uBowasi kuRakhabi, uBowasi wazala u-Obede kuRuthe, u-Obede wazala uJesayi;
Matt 1:6 uJesayi wazala uDavide, inkosi. UDavide wazala uSolomoni kumka-Uriya;
Matt 1:7 uSolomoni wazala uRobowamu, uRobowamu wazala u-Abiya, u-Abiya wazala u-Asafa;
Matt 1:8 u-Asafa wazala uJosafati, uJosafati wazala uJoramu, uJoramu wazala u-Oziya;
Matt 1:9 u-Oziya wazala uJothamu, uJothamu wazala u-Akazi, u-Akazi wazala uHezekiya;
Matt 1:10 uHezekiya wazala uManase, uManase wazala u-Amoni, u-Amoni wazala uJosiya;
Matt 1:11 uJosiya wazala uJekoniya nabafowabo ngesikhathi sokuthunjelwa eBabiloni.
Matt 1:12 Kwathi emva kokuthunjelwa eBabiloni uJekoniya wazala uSalatiyeli, uSalatiyeli wazala uZorobabeli;
Matt 1:13 uZorobabeli wazala u-Abiyudi, u-Abiyudi wazala u-Eliyakimi, u-Eliyakimi wazala u-Azori;
Matt 1:14 u-Azori wazala uSadoki, uSadoki wazala u-Akimi, u-Akimi wazala u-Eliyudi;
Matt 1:15 u-Eliyudi wazala u-Eleyazare, u-Eleyazare wazala uMathani, uMathani wazala uJakobe;
Matt 1:16 uJakobe wazala uJosefa, indoda kaMariya, azalwa nguye uJesu othiwa uKristu.
Matt 1:17 Zinjalo-ke izizukulwane zonke ezisukela ku-Abrahama ziye kuDavide, ziyizizukulwane eziyishumi nane; nezisukela kuDavide ziye ekuthunjelweni eBabiloni ziyizizukulwane eziyishumi nane; nezisukela ekuthunjelweni eBabiloni ziye kuKristu ziyizizukulwane eziyishumi nane.
Matt 1:18 Ukuzalwa kukaJesu Kristu kwaba nje: unina uMariya esemiselwe uJosefa, bengakahlangani wafunyanwa ekhulelwe ngoMoya oNgcwele.
Matt 1:19 Kepha uJosefa indoda yakhe engumuntu olungileyo, engathandi ukumthela ihlazo, wayefuna ukumlahla ngasese.
Matt 1:20 Esazindla ngalokho, bheka, ingelosi yeNkosi yabonakala kuye ngephupho, ithi: “Josefa, ndodana kaDavide, ungesabi ukumthatha uMariya umkakho, ngokuba lokho akukhulelweyo kungoMoya oNgcwele.
Matt 1:21 Uzakuzala indodana, uyiqambe igama lokuthi uJesu, ngokuba nguye oyakusindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo.”
Matt 1:22 Lokhu konke kwenzeka ukuba kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa yiNkosi ngomprofethi ukuthi:
Matt 1:23 “Bheka, intombi iyakukhulelwa, izale indodana; bayakuyiqamba igama lokuthi u-Emanuweli,” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa “uNkulunkulu unathi”.
Matt 1:24 UJosefa esevukile ebuthongweni wenza njengalokho imyalile ingelosi yeNkosi, wamthatha umkakhe;
Matt 1:25 akaze aya kuye, waze wazibula ngendodana; wayiqamba igama lokuthi uJesu.
Matt 2:1 UJesu esezelwe eBetlehema laseJudiya emihleni kaHerode inkosi, bheka, kwafika izazi eJerusalema, zivela empumalanga, zithi:
Matt 2:2 “Uphi lowo ozelwe eyinkosi yabaJuda na? Ngokuba sibonile inkanyezi yakhe kwelasempumalanga, size ukukhuleka kuye.”
Matt 2:3 UHerode inkosi esekuzwile lokho wakhathazeka neJerusalema lonke kanye naye.
Matt 2:4 Wabutha bonke abapristi abakhulu nababhali besizwe, wabuza kubo ukuthi uKristu uzakuzalelwaphi.
Matt 2:5 Bathi kuye: “EBetlehema laseJudiya, ngokuba kulotshiwe kanjalo ngomprofethi ukuthi:
Matt 2:6 “ ‘Nawe Betlehema, lizwe lakwaJuda, kawusiye omncane nakanye kubabusi bakwaJuda, ngokuba kuyakuvela kuwe umbusi oyakwalusa isizwe sami u-Israyeli.’ ”
Matt 2:7 Khona uHerode, ezibizile izazi ngasese, wabuzisisa kuzo isikhathi inkanyezi ebonakele ngaso,
Matt 2:8 wazithuma eBetlehema, wathi: “Hambani nibuzisise ngomntwana; kuyakuthi nxa nimfumene, ningitshele ukuba nami ngiye ngikhuleke kuye.”
Matt 2:9 Seziyizwile inkosi, zamuka; bheka, inkanyezi ezayibona kwelasempumalanga yahamba phambi kwazo, yaze yafika yema phezu kwalapho umntwana ekhona.
Matt 2:10 Zathi ukuyibona inkanyezi, zathokoza ngokuthokoza okukhulu kakhulu.
Matt 2:11 Zase zingena endlini, zabona umntwana noMariya unina, zawa phansi, zakhuleka kuye, zavula amagugu azo, zamkhunga ngezipho: igolide namakha nenhlaka.
Matt 2:12 Kwathi ziyaliwe nguNkulunkulu ngephupho ukuba zingabuyeli kuHerode, zabuyela ezweni lakubo ngenye indlela.
Matt 2:13 Sezimukile, bheka, ingelosi yeNkosi yabonakala kuJosefa ngephupho, ithi: “Vuka uthabathe umntwana nonina, ubalekele eGibithe, uhlale khona, ngize ngikutshele; ngokuba uHerode uzakumfuna umntwana ukuba ambhubhise.”
Matt 2:14 Wavuka-ke, wathabatha umntwana nonina ebusuku, wamuka waya eGibithe,
Matt 2:15 wahlala khona, waze wafa uHerode, ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa yiNkosi ngomprofethi ukuthi: “Ngayibiza indodana yami iphume eGibithe.”
Matt 2:16 Khona uHerode, esebonile ukuthi izazi zimphambile, wathukuthela kakhulu, wathumela wabulala bonke abantwana besilisa baseBetlehema nasendaweni yonke yangakhona, abaminyaka mibili nangaphansi njengesikhathi abesibuzisisile kuzo izazi.
Matt 2:17 Khona kwagcwaliseka okwakhulunywa ngoJeremiya umprofethi ukuthi:
Matt 2:18 “Kwezwakala izwi eRama, ukukhala nokulila okukhulu, uRakheli ekhalela abantwana bakhe, engavumi ukududuzwa, ngokuba abasekho.”
Matt 2:19 Kepha uHerode esefile, bheka, ingelosi yeNkosi yabonakala ngephupho kuJosefa eGibithe, yathi:
Matt 2:20 “Vuka uthabathe umntwana nonina, uye ezweni lakwa-Israyeli; ngokuba sebefile ababezingela ukuphila komntwana.”
Matt 2:21 Wasuka-ke, wathabatha umntwana nonina, wafika ezweni lakwa-Israyeli.
Matt 2:22 Kepha ezwa ukuthi sekubusa u-Arkelawu eJudiya esikhundleni sikaHerode uyise, wesaba ukuya khona; eseyaliwe nguNkulunkulu ngephupho wamuka waya kwelaseGalile;
Matt 2:23 wafika wakha emzini othiwa iNazaretha ukuba kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa ngabaprofethi ukuthi: “Uyakubizwa ngokuthi umNazaretha.”
Matt 3:1 Ngaleyo mihla kwavela uJohane uMbhapathizi eshumayela ehlane laseJudiya, ethi:
Matt 3:2 “Phendukani, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ususondele!”
Matt 3:3 Ngokuba nguye akhuluma ngaye umprofethi u-Isaya, ethi: “Izwi lomemezayo ehlane, lithi: ‘Lungisani indlela yeNkosi, nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde.’ ”
Matt 3:4 Yena uJohane wayenengubo yoboya bekamela noqhotho lwesikhumba okhalweni lwakhe; ukudla kwakhe kwakuyizinkumbi nezinyosi zasendle.
Matt 3:5 Khona kwaphumela kuye iJerusalema, neJudiya lonke, nezwe lonke laseJordani,
Matt 3:6 babhapathizwa nguye emfuleni iJordani bevuma izono zabo.
Matt 3:7 Kepha kwathi ebona abaningi kubaFarisi nabaSadusi beza embhapathizweni, wathi kubo: “Nzalo yezinyoka, ngubani onibonise ukubalekela intukuthelo ezayo na?
Matt 3:8 Ngakho vezani izithelo ezifanele ukuphenduka.
Matt 3:9 Ningacabangi ukuba ningasho phakathi kwenu ukuthi: ‘Sinobaba u-Abrahama;’ ngokuba ngithi kini: UNkulunkulu angamvusela u-Abrahama abantwana kulawa matshe.
Matt 3:10 Izembe selibekiwe empandeni yemithi; ngakho yonke imithi engatheli izithelo ezinhle iyanqunywa, iphonswe emlilweni.
Matt 3:11 “Mina nginibhapathiza ngamanzi, kube ngukuphenduka; kepha yena oza emva kwami unamandla kunami engingafanele ukuthwala izicathulo zakhe; yena uzakunibhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele nangomlilo,
Matt 3:12 ombenge yakhe yokwela isesandleni sakhe; uzakushanelisisa isibuya sakhe, abuthele amabele enqolobaneni yakhe; kepha amakhoba uzakuwashisa ngomlilo ongacimekiyo.”
Matt 3:13 Khona uJesu evela eGalile wafika kuJohane eJordani ukuba azobhapathizwa nguye.
Matt 3:14 Kepha uJohane wamalela wathi: “Yimi engiswela ukubhapathizwa nguwe; wena uza kimi na?”
Matt 3:15 UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Vuma kalokhu, ngokuba kusifanele ukugcwalisa kanjalo ukulunga konke.” Khona wayesemvumela.
Matt 3:16 UJesu esebhapathiziwe wakhuphuka masinyane emanzini; bheka, izulu lavuleka, wabona uMoya kaNkulunkulu ehla njengejuba, eza phezu kwakhe.
Matt 3:17 Bheka, kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: “Lo uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo engithokozile ngayo.”
Matt 4:1 Khona uJesu waholelwa nguMoya ehlane ukuba alingwe nguSathane.
Matt 4:2 Esezilile ukudla izinsuku ezingamashumi amane nobusuku obungamashumi amane, wagcina walamba.
Matt 4:3 Kwafika umlingi, wathi kuye: “Uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, yisho ukuba lawa matshe abe yizinkwa.”
Matt 4:4 Kepha waphendula wathi: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Akusinkwa sodwa umuntu ayakuphila ngaso kodwa ngamazwi onke aphuma emlonyeni kaNkulunkulu.’ ”
Matt 4:5 Khona uSathane wamthatha, wamyisa emzini ongcwele, wammisa esiqongweni sethempeli,
Matt 4:6 wathi kuye: “Uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ziphonse phansi; ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “ ‘Uyakuyaleza izingelosi zakhe ngawe, zikuthwale ngezandla, ungaze waqhuzuka etsheni ngonyawo lwakho.’ ”
Matt 4:7 UJesu wathi kuye: “Kulotshiwe futhi ukuthi: ‘Ungayilingi iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho.’ ”
Matt 4:8 USathane wabuye wamyisa entabeni ende kakhulu, wamkhombisa imibuso yonke yezwe nenkazimulo yayo;
Matt 4:9 wathi kuye: “Konke lokhu ngizakukunika khona, uma uziwisa phansi, ukhuleke kimi.”
Matt 4:10 Khona uJesu wathi kuye: “Suka, Sathane, ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Wokhuleka eNkosini uNkulunkulu wakho, umkhonze yena yedwa.’ ”
Matt 4:11 USathane wayesemshiya; bheka, kwafika izingelosi, zamkhonza.
Matt 4:12 Kuthe esezwile ukuthi uJohane uboshiwe, wamuka waya eGalile.
Matt 4:13 Wasuka eNazaretha, weza wahlala eKapernawume elingaselwandle emikhawulweni yakwaZabuloni neyakwaNafetali
Matt 4:14 ukuba kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa ngo-Isaya umprofethi ukuthi:
Matt 4:15 “Izwe lakwaZabuloni nezwe lakwaNafetali ngaselwandle ngaphesheya kweJordani, iGalile labezizwe,
Matt 4:16 isizwe esasihlezi ebumnyameni sibonile ukukhanya okukhulu, nababehlezi ezweni nasethunzini lokufa kuphumele kubo ukukhanya.”
Matt 4:17 Kusukela kuleso sikhathi uJesu waqala ukushumayela nokusho ukuthi: “Phendukani, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ususondele.”
Matt 4:18 UJesu ehamba ngaselwandle lwaseGalile wabona izelamani ezimbili, uSimoni othiwa uPetru no-Andreya umfowabo, bephonsa inetha elwandle; ngokuba babe ngabadobi.
Matt 4:19 Wayesethi kubo: “Ngilandeleni; ngiyakunenza nibe ngabadobi babantu.”
Matt 4:20 Base bewashiya masinyane amanetha, bamlandela.
Matt 4:21 Esedlulela phambili wabona ezinye izelamani ezimbili, uJakobe kaZebedewu, noJohane umfowabo, besemkhunjini kanye noZebedewu uyise, belungisa amanetha abo; wababiza.
Matt 4:22 Base beshiya masinyane umkhumbi noyise, bamlandela.
Matt 4:23 UJesu walihamba lonke elaseGalile efundisa emasinagogeni abo, eshumayela ivangeli lombuso, ephulukisa abantu ezifweni zonke nasebuthakathakeni bonke.
Matt 4:24 Udumo lwakhe lwezwakala ezweni lonke laseSiriya; baletha kuye bonke abagulayo abaphethwe yizifo ngezifo nobuhlungu, nabakhwelwe ngamademoni, nabanesithuthwane, nabafe uhlangothi, wabaphulukisa.
Matt 4:25 Izixuku eziningi zamlandela zivela eGalile, naseDekapholi, naseJerusalema, naseJudiya, nangaphesheya kweJordani.
Matt 5:1 Kwathi ebona izixuku, wenyukela entabeni; esehlezi phansi, abafundi bakhe beza kuye.
Matt 5:2 Wayesevula umlomo wakhe, wabafundisa wathi:
Matt 5:3 “Babusisiwe abampofu emoyeni, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ungowabo.
Matt 5:4 Babusisiwe abakhalayo, ngokuba bayakududuzwa.
Matt 5:5 Babusisiwe abamnene, ngokuba bayakudla ifa lomhlaba.
Matt 5:6 Babusisiwe abalambele, bomele ukulunga, ngokuba bayakusuthiswa.
Matt 5:7 Babusisiwe abanesihawu, ngokuba bayakuhawukelwa.
Matt 5:8 Babusisiwe abanenhliziyo ehlanzekileyo, ngokuba bayakubona uNkulunkulu.
Matt 5:9 Babusisiwe abalamulayo, ngokuba bayakuthiwa abantwana bakaNkulunkulu.
Matt 5:10 Babusisiwe abazingelwa ngenxa yokulunga, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ungowabo.
Matt 5:11 “Nibusisiwe, nxa benithuka, benizingela, bekhuluma konke okubi ngani, beqamba amanga ngenxa yami.
Matt 5:12 Jabulani, nithokoze, ngokuba umvuzo wenu mkhulu ezulwini; ngokuba kanjalo babazingela abaprofethi abananduleleyo.
Matt 5:13 “Nina ningusawoti womhlaba, kepha uma usawoti edumele, ubusawoti bovuswa ngani na? Akasasizi lutho, kuphela ukulahlwa ngaphandle, anyathelwe ngabantu.
Matt 5:14 “Nina ningukukhanya kwezwe. Umuzi owakhe entabeni ungesitheke.
Matt 5:15 Nomuntu kasokheli isibani, asibeke phansi kwesitsha, kodwa usifaka othini; khona siyabakhanyisela bonke abasendlini.
Matt 5:16 Kanjalo makukhanye ukukhanya kwenu phambi kwabantu ukuba babone imisebenzi yenu emihle, badumise uYihlo osezulwini.
Matt 5:17 “Ningathi ngize ukuchitha umthetho nabaprofethi; angizanga ukuchitha, ngize ukugcwalisa.
Matt 5:18 Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kuze kudlule izulu nomhlaba, akusoze kwadlula gamana linye nasicashana sinye somthetho, kuze kufezeke konke.
Matt 5:19 Ngakho-ke oweqa owodwa kule miyalo emincinyane, afundise abantu kanjalo, uyakuthiwa omncinyane embusweni wezulu; kepha oyigcinayo, ayifundise, lowo uyakuthiwa mkhulu embusweni wezulu.
Matt 5:20 Ngokuba ngithi kini: Uma ukulunga kwenu kungadluli okwababhali nokwabaFarisi, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu.
Matt 5:21 “Nizwile kwathiwa kwabasendulo: ‘Ungabulali; yilowo nalowo obulalayo uyakuba necala lokwahlulelwa.’
Matt 5:22 Kepha mina ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo othukuthelela umfowabo uyakuba necala lokwahlulelwa; noshoyo kumfowabo ukuthi: ‘Silima,’ uyakuba necala emphakathini; noshoyo ukuthi: ‘Siwula,’ uyakuba necala lokulahlwa esihogweni somlilo.
Matt 5:23 “Ngakho-ke nxa uletha umnikelo wakho e-altare, ukhumbula lapho ukuthi umfowenu unamagqubu nawe,
Matt 5:24 shiya lapho umnikelo wakho phambi kwe-altare, uhambe kuqala ubuyisane nomfowenu, andukuba uze unikele umnikelo wakho.
Matt 5:25 “Shesha uzwane nolwa nawe nisesendleleni, funa olwa nawe akunikele kumahluleli, umahluleli akunikele esikhonzini, uphonswe etilongweni.
Matt 5:26 Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Kawusoze waphuma khona, uze ukhiphe ifadingi lokugcina.
Matt 5:27 “Nizwile kwathiwa: ‘Ungaphingi.’
Matt 5:28 Kepha mina ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo obuka owesifazane, amkhanuke, usephingile naye enhliziyweni yakhe.
Matt 5:29 Uma iso lakho lokunene likukhubekisa, likhiphe, ulilahle; ngokuba kungcono kuwe ukuba kubhubhe sibe sinye ezithweni zakho kunokuba wonke umzimba wakho uphonswe esihogweni.
Matt 5:30 Noma isandla sakho sokunene sikukhubekisa, sinqume, usilahle; ngokuba kungcono kuwe ukuba kubhubhe sibe sinye ezithweni zakho kunokuba wonke umzimba wakho uphonswe esihogweni.
Matt 5:31 “Kwathiwa: ‘Yilowo nalowo olahla umkakhe kamnike incwadi yesahlukaniso.’
Matt 5:32 Kepha mina ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo olahla umkakhe kungengenxa yokuphinga umenza aphinge, noganwa ngolahliweyo uyaphinga.
Matt 5:33 “Nizwile futhi kwathiwa kwabasendulo: ‘Ungafungi amanga, kepha uqinise izifungo zakho eNkosini.’
Matt 5:34 Kepha mina ngithi kini: Ningafungi nakanye, noma izulu, ngokuba liyisihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu,
Matt 5:35 noma umhlaba, ngokuba uyisenabelo sezinyawo zakhe, noma iJerusalema, ngokuba lingumuzi weNkosi enkulu.
Matt 5:36 Ungafungi nekhanda lakho, ngokuba awunakuphendula nalunye unwele lube mhlophe nokuba lube mnyama.
Matt 5:37 Kepha izwi lenu malibe ngokuthi: Yebo, yebo; qhabo, qhabo. Okudlula lokhu kuvela kokubi.
Matt 5:38 “Nizwile kwathiwa: ‘Iso ngeso, izinyo ngezinyo.’
Matt 5:39 Kepha mina ngithi kini: Ningamelani nokubi, kodwa uma umuntu ekumukula esihlathini sokunene, mphendulele nesinye.
Matt 5:40 Nofuna ukukumangalela, akwamuke ingubo, mnike nejazi.
Matt 5:41 Nosuka ekucindezela ukuba uhambe imayela libe linye, hamba naye abe mabili.
Matt 5:42 Muphe ocela kuwe, ungamfulatheli ofuna ukutsheleka kuwe.
Matt 5:43 “Nizwile kwathiwa: ‘Wothanda umakhelwane wakho, uzonde isitha sakho.’
Matt 5:44 Kepha mina ngithi kini: Thandani izitha zenu, nibabusise abaniqalekisayo, nibaphathe kahle abanizondayo, nibakhulekele abanizingelayo
Matt 5:45 ukuba nibe ngabantwana bakaYihlo osezulwini; ngokuba yena uphumisa ilanga lakhe phezu kwababi nabahle, anise imvula phezu kwabalungileyo nabangalungile.
Matt 5:46 Ngokuba uma nithanda abanithandayo, ninamvuzo muni na? Abenzi njalo nabathelisi na?
Matt 5:47 Futhi uma nibingelela abafowenu bodwa, nenza lukhulu luni na? Abenzi njalo nabezizwe na?
Matt 5:48 Ngakho-ke manibe ngabapheleleyo, njengokuba uYihlo wasezulwini ephelele.
Matt 6:1 “Kepha qaphelani ningenzi ukulunga kwenu phambi kwabantu ukuba nibonwe yibo, funa ningabi nawo umvuzo kuYihlo osezulwini.
Matt 6:2 “Ngakho-ke nxa wabela isipho, ungakhalisi icilongo phambi kwakho, njengalokhu kwenza abazenzisi emasinagogeni nasemigwaqweni ukuba badunyiswe ngabantu. Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Sebewamukele umvuzo wabo.
Matt 6:3 Kepha wena, nxa wabela isipho, isandla sakho sokhohlo masingakwazi esikwenzayo esokunene,
Matt 6:4 ukuze isipho sakho sibe sekusithekeni; noYihlo obona ekusithekeni uzakukuvuza.
Matt 6:5 “Nalapho nikhuleka, ningabi njengabazenzisi, ngokuba bethanda ukukhuleka bemi emasinagogeni nasezinhlanganweni zezindlela ukuba babonwe ngabantu. Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Sebewamukele umvuzo wabo.
Matt 6:6 Kepha wena, nxa ukhuleka, ngena ekamelweni lakho, uthi usuvale umnyango wakho ukhuleke kuYihlo osekusithekeni; noYihlo obona ekusithekeni uzakukuvuza.
Matt 6:7 Kodwa nxa nikhuleka, ningathemelezi njengabezizwe, ngokuba bathi bayakuzwiwa ngokukhuluma kwabo okuningi.
Matt 6:8 Ngakho-ke maningafani nabo; ngokuba uYihlo uyakwazi enikuswelayo ningakaceli kuye.
Matt 6:9 Ngakho-ke anokhuleka kanje, nithi: “ ‘Baba wethu osezulwini, malingcweliswe igama lakho;
Matt 6:10 mawufike umbuso wakho; mayenziwe intando yakho emhlabeni njengasezulwini;
Matt 6:11 usiphe namuhla isinkwa sethu semihla ngemihla;
Matt 6:12 usithethelele amacala ethu, njengalokhu nathi sibathethelela abanecala kithi;
Matt 6:13 ungasingenisi ekulingweni, kodwa usikhulule kokubi; ngokuba umbuso ungowakho, namandla, nenkazimulo, kuze kube phakade. Amen.’
Matt 6:14 “Ngokuba uma nithethelela abantu iziphambeko zabo, noYihlo wasezulwini uyakunithethelela nani.
Matt 6:15 Kepha uma ningathetheleli abantu iziphambeko zabo, noYihlo akayikunithethelela iziphambeko zenu.
Matt 6:16 Futhi nxa nizila ukudla, ninganyukumali njengabazenzisi; ngokuba bona banyakamisa ubuso babo, ukuze babonakale kubantu ukuthi bazilile. Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Sebewamukele umvuzo wabo.
Matt 6:17 Kepha wena, nxa uzila, gcoba ikhanda lakho, ugeze ubuso bakho,
Matt 6:18 ukuze ungabonakali kubantu ukuthi uzilile kodwa kuYihlo osekusithekeni; noYihlo obona ekusithekeni uzakukuvuza.
Matt 6:19 “Ningazibekeleli ingcebo emhlabeni, lapho kona inundu nokugqwala, nalapho amasela efohla khona, ebe.
Matt 6:20 Kepha zibekeleleni ingcebo ezulwini, lapho kungoni inundu nokugqwala, nalapho amasela engafohli khona, ebe.
Matt 6:21 Ngokuba lapho kukhona ingcebo yakho, nenhliziyo yakho iyakuba khona lapho.
Matt 6:22 “Isibani somzimba yiso. Ngakho uma iso lakho lilihle, uzakukhanya umzimba wakho wonke.
Matt 6:23 Kepha uma iso lakho lilibi, uzakuba mnyama umzimba wakho wonke. Ngakho uma ukukhanya okukuwe kungubumnyama, ubumnyama bukhulu kangakanani!
Matt 6:24 “Akakho ongakhonza amakhosi amabili. Ngokuba uyakuzonda enye, athande enye, noma abambelele kwenye, adelele enye. Ningekhonze uNkulunkulu noMamona.
Matt 6:25 “Ngalokho-ke ngithi kini: Ningakhathazeki ngokuphila kwenu ukuthi niyakudlani noma niyakuphuzani, nangomzimba wenu ukuthi niyakwembathani. Ukuphila akukukhulu kunokudla nomzimba kunesambatho na?
Matt 6:26 Bukani izinyoni zezulu ukuthi azihlwanyeli, azivuni, azibekeleli ezinqolobaneni; nokho uYihlo wasezulwini uyazondla. Nina kanizidluli kakhulu na?
Matt 6:27 Ngumuphi kini ongelekela ebudeni bakhe ingalo ibe nye ngokukhathazeka na?
Matt 6:28 “Nikhathazekelani ngesambatho na? Qaphelani iminduze yasendle ukuthi imila kanjani; kayikhandleki, kayiphothi;
Matt 6:29 kepha ngithi kini: NoSolomoni ebukhazikhazini bakhe bonke wayengembathisile okomunye wayo.
Matt 6:30 Uma uNkulunkulu embathisa kanjalo utshani basendle obukhona namuhla, ngomuso buphonswe eziko, akayikunembathisa kakhulu nina eninokukholwa okuncane na?
Matt 6:31 Ngakho-ke ningakhathazeki nithi: ‘Siyakudlani?’ noma: ‘Siyakuphuzani?’ noma: ‘Siyakwembathani na?’
Matt 6:32 Ngokuba konke lokhu abezizwe bayakufunisisa; ingani uYihlo wasezulwini uyazi ukuthi niyakudinga konke lokhu.
Matt 6:33 Kodwa funani kuqala umbuso kaNkulunkulu nokulunga kwakhe, khona konke lokhu kuyakwenezelwa nina.
Matt 6:34 Ningakhathazeki ngengomuso, ngokuba ingomuso iyakukhathalela okwayo. Inkathazo yosuku yanele lona.
Matt 7:1 “Ningahluleli ukuba ningahlulelwa.
Matt 7:2 Ngokuba ngokwahlulela enahlulela ngakho nani niyakwahlulelwa ngakho, nangaleso silinganiso enilinganisa ngaso nani niyakulinganiselwa ngaso.
Matt 7:3 “Ubhekelani ucezwana olusesweni lomfowenu, kepha ugongolo olusesweni lakho awuluboni, na?
Matt 7:4 Ungasho kanjani kumfowenu ukuthi: ‘Ake ngikhiphe ucezwana olusesweni lakho;’ bheka, ugongolo lusesweni lakho.
Matt 7:5 Mzenzisi, khipha kuqala ugongolo esweni lakho, khona-ke uzakubonisisa ukukhipha ucezwana esweni lomfowenu.
Matt 7:6 “Ninganiki izinja okungcwele, ningaphonsi amaparele enu phambi kwezingulube, funa ziwanyathele ngezinyawo zazo, ziphenduke, ziniklebhule.
Matt 7:7 “Celani, khona nizakuphiwa; funani, khona nizakufumana; ngqongqothani, khona nizakuvulelwa.
Matt 7:8 Ngokuba yilowo nalowo ocelayo uyamukeliswa, nofunayo uyafumana, nongqongqothayo uzakuvulelwa.
Matt 7:9 “Noma ngumuphi umuntu kini ongathi, uma indodana yakhe icela isinkwa, ayinike itshe,
Matt 7:10 noma icela inhlanzi, ayinike inyoka na?
Matt 7:11 Ngakho-ke uma nina enibabi nazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezinhle, kakhulu uYihlo osezulwini uzakubapha okuhle abacela kuye.
Matt 7:12 Ngakho-ke konke nokungakanani enifuna ukuba abantu bakwenze kini, kwenzeni nani kanjalo kubo; ngokuba lokhu kungumthetho nabaprofethi.
Matt 7:13 “Ngenani ngesango elincane; ngokuba isango libanzi nendlela inkulu eyisa ekubhujisweni; baningi abangena khona.
Matt 7:14 Kepha isango lincane nendlela iyingcingo eyisa ekuphileni; bayingcosana abayifumanayo.
Matt 7:15 “Xwayani abaprofethi bamanga abeza kini bembathise okwezimvu, kepha ngaphakathi bayizimpisi eziphangayo.
Matt 7:16 Niyakubazi ngezithelo zabo. Kungakhiwa yini izithelo zomvini emeveni noma amakhiwane ekhakhasini na?
Matt 7:17 Kanjalo yilowo nalowo muthi omuhle uthela izithelo ezinhle, kepha umuthi omubi uthela izithelo ezimbi.
Matt 7:18 Umuthi omuhle ungethele izithelo ezimbi, nomuthi omubi ungethele izithelo ezinhle.
Matt 7:19 Yilowo nalowo muthi ongatheli izithelo ezinhle uyanqunywa, uphonswe emlilweni.
Matt 7:20 Njalo-ke niyakubazi ngezithelo zabo.
Matt 7:21 “Asibo bonke abashoyo kimi ukuthi: ‘Nkosi, Nkosi,’ abayakungena embusweni wezulu, kuphela owenza intando kaBaba osezulwini.
Matt 7:22 Abaningi bayakuthi kimi ngalolo suku: ‘Nkosi, Nkosi, asiprofethanga yini ngegama lakho, sakhipha amademoni ngegama lakho, senza imisebenzi eminingi yamandla ngegama lakho, na?’
Matt 7:23 Khona ngiyakufakaza kubo ukuthi: ‘Angizange nginazi; sukani kimi nina benzi bokubi.’
Matt 7:24 “Ngalokho yilowo nalowo owezwa lawa mazwi ami, awenze, uyakufaniswa nendoda ehlakaniphileyo eyakha indlu yayo phezu kwedwala.
Matt 7:25 Layithela imvula, kwafika izikhukhula, kwavunguza imimoya, yayishaya leyo ndlu; kepha kayiwanga, ngokuba yayisekelwe yidwala.
Matt 7:26 Kodwa yilowo owezwa lawa mazwi ami, angawenzi, uyakufaniswa nendoda eyisiwula eyakha indlu yayo phezu kwesihlabathi.
Matt 7:27 Layithela imvula, kwafika izikhukhula, kwavunguza imimoya, yayishaya leyo ndlu, yawa, kwaba kukhulu ukuwa kwayo!”
Matt 7:28 Kwathi uJesu eseqedile lawo mazwi, izixuku zamangala ngokufundisa kwakhe;
Matt 7:29 ngokuba wayebafundisa njengonamandla, kungenjengababhali babo.
Matt 8:1 Kwathi esehlile entabeni, zamlandela izixuku eziningi.
Matt 8:2 Bheka, kwafika onochoko, wakhuleka kuye, wathi: “Nkosi, uma uthanda, ungangihlambulula.”
Matt 8:3 Wayeselula isandla, wamphatha, wathi: “Ngiyathanda; hlambuluka.” Wayesehlambuluka masinyane ochokweni lwakhe.
Matt 8:4 UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Bheka, ungatsheli muntu, kepha hamba uzibonakalise kumpristi, uyise umnikelo owayalelwa nguMose, kube ngubufakazi kubo.”
Matt 8:5 Kwathi esangena eKapernawume, kweza kuye induna yekhulu, yamncenga yathi:
Matt 8:6 “Nkosi, umfana wami ulele endlini, ufe uhlangothi, ukhwelwe kakhulu ngubuhlungu.”
Matt 8:7 Wathi kuyo: “Mina ngizakuza ngimphulukise.”
Matt 8:8 Induna yekhulu yaphendula yathi: “Nkosi, angifanele ukuba ungene phansi kophahla lwami, kepha yisho izwi nje, khona umfana wami uyakusinda.
Matt 8:9 Ngokuba nami ngingumuntu ophansi kwamakhosi, nginamabutho phansi kwami; ngithi kwelinye: ‘Hamba,’ lihambe; ngithi kwelinye: ‘Woza,’ lize; nasencekwini yami: ‘Yenza lokhu,’ ikwenze.”
Matt 8:10 UJesu ekuzwa lokho wamangala, wathi kwabamlandelayo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Angizange ngifumane kwa-Israyeli ukukholwa okungaka kumuntu.
Matt 8:11 Kepha ngithi kini: Abaningi bayakuza bevela empumalanga nasentshonalanga, bahlale ekudleni no-Abrahama no-Isaka noJakobe embusweni wezulu,
Matt 8:12 kodwa abantwana bombuso bayakukhishelwa ebumnyameni obungaphandle; lapho kuyakuba khona ukukhala nokugedla amazinyo.”
Matt 8:13 UJesu wayesethi enduneni yekhulu: “Hamba, makube kuwe njengokukholwa kwakho.” Umfana wasinda ngaso leso sikhathi.
Matt 8:14 UJesu wayesengena endlini kaPetru, wabona umkhwekazi wakhe elele phansi enomkhuhlane.
Matt 8:15 Waphatha isandla sakhe, umkhuhlane wamyeka; wavuka, wamkhonza.
Matt 8:16 Kwathi sekuhlwile, baletha kuye abaningi abakhwelwe ngamademoni, wakhipha omoya ngezwi, waphulukisa bonke abagulayo,
Matt 8:17 ukuze kugcwaliseke okwakhulunywa ngo-Isaya umprofethi ukuthi: “Yena wabetshatha ubuthakathaka bethu, wathwala izifo zethu.”
Matt 8:18 Kwathi uJesu ebona isixuku simhaqile, wayala ukuba kuwelelwe ngaphesheya.
Matt 8:19 Kwase kufika umbhali, wathi kuye: “Mfundisi, ngizakukulandela, noma uya ngaphi.”
Matt 8:20 UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Izimpungushe zinemigodi, nezinyoni zezulu zinezidleke, kepha iNdodana yomuntu kayinandawo, lapho ingacamelisa khona ikhanda.”
Matt 8:21 Kodwa omunye wabafundi bakhe wathi kuye: “Nkosi, ngivumele ngiye kuqala ukuyakummbela ubaba.”
Matt 8:22 Kepha uJesu wathi kuye: “Ngilandele; yeka abafileyo bembele abafileyo babo.”
Matt 8:23 Wayesengena emkhunjini; abafundi bakhe bamlandela.
Matt 8:24 Bheka, kwavuka isiphepho esikhulu elwandle, umkhumbi waze wagujuzelwa ngamaza; kepha yena wayelele.
Matt 8:25 Basondela, bamvusa, bathi: “Nkosi, sisindise, safa.”
Matt 8:26 Wayesethi kubo: “Nesabelani nina bokukholwa okuncane na?” Khona wavuka wakhuza umoya nolwandle, kwaba khona ukuthula okukhulu.
Matt 8:27 Kepha abantu bamangala, bathi: “Unjani lo ukuba nomoya nolwandle kumlalele na?”
Matt 8:28 Kwathi esefikile ngaphesheya ezweni lamaGadara, kwahlangana naye ababili abakhwelwe ngamademoni, bephuma emathuneni, beyizidlova ezinkulu ngangokuba kwakungedlule muntu ngaleyo ndlela.
Matt 8:29 Bheka, bamemeza bathi: “Sinamsebenzi muni nawe Ndodana kaNkulunkulu? Uze lapha ukusizwisa ubuhlungu, kungakabi yiso isikhathi, na?”
Matt 8:30 Manje kwakukhona kude nabo umhlambi wezingulube eziningi ziklabile.
Matt 8:31 Amademoni amncenga athi: “Uma usikhipha, sithume ukuba singene emhlambini wezingulube.”
Matt 8:32 Wathi kuwo: “Hambani.” Ayesephuma, angena ezingulubeni; bheka, umhlambi wonke wagulukudela eweni, waphonseka elwandle, wafela emanzini.
Matt 8:33 Kodwa ababezalusa babaleka, baya emzini, babika konke, nalokho okwehlele abakhwelwe ngamademoni.
Matt 8:34 Bheka, umuzi wonke waphuma ukuyomhlangabeza uJesu; bathe bembona, bamncenga ukuba amuke emikhawulweni yelakubo.
Matt 9:1 Wayesengena emkhunjini, wawela, weza emzini wakubo.
Matt 9:2 Bheka, baletha kuye umuntu ofe uhlangothi elele ohlakeni. UJesu ebona ukukholwa kwabo wathi kofe uhlangothi: “Yima isibindi, ndodana; uthethelelwe izono zakho.”
Matt 9:3 Bheka, abathile kubabhali bathi phakathi kwabo: “Lo uyahlambalaza.”
Matt 9:4 UJesu ezazi izizindlo zabo wathi: “Nizindlelani okubi ezinhliziyweni zenu na?
Matt 9:5 Ngokuba yikuphi okulula ukuthi: ‘Uthethelelwe izono zakho,’ noma ukuthi: ‘Vuka uhambe,’ na?
Matt 9:6 Kepha ukuze nazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu inamandla emhlabeni okuthethelela izono —” khona wathi kofe uhlangothi: “Vuka, uthabathe uhlaka lwakho, uye endlini yakho.”
Matt 9:7 Wavuka, waya endlini yakhe.
Matt 9:8 Kepha izixuku zikubona zethuka, zamdumisa uNkulunkulu onikile abantu amandla anjalo.
Matt 9:9 Esadlula lapho uJesu wabona umuntu othiwa uMathewu ehlezi endaweni yokuthela, wathi kuye: “Ngilandele.” Wasuka-ke, wamlandela.
Matt 9:10 Kwathi ehlezi ekudleni endlini, bheka, kwafika abaningi abathelisi nezoni, bahlala badla noJesu nabafundi bakhe.
Matt 9:11 AbaFarisi bekubona lokho bathi kubafundi bakhe: “Yini ukuba umfundisi wenu adle nabathelisi nezoni na?”
Matt 9:12 Ekuzwa lokhu wathi: “Abaphilileyo abadingi inyanga, ngabagulayo bodwa.
Matt 9:13 Kepha hambani nifunde ukuba kuthini ukuthi: ‘Ngifuna isihawu, hhayi umhlatshelo.’ Ngokuba angizanga ukubiza abalungileyo kepha izoni ukuba ziphenduke.”
Matt 9:14 Khona kwase kufika kuye abafundi bakaJohane, bathi: “Yini ukuba thina nabaFarisi sizila ukudla; kepha abafundi bakho abazili ngani na?”
Matt 9:15 UJesu wathi kubo: “Abayeni bangalila yini, umyeni enabo na? Kodwa kuzakufika izinsuku, lapho umyeni ezakususwa kubo; yikhona-ke bezakuzila.
Matt 9:16 Akakho obekela isiziba sendwangu engakashukeki engutsheni endala, ngokuba lokhu okubekelwa kuyo kuyaklebhula engutsheni, kwande ukuklebhuka.
Matt 9:17 Akuthelwa futhi iwayini elisha ezimvabeni ezindala, funa izimvaba ziqhume, newayini lichitheke, nezimvaba zonakale. Kodwa iwayini elisha balithela ezimvabeni ezintsha, kulondeke kokubili.”
Matt 9:18 Esakhuluma lokhu kubo, bheka, kwafika umphathi othile, wakhuleka kuye, wathi: “Indodakazi yami ifa khona manje; kepha woza, ubeke isandla sakho phezu kwayo, izakuphila.”
Matt 9:19 Wasuka-ke uJesu, wamlandela kanye nabafundi bakhe.
Matt 9:20 Bheka, owesifazane owayenomopho iminyaka eyishumi nambili weza emva kwakhe, wathinta umphetho wengubo yakhe.
Matt 9:21 Ngokuba wayethi phakathi kwakhe: “Uma ngingathinta nje ingubo yakhe, ngizakusindiswa.”
Matt 9:22 UJesu ephenduka wambona, wathi: “Yima isibindi, ndodakazi; ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile.” Wasinda owesifazane, kusukela kuleso sikhathi.
Matt 9:23 UJesu esefikile endlini yomphathi, ebona khona ababethi bemitshingo nesixuku esixokozelayo,
Matt 9:24 wathi kubo: “Dedani, ngokuba intombazana ayifile, kodwa ilele.” Bamhleka usulu.
Matt 9:25 Isixuku sesikhishiwe, wangena, wayibamba ngesandla; yavuka intombazana.
Matt 9:26 Udumo lwalokho lwezwakala ezweni lonke langakhona.
Matt 9:27 Esadlula lapho uJesu, izimpumputhe ezimbili zamlandela, zamemeza zathi: “Sihawukele, ndodana kaDavide!”
Matt 9:28 Esengenile endlini, izimpumputhe zeza kuye. UJesu wathi kuzo: “Niyakholwa yini ukuthi ngingakwenza lokhu na?” Zathi kuye: “Yebo, Nkosi.”
Matt 9:29 Khona wathinta amehlo azo, wathi: “Makwenzeke kini njengokukholwa kwenu.”
Matt 9:30 Ayesevuleka amehlo azo. UJesu waziyalisisa, wathi: “Qaphelani ukuba kungaziwa muntu.”
Matt 9:31 Kepha zaphuma, zamdumisa kulo lonke lelo zwe.
Matt 9:32 Ekuphumeni kwazo, bheka, kwalethwa kuye isimungulu esinedemoni.
Matt 9:33 Idemoni selikhishiwe, isimungulu sakhuluma. Izixuku zamangala, zathi: “Akuzange kubonwe okunje kwa-Israyeli.”
Matt 9:34 Kepha abaFarisi bathi: “Ukhipha amademoni ngenkosi yamademoni.”
Matt 9:35 UJesu wayihamba imizi yonke nemizana efundisa emasinagogeni abo, eshumayela ivangeli lombuso, ephulukisa izifo zonke nokugula konke.
Matt 9:36 Kepha ebona izixuku wabanesihe ngazo, ngokuba zazikhathazekile, zihlakazekile njengezimvu ezingenamalusi.
Matt 9:37 Wayesethi kubafundi bakhe: “Ukuvuna kukhulu, kodwa izisebenzi ziyingcosana.
Matt 9:38 Ngakho-ke nxusani eNkosini yokuvuna ukuba ithume izisebenzi, ziye ekuvuneni kwayo.”
Matt 10:1 Wayesebabiza abafundi bakhe abayishumi nambili, wabanika amandla phezu kwawomoya abangcolileyo ukuba babakhiphe, nawokuphulukisa izifo zonke nokugula konke.
