Matt 26:75 UPetru wayesekhumbula izwi likaJesu abelishilo lokuthi: “Iqhude lingakakhali, uzakungiphika kathathu.” Waphumela phandle, wakhala kamunyu.
Matt 27:1 Kwathi sekusile, bonke abapristi abakhulu namalunga esizwe benza icebo ngoJesu lokuba bambulale;
Matt 27:2 bambopha, bamuka naye, bamnikela kuPilatu umbusi.
Matt 27:3 Khona uJuda owamkhaphelayo, ebona ukuthi ulahliwe, wazisola, wabuyisela izinhlamvu zesiliva ezingamashumi amathathu kubapristi namalunga,
Matt 27:4 wathi: “Ngonile ukuba ngikhaphele igazi elingenacala.” Bona bathi: “Kuyini lokho kithi na? Zibonele wena.”
Matt 27:5 Wayesephonsa izinhlamvu zesiliva ethempelini, wamuka, waziphanyeka.
Matt 27:6 Kepha abapristi abakhulu bazithatha izinhlamvu zesiliva, bathi: “Akuvunyelwe ukuzifaka emnikelweni, ngokuba kuyimali yegazi.”
Matt 27:7 Benza icebo, bathenga ngayo insimu yombumbi, ibe ngeyokumbela abafokazi.
Matt 27:8 Ngalokho insimu leyo ithiwa insimu yegazi kuze kube namuhla.
Matt 27:9 Khona kwagcwaliseka okwashiwo ngomprofethi uJeremiya ukuthi: “Bathatha izinhlamvu zesiliva ezingamashumi amathathu, inani lowamiselwa inani onani lakhe lamiswa ngamadodana ka-Israyeli;
Matt 27:10 bakhokha ngazo insimu yombumbi, njengokuba iNkosi ingiyalile.”
Matt 27:11 Kepha uJesu wayemi phambi kombusi; umbusi wambuza wathi: “Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na?” UJesu wathi kuye: “Usho khona.”
Matt 27:12 Kwathi lapho abapristi abakhulu namalunga bemthwesa icala, kaphendulanga lutho.
Matt 27:13 Khona uPilatu wathi kuye: “Awuzwa yini lokho okungaka abakufakaza ngawe na?”
Matt 27:14 Akaze amphendula nakwelilodwa izwi, umbusi waze wamangala kakhulu.
Matt 27:15 Kepha ngomkhosi umbusi wayejwayele ukukhululela isixuku isiboshwa sibe sinye esasisithanda.
Matt 27:16 Ngaleso sikhathi babe nesiboshwa esidumileyo esithiwa uBaraba.
Matt 27:17 Ngakho sebebuthene, uPilatu wathi kubo: “Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele bani, uBaraba nokuba uJesu othiwa uKristu, na?”
Matt 27:18 Ngokuba wayekwazi ukuthi bamnikele ngomhawu.
Matt 27:19 Esahlezi esihlalweni sokwahlulela, umkakhe wathumela kuye, wathi: “Ungabi nandaba kulowo muntu olungileyo; ngokuba ngihluphekile kakhulu namuhla ngaye ephusheni.”
Matt 27:20 Kepha abapristi abakhulu namalunga bancenga izixuku ukuba zicele uBaraba, zimbulale uJesu.
Matt 27:21 Wayesephendula umbusi, wathi kubo: “Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele muphi kulaba ababili na?” Bathi: “UBaraba.”
Matt 27:22 UPilatu wathi kubo: “Pho-ke, ngimenze njani uJesu othiwa uKristu na?” Bonke bathi: “Makabethelwe esiphambanweni.”
Matt 27:23 Wayesethi: “Ngokuba wenze bubi buni na?” Kepha bamemeza kakhulu, bathi: “Makabethelwe esiphambanweni.”
Matt 27:24 UPilatu esebona ukuthi akanakwenza lutho nokuthi isiphithiphithi sesanda kakhulu, wathatha amanzi, wahlamba izandla phambi kwesixuku, wathi: “Anginacala egazini lalo muntu; ziboneleni nina.”
Matt 27:25 Abantu bonke base bephendula bethi: “Igazi lakhe malibe phezu kwethu naphezu kwabantwana bethu.”
Matt 27:26 Wayesebakhululela uBaraba, kepha wamshaya uJesu, wamnikela ukuba abethelwe esiphambanweni.
Matt 27:27 Khona amabutho ombusi ayesemthatha uJesu, amngenisa enqabeni, aqoqela kuye ibutho lonke.
Matt 27:28 Amhlubula, amembathisa ingubo ebomvu,
Matt 27:29 aluka umqhele wameva, awufaka ekhanda lakhe, nomhlanga esandleni sakhe sokunene, aguqa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, ambhinqa athi: “Bayede, nkosi yabaJuda!”
Matt 27:30 Amkhafulela ngamathe, athatha umhlanga, amshaya ekhanda lakhe.
Matt 27:31 Esembhinqile amhlubula ingubo, amembathisa izingubo zakhe, amuka naye ukuyombethela esiphambanweni.
Matt 27:32 Esaphuma afumana umuntu waseKhurene, nguSimoni igama lakhe; amcindezela lowo ukuba athwale isiphambano sakhe.
Matt 27:33 Esefikile endaweni ethiwa iGolgotha okungukuthi iNdawo Yekhanda,
Matt 27:34 amphuzisa iwayini elixutshwe nenyongo; kepha kuthe elizwa, akathandanga ukuliphuza.
Matt 27:35 Esembethele esiphambanweni abelana izingubo zakhe, enzelana inkatho;
Matt 27:36 ahlala amlinda khona.
Matt 27:37 Abeka ngaphezu kwekhanda lakhe icala lakhe libhalwe ngokuthi: LO NGUJESU, INKOSI YABAJUDA.
Matt 27:38 Kwabethelwa kanye naye abaphangi ababili, omunye ngakwesokunene nomunye ngakwesokhohlo.
Matt 27:39 Kepha abadlulayo bamhlambalaza benikina amakhanda abo,
Matt 27:40 bathi: “Wena odiliza ithempeli, ubuye ulakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu, zisindise, uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, wehle esiphambanweni.”
Matt 27:41 Kanjalo nabapristi abakhulu bambhinqa kanye nababhali namalunga, bathi:
Matt 27:42 “Wasindisa abanye, angezisindise yena; uyinkosi yakwa-Israyeli, akehle manje esiphambanweni, sikholwe nguye.
Matt 27:43 Wethembile uNkulunkulu; makamkhulule manje, uma emthanda, ngokuba wathi: ‘NgiyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.’ ”
Matt 27:44 Kepha nabaphangi ababebethelwe esiphambanweni kanye naye bamdumaza kanjalo.
Matt 27:45 Kepha kusukela ngehora lesithupha kwaba mnyama emhlabeni wonke, kwaze kwaba yihora lesishiyagalolunye.
Matt 27:46 Kepha ngehora lesishiyagalolunye uJesu wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” okungukuthi: “Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungishiyeleni na?”
Matt 27:47 Abanye kwababemi khona bekuzwa bathi: “Lo ubiza u-Eliya.”
Matt 27:48 Masinyane omunye kubo wagijima, wathatha ilula, waligcwalisa ngoviniga, walihloma emhlangeni, wamphusiza.
Matt 27:49 Kepha abanye bathi: “Yeka, sibone uma u-Eliya eza ukumsindisa.”
Matt 27:50 UJesu wabuye wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wafa.
Matt 27:51 Bheka-ke, isihenqo sethempeli sadabuka kabili, kusukela phezulu kuze kufike phansi; umhlaba wazamazama, amadwala aqhekezeka;
Matt 27:52 amathuna avuleka, imizimba eminingi yabangcwele ababelele yavuka;
Matt 27:53 baphuma emathuneni emva kokuvuka kwakhe, bangena emzini ongcwele, babonakala kwabaningi.
Matt 27:54 Kepha induna yekhulu nababe nayo belinda uJesu sebebona ukuzamazama nalokho okwenzekileyo besaba kakhulu, bathi: “Nempela lo ube yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.”
Matt 27:55 Kwakukhona lapho abesifazane abaningi bebukela, bekude, ababemlandele uJesu bevela eGalile, bemkhonza;
Matt 27:56 phakathi kwabo kwakukhona oMariya Magdalena, unina kaJakobe nokaJose, nonina wamadodana kaZebedewu.
Matt 27:57 Sekuhlwile, kwafika umuntu ocebileyo wase-Arimatheya, igama lakhe nguJosefa, owayengumfundi kaJesu naye;
Matt 27:58 lo waya kuPilatu, wacela isidumbu sikaJesu. Khona uPilatu wayala ukuba anikwe sona.
Matt 27:59 UJosefa wasithatha isidumbu, wasisonga ngendwangu enhle ehlanzekileyo,
Matt 27:60 wasibeka ethuneni lakhe elisha ayeliqophe edwaleni, wagingqela itshe elikhulu emnyango wethuna, wahamba.
Matt 27:61 Kepha kwakukhona lapho uMariya Magdalena nomunye uMariya behlezi phambi kweliba.
Matt 27:62 Kepha ngangomuso okungolulandela usuku lokulungisela abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi babuthana kuPilatu,
Matt 27:63 bathi: “Nkosi, sikhumbula ukuthi lowo mkhohlisi esekhona wathi: ‘Emva kwezinsuku ezintathu ngizakuvuka.’
Matt 27:64 Ngakho yala ukuba iliba ligcinwe kuze kube lusuku lwesithathu ukuba abafundi bakhe bangaze bafike bamebe, bathi kubantu: ‘Uvukile kwabafileyo;’ kuthi inkohliso yokugcina ibe mbi kuneyokuqala.”
Matt 27:65 UPilatu wathi kubo: “Nampa abalindi; hambani niligcine njengokubona kwenu.”
Matt 27:66 Base behamba, baligcina iliba, babeka uphawu etsheni bekanye nabalindi.
Matt 28:1 Kepha ekupheleni kwesabatha ngovivi lolokuqala lweviki kwafika uMariya Magdalena nomunye uMariya, beza ukuyobona iliba.
Matt 28:2 Bheka, kwaba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba okukhulu, ngokuba ingelosi yeNkosi yehla ezulwini, yeza yagingqa itshe, yahlala phezu kwalo.
Matt 28:3 Ukubonakala kwayo kwakunjengonyazi, nesambatho sayo sasimhlophe njengongqoqwane.
Matt 28:4 Kepha abalindi bathuthumela ngokuyesaba, baba njengabafileyo.
Matt 28:5 Kodwa ingelosi yaphendula, yathi kwabesifazane: “Ningesabi nina; ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi nifuna uJesu obebethelwe esiphambanweni;
Matt 28:6 kakho lapha, ngokuba uvukile njengokusho kwakhe; zanini nibone indawo lapho ebelele khona.
Matt 28:7 Hambani masinyane, nitshele abafundi bakhe ukuthi uvukile kwabafileyo; bhekani, uyanandulela ukuya eGalile, nizakumbona khona. Bhekani, nginitshelile.”
Matt 28:8 Base beshesha bamuka ethuneni benokwesaba nokuthokoza okukhulu, bagijima baya ukubikela abafundi bakhe.
Matt 28:9 Bheka, uJesu wabahlangabeza, wathi: “Sanibona.” Besondela babamba izinyawo zakhe, bakhuleka kuye.
Matt 28:10 Khona uJesu wathi kubo: “Ningesabi; hambani, nibikele abafowethu ukuba bahambe baye eGalile; bayakungibona khona.”
Matt 28:11 Besahamba, bheka, abanye kubalindi bafika emzini, babikela abapristi abakhulu konke okwenzekileyo.
Matt 28:12 Sebebuthene namalunga benza icebo, banika amabutho imali eningi,
Matt 28:13 bathi: “Shonini ukuthi abafundi bakhe beza ebusuku, bameba silele.
Matt 28:14 Uma kuzwakala lokho kumbusi, siyakuncengana naye thina, nina ningakhathazeki.”
Matt 28:15 Ayeseyithatha imali, enza njengokufundiswa kwawo. Leli zwi landa phakathi kwabaJuda kuze kube namuhla.
Matt 28:16 Kepha abafundi abayishumi nanye baya eGalile kuleyo ntaba uJesu ayebayalele yona;
Matt 28:17 sebembona bakhuleka kuye, kepha abanye bangabaza.
Matt 28:18 UJesu wasondela, wakhuluma kubo, wathi: “Ngiphiwe amandla onke ezulwini nasemhlabeni;
Matt 28:19 ngalokho hambani nenze izizwe zonke abafundi, nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele,
Matt 28:20 nibafundise ukugcina konke enginiyale ngakho; bhekani, mina nginani izinsuku zonke kuze kube sekupheleni kwezwe.”
Mark 1:1 Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu.
Mark 1:2 Njengokulotshwe kumprofethi u-Isaya ukuthi: “Bheka, ngiyasithuma isithunywa sami phambi kwakho esiyakulungisa indlela yakho,” —
Mark 1:3 “izwi lomemezayo ehlane, lithi: ‘Lungisani indlela yeNkosi, nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde,’ ”
Mark 1:4 kwavela uJohane ebhapathiza ehlane, eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka, kube ngukuthethelelwa kwezono.
Mark 1:5 Kwaphumela kuye izwe lonke laseJudiya nabo bonke abaseJerusalema, babhapathizwa nguye emfuleni iJordani, bevuma izono zabo.
Mark 1:6 UJohane wayembethe eyoboya bekamela, enoqhotho lwesikhumba okhalweni lwakhe, edla izinkumbi nezinyosi zasendle.
Mark 1:7 Washumayela wathi: “Emva kwami kuyeza onamandla kunami, engingafanele ukuba ngikhothame ngithukulule umchilo wezicathulo zakhe.
Mark 1:8 Mina nginibhapathize ngamanzi, kepha yena uzakunibhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele.”
Mark 1:9 Kwathi ngaleyo mihla kwafika uJesu evela eNazaretha laseGalile, wabhapathizwa nguJohane eJordani.
Mark 1:10 Wanele ukukhuphuka emanzini, wabona izulu livuleka, noMoya ehlela phezu kwakhe njengejuba.
Mark 1:11 Kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: “Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo; ngithokozile ngawe.”
Mark 1:12 Masinyane uMoya wayesemqhubela ehlane.
Mark 1:13 Wayekhona ehlane izinsuku ezingamashumi amane elingwa nguSathane; wayendawonye nezilwane; izingelosi zamkhonza.
Mark 1:14 Emva kokuboshwa kukaJohane uJesu wafika eGalile eshumayela ivangeli likaNkulunkulu,
Mark 1:15 wathi: “Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele; phendukani, nikholwe yivangeli.”
Mark 1:16 Kwathi edlula ngaselwandle lwaseGalile, wabona oSimoni no-Andreya umfowabo kaSimoni bephonsa inetha elwandle, ngokuba babe ngabadobi.
Mark 1:17 UJesu wayesethi kubo: “Ngilandeleni; ngiyakunenza nibe ngabadobi babantu.”
Mark 1:18 Base bewashiya masinyane amanetha, bamlandela.
Mark 1:19 Eseqhubekile ingcosana wabona uJakobe kaZebedewu noJohane umfowabo besemkhunjini, belungisa amanetha.
Mark 1:20 Wababiza masinyane; base bemshiya uyise uZebedewu emkhunjini kanye nezisebenzi, bamlandela.
Mark 1:21 Bangena eKapernawume. Kwathi masinyane ngesabatha wangena esinagogeni, wafundisa.
Mark 1:22 Bamangala ngokufundisa kwakhe; ngokuba wabafundisa njengonamandla, kungenjengababhali.
Mark 1:23 Kwakukhona-ke esinagogeni umuntu onomoya ongcolileyo, wamemeza,
Mark 1:24 wathi: “Sinamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu waseNazaretha? Uze ukusibhubhisa na? Ngiyakwazi ukuba ungubani — ungoNgcwele kaNkulunkulu.”
Mark 1:25 UJesu wamkhuza wathi: “Thula, uphume kuye!”
Mark 1:26 Umoya ongcolileyo wamhlukumeza, wakhala ngezwi elikhulu, waphuma kuye.
Mark 1:27 Bethuka bonke, babuzana bodwa, bathi: “Kuyini lokhu? Yisifundiso esisha esinamandla; nawomoya abangcolileyo uyabayala, bamlalele.”
Mark 1:28 Udumo lwakhe lwase lwanda masinyane kuso sonke isifunda saseGalile.
Mark 1:29 Sebephume esinagogeni bangena masinyane endlini kaSimoni no-Andreya, benoJakobe noJohane.
Mark 1:30 Umkhwekazi kaSimoni wayelele enomkhuhlane; bashesha bamtshela ngaye.
Mark 1:31 Waya kuye, wamlulamisa embamba ngesandla; umkhuhlane wamyeka, wabakhonza.
Mark 1:32 Kwathi ukuba kuhlwe, selishonile ilanga, baletha kuye bonke abagulayo nabakhwelwe ngamademoni.
Mark 1:33 Umuzi wonke wawubuthene ngasemnyango.
Mark 1:34 Waphulukisa abaningi abaphethwe yizifo ngezifo, wakhipha amademoni amaningi, wayengawavumeli amademoni ukukhuluma, ngokuba ayemazi.
Mark 1:35 Ekuseni kusemnyama kakhulu, wavuka waphuma, waya endaweni eyihlane, wakhuleka khona.
Mark 1:36 USimoni nababe naye bamlandela ngokuphuthuma.
Mark 1:37 Sebemfumene bathi kuye: “Bonke bayakufuna.”
Mark 1:38 Wathi kubo: “Masiye kwezinye izindawo emizaneni eseduze ukuba ngishumayele nakhona; ngokuba ngiphumele khona lokho.”
Mark 1:39 Wahamba eshumayela emasinagogeni abo kulo lonke iGalile, ekhipha amademoni.
Mark 1:40 Kwafika kuye onochoko, wamncenga eguqa ngamadolo, ethi kuye: “Uma uthanda, ungangihlambulula.”
Mark 1:41 UJesu wamhawukela, welula isandla, wamphatha, wathi kuye: “Ngiyathanda; hlambuluka.”
Mark 1:42 Lwasuka masinyane uchoko kuye, wahlambuluka.
Mark 1:43 Esemyalisisile washesha wammukisa,
Mark 1:44 wathi kuye: “Bheka, ungasho lutho kumuntu, kepha hamba uzibonakalise kumpristi, unikele ngokuhlanjululwa kwakho lokho okwayalelwa nguMose, kube ngubufakazi kubo.”
Mark 1:45 Kepha yena esephumile waqala ukuyandisa kakhulu nokuyidumisa le ndaba, ngangokuba uJesu wayengasenakungena emzini obala; wayesehlala ngaphandle ezindaweni eziyihlane; beza kuye bevela nxazonke.
Mark 2:1 Wabuye wangena eKapernawume emva kwezinsuku ezithile; kwezwakala ukuthi usendlini.
Mark 2:2 Kwase kubuthana abaningi, akwabe kusabakho ndawo nangasemnyango; wakhuluma izwi kubo.
Mark 2:3 Beza kuye bethwele umuntu ofe uhlangothi, ephethwe ngabantu abane.
Mark 2:4 Bengenakusondela kuye ngenxa yesixuku baqaqa uphahla lapho ekhona, bathi sebebhobozile behlisa uhlaka alele kulo ofe uhlangothi.
Mark 2:5 UJesu ebona ukukholwa kwabo wathi kofe uhlangothi: “Ndodana, uthethelelwe izono zakho.”
Mark 2:6 Kepha kwakukhona ababhali abathile behlezi khona, bezindla ezinhliziyweni zabo ngokuthi:
Mark 2:7 “Lo ukhulumelani kanje na? Uyahlambalaza. Ngubani ongathethelela izono, kungeyena uNkulunkulu yedwa na?”
Mark 2:8 UJesu ekwazi masinyane emoyeni wakhe ukuthi bazindla kanjalo phakathi kwabo, wathi kubo: “Nizindlelani ngalokhu ezinhliziyweni zenu na?
Mark 2:9 Yikuphi okulula ukuthi kofe uhlangothi: ‘Uthethelelwe izono zakho,’ noma ukuthi: ‘Vuka, uthathe uhlaka lwakho, uhambe,’ na?
Mark 2:10 Kepha ukuze nazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu inamandla emhlabeni okuthethelela izono” — wathi kofe uhlangothi —
Mark 2:11 “ngithi kuwe: Vuka, uthathe uhlaka lwakho, uye endlini yakho.”
Mark 2:12 Wayesevuka, wathatha masinyane uhlaka lwakhe, waphuma phambi kwabo bonke, baze bamangala bonke, bamdumisa uNkulunkulu, bathi: “Asizange sikubone okunje.”
Mark 2:13 Waphuma futhi, waya ngaselwandle; isixuku sonke sabantu seza kuye, wabafundisa.
Mark 2:14 Wathi edlula, wambona uLevi ka-Alfewu ehlezi endaweni yokuthela, wathi kuye: “Ngilandele.” Wasuka-ke, wamlandela.
Mark 2:15 Kwathi ehlezi ekudleni endlini yakhe, abathelisi abaningi nezoni bahlala noJesu nabafundi bakhe; ngokuba babe baningi, bamlandela.
Mark 2:16 Khona ababhali babaFarisi bembona edla nezoni nabathelisi bathi kubafundi bakhe: “Yini ukuba adle nabathelisi nezoni na?”
Mark 2:17 UJesu ekuzwa lokho wathi kubo: “Abaphilileyo abadingi inyanga, ngabagulayo bodwa; kangizelanga ukubiza abalungileyo kodwa izoni.”
Mark 2:18 Abafundi bakaJohane nabaFarisi babezila ukudla; beza bathi kuye: “Yini ukuba abafundi bakaJohane nabafundi babaFarisi bazile ukudla, kodwa abafundi bakho bangazili na?”
Mark 2:19 UJesu wathi kubo: “Abayeni bangazila yini, umyeni esenabo na? Bese naye umyeni bangezile.
Mark 2:20 Kodwa zizakufika izinsuku, lapho umyeni ezakususwa kubo; yikhona-ke bezakuzila ngalolo suku.
Mark 2:21 Akakho othungela isiziba esingakashukeki engutsheni endala, funa okusha okubekelwayo kuklebhule kwendala, kwande ukuklebhuka.
Mark 2:22 Futhi akakho othela iwayini elisha ezimvabeni ezindala, funa iwayini liqhumise izimvaba, lichitheke iwayini, nezimvaba zonakale; kodwa iwayini elisha lithelwa ezimvabeni ezintsha.”
Mark 2:23 Kwathi edabula amasimu ngesabatha, abafundi bakhe baqala ukukha izikhwebu behamba.
Mark 2:24 Base bethi kuye abaFarisi: “Bheka, bakwenzelani ngesabatha okungavunyelwe na?”
Mark 2:25 Wathi kubo: “Anizange nifunde yini akwenzayo uDavide mhla eswele, elambile yena nababe naye
Mark 2:26 ukuthi wangena endlini kaNkulunkulu enkathini ka-Abiyathara umpristi omkhulu, wadla izinkwa zokubukwa ezingavunyelwe ukudliwa muntu, ngabapristi bodwa, wanika nababe naye, na?”
Mark 2:27 Wayesethi kubo: “Isabatha lenzelwa umuntu, umuntu akenzelwanga isabatha.
Mark 2:28 Ngokunjalo iNdodana yomuntu iyinkosi neyesabatha.”
Mark 3:1 Khona wabuye wangena esinagogeni. Kwakukhona lapho umuntu onesandla esishwabeneyo.
Mark 3:2 Bamqaphela ukuba uzakumphilisa yini ngesabatha, ukuze bambeke icala.
Mark 3:3 Wathi kumuntu onesandla esishwabeneyo: “Sukuma, ume phakathi.”
Mark 3:4 Wayesethi kubo: “Kuvunyelwe ngesabatha ukwenza okuhle noma okubi yini, ukusindisa umuntu noma ukumbulala na?” Kepha bathula.
Mark 3:5 Waqalaza ebabuka ngokuthukuthela, edabukile ngobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo; wayesethi kulowo muntu: “Yelula isandla.” Waselula, saphiliswa isandla sakhe.
Mark 3:6 AbaFarisi base bephuma masinyane bacebisana ngaye nabakaHerode ukuthi bangambhubhisa kanjani.
Mark 3:7 UJesu wasuka kanye nabafundi bakhe, waya ngaselwandle; isixuku esikhulu samlandela sivela eGalile, naseJudiya,
Mark 3:8 naseJerusalema, nase-Idumiya, nangaphesheya kweJordani, nangaseTire, naseSidoni; isixuku esikhulu sesizwile konke akwenzayo seza kuye.
Mark 3:9 Wayeseyala abafundi bakhe ukuba isikebhe simlindele ngenxa yesixuku sabantu, ukuze bangamcindezeli,
Mark 3:10 ngokuba wayephulukisa abaningi, kwaze kwathi bonke abanezifo bawela phezu kwakhe ukuba bamnamathe.
Mark 3:11 Nawomoya abangcolileyo bathi ukuba bambone, bawa phansi phambi kwakhe, bamemeza bathi: “Wena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.”
Mark 3:12 Wabayalisisa ukuba bangamzwakalisi.
Mark 3:13 Wayesenyukela entabeni, wabizela kuye abebafuna yena; beza kuye.
Mark 3:14 Wamisa abayishumi nambili ukuba babe naye nokuba abathume baye kushumayela,
Mark 3:15 babe namandla okukhipha amademoni.
Mark 3:16 Wayesemisa laba abayishumi nambili: uSimoni owamqamba igama lokuthi uPetru,
Mark 3:17 noJakobe kaZebedewu, noJohane umfowabo kaJakobe; laba wabaqamba igama lokuthi oBowanergesi okungukuthi amadodana okuduma;
Mark 3:18 no-Andreya, noFiliphu, noBartolomewu, noMathewu, noTomase, noJakobe ka-Alfewu, noThadewu, noSimoni umKhanani,
Mark 3:19 noJuda Iskariyothe owamkhaphelayo.
Mark 3:20 Wayesefika ekhaya; isixuku sabuthana futhi, ababe besaba nathuba lokudla nasinkwa.
Mark 3:21 Abakubo sebekuzwile baphuma ukuyombamba, ngokuba bathi uyahlanya.
Mark 3:22 Nababhali abehla bevela eJerusalema bathi: “UnoBelzebule, ukhipha amademoni ngombusi wamademoni.”
Mark 3:23 Wayesebabiza, wakhuluma kubo ngemifanekiso, ethi: “USathane angakhipha kanjani uSathane na?
Mark 3:24 Uma umbuso wahlukene wodwa, lowo mbuso ungeme.
Mark 3:25 Nendlu, uma yahlukene yodwa, leyo ndlu ayizukuma.
Mark 3:26 NoSathane, uma ezivukela yena, ahlukane, akanakuma, kepha uyaphela.
Mark 3:27 Yebo, akakho ongangena endlini yesiqhwaga, aphange impahla yaso, uma engabophi kuqala isiqhwaga, andukuba aphange indlu yaso.
Mark 3:28 Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Abantwana babantu bayakuthethelelwa izono zonke nokuhlambalaza noma kungakanani abangahlambalaza ngakho,
Mark 3:29 kepha lowo ohlambalaza uMoya oNgcwele kanakuthethelelwa naphakade, kodwa unecala lesono esingapheliyo.”
Mark 3:30 Ngokuba bathi unomoya ongcolileyo.
Mark 3:31 Kwase kufika unina nabafowabo, bema ngaphandle, bathumela kuye bembiza.
Mark 3:32 Isixuku sabantu sasimphahlile; bathi kuye: “Bheka, unyoko nabafowenu nawodadewenu bangaphandle bekufuna.”
Mark 3:33 Wabaphendula wathi: “Ngubani umame nabafowethu na?”
Mark 3:34 Waqalaza ebuka ababehlezi bemphahlile, wathi: “Bhekani, nangu umame nabafowethu.
Mark 3:35 Ngokuba owenza intando kaNkulunkulu nguye ongumfowethu nodadewethu nomame.”
Mark 4:1 Khona wabuye waqala ukufundisa ngaselwandle. Kwabuthana kuye isixuku esikhulu kakhulu, waze wangena emkhunjini, wahlala elwandle; isixuku sonke sasisemhlabathini ngaselwandle.
Mark 4:2 Wabafundisa okuningi ngemifanekiso; wathi kubo ekufundiseni kwakhe:
Mark 4:3 “Lalelani; bhekani, kwaphuma umhlwanyeli ukuyohlwanyela.
Mark 4:4 Kwathi ekuhlwanyeleni kwakhe enye imbewu yawela ngasendleleni; kwafika izinyoni, zayidla zayiqeda.
Mark 4:5 Enye yawela edwaleni, lapho yayingenamhlabathi omningi khona; yamila masinyane, ngokuba ingenamhlabathi ojulileyo.
Mark 4:6 Kwathi ukuba liphume ilanga, yahamuka; nangokuba ingenampande, yabuna.
Mark 4:7 Enye yawela emeveni; ameva akhula, ayiminyanisa, ayaze yathela isithelo.
Mark 4:8 Enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle; yahluma, yakhula, yathela isithelo, yaveza ngamashumi amathathu, nangamashumi ayisithupha, nangekhulu.”
Mark 4:9 Wayesethi: “Onezindlebe zokuzwa makezwe.”
Mark 4:10 Lapho esengasesitha, ababe naye kanye nabayishumi nambili bambuza ngale mifanekiso.
Mark 4:11 Wathi kubo: “Nina niphiwe imfihlakalo yombuso kaNkulunkulu, kodwa abangaphandle benzelwa konke ngemifanekiso,
Mark 4:12 ukuze ngokubona babone, bangabonisisi, nangokuzwa bezwe, bangaqondi, funa baphenduke, bathethelelwe.”
Mark 4:13 Wayesethi kubo: “Aniwazi lo mfanekiso; pho, niyakuyazi kanjani yonke imifanekiso na?
Mark 4:14 Umhlwanyeli uhlwanyela izwi.
Mark 4:15 Abangasendleleni yilabo abathi lapho kuhlwanyelwa khona izwi, nanxa sebelizwile, kufike masinyane uSathane, alisuse izwi elihlwanyelwe kubo.
Mark 4:16 Kanjalo abahlwanyelwe edwaleni yilabo abathi sebelizwile izwi, balamukele masinyane ngokuthokoza;
Mark 4:17 kepha kabanampande phakathi kwabo, kodwa bahlala isikhashana nje, kuthi sekuvele ukuhlupheka nokuzingelwa ngenxa yezwi, bakhubeke masinyane.
Mark 4:18 Abanye bangabahlwanyelwe emeveni; yibo abalizwile izwi,
Mark 4:19 kepha iminako yalesi sikhathi, nokukhohlisa kwengcebo, nokunxanela ezinye izinto kungena kuliminyanise izwi, libe ngelingatheliyo.
Mark 4:20 Nabahlwanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle yilabo abalizwa izwi, balamukele, bathele isithelo ngamashumi amathathu, nangamashumi ayisithupha, nangekhulu.”
Mark 4:21 Wayesethi kubo: “Imbala isibani siza ukuba sibekwe phansi kwesitsha nokuba phansi kombhede yini, singabekwa othini, na?
Mark 4:22 Ngokuba akukho okusithekileyo okungayikuhlalukiswa; akukho okuyisifuba okungayikuba sobala.
Mark 4:23 Uma ekhona onezindlebe zokuzwa, makezwe.”
Mark 4:24 Wayesethi kubo: “Qaphelani enikuzwayo; ngaleso silinganiso enilinganisa ngaso nani niyakulinganiselwa ngaso, nenezelwe nina.
Mark 4:25 Ngokuba onakho uyakuphiwa; kepha ongenakho uyakwamukwa nalokho anakho.”
Mark 4:26 Wayesethi: “Unjalo umbuso kaNkulunkulu; unjengokuba umuntu ephonsa imbewu emhlabathini,
Mark 4:27 alale, avuke ubusuku nemini, imibewu imile, ikhule, engazi ukuthi kanjani.
Mark 4:28 Umhlabathi uthela isithelo ngokwawo, kuqala ikhaba, khona isikhwebu, besekuba yizinhlamvu ezipheleleyo esikhwetshini.
Mark 4:29 Nxa sesivuthiwe isithelo, afake masinyane isikela, ngokuba ukuvuna sekufikile.”
Mark 4:30 Wathi futhi: “Siyakuwufanisa nani umbuso kaNkulunkulu? Siyakuwuchaza ngamfanekiso muni na?
Mark 4:31 Unjengenhlamvu yesinaphi ethi, nxa ihlwanyelwe emhlabathini, incinyane kunazo zonke izimbewu ezisemhlabeni,
Mark 4:32 kodwa nxa isihlwanyelwe imila ibe nkulu kunazo zonke izilimo, ixhante amagatsha amakhulu, ukuze izinyoni zezulu zakhele emthunzini wawo.”
Mark 4:33 Walikhuluma izwi kubo ngemifanekiso eminingi enjalo njengamandla abo okuzwa;
Mark 4:34 kodwa ngaphandle komfanekiso kakhulumanga kubo; kepha sebebodwa wabachasisela abafundi bakhe konke.
Mark 4:35 Ngalolo suku sekuhlwile, wathi kubo: “Asiwele siye ngaphesheya.”
Mark 4:36 Base bemukisa isixuku, bahamba naye, njengalokho ebesemkhunjini; kwakukhona neminye imikhumbi ihambisana naye.
Mark 4:37 Kwase kuvuka isivunguvungu esikhulu somoya, amaza aphonseka phakathi emkhunjini, umkhumbi waze waqala ukugcwala.
Mark 4:38 Kepha yena wayengasemuva emkhunjini elele esicamelweni; bamvusa, bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, awunaki, nakuba sibhubha, na?”
Mark 4:39 Wayesevuka, wakhuza umoya, wathi kulo ulwandle: “Thula, uthi du.” Kwanqamuka umoya, kwaba khona ukuthula okukhulu.
Mark 4:40 Wathi kubo: “Yini ukuba nesabe kangaka na? Yini ukuba ningabi nakukholwa na?”
Mark 4:41 Besaba ngokwesaba okukhulu, bathi omunye komunye: “Kanti lo ungubani, lokhu nomoya nolwandle kuyamlalela?”
Mark 5:1 Base befika phesheya kolwandle ezweni lamaGerasa.
Mark 5:2 Esephume emkhunjini, kwahlangana naye masinyane umuntu ovela emathuneni, enomoya ongcolileyo.
Mark 5:3 Wayehlala emathuneni, kungasekho muntu ongambopha nangeketanga;
Mark 5:4 ngokuba wayeseboshwe kaningi ngawozankosi nangamaketanga, kepha amaketanga ayegqashuliwe nguye nawozankosi babephuliwe, kungekho noyedwa owayenamandla okumthambisa.
Mark 5:5 Ngesikhathi sonke ubusuku nemini wayesemathuneni nasezintabeni, ememeza, ezilimaza ngamatshe.
Mark 5:6 Wathi ukuba ambone uJesu esekude, wagijima, wakhuleka kuye;
Mark 5:7 wayesememeza ngezwi elikhulu, ethi: “Nginamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu, Ndodana kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke? Ngikufungisa uNkulunkulu, ungangihluphi.”
Mark 5:8 Ngokuba wathi kuye: “Phuma kulo muntu, moya ongcolileyo.”
Mark 5:9 Wayesembuza ethi: “Ngubani igama lakho?” Wathi kuye: “NginguLegiyona igama lami, ngokuba sibaningi.”
Mark 5:10 Wamncenga kakhulu ukuba angabamukisi kulelo zwe.
Mark 5:11 Kwakukhona lapho ngasentabeni umhlambi omkhulu wezingulube ziklabile.
Mark 5:12 Bamncenga bathi: “Sithumele ezingulubeni ukuba singene kuzo.”
Mark 5:13 Wabavumela. Omoya abangcolileyo baphuma, bangena ezingulubeni; umhlambi wagulukudela eweni, waphonseka elwandle kungathi izinkulungwane ezimbili, zaminza elwandle.
Mark 5:14 Ababezalusa babaleka, baya babika emzini nasemaphandleni; base beza ukuyobona okwenzekileyo.
Mark 5:15 Bafika kuJesu, bambona obekhwelwe ngamademoni ehlezi embethe, esangulukile, yena owayenelegiyona; base besaba.
Mark 5:16 Ababekubonile babatshela ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani kowayekhwelwe ngamademoni, nangezingulube.
Mark 5:17 Base beqala ukumncenga ukuba amuke ezweni lakubo.
Mark 5:18 Wathi ukuba angene emkhunjini, lowo owayekhwelwe ngamademoni wamncenga ukuba abe naye.
Mark 5:19 Akamvumelanga, kepha wathi kuye: “Hamba uye ekhaya kwabakini, ubabikele ukuthi kungakanani iNkosi ekwenzele khona, yakuhawukela.”
Mark 5:20 Wamuka-ke, waqala ukulanda eDekapholi ngokuthi kungakanani abekwenzile kuye uJesu; bamangala bonke.
Mark 5:21 Khona uJesu esebuye ewelele ngaphesheya ngomkhumbi, kwabuthana isixuku esikhulu kuye engaselwandle.
Mark 5:22 Kwase kufika omunye wabaphathi besinagoge, nguJayiru igama lakhe, owathi ukuba ambone, waziphonsa phansi ngasezinyaweni zakhe,
Mark 5:23 wamncenga kakhulu, wathi: “Indodakazi yami isiyalela; ake uze, ubeke izandla phezu kwayo ukuba isindiswe, iphile.”
Mark 5:24 Wahamba naye. Isixuku esikhulu samlandela, samcindezela.
Mark 5:25 Owesifazane owayenomopho iminyaka eyishumi nambili,
Mark 5:26 ehluphekile ngokuningi ezinyangeni eziningi, echithile konke ayenakho, engasizakalanga ngalutho, kodwa kwayilokhu kuqhubeka,
Mark 5:27 esezwile ngoJesu, weza esixukwini ngasemuva, wathinta ingubo yakhe,
Mark 5:28 ngokuba wathi: “Uma ngingathinta nje izingubo zakhe, ngizakusindiswa.”
Mark 5:29 Kwanqamuka masinyane umthombo wegazi lakhe, wezwa emzimbeni ukuthi uphulukile enhluphekweni yakhe.
Mark 5:30 Wanele ukuzwa uJesu phakathi kwakhe ukuthi amandla aphumile kuye, waphendukela esixukwini, wathi: “Ngubani othinte izingubo zami na?”
Mark 5:31 Abafundi bakhe bathi kuye: “Uyabona isixuku sikucindezela, usuthi: ‘Ngubani ongithintileyo na?’ ”
Mark 5:32 Waqalaza ukuba ambone owenzile lokho.
Mark 5:33 Khona owesifazane esaba ethuthumela, azi okwenzekile kuye, weza waziphonsa phansi phambi kwakhe, wamtshela iqiniso lonke.
Mark 5:34 Wayesethi kuye: “Ndodakazi, ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile; hamba ube nokuthula; usuphulukile enhluphekweni yakho.”
Mark 5:35 Esakhuluma, kwafika abomphathi wesinagoge, bathi: “Indodakazi yakho isifile; usamkhathazelani uMfundisi na?”
Mark 5:36 Kwathi ukuba uJesu ezwile izwi elishiwoyo, wathi kumphathi wesinagoge: “Ungesabi, kholwa kuphela.”
Mark 5:37 Akavumelanga muntu amlandele, kuphela oPetru, noJakobe, noJohane umfowabo kaJakobe.
Mark 5:38 Bafika-ke endlini yomphathi wesinagoge, wabona isiyaluyalu nabakhalayo nabalila kakhulu.
Mark 5:39 Wangena, wathi kubo: “Niyaluzelani, nikhalelani na? Umntwana akafile, kodwa ulele.”
Mark 5:40 Bamhleka usulu. Kepha yena wabakhipha bonke, wathatha uyise womntwana nonina kanye nababe naye, wangena lapho kulele khona umntwana.
Mark 5:41 Wabamba umntwana ngesandla, wathi kuye: “Thalitha, kumi,” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa: “Ntombazana, ngithi kuwe, vuka!”
Mark 5:42 Yayisivuka masinyane intombazana, yahamba; ngokuba yayineminyaka eyishumi nambili. Khona bamangala ngokumangala okukhulu.
Mark 5:43 Wabayalisisa ukuba lokhu kungaziwa muntu; futhi wathi mayiphiwe ukudla.
Mark 6:1 Khona wamuka lapho, waya ezweni lakubo; abafundi bakhe bamlandela.
Mark 6:2 Sekufikile isabatha, waqala ukufundisa esinagogeni. Abaningi abamuzwayo bamangala bathi: “Lo ukuthathaphi lokhu na? Ukuhlakanipha kuni akunikiwe lona na? Nemisebenzi yamandla enje yenziwe ngezandla zakhe na?
Mark 6:3 Lo akusiye umbazi, indodana kaMariya, nomfowabo kaJakobe, noJose, noJuda, noSimoni, na? Nawodadewabo abakho yini lapha kithi na?” Base bekhubeka ngaye.
Mark 6:4 Wayesethi kubo uJesu: “Umprofethi kadelelwa ngaphandle kwasezweni lakubo, nasezihlotsheni zakhe, nasendlini yakwabo.”
Mark 6:5 Wayengenakwenza lapho nowodwa umsebenzi wamandla ngaphandle kokuthi wabeka izandla phezu kwabagulayo abayingcosana, wabaphulukisa.
Mark 6:6 Wamangala ngokungakholwa kwabo. Wahamba imizi ngemizi efundisa.
Mark 6:7 Wayesebabiza abayishumi nambili, waqala ukubathuma ngababili, wabanika amandla phezu kwawomoya abangcolileyo.
Mark 6:8 Wabayala ukuba bangaphathi lutho lwendlela, kuphela udondolo lodwa, bangaphathi nasinkwa, nasikhwama, nathusi emixhakeni,
Mark 6:9 kepha bafake izicathulo, bangembathi kodwa amabhantshi amabili.
Mark 6:10 Wathi kubo: “Nakuphi lapho ningena khona endlini, hlalani kuyo, nize nimuke khona.
Mark 6:11 Nayiphi indawo engayikunamukela, nalapho bengayikunizwa khona, anothi nimuka kuyo, nivuthulule uthuli oluphansi kwezinyawo zenu, kube ngubufakazi kubo.”
Mark 6:12 Base behamba beshumayela ukuba abantu baphenduke.
Mark 6:13 Bakhipha amademoni amaningi, bagcoba abagulayo abaningi ngamafutha, babaphulukisa.
Mark 6:14 Yayisikuzwa inkosi uHerode, ngokuba lalidumile igama lakhe. Kwathiwa uJohane uMbhapathizi uvukile kwabafileyo; kungalokho lawa mandla asebenza kuye.
Mark 6:15 Kodwa abanye bathi: “Ngu-Eliya;” abanye bathi: “Ngumprofethi njengomunye wabaprofethi.”
Mark 6:16 Kepha uHerode ekuzwile wathi: “UJohane engamnquma ikhanda nguye ovukile.”
Mark 6:17 Ngokuba yena uHerode wayethumele wambamba uJohane, wambopha etilongweni ngenxa kaHerodiya umkaFiliphu umfowabo, ngokuba wayeganwe nguye.
Mark 6:18 Ngokuba uJohane wayethe kuHerode: “Awuvunyelwe ukuthatha umkamfowenu.”
Mark 6:19 Njalo uHerodiya wambambela amagqubu, wafuna ukumbulala; kepha kabanga namandla,
Mark 6:20 ngokuba uHerode wayemesaba uJohane emazi ukuthi uyindoda elungileyo engcwele, wamlonda; nalapho emuzwa, wayesambatheka kaningi, nokho kwabamnandi kuye ukumuzwa.
Mark 6:21 Kwathi sekufikile usuku oluhle, lapho uHerode ngosuku lokuzalwa kwakhe ezenzela idili izikhulu zakhe, nezinduna zempi, nabanumzane baseGalile,
Mark 6:22 kwangena indodakazi kaHerodiya uqobo, yasina, yajabulisa uHerode nababehlezi naye. Inkosi yayisithi entombazaneni: “Cela kimi noma yini okuthandayo, ngizakukunika.”
Mark 6:23 Wafunga kuyo, wathi: “Noma yini ongakucela kimi ngizakukunika, nakuba kungaze kube yinxenye yombuso wami.”
Mark 6:24 Yayisiphuma, yathi kunina: “Ngizakucelani na?” Yena wathi: “Ikhanda likaJohane uMbhapathizi.”
Mark 6:25 Yakhawuleza yangena masinyane enkosini, yacela yathi: “Ngithanda ukuba ungiphe khona manje ngoqwembe ikhanda likaJohane uMbhapathizi.”
Mark 6:26 Inkosi yadabuka kakhulu, kepha ngenxa yezifungo nangenxa yababehlezi nayo ekudleni ayithandanga ukuyilandulela.
Mark 6:27 Inkosi yayisithuma masinyane ibutho, waliyala ukuba lilethe ikhanda lakhe. Lahamba, lamnquma ikhanda etilongweni.
Mark 6:28 Laletha ikhanda lakhe ngoqwembe, layinika intombazana, intombazana yamnika unina.
Mark 6:29 Kwathi ukuba abafundi bakhe bakuzwe lokho, beza bathatha isidumbu sakhe, basibeka ethuneni.
Mark 6:30 Abaphostoli babuthana kuJesu, bambikela ababekwenzile nababekufundisile.
Mark 6:31 Wayesethi kubo: “Zanini nina nodwa endaweni eyihlane, niphumule ingcosana.” Ngokuba babe baningi abezayo nabahambayo, abaze bathola nasikhathi sokudla.
Mark 6:32 Base bemuka ngomkhumbi, baya endaweni eyihlane bebodwa.
Mark 6:33 Abaningi sebebabona bemuka, baqonda, baze bagijimela khona ngezinyawo, bephuma kuyo yonke imizi, babandulela.
Mark 6:34 Wathi ephuma, wabona isixuku esikhulu, waba nesihe ngabantu, ngokuba babe njengezimvu ezingenamalusi; waqala ukubafundisa okuningi.
Mark 6:35 Kwathi isikhathi sesihambile, beza kuye abafundi bakhe, bathi: “Le ndawo iyihlane, isikhathi sesidlulile;
Mark 6:36 bamukise ukuba baye emaphandleni nasemizaneni ezungezileyo, bazithengele ukudla.”
Mark 6:37 Wayesephendula, ethi kubo: “Bapheni nina ukudla.” Bathi kuye: “Sihambe yini, siyothenga izinkwa zawodenariyu abangamakhulu amabili, sibaphe badle na?”
Mark 6:38 Wathi kubo: “Ninezinkwa ezingaki na? Hambani nibone.” Sebazi bathi: “Ziyisihlanu, nezinhlanzi ezimbili.”
Mark 6:39 Wabayala ukuba bonke bahlale phansi etshanini obuluhlaza izigaba ngezigaba.
Mark 6:40 Base behlala phansi amaviyo ngamaviyo, kwaba ngamakhulu nangamashumi ayisihlanu.
Mark 6:41 Wazithabatha izinkwa eziyisihlanu nezinhlanzi ezimbili, wabheka ngasezulwini, wazibusisa, wazihlephula izinkwa, wazinika abafundi ukuba bazibeke phambi kwabo; nezinhlanzi ezimbili wababela bonke ngazo.
Mark 6:42 Badla bonke, basutha.
Mark 6:43 Babutha imvuthuluka, iziqabetho eziyishumi nambili ezigcwele, neyezinhlanzi.
Mark 6:44 Ababedlile izinkwa babe ngamadoda ayizinkulungwane eziyisihlanu.
Mark 6:45 Wayesecindezela masinyane abafundi bakhe ukuba bangene emkhunjini, bamandulele ukuya phesheya eBetsayida, yena aze amukise isixuku.
Mark 6:46 Esebavalelisile wahamba waya entabeni ukuyokhuleka.
Mark 6:47 Kwathi sekuhlwile, umkhumbi wawuphakathi nolwandle, yena eyedwa emhlabathini.
Mark 6:48 Wababona behlupheka ekugwedleni, ngokuba umoya wawuphambene nabo, weza kubo ngomlindo wesine wobusuku ehamba phezu kolwandle. Kwangathi uyadlula kubo.
Mark 6:49 Sebembonile ehamba phezu kolwandle, bacabanga ukuthi yisithunzi; bakhala.
Mark 6:50 Ngokuba bonke bambona, bethuka. Kepha washesha wakhuluma nabo, wathi kubo: “Yimani isibindi; yimina, ningesabi.”
Mark 6:51 Wayesekhwela emkhunjini kubo, umoya wanqamuka; bamangala kakhulu impela phakathi kwabo.
Mark 6:52 Ngokuba abaqondanga okwezinkwa, lokhu inhliziyo yabo yayilukhuni.
Mark 6:53 Sebewelile bafika ezweni laseGenesaretha, babopha ogwini.
Mark 6:54 Ukuphuma kwabo emkhunjini yena wayaziwa masinyane.
Mark 6:55 Bagijimela kulo lonke lelo zwe, baqala ukuletha abagulayo ngezinhlaka, lapho bemuzwa ukuthi ukhona.
Mark 6:56 Kwathi nomaphi lapho engena khona, emizaneni, nasemizini, nasemaphandleni, babeka abagulayo ezigcawini, bamncenga ukuba bathinte noma umphetho wengubo yakhe kuphela; bonke abamthinta basindiswa.
Mark 7:1 Kwabuthana kuye abaFarisi nabanye bababhali bevela eJerusalema.
Mark 7:2 Sebebonile ukuthi abanye babafundi bakhe badla izinkwa ngezandla ezimbi okungukuthi ezingahlanjiwe —
Mark 7:3 ngokuba abaFarisi kanye nabaJuda bonke abadli bengahlambisisanga izandla, bebamba isiko labadala;
Mark 7:4 nanxa bevela endalini, abadli bengakahlambi; kukhona nezinye izinto eziningi abazamukeleyo ukuba bazibambe, njengokuhlanza izinkezo, nezinkamba, nezitsha zethusi —
Mark 7:5 abaFarisi nababhali bambuza bathi: “Abafundi bakho abahambi ngani ngesiko labadala, kepha badla isinkwa ngezandla ezimbi na?”
Mark 7:6 Wayesethi kubo: “U-Isaya waprofetha kahle ngani nina bazenzisi njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: “ ‘Lesi sizwe singidumisa ngezindebe zomlomo, kepha inhliziyo yaso ikude nami;
Mark 7:7 kodwa bangikhonza ngeze befundisa izifundiso eziyimiyalo yabantu.’
Mark 7:8 “Niyeka umyalo kaNkulunkulu, nibambe isiko labantu.”
Mark 7:9 Wayesethi kubo: “Yebo, nichitha umyalo kaNkulunkulu ukuba nigcine isiko lenu.
Mark 7:10 Ngokuba uMose wathi: ‘Yazisa uyihlo nonyoko,’ nokuthi: ‘Othuka uyise noma unina makafe nokufa;’
Mark 7:11 kepha nina nithi: ‘Uma umuntu ethi kuyise noma kunina: YiKorbana, okungukuthi umnikelo, lokho ongabe usizwa yimi ngakho,’
Mark 7:12 anisamvumeli ukuba enzele uyise noma unina utho.
Mark 7:13 Izwi likaNkulunkulu nilenza libe yize ngesiko lenu enilivezileyo; nokunye okuningi okunjalo niyakwenza.”
Mark 7:14 Khona wabuye wabiza isixuku, wathi kuso: “Ngizweni nonke, niqonde.
Mark 7:15 Alukho utho olungaphandle komuntu lungene kuye olungamngcolisa; kepha okuphumayo kuye yilokho okumngcolisayo umuntu.
Mark 7:16 Uma ekhona onezindlebe zokuzwa, makezwe.”
Mark 7:17 Kuthe esengene endlini, evela esixukwini, abafundi bakhe bambuza ngalowo mfanekiso.
Mark 7:18 Wayesethi kubo: “Kanti nani ningabangaqondiyo na? Aniqondi yini ukuthi konke okungaphandle okungena kumuntu kungemngcolise na?
Mark 7:19 Ngokuba akungeni enhliziyweni yakhe, kodwa kungena esiswini, kuphumele ngaphandle, kuhlambulula ukudla konke.”
Mark 7:20 Wayesethi: “Okuphumayo kumuntu yilokho okumngcolisayo umuntu;
Mark 7:21 ngokuba ngaphakathi enhliziyweni yabantu kuphuma imicabango emibi, nobufebe, nokweba, nokubulala,
Mark 7:22 nokuphinga, nokufisa, nokushinga, nenkohliso, nokungabi nanhloni, neso elibi, nokuhlambalaza, nokuzidla, nobuwula.
Mark 7:23 Zonke lezo zinto ezimbi zivela ngaphakathi, zimngcolise umuntu.”
Mark 7:24 Wayesemuka lapho, waya emikhawulweni yaseTire. Wangena endlini, akathanda ukwaziwa muntu, kodwa wayengenakufihlakala.
Mark 7:25 Kwathi masinyane owesifazane ondodakazi yakhe encane inomoya ongcolileyo esezwile ngaye, weza waziphonsa phansi ngasezinyaweni zakhe.
Mark 7:26 Kepha owesifazane lo wayengumGreki engumSirofenike ngokuzalwa, wamnxusa ukuba akhiphe idemoni endodakazini yakhe.
Mark 7:27 UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Ake kusuthe abantwana kuqala, ngokuba akukuhle ukuthatha isinkwa sabantwana, usiphonse ezinjaneni.”
Mark 7:28 Kodwa waphendula, wathi kuye: “Yebo, Nkosi; kepha nezinjana zidla imvuthuluka yabantwana phansi kwetafula.”
Mark 7:29 Wayesethi kuye: “Ngenxa yalelo zwi, hamba-ke; idemoni seliphumile endodakazini yakho.”
Mark 7:30 Wayesemuka, waya endlini yakhe, wafumana umntwana elele embhedeni, idemoni liphumile.
Mark 7:31 UJesu waphuma futhi emikhawulweni yaseTire, wadabula iSidoni, weza ngaselwandle lwaseGalile edabula izwe laseDekapholi.
Mark 7:32 Baletha kuye isithulu esinamalimi, bamncenga ukuba abeke isandla phezu kwaso.
Mark 7:33 Wagudluka naso esixukwini bebodwa, wafaka iminwe yakhe ezindlebeni zaso, wafela amathe, waphatha ulimi lwaso,
Mark 7:34 wabheka ngasezulwini, wabubula, wathi kuso: “Efatha!” okungukuthi: “Vuleka!”
Mark 7:35 Zase zivuleka izindlebe zaso, wathukuluka masinyane umthambo wolimi lwaso, sakhuluma kahle.
Mark 7:36 Wabayala ukuba bangatsheli muntu. Kepha kwathi nakuba ebayala kakhulu, kwayikhona bekwandisa kakhulu impela.
Mark 7:37 Bamangala nokumangala, bathi: “Wenze kahle konke; nezithulu uzenza zizwe, nezimungulu zikhulume.”
Mark 8:1 Ngalezo zinsuku sekukhona futhi isixuku esikhulu singenakudla, wabiza abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo:
Mark 8:2 “Ngiyasihawukela isixuku, ngokuba sekuyizinsuku ezintathu sihlezi kimi, singenanto yokudla.
Mark 8:3 Uma ngibamukisa, baye ekhaya bengadlanga, bayakuphela amandla endleleni, ngokuba abanye babo bavela kude.”
Mark 8:4 Abafundi bakhe bamphendula bathi: “Umumtu angatholaphi lapha ehlane izinkwa zokusuthisa laba na?”
Mark 8:5 Wababuza wathi: “Ninezinkwa ezingaki na?” Bathi: “Eziyisikhombisa.”
Mark 8:6 Wayala isixuku ukuba sihlale phansi; wazithabatha izinkwa eziyisikhombisa, wabonga, wazihlephula, wanika abafundi bakhe ukuba bababele; basabela isixuku.
Mark 8:7 Babe nezinhlanzana eziyingcosana futhi; esezibusisile wathi abababele nazo.
Mark 8:8 Badla, basutha, babutha imvuthuluka eseleyo, amaqoma ayisikhombisa.
Mark 8:9 Babengathi izinkulungwane ezine; wabamukisa.
Mark 8:10 Wayesengena masinyane emkhunjini kanye nabafundi bakhe, weza ezweni laseDalmanutha.
Mark 8:11 Khona kwafika abaFarisi, baqala ukuphendulana naye befuna kuye isibonakaliso esivela ezulwini, bemlinga.
Mark 8:12 Wabubula emoyeni wakhe, wathi: “Lesi sizukulwane sifunelani isibonakaliso na? Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesi sizukulwane asiyikunikwa sibonakaliso.”
Mark 8:13 Wabashiya, wabuye wangena emkhunjini, wamuka, waya ngaphesheya.
Mark 8:14 Kepha babekhohliwe ukuphatha izinkwa, bengenalutho, isinkwa sisinye kuphela emkhunjini.
Mark 8:15 Wayesebayala ethi: “Anobheka nixwaye imvubelo yabaFarisi nemvubelo kaHerode.”
Mark 8:16 Baphendulana bodwa, bathi abanazinkwa.
Mark 8:17 UJesu ekwazi wathi kubo: “Yini ukuba niphendulane ngokuthi aninazinkwa na? Anikaboni, anikaqondi, na? Inhliziyo yenu iselukhuni na?
Mark 8:18 Ninamehlo aniboni yini, ninezindlebe anizwa na? Anikhumbuli yini
Mark 8:19 mhla ngihlephulela abayizinkulungwane eziyisihlanu izinkwa eziyisihlanu ukuthi nabutha iziqabetho ezingaki ezigcwele imvuthuluka na?” Bathi kuye: “Ishumi nambili.”
Mark 8:20 “Mhla ziyisikhombisa kwaba yizinkulungwane ezine, nabutha amaqoma amangaki agcwele imvuthuluka na?” Bathi: “Isikhombisa.”
Mark 8:21 Wathi kubo: “Anikaqondi na?”
Mark 8:22 Bafika eBetsayida. Base beletha kuye impumputhe, bamncenga ukuba ayiphathe.
Mark 8:23 Wayibamba impumputhe ngesandla, wayiholela ngaphandle komuzi, wafela amathe emehlweni ayo, wabeka izandla phezu kwayo, wayibuza wathi: “Ubona utho na?”
Mark 8:24 Yabheka, yathi: “Ngibona abantu, ngibabona behamba; kungathi yizihlahla.”
Mark 8:25 Khona waphinda wabeka izandla phezu kwamehlo ayo, yabhekisisa, yasinda, yabonisisa konke.
Mark 8:26 Wayithumela ekhaya layo, wathi: “Ungangeni emzini wabantu.”
Mark 8:27 UJesu wayesephuma kanye nabafundi bakhe, waya emizini yaseKesariya Filipi. Besendleleni, wababuza abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Abantu bathi ngingubani na?”
Mark 8:28 Bamtshela bathi: “UJohane uMbhapathizi;” abanye bathi: “Ngu-Eliya;” abanye bathi: “Ngomunye wabaprofethi.”
Mark 8:29 Wayesebabuza ethi: “Nina-ke nithi ngingubani na?” UPetru waphendula, wathi kuye: “Wena unguKristu.”
Mark 8:30 Wabayalisisa ukuba bangatsheli muntu ngaye.
Mark 8:31 Khona waqala ukubafundisa ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu imelwe ukuhlupheka ngokuningi, ilahlwe ngamalunga nabapristi abakhulu nababhali, ibulawe, ivuswe emva kwezinsuku ezintathu.
Mark 8:32 Leli zwi walikhuluma ngokusobala. UPetru wamthatha, waqala ukumkhuza.
Mark 8:33 Kepha waphenduka, wabheka abafundi bakhe, wamkhuza uPetru, wathi: “Buyela emva kwami, Sathane, ngokuba awuqondi okukaNkulunkulu kepha okwabantu.”
Mark 8:34 Wayesebiza isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukuza emva kwami, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele.
Mark 8:35 Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangenxa yevangeli uyakukusindisa.
Mark 8:36 Ngokuba kuyakumsizani umuntu ukuzuza izwe lonke, alahlekelwe ngukuphila kwakhe, na?
Mark 8:37 Yingabe angakhiphani umuntu, kube yisihlengo sokuphila kwakhe, na?
Mark 8:38 Ngokuba yilowo nalowo onezinhloni ngami nangamazwi ami kulesi sizukulwane esiphingayo nesonakeleyo, neNdodana yomuntu iyakuba nezinhloni ngaye, lapho iza ngenkazimulo kaYise kanye nezingelosi ezingcwele.”
Mark 9:1 Wayesethi kubo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Bakhona abanye kwabemi lapha abangayikuzwa ngempela ukufa, baze babone umbuso kaNkulunkulu ufikile ngamandla.”
Mark 9:2 Emva kwezinsuku eziyisithupha uJesu wathatha oPetru, noJakobe, noJohane, wakhuphukela nabo entabeni ende bebodwa; waphenduka esinye isimo phambi kwabo.
Mark 9:3 Izingubo zakhe zacwazimula zaba mhlophe qwa, ngangokuba umhlanzi wasemhlabeni angezenze zibe mhlophe kangaka.
Mark 9:4 Kwabonakala kubo u-Eliya enoMose; babekhuluma noJesu.
Mark 9:5 Wathatha uPetru, wathi kuJesu: “Rabi, kuhle ukuba silapha; masakhe amadokodo amathathu, elinye libe ngelakho, elinye libe ngelikaMose, elinye libe ngelika-Eliya.”
Mark 9:6 Wayengazi ukuthi uzakuphendula ngokuthini, ngokuba babesaba kakhulu.
Mark 9:7 Kwase kufika ifu, libasithibeza; kwavela izwi efwini, lithi: “Lo uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo; yizweni.”
Mark 9:8 Kwathi masinyane beqalaza, ababe besabona muntu, kuphela uJesu yedwa enabo.
Mark 9:9 Besehla entabeni, wabayala ukuba bangatsheli muntu abakubonileyo, iNdodana yomuntu ingakavuki kwabafileyo.
Mark 9:10 Bazigcinela lelo zwi bebuzana ngokuthi kuyini lokho ukuvuka kwabafileyo.
Mark 9:11 Base bembuza, bethi: “Basholoni ababhali ukuthi u-Eliya umelwe ukufika kuqala na?”
Mark 9:12 Wayesethi kubo: “Nempela u-Eliya uyeza kuqala ukuba abuyisele konke; kepha kulotshiwe kanjani ngeNdodana yomuntu ukuthi izakuhlupheka ngokuningi, idelelwe, na?
Mark 9:13 Kodwa ngithi kini: U-Eliya sewafika, benza kuye abakuthandayo, njengalokho kulotshiwe ngaye.”
Mark 9:14 Kwathi sebeza kubafundi, babona isixuku esikhulu sibahaqile nababhali bebuzana nabo.
Mark 9:15 Isixuku sonke sambona qede sashaywa luvalo, sagijimela kuye, sambingelela.
Mark 9:16 Wayesebabuza ethi: “Nibuzana nabo ngantoni na?”
Mark 9:17 Omunye wesixuku wamphendula wathi: “Mfundisi, ngilethe kuwe indodana yami enomoya oyisimungulu.
Mark 9:18 Kuthi lapho eyibambayo, uyidonsela phansi, ikhihlize amagwebu, igedle amazinyo, iphele amandla. Ngikhulume nabafundi bakho ukuba bamkhiphe, kepha bahluleka.”
Mark 9:19 Waphendula wathi: “O sizukulwane esingakholwayo, koze kube nini nginani na? Koze kube nini nginibekezelela na? Yiletheni kimi.”
Mark 9:20 Bayiletha kuye. Kwathi umoya embona, wayihlukumeza kakhulu masinyane, yawa phansi emhlabathini, yazigingqa ikhihliza amagwebu.
Mark 9:21 Wayesebuza kuyise ukuthi isikhathi sesingakanani ifikelwe yilokhu na? Wathi: “Kwasebuntwaneni.
Mark 9:22 Uyiphonsile kaningi emlilweni nasemanzini ukuba ayibhubhise; kodwa uma unamandla okwenza utho, sihawukele, usisize.”
Mark 9:23 UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Uma unamandla! Konke kungenzeka kokholwayo.”
Mark 9:24 Uyise womntwana wayesememeza masinyane, wathi: “Ngiyakholwa, siza ukungakholwa kwami.”
Mark 9:25 UJesu esebona ukuthi isixuku sigijimela ndawonye, wamkhuza umoya ongcolileyo, wathi kuye: “Wena moya oyisimungulu nesithulu ngiyakuyala mina, ngithi: Phuma kuye, ungabe usangena kuye.”
Mark 9:26 Wamemeza, wamhlukumeza kakhulu, waphuma; waba njengofileyo, baze bathi abaningi: “Usefile.”
Mark 9:27 Kepha uJesu wambamba ngesandla, wamvusa; wasukuma.
Mark 9:28 Kuthe esengenile endlini, abafundi bakhe bambuza bebodwa, bathi: “Thina besingemkhiphe ngani na?”
Mark 9:29 Wayesethi kubo: “Lolu hlobo lungephume ngalutho, kuphela ngokukhuleka nangokuzila ukudla.”
Mark 9:30 Bamuka lapho, badabula iGalile, wayengathandi ukuba kwaziwe muntu,
Mark 9:31 ngokuba wabafundisa abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “INdodana yomuntu ikhashelwa ezandleni zabantu, bazakuyibulala; kuthi isibulewe, izakuvuka emva kwezinsuku ezintathu.”
Mark 9:32 Kepha abakuzwisisanga lokho kusho, besaba nokumbuza.
Mark 9:33 Base beza eKapernawume. Kwathi esengene endlini, wababuza wathi: “Beniphendulana ngantoni endleleni na?”
Mark 9:34 Kepha bathula, ngokuba bebekhulumisene endleleni ngokuthi ngubani omkhulu.
Mark 9:35 Wayesehlala phansi, wababiza abayishumi nambili, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukuba ngowokuqala, makabe ngowokugcina kubo bonke nesikhonzi sabo bonke.”
Mark 9:36 Wayesethatha umntwana, wammisa phakathi kwabo, wamgona, wathi kubo:
Mark 9:37 “Yilowo nalowo oyakwamukela abe munye kubantwana abanje ngegama lami uyangamukela mina, ongamukela mina akamukeli mina kodwa ongithumileyo.”
Mark 9:38 UJohane wayesethi kuye: “Mfundisi, sabona umuntu ongasilandeli ekhipha amademoni ngegama lakho; samnqabela ngokuba engasilandeli.”
Mark 9:39 Kepha uJesu wathi: “Ningamnqabeli, ngokuba akakho owenza umsebenzi wamandla ngegama lami ongasuka masinyane, akhulume kabi ngami.
Mark 9:40 Ngokuba ongamelene nathi ungakithi.
Mark 9:41 Yilowo nalowo oniphuzisa inkezo yamanzi ngegama lami ngokuba ningabakaKristu, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Akasoze alahlekelwa ngumvuzo wakhe.
Mark 9:42 Nalowo okhubekisa abe munye kulaba abancinyane abakholwayo kungangcono kuye ukuba itshe lokusila ligaxwe entanyeni yakhe, aphonswe elwandle.
Mark 9:43 Uma isandla sakho sikukhubekisa, sinqume; kungcono ungene ekuphileni uyingini kunokuba uye esihogweni, emlilweni ongacimekiyo, unezandla zombili,
Mark 9:44 lapho impethu yabo ingafi, nomlilo ungacimi.
Mark 9:45 Uma unyawo lwakho lukukhubekisa, lunqume; kungcono ungene ekuphileni ulunyonga kunokuba uphonswe esihogweni, emlilweni ongacimekiyo, unezinyawo zombili,
Mark 9:46 lapho impethu yabo ingafi, nomlilo ungacimi.
Mark 9:47 Uma iso lakho likukhubekisa, likhiphe; kungcono ungene embusweni kaNkulunkulu uneso linye kunokuba uphonswe esihogweni unamehlo omabili,
Mark 9:48 lapho impethu yabo ingafi, nomlilo ungacimi.
Mark 9:49 Ngokuba bonke bazakugqunyiswa ngomlilo.
Mark 9:50 “Usawoti muhle, kepha uma usawoti engasenabusawoti, niyakumhlaziya ngani na? Yibani nosawoti phakathi kwenu, nihlalisane ngokuthula.”
Mark 10:1 Wasuka lapho, weza emikhawulweni yaseJudiya nangaphesheya kweJordani; izixuku zabuye zabuthana kuye, waphinda wabafundisa abantu njengokujwayela kwakhe.
Mark 10:2 Kwase kusondela kuye abaFarisi, bambuza ukuthi kuvunyelwe yini ukuba indoda ilahle umkayo, bemlinga.
Mark 10:3 Waphendula, wathi kubo: “UMose waniyala ngokuthini na?”
Mark 10:4 Bathi: “UMose wavuma ukuba kulotshwe incwadi yesahlukaniso, alahlwe.”
Mark 10:5 UJesu wayesethi kubo: “Ngenxa yobulukhuni benhliziyo yenu wanilobela lowo myalo.
Mark 10:6 Kepha kusukela ekuqaleni kokudalwa uNkulunkulu wabenza owesilisa nowesifazane.
Mark 10:7 Ngenxa yalokho umuntu uyakushiya uyise nonina, anamathele kumkakhe;
Mark 10:8 labo ababili bayakuba nyamanye; ngakho abasebabili, kepha sebenyamanye.
Mark 10:9 Ngakho-ke lokho akuhlanganisileyo uNkulunkulu makungahlukaniswa ngumuntu.”
Mark 10:10 Besendlini abafundi babuye bambuza ngalokho.
Mark 10:11 Wathi kubo: “Yilowo nalowo olahla umkakhe, aganwe ngomunye, uyaphinga kuye.
Mark 10:12 Naye, uma elahla indoda yakhe, agane enye, uyaphinga.”
Mark 10:13 Khona baletha kuye abantwanyana ukuba abaphathe; kepha abafundi babakhuza.
Mark 10:14 Kodwa uJesu ekubona wathukuthela, wathi kubo: “Vumelani abantwana beze kimi, ningabenqabeli, ngokuba umbuso kaNkulunkulu ungowabanjalo.
Mark 10:15 Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo ongamukeli umbuso kaNkulunkulu njengomntwana kasoze angena kuwo.”
Mark 10:16 Wabagona, wababusisa ebeka izandla phezu kwabo.
Mark 10:17 Ekuphumeni kwakhe ukuya endleleni umuntu wagijimela kuye, waguqa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, wambuza wathi: “Mfundisi omuhle, ngiyakwenzani ukuba ngidle ifa lokuphila okuphakade na?”
Mark 10:18 Kepha uJesu wathi kuye: “Ungibizelani ngokuthi ngimuhle na? Kakho omuhle, munye kuphela, uNkulunkulu.
Mark 10:19 Uyayazi imiyalelo ukuthi: Ungabulali, ungaphingi, ungebi, ungafakazi amanga, ungamamuki umuntu utho, yazisa uyihlo nonyoko.”
Mark 10:20 Kepha wathi kuye: “Mfundisi, konke lokho ngikugcinile kwasebusheni bami.”
Mark 10:21 UJesu wayesembheka, emthanda, wathi kuye: “Usasilalelwe into inye; hamba uthengise ngakho konke onakho, uphe abampofu, khona uzakuba negugu ezulwini; uze ungilandele.”
Mark 10:22 Kepha wanyukumala ngalelo zwi, wamuka edabukile, ngokuba wayenengcebo enkulu.
Mark 10:23 UJesu waqalaza, wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Kulukhuni kangakanani kwabanomnotho ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu.”
Mark 10:24 Kepha abafundi bethuka ngamazwi akhe. UJesu wabuye waphendula, wathi kubo: “Bantwana, kulukhuni kangakanani kwabethemba umnotho ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu.
Mark 10:25 Kulula ukuba ikamela lingene ngentunja yosungulo kunokuba onothileyo angene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.”
Mark 10:26 Bamangala kakhulu, bathi omunye komunye: “Pho, kungasindiswa bani na?”
Mark 10:27 UJesu ebabheka wathi: “Kubantu akunakwenzeka, kepha kuNkulunkulu akunjalo; ngokuba kuNkulunkulu kungenzeka konke.”
Mark 10:28 UPetru wathatha, wathi kuye: “Bheka, thina sishiye konke, sakulandela.”
Mark 10:29 UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Akukho muntu oshiye indlu, noma abafowabo, noma odadewabo, noma unina, noma uyise, noma abantwana, noma amazwe ngenxa yami nangenxa yevangeli,
Mark 10:30 ongayikwamukeliswa ngekhulu: manje kulesi sikhathi izindlu, nabafowabo, nawodadewabo, nawonina, nabantwana, namazwe kanye nokuzingelwa, nasenkathini ezayo ukuphila okuphakade.
Mark 10:31 Kepha abaningi abokuqala bayakuba ngabokugcina, nabokugcina babe ngabokuqala.”
Mark 10:32 Babesendleleni bekhuphukela eJerusalema; uJesu wayehamba phambi kwabo; ababelandela babethukile, besaba. Wayesethatha futhi abayishumi nambili, waqala ukubatshela okuzakumehlela, ethi:
Mark 10:33 “Bhekani, sikhuphukela eJerusalema; iNdodana yomuntu izakukhashelwa kubapristi abakhulu nababhali; bazakuyinqumela ukuba ife, bayikhaphele kwabezizwe;
Mark 10:34 bazakuyiklolodela, bayikhafulele ngamathe, bayishaye, bayibulale; kepha emva kwezinsuku ezintathu izakuvuka.”
Mark 10:35 Kwase kusondela kuye oJakobe noJohane amadodana kaZebedewu, bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, siyathanda ukuba usenzele lokhu esizakukucela kuwe.”
Mark 10:36 Wathi kubo: “Nifuna ukuba nginenzeleni na?”
Mark 10:37 Bathi kuye: “Siphe ukuba sihlale, omunye ngakwesokunene sakho, omunye ngokwesokhohlo sakho enkazimulweni yakho.”
Mark 10:38 Kepha uJesu wathi kubo: “Anikwazi enikucelayo. Ningasiphuza yini isitsha engisiphuzayo mina, nibhapathizwe ngombhapathizo engibhapathizwa ngawo na?”
Mark 10:39 Bathi kuye: “Singakwenza.” UJesu wathi kubo: “Isitsha engisiphuzayo mina niyakusiphuza, nibhapathizwe ngombhapathizo engibhapathizwa ngawo mina;
Mark 10:40 kepha ukuhlala ngakwesokunene sami nangakwesokhohlo akusikho okwami ukuphana ngakho, kodwa kungokwalabo abakulungiselweyo.”
Mark 10:41 Bathi ukuzwa lokho abayishumi, baqala ukuthukuthelela oJakobe noJohane.
Mark 10:42 UJesu wayesebabiza, wathi kubo: “Niyazi ukuthi abathiwa babusa izizwe bazenza amakhosi phezu kwazo, nezikhulu zazo ziphethe amandla phezu kwazo.
Mark 10:43 Kepha akunjalo phakathi kwenu, kodwa yilowo nalowo ofuna ukuba mkhulu phakathi kwenu makabe yisikhonzi senu,
Mark 10:44 nalowo ofuna ukuba ngowokuqala phakathi kwenu makabe yinceku yabo bonke.
Mark 10:45 Ngokuba nayo iNdodana yomuntu ayizelanga ukukhonzwa kepha ukukhonza nokunikela ukuphila kwayo, kube yisihlengo sabaningi.”
Mark 10:46 Khona bafika eJeriko. Kwathi esaphuma eJeriko nabafundi bakhe nesixuku esikhulu, indodana kaThimewu uBartimewu, isinxibi esiyimpumputhe, wayehlezi ngasendleleni.
Mark 10:47 Wathi ukuba ezwe ukuthi nguJesu waseNazaretha, waqala ukumemeza ethi: “Jesu, Ndodana kaDavide, ngihawukele!”
Mark 10:48 Abaningi bamkhuza, bathi kathule; kepha kwayikhona wamemeza kakhulu, ethi: “Ndodana kaDavide, ngihawukele!”
Mark 10:49 Wayesema uJesu, wathi: “Mbizeni.” Bayibiza impumputhe, bathi kuyo: “Yima isibindi, usukume; uyakubiza.”
Mark 10:50 Yayisilahla ingubo yayo, yagxuma, yaya kuJesu.
Mark 10:51 UJesu washo kuyo, wathi: “Ufuna ukuba ngikwenzeleni na?” Impumputhe yathi kuye: “Rabuni, ukuba ngibone.”
Mark 10:52 UJesu wathi kuyo: “Hamba-ke; ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile.” Yayisibona khona lapho, yamlandela endleleni.
Mark 11:1 Kwathi ukuba basondele eJerusalema, naseBetfage, naseBethaniya ngaseNtabeni Yeminqumo, wathuma ababili kubafundi bakhe,
Mark 11:2 wathi kubo: “Hambani niye emzaneni obhekene nani; kothi nisangena kuwo, nizakufumana ithole lembongolo likhulekiwe, okungakaze kuhlale muntu kulo; lithukululeni, nililethe.
Mark 11:3 Uma umuntu ethi kini: ‘Nikwenzelani lokhu na?’ anothi: ‘INkosi iyalidinga; izakulibuyisela lapha masinyane.’ ”
Mark 11:4 Bahamba, bafumana ithole likhulekiwe ngasesangweni ngaphandle emgwaqweni; balithukulula.
Mark 11:5 Abanye kwababemi khona bathi kubo: “Nenzani nilithukulula ithole na?”
Mark 11:6 Basho kubo njengokusho kukaJesu; base bebayeka.
Mark 11:7 Baliletha ithole kuJesu, babeka izingubo zabo phezu kwalo, wakhwela kulo.
Mark 11:8 Abaningi bendlala izingubo zabo endleleni, abanye amahlamvu ababewagawule endle.
Mark 11:9 Ababehamba phambili nababelandela bamemeza bathi: “Hosiyana! Ubusisiwe ozayo egameni leNkosi.
Mark 11:10 Ubusisiwe umbuso ozayo kababa uDavide. Hosiyana kweliphezulu!”
Mark 11:11 UJesu wangena eJerusalema, waya ethempelini; esekubukile konke waphuma, sekuhlwile, waya eBethaniya kanye nabayishumi nambili.
Mark 11:12 Ngangomuso ekuphumeni kwabo eBethaniya walamba.
Mark 11:13 Wabona umkhiwane ukude, unamaqabunga, wasondela ethi mhlawumbe angathola utho kuwo; esefikile kuwo akafumananga lutho, amaqabunga odwa, ngokuba kwakungesiso isikhathi samakhiwane.
Mark 11:14 UJesu wakhuluma, wathi kuwo: “Akungabe kusadla noyedwa isithelo kuwe kuze kube phakade.” Abafundi bakhe bakuzwa.
Mark 11:15 Bafika eJerusalema. Wangena ethempelini, waqala ukuxosha abathengisayo nabathengayo ethempelini, wagumbuqela amatafula abashintshelana imali nezihlalo zabathengisa ngamajuba;
Mark 11:16 wayengavumi ukuba umuntu adabule ithempeli ethwele isitsha.
Mark 11:17 Wafundisa, wathi kubo: “Akulotshiwe yini ukuthi, ‘indlu yami iyakubizwa ngokuthi indlu yokukhuleka yezizwe zonke’ na? Kepha nina niyenze ‘umhume wabaphangi.’ ”
Mark 11:18 Abapristi abakhulu nababhali bekuzwa lokho bazindla ngokuthi bangambhubhisa kanjani, ngokuba babemesaba, lokhu isixuku sonke samangala ngokufundisa kwakhe.
Mark 11:19 Njalo ngokuhlwa baphuma emzini.
Mark 11:20 Kusasa bedlula babona umkhiwane ubunile kusukela ezimpandeni.
Mark 11:21 UPetru ekhumbula wathi kuye: “Rabi, bheka, umkhiwane owuqalekisileyo ubunile.”
Mark 11:22 UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Kholwani nguNkulunkulu.
Mark 11:23 Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo oyakuthi kule ntaba: ‘Nqukuleka, uphonseke elwandle,’ engangabazi enhliziyweni yakhe kepha ekholwa ukuthi lokho akushoyo kuyenzeka, uzakuba nakho.
Mark 11:24 Ngalokho ngithi kini: Konke enikukhulekelayo nenikucelayo, kholwani ukuthi nikwamukele, nizakuba nakho.
Mark 11:25 Futhi nxa nimi nikhuleka, thethelelani, uma ninamagqubu nomunye, ukuze noYihlo osezulwini anithethelele iziphambeko zenu.
Mark 11:26 Kepha uma nina ningathetheleli, noYihlo osezulwini akayikunithethelela iziphambeko zenu.”
Mark 11:27 Babuye bafika eJerusalema; kwathi ehamba ethempelini, beza kuye abapristi abakhulu, nababhali, namalunga,
Mark 11:28 bathi kuye: “Lokhu ukwenza ngagunya lini na? Ngubani okunike leli gunya ukuze wenze lokhu na?”
Mark 11:29 Kepha uJesu wathi kubo: “Ngizakunibuza izwi libe linye, nize ningiphendule; yikhona ngizakunitshela ukuthi ngenza lokhu ngagunya lini.
Mark 11:30 Ukubhapathiza kukaJohane kwavela ezulwini noma kubantu na? Ngiphenduleni.”
Mark 11:31 Bakhulumisana bodwa, bathi: “Uma sithi: ‘Ezulwini,’ uzakuthi: ‘Pho, anikholwanga nguye ngani na?’
Mark 11:32 Kepha uma sithi: ‘Kubantu,’ ” besaba isixuku, ngokuba bonke bathi uJohane ungumprofethi impela.
Mark 11:33 Base bemphendula uJesu, bathi: “Asazi.” Wayesethi uJesu kubo: “Nami anginitsheli ukuthi ngenza lokhu ngagunya lini.”
Mark 12:1 Wayeseqala ukukhuluma kubo ngemifanekiso, ethi: “Umuntu watshala isivini, wasibiyela ngothango, wemba isikhamo, wakha isiqongo sokulinda, wasiqashisa kubalimi, waya kwelinye izwe.
Mark 12:2 Ngenkathi efaneleyo wayesethuma inceku kubalimi ukuba ithathe kubalimi ezithelweni zesivini.
Mark 12:3 Bayibamba, bayishaya, bayimukisa ze.
Mark 12:4 Waphinda wathuma kubo enye inceku; yona bayilimaza ekhanda, bayithuka.
Mark 12:5 Wathuma enye futhi; yona bayibulala, nezinye eziningi: ezinye bazishaya, ezinye bazibulala.
Mark 12:6 “Kwase kusele umuntu munye, indodana ethandekayo; yona wayithuma kubo ekugcineni, ethi: ‘Bayakuyazisa indodana yami.’
Mark 12:7 “Kepha labo balimi bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: ‘Lo uyindlalifa; wozani siyibulale, ifa libe ngelethu.’
Mark 12:8 Base beyibamba bayibulala, bayiphonsa ngaphandle kwesivini.
Mark 12:9 “Uzakwenzani umninisivini na? Uzakuza, ababhubhise labo balimi, isivini asinike abanye.
Mark 12:10 Aniwufundanga yini lo mbhalo othi: “ ‘Itshe abalinqabayo abakhi lona laba yinhloko yegumbi;
Mark 12:11 lona lavela eNkosini; liyisimangaliso emehlweni ethu,’ na?”
Mark 12:12 Base befuna ukumbamba, kepha besaba isixuku; ngokuba bazi ukuthi ukhulume lo mfanekiso ngabo. Base bemshiya bamuka.
Mark 12:13 Khona abanye babaFarisi nabakaHerode bathunyelwa kuye ukuba bamhile ngezwi.
Mark 12:14 Beza bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, siyazi ukuthi uqinisile nokuthi awukhathali ngamuntu, ngokuba awubheki ubuso babantu, kodwa indlela kaNkulunkulu uyifundisa ngeqiniso. Kuvunyelwe ukuthela kuKesari noma qha? Sithele nokuba singatheli na?”
Mark 12:15 Kepha yena ekwazi ukuzenzisa kwabo wathi kubo: “Ningilingelani na? Lethani kimi udenariyu, ngimbone.”
Mark 12:16 Bamletha. Wayesethi kubo: “Ngokabani lo mfanekiso nalo mbhalo na?” Bathi kuye: “NgokaKesari.”
Mark 12:17 UJesu wathi kubo: “Nikani uKesari okukaKesari, noNkulunkulu okukaNkulunkulu.” Bamangala ngaye.
Mark 12:18 Khona kwafika kuye abaSadusi abathi akukho ukuvuka kwabafileyo, bambuza bathi:
Mark 12:19 “Mfundisi, uMose wasilobela ukuthi, uma kufa umfowabo womuntu, eshiya umkakhe engashiyi mntwana, umfowabo makamthathe umkakhe, amvusele umfowabo inzalo.
Mark 12:20 Kwakukhona izelamani eziyisikhombisa, owokuqala wathatha umfazi; wafa engashiyanga nzalo.
Mark 12:21 Nowesibili wamthatha; naye wafa engashiyanga nzalo; kanjalo nowesithathu.
Mark 12:22 Abayisikhombisa kabashiyanga nzalo. Ekugcineni kwabo bonke kwafa nomfazi.
Mark 12:23 Ekuvukeni mhla bevukayo uyakuba ngumkabani kubo, lokhu abayisikhombisa babe naye engumkabo, na?”
Mark 12:24 UJesu wathi kubo: “Angithi nidukile ngenxa yokuba ningayazi imibhalo namandla kaNkulunkulu na?
Mark 12:25 Ngokuba mhla bevuka kwabafileyo abaganwa, abendiswa, kodwa banjengezingelosi ezulwini.
Mark 12:26 Kepha maqondana nabafileyo ukuthi bayavuswa anifundanga yini encwadini kaMose ngesihlahla ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakhuluma kuye, wathi: ‘NginguNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, noNkulunkulu ka-Isaka, noNkulunkulu kaJakobe,’ na?
Mark 12:27 Akasiye uNkulunkulu wabafileyo kodwa owabaphilayo. Nidukile kakhulu.”
Mark 12:28 Kwase kusondela omunye wababhali owayebezwile bebuzana, eqonda ukuthi wayebaphendule kahle, wambuza wathi: “Ngumuphi umyalo wokuqala kuyo yonke na?”
Mark 12:29 UJesu waphendula wathi: “Owokuqala ngowokuthi: ‘Yizwa, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu, iNkosi, yinye.
Mark 12:30 Woyithanda iNkosi, uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho, nangawo onke amandla akho.’
Mark 12:31 Owesibili yilo: ‘Womthanda umakhelwame wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.’ Awukho omunye umyalo omkhulu kunale.”
Mark 12:32 Umbhali wayesethi kuye: “Yebo, Mfundisi, ushilo ngeqiniso ukuthi yinye, ayikho enye ngaphandle kwayo;
Mark 12:33 futhi ukuyithanda yona ngenhliziyo yonke, nangengqondo yonke, nangamandla onke, nokuthanda umakhelwane njengalokhu umuntu ezithanda yena kudlula yonke iminikelo yokushiswa nemihlatshelo.”
Mark 12:34 UJesu embona ukuthi uphendule ngokuqonda, wathi kuye: “Awukude nombuso kaNkulunkulu.” Akwabe kusabakho onesibindi sokumbuza.
Mark 12:35 Khona uJesu efundisa ethempelini wabuza wathi: “Basho kanjani ababhali ukuthi uKristu uyindodana kaDavide na?
Mark 12:36 UDavide uqobo lwakhe washo ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuthi: “ ‘INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: “Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, ngize ngibeke izitha zakho phansi kwezinyawo zakho.” ’
Mark 12:37 “UDavide uqobo lwakhe umbiza ngokuthi iNkosi. Pho, uyindodana yakhe kanjani na?” Isixuku esikhulu sasimuzwa ngokujabula.
Mark 12:38 Ekufundiseni kwakhe wathi: “Xwayani ababhali abathanda ukuhamba bembethe izingubo ezinde, nokubingelelwa ezigcawini,
Mark 12:39 nezihlalo eziphambili emasinagogeni, nezindawo ezingenhla ekudleni,
Mark 12:40 abadla izindlu zabafelokazi, bekhuleka isikhathi eside ngokuzenzisa; laba bayakwamukeliswa ukulahlwa okukhulu.”
Mark 12:41 Wayesehlala phansi maqondana nomphongolo womnikelo, wabuka isixuku sibeka umnikelo emphongolweni. Abaningi abacebileyo babeka kakhulu.
Mark 12:42 Kwase kufika umfelokazi ompofu wabeka amafadingi amabili okuyisitebela.
Mark 12:43 Wayesebabiza abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lo mfelokazi ompofu ubekile kakhulu kunabo bonke ababeke emphongolweni,
Mark 12:44 ngokuba bonke babeka kokuchichimileyo kwabo, kepha yena ebumpofini bakhe ubeke konke anakho, konke abephila ngakho.”
Mark 13:1 Kuthe ephuma ethempelini, omunye wabafundi bakhe wathi kuye: “Mfundisi, bheka amatshe anjani nezakhiwo ezinjani!”
Mark 13:2 UJesu wathi kuye: “Uyabona lezi zakhiwo ezinkulu na? Akuyikushiywa itshe phezu kwetshe elingayikudilizelwa phansi.”
Mark 13:3 Esahlezi eNtabeni Yeminqumo maqondana nethempeli, oPetru noJakobe noJohane no-Andreya bambuza bebodwa,
Mark 13:4 bathi: “Sitshele ukuthi lokhu kuyakuba nini, nesibonakaliso siyakuba yini, lapho sekuyakufezeka konke lokhu, na?”
Mark 13:5 Khona uJesu waqala ukukhuluma kubo, ethi: “Qaphelani ningadukiswa muntu.
Mark 13:6 Kuyakuza abaningi ngegama lami, bathi: ‘Nginguye,’ badukise abaningi.
Mark 13:7 Nxa nizwa izimpi namahemuhemu ezimpi, ningethuki; kumelwe ukuba kwenzeke, kepha ukuphela koba kungakafiki.
Mark 13:8 Ngokuba isizwe siyakuvukela isizwe, nombuso uvukele umbuso; kuyakuba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba izindawo ngezindawo, kube khona indlala; lokhu kungukuqala kwemihelo.
Mark 13:9 “Kepha ziqapheleni nina. Bayakunikhaphela emiphakathini; niyakushaywa emasinagogeni; niyakumiswa phambi kwababusi namakhosi ngenxa yami, kube ngubufakazi kubo.
Mark 13:10 Kepha ivangeli limelwe ukushunyayelwa kuqala ezizweni zonke.
Mark 13:11 Uma beniqhuba, benikhaphela, ningakhathaleli ngaphambili eniyakukukhuluma, kodwa lokho eniyakukunikwa ngaleso sikhathi, kukhulumeni; ngokuba kakunina enikhulumayo kodwa nguMoya oNgcwele.
Mark 13:12 “Khona umuntu uyakukhaphela umfowabo ekufeni noyise umntanakhe, yebo, abantwana bayakuvukela abazali babo, bababulale.
Mark 13:13 Niyakuzondwa yibo bonke ngenxa yegama lami, kodwa okhuthazelayo kuze kube sekupheleni nguyena oyakusindiswa.
Mark 13:14 “Kepha nxa nibona amanyala encithakalo emi lapho kungafanele khona — ofundayo makaqaphele — khona abaseJudiya mababalekele ezintabeni,
Mark 13:15 ophezu kwendlu angehli, angangeni ukuyothatha utho endlini yakhe,
Mark 13:16 osensimini angabuyeli emuva ukuyothatha ingubo yakhe.
Mark 13:17 Kepha maye kwabakhulelweyo nabancelisayo ngalezo zinsuku!
Mark 13:18 Khulekani ukuba kungabi sebusika.
Mark 13:19 Ngokuba lezo zinsuku ziyakuba nosizi olungazange lube khona olunjalo kwasekuqaleni kokudalwa akudalayo uNkulunkulu kuze kube manje, nolungasayikuba khona.
Mark 13:20 Uma iNkosi ibingazifinyezi lezo zinsuku, bekungesindiswe muntu, kepha ngenxa yabakhethiweyo eyabakhetha yazifinyeza lezo zinsuku.
Mark 13:21 Khona-ke uma umuntu ethi kini: ‘Bhekani, nangu uKristu,’ noma: ‘Bhekani, nanguya,’ ningakholwa.
Mark 13:22 Ngokuba kuyakuvela okristu bamanga nabaprofethi bamanga, benze izibonakaliso nezimangaliso, ukuze badukise abakhethiweyo, uma kungenzeka.
Mark 13:23 Kepha qaphelani nina; senginitshele konke ngaphambili.
Mark 13:24 “Kodwa ngalezo zinsuku emva kwalolo sizi ilanga liyakufiphazwa, nenyanga ayiyikukhanya,
Mark 13:25 nezinkanyezi ziyakuwa ezulwini, namandla asezulwini ayakuzanyazanyiswa.
Mark 13:26 Khona-ke bayakubona iNdodana yomuntu iza emafwini, inamandla amakhulu nenkazimulo.
Mark 13:27 Lapho iyakuthuma izingelosi, iqoqe abakhethiweyo bayo emimoyeni yomine, kusukela emkhawulweni womhlaba kuze kube semkhawulweni wezulu.
Mark 13:28 “Fundani umfanekiso emkhiwaneni; nxa igatsha lawo selithamba, lihlume amaqabunga, niyazi ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze.
Mark 13:29 Kanjalo nani, nxa nibona lokhu kwenzeka, yazini ukuthi iseduze ngasemnyango.
Mark 13:30 Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesi sizukulwane asiyikudlula, kungakenzeki konke lokhu.
Mark 13:31 Kuyakudlula izulu nomhlaba, kepha amazwi ami awayikudlula.
Mark 13:32 “Kepha lolo suku nalelo hora akakho owazi lutho ngalo, nazingelosi ezulwini, naNdodana, nguBaba kuphela.
Mark 13:33 Qaphelani, nilinde, ngokuba anisazi isikhathi ukuthi siyakuba nini.
Mark 13:34 Kunjengomuntu owahambela kwelinye izwe; washiya indlu yakhe, wanika izinceku zakhe amandla, yileyo naleyo wayinika umsebenzi wayo, wayala umlindisango ukuba alinde.
Mark 13:35 “Ngakho lindani, ngokuba anazi ukuthi inkosi yendlu iyakufika nini, noma ngokuhlwa, noma phakathi kobusuku, noma ngokukhala kwezinkuku, noma ekuseni,
Mark 13:36 funa ifike ngokuzuma, inifumane nilele.
Mark 13:37 Kepha lokhu engikusho kini ngikusho kubo bonke, ngithi: ‘Lindani.’ ”
Mark 14:1 Emva kwezinsuku ezimbili kwaba khona iPhasika nomkhosi wesinkwa esingenamvubelo; abapristi abakhulu nababhali bafuna isu lokumbamba ngobuqili, bambulale.
Mark 14:2 Ngakho bathi: “Makungabi ngomkhosi, kungaze kube khona isiyaluyalu esizweni.”
Mark 14:3 Kwathi eseBethaniya endlini kaSimoni owayenochoko, ehlezi ekudleni, kwafika owesifazane ephethe umfuma we-alabaste wamafutha enadi lodwa elibiza kakhulu; wachoboza umfuma wathela amafutha ekhanda lakhe.
Mark 14:4 Kepha kwakukhona abanye abakhuluma bodwa ngokuthukuthela, bethi: “Kwenzelweni lokho kuchithwa kwamafutha na?
Mark 14:5 Ngokuba lawa mafutha nga ethengisiwe ngawodenariyu abangaphezu kwamakhulu amathathu, kwaphiwa abampofu.” Bamthukuthelela kakhulu.
Mark 14:6 Kepha uJesu wathi: “Myekeni; nimhluphelani na? Usebenzile umsebenzi omuhle kimi.
Mark 14:7 Ngokuba abampofu ninabo njalo; nanini, uma nithanda, ningabenzela okuhle: kepha mina aninami njalo.
Mark 14:8 Wenzile abengakwenza; wandulele ukuwugcobela umzimba wami ukumbelwa.
Mark 14:9 Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Nomaphi lapho liyakushunyayelwa khona ivangeli ezweni lonke, kuyakukhulunywa nangalokho akwenzileyo, kube yisikhumbuzo ngaye.”
Mark 14:10 UJuda Iskariyothe, omunye wabayishumi nambili, wayeseya kubapristi abakhulu ukuba amkhaphele kubo.
Mark 14:11 Sebezwile bathokoza, bathembisa ukumnika imali. Wayesefuna ithuba lokumkhaphela.
Mark 14:12 Ngosuku lokuqala lwesinkwa esingenamvubelo okwakuhlatshwa ngalo iphasika abafundi bakhe bathi kuye: “Uthanda ukuba siye silungiselephi ukuba udle iphasika na?”
Mark 14:13 Wayesethuma ababili kubafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Hambani niye emzini; khona nizakuhlangana nomuntu othwele imbiza yamanzi; mlandeleni.
Mark 14:14 Lapho engena khona, anothi kumninindlu: ‘Uthi uMfundisi: Iphi indlu yami, lapho ngingadlela khona iphasika nabafundi bami, na?’
Mark 14:15 Yena uzakunikhombisa ikamelo elikhulu eliphezulu, elendlelweyo, lilungisiwe; silungiseleni khona.”
Mark 14:16 Bahamba abafundi bafika emzini, bafumana kunjengokusho kwakhe kubo; base belungisa iphasika.
Mark 14:17 Kusihlwa wafika nabayishumi nambili.
Mark 14:18 Sebehlezi ekudleni, uJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Omunye kini, odla nami, uzakungikhaphela.”
Mark 14:19 Baqala ukudabuka, bathi kuye ngamunye: “Kungaba yimi na?”
Mark 14:20 Wathi kubo: “Ngomunye wabayishumi nambili, okha kanye nami esitsheni.
Mark 14:21 INdodana yomuntu iyamuka kambe njengokulotshiwe ngayo, kepha maye kulowo muntu iNdodana yomuntu ekhashelwa ngaye! Nga kukuhle kulowo muntu ukuba kazalwanga.”
Mark 14:22 Kwathi besadla, uJesu wathabatha isinkwa, wasibusisa, wasihlephula, wabanika, wathi: “Thabathani nidle; lokhu kungumzimba wami.”
Mark 14:23 Wayesethabatha isitsha, wabonga, wabanika; baphuza kuso bonke.
Mark 14:24 Wathi kubo: “Lokhu kuyigazi lami lesivumelwano elithululwa ngenxa yabaningi.
Mark 14:25 Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Angisayikuphuza okwesithelo somvini, kuze kufike lolo suku engiyakusiphuza ngalo sisisha embusweni kaNkulunkulu.”
Mark 14:26 Kwathi sebehlabelele igama lokubonga, baphuma baya eNtabeni Yeminqumo.
Mark 14:27 UJesu wathi kubo: “Nonke nizakukhubeka, ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Ngiyakushaya umalusi, izimvu zihlakazeke.’
Mark 14:28 Kepha emva kokuvuswa kwami ngiyakunandulela ukuya eGalile.”
Mark 14:29 UPetru wathi kuye: “Noma beyakukhubeka bonke, hhayi mina.”
Mark 14:30 UJesu wathi kuye: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Namhlanje ngalobu busuku, lingakakhali kabili iqhude, uzakungiphika kathathu.”
Mark 14:31 Kepha waqinisa ngamandla, wathi: “Noma ngingaze ngife nawe, angisoze ngakuphika.” Basho njalo bonke.
Mark 14:32 Bafika endaweni ethiwa iGetsemane; wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Hlalani lapha, ngisaya kukhuleka.”
Mark 14:33 Wathatha oPetru noJakobe noJohane, waqala ukuba novalo nosizi.
Mark 14:34 Wathi kubo: “Umphefumulo wami ulusizi kakhulu kuze kube sekufeni; hlalani lapha, nilinde.”
Mark 14:35 Waqhubeka ingcosana, wawa phansi, wakhuleka ukuba, uma kungenzeka, kudlule kuye lo mzuzu.
Mark 14:36 Wathi: “Aba, Baba, konke kungenzeka kuwe; ake ususe kimi lesi sitsha, kepha kungabi njengokuba ngithanda mina, kodwa njengokuba uthanda wena.”
Mark 14:37 Wayeseza, wabafumana belele; wathi kuPetru: “Simoni, ulele na? Ubungelinde ihora libe linye na?
Mark 14:38 Lindani, nikhuleke ukuba ningangeni ekulingweni; umoya uyavuma, kepha inyama ibuthakathaka.”
Mark 14:39 Wabuye wasuka waya kukhuleka, esho lona lelo zwi.
Mark 14:40 Esebuya futhi wabafumana belele, ngokuba amehlo abo ayenzima; babengazi ukuthi bazakumphendula ngokuthini.
Mark 14:41 Weza ngokwesithathu, wathi kubo: “Nisalele namanje niphumula. Kwanele, ihora lifikile; bhekani, iNdodana yomuntu isiyakhashelwa ezandleni zezoni.
Mark 14:42 Sukumani sihambe. Bhekani, ongikhaphelayo usesondele.”
Mark 14:43 Khona masinyane esakhuluma, kwafika uJuda, omunye wabayishumi nambili, enesixuku esinezinkemba nezinduku, sivela kubapristi abakhulu nababhali namalunga.
Mark 14:44 Kepha omkhaphelayo wayebanike isiboniso sokuthi: “Lowo engiyakumanga, nguye; mbambeni, nihambe naye, nimqinise.”
Mark 14:45 Esefikile wasondela kuye masinyane, wathi: “Rabi!” Wamanga.
Mark 14:46 Base bembeka izandla, bambamba.
Mark 14:47 Omunye kwababemi khona wahosha inkemba, wayigenca inceku yompristi omkhulu, wayinquma indlebe.
Mark 14:48 UJesu wathatha wathi kubo: “Niphumile kungathi nize kumphangi, niphethe izinkemba nezinduku ukungibamba.
Mark 14:49 Benginani imihla ngemihla ethempelini ngifundisa, anangibamba; kepha nga kugcwaliseka imibhalo.”
Mark 14:50 Bamshiya bonke, babaleka.
Mark 14:51 Insizwa ethile yamlandela yembethe indwangu nje emzimbeni; bayibamba.
Mark 14:52 Yayisiyishiya indwangu, yabaleka ze.
Mark 14:53 Base bemusa uJesu kumpristi omkhulu; kwabuthana bonke abapristi abakhulu namalunga nababhali.
Mark 14:54 UPetru wamlandela ekude, waze wangena egcekeni lompristi omkhulu; wayehlezi kanye nezikhonzi otha umlilo.
Mark 14:55 Abapristi abakhulu nomphakathi wonke bafuna ubufakazi ngoJesu ukuba bambulale, kepha ababufumananga.
Mark 14:56 Ngokuba abaningi bafakaza amanga ngaye, kepha ubufakazi babo abuhlangananga.
Mark 14:57 Kwasukuma abathile, bafakaza amanga ngaye, bathi:
Mark 14:58 “Thina simzwile ethi: ‘Ngiyakulidiliza leli thempeli elenziwe ngezandla, ngakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu elinye elingenziwe ngezandla.’ ”
Mark 14:59 Nakuba kunjalo ubufakazi babo abuhlangananga.
Mark 14:60 Kwase kusukuma umpristi omkhulu phakathi kwabo, wambuza uJesu, wathi: “Awuphenduli lutho na? Kuyini abakufakaza ngawe laba na?”
Mark 14:61 Kepha wathula, akaphendula lutho. Umpristi omkhulu wabuye wambuza, wathi kuye: “UnguKristu, iNdodana yoBongekayo na?”
Mark 14:62 Wathi uJesu: “Nginguye. Niyakubona iNdodana yomuntu ihlezi ngakwesokunene saMandla, iza ngamafu ezulu.”
Mark 14:63 Khona umpristi omkhulu waklebhula izingubo zakhe, wathi: “Sisaswelelani ofakazi na?
Mark 14:64 Senikuzwile ukuhlambalaza; nithini na?” Bamlahla bonke ngokuthi ufanele ukufa.
Mark 14:65 Abanye base beqala ukumkhafulela ngamathe nokumgubuzela ubuso nokumdushuza, bathi kuye: “Profetha.” Nezikhonzi zamthatha zammukula.
Mark 14:66 UPetru esesegcekeni ngaphansi, kwafika enye yamantombazana ompristi omkhulu,
Mark 14:67 yambona uPetru otha, yambheka, yathi: “Nawe ubunoJesu waseNazaretha.”
Mark 14:68 Kepha waphika wathi: “Angikwazi, yebo, angikuzwisisi okushoyo;” waphumela enkundleni; lakhala iqhude.
Mark 14:69 Intombazana imbona yabuye yaqala ukusho kwababemi khona ukuthi: “Lona ungomunye wabo.”
Mark 14:70 Kepha waphinda waphika. Emva kwesikhashana futhi ababemi khona bathi kuPetru: “Nempela ungomunye wabo, ngokuba ungowaseGalile.”
Mark 14:71 Wayeseqala ukuthuka nokufunga, ethi: “Angimazi lowo muntu enikhuluma ngaye.”
Mark 14:72 Lase likhala masinyane iqhude ngokwesibili. UPetru wayesekhumbula izwi abelishilo kuye uJesu lokuthi: “Iqhude lingakakhali kabili, uzakungiphika kathathu;” wakhala nokukhala izinyembezi.
Mark 15:1 Kwathi masinyane ekuseni abapristi abakhulu namalunga nababhali nomphakathi wonke benza icebo, bambopha uJesu, bamqhuba, bamnikela kuPilatu.
Mark 15:2 UPilatu wambuza wathi: “Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na?” Waphendula, wathi kuye: “Usho khona.”
Mark 15:3 Abapristi abakhulu bammangalela ngokuningi.
Mark 15:4 UPilatu wabuye wambuza, wathi: “Awuphenduli lutho na? Bheka, bakuthwesa icala ngokuningi kangaka.”
Mark 15:5 Kodwa uJesu akabe esaphendula lutho, waze wamangala uPilatu.
Mark 15:6 Kwathi ngomkhosi wayehleze ebakhululela isiboshwa sibe sinye abasicelayo.
Mark 15:7 Kwakukhona-ke omunye, nguBaraba igama lakhe, owayeboshiwe kanye namahlubuka; wona ayebulele umuntu ekuhlubukeni.
Mark 15:8 Isixuku senyuka, saqala ukucela ukuba abenzele njengalokho ebehleze ebenzela.
Mark 15:9 Kepha uPilatu wabaphendula wathi: “Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele inkosi yabaJuda na?”
Mark 15:10 Ngokuba wayekwazi ukuthi abapristi abakhulu bamnikele ngomhawu.
Mark 15:11 Kepha abapristi abakhulu babhebhezela isixuku ukuba okungcono asikhululele uBaraba.
Mark 15:12 UPilatu wabuye waphendula, wathi kubo: “Pho-ke, ngimenzenjani lo enithi uyinkosi yabaJuda na?”
Mark 15:13 Babuye bamemeza, bathi: “Mbethele esiphambanweni!”
Mark 15:14 Kodwa uPilatu wathi kubo: “Ngokuba wenze bubi buni na?” Kepha bamemeza kakhulu, bathi: “Mbethele esiphambanweni!”
Mark 15:15 Khona uPilatu ethanda ukudelisa isixuku wasikhululela uBaraba, kepha wamshaya uJesu, wamnikela ukuba abethelwe esiphambanweni.
Mark 15:16 Amabutho ayesemngenisa phakathi endlini ethiwa iPretoriyu, abizela ndawonye ibutho lonke.
Mark 15:17 Ayesemembathisa ingubo ebubende, amcwashelisa ngomqhele ayeweluke ngameva.
Mark 15:18 Aqala ukumkhulekela, athi: “Bayede, nkosi yabaJuda!”
Mark 15:19 Amshaya ekhanda ngomhlanga, amkhafulela ngamathe, aguqa ngamadolo, akhuleka kuye.
Mark 15:20 Esembhinqile amhlubula ingubo ebubende, amembathisa izingubo zakhe. Ayesephuma naye ukuba ambethele esiphambanweni.
Mark 15:21 Acindezela umuntu obedlula, uSimoni waseKhurene, evela endle, uyise ka-Aleksandru noRufu, ukuba athwale isiphambano sakhe.
Mark 15:22 Ayesemyisa endaweni yaseGolgotha okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa iNdawo Yekhanda.
Mark 15:23 Amnika iwayini elixutshwe nemure; kepha akalamukelanga.
Mark 15:24 Ayesembethela esiphambanweni, abelana izingubo zakhe, enzelana inkatho ngazo ukuthi yilowo nalowo uyakuthathani.
Mark 15:25 Kwakuyihora lesithathu esembethela esiphambanweni.
Mark 15:26 Umbhalo wecala lakhe ubulotshiwe ngaphezulu wokuthi: INKOSI YABAJUDA.
Mark 15:27 Kwabethelwa kanye naye abaphangi ababili, omunye ngakwesokunene nomunye ngakwesokhohlo sakhe.
Mark 15:28 Kwase kugcwaliseka umbhalo othi: “Wabalwa kanye naboni.”
Mark 15:29 Abadlulayo bamhlambalaza benikina amakhanda abo, bathi: “Eya wena odiliza ithempeli, ubuye ulakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu;
Mark 15:30 zisindise, wehle esiphambanweni.”
Mark 15:31 Kanjalo nabapristi abakhulu bambhinqa bebodwa kanye nababhali, bathi: “Wasindisa abanye, angezisindise yena.
Mark 15:32 UKristu, iNkosi yakwa-Israyeli, makehle manje esiphambanweni, ukuze sibone, sikholwe.” Nababebethelwe kanye naye bamdumaza.
Mark 15:33 Sekufikile ihora lesithupha kwaba mnyama emhlabeni wonke, kwaze kwaba yihora lesishiyagalolunye.
