2Cor 10:11 Onjalo makaqonde lokhu ukuthi lokhu esiyikho ngamazwi ezincwadi nxa singekho, siyakuba yikho ngesenzo nxa sikhona.
2Cor 10:12 Ngokuba asinasibindi sokuzilinganisa nokuzifanisa nabathile babo abazincomayo. Kodwa bona, nxa bezilinganisa ngezingqobo zabo, bezifanisa nezingqobo zabo, kaba namqondo.
2Cor 10:13 Kepha thina asiyikuzibonga ngaphezu kokulinganisa, kodwa ngesilinganiso sendawo esiyisilinganiso asilinganisele sona uNkulunkulu, ukuze sifinyelele nakini.
2Cor 10:14 Ngokuba asizeluli ngokweqisa ngokungathi asifinyeleli kini, ngokuba sifikile kwaze kwaba nakini ngevangeli likaKristu,
2Cor 10:15 singazibongi ngemisebenzi yabanye ngaphezu kokulinganisa, kepha sinethemba lokuthi ngokukhula kokukholwa kwenu, siyakukhuliswa kakhulu impela kini endaweni yethu,
2Cor 10:16 size sishumayele ivangeli nasezindaweni ezingaphambi kwakini, singazibongi ngezinto esezenziwe endaweni yomunye.
2Cor 10:17 Kepha ozibongayo makazibonge eNkosini.
2Cor 10:18 Ngokuba akusiye ozincomayo ovunywa abongwe, kepha yilowo iNkosi emncomayo.
2Cor 11:1 Sengathi ningangibekezelela ebuwuleni obuyingcosana, yebo, ngibekezeleleni.
2Cor 11:2 Ngokuba ngiyanishisekela ngokushisekela kukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba nganendisela endodeni eyodwa ukuba nginiyise kuKristu niyintombi emhlophe.
2Cor 11:3 Kepha nginovalo lokuthi njengalokho inyoka yamkhohlisa u-Eva ngobuqili bayo, kanjalo izingqondo zenu mhlawumbe zingadukiswa, ziyeke ubuqotho nobumhlophe ngakuKristu.
2Cor 11:4 Ngokuba uma kufika umuntu eshumayela omunye uJesu esingamshumayelanga, noma namukela omunye umoya eningawamukelanga, noma elinye ivangeli eningalamukelanga, nikubekezelela kakhulu.
2Cor 11:5 Ngokuba ngithi angisilele ngalutho kubaphostoli abaqhamileyo kakhulu.
2Cor 11:6 Noma ngiyibhimbi lokukhuluma, nokho angisilo ngokwazi; lokhu sikubonakalisile kinina ngezindlela zonke ezintweni zonke.
2Cor 11:7 Kumbe ngonile yini ngokuzithoba ukuba niphakanyiswe nina, lokhu nganishumayeza ngesihle ivangeli likaNkulunkulu na?
2Cor 11:8 Ngaphanga amanye amabandla, ngithatha iholo kuwo, ukuba ngikhonze nina;
2Cor 11:9 nalapho ngikhona kini ngiswele, angibanga mthwalo kumuntu, ngokuba abazalwane abavela eMakedoniya bakuqeda ukuswela kwami; ezintweni zonke ngazilinda ukuba nginganisindi, futhi ngisezakuzilinda.
2Cor 11:10 Njengalokhu iqiniso likaKristu likimi, angiyikwaphucwa lolo dumo ezigodini zase-Akhaya.
2Cor 11:11 Ngani na? Ngokuba nginganithandi na? UNkulunkulu uyazi.
2Cor 11:12 Kepha engikwenzayo ngizakukwenza futhi, ukuze ngibaphuce ithuba abafuna ithuba lokuba bafunyanwe benjengathi kulokho abazibonga ngakho.
2Cor 11:13 Ngokuba abanjalo bangabaphostoli bamanga, izisebenzi ezikhohlisayo, beziguqula abaphostoli bakaKristu.
2Cor 11:14 Akumangalisi, ngokuba uSathane uqobo uziguqula ingelosi yokukhanya.
2Cor 11:15 Ngakho akuyinto enkulu, uma nezikhonzi zakhe ziziguqula izikhonzi zokulunga ezikuphela kwazo kuyakuba njengokwemisebenzi yazo.
2Cor 11:16 Ngiyaphinda ngithi: Makungasho muntu ngami ukuthi ngiyisiwula; kepha noma kungaba njalo, nokho ngamukeleni njengesiwula, ukuze nami ngizibonge kancane.
2Cor 11:17 Lokho engikushoyo ngalesi sibindi sokuzibonga, angikusho ngokweNkosi, kodwa ngikusho kungathi ngobuwula.
2Cor 11:18 Lokhu abaningi bezibonga ngokwenyama, nami ngiyakuzibonga.
2Cor 11:19 Ngokuba abayiziwula nibabekezelela ngenjabulo, lokhu ningabahlakaniphileyo,
2Cor 11:20 ngokuba niyabekezela, uma umuntu enenza izigqila, uma enidla, uma enibamba, uma ezikhukhumeza, uma enishaya ebusweni.
2Cor 11:21 Ngisho ngamahloni ukuthi kade sibuthakathaka. Kepha kulokho umuntu anesibindi ngakho — ngikhuluma ngobuwula — nami nginesibindi ngakho.
2Cor 11:22 BangamaHeberu na? Nami. Bangaba-Israyeli na? Nami. Bayinzalo ka-Abrahama na? Nami.
2Cor 11:23 Bayizikhonzi zikaKristu na? Ngikhulumisa okohlanya — ngiyiso kakhulu kunabo; ekukhandlekeni kakhulu kunabo, nasekuboshweni kaningi kunabo, nasekushayweni okukhulu impela, nasezingozini zokufa ngezikhathi eziningi.
2Cor 11:24 KubaJuda ngathola kahlanu imivimbo, kushiywa munye emashumini amane;
2Cor 11:25 ngashaywa kathathu ngezinduku, ngakhandwa kanye ngamatshe, kathathu ngalinyalelwa umkhumbi, ngaba semanzini olwandle ubusuku bunye nemini;
2Cor 11:26 ngangisekuhambeni kaningi, nasezingozini zemifula, nasezingozini zabaphangi, nasezingozini kwabakithi, nasezingozini kwabezizwe, nasezingozini emzini, nasezingozini ehlane, nasezingozini elwandle, nasezingozini kubazalwane bamanga,
2Cor 11:27 ngokukhandleka nangokukhathazeka, kaningi ngokuqwasha ebusuku, ngokulamba nangokoma, kaningi ngokuzila ukudla, nasemakhazeni nangokuhambaze;
2Cor 11:28 ngaphandle kwezinye izinto kukhona okungicindezelayo imihla yonke: ukukhathalela onke amabandla.
2Cor 11:29 Ngubani obuthakathaka ngingebuthakathaka nami na? Ngubani okhubekiswayo kungavuthi kimi na?
2Cor 11:30 Uma ngimelwe ukuzibonga, ngiyakuzibonga ngobuthakathaka bami.
2Cor 11:31 UNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi uJesu, obongekayo phakade naphakade, uyazi ukuthi angiqambi amanga.
2Cor 11:32 EDamaseku induna yenkosi u-Aretha yalinda umuzi wamaDamaseku ukuba ingibambe;
2Cor 11:33 ngehliswa efasiteleni ngesilulu ogangeni, ngaphepha ezandleni zayo.
2Cor 12:1 Kumelwe ukuba ngizibonge noma kungasizi; kepha sengizakuphatha imibono nezambulo zeNkosi.
2Cor 12:2 Ngiyamazi umuntu ekuKristu, sekuyiminyaka eyishumi nane — nakuba wayesemzimbeni angazi, nakuba wayengaphandle komzimba angazi, nguNkulunkulu owaziyo — onjalo wahlwithwa wayiswa kwelesithathu izulu.
2Cor 12:3 Yebo, ngiyamazi umuntu onjalo — nakuba wayesemzimbeni, nakuba wayengekho emzimbeni, angazi, nguNkulunkulu owaziyo —
2Cor 12:4 ukuthi wahlwithwa wayiswa eParadisi, wezwa amazwi angakhulumekiyo, okungavunyelwe ukuba umuntu awakhulume.
2Cor 12:5 Ngonjalo ngizakuzibonga, kepha ngami uqobo angizukuzibonga, kuphela ngobuthakathaka bami.
2Cor 12:6 Ngokuba noma bengingathanda ukuzibonga, bengingezukuba yisiwula; ngokuba bengizakube ngikhuluma iqiniso, kepha ngiyayeka, funa umuntu acabange ngami okungaphezu kwalokho angibona ngiyikho nakuzwayo kimi.
2Cor 12:7 Ngalokho ukuze ngingaziphakamisi kakhulu ngobukhulu bezambulo, nganikwa iva enyameni, ingelosi kaSathane, ukuba ingimukule, ukuze ngingaziphakamisi kakhulu.
2Cor 12:8 Ngayo-ke nganxusa iNkosi kathathu ukuba isuke kimi.
2Cor 12:9 Yathi kimi: “Umusa wami ukwanele; ngokuba amandla ami apheleliswa ebuthakathakeni.” Ngakho kunalokho ngijabulela ukuzibonga ngobuthakathaka bami, ukuze amandla kaKristu ahlale phezu kwami.
2Cor 12:10 Ngakho ngenamile ebuthakathakeni, nasekuphathweni kabi, nasekusweleni, nasekuzingelweni, nasekubandezekeni ngenxa kaKristu, ngokuba uma ngibuthakathaka, yikhona nginamandla.
2Cor 12:11 Sengize ngaba yisiwula; nina ningiphoqile. Ngokuba mina kwakufanele ukuba nginconywe yinina. Ngokuba angisilele ngalutho kubaphostoli abaqhamileyo kakhulu, noma ngingento yalutho.
2Cor 12:12 Impela izibonakaliso zobuphostoli zenziwe kini ngokukhuthazela konke, nangezibonakaliso, nangezimangaliso, nangemisebenzi yamandla.
2Cor 12:13 Ngokuba nancishwani kunamanye amabandla, uma kungeyilokho ukuthi mina angibanga mthwalo kini na? Ngithetheleleni lelo cala.
2Cor 12:14 Bhekani, sekungokwesithathu ngilungele ukuza kini; angiyikuba mthwalo kini, ngokuba angifuni okwenu, kodwa ngifuna nina. Ngokuba akubantwana abafanele ukuqongelela abazali, kodwa abazali baqongelela abantwana.
2Cor 12:15 Kepha ngokujabula okukhulu ngiyakunikela konke, yebo, ngizinikele mina ngenxa yemiphefumulo yenu. Uma nginithanda kakhulu, kanti kuyilapho ngithandwa kancane na?
2Cor 12:16 Kepha makube ngukuthi anginisindanga mina, kodwa lokhu ngiyisihlakaniphi, nganibamba ngobuqili.
2Cor 12:17 Ngake nganiqilizela yini ngomunye walabo engabathumela kini na?
2Cor 12:18 Nganxusa uThithu, ngathuma kanye naye umzalwane; uThithu wake waniqilizela na? Asihambanga ngamoya munye na? Nangamkhondo munye na?
2Cor 12:19 Kade nicabanga ukuthi siyaziphendulela kini. Thina sikhuluma phambi kukaNkulunkulu sikuKristu; kepha konke, bathandwa, kwenzelwa ukwakhiwa kwenu.
2Cor 12:20 Ngokuba nginovalo lokuthi ekufikeni kwami mhlawumbe ngizakunifumana ningenjengalokho engikuthandayo, nami ngifunyanwe yinina nginjengalokho eningakuthandiyo, mhlawumbe kube khona ukuphikisana, nomhawu, nokuthukuthela, nemibango, nenhlebo, nokuceba, nokukhukhumala, neziyaluyalu,
2Cor 12:21 funa kuthi ekufikeni kwami futhi uNkulunkulu wami angithobise phambi kwenu, ngililele abaningi abakade bonile, bengaphendukanga kukho ukungcola nobufebe namanyala abakwenzileyo.
2Cor 13:1 Lokhu kungokwesithathu ngiza kini. “Ngemilomo yawofakazi ababili nabathathu izindaba zonke ziyakuqiniswa.”
2Cor 13:2 Besengishilo ngaphambili kulabo abakade bonile nakubo bonke abanye, nakalokhu ngisho ngaphambili — ngisho manje ngingekho, njengalokho ngasho ngikhona ngokwesibili — ukuthi nxa ngifika futhi, angiyikuyekethisa.
2Cor 13:3 Ngokuba nifuna ubufakazi bokuthi kunguKristu okhulumayo kimi, yena ongebuthakathaka ngakini, kepha unamandla phakathi kwenu.
2Cor 13:4 Ngokuba noma wabethelwa esiphambanweni ngobuthakathaka, nokho uyaphila ngamandla kaNkulunkulu. Ngokuba nathi sibuthakathaka kuye, kodwa sizakuphila kanye naye ngamandla kaNkulunkulu ngakini.
2Cor 13:5 Zihloleni nina, nibone ukuba nisekukholweni yini, nizivivinye nina. Kanti anizazeli yini ukuthi uJesu Kristu ukinina? Uma kungenjalo, ningabokwaliwa.
2Cor 13:6 Kepha ngiyethemba ukuthi nizakwazi ukuthi thina asisibo abokwaliwa.
2Cor 13:7 Siyakhuleka kuNkulunkulu ukuba ningenzi lutho olubi, angisho ukuze sibonakale thina singabavunyiweyo kepha ukuba nina nikwenze okuhle, noma thina singaba njengabaliwayo.
2Cor 13:8 Ngokuba asinamandla okwenza utho, uma simelana neqiniso, kuphela uma simela iqiniso.
2Cor 13:9 Ngokuba siyajabula, nxa sibuthakathaka thina, nina-ke ninamandla; sikukhulekela nalokhu: ukupheleliswa kwenu.
2Cor 13:10 Ngalokho ngiloba lezi zinto ngingekho, ukuze, nxa ngikhona, ngingenzi kabukhali ngokwamandla eyanginika wona iNkosi, kube ngawokwakha, kungabi ngawokubhidliza.
2Cor 13:11 Elokugcina, bazalwane, thokozani, nipheleliswe, niduduzwe, nibe nhliziyonye, nibe nokuthula; khona uNkulunkulu wothando nokuthula uyakuba nani.
2Cor 13:12 Bingelelanani ngokwanga okungcwele.
2Cor 13:13 Abangcwele bonke bayakhonza kini.
2Cor 13:14 Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu, nothando lukaNkulunkulu, nokuhlangana kukaMoya oNgcwele makube nani nonke. Amen.
Gal 1:1 UPawulu, umphostoli ongaveli kubantu noma ngomuntu, kodwa ngoJesu Kristu noNkulunkulu uYise owamvusa kwabafileyo,
Gal 1:2 nabazalwane bonke abanami kuwo amabandla aseGalathiya:
Gal 1:3 Makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba wethu naseNkosini yethu uJesu Kristu
Gal 1:4 owazinikela ngenxa yezono zethu, ukuze asophule kuleli zwe elibi lamanje ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu uBaba wethu;
Gal 1:5 makube kuye udumo kuze kube phakade. Amen.
Gal 1:6 Ngiyamangala ngokuba nimhlubuka masinya kangaka yena owanibizela emuseni kaKristu, niye kwelinye ivangeli,
Gal 1:7 elingesilo elinye, kuphela ukuba bakhona abanididayo, bethanda ukuphendukezela ivangeli likaKristu.
Gal 1:8 Kepha-ke noma kungaba yithina noma ingelosi evela ezulwini enishumayeza ivangeli eliphambene nalelo esanishumayeza lona, makabe ngoqalekisiweyo.
Gal 1:9 Njengalokho sesishilo, ngisaphinda nakalokhu, ngithi: Uma umuntu enishumayeza ivangeli eliphambene nalelo enalamukelayo, makabe ngoqalekisiweyo.
Gal 1:10 Ngokuba manje ngizincengela kubantu noma kuNkulunkulu na? Kukho, ngifuna ukuzikholekisa kubantu yini? Uma bengisazikholekisa kubantu, kungaba angisiyo inceku kaKristu.
Gal 1:11 Ngokuba ngiyanazisa, bazalwane, ukuba ivangeli elishunyayelwe yimina alisilo elingokwabantu.
Gal 1:12 Ngokuba nami angilamukeliswanga ngumuntu, futhi angilifundiswanga, kepha ngilithole ngokwambulelwa nguJesu Kristu.
Gal 1:13 Nizwile phela lokhu ngenkambo yami yakuqala ebuJudeni ukuthi ngalizingela kakhulu ibandla likaNkulunkulu, ngalichitha,
Gal 1:14 futhi ebuJudeni ngabadlula abaningi abayintanga yami kwabakithi, ngishisekela kakhulu kunabo amasiko awokhokho.
Gal 1:15 Kepha-ke mhla kwaba kuhle kuNkulunkulu owangahlukanisela kwasesiswini sikamame, wangibiza ngomusa wakhe
Gal 1:16 ukuba ayambule iNdodana yakhe kimi, ukuze ngiyishumayele phakathi kwabezizwe, khona lapho angibuzananga nenyama negazi,
Gal 1:17 futhi angenyukelanga eJerusalema kubona ababe ngabaphostoli ngaphambi kwami, kodwa ngamuka ngaya e-Arabiya, ngaphinda ngabuyela eDamaseku.
Gal 1:18 Kwathi emva kweminyaka emithathu ngenyukela eJerusalema ukubona uKhefase; ngahlala kuye izinsuku eziyishumi nanhlanu.
Gal 1:19 Kepha angibonanga omunye wabaphostoli, kuphela uJakobe umnawe weNkosi.
Gal 1:20 Kulokhu-ke enginilobela khona bhekani, phambi kukaNkulunkulu, angiqambi amanga.
Gal 1:21 Emva kwalokho ngeza emazweni aseSiriya naseKhilikhiya.
Gal 1:22 Ngangisengongaziwayo ngobuso emabandleni aseJudiya akuKristu,
Gal 1:23 abesezwile nje ukuthi: “Lowo okade esizingela useshumayela ukukholwa akade ekuchitha.”
Gal 1:24 Ayesedumisa uNkulunkulu ngami.
Gal 2:1 Kwathi emva kweminyaka eyishumi nane ngabuye ngenyukela eJerusalema kanye noBarnaba, ngithatha noThithu futhi.
Gal 2:2 Kepha ngenyukela ngambulelwe; ngabalandisa ivangeli engilishumayela phakathi kwabezizwe, kepha phambi kwabadumileyo bebodwa, funa mhlawumbe kungaba ngukuthi ngigijimela ize, noma sengagijimela ize.
Gal 2:3 Kepha ngisho noThithu owayenami engumGreki kaphoqwanga ukuba asoke.
Gal 2:4 Kepha kwaba ngenxa yabazalwane bamanga abangeniswa ngasese, abangena ngokunyenya, bezakuhlola ukukhululeka kwethu esinakho kuKristu Jesu, ukuze basenze izigqila,
Gal 2:5 esingabahlehlelanga nasikhashana ngokubathobela, ukuze iqiniso levangeli lime njalo kinina.
Gal 2:6 Kepha kwabadumile ngokuthi bayinto — nokuba babe yini, akulutho kimi; uNkulunkulu akakhethi ubuso bamuntu — ngokuba kimi abadumileyo abenezelanga lutho.
Gal 2:7 Kepha kunalokho, lapho bebona ukuthi ngithenjiwe ngevangeli kwabangasokiyo njengoPetru kwabasokayo,
Gal 2:8 ngokuba yena owanika uPetru amandla ukuba abe ngumphostoli wabasokayo wanginika nami amandla ukuba ngibe ngumphostoli wabezizwe,
Gal 2:9 bathi ukubona umusa engiwuphiweyo, oJakobe noKhefase noJohane, ababaziswa ngokuthi bayizinsika, banika mina noBarnaba isandla sokunene sokuhlangana ukuba thina siye kwabezizwe, kepha bona baye kwabasokayo,
Gal 2:10 kuphela ukuba sikhumbule abampofu, eyonanto nami ebengikhuthalele ukuyenza.
Gal 2:11 Kepha ekufikeni kukaKhefase e-Antiyokiya ngamelana naye ubuso nobuso, ngokuba wayenecala.
Gal 2:12 Ngokuba bengakafiki abanye ababevela kuJakobe, wayedla nabezizwe; kepha kuthe ukuba kufike bona, wamonyuka, wazahlukanisa nabo, esaba abokusoka.
Gal 2:13 Nabanye abaJuda futhi bazenzisa kanye naye, waze wathatheka noBarnaba ngokuzenzisa kwabo.
Gal 2:14 Kepha kuthe sengibonile ukuthi kabahambisi ngokweqiniso levangeli, ngathi kuKhefase phambi kwabo bonke: “Uma wena ongumJuda uhamba ngokwabezizwe, ungahambi ngokwabaJuda, ubaphoqa kanjani abezizwe ukuba bahambe ngokwabaJuda na?
Gal 2:15 “Thina singabaJuda ngemvelo, singesizo izoni zabezizwe;
Gal 2:16 kepha lokhu sazi ukuthi umuntu akalungisiswa ngemisebenzi yomthetho, kuphela ngokukholwa nguKristu Jesu, nathi sakholwa nguKristu Jesu ukuba silungisiswe ngokukholwa nguKristu kungengemisebenzi yomthetho; ngokuba ngemisebenzi yomthetho akuyikulungisiswa nyama.
Gal 2:17 “Kepha uma thina, lapho sifuna ukulungisiswa ngoKristu, nathi uqobo safunyanwa siyizoni, kanti uKristu uyisikhonzi sesono na? Qha nakanye.
Gal 2:18 Ngokuba uma ngibuye ngakhe engikudilizileyo, ngifakaza ukuthi ngingoweqa umthetho.
Gal 2:19 Ngokuba ngomthetho mina ngafa kuwo umthetho, ukuze ngiphilele uNkulunkulu. Ngibethelwe kanye noKristu;
Gal 2:20 akuseyimi ophilayo, kepha uKristu uphila kimi; kodwa ukuphila engikuphilayo kalokhu enyameni ngikuphila ngokukholwa, okungukukholwa yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu eyangithandayo, yazinikela ngenxa yami.
Gal 2:21 Angiwenzi ize umusa kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba uma ukulunga kuya ngomthetho, khona uKristu wafela ize.”
Gal 3:1 O nina maGalathiya angaqondiyo! Ngubani oniloyileyo nina enalotshelwa phambi kwamehlo enu umfanekiso kaJesu Kristu ebethelwe esiphambanweni na?
Gal 3:2 Yilokhu kuphela engithanda ukukwazi kinina ukuthi: Namukeliswa uMoya ngemisebenzi yomthetho noma ngezwi lokukholwa na?
Gal 3:3 Niwulekile kangaka na? Niqalile kuMoya seniyakugcina enyameni na?
Gal 3:4 Nahlupheka kangaka ngeze na? uma kambe kungeze.
Gal 3:5 Ngakho yena oninikayo uMoya noveza imisebenzi yamandla phakathi kwenu ukwenza ngemisebenzi yomthetho noma ngezwi lokukholwa na?
Gal 3:6 Njengalokho u-Abrahama wakholwa nguNkulunkulu, kwabalelwa kuye ukuthi ngukulunga.
Gal 3:7 Yazini-ke ukuthi abokukholwa yibona abangamadodana ka-Abrahama.
Gal 3:8 Kepha umbhalo, ubona ngaphambili ukuthi uNkulunkulu uzakulungisisa abezizwe ngokukholwa, walishumayela ngaphambili ivangeli ku-Abrahama, wathi: “Izizwe zonke ziyakubusiswa kuwe.”
Gal 3:9 Njalo-ke abokukholwa bayabusiswa kanye no-Abrahama okholwayo.
Gal 3:10 Ngokuba bonke abemisebenzi yomthetho baphansi kwesiqalekiso, ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Baqalekisiwe bonke abangemi njalo kukho konke okulotshiweyo encwadini yomthetho ukuba bakwenze.”
Gal 3:11 Kepha ukuthi ngomthetho akukho muntu olungisiswayo phambi kukaNkulunkulu kusobala, ngokuba olungileyo uzakuphila ngokukholwa;
Gal 3:12 ngokuba umthetho awusiwo owokukholwa, kodwa owenza lokho uyakuphila ngakho.
Gal 3:13 UKristu wasihlenga esiqalekisweni somthetho, ebenziwe isiqalekiso ngenxa yethu, ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Baqalekisiwe bonke abalenga emthini,”
Gal 3:14 ukuba isibusiso sika-Abrahama ngoKristu Jesu sifike kubo abezizwe, ukuze samukeliswe isithembiso sikaMoya ngokukholwa.
Gal 3:15 Bazalwane, ngikhulumisa okwabantu: nokuba kuyintando yokugcina yomuntu eyaqiniswayo, akakho oyichithayo noma enezele kuyo.
Gal 3:16 Manje-ke izithembiso zanikwa u-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe; akasho ukuthi: “Ezinzalweni,” kungathi ngeziningi, kepha kungathi ngeyodwa ukuthi: Nasenzalweni yakho enguKristu.
Gal 3:17 Kepha ngisho lokhu ukuthi isivumelwano esaqiniswa nguNkulunkulu ngaphambili, umthetho owavela emva kweminyaka engamakhulu amane namashumi amathathu, awusesuli, uze usichithe isithembiso;
Gal 3:18 ngokuba uma ifa likhona ngomthetho, alikho ngesithembiso; kepha uNkulunkulu umnikile lona u-Abrahama ngesithembiso.
Gal 3:19 Pho, umthetho uyini na? Wenezelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko, kuze kufike inzalo enikiwe isithembiso, umisiwe ngezingelosi, ngesandla somlamuleli.
Gal 3:20 Kepha umlamuleli kasiye owamunye; kepha uNkulunkulu munye.
Gal 3:21 Pho-ke, umthetho uphambene nezithembiso zikaNkulunkulu na? Qha nakanye. Ngokuba uma wawunikiwe umthetho onamandla okuphilisa, ngempela ukulungisiswa ngakuya ngomthetho.
Gal 3:22 Kepha umbhalo uvalele konke phansi kwesono, ukuze isithembiso ngokukholwa nguJesu Kristu siphiwe abakholwayo.
Gal 3:23 Kepha kungakafiki ukukholwa, sasigcinwa phansi komthetho, sivalelwe kuze kufike ukukholwa obekuzakwambulwa.
Gal 3:24 Njalo-ke umthetho sewaba ngumlayi wethu wokusiyisa kuKristu, ukuze silungisiswe ngokukholwa.
Gal 3:25 Kepha-ke sekufikile ukukholwa, asisephansi komlayi.
Gal 3:26 Ngokuba nonke ningabantwana bakaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa kuKristu.
Gal 3:27 Ngokuba nonke enabhapathizelwa kuKristu nembatha uKristu.
Gal 3:28 Akakho umJuda nomGreki, akakho oboshiweyo nokhululekileyo, akakho owesilisa nowesifazane, ngokuba nina nonke nimunye kuKristu Jesu.
Gal 3:29 Kepha uma ningabakaKristu, seniyinzalo ka-Abrahama, niyizindlalifa ngokwesithembiso.
Gal 4:1 Kepha ngithi ngesikhathi indlalifa iseyingane, kayahlukile ngalutho encekwini, ingani iyinkosi yakho konke;
Gal 4:2 kodwa iphansi kwabaphathi nababonisi, kuze kube yisikhathi esamiswa nguyise ngaphambili.
Gal 4:3 Kanjalo nathi, lapho siseyizingane, sasisebugqileni phansi kwezifundiso zobungane zezwe;
Gal 4:4 kepha lapho sekufikile ukuphelela kwesikhathi, uNkulunkulu wathuma iNdodana yakhe, izelwe ngowesifazane, izelwe phansi komthetho,
Gal 4:5 ukuze ihlenge abaphansi komthetho ukuba samukele ukuma kwamadodana.
Gal 4:6 Lokhu ningamadodana, uNkulunkulu uthumile uMoya weNdodana yakhe ezinhliziyweni zenu omemeza ethi: “Aba, Baba!”
Gal 4:7 Njalo-ke awuseyiyo inceku, kepha usuyindodana; kepha uma uyindodana, uyindlalifa futhi ngaye uNkulunkulu.
Gal 4:8 Kepha ngaleso sikhathi ningamazi uNkulunkulu naniyizigqila phansi kwalabo abangesibo onkulunkulu ngemvelo;
Gal 4:9 kepha manje, njengalokhu senimazi uNkulunkulu, yebo, phezu kwalokho, niyaziwa nguNkulunkulu, kukanjani ukuba nibuyele ezifundisweni zobungane ezilulana nezingelutho, enithanda ukuphinda nibe yizigqila zazo na?
Gal 4:10 Nigcina izinsuku, nezinyanga, nezikhathi, neminyaka.
Gal 4:11 Nginovalo ngani ukuthi mhlawumbe nginihluphekele ngeze.
Gal 4:12 Yibani njengami, ngokuba nami nginjengani; bazalwane, ngiyanincenga. Aningonanga ngalutho;
Gal 4:13 kepha niyazi ukuthi kwaba ngenxa yobuthakathaka benyama ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kini okokuqala,
Gal 4:14 nokulingwa kwenu ngenyama yami anikudelelanga, aninengwanga yikho, kodwa nangamukela ngokungathi ngiyingelosi kaNkulunkulu, ngokungathi nginguKristu Jesu.
Gal 4:15 Pho, sekwayaphi ukuzihalalisela kwenu na? Ngokuba ngiyanifakazela ngokuthi, uma kwakungenzeka, nanizakukhipha amehlo enu, ninginike wona.
Gal 4:16 Konje sengaba yisitha kini ngokunishumayeza iqiniso na?
Gal 4:17 Banishisekela ngokungekuhle, yebo, bafuna ukunivalela ngaphandle, ukuze nishisekele bona.
Gal 4:18 Kepha kuhle ukushisekelelwa ngento enhle njalonjalo, kungabi nxa ngikhona kini kuphela,
Gal 4:19 bantwana bami, enginemihelo futhi ngani, uKristu aze abunjwe phakathi kini;
Gal 4:20 kepha bengingathanda ngibe khona kini manje, ngiguqule izwi lami, ngokuba ngididekile ngani.
Gal 4:21 Ngitsheleni nina enithanda ukuba phansi komthetho, aniwuzwa yini umthetho na?
Gal 4:22 Ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi u-Abrahama wayenamadodana amabili, enye kuso isigqilakazi nenye kokhululekileyo.
Gal 4:23 Kodwa eyesigqilakazi izelwe ngokwenyama, kepha eyokhululekileyo izelwe ngesithembiso.
Gal 4:24 Lokhu kungukufanekisa; ngokuba laba bayizivumelwano ezimbili, esinye ngesasentabeni yaseSinayi, esizalela ubugqila, esinguHagari.
Gal 4:25 Kepha uHagari lo uyintaba yaseSinayi e-Arabiya, eqondene neJerusalema lakalokhu, ngokuba lisebugqileni nabantwana balo.
Gal 4:26 Kepha iJerusalema eliphezulu likhululekile, lona lingumame wethu.
Gal 4:27 Ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: “Thokoza wena nyumba ongazaliyo; mpompoloza wena ongenamihelo; ngokuba abantwana boyisikhwebu baningi kunabakhe onendoda.”
Gal 4:28 Kepha nina bazalwane, njengo-Isaka ningabantwana besithembiso.
Gal 4:29 Kepha njengakuleso sikhathi owazalwa ngokwenyama wazingela owazalwa ngokoMoya, kunjalo-ke namanje.
Gal 4:30 Kodwa umbhalo uthini na? Uthi: “Xosha isigqilakazi nendodana yaso, ngokuba indodana yesigqilakazi ayisoze yalidla ifa kanye nendodana yokhululekileyo.”
Gal 4:31 Ngakho-ke, bazalwane, asisibo abantwana besigqilakazi, singabokhululekileyo.
Gal 5:1 UKristu wasikhulula ukuba sibe nenkululeko; ngakho-ke yimani niqine, ningabe nisaboshelwa ejokeni lobugqila.
Gal 5:2 Bhekani, mina Pawulu ngithi kini, uma nisoka, uKristu kayikunisiza ngalutho.
Gal 5:3 Ngiyaphinda ngiqinisa kumuntu wonke osokayo ukuthi unecala lokugcina umthetho wonke.
Gal 5:4 Nahlukene noKristu nina nonke enifuna ukulungisiswa ngomthetho; niwile emseni.
Gal 5:5 Ngokuba thina ngaye uMoya sihlalela ithemba lokulungisiswa ngokukholwa.
Gal 5:6 Ngokuba kuKristu Jesu akusizi lutho ukusoka nokungasoki, kepha kuphela ukukholwa okusebenza ngothando.
Gal 5:7 Benigijima kahle; pho, nithiywe ngubani ukuba ningalaleli iqiniso na?
Gal 5:8 Lokho kuyenga akuveli konibizayo.
Gal 5:9 Imvubelo eyingcosana ibilisa inhlama yonke.
Gal 5:10 Nginethemba ngani eNkosini ukuthi aniyikuba nawo omunye umqondo; kepha onikhathazayo uyakuthwala ukwahlulelwa kwakhe, noma engubani.
Gal 5:11 Kepha mina, bazalwane, uma ngisashumayela ukusoka, ngisazingelelwani na? Ngabe siphelile isikhubekiso sesiphambano.
Gal 5:12 Sengathi bangazihuna abaninyakazisayo.
Gal 5:13 Ngokuba nina bazalwane nabizelwa ekukhululekeni. Kuphela ningakwenzi ukukhululeka kube yithuba enyameni, kepha khonzanani ngothando.
Gal 5:14 Ngokuba umthetho wonke ugcwalisiwe ezwini linye lokuthi: “Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengokuba uzithanda wena.”
Gal 5:15 Kepha uma nilumana, nidlana, qaphelani ukuba ningaqedani.
Gal 5:16 Kepha ngithi: Hambani ngoMoya, khona aniyikufeza izinkanuko zenyama.
Gal 5:17 Ngokuba inyama ikhanuka okuphambene noMoya, kepha uMoya ukhanuka okuphambene nenyama; ngokuba lezi zinto ziyamelana, ukuze ningenzi lokho enikuthandayo.
Gal 5:18 Kepha uma niholwa nguMoya, aniphansi komthetho.
Gal 5:19 Kepha imisebenzi yenyama isobala, engukuthi: ubufebe, nokungcola, namanyala,
Gal 5:20 nokukhonza izithombe, nokuthakatha, nobutha, nokulwa, nomona, nokuthukuthela, nokubanga, nokwalana, nokwahlukana,
Gal 5:21 nomhawu, nokudakwa, nokuxokozela, nokunjalo engandulela ukunitshela ngakho, njengokuba senganitshela ukuthi abenza okunje abayikulidla ifa lombuso kaNkulunkulu.
Gal 5:22 Kepha izithelo zikaMoya ziluthando, nokujabula, nokuthula, nokubekezela, nobubele, nobuvi, nokukholeka,
Gal 5:23 nobumnene, nokuzithiba. Akukho mthetho omelana nokunjalo.
Gal 5:24 Kepha abakaKristu Jesu babethele esiphambanweni inyama kanye nokuhuheka nezinkanuko.
Gal 5:25 Uma siphila ngoMoya, masihambe futhi ngoMoya.
Gal 5:26 Masingafuni udumo oluze, siqalana, sifelane umhawu.
Gal 6:1 Bazalwane, uma umuntu ehlelwa yisiphambeko, nina bomoya mbuyiseni onjalo ngomoya wobumnene; uzibheke wena, funa uyengwe nawe.
Gal 6:2 Thwalisanani imithwalo yenu, nigcwalise kanjalo umthetho kaKristu.
Gal 6:3 Ngokuba uma umuntu ezishaya utho, engelutho, uyazikhohlisa.
Gal 6:4 Kepha makube yilowo nalowo ahlole owakhe umsebenzi, yikhona eyakuba nokubongwa ngokungokwakhe yedwa, kungengokomunye,
Gal 6:5 ngokuba yilowo nalowo uyakuthwala owakhe umthwalo.
Gal 6:6 Kepha yena ofundiswa izwi makahlanganyele nalowo omfundisayo kuzo zonke izinto ezinhle.
Gal 6:7 Ningaduki; uNkulunkulu akahlekwa. Ngokuba lokho akuhlwanyelayo umuntu, lokho wokuvuna.
Gal 6:8 Ngokuba ohlwanyelela inyama yakhe uyakuvuna ukubhubha kuyo inyama; kepha ohlwanyelela uMoya uyakuvuna ukuphila okuphakade kuMoya.
Gal 6:9 Kepha masingakhathali ekwenzeni okuhle, ngokuba siyakuvuna ngesikhathi esifaneleyo, uma singadangali.
Gal 6:10 Ngakho-ke njengokuba sinethuba, asenze okuhle kubo bonke, kepha ikakhulu kwabendlu yokukholwa.
Gal 6:11 Ake nibone ukuloba okungaka enginilobele ngakho ngesami isandla.
Gal 6:12 Bonke abafuna ukubukeka enyameni, yibona abaniphoqela ukusoka, kuphela ukuba bangayikuzingelwa ngenxa yesiphambano sikaKristu.
Gal 6:13 Ngokuba ngisho bona abasokayo nabo kabawugcini umthetho, kodwa bathanda ukuba nisoke, ukuze bazibonge ngenyama yenu.
Gal 6:14 Kepha kimi makungabikho nakanye ukuzibonga, kuphela ngesiphambano seNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, okubethelwe ngaye izwe kimi nami kulo izwe.
Gal 6:15 Ngokuba nakusoka nakungasoki akulutho, isidalwa esisha kuphela.
Gal 6:16 Bonke abahamba ngale ndlela makube kubo ukuthula nesihawu, yebo, ku-Israyeli kaNkulunkulu.
Gal 6:17 Mangingabe ngisakhathazwa muntu, ngokuba ngiphethe emzimbeni wami izimpawu zikaJesu.
Gal 6:18 Umusa weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu mawube nomoya wenu, bazalwane. Amen.
Eph 1:1 UPawulu, umphostoli kaKristu Jesu ngentando kaNkulunkulu, kubo abangcwele abase-Efesu nakubo abakholwa nguKristu Jesu:
Eph 1:2 Makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba wethu naseNkosini uJesu Kristu.
Eph 1:3 Makabongwe uNkulunkulu, uYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu osibusisile ezulwini kuKristu ngesibusiso sonke sokomoya,
Eph 1:4 njengalokho asikhethela kuye ngothando ngaphambi kokusekelwa kwezwe ukuba sibe ngcwele, singabi nakusolwa phambi kwakhe;
Eph 1:5 wasimisela ngaphambili ukuba sibe ngabantwana kuye ngoJesu Kristu, njengalokho kwaba kuhle kuye ngentando yakhe,
Eph 1:6 ukuze kutuswe inkazimulo yomusa wakhe asiphe wona ngesihle ngaye oThandiweyo;
Eph 1:7 esinokuhlengwa kuye ngegazi lakhe, ukuthethelelwa kwezono ngokwengcebo yomusa wakhe
Eph 1:8 awuvamisa kithi ngakho konke ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda,
Eph 1:9 esazisa imfihlakalo yentando yakhe njengokuzibonela kwakhe azimisela khona ngaphambili,
Eph 1:10 kuze kube yihlelo lokuphelela kwezikhathi lokuba kuhlanganiselwe ndawonye kuKristu konke okusezulwini nokusemhlabeni;
Eph 1:11 kuyena esabelwa futhi ifa kuye, esakumiselwa ngaphambili ngokwesimiso salowo osebenza izinto zonke ngokunquma kwentando yakhe,
Eph 1:12 ukuze sibe ludumo lwenkazimulo yakhe, thina esethemba ngaphambili kuKristu;
Eph 1:13 kuye nani esenizwile izwi leqiniso, ivangeli lokusindiswa kwenu, enakholwa nguye futhi, nani nabekwa uphawu olunguMoya oNgcwele wesithembiso
Eph 1:14 oyisibambiso sefa lethu, kube ngukuhlengwa kokungokwakhe, ukuze kutuswe inkazimulo yakhe.
Eph 1:15 Ngalokho nami, sengizwile ngokukholwa okukini eNkosini uJesu nothando kubo bonke abangcwele,
Eph 1:16 angiyeki ukubonga ngenxa yenu, nginikhumbula emikhulekweni yami,
Eph 1:17 ukuze uNkulunkulu weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, uYise wenkazimulo, aniphe umoya wokuhlakanipha nokwambulelwa ekumazini yena;
Eph 1:18 ekhanyisiwe amehlo enhliziyo yenu, nize nazi okuyithemba lobizo lwakhe nokuyingcebo yenkazimulo yefa lakhe kubo abangcwele,
Eph 1:19 nokungubukhulu obumangalisayo bamandla akhe kithina esikholwayo, ngokokusebenza kwamandla akhe amakhulu
Eph 1:20 asebenze ngawo kuKristu emvusa kwabafileyo, wamhlalisa ngakwesokunene sakhe ezulwini,
Eph 1:21 ngaphezu kwakho konke ukubusa, negunya, namandla, nobukhosi, namagama onke aphathwayo, kungekuleli zwe lodwa kepha nakulo elizayo;
Eph 1:22 wakubeka konke phansi kwezinyawo zakhe, wammisa abe yinhloko phezu kwakho konke kulo ibandla,
Eph 1:23 elona lingumzimba wakhe, ukugcwala kwakhe ogcwalisa konke kubo bonke.
Eph 2:1 Uniphilisile nani enanifile ngeziphambeko nangezono zenu,
Eph 2:2 enanikade nihamba kuzo ngokwendlela yaleli zwe, ngokombusi wamandla omkhathi, ongumoya osasebenza kubantwana bokungalaleli,
Eph 2:3 esasikade sihamba phakathi kwabo sonke ezinkanukweni zenyama yethu, senza intando yenyama neyengqondo; ngemvelo sasingabantwana bolaka njengabo abanye.
Eph 2:4 Kepha uNkulunkulu ecebile ngesihawu, ngenxa yothando lwakhe olukhulu asithanda ngalo,
Eph 2:5 sesifile ngeziphambeko, wenza siphile kanye noKristu — kungomusa nisindisiwe —
Eph 2:6 wasivusa kanye naye, wasihlalisa kanye naye embusweni wezulu kuKristu Jesu,
Eph 2:7 kuze kuthi ezikhathini ezizayo abonakalise ingcebo enkulu yomusa wakhe ngobubele kithina kuKristu Jesu.
Eph 2:8 Ngokuba ngomusa nisindisiwe ngokukholwa; nalokhu akuveli kini, kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu;
Eph 2:9 akuveli ngemisebenzi, ukuze kungabikho ozibongayo.
Eph 2:10 Ngokuba singumsebenzi wakhe kuKristu Jesu, sidalelwe imisebenzi emihle ayilungisela ngaphambili uNkulunkulu ukuba sihambe kuyo.
Eph 2:11 Ngakho khumbulani ukuthi nina enanikade ningabezizwe ngokwenyama, ababizwa ngokuthi abangasoki yilabo ababizwa ngokuthi abokusoka, okwenziwa ngezandla enyameni,
Eph 2:12 ukuthi ngaleso sikhathi naningenaye uKristu, naningaphandle kombuso ka-Israyeli, naningabafokazi ezivumelwaneni zesithembiso, ningenathemba, ningenaNkulunkulu ezweni.
Eph 2:13 Kepha manje kuKristu Jesu nina enanikade nikude senenziwe abaseduze ngegazi likaKristu.
Eph 2:14 Ngokuba yena ungukuthula kwethu, owenza kokubili kwaba kunye, nowabhidliza udonga olwahlukanisayo olungubutha,
Eph 2:15 ngenyama yakhe ewenzile ize umthetho wemiyalo esezimisweni ukuba adale kuyena labo ababili babe muntu munye omusha, enze ukuthula,
Eph 2:16 enze futhi ukuba bobabili babuyisane noNkulunkulu emzimbeni munye ngesiphambano, esebulele ubutha ngakho.
Eph 2:17 Weza washumayela ivangeli lokuthula kinina enanikude, yebo, ukuthula nakubo abaseduze.
Eph 2:18 Ngokuba ngaye sinokungena sobabili ngoMoya munye kuYise.
Eph 2:19 Ngakho aniseyibo abafokazi nezihambi, kodwa senimbuso munye nabangcwele, ningabendlu kaNkulunkulu,
Eph 2:20 nakhiwe phezu kwesisekelo sabaphostoli nabaprofethi, uKristu Jesu uqobo lwakhe eyitshe legumbi,
Eph 2:21 okuhlanganiselwe kuye isakhiwo sonke, sikhule sibe yithempeli elingcwele eNkosini,
Eph 2:22 okukuyo nani, nakhiwe kanye nabanye, ukuba nibe yindlu kaNkulunkulu ngoMoya.
Eph 3:1 Ngenxa yalokho mina Pawulu ngiyisiboshwa sikaKristu Jesu ngenxa yenu nina bezizwe —
Eph 3:2 uma ngabe senizwile ngohlelo lomusa kaNkulunkulu engiwuphiweyo ngenxa yenu
Eph 3:3 ukuthi ngaziswa imfihlakalo ngesambulo, njengalokho sengaloba ngokufushane —
Eph 3:4 okungakho, nxa nikufunda, ningaqonda ukwazi kwami ngemfihlakalo kaKristu,
Eph 3:5 bengayaziswanga abantwana babantu ezizukulwaneni ezinye, njengalokhu isiyambuliwe manje kubaphostoli bakhe abangcwele nabaprofethi ngoMoya
Eph 3:6 ukuthi abezizwe bayizindlalifa kanye nathi, nokuthi bamzimba munye nathi, nokuthi bangabahlanganyeli besithembiso kanye nathi kuKristu Jesu ngevangeli;
Eph 3:7 engenziwa isikhonzi salo ngokwesipho somusa kaNkulunkulu engiwuphiwe ngokokusebenza kwamandla akhe.
Eph 3:8 Mina engimncinyane kunabo bonke abangcwele ngaphiwa lowo musa wokushumayeza abezizwe ivangeli lengcebo kaKristu engaphenyekiyo
Eph 3:9 nokubakhanyisela ukuthi luyini uhlelo lwemfihlakalo ebifihliwe kwaphakade kuNkulunkulu owadala izinto zonke,
Eph 3:10 ukuze imibuso nabanamandla emazulwini baziswe manje ngebandla ukuhlakanipha okuninginingi kukaNkulunkulu,
Eph 3:11 ngokwecebo laphakade alenza ngoKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu;
Eph 3:12 okungaye sinesibindi ukungena ngokwethemba, ngokukholwa nguye.
Eph 3:13 Ngalokho ngiyacela ukuba ningadangali ngezinhlupheko zami ngenxa yenu, okuludumo lwenu.
Eph 3:14 Ngenxa yalokho ngiguqa ngamadolo ami kuYise,
Eph 3:15 eyethiwa ngaye imindeni yonke ezulwini nasemhlabeni,
Eph 3:16 ukuba ngokwengcebo yenkazimulo yakhe aninike ukuqiniseka emandleni ngoMoya wakhe kumuntu ongaphakathi;
Eph 3:17 uKristu ahlale ezinhliziyweni zenu ngokukholwa, ukuze nigxile, nisekelwe othandweni,
Eph 3:18 nibe namandla okuqonda kanye nabangcwele bonke okungububanzi, nobude, nokuphakama, nokujula,
Eph 3:19 nokulwazi uthando lukaKristu oludlula ukwazi konke, ukuze nigcwaliswe kube ngukugcwala konke kukaNkulunkulu.
Eph 3:20 Kepha yena onamandla okwenza okukhulu kakhulu kunakho konke esikucelayo nesikuqondayo ngokwamandla asebenza kithi,
Eph 3:21 makube kuye udumo ebandleni nakuKristu Jesu ezizukulwaneni zonke zaphakade naphakade. Amen.
Eph 4:1 Ngakho mina siboshwa eNkosini ngiyanincenga ukuba nihambe ngokufanele ukubizwa enabizwa ngakho,
Eph 4:2 ngokuthobeka konke nobumnene, ngokubheka kade nokubekezelelana ngothando,
Eph 4:3 nikhuthalele ukugcina ubunye bukaMoya ngesibopho sokuthula;
Eph 4:4 munye umzimba, munye uMoya, njengalokho nabizelwa ethembeni linye lokubizwa kwenu;
Eph 4:5 yinye iNkosi, yinye inkolo, munye umbhapathizo;
Eph 4:6 munye uNkulunkulu, uYise wabo bonke, ophezu kwabo bonke, okubo bonke, ophakathi kwabo bonke.
Eph 4:7 Kepha yilowo nalowo kithina uphiwe umusa ngokwesilinganiso sesipho sikaKristu.
Eph 4:8 Ngalokho uthi: “Esenyukele phezulu wathumba abathunjiweyo, wapha abantu izipho.”
Eph 4:9 Kepha lokhu ukuthi wenyuka, kuthini, uma kungesikho ukuthi wake wehlela ezindaweni zomhlaba eziphansi na?
Eph 4:10 Owehlayo nguyena owenyukela futhi ngaphezu kwamazulu onke, ukuze agcwalise konke.
Eph 4:11 Nguyena futhi owanika abanye ukuba babe ngabaphostoli, abanye abaprofethi, abanye abavangeli, abanye abelusi nabafundisi,
Eph 4:12 ukuze abangcwele bapheleliselwe umsebenzi wokukhonza, kwakhiwe umzimba kaKristu,
Eph 4:13 size sifinyelele sonke ebunyeni bokukholwa nasekwazini iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ebudodeni obupheleleyo, esilinganisweni sobukhulu sokugcwala kukaKristu,
Eph 4:14 ukuze singabe sisaba yizingane, sishukunyiswa okwamaza, sipheshulwa yimimoya yonke yezifundiso ngenkohliso yabantu, ngobuqili obunamacebo okudukisayo;
Eph 4:15 kodwa sithi sikhuluma iqiniso ngothando, sikhulele ngakho konke kuye oyinhloko, uKristu,
Eph 4:16 okungaye umzimba wonke uhlanganisiwe, ubambene ngokwelekelelana kwamalungu onke awo njengokusebenza okulinganiselwe yilelo nalelo lungu, kukhuliswe umzimba, ube yisakhiwo othandweni.
Eph 4:17 Ngakho ngisho, ngifakaza eNkosini, ngithi ningabe nisahamba njengalokhu kuhamba abezizwe ebuzeni bengqondo yabo,
Eph 4:18 behlwelwe emqondweni, behlukanisiwe nokuphila kukaNkulunkulu ngokungazi okukubo ngenxa yobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo,
Eph 4:19 abathi bebuthuntu, bazinikela emanyaleni, ukuze basebenze ukungcola konke ngokuhuheka.
Eph 4:20 Kepha nina animfundanga uKristu kanjalo,
Eph 4:21 uma-ke nimzwile nafundiswa kuye, njengokuba iqiniso likuJesu,
Eph 4:22 ukuba nikhumule umuntu omdala ongowenkambo yokuqala, owonakala ngezinkanuko zenkohliso,
Eph 4:23 nenziwe basha emoyeni wengqondo yenu,
Eph 4:24 nembathe umuntu omusha owadalwa ngokukaNkulunkulu ekulungeni nasebungcweleni beqiniso.
Eph 4:25 Ngakho lahlani amanga, nikhulume iqiniso, yilowo nalowo nomakhelwane wakhe, lokhu singamalungu omunye komunye.
Eph 4:26 Thukuthelani ningoni; ilanga malingashoni nisathukuthele.
Eph 4:27 Ningamniki uSathane indawo.
Eph 4:28 Owebayo angabe eseba, kepha kunalokho akhuthale asebenze okuhle ngezandla zakhe, ukuze abe nokokwabela osweleyo.
Eph 4:29 Makungaphumi emlonyeni wenu nalinye izwi elibolileyo, kodwa kube ngelilungele ukwakha njengokuswelekileyo, ukuze libavezele umusa abezwayo.
Eph 4:30 Ningamdabukisi uMoya oNgcwele kaNkulunkulu enabekwa uphawu ngaye kuze kube lusuku lokuhlengwa.
Eph 4:31 Konke okubabayo, nentukuthelo, nolaka, nomsindo, nokuhlambalaza makususwe kini kanye nakho konke okubi.
Eph 4:32 Maniphathane ngobumnene, nihawukelane, nithethelelane, njengalokho noNkulunkulu wanithethelela ngoKristu.
Eph 5:1 Ngakho yibani ngabalingisa uNkulunkulu njengabantwana abathandekayo,
Eph 5:2 nihambe othandweni, njengalokho uKristu wanithanda, wazinikela ngenxa yethu, abe ngumnikelo nomhlatshelo, abe yiphunga elimnandi kuNkulunkulu.
Eph 5:3 Kepha ubufebe, nakho konke ukungcola, noma isangabe, makungaphathwa nangegama phakathi kwenu, njengokuba kufanele abangcwele,
Eph 5:4 nehlazo, nokubheda, nokulawula, okuyizinto ezingafanele, kepha kunalokho makube ngukubonga.
Eph 5:5 Ngokuba yazini lokhu, nikuqonde ukuthi akukho sifebe, noma ongcolileyo, noma onesangabe ongokhonza izithombe, onefa embusweni kaKristu noNkulunkulu.
Eph 5:6 Masingakhohliswa muntu ngamazwi ayize, ngokuba ngenxa yalezo zinto ulaka lukaNkulunkulu lwehlela phezu kwabantwana bokungalaleli.
Eph 5:7 Ngakho-ke ningabi ngabahlanganyela nabo.
Eph 5:8 Ngokuba kade naningubumnyama, kepha manje ningukukhanya eNkosini; hambani njengabantwana bokukhanya,
Eph 5:9 ngokuba izithelo zokukhanya zisebuhleni bonke nasekulungeni naseqinisweni,
Eph 5:10 nihlole ukuthi kuyini okuthandeka eNkosini,
Eph 5:11 ningahlanganyeli imisebenzi yobumnyama engenazithelo, kepha kunalokho niyidalule;
Eph 5:12 ngokuba okwenziwa yibo ngasese kuyihlazo nokukhuluma ngakho.
Eph 5:13 Kepha konke okudalulwayo kubonakaliswa ngukukhanya, ngokuba konke okubonakaliswayo kungukukhanya.
Eph 5:14 Ngalokho uthi: “Phaphama wena oleleyo, uvuke kwabafileyo, uKristu uzakukukhanyisa.”
Eph 5:15 Ngakho-ke bhekisisani ukuthi nihamba kanjani, kungabi njengabangahlakaniphile kepha njengabahlakaniphileyo,
Eph 5:16 nithengisise isikhathi, ngokuba izinsuku zimbi.
Eph 5:17 Ngakho-ke ningabi yiziwula, kodwa qondani okuyintando yeNkosi.
Eph 5:18 Ningadakwa yiwayini, kuvela kulo umhumheko, kodwa nigcwaliswe ngoMoya,
Eph 5:19 niphendulane ngamahubo nangezihlabelelo nangamaculo okomoya, nihlabelele, nihubele iNkosi enhliziyweni yenu,
Eph 5:20 nimbonge njalo uNkulunkulu uYise ngakho konke egameni leNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu,
Eph 5:21 nithobelane ngokumesaba uKristu.
Eph 5:22 Abafazi mabathobele amadoda abo kungathi kukuyo iNkosi,
Eph 5:23 ngokuba indoda iyinhloko yomfazi, njengokuba noKristu uyinhloko yebandla, yena engumsindisi womzimba.
Eph 5:24 Kepha njengokuba ibandla lithobela uKristu, kanjalo nabafazi mabathobele amadoda ezintweni zonke.
Eph 5:25 Madoda, thandani omkenu, njengalokho noKristu ulithandile ibandla, wazinikela ngenxa yalo
Eph 5:26 ukuba alingcwelise, alihlambulule ngesigezo samanzi ngezwi,
Eph 5:27 ukuze azimisele ibandla elinenkazimulo, lingenasisihla, nambimbi, nanto enjalo, kodwa libe ngcwele lingenacala.
Eph 5:28 Kanjalo amadoda afanele ukuthanda omkawo njengemizimba yawo. Othanda umkakhe uzithanda yena.
Eph 5:29 Ngokuba akakho owake wazonda eyakhe inyama, kepha uyayondla, ayiphathe kahle, njengalokhu noKristu enza kulo ibandla;
Eph 5:30 ngokuba singamalungu omzimba wakhe.
Eph 5:31 Ngenxa yalokho umuntu uyakushiya uyise nonina, anamathele kumkakhe; labo ababili bayakuba nyamanye.
Eph 5:32 Le mfihlakalo inkulu, kepha ngikhuluma ngoKristu nebandla.
Eph 5:33 Nani-ke, yilowo nalowo makathande umkakhe njengokuba ezithanda yena, kepha umfazi makahloniphe indoda yakhe.
Eph 6:1 Bantwana, lalelani abazali benu eNkosini, ngokuba lokho kulungile.
Eph 6:2 Yazisa uyihlo nonyoko, okungumyalelo wokuqala onesithembiso:
Eph 6:3 ukuze kube kuhle kuwe, uhlale kade emhlabeni.
Eph 6:4 Nani boyise, ningabathukuthelisi abantwana benu, kodwa nibondle ngokuyala nangokuqondisa kweNkosi.
Eph 6:5 Zinceku, abangamakhosi enu ngokwenyama, balaleleni ngokwesaba nokuthuthumela ngobuqotho benhliziyo yenu kungathi kukuKristu,
Eph 6:6 ningathengi amehlo njengabathokozisa abantu, kodwa njengezinceku zikaKristu nenze intando kaNkulunkulu ngenhliziyo,
Eph 6:7 nikhonze ngothando kungathi kuseNkosini kungekubantu,
Eph 6:8 nazi ukuthi konke okuhle yilowo nalowo akwenzayo, uzakukwamukela okunjalo eNkosini, noma eyinceku noma engokhululekileyo.
Eph 6:9 Nani makhosi, yenzani okunjalo kuzo, niyeke ukusongela, nazi ukuthi neyazo neyenu iNkosi isezulwini nokuthi ukukhetha umuntu akukho kuye.
Eph 6:10 Elokugcina, qinani eNkosini nasemandleni ayo amakhulu.
Eph 6:11 Hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu, ukuze nibe namandla okumelana namaqhinga kaSathane;
Eph 6:12 ngokuba asibambene negazi nenyama, kodwa sibambene nemibuso, namandla, nababusi bezwe balobu bumnyama, nabawomoya bobubi emkhathini.
Eph 6:13 Ngakho hlomani izikhali zonke zikaNkulunkulu ukuba nibe namandla okuzabalaza ngosuku olubi, nalapho senifeze konke, nime.
Eph 6:14 Ngakho yimani izinkalo zenu ziboshiwe ngeqiniso, nifakile isivikelo sesifuba sokulunga,
Eph 6:15 izinyawo zigqokisiwe ukulungela kukho ukushumayela ivangeli lokuthula;
Eph 6:16 kukho konke nithathe isihlangu sokukholwa eniyakuba namandla okucima ngaso yonke imicibisholo evuthayo yomubi,
Eph 6:17 namukele futhi isigqoko sensindiso, nenkemba kaMoya eyizwi likaNkulunkulu,
Eph 6:18 ngokukhuleka konke nokunxusa, nikhuleka ngezikhathi zonke ngoMoya; kulokho nilinde ngesineke sonke nangokunxusela abangcwele bonke,
Eph 6:19 ninginxusele nami ukuba ngiphiwe izwi, nxa ngivula umlomo wami, ngize ngiyishumayele ngesibindi imfihlakalo yevangeli;
Eph 6:20 engiyisithunywa ngalo esiboshiwe ngamaketanga, ukuze ngikhulume ngesibindi ngalo, njengokuba kufanele ukuba ngikhulume.
Eph 6:21 Kepha ukuba nani nazi okuqondene nami nalokhu engikwenzayo, uyakunazisa konke uThikhiku, umzalwane othandekayo nesikhonzi esikholekileyo eNkosini,
Eph 6:22 engamthumela kini ngakho lokho ukuba nazi izindaba zethu, nokuba aduduze izinhliziyo zenu.
Eph 6:23 Ukuthula makube kubazalwane, nothando kanye nokukholwa okuvela kuNkulunkulu uYise naseNkosini uJesu Kristu.
Eph 6:24 Umusa mawube nabo bonke abathanda iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ngokunganqamukiyo.
Phil 1:1 OPawulu noThimothewu, izinceku zikaKristu Jesu, kubo bonke abangcwele kuKristu Jesu abaseFilipi, kanye nababonisi namadiyakoni:
Phil 1:2 Makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba wethu naseNkosini uJesu Kristu.
Phil 1:3 Ngiyambonga uNkulunkulu wami ekunikhumbuleni kwami konke
Phil 1:4 ngezikhathi zonke ekunxuseni kwami konke ngani nonke, nginxusa ngokuthokoza,
Phil 1:5 ngenxa yokuhlanganyela kwenu evangelini, kusukela osukwini lokuqala kuze kube manje;
Phil 1:6 ngethembile ngempela yona le nto ukuthi owaqala umsebenzi omuhle kinina uyakuwufeza kuze kube lusuku lukaKristu Jesu,
Phil 1:7 njengalokhu kufanele ukuba ngibe nomqondo onjalo ngani nonke, njengokuba nginithwele enhliziyweni yami, lokhu ekuboshweni kwami nasekulivikeleni nasekuliqiniseni ivangeli nina nonke nihlanganyele nami emseni.
Phil 1:8 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu ungufakazi wami wokuthi nginilangazelela kangakanani nonke ngesihe sikaJesu Kristu.
Phil 1:9 Ngikhulekela lokhu ukuba uthando lwenu luvame kakhulu njalo ekwazini nasekuqondeni konke,
Phil 1:10 ukuze nikwazi ukwahlukanisa, nize nibe mhlophe nabangakhubekisiyo kuze kube lusuku lukaKristu,
Phil 1:11 nigcwaliswe ngezithelo zokulunga ezingaye uJesu Kristu, kube yinkazimulo nodumo kuNkulunkulu.
Phil 1:12 Kepha ngithanda ukuba nazi, bazalwane, ukuthi lokho okwangehlelayo kugcine kwaveza ukuqhubeka kwevangeli,
Phil 1:13 kwaze kwathi izibopho zami zabonakala enqabeni yonke nakubo bonke abanye ukuthi zingenxa kaKristu
Phil 1:14 nokuthi iningi labazalwane eNkosini betholile ithemba ngezibopho zami bazuzile kakhulu isibindi sokukhuluma izwi likaNkulunkulu ngokungesabi.
Phil 1:15 Abanye kambe bashumayela uKristu ngomhawu nangombango kepha abanye ngenhliziyo enhle;
Phil 1:16 laba bashumayela ngothando, bazi ukuthi ngimiselwe ukuvikela ivangeli,
Phil 1:17 kepha labo bamemezela uKristu ngombango kungenganhliziyo emhlophe, bethi bazakungivusela ukukhathazeka ekuboshweni kwami.
Phil 1:18 Kunani pho? Nokho uKristu uyamenyezelwa ngezindlela zonke, noma ngokuzenzisa noma ngesiminya; kulokho-ke ngiyathokoza, yebo, ngiyakuthokoza,
Phil 1:19 ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu kuyakungenzela ukusindiswa ngokunxusa kwenu nangokusiza kukaMoya kaJesu Kristu,
Phil 1:20 njengokulangazela nokwethemba kwami ukuthi ayikho into engizakujabhiswa kuyo, kepha ngesibindi sonke, njengasezikhathini zonke namanje, uKristu uyakwenziwa mkhulu emzimbeni wami, nokuba kungokuphila nokuba kungokufa.
Phil 1:21 Ngokuba kimina ukuphila kunguKristu, ukufa kuyinzuzo.
Phil 1:22 Kepha uma ukuphila enyameni kuyisithelo somsebenzi kimi, angisakwazi engizakukukhetha.
Phil 1:23 Kepha ngiphakathi kokubili; nginesifiso sokumuka ngibe noKristu, ngokuba yikhona okuhle kakhulu;
Phil 1:24 kanti-ke ukuhlala enyameni kuswelekile kakhulu ngenxa yenu.
Phil 1:25 Lokhu nginalo leli themba, ngiyazi ukuthi ngiyakuhlala, yebo, ngihlale nani nonke, kube ngukuqhubeka nokuthokoza kwenu ekukholweni,
Phil 1:26 ukuze ukuzibonga kwenu ngami kuvame kuKristu Jesu ngokufika kwami futhi kini.
Phil 1:27 Kuphela hambani ngokufanele ivangeli likaKristu, kuze kuthi, noma ngiza nginibona noma ngingekho, ngizwe izindaba zenu zokuthi nimi niqinile emoyeni munye, nangomphefumulo munye nilwela inkolo yevangeli,
Phil 1:28 ningethuswa ngalutho ngabamelene nani, okuyisiboniso sokubhubha kubona kepha ngesokusindiswa kwenu; lokhu-ke kuvela kuNkulunkulu.
Phil 1:29 Ngokuba ngenxa kaKristu nina nabelwa ngomusa, angisho ukukholwa kuye kuphela kepha nokuhlupheka ngenxa yakhe,
Phil 1:30 nikukho khona lokho kulwa enakubona kimina, nakalokhu nizwa ukuthi kukimina.
Phil 2:1 Ngakho-ke uma kukhona induduzo kuKristu, uma kukhona ukududuzeka kothando, uma kukhona inhlangano kaMoya, uma kukhona isisa nesihawu,
Phil 2:2 gcwalisani ukuthokoza kwami ukuba nibe nomqondo munye, ninothando lunye, nibe nhliziyonye, niqonde into inye;
Phil 2:3 ningenzi lutho ngombango nangodumo lwezwe; kepha ngokuthobeka nishaye sengathi abanye bakhulu kunani,
Phil 2:4 yilowo nalowo angabheki okwakhe, kepha yilowo abheke nokwabanye.
Phil 2:5 Mawube kini lowo mqondo owawukhona nakuKristu Jesu
Phil 2:6 owathi enesimo sikaNkulunkulu, akaze asho ukuthi kuyinto yokuphangwa ukulingana noNkulunkulu,
Phil 2:7 kepha wazidela ethabatha isimo senceku, enziwe ngomfanekiso wabantu;
Phil 2:8 wathi efunyenwe enjengomuntu ngesimilo, wazithobisa, elalela kwaze kwaba sekufeni, yebo, ekufeni kwesiphambano.
Phil 2:9 Ngalokho-ke uNkulunkulu wamphakamisa kakhulu, wamnika igama eliphezu kwamagama onke,
Phil 2:10 ukuze kuthi ngegama likaJesu amadolo onke aguqe, awabasezulwini, nawabasemhlabeni, nawabangaphansi komhlaba,
Phil 2:11 nezilimi zonke zivume ngokuthi UJESU KRISTU UYINKOSI, kube yinkazimulo kuNkulunkulu uYise.
Phil 2:12 Ngakho-ke, bathandiweyo bami, njengalokho nilalele ngezikhathi zonke, kungesikho nxa ngikhona kuphela, kodwa ikakhulu manje nxa ngingekho, fezani ukusindiswa kwenu ngokwesaba nangokuthuthumela,
Phil 2:13 ngokuba nguNkulunkulu osebenza kini nokuthanda nokwenza njengentando yakhe.
Phil 2:14 Yenzani konke ngokungakhononi nokungangabazi,
Phil 2:15 ukuze nibe ngabangasolekiyo nabangenacala, abantwana bakaNkulunkulu abangenasici phakathi kwesizukulwane esiyisigwegwe nesiphambeneyo, enikhanya phakathi kwaso njengezinkanyiso ezweni,
Phil 2:16 nibambelele ezwini lokuphila, ngize ngibe nokuzibonga ngosuku lukaKristu ngokuthi angigijimelanga ize, angisebenzelanga ize.
Phil 2:17 Yebo, nokuba nginikelwa emhlatshelweni nasenkonzweni yokukholwa kwenu, ngiyathokoza, ngithokoza kanye nani nonke;
Phil 2:18 ngokunjalo-ke thokozani nani, nithokoze kanye nami.
Phil 2:19 Kepha ngiyethemba eNkosini uJesu ukuthuma uThimothewu kini masinyane, ukuze nami ngename nxa sengazi izindaba zenu.
Phil 2:20 Ngokuba anginamuntu onenhliziyo enjengeyakhe, onganakekela izindaba zenu ngobuqotho;
Phil 2:21 ngokuba bonke bafuna okwabo, abafuni okukaJesu Kristu.
Phil 2:22 Kepha niyakwazi ukuthembeka kwakhe ukuthi ukhonzile kanye nami ngenxa yevangeli njengomntwana kuyise.
Phil 2:23 Yena-ke ngiyethemba ukumthuma masinyane, uma sengibonile ukuthi okuqondene nami kophelelaphi;
Phil 2:24 kepha ngiyethemba eNkosini ukuthi nami ngizakuza eduzane.
Phil 2:25 Kodwa ngibone ukuthi kudingekile ukuba ngithume kinina u-Ephafrodithu, umzalwane nesisebenzi nebutho kanye nami, nesithunywa senu, isikhonzi ekusweleni kwami,
Phil 2:26 lokhu wayenilangazelela nonke, eyaluza ngokuba nizwile ukuthi wayegula.
Phil 2:27 Ngokuba nempela wayegula ephansi kokufa; kepha uNkulunkulu wamhawukela, kungeyena yedwa, wangihawukela nami, ukuze ngingabi nalusizi phezu kosizi.
Phil 2:28 Ngalokho ngakhuthalela kakhulu ukumthuma, ukuze kuthi nxa senimbona futhi nithokoze, kimi kunciphe usizi.
Phil 2:29 Ngakho-ke mamukeleni eNkosini ngokuthokoza konke, abanjalo-ke nibaphathe ngokubatusa,
Phil 2:30 ngokuba ngenxa yomsebenzi kaKristu wacishe wafa ezidela amathambo, ukuze agcwalise okusileleyo ekungikhonzeni kwenu.
Phil 3:1 Elokugcina, bazalwane bami, thokozani eNkosini. Ukunilobela khona lokho angikwenqeni, kepha nina kuyanigcina.
Phil 3:2 Xwayani izinja, nixwaye izisebenzi ezimbi, nixwaye abokusika.
Phil 3:3 Ngokuba singukusoka thina esikhonza ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu, sizibonga kuKristu Jesu, singethembi enyameni,
Phil 3:4 nakuba nami bengingaba nokwethemba enyameni. Uma omunye umuntu ecabanga ukuthi unokwethemba enyameni, mina kakhulu;
Phil 3:5 ngasokwa ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili ngingowohlanga luka-Israyeli, owesizwe sakwaBenjamini, umHeberu wamaHeberu, ngokomthetho umFarisi;
Phil 3:6 ngokokushisekela ngingowazingela ibandla, ngokokulunga okusemthethweni ngingongasolekiyo.
Phil 3:7 Kanti-ke lokho okwakuyinzuzo kimi ngakushaya indiva ngenxa kaKristu.
Phil 3:8 Yebo impela, konke ngikushaya indiva ngobukhulu bokumazi uKristu Jesu iNkosi yami, engilahlekelwe yikho konke ngenxa yakhe, ngikushaya izibi, ukuze ngizuze uKristu,
Phil 3:9 ngifunyanwe kuyena, ngingenakho ukulunga okungokwami okuya ngomthetho kodwa lokho okuya ngokukholwa nguKristu, ngisho ukulunga okuvela kuNkulunkulu ngokukholwa,
Phil 3:10 ukuze ngimazi yena, namandla okuvuka kwakhe, nokuhlanganyela ezinhluphekweni zakhe, ngimfuze ngokufa kwakhe,
Phil 3:11 uma mhlawumbe ngingaze ngifinyelele ekuvukeni kwabafileyo,
Phil 3:12 kungesikho ukuthi sengibambile nokuthi sengiphelelisiwe, kepha ngijonga ukuba kumbe ngingakubamba yini lokho nami engabanjelwa khona nguKristu Jesu.
Phil 3:13 Bazalwane, angisho ukuthi mina uqobo sengikubambile; kepha kunye engikwenzayo: ngikhohlwa okungasemuva, ngizelulela kokungaphambili,
Phil 3:14 ngijonge emgomeni, emklomelweni wokubizwa okukhulu kwaphezulu nguNkulunkulu kuJesu Kristu.
Phil 3:15 Ngakho-ke thina sonke esiphelele masibe nokuqonda okunjalo; kepha uma kokuthile niqonda ngokunye, nalokho uNkulunkulu uyakunambulela khona,
Phil 3:16 kuphela ukuthi kwesesifinyelele kukho, sihambe ngawo lowo mkhondo.
Phil 3:17 Ngilingiseni, bazalwane, nibabhekisise abahamba njengathi esiyisibonelo kini.
Phil 3:18 Ngokuba abaningi, enganitshela kaningi ngabo namanje nginitshela nangezinyembezi, bahamba beyizitha zesiphambano sikaKristu,
Phil 3:19 abakuphela kwabo ngukubhujiswa, abankulunkulu wabo yisisu, nodumo lwabo lusehlazweni labo, abangabanaka okomhlaba.
Phil 3:20 Kepha thina singabombuso wasezulwini, lapho futhi silindela khona ukuba kuvele uMsindisi, iNkosi uJesu Kristu,
Phil 3:21 oyakuguqula isimo somzimba wethu wokuthotshiswa, ufane nomzimba wakhe wenkazimulo, ngamandla angazihlelela ngawo konke phansi kwakhe.
Phil 4:1 Ngalokho, bazalwane bami abathandekayo nabalangazelelwayo, ntokozo yami nomqhele wami, yimani niqinile kanjalo eNkosini, bathandwa.
Phil 4:2 Ngiyamyala u-Evodiya, ngiyamyala noSintike ukuba babe nokuqonda kunye eNkosini.
Phil 4:3 Yebo, ngiyakunxusa nawe mana wami oqotho, yelekelela labo besifazane, lokhu babambisana nami evangelini, kanye noKlemente nezinye izisebenzi zami abamagama abo asencwadini yokuphila.
Phil 4:4 Thokozani eNkosini njalonjalo; ngiyaphinda ngithi: Thokozani!
Phil 4:5 Ukubekezela kwenu akwaziwe ngabantu bonke; iNkosi iseduze.
Phil 4:6 Ningakhathazeki ngalutho, kepha kukho konke izicelo zenu mazaziwe nguNkulunkulu ngokukhuleka nokunxusa kanye nokubonga.
Phil 4:7 Ukuthula kukaNkulunkulu okudlula ukuqonda konke kuyakulondoloza izinhliziyo zenu nemicabango yenu kuKristu Jesu.
Phil 4:8 Elokugcina, bazalwane, konke okuyiqiniso, konke okuhloniphekayo, konke okulungileyo, konke okumhlophe, konke okuthandekayo, konke okutusekayo, noma kukhona okuhle, noma kukhona okubongekayo, zindlani ngalokho;
Phil 4:9 enakufunda, nakwamukela, nakuzwa, nakubona kimi, kwenzeni lokho; khona uNkulunkulu wokuthula uyakuba nani.
Phil 4:10 Kepha-ke ngathokoza kakhulu eNkosini, ngokuba manje senize navuselela ukunginakekela kwenu; beninginakekela kambe, kepha anibanga nathuba.
Phil 4:11 Akusikho ukuthi ngisho maqondana nokuswela, ngokuba mina ngifundile ukuba nganeliswe noma ngihlezi kanjani.
Phil 4:12 Ngiyakwazi ukuba phansi, ngiyakwazi nokubusa; kukho konke nasezintweni zonke ngifundisiwe: ukusutha, nokulamba, nokubusa, nokuswela.
Phil 4:13 Nginamandla ukwenza konke ngaye ongiqinisayo.
Phil 4:14 Nokho nenze kahle ngokuhlanganyela nami ekuhluphekeni kwami.
Phil 4:15 Niyazi nani nina baseFilipi ukuthi ekuqaleni kwevangeli ekuphumeni kwami eMakedoniya kwakungekho bandla nelilodwa elahlanganyela nami endabeni yokupha nokwamukela, kuphela nina nodwa,
Phil 4:16 ngokuba naseThesalonika nathumela kanye nakabili ngokuswela kwami.
Phil 4:17 Akusikho ukuthi ngifuna isipho, kodwa ngifuna isithelo esiyakwandisa okubalelwa nina.
Phil 4:18 Kepha nginakho konke ngokweqileyo; nganelisiwe sengamukelisiwe ngu-Ephafrodithu okuvela kinina, iphunga elimnandi, umhlatshelo omuhle nothokozisayo kuNkulunkulu.
Phil 4:19 UNkulunkulu wami uzakugcwalisa ukuswela konke kwenu njengokwengcebo yakhe ekukhazimuleni kuKristu Jesu.
Phil 4:20 KuNkulunkulu noBaba wethu makube ludumo kuze kube phakade naphakade. Amen.
Phil 4:21 Ngikhonzeleni kwabangcwele bonke abakuKristu Jesu. Abazalwane abanami bakhonza kinina.
Phil 4:22 Abangcwele bonke bayakhonza kini, ikakhulu abendlu kaKesari.
Phil 4:23 Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu mawube nomoya wenu.
Col 1:1 UPawulu, umphostoli kaKristu Jesu ngentando kaNkulunkulu, noThimothewu umzalwane
Col 1:2 kubo abaseKolose, abangcwele nabazalwane abakholwayo kuKristu; makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba wethu.
Col 1:3 Simbonga njalonjalo uNkulunkulu uYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu, nxa sinikhulekela,
Col 1:4 lokhu sizwile ngokukholwa kwenu kuKristu Jesu nangothando eninalo kubo bonke abangcwele,
Col 1:5 ngenxa yethemba enibekelwe lona ezulwini, enezwa ngalo ngaphambili ngezwi leqiniso levangeli
Col 1:6 elifikile kini, njengalokhu likhona ezweni lonke lithela izithelo, landa, njengokuba kunjalo naphakathi kwenu, kusukela osukwini enezwa ngalo, nazi umusa kaNkulunkulu ngeqiniso,
Col 1:7 njengalokho nafunda ku-Ephafra othandekayo oyinceku kanye nathi, oyisikhonzi esithembekayo sikaKristu ngenxa yenu;
Col 1:8 okunguyena futhi wasitshela ngothando lwenu ngoMoya.
Col 1:9 Ngalokho nathi, kusukela osukwini esezwa ngalo, asiyeki ukunikhulekela nokuninxusela ukuba nigcwaliswe ngokwazi intando yakhe ngokuhlakanipha konke nokuqonda okungomoya,
Col 1:10 nihambe ngokufanele iNkosi, niyithokozise ngakho konke, nithela izithelo emisebenzini yonke elungileyo, nikhula ekumazini uNkulunkulu,
Col 1:11 niqiniswe nokuqiniswa konke ngokwamandla enkazimulo yakhe, kuze kube ngukubekezela konke nokubheka kade ngokujabula;
Col 1:12 nibonga uYise owanenza nifanele isabelo sefa labangcwele ekukhanyeni,
Col 1:13 owasikhulula emandleni obumnyama nowasibeka embusweni weNdodana yothando lwakhe;
Col 1:14 okukuyo sinokuhlengwa, ukuthethelelwa kwezono,
Col 1:15 yona ingumfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ongenakubonwa, izibulo lezidalwa zonke,
Col 1:16 ngokuba kwadalelwa kuyo konke okusezulwini nasemhlabeni, okubonwayo nokungenakubonwa, nokuba kuyizihlalo zobukhosi, nokuba kuyimibuso, nokuba kuyizikhulu, nokuba kuyiziphathimandla; konke kwadalwa ngayo, kwadalelwa yona;
Col 1:17 yona ingaphambi kwakho konke, nezinto zonke zimi ngayo;
Col 1:18 yona iyinhloko yomzimba, ngisho ibandla, engukuqala, izibulo kwabafileyo, ukuze yona ibe ngowokuqala ezintweni zonke,
Col 1:19 ngokuba kwaba kuhle kuye ukuba ukugcwala konke kuhlale kuyo
Col 1:20 nokuba ngayo abuyisane nakho konke esenzile ukuthula ngegazi lesiphambano sayo, yebo ngayo, nokuba kuyizinto ezisemhlabeni nokuba ngezisezulwini.
Col 1:21 Nani ekade ningabafokazi nezitha engqondweni ngemisebenzi emibi,
Col 1:22 nokho manje usebuyisene nani emzimbeni wenyama yayo ngokufa ukuba animise ningcwele, ningenasisihla nacala phambi kwakhe,
Col 1:23 uma kambe nihlala ekukholweni, nisekeliwe nigxilile, ningagudluzwa ethembeni levangeli enalizwayo, elashunyayelwa kukho konke okudaliweyo okuphansi kwezulu, engenziwa isikhonzi salo mina Pawulu.
Col 1:24 Kalokhu ngiyathokoza ezinhluphekweni zami ngenxa yenu ngokugcwalisa okusileleyo osizini lukaKristu enyameni yami ngenxa yomzimba wakhe, oyibandla;
Col 1:25 engenziwa isikhonzi salo ngokwesimiso sikaNkulunkulu enganikwa sona maqondana nani ukuba ligcwaliswe izwi likaNkulunkulu,
Col 1:26 ngisho imfihlakalo ebifihlakele selokhu kwaqala izikhathi nezizukulwane, kepha kalokhu yambuliwe kwabangcwele bakhe;
Col 1:27 okubona uNkulunkulu athanda ukubazisa ukuthi iyini ingcebo yenkazimulo yaleyo mfihlakalo phakathi kwabezizwe, enguKristu phakathi kwenu, ithemba lenkazimulo;
Col 1:28 okunguye esimshumayelayo, siluleka wonke umuntu, sifundisa wonke umuntu ngokuhlakanipha konke, ukuze simise wonke umuntu ephelele kuKristu,
Col 1:29 engikusebenzelayo futhi, ngilwa ngokusebenza kwakhe okusebenza kimi ngamandla.
Col 2:1 Ngokuba ngiyathanda ukuba nazi ukuthi kukhulu kangakanani ukulwa enginakho ngenxa yenu nabaseLawodikeya nabo bonke abangabonanga ubuso bami ngamehlo,
Col 2:2 ukuze izinhliziyo zabo ziduduzwe, behlanganisiwe othandweni babe nengcebo yonke yokwazi okuphelele, bazisise imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu enguKristu,
Col 2:3 okufihlwe kuye amagugu onke okuhlakanipha nowokwazi.
Col 2:4 Ngikusho lokhu, ukuze kungabikho muntu onikhohlisa ngamazwi okuyenga.
Col 2:5 Ngokuba noma ngingekho ngomzimba, nokho ngikhona kini ngomoya ngithokoza, ngibona inhlelo yenu nokuqina kokukholwa kwenu kuKristu.
Col 2:6 Ngakho-ke njengalokho nimamukele uKristu Jesu iNkosi, hambani nikuye,
Col 2:7 nigxilile, nakhiwe kuye, niqinisiwe ekukholweni, njengalokho nifundisiwe, nivame ukubonga.
Col 2:8 Xwayani funa kube khona onithumbayo ngokuhlakanipha nangenkohliso eyize njengokwemvelo yabantu, njengezifundiso zokucathula kwezwe, kungenjengokukaKristu.
Col 2:9 Ngokuba kuhlala kuye ngokomzimba ukugcwala konke kobuNkulunkulu;
Col 2:10 nigcwalisiwe kuye, yena oyinhloko yemibuso yonke namandla,
Col 2:11 enasokela kuye futhi ngokusoka okungenziwanga ngezandla ngokukhumula umzimba wenyama, ngokusoka kukaKristu;
Col 2:12 nimbelwe kanye naye ngombhapathizo, okungawo futhi navuswa kanye naye ngokukholwa ngamandla kaNkulunkulu owamvusa kwabafileyo.
Col 2:13 Nani-ke ebenifile ngeziphambeko nangokungasoki kwenyama yenu wanenza nibe ngabaphilayo kanye naye esithethelela zonke izono zethu;
Col 2:14 esehlangule incwadi yecala lethu, emelana nathi ngemiyalo yayo, wayeyisusa ngokuyibethela esiphambanweni;
Col 2:15 ebaphucile ababusi nabanamandla izikhali wabathela ngehlazo obala, ebanqoba ngaso.
Col 2:16 Ngakho makungabikho muntu onilahla ngokudla nesiphuzo, noma ngemikhosi, noma ukwethwasa kwenyanga, noma amasabatha,
Col 2:17 okuyisithunzi nje salokhu obekuzakuza; kepha umzimba ngokaKristu.
Col 2:18 Makungabikho muntu onamuka umvuzo wenu, othanda ukuzenza othobile ekhonza izingelosi, ephike ngemibono yakhe, ezikhukhumeza ngeze ngengqondo yakhe yenyama,
Col 2:19 engabambeleli kuye oyinhloko, okungaye umzimba wonke usizwa, uhlanganiswa ngamalungu nemisipha, ukhula ngokukhula kukaNkulunkulu.
Col 2:20 Uma nifile kanye noKristu nakhululwa ezifundisweni zokucathula kwezwe, yini ukuba okungathi nisaphila ngokwezwe nithobele izifundiso zokuthi:
Col 2:21 “Ungaphathi, ungezwa ngolimi, ungathinti,”
Col 2:22 okuphela konke ngokudliwa ngokweziyalezo nezifundiso zabantu
Col 2:23 ezinegama lokuhlakanipha kambe ngokuzikhethela inkonzo, nangokuzithoba, nangokuhlupha umzimba; akusizi lutho maqondana nokuzithiba kwenyama.
Col 3:1 Ngakho uma navuswa kanye noKristu, funani okwaphezulu, lapho ekhona uKristu, ehlezi ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu;
Col 3:2 nakani okwaphezulu, ninganaki okusemhlabeni.
Col 3:3 Ngokuba nafa, ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu;
Col 3:4 nxa ebonakaliswa uKristu ongukuphila kwethu, khona-ke nani niyakubonakaliswa kanye naye ekukhazimuleni.
Col 3:5 Ngakho-ke bulalani amalungu enu asemhlabeni, ubufebe, nokungcola, nokuhuheka, nokukhanuka, nesangabe, okungukukhonza izithombe,
Col 3:6 okuza ngakho ulaka lukaNkulunkulu,
Col 3:7 ekade nihamba kukho nani, lapho nisahlezi kukho;
Col 3:8 kepha kalokhu nani manilahle konke lokho, ulaka, nokuthukuthela, nobubi, nokuhlambalaza, nokukhuluma amahlazo aphuma emlonyeni wenu;
Col 3:9 ningaqambelani amanga, lokhu nikhumule umuntu omdala kanye nezenzo zakhe,
Col 3:10 nembethe omusha, owenziwa musha abe nokwazi ngokomfanekiso walowo owamdalayo,
Col 3:11 lapho kungekho mGreki namJuda, ukusoka nokungasoki, owezizwe noma umSkithe, isigqila noma okhululekileyo, kepha uKristu uyikho konke, ukubo bonke.
Col 3:12 Ngakho-ke njengabakhethiweyo bakaNkulunkulu, abangcwele nabathandekayo, yembathani ububele benhliziyo, nesisa, nokuzithoba, nobumnene, nokubheka kade,
Col 3:13 nibekezelelane, nithethelelane, uma umuntu enensolo komunye; njengokuba neNkosi yanithethelela, yenzani njalo nani.
Col 3:14 Kepha phezu kwakho konke lokho yembathani uthando oluyisibopho sokuphelela.
Col 3:15 Ukuthula kukaKristu makubuse ezinhliziyweni zenu, enabizelwa futhi kukho emzimbeni munye; futhi yibani ngababongayo.
Col 3:16 Izwi likaKristu alihlale phakathi kwenu, livame, nifundisane ngokuhlakanipha konke, niyalane ngamahubo, nangezihlabelelo, nangamaculo okomoya, nimhubele uNkulunkulu ezinhliziyweni zenu ngokubonga.
Col 3:17 Konke enikwenzayo, noma kungezwi noma kungomsebenzi, kwenzeni konke egameni leNkosi uJesu, nimbonge uNkulunkulu uYise ngaye.
Col 3:18 Bafazi, thobelani amadoda enu njengokufanele eNkosini.
Col 3:19 Madoda, thandani omkenu, ningabacasukeli.
Col 3:20 Bantwana, lalelani abazali benu ezintweni zonke, ngokuba lokho kuyathandeka eNkosini.
Col 3:21 Boyise, ningabathukuthelisi abantwana benu ukuba bangadangali.
Col 3:22 Zinceku, lalelani ezintweni zonke labo abangamakhosi enu ngokwenyama, kungengokuthenga amehlo njengabathokozisa abantu kodwa ngobuqotho benhliziyo, niyesabe iNkosi.
Col 3:23 Konke enikwenzayo kwenzeni ngenhliziyo, kungathi kwenzelwa iNkosi, qha abantu,
Col 3:24 nazi ukuthi niyakwamukela umvuzo wefa eNkosini. Khonzani iNkosi uKristu.
Col 3:25 Ngokuba lowo owenza ukungalungi uyakwamukeliswa ukungalungi akwenzileyo; akukho ukukhetha umuntu.
Col 4:1 Makhosi, zenzeleni izinceku zenu okulungileyo nokufaneleyo; nazi ukuthi nani nineNkosi ezulwini.
Col 4:2 Qiniselani ekukhulekeni, nilinde kukho ninokubonga.
Col 4:3 Nathi nisikhulekele, ukuze uNkulunkulu asivulele umnyango wezwi ukuba sikhulume imfihlakalo kaKristu engiboshwe ngenxa yayo,
Col 4:4 ukuze ngiyibonakalise njengalokhu ngifanele ukukhuluma.
Col 4:5 Hambani ngokuhlakanipha kubo abangaphandle, nithengisise isikhathi.
Col 4:6 Ukukhuluma kwenu makube nomusa njalo, kuyolisiwe ngosawoti, ukuze nazi enifanele ukubaphendula ngakho bonke abantu.
Col 4:7 Konke okuqondene nami uyakunazisa khona uThikhiku, umzalwane othandekayo nesikhonzi esikholekileyo oyinceku kanye nami eNkosini,
Col 4:8 engimthumile kini ngakho lokhu ukuba nazi ukuthi sihlezi kanjani, aduduze izinhliziyo zenu,
Col 4:9 kanye no-Onesimu, umzalwane okholekileyo nothandekayo, ongomunye wakini; bazakunazisa konke okwalapha.
Col 4:10 Uyakhonza kini u-Aristarku oyisiboshwa kanye nami, noMarku umzala kaBarnaba, enayalezwa ngaye — uma efika kini mamukeleni —
Col 4:11 noJesu othiwa uJustu; yibo bodwa abangabokusoka abasebenzela umbuso kaNkulunkulu kanye nami, abakade beyinduduzo kimi.
Col 4:12 Uyakhonza kini u-Ephafra ongomunye wakini, inceku kaKristu Jesu, enilwela njalo emikhulekweni, ukuze nime niphelele niqinisekile entandweni yonke kaNkulunkulu.
Col 4:13 Ngokuba ngingufakazi wakhe wokuthi uyanisebenzela kakhulu nina, nabaseLawodikeya, nabaseHiyerapholi.
Col 4:14 Uyakhonza kini uLuka inyanga ethandekayo, noDema.
Col 4:15 Khonzani kubazalwane abaseLawodikeya, nakuNimfa, nasebandleni lakwakhe.
Col 4:16 Nxa le ncwadi isifundiwe kini, bhekani ukuba ifundwe nasebandleni labaseLawodikeya; nani niyifunde leyo evela eLawodikeya.
Col 4:17 Nimtshele u-Arkiphu, nithi: “Qaphela inkonzo oyitholile eNkosini, ukuze uyifeze.”
Col 4:18 Yilokhu ukukhonza kwami ngesandla sami, mina Pawulu. Khumbulani izibopho zami. Umusa mawube nani.
1Thess 1:1 OPawulu, noSilvanu, noThimothewu kulo ibandla labaseTheselonika elikuNkulunkulu uBaba, naseNkosini uJesu Kristu: Makube kini umusa nokuthula.
1Thess 1:2 Sibonga uNkulunkulu njalo ngani nonke, siniphatha emikhulekweni yethu,
1Thess 1:3 sikhumbula ngokungayeki isenzo senu sokukholwa, nomsebenzi wothando, nokukhuthazela kwethemba lenu eliseNkosini yethu uJesu Kristu phambi kukaNkulunkulu noBaba wethu,
1Thess 1:4 sikwazi, bazalwane abathandiwe nguNkulunkulu, ukukhethwa kwenu
1Thess 1:5 ukuthi ivangeli lethu alizanga kini ngezwi kuphela kodwa nangamandla, nangoMoya oNgcwele, nangokwethemba okukhulu, njengokuba nazi ukuthi saba ngabantu abanjani phakathi kwenu ngenxa yenu.
1Thess 1:6 Nani naba ngabalingisi bethu, nabeNkosi senilamukele izwi ekukhathazekeni okukhulu ngokuthokoza kukaMoya oNgcwele,
1Thess 1:7 naze naba yisibonelo kubo bonke abakholwayo eMakedoniya nase-Akhaya.
1Thess 1:8 Ngokuba udumo lwezwi leNkosi lwaphuma kinina, lwafika, angisho eMakedoniya nase-Akhaya kuphela, kepha ezindaweni zonke lapho ukukholwa kwenu nguNkulunkulu kuphumele khona; ngakho asisadingi ukukhuluma lutho.
1Thess 1:9 Ngokuba bona uqobo balanda ngathi ukuthi kwaba njani ukungena kwethu kinina nokuthi naphendukela kanjani kuNkulunkulu, nishiya izithombe, ukuba nikhonze uNkulunkulu ophilayo oweqiniso,
1Thess 1:10 nilindele iNdodana yakhe ivela ezulwini, ayivusa kwabafileyo, uJesu osihlangulisa olakeni oluzayo.
1Thess 2:1 Ngokuba niyazi nina bazalwane ukuthi ukungena kwethu kinina akubanga yize.
1Thess 2:2 Kepha noma sasihlushiwe kuqala saphathwa kabi eFilipi, njengokuba nazi, saba nesibindi kuNkulunkulu wethu sokunishumayeza ivangeli likaNkulunkulu ngokulwa okukhulu.
1Thess 2:3 Ngokuba ukuyala kwethu akusikho okokuduka nokokungcola nangenkohliso,
1Thess 2:4 kepha njengokuba sivunyiwe nguNkulunkulu ukuba siphathiswe ivangeli, siyakhuluma ngokunjalo, singenzeli ukuthokozisa abantu kepha uNkulunkulu ovivinya izinhliziyo zethu.
1Thess 2:5 Ngokuba asizange sibe namazwi okuthopha, njengokuba nazi; asizange futhi sibe nobuqili bokufisa, uNkulunkulu ungufakazi,
1Thess 2:6 singafunanga nokutuswa ngabantu, nakinina nakwabanye,
1Thess 2:7 ingani sasingaba namandla okunisinda njengabaphostoli bakaKristu, nokho saba mnene phakathi kwenu njengokuba umdlezane ondla abantwana bakhe.
1Thess 2:8 Ngokunjalo lokhu besinilangazelele, sasifuna ukuninika kungesilo ivangeli likaNkulunkulu kuphela, kepha nokuphila kwethu uqobo, ngokuba nase ningabathandekayo kithina.
1Thess 2:9 Ngokuba niyakhumbula, bazalwane, ukukhandleka nokushikashikeka kwethu; sisebenza ubusuku nemini, ukuze singasindi noyedwa kinina, sanishumayeza ivangeli likaNkulunkulu.
1Thess 2:10 Nina ningofakazi, naye uNkulunkulu, bokuthi sahlala kanjani phakathi kwenu nina enikholwayo ngobungcwele, nangokulunga, nangokungasoleki,
1Thess 2:11 njengokuba nazi ukuthi saniphatha abanye ngabanye njengoyise ephatha abantwana bakhe,
1Thess 2:12 siniyala, sinimisa isibindi, sifakazela ukuba nihambe ngokufaneleyo phambi kukaNkulunkulu onibizela embusweni nasebukhosini bakhe.
1Thess 2:13 Ngalokho nathi sibonga uNkulunkulu singaphezi, ngokuba, kuthe lapho namukela izwi likaNkulunkulu enalizwa ngathi, anilamukelanga njengezwi labantu kepha njengezwi likaNkulunkulu, njengokuba liyilo isibili, elona lisebenza futhi phakathi kwenu nina enikholwayo.
1Thess 2:14 Ngokuba nina bazalwane naba ngabalingisi bamabandla kaNkulunkulu aseJudiya akuKristu Jesu, ngokuba nani nahlushwa ngabesizwe sakini, njengalokho nawo ahlushwa ngabaJuda
1Thess 2:15 ababulala neNkosi uJesu nabaprofethi, basixosha nathi, bengamthokozisi uNkulunkulu, bemelana nabantu bonke,
1Thess 2:16 besivimbela ukukhuluma nabezizwe ukuba basindiswe, ukuze bagcwalise njalo izono zabo; kepha ulaka selufinyelele phezu kwabo ngokupheleleyo.
1Thess 2:17 Kepha thina, bazalwane, lokhu besahlukanisiwe nani isikhashana ngobuso kungenganhliziyo, kwaba yikhona sikhuthalela kakhulu ukubona ubuso benu ngokunxanela okukhulu.
1Thess 2:18 Ngakho besithanda ukuza kinina, mina Pawulu ngokwami kanye nakabili, kepha uSathane wasivimbela.
1Thess 2:19 Ngokuba liyini ithemba lethu, nokuthokoza, nomqhele wokuzibonga phambi kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ekufikeni kwakhe, kungeyinina na?
1Thess 2:20 Ngokuba nina niludumo lwethu nokuthokoza kwethu.
1Thess 3:1 Ngalokho kwathi singasenakubekezela, sathi kuhle ukuba sisale sodwa e-Athene,
1Thess 3:2 sathuma uThimothewu umzalwane wethu, isikhonzi sikaNkulunkulu evangelini likaKristu, ukuba aniqinise, anivuse maqondana nokukholwa kwenu
1Thess 3:3 ukuba kunganyakaziswa muntu ngalezo zinhlupheko; ngokuba niyazi nina ukuthi simiselwe lokho.
1Thess 3:4 Ngokuba kuthe sisekhona kini, sanitshela ngaphambili ukuthi siyakuhlushwa, njengokuba kwaba njalo, nani nikwazi.
1Thess 3:5 Ngalokho nami, lapho ngingasenakubekezela, ngathumela ukuba ngiqonde ukukholwa kwenu, ingabe mhlawumbe umlingi unilingile yini, ukukhandleka kwethu kube yize.
1Thess 3:6 Kepha kalokhu uThimothewu esefikile kithi evela kini, esibikela izindaba ezinhle zokukholwa nothando lwenu, nokuthi nisikhumbula kahle njalo, nokuthi nilangazelela ukusibona, njengokuba nathi silangazelela ukubona nina,
1Thess 3:7 ngalokho, bazalwane, saduduzeka ngani ngokukholwa kwenu ekusweleni nasosizini lwethu lonke,
1Thess 3:8 ngokuba kalokhu siyaphila, uma nina nimi niqinile eNkosini.
1Thess 3:9 Ngokuba ngukubonga okunjani esingakubuyisela kuNkulunkulu ngani ngokuthokoza konke esithokoza ngakho ngenxa yenu phambi kukaNkulunkulu wethu na?
1Thess 3:10 Ubusuku nemini sinxusa nokunxusa ukuba sibone ubuso benu, siphelelise okusileleyo ekukholweni kwenu.
1Thess 3:11 Sengathi uNkulunkulu noBaba wethu uqobo neNkosi yethu uJesu angayiqondisa indlela yethu yokuza kini,
1Thess 3:12 iNkosi ininike ukwanda nokuchichima othandweni, omumye komunye nakubo bonke, njengokuba sinjalo kinina,
1Thess 3:13 ukuze iqinise izinhliziyo zenu, zingabi nakusoleka ebungcweleni phambi kukaNkulunkulu noBaba wethu ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu kanye nabangcwele bakhe bonke.
1Thess 4:1 Elokugcina-ke, bazalwane, siyaninxusa, siyaniyala ngeNkosi uJesu ukuba njengalokho nakwamukela kithi ukuthi nifanele ukuhamba nokumthokozisa kanjani uNkulunkulu, njengalokho nihamba kanjalo, manivame kakhulu kulokho.
1Thess 4:2 Ngokuba niyayazi imiyalo esaninika yona ngayo iNkosi uJesu.
1Thess 4:3 Ngokuba lokhu kuyintando kaNkulunkulu, ukungcweliswa kwenu, ukuba nidede ebufebeni
1Thess 4:4 ukuba yilowo nalowo kini akwazi ukuhlala nomkakhe ngobungcwele nangokuhlonipha,
1Thess 4:5 kungabi ngokushisa kwenkanuko njengabezizwe abangamazi uNkulunkulu
1Thess 4:6 ukuba kungabikho noyedwa omonayo, aphambe umfowabo ngento, ngokuba iNkosi ingumphindiseli kukho konke lokho, njengokuba sanitshela phambili, saqinisa.
1Thess 4:7 Ngokuba uNkulunkulu kasibizelanga amanyala, kepha wasibizela ebungcweleni.
1Thess 4:8 Ngakho-ke owalayo akali umuntu, kepha wala uNkulunkulu, yena oninika uMoya wakhe oNgcwele.
1Thess 4:9 Kepha maqondana nothando lobuzalwane anisweli ukuba umuntu anilobele, ngokuba nina uqobo ningabafundisiwe nguNkulunkulu ukuba nithandane;
1Thess 4:10 nempela niyakwenza lokho kubo bonke abazalwane abaseMakedoniya lonke. Kepha siyaniyala, bazalwane, ukuba nivame nokuvama kulokho,
1Thess 4:11 nikhuthalele ukuhlala ngokuthula, nokwenza okwenu, nokusebenza ngezandla zenu, njengokuba saniyala,
1Thess 4:12 ukuze nihambe ngokufaneleyo kwabangaphandle, ningasweli lutho.
1Thess 4:13 Kepha asithandi, bazalwane, ukuba ningabi nakwazi ngabalalayo, ukuze ningadabuki njengabanye abangenalo ithemba.
1Thess 4:14 Ngokuba uma sikholwa ukuthi uJesu wafa, wavuka, ngokunjalo-ke uNkulunkulu uyakubaletha nabaleleyo kuJesu kanye naye.
1Thess 4:15 Ngokuba lokho sikusho kini ngezwi leNkosi ukuthi thina, esisekhona sisasele kuze kube sekufikeni kweNkosi, asiyikubandulela nempela abaleleyo,
1Thess 4:16 ngokuba iNkosi uqobo iyakwehla ezulwini ngezwi lenhlokomo, ngephimbo lengelosi enkulu nangecilongo likaNkulunkulu, nabafileyo kuKristu bayakuvuka kuqala,
1Thess 4:17 khona thina, esisekhona sisasele siyakuhlwithwa kanye nabo emafwini, sihlangabeze iNkosi emoyeni; kanjalo-ke siyakuba nayo iNkosi njalo.
1Thess 4:18 Ngakho-ke duduzanani ngalawo mazwi.
1Thess 5:1 Kepha ngezikhathi nangemizuzu, bazalwane, anisweli ukulotshelwa,
1Thess 5:2 ngokuba nina uqobo niyazi kahle ukuthi usuku lweNkosi luza njengesela ebusuku.
1Thess 5:3 Nxa bethi: “Ngukuthula nokuhlala kahle,” khona ukubhujiswa kuyabazuma njengemihelo ifikela okhulelweyo, abasoze baphunyuka.
1Thess 5:4 Kepha nina bazalwane anikho ebumnyameni, ukuze lolo suku lunifice njengesela,
1Thess 5:5 ngokuba nina nonke ningabantwana bokukhanya, ningabantwana bemini. Asisibo abobusuku noma abobumnyama;
1Thess 5:6 ngalokho-ke masingalali njengabanye, kodwa masiqwashe, siqonde.
1Thess 5:7 Ngokuba abalalayo balala ebusuku, nabadakwayo badakwa ebusuku;
1Thess 5:8 kepha thina esingabemini masiqonde, sifake isivikelo sesifuba sokukholwa nesothando, isigqoko sibe yithemba lokusindiswa;
1Thess 5:9 ngokuba uNkulunkulu kasimiselanga ulaka kepha ukuba sizuze ukusindiswa ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu
1Thess 5:10 owasifelayo ukuba, noma siqwashile noma silele, siphile kanye naye.
1Thess 5:11 Ngalokho-ke vuselelanani, nakhane njengokuba futhi nikwenza.
1Thess 5:12 Kepha siyanincenga, bazalwane, ukuba nibazi abakhandlekayo phakathi kwenu, nabaniphetheyo eNkosini, nabanilulekayo,
1Thess 5:13 nibazisise kakhulu othandweni ngenxa yomsebenzi wabo. Hlalisanani ngokuthula.
1Thess 5:14 Kepha siyaniyala, bazalwane, ukuba niluleke abangahambi ngomthetho, nithokozise abadanileyo, nisekele ababuthakathaka, nibabekezelele bonke.
1Thess 5:15 Qaphelani ukuba kungabikho ophindisela omunye okubi ngokubi; kepha jongani njalo ukwenza okuhle, omunye komunye nakubo bonke.
1Thess 5:16 Thokozani njalo;
1Thess 5:17 khulekani ningaphezi;
1Thess 5:18 kukho konke bongani; ngokuba lokhu kuyintando kaNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu ngani.
1Thess 5:19 Ningamcimi uMoya;
1Thess 5:20 ningakudeleli ukuprofetha;
1Thess 5:21 vivinyani konke, nibambisise okuhle;
1Thess 5:22 dedani kukho konke okubonakala kukubi.
1Thess 5:23 Kepha uNkulunkulu wokuthula, yena uqobo, makaningcwelise ngokupheleleyo, kulondolozwe umoya wenu wonke nomphefumulo nomzimba, kungabi nacala ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu.
1Thess 5:24 Uthembekile yena onibizayo, oyakukwenza futhi.
1Thess 5:25 Bazalwane, sikhulekeleni.
1Thess 5:26 Khonzani kubazalwane bonke ngokwanga okungcwele.
1Thess 5:27 Ngiyanifungisa iNkosi ukuba le ncwadi ifundwe kubo bonke abazalwane.
1Thess 5:28 Umusa weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu mawube nani.
2Thess 1:1 OPawulu, noSilvanu, noThimothewu kulo ibandla labaseThesalonika elikuNkulunkulu, uBaba wethu, naseNkosini uJesu Kristu:
2Thess 1:2 Makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba naseNkosini uJesu Kristu.
2Thess 1:3 Simelwe ukumbonga njalo uNkulunkulu ngani bazalwane, njengokuba kufanele, ngokuba inkolo yenu iyanda kakhulu, nothando lwenu nonke omunye komunye luyakhula,
2Thess 1:4 kuze kuthi thina ngokwethu sizincome ngani emabandleni kaNkulunkulu ngenxa yokukhuthazela kwenu nokukholwa ekuzingelweni kwenu konke nasezinhluphekweni enibekezela kuzo,
2Thess 1:5 okuyisiboniso sokwahlulela okulungileyo kukaNkulunkulu, ukuze kuthiwe ningabalungele umbuso kaNkulunkulu enihlupheka ngenxa yawo,
2Thess 1:6 uma kambe kuyinto elungile kuNkulunkulu ukuba abuyisele ukuhlupheka kubo abanihluphayo,
2Thess 1:7 aniphe nina enihluphekayo ukuphumula kanye nathi ekwambulweni kweNkosi uJesu, evela ezulwini, enezingelosi zamandla akhe,
2Thess 1:8 elangabini lomlilo, ephindisela kwabangamazi uNkulunkulu nakwabangalaleli ivangeli leNkosi yethu uJesu,
2Thess 1:9 abazakunikwa isijeziso esingukubhujiswa okuphakade, basuke phambi kobuso beNkosi naphambi kwenkazimulo yamandla akhe,
2Thess 1:10 nxa efika ukuba akhazimuliswe kubo abangcwele bakhe, abe ngomangalisayo kubo bonke abakholwa ngalowo muhla, ngokuba nakholwa ngukufakaza kwethu.
2Thess 1:11 Ngenxa yalokho siyanikhulekela njalo, ukuze uNkulunkulu wethu anenze nibe ngabafanele ukubizwa kwenu, agcwalise ngamandla konke okuhle enikuthandayo nomsebenzi wokukholwa,
2Thess 1:12 ukuze igama leNkosi yethu uJesu likhazimuliswe kini, nani kuye, ngokomusa kaNkulunkulu wethu noweNkosi uJesu Kristu.
2Thess 2:1 Kepha siyanxusa, bazalwane, mayelana nokufika kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu nokubuthanela kwethu kuyo,
2Thess 2:2 ukuba ningasheshi ninyakaziswe engqondweni yenu, ningethuswa noma ngomoya, noma ngezwi, noma ngencwadi ngokungathi ivela kithi, sengathi usuku lukaKristu selufikile.
2Thess 2:3 Makungabikho muntu onikhohlisayo nangayiphi indlela; ngokuba aluyikufika, kungaveli kuqala ukuhlubuka, kwambulwe umuntu ongenamthetho, indodana yokulahlwa,
2Thess 2:4 omelana nakho konke, nozikhukhumeza phezu kwakho konke okuthiwa uNkulunkulu noma into ekhonzwayo, aze azihlalise ethempelini likaNkulunkulu ezishaya uNkulunkulu.
2Thess 2:5 Anikhumbuli yini ukuthi ngisekhona kini nganitshela lokho na?
2Thess 2:6 Senikwazi okumbambezelayo, ukuze ambulwe ngesikhathi sakhe.
2Thess 2:7 Ngokuba imfihlakalo yokungabi namthetho isiyasebenza, kuphela ukuze kudediswe yena obambezelayo manje.
2Thess 2:8 Lapho-ke uzakwambulwa lowo ongenamthetho, eyakumqeda iNkosi uJesu Kristu ngomoya womlomo wayo, imchithe ngokubonakala kokufika kwayo,
2Thess 2:9 lowo okufika kwakhe kungokokusebenza kukaSathane ngawo onke amandla, nezibonakaliso, nezimangaliso zamanga,
2Thess 2:10 nangayo yonke inkohliso yokungalungi kwababhubhayo, ngenxa yokuba bengavumanga ukuthanda iqiniso, ukuze basindiswe.
2Thess 2:11 Ngalokho-ke uNkulunkulu ubathumela amandla okuduka, baze bakholwe ngamanga,
2Thess 2:12 ukuba bonke abangakholwanga yiqiniso benamela ukungalungi balahlwe.
2Thess 2:13 Kepha thina simelwe ukubonga uNkulunkulu njalo ngani bazalwane abathandwa yiNkosi, ngokuba kwasekuqaleni uNkulunkulu wanikhethela ukusindiswa ngokungcwelisa kukaMoya nangokukholwa yiqiniso
2Thess 2:14 anibizela kukho ngevangeli lethu, nize nizuze inkazimulo yeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu.
2Thess 2:15 Ngalokho-ke, bazalwane, yimani niqinile, nibambelele kuwo amasiko enawafundiswa noma ngezwi noma ngencwadi yethu.
2Thess 2:16 Kepha iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu uqobo, noNkulunkulu uBaba wethu owasithanda nowasipha ngomusa induduzo yaphakade nethemba elihle,
2Thess 2:17 makaduduze izinhliziyo zenu, aniqinise emisebenzini yonke nasemazwini onke amahle.
